headline: Vechidiki Voita Ongororo Inobata Kushaikwa kweMari Munyika
text: Apo veruzhinji vari kuramba vachinetseka nekushaya mari mumabhangi rimwe sangano revechidiki muBulawayo ratanga chirongwa chekuita ongororo yematambudziko akasiyana siyana ari kusangana nevanhu nekuda kwekushandiswa kwema bond notes munyika. Vechidki ava vanoti chinangwa chavo ndechekuzoendesa tsvakurudzo yavo kubhanga guru renyika senzira yekuedza kubatsira kupedza matambudziko aya.\n\nMukuru wesangano reYouth Economic Forum, VaFarikai Masiyamhuru, vanoti sangano ravo raona zvakakodzera kuita tsvagiridzo pamusoro pematambudziko ari kutarisana neveruzhinji kubva mukushaikwa kuri kuitwa mari mumabhangi. VaMasiyamhuru vati vakazivisa Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe nezvechirongwa chavo vachiti zvakakosha kuti vanhu munyika vaise misoro pamwe chete mukuedza kuwana nzira dzekupedza dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari munyika. VaMasiyamhuru, avo vanoshandira imwe kambani hombe inogadzira nekutengesa mbatya, vanoti vakatanga sangano reYouth Economic Forum nevamwe vavo gore rakapera nechinangwa chekupa vechidiki mikana yekuti vazeye nezvemagariro evanhu uye nezvehupfumi ukuwo sangano iri richishanda sechipangamazano munyaya idzi. VaChirenje Moyo avo vanove nhengo yesangano reYouth Economic Forum vati senzira yekuita ongororo yavo vanenge vachitaura neveruzhinji vachivabvunza zvavari kusangana nazvo zuva nezuva mukutsvaga mari kumabhangi. VaMoyo vanoti kunze kwekunetseka kuwana mari mumabhanga mamwe matambudziko avatonzwa kubva kuvanhu munguva pfupi yavatanga chirongwa chavo anosanganisira kuti vakuru vakuru vemabhangi akasiyana siyana havautaure nevanhu vachivatsanangurira zvizere pamusoro pedambudziko rekushomeka kwemari. Vatiwo vakawanda vari kuchema nerekuti mukutsvaga mari kumabhangi vari kurasikirwa nenguva yakakura pamwe nemari shoma yavanenge vainayo. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, kana kusangano reBankers Association of Zimbabwe. Nyika yakatanga kushandisa mari yemabond notes muna Mbudzi gore rapera mushure mekunge mukuru weRBZ, VaJohn Mangudya, vachiti iyi yaive nzira yekubatsira kugadzirisa kushomeka kwemari yekunze munyika uye zvaizoitika kwenguva pfupi. VaMangudya vakatiwo ma bond notes akatadza kushanda zvakanaka, vaizosiya basa. Zimbabwe yakatanga kushandisa mari yekunze mugore ra2009 mushure mekunge mari yemunyika yapera simba rekutenga. VaMasiyamhuru vati maonero avo ndeekuti nyika inofanirwa kuve nemari yayo asi mari iyi inofanirwa kuunzwa kana mamiriro ezvehupfumi agadziriswa uye veruzhinji vachinyatsoziviswa zvizere pamusoro penyaya iyi. VaMasiyamhuru vati vanotarisira kupedza ongororo yavo mukati memasvondo maviri vobva vaendesa zvavanenge vawana kuRBZ. Mutevedzeri wemukuru wesangano reCentre for Public Engagement, vachitaura semuongorori wezvematongerwo enyika akazvimirira ega, VaButler Tambo, vanoti vanhu munyika vane tsika yekufira mumbereko semwana asingacheme vachiti zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vakwanise kutaura pachena pamusoro pematambudziko avakatarisana nawo kunyanya panyaya yekushaikwa kwemari munyika. Vanhu munyika pavakabvunzwa kuti vanoda kuti mabond notes ashandiswe here kana kuti kwete, vakawanda vakati kwete asi hurumende yakaenderera mberi nekuunza mari iyi ichiti izvi zvaizobatsira kushaikwa kwemari munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi vepaMugodhi weShamva Gold Mine Voramwa Mabasa
text: Vashandi vepamugodhi weShamva Gold Mine, vanonzi vakatanga kuramwa mabasa nezuro vachinyunyuta nemashandiro avari kuita, uye kusatambiriswa mihoro nyavo kwemwedzi mina yadarika. Vashandi vari kuramwa mabasa ava, avo vari pasi pekambani yezvicherwa ye Metallon, vanoti zvimwe zvavari kuda kuti zvigadziriswe inyaya yekuti pasi pavanoshandira hapana mweya wekufema wakanaka, izvo zvinovaisa munjodzi huru. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata vakuru vemugodhi uyu. Asi munyori wesangano revashandi vemugodhi uyu, VaPatrick Mugwambi vanoti vashandi vakazvipira kudzokera kumabasa avo kana zvichemo zvavo zvakagadziriswa nekukasika.

headline: Zimbabwe Youmba Komiti Inotsvaka Nzira Dzekushandisa Kubhdhara Zvikwereti
text: Hurumende yaumba komiti ichaona kuti Zimbabwe yabhadhara zvikwereti zvayo zvinosvika mabhiriyoni gumi emadhora. Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vanoti komiti iyi ichange iine vakuru kubva kubazi rezvehupfumi, African Development Bank, World Bank ne International Monetary Fund, IMF. Zimbabwe iri kuda zvimwe zvikwereti kuti igadzirise hupfumi asi hapana ari kuda kusungirira mari pagumbo rengwe sezvo kubhadhara zvikwereti izvi kuri kunetsa. Gore rapera mukuru wezvirongwa zveIMF muZimbabwe, VaDominique Fanezzi, vakati Zimbabwe haisi kuzopihwa zvimwe zvikwereti uye hapana kutsukunyuka padanho iri. Zvikwereti izvi zviri kuboka rinonzi Paris Club rinosanganisira Germany, France, Britain, Japan neAmerica. Kune zvikweretiwo kuIMF, African Development Bank neWorld Bank. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongwero enyika dzinoti chikwereti cheZimbabwe ndicho chimwe chikonzero chiri kutadzisa nyika kuti ibudirire. Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, vanoti Zimbabwe ikakwanisa kubhadhara chikwereti chayo, inenge yokwanisa kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi.

headline: Zimpapers Yoshorwa neKudzinga Vashandi Mabasa Zvisina Tsarukano
text: Masangano anomirira vatapi venhau munyika anoti haasi kufara nekudzingwa mabasa zvisina tsarukano kweshandi nekambani yeZimbabwe Newspapers uye masangano aya anoti achagara pasi nehurumende nechinangwa chekuti kambani iyi isiye katsika aka. Masangano aya, ayo ari pasi peMedia Alliance of Zimbabwe anoti anoshushikana zvikuru nekuti vashandi vekambani iyi vatatu vanoti, VaMunyaradzi Huni vanga vari mutevedzeri wemupepeti webepanhau rekambani iyi reThe Sunday Mail, nevamwe vakuru weimwe nhepfenyuro yekambani iyi yeCapiTalk VaNapoleon Nyanhi naMuzvare Ruvheneko Parirenyatwa vakadzingwa mabasa mazuva mashonana apfuura pasina zvikonzero zvakajeka. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuZimpapers panyaya iyi asi vanoziva zviri kuitika vanoti kudzingwa kwevatatu ava kune chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika. Zvinonzi mashandiro evatatu ava haana kufadza vamwe vakuru vakuru muhurumende. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwezvirongwa muMedia Alliance of Zimbabwe, VaNigel Nyamutumbu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti havasi kufara nemabatirwo akaikaitwa nyaya yevatatu ava. Vanoti vaitarisira kuti zvinhu zvichashanduka muhurumende itsva yaVaMnangagwa asi hapana chasanduka sezvo vatapi venhau vari kuramba vachidzvinyirirwa. VaNyamutumbu vakurudzirawo vatapi venhau kuti vaite basa ravo pachena vasina divi ravakarekera uyewo vati makambani ese ezvekutapwa kwenhau anofanira kuvhara kana asingade kuremekedza kodzero dzevatapi venhau dzavanopihwa nebumbiro remutemo wenyika. Imwe nhengo yebhodhi rinomirira vapepeti venhau munyika reZimbabwe National Editors Forum, VaBarnabas Tondhlana vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakaitwa nekambani yeZimpapers hazvina kunaka. Vanoti kunyange mutapi wenhau akakanganisa anofanirawo kubatwa zvine hunhu kwete kubatwa sembwa. Media Alliance of Zimbabwe inoti zvaitwa neZimpapers zvinoratidza pachena kuti hurumende itsva iyi haina hurongwa hwekuti vatapi venhau vashande vakasununguka uye inoti zvakaoma kuti munhu aite mutapi wenhau muZimbabwe. Pakapinda VaMnangagwa panyanga muna Mbudzi gore rapfuura Zimpapers yakadzinga vamwe vatori venhau vaifungidzirwa kuti vainge vakarerekera kuvanhu vanonzi ndivo vaifurira vaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakaita sevaive gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro VaJonathan Moyo. Nhengo dzesangano reMedia Alliance of Zimbabwe dzinosanganisira masangano anoti Media Monitoring Project Zimbabwe, Media Institute of Southern Africa (Zimbabwe chapter), Zimbabwe Union of Journalists (ZUJ), Zimbabwe National Editors’ Forum (ZINEF), Gender and Media Connect (GMC), the Media Centre, the Zimbabwe Association of Community Radio Stations (ZACRAS), the Voluntary Media Council of Zimbabwe (VMCZ) and the African Community Publishing Development Trust (ACPDT). No media source currently available

headline: Masangano Akazvimirira Okurudzira Vanhu Kuti Varambe maBond Notes
text: Vemasangano akazvimirira vakabvumirana nhemusi weMuvhuro kuti vataure neve ruzhinji kuti varambe mabond notes ari kuda kuparurwa ne hurumende mwedzi uno. Vemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira vakabvumirana kuti vapinde muvanhu vachiva kurudzira kuti vatore matanho nehurongwa hwekuda kuunza mabond notes aya. Sachigaro wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition rinove raronga musangano uyu, Muzvare Sally Dura, vati zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vasarambe vakapeta mawoko avo ivo vachitsutsumwa. Muzvare Dura vati vabvumiranawo zvakare kuti veruzhinji vazeye nyaya yehuwori hwatekeshera munyika zvikuru sei muhurumende. Doctor Patson Dzamara, avo vanoshanda nesangano reOccupy Africa Unity Square vaudza musangano uyu kuti chave kudikanwa ndechekuti munhu wese apinde mumigwagwa achiratidzira kudzamara zvido zveveruzhinji zvazadziswa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vachishanda nesangano re Labor and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze vati chanyanyonetsa ndechekuti vari muhurumende vari kuswerotambisa nguva vachitarisa kuti achatora matomhu kubva kumutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe ndiyani vasingaite zvinoda kuitwa kuti hupfumi hwenyika huvandudzwe. Vatiwo misangano iri kuitwa nagavhuna webhanga guru renyika VaJohn Mangudya ne veruzhinji inoratidza pachena kuti hurumende iri kuda kudzosa mari yemuZimbabwe nerweseri sezvagara zvichitaurwa nevari kupikisa hurongwa hwemabond notes uyu. VaMangudya neMuvhuro vakaita musangano nevagari vekuBanket vachiti vari kutsanangurira veruzhinji masevenzeserwo achaitwa mabond notes. RBZ inoti mabond notes achashandiswa semubairo kune vanenge vachitengesa zvinhu kunze kwenyika kana kuti export incentive. VaMangudya vanotiwo mabond notes achaparurwa mukupera kwemwedzi uno. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Prisca Mupfumi neVamwe Voita Misangano muLondon
text: Gurukota rezvekushanyirwa kwenyika, Amai Prisca Mupfumira, nevamwe vakuru muhurumende, vari muLondon kuBritain kwavapinda musangano wezuva rimwechete we Investment Forum waitrirwa pa London Hilton Canary Wharf iri muCentral London. Musangano uyu wakarongwa neZimbabwe Investment and Development Agency iyo yakaburitsa gwaro neChitatu ichiti chinangwa chemusangano uyu change chiri chekushambadza Zimbabwe nemikana iri munyika munyaya dzezvemabhizinesi nekushanyirwa kwenyika. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi vashoropodza danho rehurumende rikuita rwendo rwune vanhu vakawanda vanobva kuZimbabwe vachienda kuLondon kunokwezva vekunze vachiti misnagano yakadai inogona kurongwa nemuzinda weZimbabwe muBritain. Vanhu ava vanoti Zimbabwe iri parumananzomba sezvo zvisina zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzemari. Hatina kukwanisa kubata Amai Mupfumira kuti tinzwe tivi ravo. Sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekushanyirwa kwenyika, Amai Concilia Chinanzvavana vanoti basa ravo sekomiti nderekuona kuti zvirongwa zvebazi rekushanya kwevanhu munyika zvaitwa negwara rakanaka here. No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru yeBulawayo Yoendesa Zesa kuMatare eDzimhosva
text: Guta reBulawayo rinoti harizi kuzosiya zvivakwa zvaro zvichitorwa nekambani yeZesa, kubutikidza nekambani Zimbabwe Power Company, iyo iri pasi peZesa. Kanjani iyi inogadzira magetsi munyika. Kanzuru yeBulawayo inoti icharamba yakatsika madziro pahurongwa hwehurumende hwekuda kuputsa zvivakwa zvayo zviviri zviri pagwenya remagetsi anobva mumarasha paBulawayo Thermal Power Station. NeChishanu pakaita kupesana kukuru pakati pekanzuru yeBulawayo negurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, VaFortune Chasi, pamusoro pedanho rehurumende rekuda kuparadzwa zvivakwa zviviri zviri izvi. Meya weguta reBulawayo, VaSolomon Mguni, vanoti vakatokwidza nyaya iyi kumatare edzimhosva sezvo zvivakwa izvi zviri zvekanzuru yeguta ravo.  Zesa, kubudikidza neZimbabwe Power Company, inonzi iri kuda kubvisa zvivakwa izvi ichiti zvinogona kudhirika zvega zvikakonzera njodzi. Asi VaMguni vanoti izvi hazvisi kuzoitika nekuti zvivakwa izvi hazvisi zve Zesa. VaMguni vati Zesa yakaita zvisiri pamutemo zvekuedza kuchinja muridzi wezvivakwa izvi ichizviisa muzita rayo. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuvakuru vakuru veZesa divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo nharembozva dzavo dzanga dzichinetsa kubata. Asi VaMguni vanoti vane magwaro anoratidza kuti zvivakwa izvi ndezvekanzuru yeguta ravo nokudaro hapana anokwanisa kutaura akamirira zvivakwa izvi kunze kwekanzuru yavo. VaChasi vakaudza Studio7 neChishanu kuti kanzuru yeBulawayo inofanirwa kutaurirana neZesa vowirirana kuti voenderera mberi seyi. VaChasi, avo vakaita musangano nekanzuru yeBulawayo, vakati rwendo rwavo kuBulawayo rwaive rwekuti vazivisane nekuonesana pamire zvinhu. Asi VaMguni vanoti hapana hurongwa hunoitwa pazvivakwa zvavo kanzuru yavo isina ruzivo nazvo. No media source currently available

headline: Vemabhizimusi Madiki Vochema neKusafamba kweBhizimusi seZvavanga Vakatarisira paNguva Ino yeZororo reKisimusi
text: Apo kwasara zuva rimwechete kuti vanhu vapinde muzororo reKisimusi, vemamwe mabhizimusi madiki pamwe nevanotengesera mumigwagwa vanoti bhizimusi harina kusimuka gore rino sezvinotarisirwa panguva yezororo rakadai . Mumwe wevari kuchema-chema nekuderera kwebhizimusi ndiMuzvare Patricia Ticharwa vane chitoro chinotengesa mbatya mudhorobha. Muzvare Ticharwa vati sezvo gore rino zvinhu zvanga zvisinganyatsofamba vanga vane tarisiro yekuti kana vanhu vogadzirira Kisimusi zvinhu zvichachinja. Amai Benhilda Konje, avo vane vana vatatu, vanotengeserawo mumusha weGlenview, vatsigirawo vachiti veruzhinji vari kuratidza kuti havana mari uye havasi kutengerwa sezvavange vachitarisira. Amai Jane Sanhuwe, mumwe mutengesi vatiwo kushaikwa kwemari kuchakanganisawo zvirongwa zvavo zvekugadzirira vana pakuvhurwa kwezvikoro. Vanoongorora zvehupfumi, VaMasimba Manyanya, vati kuderera kwebhizimusi panguva ino hakukatyamadzi vachiti vanhu vari kutambira mari shoma dzisingakwani. Vaendererawo mberi vachiti mari haisi kutenderera munyika sezvo zvinhu zvinogadzirwa munyika zviri zvishoma izvo zvoitawo kuti vanokwanisa vanoshandisira mari dzavo kunze kwenyika. Vamwewo ndivo vari kuchengetedza mari dzavainadzo kuitira kuzobhadharira vana zvikoro gore rinouya, sezvo zvikoro zvakawanda zvemunyika zvakatozivisa kare kuti zvichakwidza mari dzechikoro gore rinouya. Gore rino Kisimusi ichange ichicherechedzwa musi weSvondo asi vazhinji vachichemachema nekuoma kwezvinhu munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yotarisana neDambudziko reKushomeka kweMvura muMaguta nekuMaruwa
text: Zimbabwe yakatarisana nedambudziko guru rekushaikwa kwemvura, uye gurukota rezvemvura, Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri, vanoti izvi hazvisati zvambotika mukati memakore makumi mashanu apfuura. Vanotiwo vakatokumbira dare remakurukota kuti rivape mvumo yekugovera mvura mumatunhu ese. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare nemusi weChishanu maererano nemamiriro akaita nyaya yemvura munyika, Amai Muchinguri Kashiri vakati kunyange hazvo hurumende yakapa bazi ravo mamiriyoni manomwe emadhora ekuderedza dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemvura munyika, dambudziko iri rakakura chose uye madhamu mumatunhu ese munyika asara nemvura shoma. Amai Muchinguri Kashiri vakati dambudziko remvura rakanyanyisa kuMasvingo uko vati madhamu eko ave nemvura iri pasi pezvikamu makumi maviri nechimwe kubva muzana. Vanoti panguva ino yegore madhamu mazhinji angadai aine zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana asi mazhinji acho angora nezvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana. Vanotiwo kunze kwemadhamu, zvibhorani nematsime akakawanda ari kupwa nekuda kwekupisa kwezuva. Vati zviborani zvinodarika zviuru gumi munyika zvakatopwa uye hurumende iri kutora matanho ekuona kuti pacherwa zvibhorani nematsime akadzika. Amai Muchinguri Kashiri vatiwo kunyange hazvo mvura isina kunaya zvakakwana mwaka uno, magariro anoita vanhu, nyaya dzekurima pedzyo nenzizi nemadhamu ndizvo zvimwe zvave kuita kuti madhamu akasike kupwa mvura. Vakurudzirawo vemaindasitiri, vemigodhi, makanzuru pamwe neveruzhinji kuti vashandise mvura zvinemwero pamwe nekudyara miti izvi vati zvinobatsira mukuchengetedza mumvura. Vatiwo vanhu vanofanira kusiyana nekatsika kekuvaka, nekurima pese vachiti izvi zviri kukonzera kuti madhamu akurumidze kuoma. Zvichakadaro, mukuru wekambani yehurumende inoona nezvemvura yeZimbabwe National Water Authority VaJefta Sakupwanya vati kambani yavo yakatarisana nedambudziko rekushaya mari sezvo makunzuru mazhinji munyika asiri kubhadhara mvura yaanoshandisa. Amai Muchinguri Kashiri vakurudzira makanzuru kuti abhadhare mvura yaanoshandisa vachiti izvi zvinobatsira kuti kambani iyi iiite basa rayo nemazvo. vatiwo vachaita musangano svondo rinoouya wekuzeya dambudziko remvura munyika pamwe nekuti ringagadziriswe sei. Makunzuru akawanda munyika akaita seHarare, Chitungwiza, Masvingo nemamwe akatotanga kugovera mvura kuvagari nenyaya yekuti mvura yavo shoma mumadhamu avo. VeChitungwiza Residents Trustvanotiwo vachaitawo musangano svondo rinoouya nekanzuru yavo pamwe nemakambani anoita zvemvura nechinangwa chekugadzirisa dambudziko remvura mudhorobha iri. Dambudziko iri richanyanya kukura sezvo hurumende isiri kuvakawo madhamu. No media source currently available

headline: VaChivhayo Vooneswa Ndondo neNyaya yeHuori muDare reParamende
text: Muzvinabhizimisi, Wicknell Chivhayo, nemusi weMuvhuro vakabvuma mudare reparamende kuti vakashandisa vezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nevakuru vakuru vehurumende kuti kambani yavo yeIntratrek iwanane basa rekuumba gwenya remagetsi ezuva reGwanda Solar Project kunyange hazvo vange vasingakodzeri. Vachipa humbowo kukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemighodhi nezvemhando dzemoto kuti kambani yavo yeIntratrek yakawana sei basa rekuvaka gwenya remagetsi reGwanda Solar Project, VaChivhayo vabvuma kuti pakutanga kambani yavo yakatadza kuwana basa iri uye rakapihwa kune imwe kambani yekuChina. Vati izvi zvaitika, vakaenda kune vaiva gurukota rezvemando dzemoto, VaDzikamai Mavhaire, vakandotsutsumwa kuti sei vainge vashaya basa iri ivo vari ivo vainge vauuya nepfungwa yekuvaka gwenya iyi. Vatiwo vakanyorera kumunyori wedare remakurukota, Chief Secretary to the President and Cabinet pamwe nasachigaro weState Procurement Board vachichema chema nenyaya yavo yekushaya basa iri. Vati izvi zvakazoita kuti veState Procurement board vape kambani yavo pamwe nedzimwe mbiri basa rekuvaka magwenya emagatsi kunzvimbo nhatu munyika uye ivo vakapihwa basa rekuGwanda. Vati mushure maizvozvo vakatanga kuita basa rekutanga kana kuti Feasibility Study asi kambani yemagetsi yeZimbabwe Power Company yakaramba kuvabhadhara mamiriyoni maviri emadhora avaida sezvo vaive vasina magwaro ekubhanga airatidza kuti ivo vaivewo nemari mubhanga mavo. Pavabvunzwa nemumiriri weKwekwe Central VaMasangano Matambanadzo kuti sei vaida kubhadharwa asi vasina kutevedza mutemo, VaChivhaya vati mari yaidiwa yange yakawandisa. VaChivhayo vati mushure mekuramba kubhadharwa nemukuru weZPC, Vakabva vadzokera zvakare kune vange vave gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, VaSamuel Undenge, kundochema chema zvakare izvo zvakazoita kuti ZPC ivabhadhare mari inosvika mamiriyoni mabiri nechuru zana chemadhora kana kuti 2, 1 million dollars. Mumiriri weGlen View North, VaFani Munengami vati semaonero avo maitiro aVaChivhayo anoratidza kuti vaiita zvinhu vasingatevedzi gwara uye vanenge vaiita zvehuwori. No media source currently available

headline: VeZCTU neZFTU Vanoti Vakuru Vakawanda kuNSSA Ngavamiswe Basa neNyaya yeHuori
text: Masangano evashandi anoti reZimbawe Congress of Trade Union ne Zimbabwe Federation of Trade Unions anoti haasi kufara nedanho rasachigaro weNational Social Security Authority Doctor Percy Toriro rekumisa basa mukuru wekambani iyi VaArthur Manase voga basa. Munyori mukuru weZCTU VaJaphet Moyo vanoti huori huri kupomerwa vakuru vekambani iyi hwakakura zvekuti hapadi kuti munhu mumwe chete akandwe pasi pebazi. VaMoyo vati bhodhi rose rinofanira kumbomiswa basa. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemunyori mukuru weZFTU VaKennias Shamuyarira vanoti masangano evashandi anofanira kumbofanobata matomu pachiitwa ongororo. Gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vanoti vashandi vanofanira kunzwisa kuti vanhu vanonzi vabatwa nemhosva chete kana papedza kuitwa ongororo. Vati vashandi vanofanira kumirira kuti hurumende ipete ongororo yayo. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakanyora mubepanhau reSunday Mail mavhiki adarika vachiti havasi kufara nemabatirwo ebasa kuNSSA zvakapa kuti paparurwe ongororo iyi. Asi vashandi vanoti vange vave nemakore vachiti NSSA iri kuvabata neseri kweruoko kana vave pamudyandigere ichivapa mari shoma asi vakuru vekambani iyi vachidya noriva nekupura nyemba nemusana.

headline: Hurumende Yokundikana Kubhadhara Vashandi Mari yeKubatsirikana
text: Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakapa mapurisa nemauto mari yekubatsirikana inosvika madhora mazana emaRTGS svondo rapera, vamwe vashandi vehurumende vakaita sevarairidzi, madhokotera navanamukoti vatambira neChishanu, havasati vapihwa mari iyi. Hurumende inoti hayo pane zvimhingamupinyi zviripo zviri kukonzerwa nekunetsana kwemabhanga nePaynet iyo iri kuti haisi kuzoshanda nemabhanga emunyika kusvika abhadhara chikwereti. Asi hurumende inoti vashandi vose vachapihwa mari yekubatsirikana iyi nhaurirano dzemihoro dzichienderera mberi. Hurumende inoti iri kuda kupa vashandi ava mari inosvika zana remadhora asi ivo vachiti vanoda mari inotosvika zviuru zvina zvichienderana nekushaya simba kwedhora reRTGS rave kushandiswa munyika. Sangano reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe rakakurudzira nemusi weChina varairidzi kuti vatange kuratidzira neChishanu richiti harisi kufara nezviri kuitwa nehurumende pakutaurirana kuri kuitwa. Vanachiremba navanamukoti vanonzi vave nenguva vachienda kumabasa mazuva maviri chete sezvo vari kuti havana mari. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano revarairidzi reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti varairidzi vachatanga kuratidzira neMuvhuro. No media source currently available Kunyange hazvo vamwe vashandi vehurumende vari kuti vave kudawo kutanga kuratidzira, sangano revashandi vemuzvipatara vanosanganisira madhokotera navanamukoti reHealth Apex Council rinoti nhengo dzaro dziri kuenda kubasa mazuva maviri chete. Vanotungamira mubatanidzwa wemasangano evashandi vemuzvipatara weHealth Apex Council,Va Panganai Chivese, vaudza Studio7 kuti naivowo vange vasati vapihwa mari yekubatsirikana. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi veHurumende Votarisirwa Kusangana neVamiriri veHurumende Kuzeya Gakava reMihoro
text: Vamiriri vevashandi vehurumende vari pasi pesangano reApex Council vari kutarisirwa kusangana zvakare mangwanani ano nevamiriri vehurumende pamusangano weNational Joint Negotiating Council, uyo unotarisirwa kugadzirisa gakava renyaya dzemihoro. Mapoka maviri aya akasangana zvakare svondo rapera neChishanu, asi musangano uyu unonzi hauna chawakaburitsa mushure mekunge vashandi varamba kutambira zvakanga zvaiswa patafura nehurumende, izvo zvinonzi zvaizosiya mushandi anotambira muhoro wepasi achitambira mihoro iri pakati pemadhora zviuru zviviri nemazana maviri nezviuru zvitatu nemazana mashanu zvemadhora emunyika pamwedzi. Munyori mukuru musangano reApex Council VaDavid Dzatsunga vanoti vanotarisira kuti musangano weMuvhuro uyu uchagadzirisa zvichemo pamwe nekutambura kwevashandi vehurumende. VaDzatsunga, avo vasina kuda kubuda pachena kuti hurumende yakanga yakapfumateyi pavakasangana svondo rapera, vanoti hurumende yakanga yadzoka yakwidza zvishoma zvayaive nazvo kubva pamusangano wavakanga vamboita asi vakada kutanga vambonzwa kubva kunhengo dzavo vasati vaita zvemusoro wavo. Chimwe chinonzi chakatadza kuwiriranwa yaive nyaya yekuti mari idzi dzotambiriswa vashandi kubva mwedzi upi sezvo hurumende ichinzi yaida kuti itange kupa vashandi vayo mihoro mitsva iyi muna Kukadzai, asi vashandi vachida kuti vatange kutambiriswa mari idzi mwedzi uno waNdira. Pari zvino vashandi vehurumende havasi kuenda kumabasa mazuva ose, vachiti havachakwanisa kuti vange vachiwana mari dzekufambisa. Mwedzi wapera hurumende yakavapa mari dzekubatsirikana dzaisvika kumadhora mazana manomwe, asi VaDzatsunga vanoti hadzina zvikuru zvadzakavabatsira nazvo sezvo vashandi vagara vanyura mumadhaka nekuda kwenhamo. Vashandi vehurumende vagara gore negore vachinetsana nemushandirwi kuti vawedzerwe mihoro inoita kuti vakwanise kurarama, ukuwo hurumende ichiti homwe dzayo dzakabooka. No media source currently available

headline: Vakuru veKambani yeFSG Vosungiswa neKuzvidza Dare reParamende neNyaya ye"Command Agriculture"
text: Paramende yeZimbabwe nhasi yanyora magwaro ekusungisa kambani mukuru wekambani yeFert, Seed, Grain (FSG) nemhosva yekuzvidza dare. Sachigaro vekomiti iyi, VaTendai Biti veMDC, vati zviri pachena kuti vakuru vekambani iyi vari kuzvidza komiti yavo saka vaita chisungo chekuti mukuru wekambani iyi, VaSteve Morland, vasungwe nenyaya yekuzvidza dare. Vakuru vekambani iyi vatadza kuuya kuzotsangangura kuti sei yakabhadharwa mamiriyoni mazana mana emadhora ($400 million) nehurumende muna 2017 na2018 zviri kunze kwebhajeti pamwe nekuti mari iyi yakashandiswei. FSG ndeimwe yemakambani ari kuda kubvunzurudzwa nekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekushandiswa kwemari yehurumende, yePublic Accounts Committee, iyo iri kuongororo kunofungidzirwa kuti kusashandiswa zvakanaka kwemari yehurumende inodarika mabhiriyoni mashanu muna 2017 na 2018. Kambani iyi yave nenguva ichitadza kumira pamberi pekomiti iyi isingape zvikonzero uye nhasi chaiye yatadza kuuya zvagumbira nhengo dzeparamende dziri mukomiti yezvekufambiswa kwemari. VaBiti vanoti zvino shamisa kuti kambani yeFSG inoramba kuuya kukomiti yavo asi ichienda kune mamwe makaomiti eparamende. Mwedzi uno VaMorland vakaenda kunomira pamberi pekomiti yezvekurima ina VaJustice Wadyajena vanova nhengo yeZanu-PF sasachigaro. Pamberi pekomiti iyi, VaMorland vatisina kukwanisa kubata nhasi vakaramba kuti vakaita zvehuori nemari iyi. Komiti yaVaBiti yashorawo kuita kwevamwe vakuru vakuru mubazi rezvamari avo vasinawo kuuya kuzopa humbowo kukomiti iyi pamusoro pemashandisirwo aiitwa mari zviri kunze kwemutemo nehurumende muna 2017 na2018. VaBiti vayambira vakuru ava, vano sanganisira mukuru anoona nezvamabhajeti mubazi rezvemari, VaZvinecheimwe Churu, kuti vasara nemukana mumwe chete uye kana vakatadza kuuya musi wa15 Mbudzi vachasungwawo. VaChuru nevamwe vavo vatadza kuenda kuparamende vachiti vange vari kumusangano wekubasa kwavo kuDarwandale. Asi VaBiti vanoti basa reparamende rakakosha kudarika rimwe basa ripi zvaro. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana chakaipa chiri kuitwa neparamende sezvo iri kuita basa rayo rekuongorora kuti mari yevanhu yakashandiswa sei. Vatiwo hazvifaniri kunetsa bazi rezvemari kutsanangura kuti mari yakashandiswa sei vachiti kana poita kuda kunzvenga nzvenga zvinoreva kuti pane zvinenge zvisina kufambiswa zvakanaka. Paramende iri kuita ongororo mushure mekunge hofisi inoona nezvekufambiswa kwemari dzehurumende yaAuditor-General vaburitsa mugwaro rayo kuti mari dzainge dzisina kushandiswa zvakanaka nebazi rezvekurima muna 2017 na2018. Mari yacho zhinji yakashandiswa pazvirongwa zvePresidential Input Scheme neCommand Agriculture. Gurukota rinoona nezvekurima VaPerrance Shiri vakazivisa kuti gore rino vari kuvandudza mapirwo emari iyi vachiti vanhu vanenge voenda kunopihwa mari dzacho sezvikwereti kumabhanga. Nyaya yekusafambisa zvakanaka mari idzi kunziwo nemuzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe mumwe munongedzo wehuori hunoitika munyika huchipa kuti itadze kufambira mberi asi iyo yozoti zvirango zvainoti yakatemerwa. Asi hurumende inoti chirongwa cheCommand Agriculture chakakosha kuvandudza nyaya dzezvehupfumi kuburikidza nekurima. No media source currently available

headline: Kubviswa kweRutsigiro rweMari neHurumende muZvimwe Zvitengeswa Kwoomesera Veruzhinji
text: Zvinhu zvinonzi zviri kuramba zvichiomera veruzhinji munyika kuburikidza nekukwira kwemitengo yezvinonyanyodiwa muhupenyu, zvikuru zvekudya pamwe nemafuta edzimotokari, asi mihoro yevashandi vazhinji isina kwairi kuenda. Izvi zvinotevera kukwira kutanga svondo rino kweupfu zvichitevera danho rinonzi rakatorwa nehurumende rekubvisa rutsigiro rwemari mukutengwa kwechibage negorosi nevanogaya upfu. Rutsigiro urwu rwunonzi rwaibatsira kuti mitengo yezvinhu zvakaita seupfu nechingwa irambe iri pasi, sezvo vanogaya upfu vaiwana dzimwe dzemari dzavanoda kubva kuhurumende. Vachitura hurongwa hwemashandisirwo emari nehurumende mugore rinouya, gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vakazivisa kuti hurumende yaizotora danho iri senzira yekuderedza nayo mari yainoshandisa. Asi imwe nyanzvi mune zveupfumi, vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti danho rehurumende rekubvisa rutsigiro rwemari iri rakatoita kuti zvinhu zvinyanye kuomera veruzhinji. Semuenzaniso, katsaga keupfu hwerudzi rwe roller meal kane huremu hwemakirogiramu gumi kanonzi kakakwira mutengo kubva pamadhora makumi mashanu nemashanu kuenda pamadhora zana nerimwe nemasendi makumi matanhatu nematanhu. Peturu yakakwirawo mutengo kubva pamadhora gumi nemanomwe ane masendi manomwe kuenda pamadhora gumi nemanomwe ane masendi makumi mana nemana parita, kuchitiwo dhiziri richenda pamadhora gumi nemanomwe ane masendi makumi mapfumbamwe parita, richibva pamadhora gumi nemanomwe ane masendi makumi manomwe nemana. Mutewedzeri wemunyori mukuru wesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, VaThomas Masvingwe, vanoti kukwira kwemitengo uku kuri kuomesera vashandi zvakanyanya nekuti mihoro yavo haisi kufambirana nezviri kuitika mune zveupfumi. VaMasvingwe vanoti mari iri kutambirwa nevashandi haichagoni kuti vararame, vachiti zvose izvi zviri kukonzerwa nehurongwa hwehurumende hwekuvandudza upfumi, kana kuti austerity measures. Izvi zvinotsinhirwawo naDoctor Chitambara, avo vanoti mihoro yevashandi yedonha zvakanyanya zvichienzaniswa nehuremu hwedhora rekuAmerica. Asi vaimbove gurukota rezvemaindasitiri nekutengesera, VaMike Bimha, vanoti hongu, vanhu vangaona sekunge zvinhu zviri kukwira mitengo asi pane zvakawanda zvaikanganisa hupfumi zviri kuedza kugadziriswa nehurumende. Vanoti zvose izvi zvichapfuura zvinhu zvichitogadzikana zvakanaka kwazvo munyika. Panyaya yekuti zvose izvi zviri kuremera vashandi, VaBimha vanoti mhinduro inofanirwa kunge ichibva kuvashandirwi kuti vari kuzviona sei, asi vanoti ibasa revashandirwi kuona kuti vashandi vavo vadzivirirwa kubva mumatambudziko akasiyanasiyana. VaMasvingwe vanoti hupenyu hucharamba huchiomera veruzhinji, zvikuru vashandi, kana mitengo yakaramba ichiita chamurambamhuru pasina ari kuiisa matomu. Vanoti pasvika zvinhu pari zvino pave kutongoda kuti vashandi vagare zvavo kudzimba dzavo, sezvo vasina mari dzekufambisa, pamwe nekuti vatenge chikafu kudzimba. Vakuru vanoti chakatanga ndicho chakachenjedza, nekudaro vakawanda vanoti vari kutarisa mberi vachiyeuka matambudziko akasangana nenyika mumakore a 2007 na 2008, apo veruzhinji vakanonga svosve nemuromo. Kusvika zvinhu zvagadzikana mune zveupfumi, vazhinji vacharamba vachitya mimvuri yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Masvingo Yotarisana neNzara Inotyisa Sezvo Mvura Yarambira Mudenga
text:
Vamwe varimi mudunhu reMasvingo nemamwe matunhu vanoti vatarisana nenzara yakaoma sezvo pasina chichabuda muminda mavo sezvo zvirimwa zvakapera kutsva apo mvura yarambira mudenga, Varimi vataura neStudio 7 mumaruwa ekwaGutu, Mwenezi, Zaka, Chivi pamwe neNemanwa vanoti kunyange mvura ikauya hapana chavachawana
nekuti zvirimwa zvakatotsva sezvo mwedzi wese waKukadzi wakapera kusina kumbonaya kusvika parizvino. Mumwe murimi wemudunhu reNemamwa , VaHenry Makusha, vanoti vakatarisana nenzara yakaoma gore rino sezvo vasina kana chekunhonga mumunda mavo.

Izvi zvatsinhirwa naAmbuya, Rosina Gonese, vemuraini rekwaMakonese, kwaGutu, avo vati gore rino chero Mhunga neRukweza izvo zvisingadi mvura yakawanda zvakatsvawo.

Mumwe murimi wekuMwenezi, VaCuthebert Mashoko, vati kunze kwezvirimwa zvipfuwo zvakaita semombe zvirikufawo nekushaikwa kwemvura yakakwana
pamwe nezvimwe zvirwere zvakaita seJanuary Disease.

Hurumende inoti chirwere cheJanaurary disease chauraya mombe dzinopfuura mazana mana munyika kubva gore richitanga.
Vamwe varimi vanoti nemamiriro akaita mamiriro ekunze hapana chavachatarisisa uye vanotarisira kuti hurumende ichadeedzera kuti gore rino igore renzara pachinenguva vanhu vazowane rubatsiro. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvekurima munyika, Dr Anxious Masuka, kuti tinzwe divi divi ravoo pamamiriro akaita zvirimwa munyika sezvo nhare yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Asi munyori mukuru mubazi rinoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko munyika, VaNick Mangwana, vanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter kuti hurumende yavekutanga chirongwa chekushandisa ndege dzinopfapfaidza mushonga mumakore kana kuti cloud seeding kuti mvura inaye ibatsire zvimwe zvirimwa zvisati zvanyanya kutsva. Mukuru webasa musangano rinomirira varimi munyika reZimbabwe Farmers Union(ZFU), VaPaul Zakariya, vanoti zvirimwa zvave kutsva munyika kunyanya munzvimbo dziri kumatunhu eMasvingo, Matebleland South neManicaland.

Sangano reFamine Early Warning Systems Network (FEWSNET) rinoti zvirimwa zvizhinji munyika zviri kutsva nezuva uye vanhu vanoda chikafu vachawedzera munyika gore rino.
FEWSNET inoti hurumende pamwe nemasangano akazvimirira vanotarisira kubatsira vanhu vanosvika mirioni imwe chete nezviurru mazana mashanu kubva muna Ndira kusvika kupera kwaKurume. Sangano iri rinoti gore rino goho rechibage richatengeserwa bazi reGrain Makerting Board(GMB) richadzika kubva pamatani zviruru mazvana mapfumbamwe nepfumbamwe 990 000 metric tonnes.

headline: Magweta Anorwira Kodzero Obatsira Vagari Vane Zvikwereti kuHCC
text: Magweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, atanga kumirira vagari vemuHarare vakaendeswa kuvanhu vanotevera zvikwereti kana nenyaya yezvekwereti kukanzuru yeHarare Magweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, atanga kumirira vagari vemuHarare vakaendeswa kuvanhu vanotevera zvikwereti kana nenyaya yezvekwereti kukanzuru yeHarare. Magweta aya audza vagari ava kuti vasiyane nekambani ye Well Cash iyo iri kutevera zvikwereti zvekanzuru. Vagari vanzi vataure nekanzuru kuti vangabhadhare chikwereti chavo sei kana vachibvuma kuti vane chikwereti. Kanzuru yeHarare yakadoma kambani yeWell Cash kuti itevere zvikwereti zvayo kuvagari uye kubvira muna Zvita gore rapfuura, kambani iyi yange iri kutyityidzira vagari nekuvanyorera matsamba ekuti vachatorerwa dzimba dzavo nemimwe midziyo kana vasina kubhadhara chikwereti. Kunze kwekubhadhara chikwereti, kambani iyi inozodawo kuti vagari vabhadhare chidimbu chezvikamu gumi kubva muzana zvechikwereti chavo semubhadharo wayo. Kunyange hazvo vamwe vakatotanga kubhadhara vamwe havasati vatanga kubhadhara uye vasati vabhadhara vatanga kuwana rubatsiro kumagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu. Vachitaura nevagari ava kumuzinda weZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, gweta rinoshandira sangano iri, VaSharon Hofisi, vati vagari havafaniri kutya maDebot Collectors sezvo asina mvumo yekutora midziyo yavo. VaHofisi vaudza vagari ava kuti zvakakosha kuti kana vachinge vawana masamanisi anobva kumatare vapindure pamwe nekuenda kumatare. Asi VaHofisi vati zvakakosha kuti kuti vagari vabhadharewo mabhiri avo nemitero kunzuru. Vamwe vevagari vakanyorerwa matsamba vakwegura zvekuti havana kwavanokwanisa kuwana mari. Asi mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vana sorojena vanobhadhara mitero yakaderera uye vanofanira kuenda kumahofisi ekanzuru nehumbowo hunoratidza kuti vakwegura uye kuti ndivo vanogara paimba yavanobhadharira mutero. VaChideme vaenderera mberi vachiti kanzuru icharamba ichiendesa vagari kumaDebt Collectors uye vanenge vasingade kutorerwa matanho aya vanofanira kuenda kumahofisiekanzuru munzvimbo dzavo kuti vandotaura kuti vachabhadhara chikwereti chavo sei. Zvichakadai mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira vagari vemuHarare, reHarare Residents Trust, VaPrecious Shumba vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kuitwa nekanzuru yeHararezvakashata uye sangano ravo richaramba richidzidzisa vagari kuti vasashande nemakambani anotevera zvikwereti. Vati kambani yeWell Cash inofanirawo kurwiswa. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevakuru vakuru vekambani yeWell Cash kuti timwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Vagari, mabizimisi pamwe nehurumende vane chikwereti chemari inodarika mamiriyoni mazana mashanu emadhora kukanzuru yeHarare. Kanzuru yeHarare inoti kana ikawana mari iyi inokwanisa kuita basa rayo zvakanaka izvo zvinota kuti ikwanise kutakura marara nekupa vanhu mvura nezvimwe zvinofadza vagari. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesera Mumigwagwa Vodyira Hurumende Marasha
text: Vanoita basa rekutengesa mumigwagwa nevanoita mabasa emaoko vaenderera mberi nemusangano wavo pachechi yeAnglican muHarare zvisinei nechaunga chemapurisa vamwe vacho vanga vakapakatira pfuti, uye vamboda kurambidza vanhu ava kuita musangano uyu. Vanhu ava vaungana kuti vazeye matanho avangatora mushure mekudzingwa mudhorobha nekanzuru yeHarare ichibatsirwa nemapurisa eZRP izvo zvavanoti zvasiya mhuri zhinji dzichinhonga svosve nemuromo. Vamhu ava vashoropodza zvikuru kurohwa kwavati vari kuitwa nemapurisa pamwe nekutorerwa zvavanenge vachitengesa. Vatengesi vati vakaramba vachishungurudzwa vanoda kuti vese vanobata mabasa emaoko vabatane pamwe chete voenda kubazi rehurumende rine chiga chekubatsira vanotambura. Mumwe mutengesi asina kuda kudomwa nezita ati kana vachitadziswa kuzvichengeta, hurumende inofanirwa kuvachengeta. Vanhu ava varatidza hasha uye vayambirawo mapurisa kuti vakaramba vachivarova vachaitawo chirwirangwe sezvo vaine kodzero dzavo semunhu wese. Amai Chipo Magwizi vati vatengesi vemumigwagwa vanofanirwa kubatana vorwisawo vanenge vachivarwisa. Mumwe mugare wemuHarare, Amai Vaida Nhemachena, vatiwo kunyange hazvo vari kushungurudzwa havasi kuzobuda mudhorobha kusvika kanzuru yeHarare yavapa kwekutengesera kune vanhu. Vatiwo mwedzi uno zvakavaomera zvikuru sezvo vasina bhizimusi ravakaita nekuda kwekudzingwa nemapurisa. Sachigaro weNational Vendors Union of Zimbabwe, VaStendrick Zvorwadza, vatiwo vanodawo kutaura nemutungamiriri wenyika kuti vanzwisise kuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ndivo vari kutuma mapurisa here kuti varove vatengesi vemumigwagwa. Vati vapa VaMugabe masvondo maviri chete kuti vakurukure nevanoita mabasa emaoko. VaZvorwadza vashoropodzawo mapurisa nekumboda kumisa musangano wavo izvo zvaita kuti vanonoke kutanga. VaZvorwadza vati mapurisa haana simba rekupa mvumo kana kurambidza misangano asi vanongofanira kuziviswa chete pasi pemutemo wePublic Order and Security Act. Pave nemasvondo matatu vanotengesa mumigwagwa vachiita hwagonzo nakiti nemapurisa eZRP pamwe neekanzuru, ayo ari kuvabvisa mumigwagwa nechisimba. No media source currently available

headline: Kubhadhariswa Maifandi Mumigwagwa neMapurisa Konetsa Munyika
text: Nyaya yekubhadhariswa kwevatyairi mari dzemafayindi pama road blocks nemapurisa iri kuenderera mberi ichinetsa munyika, vakawanda vachitsigira mashoko emutongi wedare, Justice Francis Bere, ekuti nzira inoshandiswa nemapurisa kubhadharisa mari idzi kazhinji haizi pamutemo. Mumashoko avo neChitatu, mutauriri wemapurisi, VaPaul Nyathi, vakati havazi kuzoteerera mashoko aVaBere vachiti mapurisa acharamba achibhadharisa vatyairi mari dzemafayindi kana vatyora mutemo. Mutauriri wehurumende, uye vari gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaJonathan Moyo, vari kutsigirawo mashoko emapurisa aya. Asi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaArnold Tsunga, vanoti vanotsigira mashoko aVaBere, vachiti vanhu havafanirwi kumanikidzwa kubhadhara faindi, asi kuti vanofanirwa kupihwa mukana wekupikisa tikiti ravanenge vapihwa kudare redzimhosva kana vachida. No media source currently available

headline: Vakaremara Vobatsirwa neMishina Inochera Goridhe kuManicaland
text: Sangano revacheri vezviwanikwa zvakakosha, reZimbabwe Miners’ Federation, ZMF, rakabatsira vakaremara mudunhu reManicaland nemuchina unoshandiswa pakuchera goridhe. Vachitaura pakutambidzwa kwemuchina uyu nezuro, sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Miners Federeation kudunhu reManicaland, VaLameck Mushayamhara, vakati vanovimba kuti muchina wakapihwa nhengo dzeManicalanda People with Disabilities in Mining uchapa kuti vasiye tsika yekupemha. Mumiriri weZMF kudunhu reManicaland, Amai Judith Shadaya, vakatiwo vanorarama nehurema vanofanirwa kusimudzirwa sezvaitwa neZMF. Sachigaro vesangano revanorarama nehurema mudunhu reManicaland, Va James Mutisi, vakatiwo vakafara zvikuru nezvavaitirwa neZMF Munyori mukuru musangano revanorarama nehurema mudunhu reManicaland, Muzvare Esther Nemaramba, vakati zvavo zvavaitira zvakanaka sezvo vasichapemhi kuburikidza nemuchina wavakapihwa. Nhengo makumi matanhatu dzakapihwa rubatsiro rwemuchina wecompressor dzichange dzichichera goridhe munzvimbo dzinoti Premier, Old Umtali, uye kuPenhalonga mudunhu reManicaland. Rubatsiro urwu rwakapihwa kuvanhu ava pamabiko akaitirwa muDarlington Extension muguta reMutare.

headline: Mashoko eRBZ Oratidza Pachena Kuti Hupfumi hweNyika Hwananga kuMawere
text: Bhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe rakaburitsa mashoko nemusi weChipiri anoratidza kuti zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi zviri kuramba zvichienda kumaziva ndadzoka. Izvi zviri kuonekwa kuburikidza nemari yakawanda iri kukweretwa nehurumende kubva kumabhanga emunyika, kushomeka kwemari iri kukweretwa nevemabhizimisi, uye kushaikwa kwemari mumabhanga zvopa kuti vamwe vashaye chivimbo nemabhanga acho. Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe inoti mari yakweretwa nehurumende kusvika pari zvino inosvika pamabhiriyoni manomwe ichikwira nezvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana kusvika muna Chivabvu zvichienzaniswa negore rapera. Nekushomeka kwemari munyika kunyange hazvo pakaparurwa mabond notes, RBZ inoti vanhu vakawanda vave kushandisa Real Time Gross Settlement Transaction kana kuti RTGS. Asi vaimbova gurukota rezvemari uye vachitungamira bato rinopikisa rePeople's Democratic Party, VaTendai Biti, vayambira kuti zviri kuitwa nehurumende izvi kuzvisikira moto muziso. VaBiti vati mumabhanga hamuna mari zvopa kuti pashandiswe RTGS asi izvi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti kukwereta mari kuri kuitwa nehurumende uku hakuna kunaka. Ko mari iri kukweretwa nehurumende iyi inobva kupi chaizvo kana vemabhanga vachiti havana mari. Doctor Kanyenze vanoti hurumende iri kungotora mari yevanhu iri mumabhanga. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vaimbotungamira Zimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaLuxon Zembe, vanoti nyaya yekuti hurumende iri kukwereta mari yakawanda yave kuomesera vemabhizimisi. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo naDoctor Kanyenze avo vati hurumende iri kukwereta mari yekubhdhara vashandi vayo kwete kuita mabasa ebudiriro ari kudiwa munyika. VaZembe vatiwo kukweretwa kuri kuitwa mari nehurumende kuri kupawo kuti mutengo wekuti vemabhizimisi vakwerete mari udhure. VaBiti vatiwo kuti zvinhu zvifambe munyaya dzezvehupfumi, gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vanofanira kuona kuti mabhizimisi awaniswa mari yekuita mabasa. Kuyange hazvo nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kuti hurumende haifanire kukwereta mari, VaChinamasa vanoti hurumende hakuna kumwe kwainowana mari sezvo isingakwanise kukwereteswa mari neInternational Monetary Fund, IMF, neWorld Bank. Hurumende inoti izvi zviri kukonzerwa nenyaya yezvirango zvakatemerwa nyika. Asi veIMF neWorld Bank vanoti hurumende yeZimbabwe iri kutadza kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo. No media source currently available

headline: ZIMSTAT Inoti Kuverengwa kweVanhu Kwakaburitsa Pachena Kuti Madzimai Mashoma Ari Kushanda Mabasa Anovapa Mari Yakawanda
text: Sangano reZimstat rinoti ongororo yarakaita pakuverengwa kwakaitwa vanhu gore rino inoratidza kuti varume vakawanda ndivo vanoshanda zvichienzaniswa nevanhukadzi uyewo vanhu vakawanda munyika vabvazera vari kunzi varipamabasa. Vachitura ongororo yavo, mukuru weZimstats VaTaguma Mahonde vati ongororo yavo yakaratidza kuti munyika varume vakawanda ndivo vari pamabasa zvichienzaniswa nevanhukadzi. VaMahonde vati pavanhu vasina mabasa vaitarisa kune avo var ikutotsvaka mabasa vachiti vainge vasina kuisawo avo vainge vaneta nekutsvaka mabasa zvekuti vanga vambomira. VaAdolphus Chinomwe vanoshanda nesangano reInternational Labour Organization kana kuti ILO vati zvabudiswa neZimstats izvi zvinoratidza kuti madzimai akawanda ari mumabasa avasingapihwi mihoro akadai sekuchengeta pamba, kubika nekuchengeta varwere vachiti izvi zvine njodzi huru sezvo zvichizoita kuti madzimai arambe achitambura. VaChinomwe vatiwo kunyangwe hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vasiri pamabasa huchichi hushoma, chakakosha kuongorora ndechekuti vari pamabasa vacho vangani uye vari kuita mabasa anovapa mari yekuti vakwanise kuzviriritira. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaMasimba Manyanya vatiwo zvabuditswa neZimStats zvinoratidza kuti muono wehurumende weVision 2030 hwekuti hapana anofanirwa kusarira kumashure hausi mugwara. VaManyanya vati huwandu hwapiwa neZimstats hunoratidza kuti madzimai nevechiki vari kusarira kumashure. VaMahonde vatiwo ruzivo rwezvemabasa munyika hunobatsirawo hurumende muzvirongwa zvayo kunyanya kuziva kuti hurongwa hwebudiriro hwehurumende huri mugwara here. Gawaro rabuditswa neZimStats iri nderechisere uye riri rekupedzisira pamagwaro aitarisirwa kubuditswa nesangano iri pachitariswa zvakabuda mukuverengwa kwevanhu kunoitwa kamwechete pamakore gumi. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reMadutazvinhu Rochema Kushaya kwaVaJoel Biggie Matiza
text: Sangano rinomirira vatyairi nemakondakita, reZimbabwe Union Of Drivers And Conductors (ZUDAC) rinoti kushaya kwevaimbove gurukota rinoona nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaJoel Biggie Matiza, kwarwadza vanhu vazhinji vanoshanda mune zvekutakurwa kwezvinhu. Mutungamiri weZUDAC, VaFredrick Maguramhinga, vanoti VaMatiza vakange vachishanda zvakanaka nevanhu nemasangano ane chekuita nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu. Vanoti VaMatiza vaigara vachiita misangano nemasangano avo vachiratidza kuda kunzwisisa mashandiro avo uye vachivabvunzavo nezvemirairo yavaifunga kuti ingabatsira mukufamba zvakanaka kwebazi iri, vachiti VaMatiza vakabatsira sangano ravo zvikuru. VaMaguramhinga varumbidzavo vaimbove gurukota reZimbabwe raiona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, avo vakashaya nemusi weChitatu svondo rapera, mazuva maviri VaMatiza vasati vashayawo nechirwere cheCovid-19. VaMaguranhanga vati VaMoyo vakabatsira vatyairi nemakondakita panguva iyo vanhu muSouth Africa vakange vachirwisa vatyairi vekune dzimwe nyika vaishanda muSouth Africa. VaMoyo naVaMatiza vakapihwa ruremekedzo rwehugamba hwenyika uye vose vacharadzikwa mangwana, Chitatu, paHeroes Acre muHarare, pamwe chete nerimwezve gamba, vaParadzai Zimondi. No media source currently available

headline: Zvikoro Zvovhurwa Asi Vamwe Varairidzi Vachiramwa Mabasa neNyaya yeMihoro
text: Zvikoro zvakavhurwa neMuvhuro kune vadzidzi vari kunyora bvunzo mukupera kwegore kunyangwe hazvo vamwe varairidzi vatotanga kuramwa mabasa vamwe vachitiwo hurumende haisi kupa zvikwanisiro zvakakwana kuvadzidzi kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Muzvikoro zvine chitsama zvakashanyirwa neStudio 7 muBulawayo kusanganisira Milton Primary, McKeurtan Primary, Lobengula Primary, Eveline High pamwe eGifford High, vana vechikoro vange vauya kuchikoro uye vadzidzisi vange vachiita basa ravo. Pazvikoro izvi, vana vadzidzisi pamwe nevamwe vanhu vose vanenge vasvikapo vange vachitanga vaongororwa kupisa kwemiviri yavo uyewo kugezeswa maoko nema sanitiser. Mumwe mubereki ane mwana anodzidza pane chimwe chikoro chemuBulawayo uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Amai Moyo, ati afara kuti zvikoro zvavhurwa asi akomekedza kuti hurumende itore matanho akasimba ekuti vana pamwe nevadzidzisi vadzivirirwe mukubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Tsvakurudzo yaitwa neStudio 7 inoratidza kuti kuzvikoro zvakawanda zvekumamisha vadzidzisi vakawanda havana kuenda kubasa. Mumwe mudzidzisi anodzidzisa kuBinga achigara muBulawayo uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita kana kubuda pamhepo achityira basa rake ati haazi kukwanisa kuenda kuchikoro kwaanodzidzisa nekuti mari yake yemuhoro haikwane kuti aite izvi. Masangano anomirira vadzidzisi akawanda ari kuti vadzidzisi havazi kukwanisa kudzokera kumabasa nekuti mari yavo haivakwanire. Mutungamiri wesangano reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe VaObert Masaraure vaudza Studio 7 kuti vadzidzisi vanosvika zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana vekumaruwa havana kuenda kubasa vachiti izviz hazvishamise nekuti havana mari yekuti vakwanise kuita izvi. Vatsidza kuti vadzidzisi havazi kuzodzokera kuchikoro kana nyaya yavo yemuhoro isati yagadziriswa. Svondo rakapera gurukota rezvedzidzo VaCain Mathema vakati vadzidzisi vanotadza kuenda kubasa vanogona kudzingwa basa.\nMukuru wesangano reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, kana kuti PTUZ VaTakavafira Zhou vashora danho rehurumende vachiti kutyisidzira vashandi hakuna zvakunobatsira. Mukuru wesangano remubatanidzwa wemasangano emuzvikoro reNational Association of School Development Associations, kana kuti NASDAC, VaBanny Manokora vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kufara kuti zvikoro zvavhurwa asi vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti dai hurumende yakadzirisa gakava riri pakati payo nevahsndi vayo kusanganisira vadzidzisi kuitira kuti zvinhu zvifambe zvakanaka muzvikoro. Tabata mutauriri webazi redzidzo VaTaungana Ndoro kuti tinzwe maonero ebazi ravo pazuva rekutanga regore rino rekuvhurwa kwezvikoro asi vati vange vari mumusangano. Asi gurukota rezvevashandi Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vanoti nhaurirano nevarairidzi dziri kuenderera mberi nekudaro hapana chikonzero chekuramwa mabasa. Vati hurumende yakazvipira kuwedzera vashandi mari. Pave nenguva yakareba vadzidzisi vachichema chema nenyaya yemuhoro pamwe nemashandiro uye vamwe vanoti kusagadziriswa kwenyaya iyi iri kuita kuti dzidzo yemunyika idzokere kumashure. No media source currently available

headline: Kushaikwa kweMari yeKunze Kwokonzeresa Kushomeka kweDoro neZvinwiwa
text: Kambani yeDelta inoti yasarirwa nedoro nezvinwiwa zvakaita sekokokora (Coca Cola) zvevhiki rimwechete chete nekuda kwekushaikwa kwemari kubva kubhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe. Nekuda kwekushomeka kwemari, makambani makuru munyika anopihwa mari kubva kuRBZ kuti atenge zvinhu kubva kunze kwenyika. Kambani yeDelta inonziwo ine zvikwereti zvakakura. Asi zvinhu zvinenge zvisina kumira zvakanaka kubhanga iri nenyaya yekuti mari yekunze iri kunetsa kuwana. Mukuru we‎Management Solutions (Pvt) Ltd, VaLuxon Zembe, vanoti zvinhu zvinotambudza zvikuru kune vemabhizimusi, zvichiratidza zvakare kuti nyaya yemari yekune dzimwe nyika ichiri kunetsa muZimbabwe pari zvino. "Kana makambani makuru anogadzira zvekudya akaita seDelta aakupa yambiro yakadaro zvinoratidza kuti zviro zvedu hazvina kumira zvakanaka," VaZembe vanodaro. No media source currently available

headline: Vanoita Mabasa eMaoko Vochema Vachiti Havasi Kukosheswa neHurumende
text: Vanoita mabasa emaoko pamwe nekutengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa vanoti vari kuomerwa zvikuru kuti vawane mari yekunyoresa zviri pamutemo, kuitira kuti vatange kuita mabasa zvichitevera kumbomiswa kwavakaitwa nekuda kweCovid-19. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko emutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo vakazivisa svondo rapera kuti vanozviitira mabasa avo emaoko kana kuti vari mu informal sector, vanofanira kugadzirira kushanda zvekare asi vachifanira kutanga vanyoreswa kuti vashande zviri pamutemo. Mabhizimisi mazhinji aya ange akavharwa kubva musi wa 30 Kurume apo hurumende yakasimbaradza kurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 ichiti vanhu vagare mudzimba. Munyori mukuru musangano reZimbabwe Chamber of Informal Economy Associations, VaWisbon Malaya, vanoti zvimwe zviri kudiwa kuti vatange mabasa zviri kuvanetsa kunyange vatotanga havo kuchenesa nzvimbo dzavanoshandira. Vanoti vari kuda kunzi vanyorese kumakanzura vopihwa marezinesi uye kuuya netsamba dzinoratidza kuti havasi kurwara. Izvi vanoti zvinoda mari yakawanda uye zviri kuvaremera sezvo vave nengiva vasiri kushanda. Asi meya weguta reHarare VaHerbert Gomba vanoti makanzuru ange orasikirwa nemari yakawanda nekuda kwevanhu vasingabhadhare mitero vachizviitira mabasa avo.Vati vanotengesa mumigwagwa vanofanira kubhadhara mitero kuti kanzuru ikwanisewo kuita mabasa anovabatsira akafanana nekuvawanisa mvura nekugadzira migwagwa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti vanozviitira mabasa avo emaoko ava ndivo vakabata hupfumi hwenyika sezvo vaine mari yakawanda iri kutenderera. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nevanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, avo vanoti vanozviitira mabasa emaoko ava vanosimudzirawo hupfumi nekuwanisa vanhu mabasa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paDurban University of Technology, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vanoti kunyangwe vanozviitira zvemaoko vakakosha, hurumende haina zvinobatika zvairi kuvabatsira nazvo. VaMugano vanoti vanofanira kuvakirwa pakanaka pekushandira kuti vave nechidokwa dokwa chekubhadhara mitero. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga, VaGilbert Muponda, vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende pahomwe yayakaumba yekubatsira vemabhizimisi inosvika mabhiriyoni gumi nemasere emadhora emunyika ibatsirewo vanozviitira mabasa emaoko ava. Pari zvino vakawanda vange vachibvumidzwa kushanda ndevaya vanoita mabasa ekutengesa zvirimwa pamisika mikuru munyika. Vamwe vakawanda vange vari kungoita hwakiti nagonzo nemapurisa. No media source currently available

headline: Mauto, Vasori neMapurisa Voshandiswa Kumanikidza Varimi Kuti Vaendese Chibage kuGMB
text: Varimi vakawanda munyika vari kuchema chema nedanho rehurumende rekuti mauto, vasori nemapurisa pasi peJoint Operation Command vaone kuti vamanikidzwa kutengesa chibage kuGrain Marketing Board. Vakuru muhurumende vaudza Studio 7 kuti izvi zviri kuitwa sezvo zviri kutyirwa kuti kushaikwa kwehupfu kunogona kukonzera kusagadzikana munyika. Mutsamba yakanyorwa nemunyori mukuru mubazi rezvekurima Doctor John Basera kuGMB iri mumaoko eStudio 7, pachibage matani zviuru makumi matatu zvakohwewa kana kuti 30, 000 metric tonnes, matani zviuru zvishanu kana kuti 5000 metric tonnes chete ndizvo zvaendeswa kuGMB. Patabata VaBhasera vati tivatumire mibvunzo asi vange vasati vapindura. Hurumende yakadzika mutemo wechimbi chimbi weStatutory Instrument 145/19 kumanikidza varimi kutengesa chibage kuGMB kana paita goho shoma Mapurisa, mauto nevasori vari kunzi mutsamba iyi vaende kumapurazi vachiona kuti varimi havasi kuviga chibage here kana kutengesa pamukoto. Vanonziwo vaite maroad blocks kuona kuti hapana vari kutakura chibage zvisina mvumo yeGMB here. Asi nhengo yeparamende yakazvimirira vachimirira Norton vari murimi vaTemba Mliswa vashora zvikuru zviri kuda kuitwa nehurumende izvi. Vaudza Studio 7 kuti varimi vanoda kupihwa mari inoendererana nemari yavakashandisa pakurima. Vati zvekurimisa zvakaita sembeu nefotereza zvinotengwa nemadhora ekuAmerica.  No media source currently available Sachigaro weGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe VaTafadzwa Musarara vakaudzawo Studio 7 kuti vainge vatenga chibage chinosvika matani zviuru mazana mana kana kuti 400, 000 metric tonnes kubva kuZambia neMalawi. Varimi vakawanda vari kuZambia vakatorerwa mapurazi muZimbabwe.. Kuyedza kugadzirisa nyaya yenzara, hurumende iri kuitawo misangano nebazi reUnited Nations reWorld Food Programme kuti ipihwe chikafu sezvo zvinhu zvakaita manyama amire nerongo. Munyori mubazi rezvemagariro evanhu VaSimona Masanga vanoti misangno iyi iri kuenderera mberi. WFP inoti kubva mwedzi uno kusvika muna Gumiguru, Zimbabwe inoda mari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi mashanu nematatu kana kuti US$53 million kubatsira vanhu mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 5,3 million.

headline: Hurumende Inoramba Mashoko eKuti iri Kuparura Mari Itsva yeNyika Svondo Rino
text: Hurumende pamwe nagavhuna vebhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, varamba mashoko ekuti nyika iri kuparura mari yayo svondo rino. Zvichitevera mashoko aburitswa padande mutande reTwitter nevakambove gurukota rezvemari muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, VaTendai Biti, ekuti svondo rino hurumende iri kuparura mari yenyika itsva, Doctor Mangudya vanoti vanhu havafanirwe kuteerera mashoko enhema akadai, ayo vanoti anokanganisa zvinhu mune zveupfumi. Doctor Mangudya vanoti Zimbabwe haina hurongwa hwakadaro munguva pfupi inotevera. Ukuwo, bazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko raburitsawo mashoko ekuramba nezvehurongwa uhwu, richiti hurumende iri kushushikana zvikuru nemanyepo ari kutenderedzwa nemamwe mapoka ezvematongerwo enyika ekuti nyika iri kuparura mari yayo svondo rinouya. Aka hakasi kekutanga kuti hurumende inzi iri kuda kuparura mari itsva. Masvondo mashoma adarika mashoko aya akamboduawo zvakare, zvikuru mumadandemutande. Asi mwedzi wapera gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakazivisa kuti nyika isunge dzisimbe sezvo paine hurongwa hwekuparura mari itsva yenyika mukupera kwegore rino. No media source currently available

headline: Michina yeChizvinozvino Yobatsira Vamwe Vabereki kuBhadhara Mari dzeChikoro
text: Apo zvikoro zvichangovhurwa kwekotoro yekupedzisira yegore, zvimwe zvikoro zvave kushandisa ma swipe machines izvo zvave kuita kuti vabereki varerukirwe nekubhadhara mari yechikoro yevana vavo. Asi zvisinei vamwe vanoti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari munyika rinofanirwa kugadziriswa zvachose. Nekuda kwedambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari rave nenguva richiitika munyika mumabhangi munogara makatsokodzerana nevanhu vanenge vachitsvaga mari kunyanya pamazuva ekuvhurwa kwezvikoro. Asi zvimwe zvikoro zviri munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana munyika zvave nema swipe machine uye zvave kubvumawo kuti vabereki vabhadhare nenzira yekushandisa mari yepafoni kunyanya yeEcocash. Vamwe wevabereki vataura neStudio 7 vati vanotambira danho iri sezvo rave kuvarerutsira panhamo yekutsvaga mari yekubhadharira vana vavo mari yechikoro. Mumwe wevanhu ava ndiMuzvare Mutsa Sibanda avo vati chikoro chemwana wavo chakatanga kushandisa swipe machine pakutanga kwemwedzi uno. Mumwezve mubereki VaBruce Tagwirei vati kunze kwekuve neswipe machine, chikoro chemwana wavo chave kutambirawo mari paEcocash izvo zvavati zvinobatsira kuti vasarasikirwe nenguva vachitsvaga mari pane kuita zvimwe zvinoraramisa mhuri yavo. Asi nekuda kwekuti kunetsa kwemari kuri kuramba kuchienderera mberi munyika vanhu vave kutambira kuti huremu hwemari yemabond note nemari yekunze uye nemari yekubhadhara munhu uchishandisa zvakasiyana. Semuenzaniso kana munhu uine zana remadhora ekuAmerica unogona kuwana zana nemakumi matanhatu emabond note. Kana munhu uchishandisawo card kutenga kana kubhadhara chezana remadhora unogona kubhadhariswa mari iri pakati pemadhora mashanu nemadhora gumi pamusoro. Mumwe mubereki asina kuda kudomwa nezita kana kubuda pamhepo ati chikoro chemwana wake icho chinove chimwe chezvikoro zvakazvimirira zvega muguta reBulawayo, chinoti chinoda kuti mari yechikoro ibhadharwe imwe iri mari chaiyo imwe kuchishandiswa card. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvedzidzo panyaya iyi. Nyanzvi munayaya dzezvehumhizha mukufambiswa kwemashako VaNigel Gambanga vatsinhirawo kuti danho rekuti vabereki vakwanise kubhadhara mari yevana vavo yechikoro idanho rakanaka chose. VaGambanga vati havawone chakaipa pakuti zvikoro zvakawanda zvishandise Ecocash sezvo zviri pachena kuti ndiyo nzira yekutumira kana kutambira mari iri kushandiswa nevanhu vakawanda munyika. VaButler Tambo vanove mutevedzeri wemukuru wesangano reCentre for Public Engagement, vachitaura semuongorori wezvehupfumi akazvimirira ega vati kunyange hazvo pane matanho ari kuedza kurerutsira vabereki kuti vabhadhare mari yevana vavo yechikoro, zvakosha kuti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari rigadziriswe zvachose risati ranyanyoipisisa. Mumwewo mubereki variwo mutori wenhau VaAdmire Kudita vatsinhira mashoko aya vachiti pane pamwe pakadai sekukwira makombi pekuti vanhu vanoda kushandisa mari chaiyo. Pakutanga kwegore rino bazi rezvedzidzo rakazivisa kuti raive ratora danho rekuti zvikoro zvinosvika zviuru zvipfumbamwe munyika zvive nema swipe machine senzira yekuita kuti vabereki varerukirwe nekubhadhara mari yechikoro asi zvikoro zvakawanda hazvisati zvave nemichina iyi. Senzira yekupedza dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari, gavhuna weRBZ Dr John Mangudya vakati munguva shoma inotevera vachaparura imwe mari yemabond notes. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoendeswa kuMatare neVashandi Vayo Ichipomerwa Mhosva yeKusatevedza Mutemo weNhaurirano dzeMihoro
text: Hurumende yaendeswa kudare nevashandi vayo ichipomerwa mhosva yekusada kutevedzera mutemo panhaurirano dzemari inotambiriswa vashandi. Masangano mashanu anomirira vamwe vashandi vehurumende akwira kudare reHigh Court achida kuti dare iri rimanikidze hurumende kuti ibude nehwaro hwenhaurirano dzemihoro pakati pevashandi nemushandirwi sezviri muchikamu 65 chebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Masangano akwira kudare anoti reZimbabwe Teachers Association kana kuti ZIMTA, Progressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe kana kuti PTUZ, Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe kana kuti ARTUZ, Educators Union of Zimbabwe neCivil Service Employees Association, uye ari kumirirwa nemagweta eMatika, Gwisai and Partners. Vakwirirwa kudare vanoti Public Service Commission, mutungamiri wenyika, gurukota rezvemari, gurukota rezvevashandi nemabasa, gurukota rezvemitemo pamwe negweta guru rehurumende. Vakwirirwa dare ava vapiwa mazuva gumi ekupikisa kubva pazuva ravanotambidzwa magwaro ekumatare. Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure vanoti vatora danho iri nekuti pari zvino hapana mutemo unosungira hurumende kugara pasi ichizeya mihoro nevashandi vayo. Taedza kubata gurukota rezvevashandi Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende panyaya iyi, asi vanga vasati vapindura mibvunzo yedu pataenda pamhepo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanofamba neMabhazi Vochemachema neKukwidzwa kweMari paNguva ino yeZororo
text: Veruzhinji vari kuda kufamba pazororo reKisimusi negoredzva vanoti havasi kufara nekukwira kwaita mari dzekubhadhara mumabhazi panguva iyo mafuta edzimotokari asiri kuwanikwa, hurumende ichiti dambudziko rekushayikwa kwemafuta rinogona kutora nguva yakareba kuti rigadziriswe. Vakawanda vataura neStudio 7 vanoti kukwira kwaita mabhazi panguva ino yezororo reKisimusi kuri kuvarwadza zvikuru sezvo mari iri kuvanetsa kuwana, vachiti zvinhu munyika zvaoma semafuta agwambira mubhodhoro. Pasvika Studio 7 pamusika unokwirirwa mabhazi anoenda kumaruwa weMbare, panga paine vanhu vakawanda vanga vachitsvaga chokufambisa kuti vaende kunzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana. Mumwe wevanhu vari kuti varwadziwa nekukwira kwaita mabhazi ndiAmai Viola Mafa, avo vati vanga vachida kuenda nemhuri yavo kuMhondoro asi vawana mabhazi akwira zvakapetwa kaviri. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevesangano rinomirira vemabhazi ano anotakura veruzhinji sezvo nhare dzavo dzanga dzisiri kudairwa. Asi mumwe mutyairi webhazi rinoenda kwaMutare uyo ati anongoda kudaidzwa nezita rekuti Nohoreka, ati chaita kuti vakwidze mitengo yemabhazi ndechekuti mafuta edhiziri vari kuawana achidhura pamukoto sezvo mumagaraji mazhinji musina mafuta. Zvichakadai, kukwira kunonzi kwaita mabhazi uku kwashorwa zvikuru nesangano rinomirira vafambi rePassengers Association of Zimbabwe. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaTafadzwa Goliati vatiwo havasi kufara nekurambwa kuri kuitwa mari dzendarama kana kuti ma coins nevemabhazi, iriyo imwe yemari dzavari kuwana. Vati kunyange hazvo hurumende yakaisa mabhazi eZupco mumigwagwa yakawanda, mabhazi aya mashoma zvikuru pakatariswa huwandu hwevanhu vari kuda kufamba nguva ino yezororo. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nagavhuna webhanga guru munyika VaJohn Mangudya kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira zvakare nharembozha yavo. VaGoliati vatiwo hurumende inofanira kugadzirisa dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemafuta kuitira kuti veruzhinji vasaoneswe chitsvuku nevemabhazi avo vanonzi vari kuchemachema nekukwira kuri kuita mafuta edzimotokari nguva nenguva. Gurukota rinoona nezvemando dzemoto, VaFortune Chasi, vanoti dambudziko rekushayikwa kwemafuta munyika richaramba rakapfunya chisero munyika sezvo hurumende isina mari yekunze inokwana kuti itenge mafuta anokwanira nyika. Vanhu vakawanda munyika vakatarisira kufamba nguva ino yezororo reKisimusi negoredzva kuti vanoona hama neshamwari sezvo vazvinji vavo vachange vasiri pamabasa panguva ino yezororo. Asi nekuoma kwaita zvinhu munyika nekudhura kuri kuita mabhazi nemichovha vazhinji vanoti vanogona kunoita zvichoni kunzendo dzavanenge vafamba. No media source currently available

headline: Masangano Akazvimirira Oshora Kushandiswa kweMauto neMakanzuru
text: Masangano akazvimirira ashora zvikuru zvaanoti kushandiswa kwemauto mumakanzuru pachirongwa chekuchenesa maguta. Masangano aya anoti izvi zvinofanirwa kumiswa izvozvo. Kuda kubviswa kwemakombi muguta kwakakonzera mhirizhonga neChina pamwe nerufu. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau muHarare nhasi, mutauriri weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaTabani Moyo, vashoropodza hurumende nekushandisa mauto kuti apindire munyaya dzekanzuru. VaMoyo vati zvakaitika neChina zvinorangarisa veruzhinji chirongwa cheOperation Murambatsvina chakaitwa muna 2005 chikasiya vamwe vanhu vasisina pekugara. VaMoyo vati maitiro ehurumende aya anoratidza kuti inoda kutanga zvakare chirongwa chakadai izvo vati hazvifanirwi kuregerwa zvichiitwa. Sachigaro weCombined Harare Residents Association, VaSimbarashe Moyo, vashorawo gurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, vakavapomera mhosva yekuda kusvibisa kanzuru yeHarare iyo ine makanzura eMDC akawanda vachiti maitiro eZanu PF kana sarudzo dzosvika. Vakasanobata chigaro chameya weHarare, Va Enock Mupamawonde, varamba kuti kubviswa kwemakombi mudhorobha kune chekuita nekanzuru vakati izvi zvakaitwa nebazi rinoona nezvekutongwa kwematunhu pasina kanzuru. Vatiwo makanzura haawirirani nekushungurudzwa kweveruzhinji vari kutsvaka raramo, vakati matambudziko akatarisanwa nawo neguta anogadzirisika chete kana matambudziko ehupfumi munyika agadziriswa. Kumiswa kwemakombi kuti asapinde muguta kwakazomiswa nehurumende mushure memhirizhonga dzakaitika neChina. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inotenga Ndarama yeBond Coins kuSouth Africa?
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezveupfumi dzinoti kutengwa kwemari yendarama, bond coins, kuSouth Africa kunoratidza kuti senyika, Zimbabwe haisisina mishina yekugadzira mari yayo. Izvi zvinouya mushure mekunge patenderera gwaro rinoratidza kuti Zimbabwe yakatenga ma bond coins emasendi makumi mashanu anosvika mamiriyoni matatu emadhora. Imwe nyanzvi mune zveupfumi, VaAndrew Tsiga, vati izvi zvinoratidza kuti Zimbabwe haikwanisi kugadzira mari yayo pachayo. Asi imwe nyanzvi zvakare yezveupfumi, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vatiwo zvakaitwa nebhanga guru renyika zvakanakirawo nyika kuchengetedzawo mari iyi kuitira kuti isangogadzirwa nguva nenguva zvisina tsarukano. Asi vati mutengo wemari yakagadzirwa kuSouth Africa, wakawandisa zvikuru. VaMuchichwa vati danho rakatorwa nehurumende haripedzi dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari munyika. Vati kusvika hurumende yagadzirisa mari yainoshandisa pamwedzi wega wega, Zimbabwe haigoni kubuda mumatope mairi. Gwaro rine Studio7 rinoratidza kuti mari iyi yakadhindwa nekambani yeSouth African Mint Company, uye kambani iyi yakazivisa mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemari kubhanga guru renyika neChitatu, Professor Kuveya. Asi hapana kujeka kuti mari iyi ichapinda riini muZimbabwe ichibva kuSouth Africa. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Hatinawo kukwanisa kunzwa kugurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, avo vati vanga vari kuBulawayo. Vachitura hurongwa hwemari mwedzi mishoma yapfuura, VaMangudya vakati hurumende ichaunza munyika mari inoita mamiriyoni mazana matatu ema bond note. No media source currently available

headline: Commonwealth Yotumira Nhumwa kuZimbabwe Kuti Dziongorore Kuti Ingadzorwe Here Mugungano Iri
text: Hurongwa hwekuti Zimbabwe idzokere mumubatanidzwa wenyika dzainge dziri pasi pehutongo hweBritain weCommonwealth hwave padanho repamusoro mushure mekunge sangano iri razivisa kuti rave kuzotumira chikwata chevaongorori vanoona kuti zvakakodzera here kuti itenderwe kudzokera kuva nhengo zvekare. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakanyora tsamba kumunyori mukuru weCommonwealth Amai Patricia Scotland musi wa 9 Chivabvu vachiti vave kuda kuti Zimbabwe idzokere mugungano iri. Mutauriri weCommonwealth VaBarnie Choudhury vanoti vatanga kuongorora kuti Zimbabwe yakakodzera here kudzoswa. Vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakaburitsa Zimbabwe muCommonwealth muna 2003 mushure mekunge Commonwealth yazivisa muna 2002 kuti yainge ichironga kumbomisa Zimbabwe kuva nhengo. Zimbabwe inofanira kuchengetedza kodzero dzevanhu kuti itenderwe kudzoka mugungano. No media source currently available

headline: Mizinda yeZimbabwe Yoendeswa kuMatare eDzimhosva Nekuda kweKukundikana Kubhadhara Mitero
text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvinoti zviri kushushikana zvikuru nekukundikana kwehurumende kubhadhara mitero yezvivakwa zvairi kushandisa semizinda yenyika munyika dzakawanda. Izvi zvinonzi zvave kukanganisa mafambisirwo emabasa kumizinda iyi, sezvo mina yemizinda iyi yave kuendeswa kumatare edzimhosva munyika dzairi. Mizinda yave kuendeswa kumatare inoti uri kuLondon, uri kuHong Kong, uri kuNew York pamwe nemumwe usina kutaurwa nezita. Zvinhu zvinonziwo hazvina kumira zvakanaka kumizinda yakaita seuri kuBotswana nekuEthiopia, pakati pemimwe iri kutaraika. Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekudzidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaJoey Bimha neChipiri vakapa mufananidzo unonzi unosiririsa apo vaipupura mamiriro akaita zvinhu kumizinda yenyika kukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika. VaBimha vanonzi vakaudza komiti iyi kuti zvinhu hazvina kumirawo zvakanaka kuvashandi vekumizinda iyi, sezvo vari kutatarikawo kuwana mihoro yavo. Vanonzi vakati vamwe vevashandi ava vakatobuda mudzimba dzehurumende dzavanga vachigara nekuda kwekutadza kubhadhara mitero. Mihoro yevashandi vehurumende vari kunze kwenyika inonzi yave kubva kuboka reSalary Service Bureau, iro rinonzi riri kutatarikawo kuisa mihoro paine nguva. Vamwe vevashandi ava vanonzi vari kuita dambudziko rekuti vazotora mihoro iyi munyika dzavagere. VaBimha vanonzi vakaudzawo komiti iyi kuti panzvimbo yekugadzirisa matambudziko, danho rekuti vashandi vekumizinda vawane mihoro yavo ichibva kubazi rezveupfumi rakatowedzera matambudziko. Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kukurudzira kuti hurumende ivhare mimwe mizinda, asi sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende iyi vachimirira Makonde VaKindness Paradza veZanu PF, vanoti danho iroro rinogonekwa chete kupasiswa nemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. VaParadza vanoti rimwe dambudziko riri pakuti bazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika harina zvivakwa zvaro sezvo zvivakwa izvi zviri pasi pebazi rezvekutongwa kwematunhu. Vanoti komiti yavo ichaedza kusangana negurukota rezveupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa kuti vaone kuti vangabatsira sei kuti mizinda iyi iwane mari. Vanoti vachasanganawo zvakare naVaKasukuwere kuti vaone kuti bazi ravo ragadzirisa here zvimwe zvezvivakwa zvinonzi hazvichatarisika, zvakaita semuzinda wenyika uri kuEthiopia uyo unonzi unoda kuvandudzwa. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi neVashandirwi Votambira Bond Notes Zvakasiyana
text: Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, VaJohn Mangudya, nemusi weMuvhuro vakaparura mari yemabond notes iyo iri kutambirwa zvakasiyana siyana munyika. Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, VaJohn Mangudya, nemusi weMuvhuro vakaparura mari yema bond notes iyo iri kutambirwa zvakasiyana siyana munyika. Zimbabwe iri kuda kuyedza zvisati zvamboitwa munhoroondo yenyika dzepasi rino zvekurega kushandisa mari yekune dzimwe kusanganisa dhora rekuAmerica ichishandisa mari yayo. Zimbabwe yakatanga kushandisa mari yekune dzimwe nyika muna 2009 mushure mekunge mari yenyika yashaya simba. Asi ma bond notes akaparurwa aya anenge asina kusvika zvakanaka. Vanoita basa rekuchinja mari vanonzi vatotanga kuitengesa pamukoto. Kuti munhu awane dhora rimwe chete rekuAmerica anoda ma bond notes gumi nematatu, uye kuti awane rand rimwe chete anoda mabond notes gumi. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wesangano reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, VaCallisto Jokonya, vanoti vemabhizimisi vari kutambira mari iyi nemufaro. Panyaya yekuti zviri kuitwa neZimbabwe zvakafanana nekufa uchimuka, sezvo zvisati zvamboitika, VaJokonya vanoti zvinokwanisika. Mutungamiri wesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailer’s, VaDenford Chimutashu, vanotenderana naVaJokonya vachiti mabond notes ari kurerutsira vanhu vange votadza kutenga zvinhu nekushaya mari. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kuyambira kuti kuparurwa kwemari iyi kuchapawo kuti madhora ekuAmerica ashaike zvichapa kuti zvinhu zvitange kudhura muzvitoro. Vamwe vanoti izvi zvave kutooneka nekunetsa kuri kuita mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. Asi VaChimutashu vanoti mari yekuAmerica yange ichishandiswa zvisizvo uye ikozvino inenge yave kuwanikwa. Asi mutungamiri wesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti sevashandi havasi kutambira kuparurwa kwemari iyi uye vari kuzoratidzira. Imwe nyaya iri kunetsa inyaya yekuti mari yakaparurwa iyi iri pamutemo here. Magweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu uye vemapato anopikisa kusanganisira Zimbabwe People First vakatokwira kumatare vachipikisa kuturwa kwemari iyi. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakashandisa masimba avo vakadzika mutemo unoshanda kwemwedzi mitanhatu kuti vaparure mari itsva iyi. Asi vanokokera bato reMDC-T mudare reparamende, VaInnocent Gonese, vanoti zvakaitwa naVaMugabe hazvisi pamutemo. Ikozvino dare reparamende riri kuenda kuvanhu kunovabvunza nezvekuparurwa kwemari iyi. Asi vamwe vanoti uku kuyeuka bako mvura yanaya. VaGonese vanoti havo zvakakosha kuti vanhu vape pfungwa dzavo kuitira mangwana. Zvinhu muZimbabwe panyaya yemari zvakaita manyama amire nerongo munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti kuti zvinhu zvifambe Zimbabwe inoda kuti igadzirise hupfumi hwayo kwete kuparura mari itsva. Kuti mabond notes achashanda sezviri kuparidzwa nehurumende? Aiwa apa ndipo panonzi navanasorojena totenda maruva tadya chakata. No media source currently available    .

headline: Vari Kunze Vochema neKwavanoti Kusatirimuka kweHurumende paNyaya yeMapasipoti
text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvikuru zviri kunze kwenyika zviri kunyunyuta zvakasimba nekwazvinoti kukundikana kwehurumende kuzviwanisa magwaro ekufambisa matsva kana kumutsiridza anenge apera kushanda, izvo zvave kuita kuti vamwe vavo varasikirwe nemabasa. Hurumende yakanga yambozivisa svondo rapera kuti zvinhu zvakanga zvave kuzoreruka sezvo yakatenga mapepa nezvimwe zvinodiwa mukugadzirwa kwemapasipoti. Asi tsvakiridzo yaitwa neStudio7 inoratidza kuti hurumende iri kutotarisira chikamu chekutanga chemapepa akatengwa aya pamwe nezvimwe zvinodiwa mukudhindwa kwemapasipoti zvakaita se ink zviri kutotarisirwa munyika pakati pemwedzi unouya. Mushandi uyu atiwo pari zvino hapana chiri kudhindwa kumahofisi kwavo, izvo zvinopesana nemashoko anga achiburitswa nevamwe ekuti zvinhu zvave kutanga kufamba. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri kuSouth Africa, VaMaxwell Mwale, vanoti vari kuchema zvikuru kuti pasipoti yavo yave kupera kushanda pasina hurongwa kwekuti vawane imwe nekukasika. VaMwale vanoti vanhu vakawanda muSouth Africa vave kuvharirwa mabhuku avo ekumabhanga sezvo vasisina magwaro anovabvumidza kugara nekushanda munyika iyi zviri pamutemo. VaMwale vanoti vanhu vakawanda vave kungogara vasina mapasipoti, kunyange hazvo vachityira kuti vachabatwa vachidzoserwa kumusha. VaMwale vanokurudzira hurumende yeZimbabwe kuti igare pasi nevatungamiri venyika dzine zvizvarwa zvayo votsvaga nzira dzingabatsira vanhu ava, pane kuti vadzoserwe kumusha. No media source currently available

headline: ZIMRA Yoomesera Vasiri Kubhadhara Mitero
text: Chipiri range riri zuva rekupedzisira remakambani emunyika ane zvikwereti zvemutero kuti ange atenderana nebazi reZimbabwe Revenue Authority, ZIMRA, kuti angazvibhadhara sei mari iyi gore rino risati rapera. Asi vakuru vemabhizimisi vanoti kuda kuvamanikidza kubhadhara mari iri kunzi neZIMRA inopfuura bhiriyoni imwe chete yemadhora zvichapa kuti vavhare mabhizinesi avo, vanhu vorasikirwa nemabasa. ZIMRA inoti mari iyi ndeyezvikwereti zvekubva muna Kukadzi 2009 kusvika muna Gunyana 2014. ZIMRA iri kuyambira kuti vanhu vanenge vanyepa pamapepa avo vanobvisirwa kanganwiro kana kuti Amnesty yavanenge vapihwa. ZIMRA iri kuita chipatapata chekutsvaga mari yekupa hurumende kuti ibhadhare vashandi pamwe nekufambisa mabasa ehurumende. Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chnamasa, vanoti ZIMRA inofanira kuona kuti mitero yabhadharwa. Mutungamiri wesangano revemabhizimisi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, VaJohn Mufukari, vanoti havaone makambani achikwanisa kubhdhara mari iyi sezvo makambani aya ari kuomerwawo. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemukuru anoona nezvehupfumi musangano Resource Exploitation Watch, VaWashington Mehlomakhulu, avo vanoti nguva yekuti vanhu vabhadhare zvikwereti inofanirwa kuwedzerwa. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoronga Kuwedzera maWar Veterans Mari dzeMudyandigere
text: Hurumende yazivisa kuti ichawedzera mari yemudyandigere yevakarwa hondo yerusunguko pamwe nekuvabhadharira mari kuzvipatara pamwe neparufu. Hurumende inoti chinangwa chayo ndechekuona kuti vanhu vakarwira rusununguko rwenyika vagara zvakanaka munyika yavakasungura. Izvi zviri mubhiri riri kuda kuvandudza mitemo inobata vaimbove varwiri verusununguko. Munyori mubazi rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika pamwe nevakarwa hondo yerusununguko, Ambassador Mark Grey Marongwe, vazivisa komiti yeparamende inoona nezvemukati nekudzivirirwa kwenyika kuti hurongwa uhwu huri mubhiri rekushandura mutemo weWar Veterans Act iro riri kunyorwa nebazi ravo. VaMarongwe, avo vaonovewo munhu aive murwiri wehondo yerusunguko vachizivikanwa nerekuti Tichatonga, vati maWar Veterans ari kutambura uye anotarisirwa pasi neveruzhinji izvo zviri kupa kuti bazi ravo ritore matanho ekugadzirisa chimiro chevanhu ava kuitira kuti vakwanise kugarawo zvakanaka. Vati hurumende iri kuronga kuwedzera mari yemudyandigere yemaWar Veterans kubva pamadhora mazana matatu negumi nemashanu emaRTGS - kusvika pamari inotambirwa nemusoja ane chinzvimbo chameja muchiuto. Meja muchiuto anotambira mari iri pakati pemazana mashanu nemazana matanhatu emadhora zvichienderana nemakore aanawo ari pachinzvimbo ichi. Vatiwo vari kuronga kuti maWar Vets avewo neMedical Aid kuti akwanise kurapwa kana achinge aburitsa kadhi rinoratidza kuti aive murwi wehondo yerusununguko. Asi vati pari zvino vanhu ava vari kurapwa kusvika vapora kana vachinge vapinda muzvipatara zvehurumende. VaMarongwe, avo vakamboshanda semumwe wevakuru vakuru vezvirongwa zveZBC, vaenderera mberi vachiti vanodawo kuti maWar Veterans achengetedzwe zvakanakwa kana achinge ashaya nekudaro vari kuronga neimwe kambani inoviga vanhu kuti pese panoshaya murwiri wehondo yehondo rerusunguko, achengetedzwa zvine chiremerera.
