Vazivisawo kuti pane maWar Veterans ari pakati pemazana mashanu nemazana matanhatu anoshaya gore rega. Vati pari zvino pane maWar Veterans zviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu munyika. Vati vamwe vavo vakawanda munyika havana kunyoreswa uye chirongwa chekuita izvi chiri kuenderera mberi nechinangwa chekuti vese vanokodzera vawane mari yemudya ndigere pamwe nekubatsirwa kupinza vana zvikoro. Vati bazi ravo richapinza basa maDistrict War Veterans Officers makumi matanhatu nematanhatu mumatunhu ese munyika kuti agadzirise nyaya dzavo mumatunhu ese munyika. Dzimwe nhengo dzekomiti iyi dzakaita saAmai Angeline Chipato vati kunyange hazvo chiri chinhu chakanaka kuchetengedza maWar Veterans, zvakakoshawo kuti hurumende ione zvaingaite pamusoro pana chimbwido nana mujibha avo vavati vakaitawo basa guru. Asi VaMarongwe vati mutemo uri kutosandurwa kuti vana chimbwido nana mujiba varemekedzewo pamwe nekupihwa mari dzemudyandigere sezviri kuitwa maWar Veterans. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Manyanya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo pasina chakaipa pakuchetenegedza varwi vehondo yerusununguko, vanoona sekuti danho iri riri kuda kutorwa richavhiringa hupfumi sezvakaitika muna 1997. Vati vanhu havafaniri kuve nemweya wekuda kungomora chete vasingatarisi kuti remangwana renyika richange rakamira sei. Kuma 80s hurumende yakadzika mitemo yeWar Veterans Act ne War Victims Compensation Fund iyo inosungira kuti vese vakarwira hondo yerusununguko vapihwe mari yemudyandigere pamwe nekubatsirwa panyaya dzehutano nedzidzo. Muna 1997 sangano rinomirira varwi ava, reZimbabwe Liberation War Veterans Association, rakamanikdza hurumende kuti vapihwe zviuru makumi mashanu zvemadhora pamunhu mumwe izvo zvakadonhedza dhora remunyika nekukanganisa hupfumi wenyika. Asi VaMarongwe vati rwendo runo havasi kuda kuti hurumende itore danho rinokanganisa hupfumi nekuda kwemaWar Veterans vachiti vachaumbawo Trust ichange ichiita mabhizimisi anotsvaga mari yekubatsira maWar Veterans. No media source currently available

headline: Kuvhurwa kweZvikoro Kuchanetsa Rwendo Rwuno
text: Kuvhurwa kwezvikoro kunogona kusafamba sezviri kutarisirwa mushure mekunge masangano akawanda anomirira varairidzi azivisa kuti nhengo dzawo dzakawanda dzichatadza kudzokera kumabasa nekuda kwekushaiwa mari dzekufambisa. Varairidzi vari kuda kuti hurumende idzosere mihoro yavo pamari dzavaitambira muna 2018, uye kuti nyaya dzehutano hwavo dzigadziriswe maringe nekudzivirirwa kubva kuCovid-19. Varairidzi vanodzidzisa zvidzidzo zveGrdae 7, Form 4 neForm 6 vanofanirwa kunge vadzokera kumabasa avo nhasi vachigadzirira kuvhurwa kwezvikoro muchikamu chekutanga nemusi weMuvhuro svondo rinouya. Studio 7 yakundikana kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi mukupera kwesvondo hurumende yakazivisa kuti varairidzi vose vanoda kubaiwa nhomba vachabaiwa kana zvikoro zvavhurwa. Mutungamiri wesangano reProgressive Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, VaTakavafira Zhou, vanoti hapana chikoro chingavhurika kana zvichemo zvevashandi zvisati zvagadziriswa. No media source currently available Asi vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri wesangano reZimbabwe Teachers Association, ZIMTA, VaGoodwill Taderera, vanotiwo sesangano, vanotarisira kuti hutano hwevarairidzi huiswe pamberi kunyanya, uye vari kugumburwa nehurongwa hwekuti varairidzi vadzokere kumabasa vasina mari. VaTaderera vanoti sesangano vari kuda kuti musi wa 15 Kurume uchavhurwa zvikoro, usati wasvika, hurumende inofanirwa kutanga yavapa mari dzichaita kuti varairidzi vakwanise kudzokera kumabasa. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mubatanidzwa wemamwe masangano anomirira vashandi vehurumende, weZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions, uyo waimbozivikana seApex Council, nezuro wakanyorerawo gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi vehurumende tsamba richipa hurumende mazuva manomwe kubva nezuro ekuti inge yagadzirisa zvichemo zvevashandi zvemihoro yavo, kukundikana kwayo vashandi vanozozivisa nezvehurongwa hwekuramwa mabasa. Gwaro rinoti hurumende iri kukundikana kushevedzera musangano weNational Joint Negotiating Council, uyo waifanirwa kunge wakaitwa muna Ndira wegore rino sezvakanga zvabvumirwa pamusangano wakapedzisira kuitwa muna Zvita, wekuti hurumende idzosere mihoro yevashandioo pamari dzavaitambira muna Gumiguru 2018.

headline: Hurumende Inoshevedzera Musangano weKuedza Kumisa Kuramwa Mabasa kweVashandi
text: Hurumende inonzi yashevedzera musangano wechimbichimbi nevashandi vayo senzira yekuedza kudzivirira kuramwa mabasa kwevashandi mushure mekupera kwemazuva gumi nemana avakanga vaipa kuti igadzirise zvinhu, kukundikana kwavo vaizotanga kuramwa mabasa neMuvhuro svondo rino. Sachigaro wesangano rinomirira vashandi, reApex Council, Amai Cecilia Alexander, vanoti vakokwa nehurumende kuti vasangane neMuvhuro kuti vaedze kutsvaga nzira dzekudzivirira kuramwa mabasa kwevashandi mushure mekunge dzimwe nhaurirano dzavakamboita dzatadza kuburitsa chimuko. Asi Amai Alexander vanoti sangano ravo harisati rashevedzera kuramwa mabasa kunyange hazvo mazuva gumi nemana akadarika. Vanoti zvichabuda mumusangano uyu ndizvo zvichavapa gwara rekutora kuenda mberi. “Hurongwa huripo Vakandemiiri tichienda mberi ndehwekuti, chekutanga, apex Council haisati ya declare strike. Takangosana takawirirana kuti kwasara 48 hours, saka mangwana tiri kuenda kunosangana nehurumende kuseni. “Tarongazve kuti kuseni tine Apex Council yatinozoturira zvatinenge tataura ku meeting yeNational Joint Negotiations Council,” vanodaro Amai Alexander. Vashandi vehurumende vari kuramba kutambira mari inoita mamiriyoni mazana matatu emadhora yakanga yanzi nehurumende imbofanobatsira vashandi kubva mukukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu. Mazuva gumi akanga aziviswa nevashandi akapera nemusi weChishanu svondo rapera, zvichireva kuti vashandi vaifanirwa kutanga kuramwa mabasa kutanga kwesvondo rino. No media source currently available

headline: ILO Yoyambira Zimbabwe nezveKushandiswa kweFacebook neWhatsApp Mukunyengedzwa kweVanhu Kuenda Muhunhapwa
text: Mumwe mukuru muhofisi yesangano reInternational Labour Organization kana kuti ILO muZimbabwe neNambia akaudza komiti yedare reSenate muHarare nhasi kuti vamwe vanhu vanoshambadzira mabasa pamadandemutande akaita seFacebook ndivo vari kukwezva vanhu kuti vagume vapinda muhunhapwa kana kuti human trafficking. VaAdolphus Chinomwe, mukuru weILO vaudza komiti yedare reSenate kuti madandemutande mazhinji ari kushandiswa anenge asina kunyorweswa zviri pamutemo. Vanhu vanenge vanyeperwa kuti kune mabasa vanozoguma vobatwa senhapwa kana kubatwa chibharo. Vatiwo madandemutande akaita seFacebook, Twitter neWhatsApp ndiwo avewo kushandiswa zvakanyanya nemakoronyera aya kukwezva vanhu kuenda kunze kwenyika vachivimbiswa mabasa anobhadhara mari yepamusoro kana kuvimbiswa nzvimbo dzechikoro. VaChinomwe vati basa rekutengesa vanhu kana kuti human trafficking, rine mari yakawanda chose zvekuti pagore rega rega pasi rese rinoburitsa mazana matanhatu emabhiriyoni emadhora. VaChinomwe vati zvakakosha kuti dzihurumende dziongorore vanhu vanoita izvi. Vanotiwo zvakakosha kuti hurumende inyorese kana kuvanechekuita nevanhu vayo vanenge vachibuda munyika vachiti izvi zvinogona kubatsira kuti vaye vanenge vachishanda kunze kana vachinge vapinda mumatambudziko vakwanise kuwana rubatsiro. Vaenderera mberi vachiti nyaya yekubuda kwevanhu munyika vachinotsvaga basa kana kuenda kunoshanda inonetsa nekuti kazhinji kazhinji vanhu vanongobuda munyika vasina kutaura kwavari kuenda uye vamwe vanongoenda vasina ruzivo rwekwavanoenda. VaChinomwe vati handi vashandi vemumba chete vanobatwa chibharo kana kushandiswa senhapwa vachiti kana vanhu vakadzidzira mabasa avo mumakoreji nemaUniversity pamwe nevatambi vebhora nemimwe mitambo vari kubatwa nemambure aya. Vatiwo zvinonetsa kurambidza vanhu kuti vasabude munyika kunotsvaga mambasa sezvo kuita izvi kuri kutyora kodzero dzavo. Sachigaro vekomiti iyi, Rtd General Mike Nyambuya, vati komiti yavo inoshushikana chose nekubuda kwevanhu munyika vachinobatwa chibharo kunze kwenyika uye vanoti vari kuita ongororo yekuona kuti kodzero dzevanhu vemuZimbabwe hadzisi kutyorwa here. VaChinomwe vati nyika inogona kuwana mari yakwanda chose kana ikaronga nekuona kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinoshanda kunze zvagara zvakanaka. Gore rapera munyika makamboita dambudziko guru mushure mekunge mamwe madzimai apinda muhunhapwa kunyika dzakaita seKuwait neSaudi Arabia. Hurumende yakatozomanikidzwa kuti ipindire mushure mekunge vakawanda vachema chema nemabatirwo ezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe izvi. Zvinofungidzirwa kuti vanhu vari pakati pemamiriyoni makumi maviri nematatu vari muhunhapwa munyika dzepasi rino. Bazi reUnited States Department rinoti vanhu vari pakati pezviuru mazana matanhatu kusvika zviuru mazana masere vanopinzwa muhunhapwa vanosvika makumi masere kubva muzana vari madzimai uye vamwe vakawanda vari vana vadiki. No media source currently available

headline: Harare Residents Trust Yoronga Kusangana naMeya weHarare Pamusoro peKudzuriswa Chibage kweVagari
text: Rimwe remasangano evagari vemuHarare, reHarare Residents Trust, rinoti rine hurongwa hwekusangana nameya weguta reHarare, VaBernard Manyenyeni, pamusoro pemashoko ekuti kanzuru yakati vagari vari kuSt. Martins nenzvimbo dzakapoteredza, vadzure chibage chavo chakarimwa munzvimbo dzisina kuvakirwa. Mukuru wesangano iri, VaPrecious Shumba, vanoti vanoona sekunge danho rekanzuru iri risiri kukoshesa mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzechikafu, sezvo riri kuuya panguva iyo nyika iri kutatarika nenzara. Svondo rapera kanzuru inonzi yakakurudzira vagari vakarima munzvimbo dzisina kuvakirwa kuSt. Martins, Airport Road nepedyo neCatholic University kuti vabvise chibage chavo kuitira kuti kanzuru ikwanise kutanga kuita basa rekugadzirisa masitendi ekuvakira dzimba zvakarongeka. Kanzuru inonzi ine hurongwa hwekugadzirisa masitendi anodarika mazana maviri nemakumi matatu kuitira kuti itange kupa vanhu pekuvakira dzimba. VaShumba vanoti kanzuru yaVaManyenyeni inofanirwa kunge iri kanzuru iri kushanda nevanhu vakasarudzwa nevanhu, kwete vatungamiri vezvematongerwo enyika. “Dambudziko riripo nderekuti kanzuru yedu yatsemuka nepakati, nekuti pane vamwe vashomashoma vane kwavanowana mashoko ekutaurira nyika, saka kana kanzuru ichitaura kudai iri kurwisa vagari,” VaShumba vanodaro. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri weguta reHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti hachisi chokwadi kuti kanzuru yavo iri kuda kuti chibage chose chakarimwa munzvimbo idzi chibviswe. VaChideme vanoti kanzuru yavo inongove nehurongwa hwekuti vagari vashomashoma vabvise chibage chavo munzvimbo dikidiki yavari kuda kuisa migwagwa nepombi dzemvura netsvina. “Takazivisa vagari venzvimbo inonzi St. Martins kuti pavakarima chibage pane patinoda kuvhura nzira, patiri kusevhisa masitendi ekuti vanhu vawane pekugara panotenderwa,”VaChideme vanodaro. Vanoti vanhu ava vagara vachingoudzwa makore ose kuti apa pachauya dzimba, apa pachauya dzimba, asi iye zvino kanzuru yeHarare ndipo payave kuda kuchitanga kuita basa rayo. VaChideme vanoti kanzuru yavo iri kutanga svondo rino kugadzira migwagwa yekuti vatange kuita basa rekugadzira pekuvakira dzimba iri. No media source currently available

headline: Magetsi Onetsa Kuwana kuMasvingo
text:
Vagari vekuMasvingo vanoti vari kugara vasina magetsi nguva zhinji izvo zviri kuvhiringa mararamiro avo sezvo zvinhu zvakawanda zvavanoshandisa zvichida magetsi kuti zvishande. Vagari vakawanda vanoti vari kupedza maawa akawanda vasina magetsi pazuva sezvo kambani yeZesa iri kudzima magetsi aya isina kumbovayambira.

Mumwe mugari wemuHillside, Amai Entrance Takaedza, vanoti kutsvaga dzimwe mhando dzemoto kunovadhurira sezvo vachipedzisira votenga huni kana gasi asi iwo vakabhdhara mari yakawanda vachitenga magetsi ekushandisa pasi pechirongwa chePrepaid meters.

Vamwe vagari vanoti nekuda kwekudzimwa dzimwa kwemagetsi, mabhizimusi akawanda ari kudonhera pasi. Mumwe muzvinabhizinesi akazvimirira, VaCaleb Mangoma, avo vanoita basa rekuweredha, vanoti nezuro vakaswera vakagara vasina basa ravaiita nekuti magetsi akaenda kwemaawa anopfuura gumi.

Mukuru webasa muhofisi yeConsumer Council of Zimbabwe muMasvingo,
VaDumisani Mungutsini, vanoti kudzimwa kuri kuitwa magetsi zvisina
tsurukano kunotyora kodzero dzevatengi. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano revagari reMuasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance , Muzvare Rumbidzai Magurupira, vanoti kodzero dzevagari dzekuwana mvura dziri kutyorwa sezvo magetsi ari kudzimwa kudhamu reMutirikwi kunopombwa mvura.

Mutaruri wekambani yemagetsi munyika, Muzvare Prisca Utete, vakaudza
Studio 7 kuti itumire mibvunzo yayo patsambambozha asi havasati vapindura. Gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, VaSoda Zhemu, vakati vaisakwanisa kutaura nekuti vaiva pamusangano pane ruzha vakati Studuio7 izovafonera vapedza asi vakange vasisadairi nhare yavo.

Vagari vanoti kuenda kwemagetsi nguva dzakawanda hakusi kukanganisa kubika mudzimba chete, asi kuti kuri kukanganisawo kudzidza kwevadzidzi pamasai-sai munguva ino yekuvharwa kwenyika nepamusana pedenda reCovid-19. Dunhu reMasvingo rave nemasvondo anosvika mana magetsi achinetsa mazuva ose izvo zvave kufungisa vazhinji dambudziko\ remagetsi rakamboitika mugore ra2008. No media source currently available

headline: Varimi Vonetseka neMbeu neZvikwereti zveKurimisa
text: Kunyange hazvo mvura yakaturuka, vakawanda mudunhu reMashonaland West vanoti havasati vaisa mbeu pasi sezvo vasina zvekurimisa, kushaya mbeu pamwe nefotereza izvo zviri kudhura zvakanyanya. Varimi vari kubhadhariswawo mari dzakasiyana zvichienderana nekuti vane dhora rekuAmerica here, mari yemunyika kana kuti Ecocash nedzimwe dzemakadhi. Hurumende nekune rimwe rutivi iri kukurudzira vamwe vemakambani akazvimirira kuti vabatsirewo varimi nezvikweti kurima zvakaita sesoya beans nezvimwe Varimi ava vanoti havana mbeu yekudyara sezvo iri kuvadhurira zvakanyanya. Mumwe murimi anorima kuMakonde VaIshmael Nyikadzino vanoti havana mari yekutenga mbeu nekudaro vave kutodyara chibage chemudura chavakakohwa gore rino icho vanofunga kuti chichadzikisa gohoo ravo. Pakiti yembeu yechibage yemakirogiramu gumi iri kutengwa nemadhora ari pakati pemazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe kusvika pamadhora mazana mana nemakumi maviri zvichienderana nekuti imbeu yemhando ipi. VaNyikadzino vanoti vagari vanofanirwa kupihwa chibage chehupfu sezvo kuine nzara zvekuti vanhu vachapedzisira vokanga mbeu. Zimbabwe yakatarisanawo nenzara inotyisa sezvo vanhu mamiriyoni masere vari kuda kubatsirwa nechikafu. Mumwe mugari akagariswa patsva kuBanket VaUpenyu Dzvove vanoti varimi vakawanda havana mombe dzekurimisa sezvo dzakafa. (The onus is on you to probe kuti what killed the cattle not write that he did not say) Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Farmers' Union (ZFU) VaWonder Chabikwa vanotiwo mbeu yakanonoka kuuya uye vakawanda vari kukundikana kuzadzikisa zviri kudiwa nemabhanga paine nguva kuti vakwerete mari pasi pechirongwa checommand agriculture. Vanhu vanokwanisa kukwereta mari pasi pechirongwa cheCommand Agriculture kuburikidza nebhanga reCommercial Bank of Zimbabwe (CBZ), Agribank, CBZ, Stanbic ne Zimbabwe Women’s Microfinace Bank. Mari iri kunzi ichashandiswa pachirongwa ichi inosvika mabhiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana maviri. Chirongwa cheCommand Agriculture ichi mukakore adarika change chichishorwa zvakanyanya sezvo dzimwe mari dzinodarika mabhiriyoni matatu dziri kunzi hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka. Kunyange hazvo varimi vari kuti vakaomerwa, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakaudza vagari vekuMahusekwa mudunhu reMashonaland East nguva pfupi yapera kuti mvura zvayaturuka vanofanirwa kubuda mudzimba varime vachiti vasina mbeu vanopihwa mbeu yehurumende pasi pechirongwa chePresidential Scheme. Asi vakanofanobata chigaro chevanotungamira mabasa edunhu reMashonaland West kana kuti Provincial Administrator VaChenai Media Mugandani vanoti mbeu iyi inongopihwa chete vanhu vanoshaiwa vasina kana mombe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekurima vachishanda neZimbabwe Farmers Unio VaPrince Kuipa vanoti varimi vari kusangana nematambudziko ekushaya zvekurimisa nekupihwa mbeu nehurumende nguva yapera. VaKuipa vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kupa varimi mbeu nguva iripo. Kunze kwekushaya mbeu vakawanda vanoti varimi vane minda asi havana zvikwanisiro. Mutungamiriri webato reMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa vachitaurawo pamusangano wakamboitirwa kuKariba vakashoropodzawo hurongwa hwehurumenda hwekutadza kupa varimi matirakita ekurimisa vachiti kurima nemombe zvinotadzisa varimi kurima minda yakakura kuti vakohwe pakuru. Hurumende inoti varimi vanosvika zviuru mazana manomwe vari kupihwa mbeu nefotireza pasi pechirongwa chePresidential Scheme vamwe vanosvika zviuru mazana mana vanotora zvikwereti pasi pechirongwa cheCommand Agriculture. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa Vopika Kusabva Munzvimbo Dzavanotengesera
text: Rimwe remasangano anomiririra vanotengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa, reNational Vendors Union, rinoti rinogona kumisa kutengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa kana hurumende ikatambira zvirongwa zvarakaendesa kwairi. Sangano iri rinoda kuti riwaniswewo mabasa ekuita pose panoitwa zvibvumirano nehurumende nemakambani anenge apihwa ma “tender”, sezvo richiti rine vanhu vane hunyanzvi hwakasiyana siyana, asi vasina mabasa avanoita. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaSten Zvorwadza, vanoti vakamirira kunzwa kubva kuhurumende vachiti hazvina musoro kuti hurumende inopa kambani imwe chete basa remamirioni makumi mapfumbamwe emadhora asi isingape rimwe remabasa kune avo vanotengesera mumigwagwa. “Chandinopokana nacho ndechokuti vanotengesera mumigwagwa vongonzi ibvai mumigwagwa pasina kutsvakwa imwe nzira yekuti vararame nayo,” VaZvorwadza vakaudza Studio7. Vatiwo sangano ravo rinoda kuti hurumende ipe vanotengesera mumigwagwa chikamu chema ’tender’ anenge apiwa makambani munyika. No media source currently available Asi mukuru werimwe sangano reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, kana kuti Viset, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vanoti nhengo dzesangano ravo hadzisi kuzobva munzvimbo dzavanotengesera kusvika hurumende yavapa nzvimbo yakanaka yekutengesera. VaWadzayi varatidza kunyunyuta zvikuru nekurohwa kwaitwa vamwe vavo nemapurisa eZRP achishanda nemapurisa ekanzuru. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yofunga Kutengesa Makambani Ayo
text: Hurumende inoti iri kuronga kutengesa zvikamu zvehupfumi mumakambani ayo, kana kuti ‘parastatals’. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvemari nekurongwa kwehupfumi, VaTerrence Mukupe, vanoti izvi zviri kukonzerwa nekusapinza mari kwemamwe makambani ehurumende aya. VaMukupe vanoti hurumende inogona kuenda mberi ikatengesa kambani yese kwete zvikamu zvayo chete kana zvichinge zvakakodzera. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti zvavakuda kuitwa nehurumende kuda kupa makambani aya kuvanhu vanozivikanwa kare, kana avo vanodyidzana nehurumende. Sangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions rakagara richiti makambani ehurumende aifanirwa kuitwa makambani akazvimirira kuitira kuti ashande nemazvo. VaMukupe vati kutengeswa uku kuchaitwa pachena kune ani zvake ane mari kunyange havo vachaedza kubatsira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvingada kutengawo zvikamu mukambani iyi kana kambani yose. “Pari zvino, hapana hurongwa hwekuti makambani aya ngaatengeswere vari muZimbabwe chete. Kana ave kuzoburitswa, kunokwanisa kutariswa kuti wauya uri munhu wemuZimbabwe, uri wemuno, unayo mari yako, unokwanisa kupiwa mukana nokuti uri mwana wemuZimbabwe asi chikuru ndechokuti tinoda kuti makambani aya atange kufamba,” VaMukupe vaudza Studio 7. Mamwe emakambani aya anosanganisira Air Zimbabwe, Zimbabwe Electricity Supply Authority, pamwe neNational Railways of Zimbabwe. Makambani mazhinji aya ane zvikwereti zvikuru kunyanya Air Zimbabwe iyo inonzi zvikwereti zvayo zvinosvika mazana matatu emamirioni emadhora. VaMukupe vanoti mamwe makambani akaita seZESA haagoni kutengeswa nekuti makambani akakoshera nyika nehurumende. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Varairidzi Vombosungwa Apo Hurumende Yotadza Kuwirirana neVashandi paNyaya yeMari Dzavanotambira.
text: Nhengo pfumbamwe dzesangano revadzidizi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe kana kuti ARTUZ, dzakambochengetedzwa nemapurisa zvichitevera kuratidzira kwakaitwa nesangano iri muHarare panguva iyo vamwe vashandi vehurumende vanga vachiita musangano nemamwe makurukota hurumende. Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, nedzimwe nhengo sere dzesangano ravo vakambochengetedzwa kwechinguvana nemapurisa mushure mekusungwa kwavaitwa vachida kutanga kuratidzira paAfrica Unity Square. VaMasaraure vaudza Studio vari pakamba yeHarare Central kuti kunyange hurumende ikavasunga havasi kuzodzokera shure panyaya yekurwira kuti vadzidzisi vabhadharwe nemari yekunze pamwe nekupihwa zvimwe zvikwanisiro zvinoita kuti vaite basa ravo nemazvo. Pavaregedzwa nemapurisa vasina mhosva yavapomerwa zvichitevera kupindiria kwaita magweta avo, VaMasaraure nevamwe vavo vabva vaenda kunoratidzira pahofisi yegurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Muthuli Ncube vachiti vanoda kuwedzerwa mari dzemihoro vachiti havasi kuzoenda kumabasa panovhurwa zvikoro nemusi weChipiri. Tichiri panyaya iyi, mutauriri wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaTabani Moyo vati sangano ravo harisi kufara nechisimba chiri kushandiswa nehurumende pavashandi vayo vari kuda kuwedzerwa mari dzemihoro. Zvichakadai, masangano ese anomirira vashandi vehurumende aita musangano negurukota rezvevashandi VaJuly Moyo achida kuti vashandi vehurumende vawedzerwe mari asi hapana chinobatika chabuda mumusangano uyu. Mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru muApex Council, VaGibson Mushangu, vaudza Studio 7 mushure memusangano wavo kuti hurumende yati haikwanise kubhadhara vashandi vayo nemari yekunze. VaMushangu vati sevashandi vehurumende havasi kuzoramwa mabasa parizvino kunyange hazvo vati vashandi vazhinji vanogona kutadza kuenda kumabasa sezvo vaine mari isingavakwanire kuti vakwire mabhazi kuenda kumabasa pamwe nekuraramisa mhuri dzavo. VaMushangu vati vave kutarisira kuti nhuna dzavo dzichagadziriswa mumusangano weNational Joint Negotiating Council wakatairisirwa kuitwa munguva pfupi iri kutevera. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevakafanobata chigaro chegurukota rezvemaindustry VaJuly Moyo mushure memusangano wavaita nevemasanagano anomirira vashandi kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Vashandi vehurumende vanoti vanoda kuwedzerwa mari dzavanotambiriswa pamwe nekugadzirisirwa zvikwanisiro zvose zvinoita kuti vakwanise kuita basa ravo zvakanaka. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vanhu Votamba Kisimusi Vasina Chekubata muZimbabwe
text: Vanhu vakawanda muHarare vanoti kisimusi yegore rino yanga isinganakidze kudarika yemakore ose sezvo vatadza kuenda kumisha yavo uye vashaya zvinwiwa nezvokudya muzvitoro. Veruzhinji muHarare vanoti vatadza kuenda kuzororo rekisimusi nekunetsa kwanga kuchiita mabhazi kuwana kuMbare Musika. Mumwe wevanga vachida kuenda kunoona hama neshamwari ndiAmai Nancy Sakarombe avo vati vashaya chekufambisa kuenda kumusha kwavo kuGokwe. Vamwewo vanga vasina nzendo vakaita saAmai Rosyln Masiyazi vanoti vaswera vachimbeya vachitsvaga zvinwiwa nezvokudya muzvitoro kuti vakwanise kutandara nemhuri asi zvinhu izvi zvanga zvisiri kuwanikwa semakore ose. VaKennedy Chigiji vanogara mumusha weWarren Park vaudzawo Studio7 kuti mumabhawa manga musiri kuwanikwa doro vachiti izvi zvazoita kuti vaswere varere. Vezvitoro vatataura navo vanoti zvinwiwa zvisingadhake pamwe nedoro zvawandirwa panguva ino yekisimusi sezvo vagara vachiwana zvinwiwa izvi zviri zvishoma kubva kumakambani anobika doro nezvinwiwa zvisingadhake izvi ayo ari kuchemawo kuti ari kushaya mari yekunze yekutenga zvinodiwa pakugadzirisa zvinwiwa izvi. VaGibson Rukobo, avo vanogara mumusha weGreendale, vanoti vatadzawo kushanyira hama dzavo kuUzumba sezvo vaswera vari mumutsetse wekutsvaga mafuta emotokari vaine mhuri yavo vachida kuenda kumusha. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakati dambudziko remafuta edzimotokari richapera mukupera kwemwedzi uno asi zviri kuitika zviri kuratidza kuti dambudziko iri riri kutotandavara. Zvichakadai, hurumende inoti veruzhinji vanofanira kumbotiwirira kwemakore mashomanana iyo ichiedza kugadzirisa kusamira zvakanaka kwakaita hupfumi hwenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vanochengetedza Mhuka Vaviri Vourayiwa neVanovhima Zvisiri paMutemo kuKariba
text: Vashandi vaviri veZimbabwe National Parks and Wildlife kana kuti Zimparks vanofungidzirwa kuti vakauraiwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vanovhima mhuka zvisiri pamitemo vekuZambia nemusi weChipiri. Vane ruzivo nezvakaitika vanoti vamwe vaviri vanochengetedza mhuka kubva kubazi reZimparks vakaita mahwekwe nevanofungidzirwa vaizvhima zvisiri pamutemo mudhamu reKariba. Panonzi pakaita kakurwisana apo vanochengetedza mhuka ava vakange voyedza kuendesa vanofungidzirwa kuti vaivhima zvisiri pamutemo ava pakamba yeChanga kuKariba. Zvinonzi nyaya iyi yakazozivikanwa mushure mekunge chikepe chevanochengetedza mhuka ava chaonekwa chichiyangarara chisina munhu uye chisina injini. Mutauriri weZimparks VaTinashe Farawo vatenda kuti izvi ndizvo zvakaitika vachiti vashandi vavo vaviri havasikuzivikanwa kwavari parizvino. VaFarawo vanoti vaendesa nyaya iyi kumapurisa uye kuferefetwa kwekushayikwa uku kuri kuenderera mberi uye vari kushanda pamwechete nevebazi rezvekuchengetedzwa kwemhuka kuZambia. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commisioner Paul Nyathi kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Kubatwa kwevanhu vanovhima zvisiri pamutemo kunonzi kwakanyanya pamuganhu weZimbabwe neZambia. Vanovhima mhuka zvisiri pamutemo munyika mbiri idzi vari kusungwa vachitongwerwa makore akawanda mujeri. No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru yeGweru neVagari Vopesana Pamusoro peMamita eMvura
text:
Pari kuita kusawirirana pakati pekanzuru yeguta reGweru nevamwe vagari pamusoro pehurongwa hwekanzuru iyi hwekuda kuti vagari vashandise ma-prepaid metre emvura.

Vamwe vagari vakaudza Studio 7 kuti havawirirane nehurongwa uhu nekuti kuwana mvura yakachena ikodzero yevagari isingafanirwe kutyorwa zvisinei kuti vagari vanombotadza kubhadhara mitero yemvura. Mumwe mugari uyo akangozvidoma nezita rekuti Ambuya Kurebwaseka vakati kuve nema-prepaid metre emvura kunogona kuunza zvirwere sezvo vamwe vanhu vachigona kutadza kuwana mari inenge ichidiwa kuti vakwanise kutenga mvura nguva nenguva. Mumwewo mugari, Amai Nonhlanhla Chijiya vanotiwo havatsigire nyaya yema-prepaid metre vachiti mvura yakasiyana nemagetsi ekuti vanhu vakaashaya vanokwanisa kushandisa dzimwe mhando dzemoto. Amai Chijiya vanotiwo kanzuru inofanirwa kuziva kuti veruzhinji vari kuomerwa nehupenyu vachitiwo vagari vakawanda vanoda kubhadhara zvikwereti zvavainazvo kukanzuru kunyanya zvemvura, asi vanoti kanzuru inovawomesera nekusada kutambira mari inobhadharwa muzvidimbu-zvidimbu. Kunze kwekusawirirana nenyaya yema-prepaid metre emvura mumwewo mugari VaTicharwa Ngambura vanoti vanoti vagari vanochema-chema nehwavanoti huwori hunoitwa nevamwe vashandi vekanzuru vavanoti vanovharira vagari mvura zvisiri pamutemo vachida mari yechiokomuhomwe. VaCharles Mazorodze vanove mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira vagari reGweru Residents Forum vanoti zvakanakira vagari kuti vashandise ma-prepaid metres vachitiwo zvimwe zvikwereti zvemvura zvinonzi vagari vanazvo kukanzuru hazvizi zvechokwadi nekuti vashandi vekanzuru havatarise nemazvo mashandisirwo anoitwa mvura nevagari. Asi meya weGweru VaCharles Chikozho vakaudza Studio 7 kuti hurongwa hwekuti vagari vashandise ma-prepaid metres huri kuenderera mberi vachitiwo vagari vakatambira hurongwa uhu, kunyange hazvo vakati havakwanise kupa nguva chaiyo yekuti izvi zvichaitwa riinhi. Panyaya yehuwori hunopomerwa vamwe vashandi vekanzuru vachinzi vanovharira vamwe vagari mvura vachida mari yechiokomuhomwe, VaChikozho vakakururudzira vagari kuti vasaite zvekuda kubhadhara mari yakadaro sezvo izvi zvisiri pamutemo uyewo zvisingabatsire vagari pakuderedza zvikwereti zvavanenge vainazvo kukanzuru. VaChikozho vakati vagari vane chikwereti chakakura kukanzuru vachitiwo kanzuru yavo yakazvipira kutaurirana nevagari vanenge vane zvikwereti kuti vabhadhara sei zvikwereti izvi. Vakatiwo kunyange hazvo vachitambira pfungwa yekuti kuwana mvura yakachena ikozdero yevagari, vanhu vanofanirwa kuyeuka kuti kanzuru inoshandisa mari yakawanda kuti vanhu vawane mvura iyi. VeZimbabwe National Water Authority vari kukurudzira kushandiswa kwema-prepaid water metre vachiti munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana munyika vachiti izvi zvinobatsira kuti vanhu vakwanise kubhadhara mvura yavanenge vashandisa chaiyo kwete kubhadharira inenge yaita zvekufungidzirwa. Harare nderimwe remaguta ari munyika akatanga kukurudzira vagari kuti vashandise ma-prepaid metre emvura mune dzimwe nzvimbo muguta iri.
Asi vamwe vanoti kushandiswa kwema-prepaid metre kunogona kuwomesera vanoshaya. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yovandudza Mitemo yeKuvamba Mabhizimisi
text: Zimbabwe Investment Authority inoti kuvandudzwa kuri kuda kuitwa mitemo gumi nemitatu nehurumende ine chekuita nezvehupfumi kusvika muna Chikumi kwakanangana nekurudziro dzinoitwa nebhanga guru repasi rose reWorld Bank. Sangano reZimbabwe Investment Authority, ZIA, rinoti kuvandudzwa kuri kuda kuitwa mitemo gumi nemitatu nehurumende ine chekuita nezvehupfumi kusvika muna Chikumi kwakanangana nekurudziro dzinoitwa nebhanga guru repasi rose reWorld Bank iro rinoburitsa gwaro rinoratidza nyika dziri nyore kutanga bhizimisi kana kuti Ease of Doing Business Report. Munyori wedare remakurukota, Doctor Misheck Sibanda, vakaudza vemabhizimisi kuZimbabwe International Trade Fair kuti chirongwa chekuvandudza mitemo ichi chiri kufambira mberi zvakanaka uye vanofunga kuti chichabatsira kukwezva vemabhizimisi vekunze. Pagwaro reWorld Bank rekutanga mabhizimisi ra2016, Zimbabwe iri pachidanho chezana nemakumia mashanu kubva panyika zana nemakumi masere nepfumbamwe. Munyika dzepasi rose Singapore ndiyo iri pamusoro soro, uye muAfrica i Rwanda. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti Zimbabwe inofanira kuvandudza mutemo wekuendesa hupfumi kuvatema uyo unonzi nevakawanda hauna kumira zvakanaka. Makurukota ehurumende anogara achipokana nezvemashandiro awo mutemo uyu. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Investment Authority, VaRichard Mbaiwa, vanoti zvakakosha kuti mitemo ivandudzwe kuitira kuti ikwezve vekunze uye kuti vanhu vatange kuwana mabasa. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reDiaspora Care Forum Rinoparurwa muSouth Africa
text: Zvizvarwa zviviri zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa, zvabatana nemakambani matatu emunyika iyi mukuumba sangano richabatsira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika munyaya dzekufirwa pamwe nekuronga zvirongwa zvinounza mari mumhuri. Sangano reDiaspora Care Forum, Dicafo, raparurwa zviri pamutemo muJohannesburg kuSouth Africa nemunyarikani waro, VaAustin Moyo, pamwe nemukuru waro mutsva, VaSocks Chikowero. Vachitaura pakuparurwa kwesangano iri, VaMoyo vati chinangwa chikuru chesangano ravo ndechekukurudzira vari kunze kwenyika kuti vakwanise kuita mabasa anovapa mari kuitira kuti vasazoshupike mumatambudziko akaita serufu nemamwe. VaMoyo vatiwo masangano achange achishanda neDicafo achabatsira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika mukutanga mishandira pamwe, mabhizinesi, pamwe nekuchengeta mari zvine hungwaru, senzira yekusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika, kana vachinge vazodzokera kumusha. VaChikowero vatiwo Dicafo ichashanda nevanhu vari munyika dziri muSADC, zvikuru South Africa, Botswana, Swaziland, Namibia, Lesotho neMozambique. Imwe nhengo yeDicafo, Amai Venitia Govendor, vatiwo sangano ravo richapawo ruzivo kunhengo dzaro munyaya dzakasiyana siyana, dzinosanganisira zvinhu zvinounza mari mumhuri kuti dzigare zvakanaka. Masangano emuSouth Africa achange achishanda neDicafo anosanganisra GuardRisk, Prosperity Funeral Advisors, neRetail Funerals. No media source currently available

headline: Musika weFodya Unovhurwa Asi Mitengo Iri Pasi
text: Misika yefodya yavhurwa muHarare mitengo yefodya iri pasi asi hurumende ichiti inotarisira kuti mitengo ichakwira nekufamba kwenguva. Gurukota rinoona nezvekurima, VaPerence Shiri, ndivo vaparura mwaka wekutengesa fodya zviri pamutemo pamusika weTobacco Sales Floor muHarare, uye vati vafara nemutengo kunyange hazvo wange uri pasi. VaShiri vati izvi ndizvo zvinogaroitika mwaka yese sezvo varimi vachitanga kuitengesa foya yemhando yepasi. Bhero rekutanga ratengwa nemadhora mana eku America pakirogiramu kozotiwo bhero repasi ratengwa nemasendi makumi mapfumbabweeku America pakirogiramu rimwe chete. VaShiri vaudza Studio7 kuti zvinofadza kuti misika yefodya yavhura kunyange hazvo paine dambudziko rechirwere cheCoronavirus. Asi mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira varimi vefodya munyika reTobacco Association of Zimbabwe, VaGeorge Seremwe, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo misika yavhurwa, havasi kufara nemitengo iripo. VaShiri vatiwo kunyange hazvo paine dzimwe nyika dzakawanda dzinorima fodya pasi rese, Zimbabwe ine mbiri yekurima fodya yemhando yepamusoro uye inokwikwidzana neBrazil chete pasi rese. VaShiri vati kurimwa kwefodya kuri kusimukira zvakanyanya munyika uye ishuviro yavo kuti dai vanorima zvimwe zvirimwa vadzidza kubva kuvarimi vefodya. Vatiwo kunyange hazvo Coronavirus yakavhiringa hupfumi hwenyika dzinotenga fodya kubva kuZimbabwe dzakaita seChina, hazvisati zvave pachena kuti, izvi zvichakakanganisa kutengwa kwefodya yeZimbabwe here VaShiri vatiwo vati hurumende inoda kuti varimi vatevedze marimirwo anoitwa kufodya pakurimwa zvimwe zvirimwa zvakaita sechibage, nembanje dzinioshandiswa kurapa dzakaita seHemp neCannabis. Sachigaro vebhodi remakambani yehurumende inoona nezvekutengeswa kwefodya, yeTobacco Industries Marketing Board, TIMB, VaPat Devenish, vati misika yefodya ingadai yakavhurwa mwedzi wapfuura asi izvi zvakatadziswa nekuda kweCoronavirus. Vatiwo mwaka uno zvinhu hazvisi kufambiswa semamazuva ose nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 uye mwaka uno varimi havasi kubvumidzwa kupinda mumisika uye vachange vaine vanhu vanovamiririra. Mumisika mange muine vatengi chete nevanhu vashomanana uye vanhu vese vange vari pamusika vange vakapfeka maMask, vachigeza maoko nekuita zvese zvinofanirwa kuitwa pakudzivirira Coronavirus. VaDevenish vazivisawo kuti huwandu hwevarimi vefodya hwakadzikira gore rino nezvikamu guni nezvinomwe kubva muzana. Vatiwo varimi vachange vachibhadharwa mari yavo nezvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana ari madhora ekuAmerica, uye imwe yacho iri mari yemuno. No media source currently available

headline: Varimi Vovhiringwa neKushanduka kweMamiriro eKunze kuMaruwa
text: Varimi vekumaruwa kuchamhembe nekumabvazuva kweAfrica vanoti hurumende dzenyika idzi hadzisi kuita hurukuro navo kuti Africa ingarima kudya kwakakwana sei yakatarisana nematambudziko ekuchinja kwemamiriro ekunze ichishandisa nzira dzemuAfrica. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano waitwa muHarare, uchikokerwa nesangano reLa Via Campesina in Southern and Eastern Africa. Varimi vati hurumende dzemuAfrica dzinofanirwa kuchengetedza nzira dzekurima dzemuAfrica kwete kutora zvinobva kure. Sachigaro wesangano iri, Amai Elizabeth Mpofu, avo vanotungamirirawo Zimbabwe Small-Holder Farmers Forum, vatiwo varimi vekumaruma muAfrica havasi kukosheswa sezvinoitwa varimi vemapurazi makuru. Sangano iri rinotiwo rinoda kuti hurumende dzemuAfrica dzisakurudzire kurimwa kwembeu dzakauchikwa vachiti mbeu idzi hadziunze hutano hwakanaka muvanhu. Amai Mpofu vatiwo kunyange hazvo chibvumirano chekurima cheMaputo Declaration chichiti zvikamu gumi kubva muzana zvemabhajeti enyika, zvinofanirwa kubatsira varimi, varimi vekumaruwa havasi kuwana rubatsiro urwu. VaBenedict Aminer, vanomiririra Kenya Peasants League vatiwo nzira zhinji dzekurima dzinoshandiswa nevarimi veminda mirefu dzinokuvadza nharaunda nezviwanikwa asi hurumende dzemuAfrica hadzima zvadziri kuita kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Sangano iri rinotiwo ranyora tsamba dzenyunyuto munyaya dzemabatirwo ari kuitwa varimi vekumaruwa dzichaendeswa kuSADC neComesa.

headline: PTUZ Inoti Varairidzi Vachenge Vachishanda Zuva Rimwe Chete paSvondo
text: Sangano rinomiririra varairidzi, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe (PTUZ), rinoti mari yakapiwa vashandi vehurumende senzira yekuvabatsira, yakatopera isati yatambirwa mushure mekunge hurumende yakwidza mutengo wemafuta ekufambisa dzimotikari. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vaudza Studio7 kuti varairidzi vari musangano ravo vachange vachingoshanda zuva rimwe chete, reMuvhuro, pasvondo kusvika nyaya yemihoro yevarairidzi yagadziriswa. Doctor Zhou vashora gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavhima, pamwe chete negurukota rinoona nezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vachiti havasi kumboteerera zviri kutaurwa nevashandi. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata makurukota aya kuti tinzwe divi ravo. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Yoita Hurukuro naVaMnagagwa Apo Mitengo Yoita Chamurambamhuru
text: Zvinhu munyika zvaramba zvakaita manyama amire nerongo munyaya dzezvehupfumi zvopa kuti vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi nezvematongerwo enyika vati hurumende yave kungopumha vanoipikisa huroyi ichishandisa mapepanhau akaita seHerald kurova bembera. Asi mutugamiri weZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti mushandi ave kudya nhoko dzezvironda. VaMutasa vanoti sesangano revashandi vachasangana neChitatu nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachivaudzawo nhuna dzevashandi. Vanoti gurukota rezvevashandi, Doctor Sekai Nzenza, ndivo vakaronga musangano uyu mushure mekunge ZCTU yakumbira musangano wakadai. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata Doctor Nzenza kana mutauriri waVaMnagagwa, VaGeorge Charamba, sezvo nharembozha dzavo dzange dzisiri kudairwa. Bepanhau reHerald riri kuti vemabhizimisi ndevamwe vanofanira kuongororwa kana vakwidza mitengo sezvo vari kuda kuti vanhu vapandukire hurumende vachitsigina neAmerica nebato rinopikisa reMDC. Izvi zvinotevera kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu muzvitoro. Zvinhu zvawedzerwa mitengo zvinosanganisira hupfu, chingwa, mupunga, Mazowe nezvimwe. Marita maviri eMazowe awedzerwa kusvika pamadhora emaRTGS makumi maviri nerimwe kana kuti 21 RTGS dollars kubva pamadhora gumi nematatu nemasendi makumi mashanu, 13,50 emaRTGS. Mutauriri weGrain Millers Association, VaGarikai Chaunza, vanoti vakwidza mitengo sezvo zvavanoshandisa kusanganisa mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari zvawedzerwa mutengo. Asi VaChaunza vanoitiwo seGMAZ vanenge votumira vanhu kunoongorora kuti hapana vari kudhurisa zvinhu here. Asi mutauriri weMDC, VaJacob Mafume, vanoti hurumende yeZanu-PF yakundikana kugadzirisa zvinhu. Asi muzvinabhizimisi vari nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vanoti mitengo ichagadzikana asi zvinogona kutora makore maviri sezvakavimbiswa negurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube. Zvimwe zvitoro zvinoti zvave kutengesa nemadhora ekuAmerica chete zvinonzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Doctor Godfrey kanyenze vanotungamira sangano reLabour and Economic Reform Institute of Zimbabwe hazvishamise. Ko chii chingaitwe kuti zvinhu zvigadziriswe? Doctor Kanyenze vanoti munyika munoda kugadziriswa nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika nekutaurirana. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti nyaya yehouri nekutadza kutungamira ndiyo yakanganisa hupfumi hwenyika. Asi hurumende inoti iri kukanganiswa nezvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru muhurumende. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Vobatana Vachiratidzira neMadzimai ekuHwange Colliery
text: Veruzhinji vabatana nemadzimai evashandi vekuHwange Colliery vachiratidzira muHarare vachishora gurukota rezvevashandi nemashoko avo ekuti madzimai aya ari kushandiswa nevanoita zvematongerwo enyika. Madzimai ekuHwange aya audza Studio7 kuti vanga vachiratidzira vakaremerwa zvikuru nemashoko aAmai Petronella Kagonye ekuti hurumende yakagadzirisa nyaya dzevashandi. Mumwe wemadzimai vanga vachiratidzira, Amai Tendai Sithole, vati vakakatyamadzwa nemashoko egurukota revashandi mudare reparamende ekuti vari kuita zvematongerwo enyika, asi ivo vachichemera mari dzevarume vavo kuitira kuti vawane chouviri. Amai Sithole vatiwo dzimba zhinji dzevashandi vekuHwange dzaparara sezvo mamwe madzimai oita zveupfambi kuti vawane chouviri. Vatiwo vari kutsutsumwa kuti kambani yeHwange Colliery yakaisawo chiga chekuti mushandi mumwe nemumwe akungogona kurapisa vana vatatu chete pachipatara chekambani iyi zvisinei nekuti mhuriyakakura sei. Amai Filomela Mausi vasvorawo gurukota rezvevashandi vachiti semadzimai evashandi vekuHwange Colliery, vari kuswera pamwe nekurara mutende vachiratidzira vaine tariro yekutiwo matambudziko avo achagadziriswa. Amai Sibonisiwe Ndlovu, avo vanoti vakamiswa basa vachipomerwa mhosva yekupesvedzera vamwe kuti varatidzire, vati vave kutyira kuparadzira hutachiona hweHIV sezvo nzira yega yasara kuti vararame iri yekupinda mumabhawa kuti vawane chouviri. Mumwe wevarume varatidzira vachitsigira madzimai aya,VaChunkson Madzonganyika, vati vanorwadziwa zvikuru nenyaya yemadzimai ekuHwange aya. VaMadzonganyika vati vanoda kuti vashandi vekuHwange Colliery vapihwe mari dzavo kuitira kuti madzimai aya nemhuri dzavo, vakwanisewo kurarama. Vanga vachiratidzira ava vaendesa tsamba dzenyunyuto kumapazi ehurumende akasiyana-siyana kusanganisira kugurukota rezvevashandi, bazi rezvezvechirwa, uyewo kudare reParamende. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kudivi rehurumende nezvenyaya iyi. Kambani yeHwange Colliery inonzi ine mari dzeveshandi dzinopfuura mamiriyoni makumi manomwe emadhora, uye hurumende ndiyo ine zvikamu zvehupfumi zvakawanda mukambani iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Hupfumi hweNyika Hworamba Huchienda kuMawere, Vamwe Vachiti Huwori Ndiyo Honzeri
text: Zvinhu zvinonzi zviri kuramba zvichienda kumawere munyaya dzezveupfumi munyika zvichionekwa nekushaikwa kwemafuta edzimotokari, kushaikwa kwemari yekunze, pamwe nekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu. Vamwe vanoti huwori munyika ndihwo honzeri hombe mumatambudziko aya, ayo anonzi ari kusunga vanhu, zvikuru varombo, zuva nezuva, vachipomera hurumende kutarisa rutivi panoitwa huwori uhwu. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehupfumi munguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa, uye vari mutewedzeri wasachigaro webato reMDC, VaTendai Biti vanoti matambudziko ari munyika ari kukonzerwa nekusafambiswa zvakanaka kwehurumende nevari kuitungamira. VaBiti vanoti huwori, sehawavanoti huri kuZINARA, huri kuregwa huchitambarara munyika, izvo zvave kukanganisa kukura kwehupfumi. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaProsper Chitambara, vanoti matambudziko ari munyika ari kunyanya kukonzerwa nekushaikwa kwechivimbo nehurumende kune vanoda kutanga mabhizimusi avo kana kudyara mari dzavomunyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzevashandi nemabasa, VaThomas Masvingwe vanotsinhirawo nyaya yekuti huwori dzihwo hwauraya nyika, vachiti matambudziko ose aya ari kurasirwa kuvashandi, avo vavanoti havasati vawedzerwa mihoro kwenguva yakareba kwazvo. Asi nhengo yevechidiki veZanu PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vanoramba kuti matambudziko ari munyika ari kukonzerwa nekusagona kutonga kwehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachiti matambudziko aya akasiiwa nehurumende yaVaRobert Mugabe pamwe nezvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe. VaChitambara vanoti matambudziko mune zveupfumi ari munyika anogadziriswa chete kana pakaitwa nhaurirano munyika. Izvi zvinotsigirwawo naVaBiti, avo vanoti kusvika munyika maitwa nhaurirano pakati pavaMnangagwa nemutungamiri weMDC VaNelson Chamisa, zvinhu zvicharamba zvichiomera vanhu, zvikuru varombo. Kusvika matambudziko ose aya agadziriswa, uye vekunze vanoda kudyara mari dzavo munyika vave nechivimbo nehurumende, ruzhinji rwevana veZimbabwe rwucharamba rwuchinonga svosve nemuromo munyika yechipikirwa. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari vemuBulawayo Vokurudzira Kanzuru Kushandisa Mukana Wekuve Special Economic Zone
text: Vagari vemuBulawayo vati kanzuru yeguta ravo inofanirwa kushandisa mukana wekunzi rakadomwa kuve Special Economic Zone kuti ikwezve vemabhizimisi pamwe nekumutsurudza makambani. Izvi ndezvimwe zvabuda pamusangano waitwa pakati pevagari pamwe nekanzuru muBulawayo apo kanzuru yange ichiparura chikamu chechipiri chechirongwa chekuvandudza mabasa akasiyana-siyana anoitwa nekanzuru icho chinoziikanwa kunzi Rapid Results Approach Initiative. Sachigaro weBulawayo United Residents Association, VaWinos Dube, vati kanzuru inofanirwa kuita kuti vanoda kusima mari muguta iri vakwanise kuita izvi zviri nyore. Izvi zvatsigirwawo naVaPercy Mcijo vanove mukuru mukuru wesangano reStreetwise Informal Traders Association, avo vatiwo zvakakosha kuti kanzuru ishandise mukana wekuti guta reBulawayo nderimwe renzvimbo dzakanzi maSpecial Economic Zone ari munyika kuti ibatsire kumutsurudza makambani akavhara muguta iri. Mumwe mugari angozvidoma nezita rekuti Amai Siziba vati kanzuru inorasikirwa neimwe mari yainofanirwa kuwana nekuti haizi kushandisa nzvimbo dzakadai sema hall ekanzuru. Vati kanzuru inofanirwa kugadziridza nzvimbo dzakadaro uye kukoshesa kugadziridza migwagwa, kunyanya munzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji, vachiti vakaremara kunyanya vechikoro vanofamba nema wheelchair, vanotadza kufamba zvakanaka nekuda kwekuti migwagwa mizhinji ine makomba-makomba. Chirongwa cheRapid Results Approach chinotarisa zvikamu zvakasiyana-siyana zvinofanirwa kukosheswa nekanzuru mumabasa ayo ainoitira vagari, kusanganisira kuvawanisa mvura yekunwa yakachena, kutakura marara nekuchenesa nharaunda, pamwe nekugadzira migwagwa.\n\nMukuru wezvemari mukanzuru yeBulawayo, VaKimpton Ndimande, vaudza musangano uyu kuti vagari vane zvikwereti zvinodarika zana nemakumi manomwe emamiriyoni emadhora, zvisinei kuti hurumende yakambobvisira vagari vose munyika zvikwereti zvavo zvose kumakanzuru mugore ra2013. Vati kunyange hazvo kanzuru ichiziva kuti vanhu vakawanda vari kuomerwa nehupenyu, zvakakosha kuti vagari vabhadhare zvikwereti zvavo kukanzuru kuti igokwanisa kuita mabasa ainofanirwa kuita nemazvo. Meya weguta reBulawayo, VaMartin Moyo, vati chirongwa cheRapid Results Approach, icho chakatanga kushandiswa muna Gumiguru gore rakapera, chiri kuenderanawo nechirongwa chehurumende chekutarisa zvinenge zvakwaniswa kuitwa nemapazi ehurumende pamwe nemakanzuru mukati memazuva zana. Vachipindura mubvunzo wekuti kanzuru yakagadzirira zvakadii pakudzivirira zvirwere zvakadai sekorera neTyphoid, VaMoyo vati chimwe chezvinhu zviri kukosheswa nekanzuru pachirongwa cheRapid Results Approach inyaya yekuwanisa vagari mvura yakachena uye hutsanana. Vamwe vagari vange varipo vashora nyaya yekuti makanzura akawanda haana kuuya kuchiitiko ichi. Vati chirongwa cheRapid Results Approach chakakosha vachiti chinobatsira kuti kanzuru iwone painenge iri kusarira pamabasa ainotarisirwa kuitira vagari. Chikamu chaparurwa ichi chakatanga musi wa 8 Ndira uye chichapera muna Kubvumbi apo kanzuru inotarisirwa kuzopira vagari zvainenge yakakwanisa kuita mukati menguva iyi uye kutangazve chimwe chikamu chechirongwa ichi. No media source currently available

headline: VaMangudya Vanoti Dhora reZimbabwe Harisi Kudzoka
text: Gavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, vanoti havana hurongwa hwekudzora dhora remuZimbabwe kunyange hazvo vati vari kuparura mari yemabond notes anotangira pamadhora maviri kusvika pamadhora makumi maviri munguva pfupi inotevera. Gavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, vanoti havana hurongwa hwekudzora dhora remuZimbabwe kunyange hazvo vati vari kuparura mari yemabond notes anotangira pamadhora maviri kusvika pamadhora makumi maviri munguva pfupi inotevera. VaMangudya vanoti zvavari kuita chete kuyedza kupedza dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari munyika uye kukurudzira kuti vanhu vagadzire zvinhu zvekutengesa kunze kwenyika kuti Zimbabwe iwane mari yekunze. Asi vanoona nezvehupfumi mubato guru rinopikisa reMDC-T, VaTapiwa Mashakada, vati VaMangudya vari kubata vanhu kumeso uye zvavari kuita kudzora dhora remunyika sezvo hupfumi hwenyika hwaenda kumawere. VaMashakada vati zvoitwa munongedzo wenyika isiri kutongwa zvakanaka, huori uye kutadza kugadzirisa hupfumi. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemutungamiri webato rePeople’s Democratic Party uye vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi, VaTendai Biti. VaBiti vati zviri kuitwa naVaMangudya zvichaendesa nyika kuna taisireva. Asi VaMangudya vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kuyedza kugadzirisa nyaya yehupfumi uho husina kumira zvakanaka. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari veBuhera South Voranga Kuramba Kubhadhara Mitero kuKanzuru Yavo
text: Vagari pamwe nevemabhizimusi vekuBirchenough Bridge kudunhu reBuhera South, kuManicaland, vari kunyunyuta nekushaya budiriro kwenzvimbo yavo kunyange hazvo vachiti vari kubhadhara mari dzemitero kukanzuru yavo. Vagari ava vanoti vava nechisungo chekuti vasabvisa mari dzemitero kudzamara vagutsikana nezvavari kuitirwa nekanzuru. Vagari ava vanoti kubva pakatarwa kuti Birchenough Bridge yave imwe dzenzvimbo dzichange dziri kuzosimudzirwa kuitwa madhorobha maduku makore anoda kupfuura makumi maviri adarika, hapana chinobatika pabudiriro chakaitwa nekanzuru. Venharaunda iyi vanoti Birchenough Bridge pamwechete neMurambinda Growth Point zvakatangirana pamwechete pakupiwa chidanho chekuti zvive mizinda yebudiriro kumaruwa asi Birchenough Growth Point yakasarira kwazvo. Amai Mercy Saize Mtsveta mumiriri wavana muzvinabhizinesi paBirchenough Growth Point. Amai Mtsveta vanoti kunyangwe vachiziva kuti nzvimbo yavo yakatangwa kudomwa kuti ichange ichizova ichisimukira, hapana chiri kufamba asi uku ivo vachibvisa mari kukanzuru yavo yeBuhera Rural District Council. “Kuno kuBirchenough, kuBuhera South takasungwa neCouncil nendaa yeGrowth Point ino zvichinzi tinoda maDevelopment Levy but maDevelopment Levy acho anoshandi chinyi asi imo muno muri mudondo? Vanotora mari dzedu muno vachinodzishandisa kwaMurambinda, izvozvi Murambinda yava taundi, but Murambinda isecond pamaGrowth points emuno muBuhera, Birchenough ndiyo growth point yekutanga. Nyangwe mukanozvitarisa pakubvisa mari dzemarates isusu kuno veBirchenough tiri number one pakubvisa uye nemitero yacho yemashops, but hapana kana chimwechete chatakaitirwa chinotaridza kuti mari dzedu pane chedzinoshanda.” Muzvinabhizinesi ava vanoti nekuda kwenyunyuto dzevagari, varovera mwoyo kudombo kuti vave kumbomira kubvisa mari dzemitero kukanzuru yavo. Amai ava vanoti paifanirwa kunge paine musika wemabhazi hapana kana nechimbuzi chekuti vanhu vazvibatsire, asi kanzuru iri kungovabvisisa mari kwemakore nemakore. VaFrancis Magaa ndivo sachigaro vevagari vekuBirchenough Bridge Growth point. VaMagaa vanoti vanogarochema nekanzuru yavo pamusoro pekusarira kuri kuita nharaunda yavo mune zvebudiriro. “Zviri kutitambudza ndaa yekuti growth point yedu iyi zvatinobhadhara zvinoenda kunotorwa zvoenda kwaMurambinda, Murambinda waakutokura isusu kuno takafa asi apo panga pagadzirwa zvakanaka asi patofazve. Handizivi kuti Murambinda chii achitora zvinhu zvedu kuendesa ikoko; kuti ndiko kune mahofisi edistrict here hameno? Isusu tinoda kuti panapa pakure pasimukirewo growth point yedu isumukire, pano pachigara pakafa! Hatichazivi kuti tochemera kupi,” vadaro VaMagaa. VaMagaa vanoti musika wange wovakwa nekanzuru yavo wakaregwa makore gumi apfuura pasina chikonzero chakapihwa asi vagari nevemabhizinesi vachibvisa mari mwedzi wega wega. Vanoti mugwagwa unobva paBirchenough wakananga kwaMurambinda haugadziriswe nenguva izvo zvinoita kuti usafambike; uye chikoro chekanzuru cheBirchenough Bridge Primary hachina makamuri ekudzidzira akakwana. Vemabhizinesi vanotarisirwa kubvisa madhora zana nemakumi maviri pagore, vane misha muGrowth Point vachibvisawo madhora makumi matanhatu. VaZodai Chamutsa mumwe mugari wekuBirchenough. VaChamutsa vanochema nerekuti nzvimbo yavo haina migwagwa yetara zvichienzaniswa neyave kwaMurambinda, uye hakuna magetsi emumigwagwa kanawo ma tower lights, anoita kuti vakwanise kufamba usiku, uye kuderedza njodzi dzekubatwa kwiyo kana kubhinywa. Kanzuru iyi iri kuyambira zvakare vane masitendi munzvimbo iyi ayo vasiri kusimudzira kana kuvaka kuti vachazoatorerwa achitengeserwa vamwe vari kuda zvavo kuvaka nenguva. Studio7 hainda kukwanisa kutaura naMudzviti weBuhera VaChris Mavhisa sezvo vanzi vange vari mumusangano. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoita Nhaurirano dzeMari neMusi weChina neVashandi Vayo Vange Voronga Kuramwa Mabasa
text: Hurumende nemusi weChina iri kutarisirwa kuita musangano nevashandi vayo vari pasi pesangano reZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions raimbozivikanwa nekuti Apex Council nezvenyaya yemuhoro. Izvi zvinotevera yambiro yevashandi ava yekuti vainge voronga kuratidzira sezvo hurumende isiri kuratidza kuzvipira pakuvawedzera mari. Asi gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, negurukota rezvevashandi, VaPaul Mavima, vanoti vakazvipira kuti vataurirane nevashandi nenekuvawedzera mari. Musangano uyu uri kuitwa pasi pegungano reNational Joint Negotiating Council. Nhaurirano dzakamboitwa mavhiki maviri adarika asi hapana chakabuda nekutadza kuwirirana panyaya yekuti vashandi vobatirwa here mari pahomwe yakaumbwa nehurumende yeGovernment Employees Mutual Savings (Gems) yavanozokwanisa kukwereta uye nyaya yemari yemuhoro yekubatsirikana kana kuti Cost of Living Adjustment. Hurumende inonzi yaida kuwedzera vashandi nemari inosvika zvikamu makumi maviri nemashanu kubva muzana kana kuti 25% zvakarambwa nevashandi vari kuti hurumende yakawedzera vari muchiuto nevamwe nemari inodarika zana nemakumi mashanu kubva muzana kana kuti 150%. VaMavima vati nhaurirano dzakakosha uye dzinofanira kuitwa sezvo kuramwa mabasa kuchidzosera nyika kumashure. No media source currently available Mutauriri weZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions, VaGibson Mushangu, vanoti vanoda kutambiriswa mari inosvika pamazana mashanu nemakumi maviri yekuAmerica kana kuti US$520. No media source currently available

headline: Gurukota reMari neHupfumi Rinoparura Hurongwa Hunovandudza Hupfumi?
text: Bazi rezvemari raparura hwaro huchatevedzwa nenyika kwemakore maviri ari kutevera senzira yekuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika. Vachiparura hurongwa uhwu muHarare, gurukota rezvemari, Va Mthuli Ncube, vati hurongwa uhwu, uhwo hwavari kudaidza kuti transitional stabilzation program, hwakanangana nekusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika kubva pari zvino kusvika muna zvita 2020. Izvi zvichaitwa kubudikidza nekusimbaradza nyaya dzekurima, kucherwa kwezvicherwa, kusimbisa nyaya yekutengesera dzimwe nyika, kudzikisa mari inoshandiswa nevari muhurumende, kugadzirisa migwagwa, madhamu nezvimwe zvivakwa zvehurumende pamwe nekuona kuti makanzuru aita zvose zvaanosungirwa kuita kuitira kuti veruzhinji vawane hugaro hwakanaka. VaNcube vati hurumende ichasimbaradzawo nyaya yekucherechedzwa kwekodzero dzeveruzhinji pamwe nekuona kuti munyika magara muine runyararo kuitira kuti Zimbabwe ikwanise kukwezva vemabhizimusi ekunze vanoda kuzosima mari muno. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vemabhizimusi emuno vasimewo mari yavo munyika senzira yekukwezvawo vekunze uye kuti nyika yashanda zvakasimba kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo kumasangano anokweretesa mari akaita se world bank ne internationational monetary fund nemamwe. VaNcube vaenderera mberi vachiti hupfumi hwenyika hwakatarisirwa kukura nezvikamu zvina kubva muzana mumakore mana kubva gore rinouya, huchizokura nezvikamu zvinomwe kubva muzana mamakore anenge achitevera maererano nehurongwa hwehurumende hwekuti munhu wese munyika ange ave kugara zvakanaka panosvika gore ra 2030. VaNcube vatiwo hurumende ichawedzera nhengo dzeparamende mari dzadzinotambiriswa kuitira kuti dzinyatsoitawo basa dzakachena mwoyo sezvo vachiti nyaya dzinozeyewa nenhengo dzeparamende mudare radzo dzichibata hupenyu hweveruzhinji. VaNcube, avo vanga vakatsigirwa nemunyori mubazi ravo, Va George Guvamatanga, vati mari dzemitero dziri kubhadhariswa vanhu dzichashandiswa kugadzira zvinhu zvinobatika zvakafanana nemigwagwa nekuona kuti zvipatara zvine mishonga vachiti zvakakosha kuti nyika irwisane nehuori kuti mari dzemitero dzioneke kushanda kwadzo. Mushure mekuparura hurongwa hwavo, Va Ncube vaudza Studio7 kuti vane hurongwa hwekubvisa mari yemhando yema bond notes nekufamba kwenguva mushure mekunge vagadzirisa zvinhu zvakati kuti. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vachishanda nesangano re Labour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Propser Chitambara, vaudza Studio7 kuti hapana chinofamba kana hurumende isina kuzvipira kuita zvose zviri kutaurwa naVaNcube. VaChitambara vati Zimbabwe inogona kusimukira kana ikashandisawo zviwanikwa zvayo zvakanaka pasina kutsvaga mari kunze yekuisa muhupfumi kana kuti stimulus package. Vazivisawo kuti hurumende ine hurongwa hwekuti pave nenzvimbo imwe chete ichange ichipa marezeresi kune vekunze vanoda kuita mabhizimusi munyika vachiti pane vamwe vana muzvinabhizimusi vavasina kudoma nemazita vavati vakatonosima mari dzavo kune dzimwe nyika dzakapoteredza Zimbabwe nechikonzero chekuti vainzi vatsvage marezenesi anodarika makumi maviri kuitira kuti vaite bhizimusi ravo muZimbabwe. Bazi rezvemari ratiwo riri mubishi kuongorora nyaya yekuti vari muhurumende vashandise motokari dzisingadhure senzira yekuderedza huwandu hwemari inoshandiswa nehurumende muzvinhu zvisina nemusoro. No media source currently available

headline: VaGono Vanoudza Paramende Kuti Kambani Inokwezva Mabhizinesi Haina Mari
text: Kambani iri kutarisirwa nehurumende kuti ichasimudzira hupfumi nekupa makambani mukana wekugadzira zvinhu achitengesa kunze nemutemo yakareruka, yeSpecial Economic Zones Authority, haina kana mari, mahofisi kana vashandi zvekuti nhengo dzeparamende dzashamisika kuti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kufamba vachipembedza zvinhu pasina chiri kuitika. Vachipa humbowo kukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika nemabhizimisi, sachigaro vebhodhi rekambani iyi, VaGidion Gono, vati kambani iyi haina kana hofisi zvayo uye ivo nebhodhi ravo ndivo vari kutoita basa rinofanira kunge richiitwa nevashandi avo vasipo. VaGono vati kumbani iyi iri kushandira kumahofisi avo pachavo uye nhengo dzebhodhi iri dziri kushandisa mari yadzo kuita basa rekambani iyi. Vati pave nemwedzi misere kambani iyi yaumbwa uye vakatodoma vanhu vavanoda kuti vatungamire kambani iyi asi hurumende haisati yasarudza kuti ndiyani anofanira kuva mukuru wekambani iyi. VaGono vati maSpecial Economic Zones ane mukana wekusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika nekukasika pamwe nekupedza dambudziko remari munyika nekuti pakaita makambani akawanda anogadzira achitengesa kunze, hupfumi hunofamba zvakanaka. VaGono vaudza komiti kuti kambani iyi yakaumbwa iri pasi pebazi reMacroeconomic Planning and Development muhurumende yaive yaVaRobert Mugabe. Asi zvichitevera kupinda kwaVaMnangagwa, vati havasi kuziva kuti vava pasi pebazi ripi. Vati vakatonyorera kumahofisi emutungamiriri wenyika vachibvunza nezvenyaya iyi uye havasati vawana mhinduro. Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, Amai Tabeth Malinga, vati hazvifadzi kuti mutungamiriri wenyika anopinda mumisangano kunze kwenyika achipembedza maSpecial Economic Zones asi ipo pasina chiri kuitika munyika. Vayambirawo VaGono nebhodhi ravo kuti vasiyane nekushandisa mari yavo kuita basa rehurumende vachiti kana hurumende ichikoshesa Special Economic Zones Authority inofanira kudira mari mukambani iyi. Izvi zvatsigirwawo nedzimwe nhendo dzekomiti iyi. Vanongoorora nyaya dzehupfumi vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio7 kuti humbowo hwaturwa kuparamende naVaGono haufadzi zvachose uye zvaratidza kuti hurumende iri kuwanza mutauro pasina zvairi kuita. Vati maSpecial Economic Zones akakosha uye dzimwe nyika dzakabudirira nawo nokudaro hurumende inofanira kukoshesha kambani iyi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, VaJohn Masimba Manyanya, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvataurwa naVaGono zvinotyisa. Vaenderera mberi vachiti havawoni chinotadzisa hururmende yaVaMnagwagwa kugadzirisa nyaya yemaSpecial Economic Zones nekukasika. Vati zvinonyadzisa kuti vanhu vekunze vanoda kushandira mumaSpecial Economic Zones vauye munyika vosvikoona kuti kambani iyi haitomborina kana hofisi zvayo. Asi VaGono vati zvisinei nekuoma kwakaita zvinhu vari kutoita basa uye bhodhi ravo rakatopa imwe kambani yekuChina mvumo yekumutsiridza kambani yeZISCOSTEEL nemari indarika bhiriyoni remadhora. Vatiwo pari zvino pane makambani anodarika makumi matatu akatonyorera kubhodhi ravo achida kupihwa nzvimbo yekushanda mumaSpecial Economic Zones aya. Pari zvino hurumende yakadoma nzvimbo yeSunway City kuRuwa, guta reBulawayo nedhorobha reVictoria Falls sema Special Economic Zones. No media source currently available

headline: POTRAZ Yoshorwa Ichinzi Yave Kuda Kumbunyikidza Vanoshandisa WhatApp
text: Makambani enharembhozha anoti achaziva svondo rino kuti chikonzero chei kambani yePost and Telecommunications Regulatory Authority kana kuti POTRAZ yakavamisa kupota vachimboderedza mitengo yenharembozha nekumboita zvirongwa zvekuti vanhu vafonewo nemari yakaderera pane dzimwe nguva kana kuti mapromotions. Danho rePOTRAZ iri rave kuunza mutauro vamwe vachiti danho iri rinombunyikidza kodzero dzeveruzhinji. Vanhu vakawanda vakataura neStudio 7 vanoti havazi kufara nekusabuda pachena kweveboka rePOTRAZ padanho ravakatora rekuti makambani enharembozha matatu ari munyika eEconet, Net One neTelecel ambomira kuderedza mitengo, kana kuti promotion muChirungu, kwaange achiita. Vamwe vevanhu ava vakaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotyira kuti POTRAZ yakatora danho iri senzira yekudzivira veruzhinji kuti vasawane mukana wekutaura zvavanoda nenzira dzakachipa dzepa internet. Mumwe mugari wemuBulawayo muzvare Tinaye Shumba vanoti mafungiro avo ndeekuti, hurumende kuburikidza nePOTRAZ, yakatora danho iri nekuti mapoka anorwira kodzero dzevanhu akawanda ange ari kushandisa nzira dzakachipa idzi kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti varatidze kutsutsumwa kwavo kuhumende pamusoro pemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika. VaIpithule Maphosa vanove sachigaro weboka revechidiki vebato reZAPU muBulawayo vanoti danho rePOTRAZ iri ndemumwe muenzaniso uri pachena unoratidza kushaya hanya kwehurumende pazvinhu zvinobatsira veruzhinji. VaMaphosa vanotiwo danho iri inzira yehurumende yekuedza kutsvaga nzira dzose dzingakwanisika dzekutsvaga nadzo mari sezvo hurumende iri kutambudzika kuwana mari yekubhadhara vashandi vayo. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuPOTRAZ panyaya iyi. Mumwewo mugari uyo akangoda kuzvidoma nezita rekuti Michelle akaudza Studio 7 kuti danho rakatorwa nevePOTRAZ harifadze vakawanda, asi anoona zvakakosha kuti boka iri riise mitemo inobatsira kuti nyika ichengetedzeke. Kunyange hazvo achibvuma kuti danho iri rinogona kuita kuti veruzhinji vadhurirwe nekushandisa nharembozha dzavo, muzvare Michelle anoti zvinonetsa kuti hurumende idzivirire vanhu kuti vataurirane pfungwa dzavo pamusoro pezviri kuitika munyika. Amai Koliwe Majama vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muchikamu cheBroadcsating neInformation Technonology musangano reMedia Institute of Southern Africa kana kuti MISA. Amai Majama vanoti kunyange hazvo sangano ravo richiziva nekunzwisisa kuti ibasa revePOTRAZ kuti vaongorore mashandiro emakambani enharembozha, chiri kuvanetsa ndechekuti vePOTRAZ vakatora danho iri vasingape chikonzero. Amai Majama, avo vanoti sangano reMISA rakamboita musangano nePOTRAZ, vanoti zvakakosha kuti boka iri ribudire vanhu pachena pamatanho arinenge ratora, vachitiwo chiri kuita kuti vanhu vashushikana parizvino inyaya yekuti vechiuto vakabuda vachityisidzira veruzhinji pamusoro pekushandisa iinternet. VaButler Tambo ndivo mutevedzeri wemukuru wesangano reCentre for Public Engagement uye vanoongororawo mitemo yehurumende kunyanya ine chekuita nezvehupfumi. VaTambo vakashorawo danho rePOTRAZ vachiti rinodzorera kumashure zvehupfumi munyika. Hurumende pasi pegurukota reInformation Communication Technology, iri mushishi kugadzira mutemo unonzi Computer Crime and Cyber Crime Bill uyo unonzi uchashandiswa kusunga vose vachawanikwa vachishandisa internet zviri kunze kwemutemo. Vamwe vanoti mutemo uyu unogona kutyora kodzero dziri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika dzekuti vanhu vane kodzero yekutaurirana pachena kana kuti Freedom of expression muChirungu. Asi vamwewo vanoti zvakakosha kuti nyika ive nemitemo yakadai sezvo ichibatsira kudzivirira nyika kubva kuvavengi kana vanopfurikidza mwero.

headline: Kushandiswa kweMari yeChina neIMF Koshandura Zvinhu Pasi Rose?
text: Kutambirwa kwemari yekuChina semari inogona kushandiswa nesangano rinokweretesa mari pasi rose, reInternational Monetary Fund, kana kuti IMF, kunonzi mucherechedzo mukuru wekuti dhora rekuAmerica rava kukwikwidzwa zvine mutsindo pasi rose. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemari pasi rose dzinoti IMF yakatora danho iri mushure mekuona kuti China iri kufambira mberi zvikuru munyaya dzebudiriro, uye nyika dzakawanda dzinoshandisa zvinhu zviri kugadzirwa kuChina. Kunyange hazvo mari yekuChina, Yuan, iine huremu huri pasi pedhora rekuAmerica, nyanzvi munyaya dzemari dzinoti kusimukira kuri kuita hupfumi hweChina kuchaita kuti mari yayo ive nesimba mumakore mashoma anotevera. Dzimwe nyanzvi dziri kuyambira kuti mune remangwana vane mari dzavo vachaonekwa vachidyara mari dzavo mumakambani ekuChina, sezvo nyika iyi iri kuratidza kusimukira kune mutsindo. IMF isangano rinoziva zvinoitika muna zana nemakumi masere neshanu, uye ndiro sangano rinobatsira nyika dzinenge dzichida mari yerubatsiro. Vanoziva zviri kuitika muIMF vanoti kupinda kweChina mudura remari dzinoshandiswa nesangano iri, zvava kureva kuti maitiro esangano iri ava kuchinja, kuburikidza nekupihwa nzeve kunenge kwava kuitwa China. Kutengeserana kweChina nenyika dzemuAfrica kuri kuramba kuchikwira. Mugore ra2009, China yakapfuura America mukutengeserana nenyika dzemuAfrica uye muna Ndira gore rino, China inoti kutenga nekutengeserana pakati penyika iyi nenyika dzemuAfrica kwakapfuura mabhirioni gumi nemanomwe emadhora. Kutengeserana pakati peChina nenyika zhinji kuri kuramba kuchikwirira izvo zvave kukonzera kuti vanhu kana makambani anoisa mari mune dzimwe nyika, aise mari yavo mumakambani ekuChina. Zvichitevera kupinda kwe Yuan mudura reIMF, nyika dzinoita gumi nenomwe dzemuAfrica dziri kuzeya kushandiswa kwe Yuan mukutengeserana pakati padzo. Asi nyanzvi munezvemari nehupfumi uye vachidzidzisa zvemabhizimisi paDevry University kuOhio, Professor Elliot Masocha, vanoti havavimbi nemaitiro eChina. Asi imwezve nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi uye vachishanda neLabour, Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti China iri kubata nyika dzepasi rose nekuti hupfumi hwenyika iyi huri kukwirira zvekuti vemabhizimisi vemunyika dzakaita seAmerica vave kuda kuisa mari mumakambani ekuChina. VaChitambara vanobvumirana naVaMasocha kuti Zimbabwe ngaigadzirise hupfumi hwayo. Vanotiwo Zimbabwe inofanira kurega kutengesa zvinhu kana zvicherwa zvinozonogadzirwa kunze kwenyika sezviri kuitika kufodya nemangoda. VaChitambara vanoti hapana zvekuchadzvenga China nekuti masimba ezvehupfumi ari kuchinja asi Zimbabwe inofanira kushanda nesimba kuti isasaririra. Zvamira zvakadai, VaChitambara vanoti America inofanirwa kusunga dzisimbe kuitira kuti isapinzwe parumananzombe neChina. Nyanzvi dzinoti China iri kushandisa hunyanzvi hwavo mukutenga zvicherwa semubhadharo wainopihwa nenyika, zvikuru dzemu Africa dzinenge dzatenga zvinhu zvayo, kanawo nyika dzinenge dzapihwa mari yekusimudzira nyika idzi. Izvi zvinoita kuti China ive nehupfumi hwakasimba, kuburikidza nezvicherwa zvainenge yaunganidza, kana kuti sound money. Dzimwe nyika dzakabudirira dzine hupfumi hwe fiat currency, uhwo hunovapo kuburikidza nekuvimbika kwehurumende uko kunopa veruzhinji kuti varemekedze mari inodhinda nedzihurumende dzakadai. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari veGuta reHarare Vonyunyuta neDanho reKanzuru reKutevera Zvikwereti neMasamanisi
text: Rimwe sangano rinomirira vagari vemuHarare, reHarare Residents Trust, rinoti hazvisi pamutemo kuti kanzuru itange nekutumira masamanisi kuvagari vane zvikwereti isati yagara navo pasi kuti vatsvage nzira dzekubhadhara zvikwereti zvavo. Izvi zvinotevera danho rakaziviswa nekanzuru yeHarare rekuti yave kutevera zvikwereti zvayo zviri muvagari kuburikidza nemasamanisi. Kanzuru inoti vagari vemuHarare vane zvikwereti zvinosvika mabhiriyoni gumi nemanomwe emadhora emunyika, ana kuti (ZWL$17 billion) yemitero isiri kubhadharwa. Mukuru wesangano reHarare Residents Trust, VaPrecious Shumba, vanoti zvinozivikanwa kuti kanzuru haisi kukwanisa kutumira magwaro emitero kuvagari, izvo zvinoita kuti panetse kuziva kuti mugari ane chikwereti chakakura zvakadii.  No media source currently available Asi mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme vanoti vatora danho iri maringe nekuona kuti zvikwereti zviri kukurisa vanhu vasingabhadhare. Vanoti kanzuru inoda kuti mabasa ayo ainotarisirwa kuita arambe achienderera mberi, akaita sekutakurwa kwemarara, kupa vanhu mvura, kugadzira migwagwa, kuisa magetsi, kugadzira zvipatara uye kuti zvikoro zvirambe zvichishanda, VaChideme vanoti nekuda kwaizvozvo, vakaona zvakaringana kuti vanhu vapiwe masamanisi kuti vange vachibhadhara mari dzinodiwa kukanzuru. No media source currently available

headline: Mitengo yeZvinhu Yotarisirwa Kukwira Zvichitevera Kukwira kweMitengo yeMafuta
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kuyambira kuti kukwidzwa kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari neZimbabwe Energy and Regulatory Authority kana kuti ZERA kuchapa kuti mitengo yezvinhu ikwire zvakanyanya. Mukuru weZERA, VaEddington Mazambani ,vaudza Studio 7 kuti kukwira kwemitengo yekuunza mafuta aya munyika ndiko kuri kupawo kuti vawedzera mutengo. ZERA inoti kunyangwe yatara mitengo, vanotengesa mumagaraji havafanire kudhurisa mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari aya zvakanyanya. GlobalPetrolProces.com iyo inoongorora mitengo yemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari pasi rose inoti muAfrica, Zimbabwe iri pachidanho chechipiri kubva kuSenegal pakudhura kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaVictor Bhoroma, vanoti nyaya yekukwira kwemafuta aya chave chigariro musoro wetsuro kushaya nyanga. VaBhoroma vanoti izvi zvinoshamisa zvikuru nekuti Zimbabwe inosanganisa mafuta ainotenga kunze neanogadzirwa nenzimbe dzinorimwa kuChisumbanje. Munyori mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti kukwira kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari kunopawo kuti mitengo yezvinhu zvakawanda iwedzerwe asi vashandi vasiri kuwedzerwa mari. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga VaGilbert Muponda vanoti panofanira kudzamiswa pfungwa pasati pakwidzwa mutengo wemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari nekuti zvinokonzera kusagadzikana kwehupfumi. VaMuponda vatiwo havo haisi Zimbabwe chete iri kukwidza mitengo nekuti South Africa iri kutarisirwa kuita zvimwe chetezvo munguva pfupi inotevera. Mutungamiri weEmployers Confederaition of Zimbabwe, Doctor Israel Murefu, vati kukwira kwemitengo kuchakonzera kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu kana kuti inflation vachiti sevemabhizimisi vari kunetsekana nekusagadzikana kwemutengo wemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Yoyambira Kumwe Kuratidzira Sezvo Mitengo Yoita Chamurambamhuru
text: Rimwe sangano revashandi re Zimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions kana kuti ZCTU rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru nemitengo yezvinhu kana kuti inflation zvekuti hazvishamise vashandi vakaratidzira. NeMugovera sangano reZimbabwe National Statistics Agency kana kuti Zimstats rakazivisa kuti mitengo yezvinhu kana kuti inflation yakwira kusvika pamazana masere nemakumi matatu nemanomwe kubva muzana kana kuti 837, 53%. Muna Chikumi mitengo yezvinhu yaive pazvikamu mazana manomwe nemakumi matatu nemanomwe kubva muzana kana kuti 35, 53%. Gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vanoti nhaurirano dzemihoro dziri paviri, kuTripartite Negotiating Forum dzinobata nyika yose, asi dzimwe dzinoitwa kumaindustry nemaNational Employment Councils. No media source currently available Munyori mukuru weZCTU VaJaphet Moyo vanoti mushandi aomerwa nezvinhu zvekuti havashamisike akatanga kuratidzira. No media source currently available Sezvo tisina kusimbira divi rimwe chete setsvimbo, tabatawo mutungamiri wesangano revashandirwi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe kana kuti EMCOZ Doctor Israel Mure avo vati vanoda kuwedzera vashandi mari asi vari kutatarikawo nekushaya mari sezvo makambani asiri kushanda nemazvo nekuda kwechirwere checoronavirus. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kuita Zvirongwa Zvinounza Mabasa
text:
Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti Zimbabwe inofanirwa kusunga dzisimbe kuitira kuti munyika muve nemabasa kuitira kuti vose vari kupedza zvidzidzo vawane chekuita senzira yekusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika.

Mukuru weAffirmative Action Group mudunhu reMatabeleland, VaReginald Shoko, vanoti kubvira pavakapinda pachigaro ichi, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa varatidza chido chikuru chekugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika. Asi VaShoko vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurongwa hwavo huchikasika kushanduka kubva pakuve hwepamurormo chete huve hunobatika. VaShoko vanotiwo kunze kwekuve nevemabhizimisi vekunze vanosima mari munyika, zvakakoshawo kuti pave nehwaro hwakajeka hunoita kuti zvizvarwa zvemuZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvikwanisewo kusima mari yazvo munyika pasina kutyira kuti mari iyi inogona kutsakatika. Izvi zvinotsigirwawo naVaButler Tambo avo vanove muongorori wezvehupfumi anoshanda akazvimirira ega. VaTambo vanoti zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe ibhadhare zvikwereti zvainazvo kumabhanga epasi rose eInternational Monetary Fund neWorld Bank kuti igokwanisa kuwana mari inobatsira kumutsurudza hupfumi. Asi vanotiwo zvakakoshawo kuti zvikwereti izvi zvitange zvanyatsowongororwa uyewo kuti kana nyika yawana imwe mari kubva kumabhanga aya ishandise mari iyi nenzira kwayo. Mutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti vanotsinhira nyaya yekuti hupfumi hwenyika hungagadzirika chete kana nyaya dzematongerwo enyika dzatanga dzagadziriswa. VaMutasa vanoti panofanirwa kuve nemuonera pamwe pakati pehurumende, vashandi nevashandirwi kuti zvinhu zvinyatsofamba.

VaMutasa vanoti Zimbabwe ine rombo rakanaka rekuve nyika ine zviwanikwa zvakasiyana-siyana kusanganisira zvirimwa zvinogona kushandiswa kubatsira kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire nekukasika kana zvikabatwa zvakanaka. Pakuti chii chingaitwe kuti vechidiki vawane zvingavape pundutso muhupenyu hwavo kusanganisira dzidzo pamwe nemabasa, VaMutasa vanoti zvakakosha kuti nyika irase nyaya yehuwori uye idzokere pakukoshesa kudzidzisa vechidiki kuti humene-mene haubhadhare. Mukuru weConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaSifelani Jabangwe, vanoti kukura kwehupfumi hwenyika kuri kusimukira kubvira hurumende payakatora danho rekubatsira kumutsurudza makambani emuno nekumbomisa kupinzwa munyika kwezvimwe zvinhu zvinogadzirwa kunze kwenyika zvichizotengeswa muno. Vanoti sangano ravo rine hwaro hunoratidza kuti makambani anokwanisa kuti amutsurudzwe uyewo vanotsinhira nyaya yekuti nyaya yekumutsurudzwa kwehupfumi inoda muonera pamwe. Dzimwe nyanzvi dzinoti Zimbabwe inofanirwa kuita hurongwa hunokwezva vari kunze kwenyika kuitira kuti vadzoke kumusha kuzobatsira kusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti Zimbabwe ine vanhu vanoziva mabasa akasiyana siyana vari kunze kwenyika vanokwanisa kukwezva kuti vadzoke kumusha. Nyanzvi idzi dzinotiwo vanotengesa mumigwagwa vanofanirwa kuitirwa hurongwa hwakajeka, kuitira kuti vabhadharewo mitero kuhurumende, sezvo mitero inobviswa nevashandi pamwe nemakambani, iri iyo nzira unounganidza mari dzinofanirwa kushandiswa nehurumende. No media source currently available

headline: Nyaya yeHurumende Yekumanikidza Makombi Kushanda neZUPCO Yokonzera Mutauro
text: Danho rehurumende rekuda kumanikidza vose vane makombi kuti vashande vari pasi pekambani yeZUPCO iyo iri kutatarikawo rakonzera mutauro wakanyanya munyika. Vamwe vanoti iri idanho rakanaka asi vamwe vachiti uku kukoka mhepo wakatakura mamera mutswanda. Pari zvino ZUPCO ndiyo chete iri kubvumidzwa kutakura vanhu munguva ino yecoronavirus. Vachitaura kuruzhinji neMugovera nezvematanho ekurwisa chirwere checoronavirus, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakati ZUPCO chete ndiyo inobvumidzwa kushanda parizvino. Gurukota rinoona nezvematunhu VaJuly Moyo vakamboudzawo nhepfenyuro yeZBC kuti vemakombi kana vachida zvekutakura vanhu vanofanira kushanda vachiita mushandirapamwe neZUPCO. Vamwe muhurumende vanoti mudhorobha vemakombi vange voita madiro aJojina vakaisa miswe nekoko uye kuda kuvati vatakure vanhu vashoma nguva ino kusiya mapera akarinda chitunha. Mashoko aya anotsinhirwa nemutauriri wesangano reChitungwiza Commuter Omnibus Operators Association, VaFarai Muza vanoti zvinobatsira veruzhinji vemakombi vakashanda neZUPCO. Asi mumwe ane makombi, Bishop Shelton Mudyaro veShekkaianah Glory Ministries Global vanoti zvekushanda vari pasi peZUPCO hazvina zvazvinovabatsira vachiti kambani iyi inovapa mari dzemaRTGS asi vachida mari yekunze kutenga zvekugadzirisa motokari dzavo kana dzisiri kushanda zvakanaka. Pose panorwa nzou, huswa ndihwo hunonzwa nekutsokodzerwa, kunetsana kwevamakombi nehurumende kwapa kuti vashandi vaomwere nezvinhu sematauriro emunyori mukuru musangano reZCTU VaJaphet Moyo vanoti vashandi vave kusvika kumba pakati pehusiku nekuda kwekushaya zvekufambisa. Mutungamiri wesangano revanotakurwa nemabhazi nemakombi rePassanger Association of Zimbabwe VaTafadzwa Goliati vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kune veruzhinji vave kumanikidzwa kukwira marori zvinogona kupa kuti vatapurirwe zvirwere sezvo vamwe vemarori vasiri kuvhenekwa hutachina hwecoronavirus kunyangwe vachingofamba famba. No media source currently available

headline: Musangano weForum on China-Africa Cooperation Summit Unotanga muBeijing
text: Musangano weForum on China-Africa Cooperation Summit (focac), uyo uri kuitwa kuBeijing, kuChina wavhurwa zviri pamutemo neMuvhuro nemutungamiri wenyika iyi VaXi Jinping. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo vari kuChina, vanotarisirwawo kuzotaurawo pamusangano uyu, uyo uri kupindwa nevatungamiri venyika dzemu africa vakawanda. Vachitaura nenhepfenyuro yeChina Global Television Network (CGTN) pamberi pemusangano uyu, VaMnangagwa vati Zimbabwe yashanduka kuve nyika itsva, vakati kana paine nyika dziri kutadza kuona izvi dzakapofomara. VaMnangagwa varumbidzawo hushamwari hweChina nenyika dzemuAfrica. Zimbabwe yagara iri kubatsirwa neChina nezvikwereti zvemari, uye Africa inonzi yavimbiswa mari inoita mabhiriyoni makumi matanhatu emadhora neChina. Nyanzvi mune zvemabhizimisi uye vachidzidzisa paDevry University, Professor Elliot Masocha, vanoti kukwereta mari kubva kuChina hakuna kuipa asi Zimbabwe inofanirwa kutarisisa zvibvumirano zvainonyorerana nenyika iyi kuitira kuti isazorasikirwa pakakura yatadza kubhadhara mari iyi. No media source currently available

headline: WFP Yobatsira Zimbabwe neChikafu
text: Mukuru wesangano reWorld Food Programme kana kuti WFP VaEddie Rowe vanoti sangano ravo rasendeka parutivi mari inosvika mamiriyoni majumi manomwe nemaviri yekubatsira Zimbabwe nezvekudya mugore rino. Mari iyi iri kubva muhomwe yeUnited Nations ichishanda neZimbabwe iri kuda kuunganidza mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu yakaparurwa gore rapera. VaRowe vanoti mari iyi inogona kuwedzerwa gore rinouya kuti hurumende ibatsire vanenge vachiziya nenzara. Vanhu vanosvika zviuru zana nemakumi matatu vari kutarisirwa kubatsirwa neWFP gore rino. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzekurima dzinoti vanhu vanofanira kubatsirwa nemari dzezvikwanisiro kwete kuvapa zvekudya. VaWonderful Manyonganise, murimisi mukuru weTotal Farm Solutions vanoti zvakakosha kuti varimi vabatsirwe nemari nezvikwanisiro kwete chikwereti. No media source currently available
