headline: Musangano weVarairidzi neHurumende Inotadza Kugadzirisa Zvinetswa
text: Masangano anomiririra vadzidzisi aita musangano nevakuru mubazi rezvedzidzo umo munyori mubazi rezvedzidzo, Amai Tumisang Thabela, vakurudzira masangano aya kuti vanyorerane pasi mashandiro avanoda kuita nebazi rezvedzidzo. Vamwe vapinda mumusangano uyu uye vari mutungamiriri weAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vaudza Studio 7 kuti musangano uyu hauna kubata zvinonetsa vadzidzisi kana kuedza kugadzirisa zvinhu zvinonetsa munyaya yedzidzo. “Zvizhinji zvatange tichitaura hazvinei nezvemashandiro atinoita kumabasa kwedu. Musangano uyu wange uri waPermananat Secretary mutsva achizivana nemaUnion; achikumbira maUnion kuti vanyorerane pasi mashandiro avanoda kuita nebazi rezvedzidzo,” VaMasaraure vaudza Studio 7. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata Amai Thabela kuti tinzwe divi ravo. VaMasaraure vati musanagano uyu hauna zvikuru zvawabatsira nazvo uye chirongwa chevadzidzisi chekurega basa svondo rinouya hachina kuchinja. Svondo rakapera, sangano reARTUZ rakazivisa kuti kutanga musi wa 7 Ndira 2019, nhengo dzaro dzicharamwa basa kwenguva isingazikanwi kusvika hurumende yanzwa zvichemo zvavo. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata vamiriri vemamwe masangano evarairidzi. Asi VaMasaraure vati hurongwa hwekurega basa huchaenderera mberi svondo rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoronga Kumutsiridza Kambani yeHwange
text: Hurumende yadoma VaBekithemba Moyo avo vaimbova mukuru wekambani yeDBF Capital Partners kuti vambotungamira hurongwa hwekumutsiridza kambani yemarasha yeHwange Colliery. Kambani iyi yave nemakore ichitatarika uye ine chikwereti chinosvika mamiriyoni zana nemakumi mashanu kuHurumende. Gurukota rinoona nezvemutemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi vakaburitsa mashoko ekumutsiridza Hwange mubepanhau rehurumende reGovernment Gazette nemusi weMuvhuro. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paNelson Mandela Metropolitan University Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vanoti hurongwa uhwu hahwuna kuipa nekuti hunobatsira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe asi panoda kutarisiswa kuti vanosarudzwa kuita basa iri vave vakakodzera. Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vanoti zvirongwa zvakadai vakazviona zvichibatsira kumutsa mamwe makambani akanga adonha mumwaka iri kumashure asi zvakanga zvaitwa nenzira yakanaka. Vanoti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti vanopiwa basa iri vapiwe simba rekuronga zvavanoona kuti zvinobatsira kwete kuvapa basa asi vasina masimba ekutora matanho mukambani iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzezvehupfumi Dzoti Gwaro Re2019 Budget Strategy Paper – BSP Rrakanaka, Basa Guru Kuzadzisa Zvarinotaura.
text:
Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Elliota Masocha vanodzidzisa paDevry University kuOhio vanoti gwaro rakaparurwa negurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube rebhajeti regore rinoshanda chete kana hurumende yakazvipira kuvandudza zvinhu. Muzvinafundo Masocha vanoti hurumende ine magwaro akawanda ayaburitsa asi hapana chinobuda. Gwaro iri rinonzi 2019 Budget Strategy Paper uye rino buritsa pachena zvinoda kuitwa nehurumende mukushandiswa kwemari kusvika muna 2021. Rinobatsirawo hurumende kuronga nezvemuone wayo unonzi Vision 2030. Gwaro iri rinotaurawo pamusoro pekuderedzwa kwezvinofanira kubhadharwa nehurumende uye kupedzwa kwe zvikwereti zvenyika. Embed

headline: Kuipa kweMigwagwa Kwokanganisa Hupfumi muZimbabwe
text: Kunyangwe hazvo vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kufara kuti mvura gore rino yaturuka uye vachazadza matura, zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kuzvivakwa zvenyika zvakaita semigwagwa iyo yazara makomba. Kunze kwekukanganisa zvakanyanya nyaya yezvehupfumi, vanhu vakawanda vari kupararawo mumigwagwa iyi. Mugwagwa mukuru ungadai uchiunza hupfumi munyika kuburikidza nemitero yemotokari nemabhazi anenge akatakura zvinhu mugagwa weBeitbridge-Harare-kusvika kuChirundu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paUniversity of Zimbabwe, Doctor Gift Mugano, vanoti migwagwa ndiho hupfumi. Mugwagwa uyu unoshandiswa nenyika dzakawanda dzemuSADC idzo dzave kuronga kutsvaga mumwe mugwagwa nenyaya yekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu muZimbabwe. Gurukota rinoona nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, Doctor Joram Gumbo, vanotenda kuti mugwagwa uyu wakakosha zvikuru. Gwaro rakaburitswa nenyika dzemuSadc muna 2001 rakati mugwagwa mumwe chete pamitatu muZimbabwe haina kumira zvakanaka zvakapa kuti South Africa nedzimwe nyika dzitange kutsvaga mazano ekusadarika nemuZimbabwe zvichapa kuti Zimbabwe irasikirwe nemari yakawanda. Muna 2013 bhanga reDevelopment Bank of Southern Africa iro rakabatsira Zimbabwe kugadzira mugwagwa wePlumtree-Bulawayo-Harare-Mutare rakati Zimbabwe inoda kubatsirwa zvakanyanya kugadzira migwagwa yayo nekuti yakakosha zvikuru munyaya dzezvehupfumi muAfrica yose. Asi Dr Gumbo vanoti kutanga gore rino mugwagwa uyu uchagadziriswa. Mugwagwa uyu waurayawo vanhu vakawanda zvikuru sezvo uchishandisa nevanoenda kunotenga zvinhu kuSouth Africa. Mukuru weInternational Cross Borders Association, VaDennis Juru, vanotenda kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka vachiti zvinotora mazuva akawanda kubva kuSouth Africa nenyaya yemakomba ari munzira. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti nyaya yekuti migwagwa haina kumira zvakanaka iri kupa kuti zvinhu zvakawanda munyika zvidhure. Zimbabwe haina zvitima zvakawanda zvekutakura zvinhu zvopa kuti vakawanda vashandise migwagwa chete izvo zvinodhura. Kambani yeNational Railways of Zimbabwe yave nemakore ichitatarika. Ko chi chinopa kuti hurumende itadze kugadzirisa zvivakwa? Vaimbova gurukota rezvemari vave kutungamira bato rePeople Democratic Party, VaTendai Biti, vanoti mari yehurumende iri kuperera mukubhadhara vashandi vayo izvo zvinozoita kuti isare isina mari yekugadzirisa zvivakwa zvayo. Doctor Gumbo vanoti kugadzira mugwagwa weBeitbridge-Harare-kusvika kuChirundu kunokwanisa kuwanisa vanhu zviuru mazana matatu mabasa. Asi Doctor Mugano vanoti nenyaya yehuori zvinogona kuva zviroto zvekare. Dzimwe nyika dzisina mari dzinoita zvirongwa zvinonzi Build Operate and Transfer zvichireva kuita mushandirapmwe nenyika dzekunze kana makambani vovaka migwagwa makambani ekunze otora mitero kwemakore akati wandei. Asi izvi hazvisi kuitwa muZimbabwe pari zvino. Doctor Mugano vanoti South Africa inokwezva vekunze nekuti ine zvivakwa zvakanaka. Mumaguta migwagwa mizhinji yazarawo makomba nenyaya yekuvharika kwemagoronga anofanira kutakura mvura asiri kugadzirwa nemakanzuru. Makanzuru ari kunakurira Zimbabwe National Road Authority kana kuti ZINARA nyoka mhenyu achiti iri kutora mari yemitero asi haina zviri kuita kugadzirisa migwagwa. Mahombekombe enyanza iri pedyo neZimbabwe ari kuBeira kuMozambique uye Zimbabwe iri mutsinga dzenjanji yeTazara zvichireva kuti inokwanisa kuenda kunyanza yekuTanzania ichipfuura nemuZambia. Asi hupfumi hwenyika hausi kunyatsofamba nekuti migwagwa nenjanji hazvina kumira zvakanka. Kunze kwemigwagwa isina kumira zvakanaka, nyika hainawo magetsi mvura nezvimwe zvakakosha mukukwezva vekunze vanoda kutanga mabhizimisi. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi Vanoti Kuita Nhauriano neHurumende paNyaya yeMihoro Kuteya Nzou neRiva
text: Mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru werimwe sangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende reZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions, VaGibson Mushangu, vanoti havasi kuona chinangwa chekuramba vachiita hurukuro nehurumende panyaya yemari yemihoro sezvo isina kuzvipira. Asi hurumende iri kuti vashandi havafanire kuora moyo uye nhaurirano dzichiri kuenderera mberi. Kunetsana pakati pehurumende nevashandi kwawedzera kubva hurumende zvayakati ichabvisa imwe mari pane iri kutambirwa nevashandi vari kuenda kubasa mazuva mashoma vachiti mari dzavari kutambiriswa hadzikwane kuti vaende kubasa mazuva ose. Vashandi vanotiwo vsri kuda kuti vabhadharwe muhoro wavo nemadhora ekuAmerica asi hurumende iri kutsika madziro. VaMushangu vanoti hurumende iri kungowedzera mari dzavanenge vasina kutenderana uye payadira zvopa kuti nhaurirano dzishaye basa. No media source currently available Asi gurukota rezvevashandi, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vati nhaurirano dziri kuenderera mberi uye vakazvipira. No media source currently available

headline: Botswana Yotsigira Makambani Ayo Anoda Kutanga Mabhizinesi muZimbabwe
text: Zimbabwe neBotswana dzanyorerana chibvumirano chemari inosvika bhiriyoni rimwe chete rema Pula ekuBotswana. Chibvumiranbo ichi chaona Botswana ichiisa mazana mashanu emamiriyoni ema Pula pamusoro pemazana mashanu emamiriyoni ema Pula agara aripo. Mutungamiri weBotswana, VaMokwgweetsi Masisi, vaudza vatori venhau kuti Zimbabwe neBotswana dzawirirana hurongwa hwechikwereti uhu. Mutungamiri wenyika, Va Emmerson Mnangagwa, vabvumawo kuti ichokwadi kuti nyika dzavo dzanyorerana chibvumirano. Vachitsanangura zviri muchibvumirano ichi, gurukota rinoona nezvekutengeserana muBotswana, Va Bogonelo Kenewendo, vati mari yabvumiranwa iyi ichashandiswa nemakambani emu Botswana anoda kutanga mabhizinesi muZimbabwe. Mashoko aVaKenewendo anopesana nemashoko ari kuburitswa nemapepanhau muZimbabwe ekuti Zimbabwe yapihwa chikwereti neBotswana senzira yekuti ivandudze makambani anoshanda akazvimirira. Ukuwo gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vatiwo Zimbabwe yapihwa neBotswana mari inoita mamiriyoni makumi mapfumbamwe nemashanu emadhora. Asi havana kujekesa kuti mari iyi ndeyekubatsira here makambani emuBotswana kuti atange mabhizinesi muZimbabwe kana kuti kwete. Apo VaMasisi nechikwata chavo vange vari muHarare, bazi renyika yavo rinoona nezvekutengeserana nedzimwe nyika, razivisa kuti mari iyi ndeyekubatsira makambani ekuBotswana anoda kuita mabhizimisi muZimbabwe uye Zimbabwe inofanirawo kuisa hwaro hwekuti mabhizimisi aya haasi kuzorasikirwa nemari dzawo muZimbabwe. Bazi iri ratiwo kuti chibvumirano ichi chitange kushanda chinofanira kutsigirwa neBilateral Investment Protection and Promotion Agreement pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio7 kuti izvi zvinoreva kuti hapana chashanduka sezvange zviri kutaurwa nemapepanhau ehurumende. VaKuchera vati zviri kutaurwa nebazi rezvekutengeserana rekuBotswana zvinoreva kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe inofanira kushanda zvakasimba kuona kuti chibvumirano ichi chashanda. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemabhizimisi, VaRoy Magosvongwe, varatidza kusafara nemanyepo aiburitswa mumapenhau ehurumende pamusoro pechibvumirano chemari ichi dzisati dzapera. Vati zvakakosha kuti hurumende imbomira zvekurova bembera pamusoro pezvibvurano zvainenge ichironga asi kuti iite basa rinoonekwa kuitira kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire. Bato guru rinopikisa munyika reMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, rashora manyepo ehurumende ekuti yainge ichazowana chikwereti chemamiriyoni mazana matanhatu emadhora kubva Botswana. Mumashoko araburitsa, mutauriri webato iri, VaJacob Mafume, vati manyepo aya haana kusiyana nemamwe anogaroutarwa zuva nezuva kuti hurumende iri kusaina zvibvumirano zvichaunza mari kunyika asi pasina chinobuda kana kuti ari manyepo chete. Vanoti hurumende inosungirwa kutaurira vanhu chokwadi kwete manyepo. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kutaura nemunyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende. Zimbabwe neBotswana dzasainirana zvibvurano zvitanhatu munyaya dzedzidzo pamwe nezvicherwa uye musangano unotevera uchaitirwa kuBotswana gore rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: Germany Inoudza Komiti yaVaParadza Kuti Zimbabwe Ibhadhare Zvikwereti Zvayo
text: Mumiriri wenyika yeGermany muZimbabwe, Doctor Thorsten Hutter, vaudza nhengo dzeparamende kuti Zimbabwe inofanira kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo kuWorld Bank, African Development Bank nenyika dzaya kakwereta pasi peParis Club, vachiti izvi ndizvo chete zvichaita kuti ikwanise kuwana rubatsiro kubva kumasangano aya nenyika idzi. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nenhengo dzekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekunze kwenyika, VaHutter vati manyepo ekuti Zimbabwe iri kunyimwa rubatsiro nekuda kwenyaya dzematongorewo enyika. Vati chikonzero chiri kunyimwa Zimbabwe mari inyaya yekusabhadhara zvikwereti. Vati World Bank nenyika dzekuEurope hadzikwanisi kuramba dzichipa zvikwereti zvekusimudzira maindasitiri muZimbabwe kana isati yabhadhara zvikwereti zvainayo. VaHutter vatiwo makambani ekunyika kwavo nedzimwe dzeku Europe haasi kufara nemitemo yemuZimbabwe yakaita sema roadblocks ayo ave kuitwa pese pese nemutemo wekupa masimba kuvatema munyaya dzehupfumi. Vati vemakambani vanoda mitemo yekajeka uyewo apo nyika yakatarisana nedambudziko remari, vemakambani vanoda kuziva kuti kana vakatengesa zvinhu zvavo kunze kwenyika, vanokwanisa kushandisa mari yavanenge vawana pamadiro here kana kuti kwete. Pari zvino vebhanga guru, VeReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, ndivo vanoronga nekuudza makambani kuti anga shandise sei mari dzekunze dzaanenge awana. Sachigaro wekomiti iyi, VaKindness Paradza, vati vanobvumirana naVaHutter pazvichemo zvavo, asi vati zviri kugadziriswa. VaParadza vaenderera mberi vachiti komiti yavo yakumbirawo kuti Germany ibvise zvirango zvayakatemera VaMugabe vachiti izvi zviri kukanganisa hupfumi wenyika. Vatiwo izvi hazvifaniri kunetsa sezvo Britain yavainetsana nayo muEuropean Union yave kubuda musangano iri. Kunyange hazvo VaParadza vati komiti yavo, iyo ine nhengo dzeMDC-T, yakumbira kuti VaMugabe vabvisirwe zvirango zvavakatemerwa neGermany, mutauriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vati sebato, hapana chati chachinja chingaite kuti VaMugabe varerutsirwe. VaGutu vati VaMugabe vachiri kutyora kodzero dzevanhu, mitemo yesarudzo haisati yagadziriswa, uye bato ravo rinoita rusarura pachikafu, icho chinopihwa nhengo dzeZanu PF chete. Imwewo nhengo yekomiti iyi, Amai Priscillar Misiharabwi-Mushonga, vatiwo zvakakosha kuti paramende yeZimbabwe neyekuGermany, Bundestag, zvidyidzaneuyewo kubatsira kumutsiridza hukamapakati penyika mbiri idzi pasi pesangano Zimbabwe German Association iro vati raibatsira vakawanda zvikuru Asi VaHutter vati zvirango zvaVaMugabe nemudzimai wavo nekambani neZimbabweDefence Industries hazvikanganisi hupfumi hwenyika vachiti pari zvino makambani emuZimbabwe anotengesa zvinhu kuEurope pachena pasi peEuropean Parternership Agreement. Vatiwo hupfumi hwenyika hwakakura chose panguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa apo makurukota ehurumende yaVaMugabe pamwe nemakambani akawanda aive pasi pezvirango. Vati hupfumi uhwu huri kutodzikira panguva ino kunyange hazvo EU yakabvisa makambani aya nemakurukota pazvirango. VaHutter vati hazvina kushata kuti paramende yeZimbabwe idyadzane neBundestag asi vakati pari zvinonhengo dzeBundestag hadzigoni kubuda munyika sezvo nyika yavo ichiita sarudzo muna Gunyana. Asi vati vanozvikurudzira kuti paramende dzenyika mbiri idzi dzidyidzane. Makambani ehurumende anosanganisira Telone, National Railways of Zimbabwe neZiscosteel ane zvikwereti zvinodarika mazana mashanu emamamiriyoni emaEuro kuGerman Deveopment Bank uye mari iyi yave nemakaore akawanda isati yabhadharwa. Zvichakadai, VaHutter vazivisa kuti nyika dzeEU pamwe neAfrican Union dzichasangana muna Mbudzi gore rino kuAbijan nechinangwa chekuzeya chirongwa chekudyidzana pakati pemasangano aya cheCotonou Agreement. Vati zviri pachena kuti chave kudiwa neAfrica handi rubatsiro asi kuti makambani anogadzira zvinhu achiunza mabasa kumamiriyoni akawanda evechidiki vari kubva muzvikoro muAfrica. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reAfrican Parliamentarian’s Network Against Corruption, APNAC, Rinoudzwa Kuti Panofanirwa Kuve neMafungiro Matsva eKurwisa Huwori
text:
Kunyange hazvo nyika ine mitemo nemapazi akasiyana-siyana anobatsira
kurwisa huwori, izvi zvinonzi hazvina kukwana nekuti
chinhu chikuru chinodiwa ndechekuti vanhu vave nemafungiro pamwe
nemaitiro matsva pakurwisa huwori uhu. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano wekuzeya mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzekurwisa huwori, uri kuitwa nenhengo dzeparamende dziri pasi pesangano reAfrican Parliamentarian’s Network Against Corruption kana kuti APNAC. Vachitaura semunyarikani kuburikidza nepadandemutande pamusangano
wekuzeya nyaya yekurwisa huwori waitwa muBulawayo, Muzvinafundo
Patrick Lumumba vekuKenya, avo vane mukurumbira munyaya dzekurwisa huwori, vati
kunyange hazvo pane vamwe vane maonero ekuti huwori hauna kuwanda
sezvinotaurwa nevakawanda munyika dzemuAfrica uye kuti nyika
dzekumadokero dzinobatsira mukuita kuti huwori huvepo munyika idzi,
chokwadi ndechekuti huwori idambudziko guru ratekeshera munyika
dzakawanda muAfrica.

Vati pane zvinhu zvakawanda zvinoitwa nenyika dzakawanda kusanganisira
Zimbabwe zvinosungirwa kuitwa nevanhu vanoshanda muhurumende senzira
yekudzivirira huwori asi huwori hunoramba huchitekeshera

///Zvinhu zvinoshamisa nekurwadza kuti zvisinei nekuti vashandi
vehurumende nevezvematongerwo enyika munyika dzakawanda muAfrica ndivo
vanowana mihoro yakaderera, vanowanikwa vari ivo vamwe vevanhu vane
hupfumi hwakakura munyika idzi. Pari zvino munyika dzemuAfrica
dzakawanda kana uchida kuve munhu akapfuma asi usingashande unoita
zvematongerwo enyika kana kuti unopinda muchiuto kana kuwana basa
repamusoro muhurumende.///

Vati kunyange hazvo pane mitemo uye nemapazi akasiyana-siyana
anobatsira kurwisa huwori, huwori uhu hunopera chete kana vanhu vakave
nemafungiro pamwe netsika itsva dzekuita zvinhu.

"Yasvika zvino nguva yekuti tiongorore hunhu hwedu tibvume kuti tiri
kuita zvinhu zvisina kufanira; tiri kutadza zvikurusa uye tinofanirwa
kuti tigadzirise kutadza kwedu uku. Hapana mitemo ichatibatsira
pakugadzirisa izvi; hapana matare achatibatsira pakugadzirisa
izvi…tinofanirwa kungochinja hunhu hwedu."

VaTemba Mliswa, avo vanove sachigaro wechikamu chemuZimbabwe
cheAfrican Parliamentarian’s Network Agaiant Corruption, uye vari nhengo yeparamende yakazvimirira, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanobvumirana nemaonero aMuzvinafundo Lumumba. Vashora nyaya yekuti vamwe vakuru vakuru vehurumende nemapazi
ehurumende vane chekuita nekurwisa huwori vanotadza kuvepo pamisangano
yakadai, vakatsinhira kuti zvakakosha kuti munhu wose azvipire panyaya
yekurwisa huwori.

VaBrian Dube avo vanove sachigaro vekomiti inoona
nezvekushandiswa kwemari dzehurumende mudare reparamende, kana kuti Public Accounts Committee, vatiwo vanotsigira maonero aVaLumumba.

Muzvare Memory Mbondiah vanomirira dunhu reMidlands pasi
pehurongwa hwe proportional representation vatiwo zvakakosha kuti pave nedzidziso
yakasimba kuvanhu vose munyika kusanganisira muzvikoro pamusoro
pekuipa kwehuwori.

Asi VaKuziwa Murapa vanove mutevedzeri wasachigaro weZimbabwe
Anti-Corruption Commission, kana kuti ZACC, vaudza Studio 7 kuti
kunyange hazvo vachibvumirana nemaonero aVaLumumba pane mitemo inoda
kuvandudzwa kuti kurwisa huwori munyika kunyatsobudirira.

Sangano reAPNAC rinopindwa nenhengo dzeparamende nesenate nekuda kwadzo
senzira yekuratidza kuzvipira kwadzo mukurwisa huwori. Musangano wekuzeya kurwisa huwori uyu unopera neMugovera. No media source currently available

headline: Kushandiswa kweMitemo yeRhodesia Kwopa Kuti Vanhu Vatorerwe Minda neMakambani ekuChina
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemitemo nekodzero dzevanhu dzinoti mitemo yeminda uye yezvicherwa isina kuvandudzwa kubva munguva yeRhodesia ndiyo yave kupa kuti vari mumamisha vakawanda vagare vakabatira hura mumaoko sezvo vave kumanikidzwa kutama vachisiya misha, makuva nenzvimbo dzavanoyeresa. Zvinhu zvakaita manyama amire nerongo kune vanhu variMashonaland East kwaKaseke kuUzumba, uye misha inoti Tome, Karimazonde, Kahwa neKatsukunya kwaMutoko uye kuChikomba kuChivhu. Vanhu ava vari kutamiswakuitira kuti makambani ekuChina achere matambo akakosha eGranite. Vamwe vakatarisana nekutamiswa vari kuChipinge Manicaland neChilonga kuChiredzi. Minda iyi iri kupihwa makambani evachena vanonzi vanodyidzana nehurumende. Pasi pemutemo weCommunal Areas Act, mutungamiri wenyika ndiye ane masimba ekuona kuti minda iri kumamisha iyi yashandiswa sei. Vanhu vemumaruwa havana magwaro kana kuti maTittle Deeds uye mitemo iripo inonzi haisi kunyatsovachengetedza. Gweta rinombomirira mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, VaTinomudaishe Chinyoka, vanoti mitemo inofanira kuvandudzwa. Mukuru werimwe sangano rinoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu munharaunda dzine zviwanikwa reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti hurumende iri kukundikana kuona kuti kodzero dzevanhu vari kumaruwa dzachengetedza. Vatendawo kuti mitemo ivandudzwe. No media source currently available

headline: Vanorarama neKutengesa Voomerwa Munyika
text: Apo mamiriro ezvehupfumi munyika ari kuramba achienda kumawere, vanhu vakawanda munyika vave kuwana raramo nekutenga nekutengesa zvinhu zvakasiyana siyana. Ukuwo mabhizimisi anotiwo ave kutyira ramangwana rawo kana zvinhu zvikasachinja nekukasika sezvo vanhu vasisina simba rekutenga zvinogadzirwa nemabhizinesi aya. No media source currently available VaThomas Ngara murume ane makore makumi nemaviri ekuberekwa. VaNgara, avo vanorarama nekutengesa airtime, fodya, nezviwitsi mumigwagwa yeguta reBulawayo, vanoti vave nemakore anopfuura mashanu vachirarama nekutengesa uku mushure mekunge vapererwa nebasa pane imwe kambani yaigadzira mbatya yavaishandira. VaNgara vanoti mari yavanowana mukutengesa kwavanoita iri kuramba ichivaitira shoma pakuti vakwanise kuriritira mudzimai wavo nevana vaviri. Asi vanoti vari kuwana vachimanikidzwa kuramba vachitengesa nekuti hapana zvimwe zvekuita. VaDouglas Dube vanotengesawo pamwe chete naVaNgara uye vanotsinhirawo kuti nekuda kwemamiriro akaita zvehupfumi munyika, hupenyu huri kuramba huchivaomera zvekuti vanotyira kuti kana zvinhu zvikasachinja vachapedzisira vave kutadza kuendesa mwana wavo kuchikoro kana kuwana mari yekuti vakwanise kurarama zuva nezuva. Mukuru-mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Chamber of Informal Economy Associations, Muzvare Musawenkosi Nyoni, vanoti vave nemakore anosvika gumi nematatu vachiita basa rekutenga nekutengesa mbatya pane imwe flea market iri muguta eBulawayo. Muzvare Nyoni vanoti vakakwanisa kuita zvinhu zvakwawanda zvinobatika mumakore apfuura. Asi pari zvino zvinhu zvave kuvaomera sezvo pave nevanhu vakawanda vanoita basa rekutengesa. Muzvare Nyoni vanoti sangano ravo rine nhengo dzinosvika zviuru gumi asi nekuda kwekuomerwa nehupenyu nhengo dzesangano iri dzakawanda dziri kutadza kubhadhara madhora matanhatu anobhadharwa pagore kuve nhengo yesangano iri. Muzvare Nyoni vanoti kunyange hazvo zvinhu zvakamboomera veruzhinji munyika mumakore a2007 na2008 muzvitoro musina chekutenga, izvi zvaive nani nekuti vanhu vaikwanisa kuwana mari yekunotenga zvinhu kunze kwenyika. Vanoti kuwoma kwezvinhu pari zvino kwakasiyana nekuti veruzhinji vari kunetseka nekuwana mari sezvo vanhu vakawanda vasiri pamabasa vachitiwo vanotyira kuti kana zvinhu zvikaramba zvichinetsa munyika munopedzisira maita mhirizhonga. Vemabhizmisi kana makambani kunyanya madiki vari kuchema-chemawo nenyaya yekuti mari haizi kubatika. Studio7 yakaedza kunzwa mamiriro akaita zvinhu mumabhzimisi asi sachigaro weZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, ZNCC, mudunhu reBulawayo, VaTshidzanani Malaba, vakati vaive vakabatikana uye vakatadza kupindura mubvunzo yavaive vati tivatumire vachiti vaive vakabatikana. Takakundikanawo kutaura nemutevedzeri wemukuru mukuru weZNCC mudunhu reMatabeleland, naVaCrispen Mugova, avo vakatiwo vaive vakabatikana. Asi munguva pfupi yapfuura sangano reZNCC rakakurudzira hurumende kuti itore matanho ekugadzirisa mamiriro ezvehupfumi munyika nekukasika richiti kusaita izvi kunogona kuunza matambudziko akapfurikidza munyika. Mukuru weimwe kambani inoita zvemagetsi, VaRegis Munyoro, vanoti zvinhu hazvina kuvamirira zvakanaka. VaMunyoro vanoti kambani yavo yave kunetseka pakuwana vekuitira basa vachitiwo pavanowana basa vavanenge vaitira mabasa vanonetseka pakubhadhara vamwe vachitotadza zvachose zvekuti ivo vanozonetsekawo pakubhadhara vashandi vavo pamwe nekutenga zvinhu zvinodiwa kuti vakwanise kuita basa ravo. Nekuda kwekuti makambani akawanda akavhara kana kuti ari kutatarika, hurumende yange yave kutarisira kuti vanhu vanogona kuwana raramo nekuzvishandira pachavo vega vachiita zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana kusanganisira kutenga nekutengesa pamwe nekuve nemakambani madiki anoita zvakadai sekugadzira midziyo yemumba yakaita semibhedha nemasofa nezvimwe zvakadaro. Asi nekuti kuzvishandira ndiyo yave raramo yavakawanda uye nekuti mari haizi kubatika, kuzvishandira uku hakuchawanise vanhu raramo yakanaka. Chipangamazano wesangano rePublic Research Institute of Zimbabwe iro rine muzinda waro muBulawayo, VaButler Tambo, vanobvuma kuti kana mamiriro ezvehupfumi munyika akasachinja hupfumi hwenyika hunogona kuramba huchiwondomoka zvekuti makambani achiri kushanda anogona kuvhara uye izvi zvinogona kukonzera matambudziko kumabhangi ari munyika ayo vanoti anogona kuzowondomokawo. VaTambo vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa nekukasika mitemo inokwezva vemabhizimisi vekunze kwenyika kuti vave nechido chekusima mari muZimbabwe vachitiwo Zimbabwe inofanirwa kugadzirisa hukama hwayo nenyika dzeku madokero pamwe chete nemabhangi eWorld Bank neInternational Monetary Fund. Vamwe vaongorori vezvehupfumi pamwe nezvematongerwo enyika vanoti kana hurumende ikasagadzisira zvinhu nekukasika, veruzhinji, avo vave kusvika pakupererwa nechekuita nekuda kwekutambura, vanogona kuzopedzisira vave kuita zvemhirizhonga senzira yekuratidza kutsutsumwa kwavo.

headline: Varimi Vachena Vopihwa Imwe Mari yeKubatsirikana neHurumende
text: Hurumende yatanga kupa vamwe varimi vachena vakatorerwa mapurazi mari yekubatsirikana vakamirira kupihwa mari yemuripo wezvivakwa nezvekurimisa zvainge zviri pamapurazi avakatorerwa kutanga muna 2000. Asi varimi ava vari kuchema nerekuti mari yavari kutambiriswa haisisina simba sezvo RTGS riri kushaya simba zuva nezuva zvichienzaniswa nedhora rekuAmerica. Varimi makumi maviri nevasere ndivo vapihwa mari kusvika parizvino pavarimi mazana manomwe nemakumi matatu nevanomwe vari kutarisira kupihwa mari iyi. Murimi mumwe chete ari kupihwa mari inosvika zviuru makumi mashanu nemamashanu kana kuti 55 000 RTGS. Mukuru weCFU VaBen Gilpin vanoti varimi vari kutambira mari asi vari kunetseka nekushaya simba kwayo. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoti Haichapa Makambani ekuChina Mvumo yeKuchera Marasha kuHwange National Park
text: Dare remakurukota neChipiri rakazivisa kuti harichatenderi makambani maviri ekuChina anoti Afrochine Energy neZimbabwe Zhongxin Coal Mining Group kuchera marasha kuHwange National Park mushure mekunge vanhu vakawanda vagunun’una nezvedanho iri. Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vakaudza vatori venhau muHarare kuti hurumende haichape makambani aya mvumo yekuchera zviwanikwa mumasango anochengeterwa mhuka. MuHwange mune mhuka dzesango dzakawanda dzinosanganisira nzou, zvipembere, nyati nedzimwe. Mukuru wesangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu vanoti hurumende yaita zvakanaka kuteerera vange vachigunun'una nedanho rayo rekuda kuti vekuChina vacehere marasha munzvimbo yakakosha inochenetrwa mhuka dzesango. No media source currently available

headline: Hondo Pakati peAir Zimbabwe neSouth African Airways Yoenderera Mberi
text: Hondo inotyisa yange yamuka pakati pekambani yeAir Zimbabwe neSouth African Airways inonzi haisati yanyatsopera zvopa kuti kufamba kwendege pakati penyika mbiri idzi kukanganisike. Kunetsana uku kwakatanga nemusi weChishanu zvakapa kuti ndege dzimbotadza kubhururuka zvichikonzerwa nenyaya yemamwe magwaro anonzi neSouth Africa ange asina kumira zvakanaka. Magwaro aya anonzi Foreign Operations Licenses. South Africa yakamisa ndege yeZimbabwe kubhururuka kubva kuJohannesburg ichienda kuHarare. Zimbabwe yakabva yamisawo ndege dzeSouth Africa kupinda kana kubuda munyika. Vanhu vazhinji vari kukanganiswa zvikuru mafambiro avo pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Gurukota rinoona nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu VaJoram Gumbo vati mari iri kudiwa inosvika zviuru zvitatu pandege imwe chete. VaGumbo vati haina kuwanda uye makore ose vaingoshanda neSouth Africa pasina aiti anoda magwaro aya. Parizvino, ndege shoma ndidzo dziri kubhururuka pakati peZimbabwe neSouth Africa nyaya dzemagwaro aya dzichigadziriswa.  No media source currently available

headline: Veruzhinji Vochemachema neKukwidzwa kweMari dzeMasaisai neveDzinharembozha
text: Mamwe makambani embozhanhare anonzi akwidza mitengo yemabhanduru anoita kuti veruzhinji vakwanise kuenda paindaneti nezvikamu zvinodarika gumi kubva muzana izvo zviri kutsoropodzwa nevakawanda kusanganisira vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika. Kambani yehurumende yeNetone yazivisa kuti yakwidza mutengo wemabhanduru anoita kuti vanoshandisa masaisai ekambani iyi kuenda pamadandemutande kana kufona vachemecheme. Netone yazivisa nhasi magwanani kuti yakwidza mutengo wemabhanduru kubva nhasi zvichienda mberi uye mabhanduru aya akwidzwa nezvikamu zana kubva muzana. Zvaitwa neNetone zvinotevera kukwidzwawo kwakaitwa mutengo wemabhanduru aya neEconet masvondo maviri adarika nezvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana. Mumwe anoshandisa nharembozha nemasaisai eNetone, Muzvare Gracious Mangava, vati kuita zvidzidzo zvavo kuchavadhurira sezvo vachishandisa nharembozha kuita zvidzizo izvi. Sachigaro wesangano revanoburitsa mashoko paindaneti reOnline Content Creators of Zimbabwe, VaToneo Rutsito, vati kukidzwa kwemitengo yemabhanduru kuchaita kuti vatadze kushanda zvakanaka mukuwanisa veruzhinji mashoko anobata zvakawanda muhupenyu hwavo. Mutauriri weboka revechidiki muCitizens Coalition for Change, VaStephen Chuma, vati kusvitsa mashoko avo ekutsvaga rutsigiro kune veruzhinji pamberi pesarudzo kuchavanetsa sezvo vanga vachishandisa madandemutande kutaura neveruzhinji sezvo vachiti havasi kuwaniswa mukana wekushambadzira bato ravo panhepfenyuro yeZBC pamwe nemapepanhau ehurumende. Asi mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vanoti hachisi chokwadi kuti vemapato anopikisa havasi kupihwa mukana wakaenzana newebato ravo pamhepo kuburikidza nenhepfenyuro nemapepanhau ehurumende. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevatauriri vemakambani enharembozha kuti tinzwe kuti chii chiri kukonzera kukwidza kwavaita mitengo yemabhanduru eindaneti. Asi zvichitevera kuchemachema kwaswera kuchiita veruzhinji nezvenyaya iyi pamadandemutande eFacebook, Twitter neWhatsapp, kambani yeNetone yazoburitsa mashoko ichiti iri kuongorora nyaya iyi. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vaimboshanda mubazi rezvemari, VaMasimba Manyanya, vati kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi hwenyika ndiko kuri kukonzera kuti makambani aya akwidze mitengo yemabhanduru. Munyori muboka revechidiki muZanu PF, VaTendai Chirau, vanyora pandamutande ravo reTwitter kuti vachasvitsawo nyaya iyi kugurukota rinoona nezvehumhizha hwema computer VaJenfan Muswere. Ukuwo, VaRutsitu vatiwo vachagara pasi naVaMuswere pamwe nePostal and Telecommunications Regulatory Authority of Zimbabwe kuti vaone kuti nyaya iyi ingadziriswe sei. VaMuswere vanga vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira pataenda pamhepo. No media source currently available

headline: Chikwata cheCommonwealth Chotarisirwa muNyika neMugovera Kuzoona Kana Zimbabwe Yave Kukodzera Kutambirwa Zvakare muSangano iri
text: Chikwata cheCommonwealth Assessment Mission chiri kutarisirwa kusvika munyika Mugovera kuzoongorora kana Zimbabwe yakakwanisa kuzadzisa zviga zvayakatemerwa kuti ikwanise kutambirwa zvakare mugungano iri. Commonwealth igungano renyika makumi mashanu nenhanhatu iri, zhinji dzacho dziri dzaimbove pasi pehutongi hweBritain. Mashoko akaburitswa padandemutande reTwitter nebazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika anoti chikwata ichi chichange chiri munyika mushure mekukokwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti chione nhanho dzafambwa neZimbabwe kubva zvayakanyorera kuti ibvumidzwe kudzoka mugungano iri muna 2018. Bazi iri rinoti chikwata ichi, icho chichange chichitungamirwa nemutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru wesangano iri, Muzvinafundo Luis Franceschi, chichange chiri munyika kwesvondo rose kusvika musi wa 18 mwedzi uno. Chinotarisirwa kusangana nemutungamiri wenyika VaMnangagwa, gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaFrederick Shava, mamwe makurukota pamwe nevakuru vakuru muhurumende, uye masangano enhau pamwe nevamwe vane chekuita nenyaya iyi vanoonekwa sevakakodzera kusanganikwa navo nesangano iri. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaShava, kuti tinzwe zvizhinji pamusoro pekushanya kwechikwata ichi. Zimbabwe yakabuda yoga mugungano reCommonwealth muna 2003 munguva yevaive mutungamiri wenyika mushakabvu VaRobert Mugabe mushure mekunetsana nenyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, VaRejoice Ngwenya, vanoti hapana zvati zvashanduka, zvikuru panyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu, sezvo hurumende iri kuramba ichimbunyikidza vanhu uye kudzika mitemo inoomesera mashandiro emasangano akasiyanasiyana. VaNgwenya vanotiwo kuti sangano iri rinyatsonzwisisa mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika rinofanirwa kusanganawo nevemapato anopikisa pamwe nevemasangano akazvimirira kuitira kwete kungogumira mukusangana nevehurumende chete. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vokurudzira Kutengeswa Kunze kweZvinhu Zvinodzairwa muZimbabwe
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vaparura gwaro rinoratidza gwara rehurumende rekutengesa kunze kwenyika zvinhu zvinogadzirwa muZimbabwe.\n\nVaMnangagwa vati mabhizimisi anoda kusima mari munyika dzine runyararo vakati Zimbabwe ine rombo rakanaka kuti inyika ine runyararo uye ine vanhu vanoshanda nesimba. Vati mamiriro ezvehupfumi munyika ari kuvhiringwa nekuda kwekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze uye zvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa nyika. Vakudzira vanhu vose munyika kuti vashande pamwe chete kuitira kuti vemaindasitiri vakwanise kugadzira nekutengesa zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana kunze kwenyika. Vati chinangwa chehurumende ndechekuti panosvika gore ra2023 nyika ive yave kutengesa kunze kwenyika zvinhu zvinosvika mabhiriyoni manomwe emadhora, uye panosvika gore ra2030 ive yave kutengesa zvinhu zvinosvika mabhiriyoni gumi nemana. VaMnangagwa vakurudzira vemaindasitiri nemakambani kuti vatengese kunze kwenyika zvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana zvezvinhu zvavanogadzira, vakatiwo hurumende yavo inokoshesa kutsigira nyaya yekurima nekuti maindasitiri akawanda anogadzira zvinhu kubva muzvirimwa. "Maindasitiri edu anoshanda zvikuru nezvinhu zvinobva mumabasa ekurima. Saka nekudaro zvakakosha zvikuru kuti hurumende itsigire mabasa ezvekurima, kuitira kuita kuti mabasa aya aiitwe nenzira dzechizvino-zvino izvo zvichaita kuti maindasitiri anoshanda nezvirimwa akure," vadaro VaMnangagwa. VaMnangagwa vatsinhira nyaya yekuti vemaindasitiri nevemabhizimisi vatevedzere mutemo unosungira kuti vatengese zvinhu zvavo nemari yemuno. "Zvichienderana nemitemo yenyika yedu, makambani ose anosungirwa kuti ashandise mari yemuno munyika pane zvose zvavanotenga kana kutengesa muno," vadaro VaMnangagwa. Mumwe muzvinabhizimisi, VaBenson Ntini, vati makambani ehurumende akadai seZimbabwe Electricity Supply Authority anokanganisa mashandiro emakambani nekusaita mabasa awo nemazvo. Vati pane nyaya dziri kuwanda dzekuti pane matransformer anoendeswa kunogadzirwa kuZesa, asi haadzoswe. Mutungamiri wesangano reAffirmative Action Group, VaReginald Shoko, avo vanoongorora zvehupfumi vakazvimirira, vati chinangwa chehurumende chekuti zvinotengeswa kunze kwenyika zviwedzerwe chinogona kubudirira, asi nyaya yehuwori inofanirwa kugadziriswa. Zimbabwe yakatengesa zvinhu zvinokosha mabhiriyoni mana emadhora ekuAmerica mugore ra2018 uye izvi zvairatidza kukwira kwezvakatengeswa izvi nezvikamu gumi nezvitanhatu kubva muzana pane zvakatengeswa mugore ra2017. Musangano wakadai unoitwa kamwe chete pagore uchikokerwa nekambani yehurumende, yeZimTrade, uye unopindwa nemakambani anogadzira zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana zvinotengeswa kunze kwenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari Vopengera Mitero yeMigwagwa kuMasvingo
text: Vagari vemudhorobha reMasvingo vanoti havasi kufara nezviri kuitwa nekanzuru yavo zvekuti vabhadhariswe mitero yekushandisa migagwa yeguta iri, kana kuti roda levy, ivo vasina kuwirirana nekanzuru yavo. Vagari vanoti vakatsamwa nedanho iri nekuti kanzuru haina kuuya kwavari kuzotsvaga pfungwa dzavo. Zviri kunyanya kuvarwadza ndezvekuti pachine mutauro pamusoro pechimwe chirongwa chakadai, icho vagari vanoti havana kuona zvakashandiswa mari dzavaibatirwa. Mumwe mugari, VaPaul Rimai, vanoti kanzuru yavo haina kupinda muvanhu zvakakwana kuti ipihwe mvumo yekutora mari inoita madhora mana paimba yoga yoga. Masvingo ine vagari vanosvika zviuru makumi matatu. Izvi zvinoreva kuti kanzuru ichange ichiwana mari inoita zana nemakumi maviri ezviuru zvamadhora pamwedzi kubva kuvagari. Mugari wekuMucheke, VaSamson Gororo, vanoti havaoni kushanda kwechirongwa ichi sezvo munharaunda yavo musina migwagwa yakagadzirwa pavakambobhadhara mari dzavo. Asi meya weguta reMasvingo, VaHubert Fidze, vanoti chirongwa ichi chakadzoswa mushure mukuwirirana nevagari paigadzirwa bhajeti regore rino. VaFidze vanoti chirongwa ichi chakakosha kugadzirisa migwagwa yashata mudhorobha sezvo mari yemigwagwa inobva kuhurumende nebazi reZinara iri shoma, Vati vachatsanangurira vagari kuti mari iyi vachaishandisa sei. Asi vanotungamirira kufambiswa kwebasa musangano rinomirira kodzero dzevagari, reMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance, VaAnoziva Muguti, vanoti vagari havana kupihwa mukana wakakwana kuti vape pfungwa dzavo panyaya iyi "Zvavari kutaura kuti vakaita ma consultations nevanhu pamabhajeti tinozviramba nekuti ma meeting avo vaimaita vasina kushambadzwa zvakakwana kuchiinda vanhu vashoma uye nguva dzavakaita vanhu vaiva kumabasa, ivo chavakakonewa sema councilors vaifanira kuenda ku maward avo kwete zvebhajeti,: Vadaro VaMuguti. Sangano iri rinoti riri kukurudzira nhengo dzaro kuti dzisabhadhare mari iyi kusvikira vagara pasi nekanzuru vachionesana zvakanaka panyaya iyi. Kanzuru inotarisirwa kuwana mari inoita miriyoni imwe nemamazana mana ane makumi mana ezviuru zvemadhora pagore kubva kumitero yemigwagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru yeBulawayo Yodzinga Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa
text: Mapurisa ekanzuru yeBulawayo ayenderera mberi neChitatu achitorera vanhu vanorarama nekutengesa mumigwagwa midziyo yavo uye vamwe vevatengesi ava vanonzi vakarohwa zvakayipisisa kubva marimwezuro pakatanga hurogwa uhu. Vanyatsobatwa nedanho iri vanhu vanga vachitengesera muna Five Street na Jason Moyo inova nzvimbo isina kutarwa nekanzuru. Kanzuru yeguta iri yava kudzinga vanhu ava kunyange yakambenge yati ichavatsvagira nzvimbo dzekushandira isati yavadzinga. Mumwe atorerwa midziyo yake, VaManatsa Pashoma, vashora kanzuru vachiti vapinzwa parumana sezvo vasisina nzira yekuraramisa mhuri yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Bulawayo Inokwidza Mitero Zvakanyanyisa Mubhajeti ra2021
text: Kanzuru yeguta reBulawayo ichakwidza mitero nezvikamu zvinodarika mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe kubva muzana izvo zvisiri kutambirwa nemufaro nevagari vakawanda. Kanzuru yeguta reBulawayo yazivisa kuti ichakwidza mitero yayo nezvikamu zvinopfuura mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nezviviri kuna kumaza,kana kuti 372 per cent kubva muna Ndira gore rinouya. Mutauriri wekanzuru, Amai Nesisa Mpofu, vabvuma izvi kuStudio 7 vachiti izvi zvinotevera kutambirwa nehurumende kwesupplementary budget yegore rino yakaitwa nekanzuru muna Gunyana. Kanzuru yakaita bhajeti remadhora 2.7 billion mugore rino ra2020 uye yakaita bhajeti remadhora 17, 1 billion yegore rinouya asi bhajeti iyi haisati yapasiswa nebazi rezvekutongwa kwematunhu. Mukuru wesangano reBulawayo United Residents Association, VaRodrick Fayayo, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti sangano ravo richaita musangano wechimbi-chimbi nenhengo dzaro kuti vaone kuti votora danho ripi, vachiti kukwidzwa kwemitero uku kuchawomesera veruzhinji. Mumwe mugari, VaBrian Maphosa, vati vagari vakawanda vagara vakatoomerwa nehupenyu zvekuti kukwidzwa kwemitero uku kuchaita kuti vakawanda vatadze kubhadhara mitero yavo. Mumwe mudzidzisi wezvidzidzo zvebudiriro, VaFelix Chari, vati kutambirwa kwesupplementary bhajeti yekanzuru nehurumende kunoratidza pachena kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzezvehupfumi. \n\nVati makanzuru ari parumananzombe nekuti anofanirwa kuwana mari yekuita mabasa aanotarisirwa kuita nemazvo asi nekune rimwe divi anofanirwa kubhadharisa mitero inokwanisa kubhadharwa neveruzhinji. Makanzuru emaguta nemadhorobha akawanda munyika anogara achichemachema nerekuti haawane mari yakakwana yekuita mabasa aanotarisirwa kuita nevagari. No media source currently available

headline: Varimi veDonje neVabatsiri Vavo Vogura Muchato
text: Varimi vedonje gore rino vanonzi vachatarisana nedambudziko hombe zvichitevera kubuda muzvibvumirano zvekushanda nevarimi kunonzi kwaitwa nevanga vachitsigira varimi nezvekurimisa. Makambani anga achitsigira varimi anonzi ari kunyunyuta nekusawana chimuko kubva muhurongwa hwekubatsira varimi uhu achipomera varimi ava mhosva yekutengesa donje neparutivi, vasingatevedzere zvibvumirano zvekuti makambani aya atenge iwo donje. Hurongwa hwanga huripo hunonzi hwaiita kuti varimi vawaniswe zvinodiwa pakurima zvakaita semishonga, mbeu nefotereza, ivo voisawo simba ravo pakurima, kusakura pamwe nekukohwa donje ravo vozotarisirwa kuri tengesera kambani inenge yavabatsira. Asi zvinonzi varimi vaizonotengesa nerweseri donje ravo kune vamwe vanotenga vanenge vaine mitengo inenge iri pamusoro peinenge ichipiwa nemakambani anenge avabatsira. Asi mutungamiri werimwe sangano revarimi, reZimbabwe Commercial Farmers Union, ZCFU, VaWonder Chabikwa, vanoti havawirirane nemashoko ekuti kutengeswa kwedonje parutivi nevarimi ndiko kwakonzera kuti vemakambani vabude muzvibvumirano izvi. VaChabikwa vanoti vemakambani anotenga donje ava vanogona kunge vakanga vaunganidza zvavo donje rakawanda nechekare zvekuti havachina shungu dzekutenga zvakare rimwe donje. Mitengo yedonje wemwaka wapera unonzi wakanga wakadzikawo pasi zvakanyanya, izvo zvinonzi zvakasvibisawo mwoyo yevamwe varimi mumwaka uno. Imwe yemakambani aitenga donje pamwe nekubatsira varimi, yeCargill, inonzi yakatovhara bhizimusi rayo munyika ichiti kuoma kwezvinhu kwakanga kwoita kuti isakwanise kurarama. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnanagagwa Vovimbisa Vanachiremba Mari Asi Kuramwa Mabasa Kunoenderera Mberi
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanonzi vakaudza bazi rezvemari kuti ripe imwe mari kuna vanachiremba avo vari kuramwa mabasa kubva kutanga kwemwedzi uno. Mari iri kuwedzerwa ndeye muripo kana vana chiremba vadaidzwa kuti vadzokere kubasa kana vachinge vapedza basa ravo, kana kuti on call allowance. Mashoko aya akaturwa kunana chiremba ava neHealth Services Board kana kuti HSB, iyo inoona nezvemabasa evose vanoshanda mubazi rezvehutano pamisangano yakaitwa nemusi weChipiri neChitatu. Asi kuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba kuri kuenderera mberi sezvo vari kuti HSB haisi kuvaratidza mapepa acho anonzi akabva kubazi rezvemari. Kuramwa mabasa uku kwava nemazuva makumi maviri nesere pasina zvanyoreranwa pasi kunze kwekungonzi hurumende iri kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavana chiremba. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mukuru weHSB, Dr Lovemore Mbengeranwa, kana gurukota rezvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa, sezvo vose vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha dzavo. Mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr Mxolisi Ngwenya, vanoti kuramwa mabasa kuchaenderera mberi kusvika hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi veKanzuru yeHarare Vanoti Havachakwanisa Kuramba Vachienda kuMabasa
text: Vashandi vakawanda vekanzuru yeguta reHarare vanoti vava kuomerwa nehupenyu zvekuti vachange votadza kuenda kumabasa avo nepamusana pekushaya mari inovakwanira. Izvi zviri kuuya panguva iyo vamwe vanamukoti vemuzvipatara zvekanzuru pamwe nemakiriniki vasiri kuenda kumabasa vachiti havana mari dzekufambisa, danho rinonzi rakanganisa kufambiswa kwezvehutano muguta iri. Sachigaro verimwe sangano revashandi vekanzuru, reHarare Municipality Workers Unoin, VaCosmas Bungu, vanoti vashandi vari pakati peGrade 5 neGrade 16 vanosanganisira vanamukoti, ndivo vari kunyanya kuomerwa nehupenyu. VaBungu vanoti vakasangana nevamiriri vekanzuru nemusi weMuvhuro asi havana kupedza nhaurirano, nekudaro vachasangana zvakare neMuvhuro neChipiri svondo rinouya. No media source currently available Meya veguta reHarare, VaHerbert Gomba, vanoti kanzuru yavo inozviziva kuti vashandi vakaomerwa, uye iri kuedza napose painogona kuti igadzirise mashandiro avo. Asi VaGomba vanoti kuomerwa kwevashandi kwakangofananawo nekuomerwa kwemakambani ari kushandirwa nevashandi ava, kusanganisirawo makanzuru, nekudaro vagari vanofanirwawo kuita pavo kuburikidza nekubhadhara zvikwereti zvavo kukanzuru. No media source currently available

headline: Vaive Vashandi vepaRan Mine kuBindura Voputsirwa Dzimba
text: Vaive vashandi vepaRan Mine pedyo neBindura vanonzi vari kuputsirwa dzimba nekudzingwa pamugodhi wegoridhe uyu zvasiya vakawanda vasina pekugara. Mugodhi uyu waimbocherwa kare nekambani yeGNP Industries yekuGermany kusvika muna 1999 ndokuzombocherwa neExdrill Mining pasati pauyazve kambani yeAurora Gold. Hatina kukwanisa kubata vakuru vepakambani yeAurora nezvekudzingwa kwevanhu ava asi mumwe ataura asingabvumidzwe kutaura nevatori venhau ati vakapihwa mvumo nedare repamusoro rekudzinga vanhu ava. Kanzura Ian Makone veWard 2 kuBindura vati vari kuyedza kubatsira vammwe vashandi vakadzingwa basa ava uye havana kupihwa mari yemudyandigere kunyangwe vakashanda makore akawanda. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reAmnesty International muZimbabwe Ropomerwa Mhosva yeKusashandisa Mari Zvakanaka
text: Sangano rinorwirwa kodzero dzevanhu pasi rose, reAmnesty International, rinoti wongororo yemabhuku aro emari akaitwa kuchikamu chesangano iri muZimbabwe inoratidza kuti sangano iri rakarasikirwa nemamirioni mazhinji emadhora kuburikidza nehuwori pamwe nekusashandiswa kwemari zvakanaka. Amnesty International inoti vashandi vayo havana kubata mari zvakanaka uye vamwe vakashandisa mari zvisina kufanira, vamwe vakatora mari zvisiri pamutemo. Vanoona nezvekubudiswa kwamashoko musangano iri kuchamhembe kwe Africa, VaRobert Shivambu, vaudza Studio 7 vari kuSouth Africa kuti havakwanisi kutaura nezvenyaya iyi nekuti zvingakanganisa nyaya yavo kumatare edzimhosva kwavakaiendesa. Gore rakapera, bazi reAmerica rezvekudyina nedzimwe nyika rakamisa kubatsira nemari masangano mazhinji akazvimiririra emuZimbabwe richiti masangano aya ange asingatevedzeri nzira dzinodiwa mukushandiswa kwemari yadzaivapa. Amnesty International inoti nyaya iyi inobata mukuru wesangano iri muZimbabwe, VaCousin Zilala, avo vakatosiya basa, pamwe nasachigaro wesangano iri, VaTakesure Musiyiwa. Vanoona nezvemari musangano iri, Amai Sibongile Zimbeva, vakambomiswawo basa vachipomerwa mhosva yekusaita basa ravo nemazvo. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reAnti-Corruption Trust of Southern Africa, VaAlois Munyaradzi Chaumba, vanoti nyaya dzekusabata mari zvakanaka dziri kuramba dzichiitika mumasangano emunyika dzinouraya tarisiro yeveruzhinji, avo vanotarisira kwaari kuti avabatsire mukuchengetedzwa kwekodzero dzavo. VaChaumba vanoti huwori mumashandisirwo emari mumasangano aya hunopedzawo simba reavo vanoapa mari kuti arwire kodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa Votaura neHurumende Kuti Vabatsirwewo Munguva yeKuvharwa kweNyika
text: Sangano rinomirira vanotengesera mumigwagwa, reVendors Initiative for Social Transformation, VISET, rinoti rinotarisira kuti rwendo rwuno hurumende ichabatsirawo nhengo dzaro nemari munguva ino yadzisiri kukwanisa kushanda nekuda kwemutemo wekumbovharwa kwenyika. Mashoko eVISET anouya zvichitevera kuvharwa kwenyika kwemazuva makumi matatu, kana kuti lockdown Level 4, iyo yakadzikwa svondo rapera nehurumende. Mukuru weVISET, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vanoti mukumbovharwa kwakaitwa nyika gore rapera, nhengo dzavo dzakawanda hadzina kukwanisa kuwana rubatsiro rwaingovimbiswa nehurumende kuti rwuchapiwa vanozviitira mabasa emaoko. VaWadzayi vanoti vatotanga hurongwa hwekutaudzana nebazi rezvemabhizimusi madiki neepakati, kuti vaone kuti vangayeukwa here munguva ino. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rebazi iri. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vononga Svosve neMuromo neNyaya yeHupfumi Hwaenda kuMawere
text: Veruzhinji munyika vanoti kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi hwenyika kwakonzera kuti hupenyu huvawomere kunyange hazvo hurumende ichiti ine hurongwa hwakasimba hwekuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika. Vanhu vakawanda munyika vanoti hupenyu hwavawomera zvichitevera kuwondomoka kuri kuramba kuchiita hupfumi hwenyika. Mumwe wevanhu ava, VaGodfrey Banhwa vanogara mumusha weBudiriro muno mu Harare vanoti vakaburira muzvidzidzo zvavo zve Development Studies pane imwe yunivhesiti yemuno asi vanoti vave nemakore matatu vagere kumba. VaBanhwa vanoti vavakuswera vachigeza motokari dzevanhu mudhorobha kuti vakwanise kuchengeta mudzimai wavo nemapatya avo. Muzvare Kudzai Chiwanza vanogara ku Southerton vanoti kuwoma kuri kuramba kuchiita zvinhu munyika kwanyanya kuomera vanhukadzi vachiti chipfambi chizhinji chiri kuitwa munzvimbo dzakawanda chiri kukonzerwa nekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyika. Muzvare Chiwanza vanoti kushayikwa kwemari kwavakukonzera kuti madzimai mazhinji atadze kutenga zvipfeko zvemukati panguva yavanenge vachitevera. Nekuda kwekuooma kuri kuramba kuchiita hupenyu, vanhu vazhinji mu Harare vavekutsvaga zvinhu zvingavararamise. Amai Getrude Govere vanogara mu Gen Norah vanoti mushure mekuenda papenjeni makore mashanu apfuura, vakaona zvakakodzera kuti vatange kuswera vachitengesa matohwe, tsubvu pamwe nemasau mudhorobha vachiti penjeni yavo ishoma zvikuru zvekuti havakwanise kuterera imba yavanogara nemhuri yavo. Amai Govere vanoti vanobva kumamisha vachivahodhesera michero yavanotengesa vanenge vakatarisirawo kuwana chouviri pamichero yavo asi nguva zhinji vanogara vakashaya mari yekuvapa sezvo vachiti mari inenge yapeera mukubhadhara mafaindi kukanzuru yeHarare iyo isiri kubvumidza vanhu kuti vatengesere kunzvimbo dzisina kutatrwa. Vanoenderera mberi vachit havasi kuda kuenda kunzvimbo dzakatarwa nekanzuru idzi vachiti mari yavanowana mukutengesa kwavanoita haikwane kuti vabhadhare mitero kukanzuru pamwe nekuchengeta mhuri yavo. VaFarai Kabesha vanogara ku Mbare vanoti vanoswera vachitsvaga chero munhu anenge achida kubatsirwa kutakura zvinhu pamusika kuti vawane chouviri. VaKabesha vanoti havana chavari kuona chiri kuitwa nehurumende kuedza kugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika. Nekugarochema-chema kuri kuita veruzhinji, vamwe vanhu vakaita sa Amai Govere vanoti hurumende yaVaRobert Mugabe inofanira kutsvaga nzira dzkuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika nekukasika. Amai Govere vanoti zvinhu zvakamboita nani pakawumbwa hurumende yemubatanidzwa muna 2009 asi zvinhu zvakazotanga kuwoma zvakare pakaitwa sarudzo. Asi VaKabesha vanoti chave kutodikanwa ndechekuti pambotsvagwa imwe hurumende ine pfungwa itsva dzinogona kufambisa hupfumi hwenyika zvakanaka. VaMugabe vakaudza nyika svondo rapera kuti hurumende yavo ichashanda zvakasimba kusimbaradza nyaya dzezvekurima kuitira kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire. Hurumende yavo inoti chirongwa chekuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika che Zimbabwe Agenda for Sustainable Socio Economic Transformation kana kuti Zimasset chikazadziswa chinogona kusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika uhwo hwagwadama. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti Zimbabwe ikasawana chikwereti chimwe chakakura kubva kunze kugadzirisa hupfumi acharamba ari manyautsa mukanwa chembere kurota ichiyamwa. No media source currently available

headline: WFP Inoti Mhuri Zhinji muMaguta emuZimbabwe Dzatarisana neNzara Inotyisa
text: Sangano rinobatsira nechikafu pasi rose reWorld Food Programme kana kuti WFP rinoti gwaro rakaburitswa nesangano reZimbabwe Vulnerability Assessment kana kuti ZIMVAC richikokerwa neFood Nutrition Council rinoratidza kuti vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mana kana kuti 2,4 million vanoda rubatsiro rwechikafu mumaguta emuZimbabwe. Sangano iri rinoti kubva gore rapera kusvika gore rino nyaya yekuti vanhu vari kumanikidzwa kuti vambogara mudzimba kuyedza kurwisa chirwere cheCoronavirus kana kuti Lockdown yapa kuti vakawanda vatoziye nenzara sezvo vasingakwanise kuenda kumabasa mumadhora kana kunoita maricho kumamisha. Sezvo pasina mabasa, ongororo iyi inoti vanhu zvikamu makumi mana nezviviri kubva muzana kana kuti 42% vemumadhorobha havakwanise kuwana zvekudya zvakakwana zvichienzaniswa nezvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana kana kuti 30% muna 2019. Mumiriri weWFP muZimbabwe Amai Francesca Erdelmann mumashoko avo kuvatori venhau vati vanhu vakawanda vave kumanikidzwa kudya kamwe chete pazuva kana kutorara nenzara. Vanotiwo kusadya zvinovaka muviri kuchakanganisa hutano hwevakawanda. WFP inoti mararamiro evakawanda mumaguta aderera zvakanyanya zvapa kuti vanhu vanodarika zvikamu makumi masere nematatu kubva muzana kana kuti 83% vatadze kuwana zvekudya zvakaringana zvinosanganisira hupfu, munyu nemafuta ekubikisa zvichienzaniswa nezvikamu zvinodarika makumi manomwe nematanhatu kubva muzana kana kuti 76, 8% muna 2019. Mitengo yezvinhu inonzi yawedzerawo zvakanyanya sezvo dhora riri kushaya simba. WFP inoti iri kupa mari kumhuri dzinosvika zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi maviri nematanhatu kana kuti 326, 000 mumadhorobha makumi maviri nematatu munyika uye iri kuda kuwedzera rubatsiro kusvika pazviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu kana kuti 550,00 mumadhorobha makumi maviri nemasere. Gurukota rezvemagariro akanaka evanhu, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende iri kubatsirawo vanhu nezvekudya ichishanda nemasangano akaita seWFP. No media source currently available Mukuru wesangano rinomirira vagari reHarare Residents Trust VaPrecious Shumba vanoti ichokwadi kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kune vagari vemuHarare vakawanda wavari kutaura navo vachiti vave kudya kamwechete pazuva. Vanoti mitengo yezvinhu iri kukwirawo zvakanyanya. No media source currently available

headline: Chirwere cheCovid-19 Chonetsa Mumajeri
text:
Bazi rinoona nezvekuchengetwa kwevasungwa mumajeri reZimbabwe Prisons and Correctional Services, ZPCS, raramba kuzivisa huwandu hwevasungwa vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika panguva iyo vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika mumajeri vari kuti dambudziko reCovid-19 ranetsa zvikuru mumajeri ari munyika. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri weZPCS munyika, VaPeter Chaparanganda, avo vakanga vavimbisa kutipa huwandu hwevasungwa vane chirwere cheCovid-19, vadududza nhasi vachiti tipihwe nachiremba mukuru wemajeri, Dr Evidence Gaka. VaChaparanganda varamba kutipa nhamba dzaDr Gaka vachiti vanoda
kutanga vataura navo asi vazodzima foni yavo vasati vatipa nhamba
dzacho. Asi svondo rakapera Dr Gaka vakaudza bepa nhau reHerald kuti vari
kushushikana nehuwandu hwevasungwa vari kubatwa mumajeri nechirwere cheCovid-19 vachiti muChinhoyi vasungwa gumi nevatatu vainge vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Mutauriri weZPCS mudunhu reMashonaland West, VaPeter Kondowe,vati
mumwe musungwa abatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvakwidza huwandu kusvika pagumi nevana. Kunyange nzvimbo inochengeterwa vasungwa muChinhoyi iine vasungwa gumi nevana vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19, vashandi vepo vanoti huwandu uhwu hunogona kunge hwuri pamusoro sezvo manhamba evasungwa vanenge vabatwa nechirwere ichi asingaziviswe kune vashandi vose. Kusaburitswa kwemanhamba kunonzi kwakamboita kuti vamwe vashandi
varambe kukwira motokari imwechete nevasungwa kuenda kumatare
edzimhosva vachiti vanofamba netsoka sezvo pari pedyo vachityira
kutapurirana chirwere cheCovid-19. Asi zvinonzi vakazokwira motokari imwechete mushure mukunge vashandi
vayambirwa kuti vakatizwa nevasungwa vachaiswa panguva yakaoma. VaKondowe vati vanofunga kuti huwandu hwevasungwa vari kubatwa
nechirwere ichi hwakawanda muChinhoyi nekuda kwekuti matare
edzimhosva ekuKaroi akambovharwa vasungwa vakawanda vakaendeswa
kuChinhoyi.

Panyaya yenhomba yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19, VaKondowe vati
vasungwa, vanochengeta vasungwa, pamwe nemhuri dzavo vanosvika makumi mashanu nevana vakabayiwa nhomba pazororo reEaster chete. Pajeri reMutimurefu rekuMasvingo zvinonzi kune vasungwa makumi manomwe nevasere vakabatwa chirwere cheCovid-19 masvondo maviri akapfuura. Zvinonzi mujeri reRemand muHarare vasungwa vakawanda vari kurwara
nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvekuti vaimbove meya weguta reHarare, VaJacob Mafume, vakabata chirwere ichi pavakambosungwa vakaendeswa kuremand mwedzi mishoma yapfuura. Mukuru wesanganore Zimbabwe Association for Crime Prevention and
Rehabilitation, VaEdison Chihota, vati vari kushushikana
nevasungwa vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vachiti hurumende
inofanirwa kuburitsa vamwe vasungwa sezvayakavimbisa. VaChihota vati vasungwa vanofanirwa kubayiwa nhomba nekukurumidza
sezvo vachipinda nekubuda nguva dzose mujeri. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nevaimbove gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Henry Madzorera,
avo vanoti vasungwa vanopara mhosva diki vanofanirwa kubhadhariswa
fayindi uye kuti vasungwa vapihwe mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso kuitira kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba.

Hurumende yakazivisa kuti pane vasungwa vanosvika zviuru makumi maviri nezviviri kana kuti 22 000 mumajeri anofanirwa kunge ayine vasungwa zviuru gumi nezvisere kana kuti 18 000. Tatadza kubata gurukota rezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, kuti tinzwe kuti
danho rehurumende rekudzikisa huwandu hwevasungwa mumajeri richaitwa riini. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu zviuru zvitanhatu nezana
nemakumi mashanu nevanomwe kana kuti 6157 vakabayiwa nhomba yekutanga nezuro izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga pazviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvitatu zvine mazana mana nemakumi mashanu nevana kana kuti 123 454.

Bazi iri rakazivisawo kuti nezuro hapana munhu akafa nechirwere
cheCovid-19 izvo zvakaita kuti vanhu vafa nechirwere ichii varambe vari
chiuru chimwechete nemazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nevashanu kana kuti 1525. Vanhu gumi nemumwe chete vakabatwa nechirwere ichii
nezuro izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechichere cheCovid-19 pazviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matatu nevana kana kuti 36 934.

Vanhu vachiri kurwara nechirwere ichi vava mazana matanhatu nemakumi
mashanu nemumwechete kana kuti 651.

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kufa neCovid-19 Hunokwira muNyika
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nezuro kuti huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwakanga hwasvika pazana nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 189, mushure mekushaya kwevamwe vanhu gumi. Vanhu makumi mana nemumwe kana kuti 41 ndivo vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi pavanhu mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu nemumwe kana kuti 951, vakavhenekwa kuona kana vaine chirwere ichi. Pavanhu ava, makumi matatu nevasere kana kuti 38 vanhu vagara vari munyika, kuchiti vamwe vatatu kana kuti 3, vari vanhu vakadzoka munyika vachibva kuSouth Africa. Vanhu zviuru zvitanhatu nemazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri kana kuti 6 292, vakabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose, kunyange hazvo paine vamwe vanosvika zviuru zvishanu negumi kana kuti 5 010. vapora kubva kuCovid-19. Izvi zvinosiya vanhu chiuru nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu, kana kuti 1 093 vachine chirwere ichi. Izvi zvinouya panguva iyo sangano reCommunity Working Group on Health riri kudzidzisa vanotungamira nyaya dzehutano munharaunda pamusoro peCovid-19 uye kuti chirwere ichi chingadzivirirwa sei. Mukuru wesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti sangano ravo rakabatana nebazi rezvehutano riri kushanda pamwe nemakanzuru kupa ruzivo kune vanoita zvehutano mumadhorobha nemumaruwa. Vanoti vawaniswawo mabhasikoro akawanda kwazvo nesangano re World Bicycle Relief, ayo achashandiswa zvikuru mumaruwa mukurwisana nedenda iri. Zvichakadaro, Johns Hopkins University Hospital, iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kweCovid-19 pasi rose, inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemana nemazana mana ezviuru, kana kuti 24,400 000 vabatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose, icho chaurayawo vamwe vanodarika zviuru mazana masere nemakumi matatu nezviviri kana kuti 832 000. America ndiyo iri pamusoro pasi rose iine vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi matanhatu nezvipfumbamwe, kana kuti 5, 869 000 Vanhu vafa muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana nemakumi masere kana kuti 180 000. South Africa, iyo iri pamusoro muAfrica yose, ine vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matanhatu negumi nezvisere kana kuti 618 000 vabatwa nechirwere ichi, kuchitiwo vafa nacho vadarika zviuru gumi nezvitatu zvine mazana matanhatu, kana kuti 13 600. No media source currently available

headline: Munhu Mumwe Chete Akafa neChirwere cheCovid-19 kuMatabelaland South neMusi weChipiri
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChipiri kuti munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kuMatabeleland South, izvo zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera, hwave pachiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu ane makumi mashanu nevana, kana kuti 1,554. Vanhu gumi nevatanhatu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare, izvo zvakasiyawo vanhu vabatwa nacho vave zviuru makumi matatu nezvinomwe ane mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nevashanu, kana kuti 37, 875. Vanhu makumi maviri nevanomwe vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvasiya vanhu vapora vave zviuru makumi matatu nemashanu nemakumi mashanu nevasere kana kuti 35, 058. Vanhu vachiri kurwara vave chiuru chimwe chete chine mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nevatatu kana kuti 1, 263. Huwandu uhu hunogona kukwira neChitatu manheru apo hurumende ichazivisa zvayakawana. Zvichakadaro, vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yecovid-19 kekutanga hwave zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi masere nezvisere nemazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 288, 229. Asi vabayiwa. Nhomba yepiri sezviri kukurudzirwa navanachiremba vave zviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu ane mazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe nevasere, kana kuti 36, 778. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumukuru munyaya dzekurwisa chirwere checovid-19 muhurumende dr agness mahomva sezvo vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yedu. Asi hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba vanhu mamiriyoni gumi ichishandisa nhomba dzakabva kuChina dzinoti Sinovac neSinopharm, idzo dzisati dzapihwa chitambi neWorld Health Organization kuti dzishandiswe neveruzhinji. Imwe nhomba yakabva kuIndia uye imwe iri kutarisirwa kubva kuRussia. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vakambove mukuru weChitungwiza Hospital varizve munyori wesangano reZimbabwe Medical Association mudunhu reMashonaland, Dr Enock Mayida, vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vabayiwe nhomba uye kuramba vachiteerera kurudziro iri kuitwa nebazi rezvehutano kuti chirwere ichi chisadzoke zvine hukasha. No media source currently available

headline: Mitumbi yeVanhu Gumi Vakafa neHutsi Yoongororwa kuUBH kuBulawayo
text: Mapurisa aburitsa mazita evanhu gumi vakafa mushure mekutadza kufema nehutsi hwemoto wavaiyedza kudzima uchipisa sora papurazi rinonzi Rodrose kuEsigodini nezuro. Mitumbi yevanhu ava yakaendeswa kuchipatara cheUnited Bulawayo Hospitals kuti inovhenekwa navanamazvikokota. Mumashoko padandemutande reTwitter, mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vati vanhu vakashaya vanoti VaKessary Sibanda vane makore makumi mashanu nematau-53, VaIan Mudimba vane makore gumi nematatu nemasere 38, VaSimon Mdlongwa vane makore makumi matatu nemapfumbamwe, 39, VaNelisingwane Dlamini vane makre makumi mana nemanomwe-47, VaLuzibo Tshuma vane makore asina kuziviswa, VaOliver Mudimba vane makore makumi matatu nemapfumbamwe, VaBafana Moyo, vane makore makumi mashanu nematatu, 53, VaEngland Moyo vane makore makumi maviri 20, VaThabani Mpofu vane makore makumi mana nematanhatu, uye VaMenelisi Ngwenya vane makore makumi maviri-20 zvekare. Mapurisa atiwo achasunga vanhu vari kupisa masango izvi zviri kukonzera kufa kwevanhu.

headline: Vanhu Vatatu Vofa neChirwere cheCovid-19 neMugovera
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu vatatu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weMugovera zvasiya vafa kubva zvatanga chirwere ichi kupararira vave zviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nemakumi maviri kana kuti 4, 782. Vanhu zviuru zviviri nezana nevatanhatu kana kuti 2, 106 vakabatwawo nechirwere ichi zvasiya vanhu zana rezviuru nemakumi mapfumbamwe nechimwe zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nematatu kana kuti 191 673 vabatwawo nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba kaviri vave mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru zvitanhatu nezvitatu zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matatu nemana kana kuti 3 063 934. Vanhu vabayiwa kekutanga vave mamiriyoni mana nezviuru makumi mana nemanomwe zvine mazana manomwe nemakumi mana nematatu kana kuti 4 047 743. Hurumende inoti ine chinangwa chekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana mukupera kwemwedzi uno kuti inyatsoshanda. Kuuya kwemhando itsva yeCovid-19 kwapa kuti huwandu hwevari kurwara neCovid-19 huwedzere zvakanyanya. Pakazivisa hurumende kuti mhando itsva yechirwere ichi yainge yawanikwa munyika musi wa 5 Zvita painge paine vanhu zviuru zviviri nemazana masere nemakumi mana nematatu kana kuti 2 843 vairwara. Asi neMugovera vari kurwara vainge vave zviuru kamumi mashanu nechimwe nezana nemakumi matatu nematanhatu kana kuti 51 136. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Enoch Mayida vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vabayiwe nhomba sezvo iri iyo chete nzira inopa kuti vasarware zvakanyanya kana kufa neCovid-19.

headline: Paramende Youdzwa Kuti Hurumende Haisi Kukoshesa Mishonga yeChivanhu
text: Hurumende yeZimbabwe inonzi haisi kukoshesa varapi vechivanhu pamwe nemishonga yavo sezvo isiri kupa rutsigiro rwakasimba kubazi kuvarapi kunyange hazvo paine humbowo hunoratidza kuti zvikamu masere kubva muzana zvevanhu vemuZimbabwe zvinoenda kun’anga kana kushandisa mushonga yechivanhu pane dzimwe nguva. Ongororo yakaitwa nesangano reWorld Health Organisation yakaratidzawo kuti zvikamu makumi masere kubva muzana zvevanhu vane hutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS pamwe nezvikamu makumi mashanu nezviviri zvemadzimai akazvitakura vanoshandisawo mishonga yechivanhu. Vachipa humbowo nemaererano nemabasa ari kuitwa nehurumende kusimudzira mabasa evarapi vemuno pamwe nemishonga yavo, munyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano, Doctor Gerald Gwinji, vaudza komiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano kuti kunyange hazvo vanhu vakawanda vachishandisa mishonga iyi, hurumende hasi kuvapa mari yavanoda kusimudzira kushandiswa kwemishona iyi. Doctor Gwinji vati bazi ravo rine chikamu chinoona nezvemishonga iyi asi chikamu ichi hachiwani mari yachinoda. Semuenzaniso, Doctor Gwinji vati gore rega rega, chikamu ichi chinoda zviuru mazana matanhatu zvemadhora nechidumbu asi chinowanzo pihwa churu chemadhora chete izvo zvinoita kuti chitadze kuita basa racho. Vanoti kunze kwekushaya mari vane zvakawanda zvavari kuita zvekuona kuti mabasa evarapi vemuno pamwe nemishonga yavo yasimudzirwa. Vati mutemo we Traditional Medical Practitioners Act 11, Regulations on Complementary and the Traditional Medicine policy ndezvimwe zvavakaitwa kusimudzira mabasa evarapi vemuno. Doctor Gwinji vati kunyange hazvo paine varapi vanodarika churu vakanyoreswa neTraditional Medical Practitioners Council, vanoziva kuti munyika mune n’anga nevarapi vakawanda kudarika apa uye mishonga yechivanhu iri kutengeswa pese pese kunyange munzvimbo dzisina kunyoreswa. Vati zvingave zvakanaka chose kana varapi vese vakadzidziswa kubata mishonga yavo zvakanaka zvinoita kuti vanhu vasakanganiswa nemishonga iyi sezvinoitika pane dzimwe nguva. Vati Zimbabwe inogona kudzidza zvakawanda kubva kune dzimwe nyika zvikuru sei kunyika dzakaita seIndia neChina idzo dzave kushandisa mishonga yechivanhu zvakanyanya. Munyori anoona nezvedzidzo musangano reZimbabwe National Traditional Healers Association, VaPrince Mutandi Sibanda, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo vaine ruzivo rwekusimudzira mushonga yechivanhu, havasi kuwana rutsigirwo rwemari kuti vaite izvi. VaSibanda vati ZINATHA ine nhengo dzakawanda chose zvekuti hazvivanetsi kugadzira mishonga yechivanhu nekubatsira vanhu vese munyika. Muzvare Juliet Chirenje avo vari kudzidzira zvekurapa nemishonga yechivanhu pachikoro cheZINATHA vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende inofanira kuisa mari parutivi yekutsigira vanoshandisa mishonga yechivanhu. Doctor Gwinji vati pari zvino pave nemasangano gumi nematatu anomiriria varapi vemuno akanyoreswa zviri pamutemo uyewo kune makirinika emishonga yemuno gumi nemana. Asi vati mishonga iyi yave kutengeswa pese pese, mumigwagwa nedzimwe nzvimbo zvekuti bazi ravo rinoda kuti itengeswe zviri pamutemo pachitevedzwa hurongwa hweMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe pamwe ne Medical Research Council of Zimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Britain Yorambidza Ndege Dzinobva kuZimbabwe Kuti Dzimhare Munyika Iyi
text: Hurumende yeBritain yazivisa kuti yambomisa kuti ndege dzinobva muZimbabwe nedzimwe nyika shanu dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica kuti dzimhare munyika iyi kusvika nemusi weSvondo zvichitevera kuwanikwa kweimwe mhando yehutachiwana hweCovid 19 kuSouth Africa nekuBotswana. Gurukota rinoona nezvehutano muBritain, VaSajid Javid, vati hurumende yavo yambomisa kumhara kwendege munyika yavo kubva nhasi masikati kusvika nemusi weSvondo dzinenge dzichibva kunyika dzinoti Zimbabwe, Botswana, Lesotho, South Africa, Namibia pamwe neEswathini. Izvi zvinotevera kubatwa kweimwe mhando yeCovid 19, kana kuti new variant, muSouth Africa pamwe nemuBotswana pakutanga kwesvondo rino iyo iri kudaidzwa kuti B.1.1.529. VaJavid vati hurumende yavo yatora danho iri uku ichinyatsoongorora kuti mamwe matanho aingatore ndeapi kuti new variant iyi isapinde munyika. Israel inotiwo icharambidza zvizvarwa zvayo kushanyira nyika nhanhatu idzi kusanganisirawo Mozambique nekuda kwechikonzero chimwechetecho ichiti zvakare icharambidzawo vanhu vari kubva kunyika idzi kuti vapinde muIsrael. Mumwe mukuru muEupean Union Commission, VaUrsulavon der Leyen, vabuditsawo mashoko padandemutande ravo reTwitter vachiti European Union ichatorawo matanho ekudzivirira kupararira kwe new variant iyi munyika dziri mugungano reEU. Vanamazvikokota munyaya dzezvehutano muSouth Africa vanoti new variant yeB.1.1.529 iyi ine hukasha hwakanyanya uye hurumende yeBotswana yaburitsawo mashoko kuvatori venhau ichiti vanhu vana vose vakawanikwa vaine new variant iyi muBotswana, vakanga vakabaiwa nhomba dze Covid 19 kaviri sezvinokurudzirwa. Gurukota rinoona nezvehutano uye vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vanga vachitaura pavavhura zviri pamutemo kongiresi yavari munezvehutano ye Health Profesions Authority, vatiwo hurumende yakavhura ziso rayo kuti new variant iyi isapindewo munyika. Asi vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa uye vari munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vati Zimbabwe inofanira kugara yakagadzirira zvakakwana nekuti ma variant aya acharamba achingouya. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti dziri kutyira kuti chirwere cheCovid 19 chinogona kupararira zvakanyanya pachange pachifamba vanhu vakawanda munguva yezororo reKisimusi pamwe negoredzva. Doctor Madzorera vakurudzirawo kuti miganhu yenyika ivharwe sezviri kuitwa nedzimwe nyika ukuwo vanhu vachiongororwa zvakasimba. Mukuru wesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vakurudzira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neBotswana kuti zviregedze kuuya kuzororo reKisimusi negoredzva zvisina kubaiwa nhomba senzira yekuderedza mukana wekupararira chirwere cheCovid 19. VaRusike vanotiwo vanhu vazhinji havachatevedzera nzira dzakatarwa dzekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Asi VaChiwenga vati hurumende iri kuita zvese zvainogona kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira uye vakurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vasamire kubaiwa nhomba dzeCovid 19. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti pane munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid nezuro zvabva zvasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muZimbabwe pazviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nevana (4704) kubva pakatanga chirwere ichi. Bazi iri rinotiwo vanhu vakabaiwa nhomba yekutanga nezuro vakasvika zviuru gumi nezvisere nemazana matanhatu nemakumi masere nevanomwe (18687) izvo zvasvitsa huwandu hwevabaiwa nhomba yekutanga munyika yose pamamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi matatu nezvinomwe nemazana mana nemakumi matanhatu nevatatu (3 737 463). Vanhu vakabaiwa nhomba yechipiri nezuro sezvinokurudzirwa vakasvika zviuru zvinomwe nemazana nana nemakumi masere nevatanhatu (7486) izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabaiwa nhomba yepiri munyika yose pamamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe nezvna zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nevapfumbamwe (2 774 929). Huwandu uhwu hunogona kukwira pachaziviswa zvabuda muongororo dzaitwa nebazi iri muzuva ranhasi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid 19. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Makumi Mana neVaviri (42) Vofa muMavhiki Maviri muZimbabwe neCovid-19
text: Vanhu makumi mana nevaviri kana kuti 42 vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika, vamwe churu nemazana masere nemakumi mashanu nevasere kana kuti 1, 858 vachibatwa nechirwere ichi mukati memavhiki maviri adarika. Pamavhiki amaviri aya pane vanhu gumi nevanomwe vakabva kuSouth Africa vakabatwa nechirwere ichi. Izvi zviri kutemesa nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano musoro nekuti chirwere cheCovid-19 kuSouth Africa, Britain, France, Japan, Nigeria, Denmark, Canada, Italy, Lebanon, Netherlands, Singapore, Sweden ne Spain chatanga kuzvivanddza kana kuti mutate. Mhando yeCovid-19 itsva iyi inopararira zvakanyanya ichifungidzirwa kuti inobatawo zvakanyanya vana vadiki. Kamhando katsva aka kakatanga kutaurwa nezvako kuBritain musi wa 14 Zvita. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weSvondo kuti vanhu vasere vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika muvhiki rapera zvasiya vafa kubva zvakatanga chirwere ichi kupararira munyika vave mazana matatu nemakumi mana nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 349. Vanhu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi neSvondo izana negumi nevana kana kuti 114. Izvi zvinoreva kuti vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino vave zvuru gumi nezvitatu zvine manomwe nevanomwe kana kuti 13, 077. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvuru gumi nemazana mashanu ane makumi mapfumbamwe nematatu kana kuti 10, 593 zvichitevera kupora kwevamwe vanhu makumi manomwe nevana neSvondo. Vanhu vachiri kurwara vanosvika zvuru zviviri nezana nemakumi matatu nevashanu kana kuti 2,135. Vakawanda vari kurwara vari muHarare neBulawayo. Africa Covid-19 Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 2,6 million vabatwa nechirwere checovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zvuru makumi matanhatu nemaviri ane mazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu nematanhatu kana kuti 62, 366.  Vapora vadarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazatuna maviri kana kuti 2,2 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Dunhu reSADC ndirozve rine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete. Pasi Rose Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi masere nezvuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 80, 7 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zvuru mazana matatu zvine makumi matatu nematatu kana kuti 333, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 19 miillion. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 1,7 million. Asi vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi mana nemashanu ane zvuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 45, 6 million.

headline: Vanhu Vatatu Vofa neCovid-19 Iyo Yapararira muZvikoro Kunyangwe Hurumende Iri Kuti Yakagadzira
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weSvondo kuti vanhu vatatu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika. Pavanhu ava, vaviri vakafira kuBulawayo mumwe chete kuMasvingo. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika vave mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nevasere kana kuti 268 kubva zvachatanga kupararira muna Kurume. Vamwe vanhu makumi mana nevasere vakabatwawo nechirwere ichi nemusi weSvondo wakare zvichireva kuti vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga vave zviuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana maviri nemakumi maviri kana kuti 9,220. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vave zviuru zvisere nemazana maviri nemakumi mashanu kana kuti 8, 250 mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu gumi nevashanu vapora nemusi weSvondo. Vanhu vachiri kurwara mazana manomwe nevaviri kana kuti 702. Hurumende inengewo yave kutatarika zvakanyanya kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi muzvikoro, zvikoro zvakaita seJohn Tallach High School, Emakhandeni Primary School, Matopo High, Prince Edward, National University of Science and Technology, Chinhoyi University of Technology nezvimwe zvakazivisa kuti zvine vana nevarairidzi vainge vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika vari gurukota rezvehutano VaConstantino Chiwenga vakayambira kuti chirwere ichi chinogona kudzoka zvine hukasha sezvo vanhu vasisatevedzeri kurudziro dzekumisa kupararira kweCovid-19. NeMuvhuro chikoro cheChinhoyi High chinonzi change chichirambidza vamwe vana kupinda mushure mekunge mumwe mwana abatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weMugovera. Pasvika Studio 7 pachikoro ichi mangwanani vana vose vanodzidza vachibva kumba vange vachidzoserwa kudzimba. Vana vanga vachibvumirwa kupinda pachikoro vana vari kunyora bvunzo chete. Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru webazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMashonaland West Dr Gift Masoja vanoti vakakurudzira kuti vana vambomisa zvidzidzo nekutyira kuti chirwere ichi chinopararira pachikoro ichi. Dr Masoja vanoti vakabva vawongorora vamwe vana vanosvika makumi mashanu nevashanu vanodzidza nemusikana uyu pamwe nevadzidzisi gumi vakambodzidzisa vana ava svondo rapera. Patabvunza kuti matanho api avari kutora kuti vana vari kunyora vachibva kumba nevanogara pachikoro vasa tapurirane chirwere, mukuru webazi rezvedzidzo mudunhu reMashonaland West VaGabriel Mhuma vati vana vari kunyora bvunzo vanodzidza vachibva kumba nevanodzidza vachigara pachikoro vanonyora mumakamuri akasiyana. Mumwe mwana adzoserwa kumba uyo watisingakwanise kudoma nezita sezvo asati abvazera anoti vadzoserwa kumba vachinzi vazodzoka kuchikoro kupera kwemwedzi uno. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa Dr Henry Madzorera vanoti vadzidzi vari pazvikoro zvine vana vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vanofanirwa kuwongororwa vose. No media source currently available Dzimwe nhengo dzedare reparamende dzakakurudzira hurumende kuti ivhare zvikoro sezvo chirwere cheCovid-19 chave kupararira asi vanotungamira mabasa ehurumende mudare iri vari gurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi vakati hurumende yakagadzirira. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nevanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubazi rezvedzidzo VaTaungana Ndoro avo vati zvikoro zvishoma ndizvo zvawirwa nedambudziko uye vari kukurudzira zvikoro kuti zvitevedzere kurudziro yavari kupa nebazi rezvehutano kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Cholera Yobata Munhu kuChiredzi Zvotyisa Vakawanda
text: Vagari vemudhorobha reChiredzi nenzvimbo dzakapoteredza vari kutyira kubata chirwere cheCholera icho chinonzi chakabata vamwe vanhu munzvimbo iyi nezuro zvinonzi zvakonzerwa nekushaikwa kwemvura yakachena.
