Bazi rezvehutano rinoti munhu mumwe chete akabatwa nechirwere checholera uye pane vamwe gumi vachiri kuongororwa. Mumwe mugari wemumusha weTshovani Vamwe vagari vakaita saAmai Enia Mukarati vemumusha weTshovani muChiredzi vanoti vave kutyira hupenyu hwavo sezvo vari kutarisana ne ndambudziko remvura iyo yave nemwedzi inodarika miviri ichinetsa\n\nizv zvatsinhirwa nevanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano rinomirira vagari reUnited Chiredzi Residents and RatePayers Association kana kuti UCHIRA Amai Constance Chikumbo Kanzura weward 18 mumusha weTraingle kuChiredzi, VaGilbert Mutubukiti vanoti vagary vave kumanikidzwa mvura ine tsvina yekudiridza nzimbe inodarika nemumigero yakavhurika. Vanotiwo nyaya yekuti vanhu vanozvibatsira pedyo nemigero iyi inobva yapa kuti itonyanye kusviba zvichiisa vanhu munjodzi yekubatwa necholera. VaMutubuki vati kanzuru yavo iri kuvaka zvimbuzi nekuchera zvibhorani kuyedza kuti vanhu vasarware nezvirwere zvakaita secholera. Munyori wekanzuru yeChiredzi, Engineer Wesley Kauma vati havasati vanzwa nezve denda iri kubva kubazi rezvehutano. Mukuru mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMasvingo, Dr Emedus Shamu vatenda kuti chirwere ichi chakabata munhu kuChiredzi vachiti bazi ravo richiri kuongorora vamwe vanofungirwa kuti vanacho. Muna 2008, vanhu vanoda kusvika zana rezviuru kana kuti 100 000 vakabatwa nechirwere checholera munyika vamwe zviuru zvina vakafa. Kuti vanhu vasabatwe nechirwere checholera, nyanzvi dzinoti vanofanira kunwa mvura yakachena, kugeza maoko nesipo vasati vabika nekudya, kubhoirisa chikafu uye kushandisa zvimbuzi. Kana munhu abatwa nechirwere ichi anoita manyoka, kunzwa nyota zvakanyanya, kurutsa kana kunzwa kuneta. Anenge achinzwa izvi anokurudzirwa kumhanya kuchipatara. No media source currently available

headline: CHRA Inoti Harare Iri Kusiya Madzimai Akazvitakura Asina Rubatsiro paGlen View Polyclinic
text: Sangano revagari vemuguta guru reHarare, reCombined Harare Residents Association kana kuti CHRA, rinoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka paGlen View Poly Clinic apo panonzi pane vakoti vashoma. Mukuru wezvirongwa muCHRA, VaReuben Akili, vanoti paGlen View Polyclinic panobatsirwa madzimai anenge akazvitakura, uye vanhu vari kubayiwawo nhomba yeCovid-19 pachipatara ichi. VaAkili vanoti chipatara ichi hachina mvura yekushandisa, izvo zvave kuisa hupenyu hwemadzimai akazvitakura panjodzi. VaAkili vanoti matambudziko akatarisana neGlevn View Polyclinic akabuda pachena pamusangano wakaitirwa padandemutande nguva pfupi yapfuura uyo waizeya matambudziko ari kusangana nemadzimai munzvimbo iyi. Musangano uyu wakanzwawo kuti vamwe varwere vave kuendeswa kuBudiriro 1 kuti vanorapwa. Kubudiro 1 kunonzi kwakamanikidzanawo zvekuti madzimai akazvitakura anogona kuguma atapurirwa chirwere ccheCovid-19. CHRA inoti vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mukanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vakati kanzuru ine vakoti vashoma sezvo vakawanda vari kuenda kunotsvaga mafuro manyoro. Studio 7 yatumira mibvunzo kuna VaChideme asi vange vasati vapindura pataenda pamhepo. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzinoti Dambudziko reMbereko Rinokonzerwa neZvakawanda
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti vanhu vazhinji vanofunga kuti kushaya mbereko munyama, kana kuti kutukwa naMwari, izvo zvinoita kuti vagare vasina mufaro munyika. Nyanzvi dzehutano dzinoti pane zvikonzero zvakawanda zvinoita kuti vanhu vaviri vatadze kuita vana sokuronga kwavanenge vakaita pavanenge varoorana. Mumwe mudzimai akasangana nedambudziko rekutadza kuita mbereko, Amai Sencia Maponga, vanoti vakaroorwa mugore 1989, asi vakapedza gore vasina kubata pamuviri, vachingoti zvichazongoita chete. Amai Maponga vanoti murume wavo hapana zvaaimbotaura nezvenyaya yokuita vana asi zvakazochinja nenzira yavasina kumbofungira vakasvika pokuzorambana. Amai Maponga vanoti vasati vatombofunga kuti vaitove nedambiko rekushaya mbereko, tezvara vavo vakauya mumba mavairara nemurume wavo vakawaranyurwa kuti vabude mumagumbeze vasina kana kumbopfeka vachitukwa nemashoko asinganyoreke. Amai Maponga vanoti nyaya iyo yakavarwadza uye vakajekeserwa kuti kana usina mwana hama nevanhu vemunharaunda vanokuona semunhu asina basa kana chiremerera. Amai Maponga vanoti vanosarurwa nekutarisirwa pasi zvokuti vakatombopindwa nepfungwa yokuda kuzviuraya. Mumwe mudzimai, Amai Tracy Sanudi vekuKambuzuma, vanoti vakaroorwa mugore 1977 vakashaya mbereko zvokuti vakamboedza kutsvaga rubatsiro kuzvipatara, maporofita nekun’anga, asi zvakaramba. Asi Amai Sanudi vanoti vakaita rombo rakanaka rokuti murume wavo haana kuvaramba zvokuti vagere zvakanaka chero zvazvo hama dzemurume dzichitaura mashoko anorwadza nenyaya yavo yekushaya mbereko. No media source currently available  Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekuita mbereko, uye vachishanda mubazi rehutano, Dr Robert Madzima, vanoti kushaya mbereko mudzimba rave dambudziko guru riri kusangana nevanhu vakawanda munyika izvo zvakapa kuti hurumende iparure chirongwa chitsva chakanangana nevanhu vanoshaya mbereko. Dr Madzima vanoti bazi ravo harina chirongwa chekuongorora vanhu kuti vanokwanisa here kuita mbereko muzvipatara zvaro, izvo zvinoita kuti pasave nezvinyorwa zvinoratidza kuti vanhu vangani vane dambudziko irori sezvo donzvo rebazi rehutano raiva rakanyanya kunangana nechirongwa chekuronga mhuri chete. Dr Madzima vanoti kunyange hazvo kuine vamwe vanhu vanozvarwa vasingakwanise kuita mbereko, vazhinji vanoshaya mbereko nemhosva yezvirwere zvepabonde. Dr Madzima vanoti havasi vakadzi chete vanotadza kuita mbereko. Dr Mudzima vanoti varume vanokwanisa kuita dambudziko iri zvakanyanya, asi vazhinji vavo havade kubuda pachena. Kubudikidza nekubuda pachena kwakaita Amai Maponga nezvedambudziko rekushaya mbereko, vanoti zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvakavachaira runhare musi wavakabuda panhepfenyuro vachitaura nyaya yavo, izvo zvakazoita kuti vatange sangano rinonzi "Hannah’s Tears", iro rinonyaradza vakadzi vanenge vasangana nedambudziko rokushaya mbereko. Senzira yekugadzirisa dambudziko iri, gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Obediah Moyo, vanoti pane chikwata chevanachiremba vakatumwa nehurumende mhiri kwemakungwa kunodzidzira zvokuuchika vana kuitira kuti vazobatsira vanoshaya mbereko muZimbabwe kuitira kuti vakwanisewo kuita vana vavo.

headline: Zimbabwe Yobvumidza Kurimwa kweMbanje Zviri paMutemo
text: Hurumende inoti yava kubvumidza vanhu kuti varime mbanje zviri pamutemo, mbanje iyi ichishandiswa semushonga unorapa unenge wapihwa munhu nachiremba. Pasi pemutemo we Statutory Instrument 62 of 2018, "Dangerous Drugs – Production of Cannabis for Medicinal and Scientific Use Regulations", gurukota rezveutano ndiro rine masimba ekubvumidza vanoda kurima mbanje zviri pamutemo. Izvi zvinoreva kuti vanhu vanenge vopihwa rezenisi rekuti varime mbanje, vachiita zvinodiwa nemutemo. Mbanje iyi ienge ichitengeserwa kuzvitoro zvinogadzira mishonga zvinenge zvakapihwa mvumo nehurumende. Chiremba vanoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe Doctors for Human Rights, VaNicholas Wazadza, varumbidza zvikuru danho ratorwa nehurumende vachiti izvi zvichabatsira vanogadzira mushonga. Dr Wazadza vatiwo zvirwere zvakaita segomarara zvinodawo mishonga ine mbanje mukati. Dr Wazadza vatiwo kushandiswa zvakaipa kwembanje kune njodzi nekudaro zvakakoshawo kuti hurumende inyatsoongorora kuti mbanje iyi haizoshandiswi zvisiri pamutemo. Asi Amai Dorcas Chihwa, avo vanogara kuMufakose, vati senyika ine huori, vanotyira kubvumidzwa kurimwa kwembanje uku. Amai Chihwa vati zvinenge zvichida kunyatsoongororwa zvakadzama kuona kuti vanhu vanongorima mbanje kuti ishandiswe mukurapa netsvagiridzo chete, kwete kuti vazopedzisira votengeserana munzvimbo dzavanogara. Izvi zvatsigirwawo naAmai Pretty Gambiza avo vatiwo vanotyira kuti vanhu vanozotadza kutevedzera zvinangwa chaizvo zvapa kuti kurimwa kwembanje munyika kubvumidzwe. Zimbabwe inyika yechipiri mudunhu reAfrica kubvumidza kurimwa kwembanje zviri pamutemo mushure meLesotho. Mbanje hachisi chinhu chitsva muZimbabwe sezvo ichirimwa kumaruwa, uye nzvimbo dzakaita seBinga, Mutoko neMt Darwin, dzichizivikanwa zvikuru nekurima mhando iyi yefodya. Dzimwe nyanzvi dzinoti Zimbabwe inogona kurima mbanje yekutengesera dzimwe nyika, izvo zvinogona kuunza mari yakawanda. Nyika dzakabudirira dzinotengesa mishonga inenge iine tetrahydrocannabinol, kana THC, iyo inobva mumbanje. Asi munhu anofanirwa kunyorerwa prescription nachiremba kuti atengeserwe. Matunhu anobvumidza kurimwa kwembanje muAmerica, akaita seMichigan, Oregon, California, Colorado nemamwe, akawana mari inoita mabhiriyoni manomwe emadhora kubva mumbanje yakatengeswa mugore ra 2016. Huwandu hwemari iyi hwakakwira nezvikamu makumi matatu nezvina kubva muzana pamari yakawanikwa muna 2015. Dunhu reOregon, iro rinogara muimbi wemuZimbabwe ane mukurumbira, Thomas Mapfumo, uye riine vanhu mamiriyoni mana, rakawana mari inodarika mazana matatu emamiriyoni emadhora mukutengeswa kwembanje. Bhizinesi rembanje rinowanisa vanhu vemuOregon zviuru gumi nezviri nechidimbu mabasa, vanhu vachibhadharwa madhora gumi nemaviri pa awa yega yega. Dunhu reMichigan riri kukurudzirwa nesangano re Coalition to Regulate Marijuana Like Alcohol, kuti ribvumidza kuputwa kwembanje zviri pamutemo nemunhu anenge aine makore makumi maviri nerimwe zvichikwira. Nyaya iyi iri kutarisirwa kuvhoterwa mudare remuMichigan muna Mbudzi. Kunyange hazvo mamwe matunhu emuAmerica achibvumidza kurimwa kwembanje zviri pamutemo, hurumende yaVaDonald Trump inoti pasi pemitemo yenyika yose, mbanje haibvumidzwe, izvo zviri kupa kuti mitemo iyi ipesane pakati pezvinodiwa nematunhu nezvinodiwa nehurumende yose. Matunhu emuAmerica ane kodzero yekuita mitemo yawo zvisina kupindira kwehurumende. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vanodarika Miriyoni Imwe Chete Vobayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 Kaviri muNyika
text: Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 munyika kechipiri sezviri kukurudzirwa vadarika miriyoni imwe chete kunyangwe poita mutauro panyaya yekuti vanhu vomanikidzwa kubayiwa nhomba here kana kuti kwete. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi mashanu nechimwe zvine mazana mana nemanomwe kana kuti 1, 851 407 vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kekutanga. Vamwe miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru zviviri nemazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu kana kuti 1002 261 vabayiwa nhomba kechipiri sezviri kukurudzirwa. Vanhu makumi maviri nemumwe kana kuti 21 vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 neMugovera zvasiya vanhu zviuru zvitatu nemazana masere nemakumi maviri nevatanhatu kana kuti 3, 826. Vanhu mazana mana nemakumi mana nevasere kana kuti 445 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi neMugovera wakare zvasiyawo vabatwa nacho vave zana negumi nemashanu zvine mazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe kana kuti 115, 890. Vanhu mazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe kana kuti 890 vakabatwa necchirwere ichi zvasiya vapora vave zviuru makumi masere nezvinomwe zvine mazana mana nagumi nevatanhatu kana kuti 87, 416.

headline: Musangano weUNGA Unozeya Nzara Pamwe neHutano
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmeron Mnangagwa vanyora neChishanu padandemutande ravo reTwitter vachiti musangano wavo wekutanga kuUnited Nations General Assembly muNew York wakafamba zvakanaka chose. Asi zviri kubuda kuUnited Nations zviri kuratidza kuti zvinhu zvakaomera sangano iri, uye pane nyaya dzehutano nezvekudya Zimbabwe inofanira kusunga dzisimbe. VaMnangagwa vanoti chinangwa chavo chaive chekuti Zimbabwe itange kudyidzana nedzimwe nyika uye kuti vatungamiri venyika idzi vashanyirewo Zimbabwe. Kunze kwevatungamiri ava, VaMnangagwa vanoti vakasanganawo nevemabhizimisi kuti vauye kuzotanga mabhizimisi muZimbabwe zvikuru vekuAmerica. VaMnangagwa vanoti misangano yavo yakafamba zvakanaka uye Zimbabwe yadzokera mugungano renyika dzepasi rino. Zimbabwe yakaonawo mupupuriri akanaka kubva kumutungamiri weRwanda, VaPaul Kagame, vanove sachigaro weAfrican Union. Mumashoko avo kuUnited Nations, VaKagame vakati Zimbabwe inoda rubatsiro kubva kunyika dzepasi rino. Asi vachitaura kumucheto wemusangano uyu, munyori anoona nezvekudyidzana nenyika dzemuAfrica muhurumende yeAmerica, VaTibor Nagy, vakati Zimbabwe inofanira kuvandudza mitemo yakaita saana AIPPA nanaPOSA uye vakati Zimbabwe inoziva zvairi kuda kunzi iite kuti itange kudyidzana neAmerica. KuUnited Nations kuri kubudawo nyaya yekuti zvinhu munyaya dzekurwisa chirwere cherurindi kana kuti TB haina kumira zvakanaka. Mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru weUnited Nations, Amai Anna Mohammed, vakanoti pagore, mari yekurwisa chirwere ichi iri kushomeka nemari inosvika mabhiriyoni gumi nematatu. Zimbabwe pari zvino iri kutatarika kuwana mari yekutenga mapiritsi ekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Rimwe dambudziko riri kubudawo kumusangano weUnited Nations inyaya yekuti vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni mazana masere nemakumi maviri nemumwe kana kuti munhu mumwe chete pavapfumbamwe anoziya nenzara. Vakawanda vakatarisana nenzara kunyanya muAfrica neSouth America. Nzara inonzi yatove nemakore matatu ichiwedzera. MuZimbabwe vanhu mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mana vakatarisana nenzara gore rinouya nekuda kwemhepo yeEl Nino iri kutarisirwa kukanganisa kunaya kwemvura. Musangano weUnited Nations uyu uri kupera musi wa 5 Gumiguru vatungamiri venyika vachitaura mudare reUnited Nations General Assembly uye vamwe vachiitawo misangano kumucheto wemusangano mukuru uyu. Imwewo nyaya yakasimudzwa kumusangano uyu ndeyezvinotarisirwa neUnited Nations kuti zviitwe nevechidiki. Munyori mukuru weUnited Nations VaAntonio Guterres vanoti vanoda kuti sangano ravo risimbaradze kushanda nevechidiki avo vanosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete mazana masere emamiriyoni pasi rose. Kuita izvi, VaGuterres vanoti kodzero dzevechidiki dzinofanira kuremekedzwa uye vachiwaniswa mikana. No media source currently available

headline: Mumwe Munhu Ofa neCovid-19 kuBulawayo, Vanodarika Zana Vachibatwa neChirwere Ichi muHarare
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwasvika pamazana maviri nevasere kana kuti 208 zvichitevera kufa kwemumwe munhu kuBulawayo neSvondo. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vasvika zviuru zvinomwe nezana rine gumi nevatanhatu kana kuti7, 116. NeSvondo vanhu zana nemakumi matatu nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 139 vakanzi vabatwa nechirwere ichi zana nemakumi maviri nevana kana kuti 124 vari vemuHarare. Asi bazi rezvehutano rinoti vamwe vanhu ava vainge vavhenekwa kare asi vasati vaziviswa zvainge zvabuda kwemazuva akati wandei. Vanhu vapora zviuru zvishanu nemazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nevatatu kana kuti 5, 373. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vakambotungamira chipatara chechitungwiza central hospital dr enoch mayida. zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana ma`viri kana kuti 1, 2 million vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Vafa vasvika zviuru makumi matatu nechimwe zvine makumi mashanu nevatanhatu kana kuti 31, 056. Vapora vadarika miriyoni imwe chete. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nematanhatu nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 26, 9 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana zvine mazana masere nemasere kana kuti 188,000. Vanhu vafa pasi rose vasvika zviuru mazana masere ane makumi masere kana kuti 880, 000. Vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nemanomwe ane zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 17, 9 million.

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vabatwa neCOVID-19 Munyika Hwave Makumi Matatu neVasere
text: Bazi rezvehutano nekuchengetwa kwakanaka kwevana rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwakwira kusvika pamakumi matatu nevasere zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwakaitwa munhu mumwe chete aine chirwere ichi muHarare nemusi weChina. Bazi iri razivisawo kuti vafa nechirwere ichi vachiri vana munyika yose, uye vapona kubva kuchirwere ichi vari gumi nevatatu. Izvi zvinobuda panguva iyo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kutarisirwa kuzivisa nezvekuti vari kuwedzera mazuva here kana kubvisa mutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu, kana kuti lockdown, uyo vakaderedza kuenda pachinhanho chepiri, kana kuti Level 2 masvondo maviri adarika. Mutemo uyu uri kutarisirwa kupera nemusi weSvondo. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica inoti vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose vadarika mamiriyoni mana nemazana mana ezviuru (4.4 million) uye vafa nechirwere ichi vasvika pazviuru mazana matatu nezvitatu nemazana matatu nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe (303 389). Gweta uye vari chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri ku Britain, Doctor Simba Mavaza, vanoti kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemunhu mumwe chete kunoratidza kuti chirwere ichi hachisati chadzika midzi munyika. Dctor Mavaza vanoti izvi zvinogona kunge zviri kukonzerwa nenyaya yekuti vanhu vari kutevedzera kurudziro yekuti vazvichengetedze, kana matanho ari kutorwa nehurumende ekuchengetedza kwavo voga vose vanenge vaponda munyika vachibva kunze. Panyaya yekuti mutungamiri wenyika owedzera here kana kubvisa mazuva ekusafambafamba kwevanhu, Doctor Mavaza vanoti vanofunga kuti VaMnangagwa vachavhura makambani ose uye kubvumidza vanhu kufambafamba sezvo pakatoiswa kare matanho anofanirwa kuteverwa nevemakambani mukuona kuti vashandi vavo vakadzivirirwa kubva kuchirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yocherechedza Zuva reVane Chirwere chePfungwa
text: Zimbabwe nhasi yabatana nedzimwe nyika kucherechedza zuva revane chirwere chepfungwa. Vachitaura pagungano rekucherechedza zuva iri kana kuti World Mental Health Day muHarare, mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, Doctor John Chamunorwa Mangwiro vati hurumende yakazvipira kubatsira vane chirwere ichi asiwo vachichema chema nekushandiswa kwezvinodhaka munyika izvo zvinonzi zvinowedzerawo dambudziko rechirwere chepfungwa. Mukuru wesangano rakazvimiririra reZimbabwe Obsessive Compulsive Disorder Zimbabwe (OCD) Trust, Amai Angelica Mukorongo, avo vane dambudziko rechirwere ichi vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vasadzikisira pasi vane zvirwere zvepfungwa vachiti zvakangofanana nezvimwe zvirwere. Amai Mukorongo vachemachemawo vachiti vazhinji vane zvirwere zvepfungwa havasi kuwana mishonga muzvipatara zvehurumende vakati dai hurumende yawanisa mishonga yezvirwere zvepfungwa pachena. Asi VaMangwiro vati hurumende ine hurongwa hwekuona kuti mishonga yezvirwere zvepfungwa yawanikwa zviri nyore munyika. Amai Babra Machando vanoshanda nesangano rinoona nezvehutano pasi rese reWorld Health Organisation vati dambudziko reCovid-19 rakawedzerawo kuwanda kwezvirwere zvepfungwa vachiti zvakakosha kuti vanhu ava vawane rubatsiro. Muzvare Batsirai Chiedza Muchochomi vanoshandawo nesangano rinobatsira vane zvirwere zvepfungwa rinonzi Insight Wellbeing vati dambudziko rechirwere chepfungwa rinobata munhu chero upi zvake vachitiwo zvakakosha kuti vanhu vazive kuti zvirwere izvi zvinorapika. Zuva reWorld Mental Health Day rinocherechedzwa musi wa 10 Gumiguru pasi rese. Mhemberero dzanhasi dzaitwa panine kurudziro yekuti pasi rese rikoshese hutano hwepfungwa. World Health Organization inoti muAfrica, vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemaviri kana kuti 792 million vane chirwere chepfungwa. No media source currently available

headline: Health Services Board Inoti Yawirirana navanaChiremba vari Kuramwa Mabasa
text: Bhodhi rezvehutano, reHealth Services Board, nezuro rakabudisa gwaro rinokurudzira kuti vana chiremba vari pakuramwa mabasa vadzoke kubasa, richiti hurumende yave kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavana chiremba ava. Asi mutungamiri wesangano ravanachiremba vezvipatara zvehurumende reHospital Doctors Association, Doctor Mloxisi Ngwenya varamba mashoko aya, vachiti hapana chati chatenderanwa uye vanachiremba havasi kuzodzokera pamabasa. Mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, Doctor Fortune Nyamande, vanoti sesangano, vanoshora zvikuru danho ratorwa nebhodhi rezvehutano iri rekutaura zvisina kuwiriranwa navachiremba Doctor Nyamande vanoti bhodhi iri ranga risingafanirwi kumhanyira kuenda kumapepanhau kunoshambadza kuti vawirirana, pane kuita zvinhu negwara kuti zvinonetsa zvigadziriswe. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vafa neCovid-19 muZimbabwe Vadarika Zana
text: Vanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika vave zana nevaviri kana kuti 104. MuHarare muri imo mune vanhu vakawandisa vafa nechirwere ichi vanosvika makumi mashanu nevashanu kana kuti 55. Bulawayo ndiyo iri kutevera pavanhu vafa vanosvika makumi maviri nevatatu. Dunhu reMasvingo chete ndiro risina kana munhu mumwe chete ati afa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika vadarika zviuru zvina nemazana mashanu ane makumi manomwe nemashanu kana kuti 4, 575. Vapora vachidarika chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mana ane gumi nevatanhatu kana kuti 1,416. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Brighton Chireka vanoti havo vanhu vazhinji vanopora kunyangwe vamwe vashoma vachida kuzoendeswa kuchipatara. No media source currently available Dr Chireka vatiwo kudziya muviri, kurutsa, kutonhorwa zvakanyanyisa, kubvunda nezvimwe munongedzo wekuti munhu anogona kunge abatwa nechirwere ichi. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Vafa vadarika zviuru makumi maviri nemaviri ane mazana mapfumbamwe nevatatu kana kuti 22, 903. Vanhu vapora vadarika zviuru mazana masere nemakumi maviri kana kuti 720, 000. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni gumi memapfumbamwe ane zviuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 19, 6 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana ne makumi matanhatu nemaviri kana kuti 162, 000. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vadarika zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi maviri nemanomwe ane mazana mashanu kana kuti 727,000. Vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nerimwe nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 11,9 million.

headline: Vana Mukoti Vanokanda Mapadza Pasi Vachiti Mari Dzavo Dziwedzerwe
text: Vana mukoti muzvipatara zvikuru zvehurumende zvakasiyana-siyana munyika vatanga kuramwa mabasa neChishanu vachiti vanoda kuti hurumende ihadzirise zvichemo zvavo. Kuramwa mabasa uku kunoitika panguva iyo vana chiremba vadarika masvondo maviri vachiramwawo mabasa. Vana mukoti vanodarika zviuru gumi nezvitanhatu munyika mose vakanda mapadza avo pasi vachiti hurumende iri kuramba ichivabata kumeso pazvichemo zvavo, izvo yakavimbisa kugadzirisa makore akawanda apfuura. Vana mukoti ava vanoti vari kuramwa mabasa kwete senzira yekutsigira vana chiremba avo vava nemazuva gumi nematanhatu vachiramwa mabasa, asi kuti ivo vane zvichemo zvavowo zvisiri kugadziriswa nehurumende, zvavanoda kuti zvigadziriswe nechimbi chimbi. Vana mukoti vari kuda kuti mari dzavanotambira dziwedzerwe, uye mashandiro avo agadziriswe kuitira kuti vashande zvine chiremera, pamwe nekuti muzvipatara muve nemishonga uye zvikwanisiro zvinoita kuti vashande nemazvo. Sachigaro weZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vati ichokwadi kuti nhengo dzavo zhinji dzaramwa mabasa kuitira kuti zvichemo zvavo zvigadziriswe nehurumende. Vati hurumende iri kutaura navo nechinangwa chekugadzirisa zvichemo izvi. Asi vati zvinenge zvavimbiswa nehurumende zvichazeyiwa nesangano ravo voona matanho ekutora. Pashanyira Studio7 zvipatara zvemuBulawayo, vana mukoti vanga vachidzokera kudzimba dzavo mangwanani, pasina basa ravaita. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association muBulawayo, VaSimangaliso Mafa, vaudza Studio 7 vati hapana zvakawanda zvavange vachikwanisa kutaura pamusoro pezvekuramwa mabasa uku sezvo vange vachipinda mumusangano patavabata parunhare. Sangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions raburitsa gwaro rinoshora gurukota rezvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa, richiti VaParirenyatwa vanofanirwa kusiya basa nekuti varatidza kukundikana kugadzirisa matambudziko munyaya dzezvehutano. Munyori mukuru weWomen’s Committee muZCTU, Amai Barbara Tanyanyiwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti sangano ravo rinotsigira kuramwa mabasa kwemadhokotera navana mukoti vachiti zvakakosha kuti vapiwe mugove wavo wakafanira. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuna Dr Parirenyatwa kana kuhurumende panyaya iyi. Asi hurumende inoti haina mari yekugadzirisa zviri kudiwa nebazi rezvehutano. Vanhu vakawanda vanoti kuramwa basa kwemadhokotera navana mukoti mabasa kuri kuisa hupenyu hweveruzhinji munjodzi vachiti hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa nyaya iyi nekukasika. Mumwe mugari wemuBulawayo uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Takunda ati ange aperekedza sekuru vake kuRichard Morris Hospital chikamu chechipatara cheUnited Bulawayo Hospital panorapwa vanhu maziso, asi ati vatadza kuwana rubatsiro. Nhengo yekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, VaDingilizwe Tshuma, avo vanomirira Entumban/Emakhandeni mudare reparamende, vati nhengo dzeparamende dzinogara dzichitaura kuti hurumende igadzirise matambudziko akatarisana nebazi rezvehutano. Mumiriri we Bulawayo Central mudare reparamende, Amai Dorcas Sibanda,vatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kukoshesa kugadzirisa matambudziko munyaya dzezvehutano pamwe nedzidzo munyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti vana mukoti vari kuramwa mabasa ava vari kuwedzera matambudziko akatarisana nevarwere munyika yose, sezvo vana chiremba vanodarika chiuru chimwe chete, vari kuramwawo mabasa. No media source currently available

headline: Nyika Inovharwa kweMazuva Makumi Matatu Ichirwisa Covid-19
text:
Vanhu vakawanda vatevedzera kurudziro yehurumende yekuti vanhu varemekedze mutemo weNational Lockdown Level Four uyo achange uripo kwemazuva makumi matatu. Asi vakawanda vari kuchemachema nerekuti hurongwa uhu huchavasiya vari munzara.

Veruzhinji muBulawayo vagara kudzimba dzavo pakutanga kwelockdown
nhasi uye nzvimbo dzakawanda dzinosive dzakazara vanhu mudhorobha
dzange dziine vanhu vashoma-shoma kusanganisira kunoziikanwa kunzi
kuMarket muna Fifth Avenue.

Pange paine ma roadblock mumigwagwa yakawanda inopinda mudhorobha uye vamwe vanhu vange vachida kupinda mudhorobha vasina magwaro anodiwa vange vachidzorerwa kumba. Asi vamwe vataura neStudio7 vati izvi zvange zvichiitwa nenzira yakanaka pasina kutyisidzira kana kuvhundutsira vanhu kunosiitwa nemapurisa nemasoja panguva dzakadai.

Vakawanda vange vachichema-chema vachiti pane kuti hurumende iise
lockdown zviri nani kuti iite zvose zvainogona kuti vanhu vatevedzere
zvinotaurwa nenyanzvi dzezvehutano pakudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19.

Mumwe ane chitoro chinotengesa zvakasiyana-siyana mudhorobha uyo
angoda kuzvidoma nezita rekuti Moyo ati kuvharwa kuchasiya
vakawanda vari munzara.

Mumwe anorarama nekutengesa zvirimwa zvakasiyana-siyana paMarket,
VaTyson Shumba, vati vanonzwisisa kuti sei hurumende yakaisa mutemo
wekuvharwa kwenyika asi vati ivo semumwe wevanhu vanozvishandira, shuviro yavo ndeyekuti dai hurumende yakavapa mukana wekuti varambewo vachishanda.

Mumwe anorarama nekutengesa, Amai Memory Gaviro, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanhukadzi kunyanya ndivo vanonyanya kuomerwa nekushaiswa mukana wekuita mabasa avo nekuda kwekuvharwa kwenyika. Vati vanhu vakawanda vanogona kufa nenzara sezvo pasina matanho akatorwa nehuruemende ekuti ape veruzhinji vanotambura mari yerubatsiro panguva yelockdown.

Mumwewo mugari, VaFarai Zowa, vati kunyange hazvo vachibvuma kuti
mitemo iyi inoomesera veruzhinji, zvakakosha kuti ivepo senzira yekuedza
kurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 icho choramba chichikura munyika nepasi
rose.

Mudzidzisi wezvidzidzo zvepamusoro zvehupfumi uye vari muongorori
akazvimirira, VaFelix Chari, vati nekuda kwekuti hupfumi hwenyika
hwagara husina kumira zvakanaka, Lockdown Level Four ichawedzera kutambura kweveruzhinji. Vati zvange zviri nani kuti hurumende isimudzire dzimwe nzira dzekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi.

Mutauriri wemutungamiri weMDC T, VaWitmess Dube, vati bato ravo riri
kushushikana nekutekeshera kwechirwere cheCovid 19 munyika uyewo kuti chave kubata vechidiki. Vati dai hurumende yawana dzimwe nzira dzekurwisa chirwere vachitiwo
vanhu vanozvishandira pachavo vega vanofanirwa kubvumidzwa kuramba
vachishanda.

Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vashora hurumende vachiti maitiro ayakaita lockdown anoomesera
veruzhinji.

Gurukota revashandi pamwe nekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu, VaPaul Mavima, vabvuma kuti hurumende yange isati yatora danho rekupa
vamwe veruzhinji vanotambura mari yerubatsiro nekuti lockdown yerwendo
rwuno yakaitwa nechimbi-chimbi. Asi vati nekuda kwekuti lockdown inogona kuvepo kwenguva yakareba bazi ravo riri mushishi kutaura nebazi rezvemari kuti rubatsiro urwu rupiwe kuvanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inotara Coronavirus seDambudziko Guru Rakatarisana neNyika
text: Hurumende yatara chirwere cheCoronavirus sedambudziko guru rabata nyika yose, kana kuti National Disaster, uye ndokukanzura zvirongwa zvakawanda zvinosangana vanhu vakawanda senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Vachitaura nevatori venhau kuState House, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vati vaona zvakakodzera kutora matanho aya nekuti nyika inogona kuwirwa nedambudziko reCoronavirus sezvo ratove munyika dzakavakidzana nayo dzakaita seSouth Africa. Vati kutara Coronavirus sedambudziko renyika yese kunoita kuti nyika ikwanise kuunganidza mari, nezvimwe zvinodiwa kurwisana nechirwere ichi. Vati hurongwa uhwu huchange huchitungamirrwa nebazi rezvehutano. VaMnangagwa vati zvipatara zvese munyika zvave kutarisirwa kugara zvakagadzirira kuongorora pamwe nekurapa chirwere ichi. Vatiwo hurumende iri kugadzira nzvimbo dzakawanda dzekuchengetera vanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vane hutachiwana hweCoronavirus. VaMnangagwa vati vese vari kuronga kuenda kunyika dzine chirwere ichi vanofanira kumbomira nzendo dzavo kudzamara zvinhu zvadzikama. Vatiwo hurumende yambomisa zvirongwa zvinounganidza vanhu vakawanda zvakaita seZimbabwe International Trade Fair nemhemberero dzekucherechedza zuva rekuwana kuzvitonga idzo dzange dzichifanirwa kuitwa mwedzi unouya. Zimbabwe yakanzurawo mitambo pamwe nekukurudzira kusaungana kwevanhu pamichato pamwe nedzisvondo kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire. VaMnangagwa vati hurumende ichazoongorora danho iri mukati memazuva makumi matanhatu ari kutevera. Panyaya yezvikoro, VaMnangagwa vati sezvo pasina kana mumwe chete abatwa nechirwere ichi, zvikoro zvicharamba zvakavhurwa sezvo zvave pedyo nekuvhara asi vakati hurumende ichaongorora danho iri kana pane zvinenge zvaitika. Vatiwo mahofisi ese ehurumende anofanira kuchitanga kuongorora kuti vanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vane hutachiwana hweCoronavirus. Vati kunyange vatora matanho aya nzvimbo dzese dzekupinda nadzo munyika dzicharamba dzakavhurwa asi vakati vachasimbaradza nzira dzekuongorora vanhu vanobva kune dzimwe nyika zvikuru sei kunyika dzine hutachiwana uhwu. Vati vanhu vanofanira kuchinja maitiro nekuregedza kuita zvimwe zvinhu senzira yekuzvidzivirira kubva kuCoronavirus. Vatiwo kunyange hazvo pasina ati abatwa nechirwere ichi, chave kutokanganisa nyaya dzehupfumi munyika zvekuti nyika inogona kutadza kubata zviga zvayo zveVision 2030. Chirwere cheCoronavirus chauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvinomwe nekubata vanodarika zana nemakumi masere ezviuru pasi rose. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yotambira neMufaro Kupihwa Mvumo yeKushandiswa kweNhomba yeSinopharm neWHO
text: World Health Organization kana kuti WHO nemusi weChishanu yakapa mvumo nhomba yeSinopharm yekuChina, iyo iri kushandiswa muZimbabwe, kuti ishandiswe nechimbi chimbi kana kuti "Emergency use authorization" Mukuru anoona nezvekurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 munyika Doctor Agnes Mahomva vanoti vari kufara kuti Sinopharm yapihwa mvumo yekushanda zvakagara zvaonekwa nenyanzvi dzemuZimbabwe dzakakurudzira kuti ibayiwe vanhu. Zimbabwe yakatanga kushandisa nhomba iyi muna Kukadzi payakapihwa nhomba dzinosvika zviuru mazana maviri neChina. No media source currently available Iyi ndiyo nhomba yekutanga isiri kubva kunyika dzekumawirira kupihwa mvumo yakadai. Izvi zvave kureva kuti Sinopharm yave kupinda pachirongwa cheCOVID-19 Vaccines Global Access kana kuti COVAX chekubatsira nyika dzichiri kubudirira nenhomba. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano vari nhengo yeMDC Alliance Dr Henry Madzorera vanoti vanhu vange vachizengurira kubayiwa nhomba iyi vave kuchifanira kurega kutya sezvo yatambirwa neWHO. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rinoti nemusi weSvondo hakuna munhu akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya huwandu hwevafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira huchiri pachiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe nevatanhatu, 1 576. Vanhu gumi nemumwe vakabatwawo nechirwere ichi neSvondo zvekare izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi pazviuru makumi matatu nezvisere nemazana mana negumi nevana kana kuti 38 414. Vamwe vanhu gumi nemumwe vakaporawo zvasiya vapora vave zviuru makumi matatu nematanhatu nemakumi mashanu nevaviri kana kuti 36, 052. Vanhu vachiri kurwara munyika vave mazana manomwe nemakumi masere nevatanhatu kana kuti 786. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa kuti kusvika musi weSvondo vanhu vabayiwa nhomba munyika yose vainge vava zviuru mazana mashanu nepfumbamwe nemazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nevana kana kuti 509, 274. Pavanhu ava, vabayiwa nhomba kaviri sezvinokurudzirwa vave zviuru zana nemakumi mana nevasere nemazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nevana kana kuti 148, 564. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi senzira yekumisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi.

headline: Africa Yotadza Kusvitsa Zvikamu Zvakatarwa neWHO zveVanhu Vabayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 Gore Rino Risati Rapera
text: Sangano reWorld Health Organisation-WHO-rinoti nyika dzakawanda dzemuAfrica kusanganisira Zimbabwe dziri kutadza kubaya nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 kusvika pazvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana gore rino risati rapera sezvanga zvakatarwa nesangano iri. Vachitaura nezuro pamusangano we International Conference Public Health in Africa, mukuru weWHO, Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, vakati nyika makumi mana nesere panyika makumi mashanu neina dziri muAfrica dzichatadza kubaya zvizvarwa zvadzo zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana sezvanga zvakatarwa neWHO. Dr Tedros vakati rimwe dambudziko riri kuitika mudunhu reAfrica nderekuti nyika idzi hadzisi kuburitsa huwandu hwechokwadi hwevanhu vari kufa kana kurwara nechirwere cheCovid-19. Mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, Va Itai Rusike, vanoti kusabuda nehuwandu chaihwo hwevanhu vari kubatwa neCovid-19 zvinokonzerwa nekuti munyika hamuna zvikwanisiro zvemhando yepamusoro zvekuongorora kuti munhu ane Covid-19 here kana kuti kwete. VaRusike vanoti zvimwe zviri kutadzisa nyika dzemuAfrica kusanganisira Zimbabwe kubaya vanhu vakawanda idambudziko rekushandisa nhomba dzinobayiwa kaviri pamwe nekusawana kweveruzhinji ruzivo rwechokwadi nenguva. Mukuru munyaya dzekurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 munyika, Dr Agnes Mahomva, vanoti sehurumende vachiri vakatarisira kuti vachabaya vanhu zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana sezviri kukurudzira neWHO vachiti vachazobvuma kuti vatadza musiwa 31 Zvita 2021 wapfuura. Kusvika pakupera kwezuva nezuro, Zimbabwe yakazivisa kuti yakange yabaya nhomba yekutanga vanhu mamiriyoni mana nezviuru makumi maviri nezvitatu negumi nevatu (4 023 013). Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba mbiri kusvika mukupera kwezuva nezuro vainge vava mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu nezana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri, (3 035 192). WHO inoti vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni makumi manomwe nemanomwe, kana kuti zvikamu zvisere chete kubva muzana vakabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 muAfrica yose. Zimbabwe yakwanisa kubaya zvikamu gumi nezvipfumbamwe kubva muzana, zvinoreva kuti mumazuva gumi nemana asara kuti gore ripere, Zimbabwe inofanirwa kubaya vanhu zvikamu makumi maviri nechimwe kubva muzana, kana kuti 21%, unova mutoro mukuru pakatariswa nguva yatorwa kuti isvika pazvikamu gumi nezvipfumbamwe kubva muzana, kana kuti 19%. Zimbabwe inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Veruzhinji Vokurudzirwa Kutsigira Hurumende Kuita Mabasa eKurwisa Covid-19
text: Apo huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa kana kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 huri kuramba huchikwira, vemakereke vanoti vari kushanda zvakasimba vachirwisa kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, kuburikidza nekuwanisa zvipatara zvemachechi zvikwanisiro, mvura pamwe nekupa dzidziso kune veruzhinji pamusoro pedenda iri. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Council of Churches, Reverend Kenneth Mtata, vanoti basa guru riri kuitwa nemakereke kugadzirisa zvipatara zvemachechi, izvo vanoti zvakawanda kumaruwa, kuwanisa zvipatara izvi mvura yakachena, kuwanisa vashandi vemuzvipatara zvipfeko zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere ichi, pamwe nekuwanisa vanhu zvekudya munguva ino ye lockdown. Reverend Mtata, avo vakaita zvidzidzo zvepamusoro soro zvePhD munyaya dzezvidzidzo zvebhaibheri, vanoti nyaya yakatarisana nenyika yedenda reCovid-19 haichisiri nyaya ingangonzi ingasiirwa kuhurumende chete, asi kuti yave nguva yekuti munhu wese pamwe nemasangano vawane chavangaisa mukubatsiridza kuti zvinhu zvirerukire nyika. Panyaya yekuti nyika yakagadzirira here kupa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19, Reverend Mtata vanoti pasi rose nyika zhinji hadzina kugadzirira, kusanganisirawo dzakaita seAmerica, hadzinawo kugadzirira pakugoverwa kwenhomba idzi, kusanganisirawo Zimbabwe. Munyika mune vamwe vemakereke vanonzi vari kukurudzira nhengo dzavo kuti dzisazotora nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19, asi munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Council of Churches ava vanoti vemakereke ava havafanirwe kutsvaga mbiri nekushambadza mashoko asina humbowo. Vanoti zvinozivikanwa pasi rose kuti nhomba dzinogona kukonzerawo mamwe matambudziko pamunhu, asi vachiti zvinozivikanwawo cjose kuti nhomba dzinoponesa. Reverend Mtata vanoti vemakereke ava vanofanirwa kutobatsira mukushanda pamwe kuburikidza nekusvitsawo pfungwa dzavo kuti dzishandiswe, uyewo kuti ivo kana vasingade kupiwa nhomba idzi vanofanirwa kusiya vanoda zvavo vachibaiwa. No media source currently available

headline: Muzinda weZimbabwe kuBotswana Woshanda Nguva Pfupi neNyaya yeCovid-19
text: Muzinda weZimbabwe uri muBotswana wave kuvandudza mashandiro nekuda kwekupararira zvakanyanya kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika iyi paine kurudziro yekuti vanhu vashandisewo madandemutande nembozhanhare. Vanoona nezve kuburitswa kwemashoko pamuzinda weZimbabwe muBotswana, VaFrancis Chimina vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti iri nderimwe danho rekuderedza mazuva ekushanda kubva pamashanu kusvika pamana pavhiki nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Pataenda pamhepo, VaChimhina vange vasati vakwanisa kupa Studio 7 huwandu hwezvizvazvarwa zveZimbabwe zvafa nechirwere ichi muBotswana . Asi muchiziviso chakaburitswa nemuzinda uyu, vanoda rubatsiro rwekuti vakwanise kutakura mufi kubva kuBotswana kuenda kuZimbabwe vanofanira kuita zvekutumira mapepa anodikwana panharembozha vachishandisa WhatsApp panhamba dzinoti 2677 196 7240 ndinodzokorora zvakare nhamba idzi 267 7 196 72470. Kana munhu achida kuendesa mutumbi kuZimbabwe panodiwa magwaro kana kuti copy anoti rerufu, death certificate, gwaro rekufambisa, passport, tsamba yekuratidza kuti mugtumbi hauna chirwere chinogona kutapurirwa vapenyu, tsamba yekuti mutumbi wachengetedzwa kuti usaore uye kune vanenge vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19, vanofanira kuiswa mubhokisi risingavhurike kana kuti zinc-hermatically filled coffin. Izvi zvinodiwa nenyika yeBotswana zvekare. Asi pane vanoda kuradzika hurumende muBotswana panodiwa gwaro rerufu, gwaro rekufambisa kana chitupa uye gwaro rekufambisa rehama yepedyo. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinorarama nechamuka inyama muguta reGaborone, VaEken Tendai Chidarikire vaudza Studio7 kuti hurongwa uhu huri kuomesera zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara munyika iyi. Vanotiwo dai muzinda weZimbabwe watsvaga dzimwe nzira dzekubatsira nadzo vanhu nokuti vakasadaro ruzhinji rwuchatsvaga nzira dzekuendesa Asi chimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinogara muguta reGaborone VaHoward Munemo vanoti danho ratorwa nemuzinda weZimbabwe muBotswana idanho rakanaka kwazvo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano hweruzhinji uye vari mukoti pachipatara chikuru cheNyangabgwe Referral Hospital muguta reFrancistown, Muzvare Jestina Mayambutse vanoti vanhu vanofanira kuziva kuti hutachiona hunokonzera COVID-19 hunogona kutapuriranwa nekugamuchidzana mapepa chaiwo. Botswana ine vanhu zviuru zana nematanhatu zvine mazana matanhatu ne makumi mapfumbabwe (106, 690) vakabatwa nechirwere icho chauraya vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 1, 569. Mizinda yenyika dzakawanda pasi rose iri kuderdza huwandu hwevashandi mukuyedza kumisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vana Vane Chirwere cheMoyo Vanombonorapwa kuItaly Vofira muNyika neKutadziswa Kufamba neCovid-19
text: Apo pasi rose riri kutarisana nekurwisa chirwere charura cheCovid-19, zvimwe zvirwere zvakaita sezvemoyo zvikuru muvana vadiki zvasara zvisina ari kunyatsozvirapa izvo zvoisa vana vakawanda munyika munjodzi huru vamwe vachifa. Vabereki vevana vane chirwere ichi vanonziwo vanogona kutangawo kurwara nepfungwa sezvo basa rekuvariritira rakaoma. Chimwe chirongwa chakanganiswa nedenda iri ndechekuenda kwevana vemuZimbabwe kuItaly kunorapwa chirwere chemaburi pamoyo kana kuti Congenital Heart Disease-CHD. Vanachiremba vekuItaly vanoenda kuchipatara cheRoman Catholic cheAll Soul’s Mission kwaMutoko uko vanosarudza vana vanenge vari munjodzi huru vovaendesa kuItaly. Vanachiremba ava vanoshandawo nemamwe masangano akaita sereBrave Little Hearts. Sangano reBrave Little Hearts rakaumbwa naAmai Tendai Moyo wekuBulawayo avo vakashaikirwa nemwana wavo Rudorwashe aiva nechirwere cheCHD ichi. Sangano iri rinounza pamwe chete vabereki vane vana vane denda iri kuti vapangane mazano. Mumwe mubereki ane mwana akashaya ave nemakore maviri nekukundikana kunorapwa kuItaly gore rapera nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 ndi Amai Angelina Manda vaudza Studio 7 nezvekurwadziwa kwavari kuita nekurasikirwa nemwana. Vachitaura nezvematambudziko evabereki vari kurwarirwa, Amai Tendai Chatikobo, vanotungamirira sangano reBrave Little Hearts muHarare vati zvinhu zvakaoma kuchengeta mwana ane chirwere chemoyo ichi. Amai Chatikobo, avo vanemwana anemakore matatu ane denda remwoyo iro risingakwanisike kugadzirika, vati maoparesheni aya aisimboitwa kuzvipatara zvehurumende zviri munyika kare asi ikozvino hakuchina vanachiremba vakawanda vanokwanisa kuvarapa. Vashoma varipo vanodhurawo zvakanyanya. Vatiwo Covid-19 yakavhiringidza hurongwa hwavo uye kuda kuzviita munyika kunodhura. Studio 7 yataurawo nemumwe mubereki VaTatenda Katayi vanoti havo vakaita rombo rakanaka sezvo mwana wavo akakwanisa kuenda kuItaly muna 2019 Covid isati yatanga. Vati vari kufarawo kuti mwana wavo ave kukwanisa kuenda kuchikoro nevamwe. Asi vamwe vabereki vanonzi vanonoka kuendesa vana kunorapwa nekushaya ruzivo vachifunga kuti vange varoyiwa. Amai Moyo vanova vakavamba sangano reBrave Little Hearts vati kune mhando makumi mana ematenda emoyo asi denda remaburi epamoyo rakawanda munyika uyezve rinokwanisa kurapika rikakurumidzirwa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Josephat Chiripanyanga vaudza Studio 7 kuti vana vese vanozvarwa vaine maburi aya asi anovhara pavanenge vasungunukwa, asi vakati pane dzimwe nguva anotadza kuvhara. Vanoti vana ava vanozokura vave nedambudziko rokuzarirwa nekuneta uye vasingakure vaine huremu hunoendera nemakore avo. Mukuru weAll Souls Mission Hospital Dr Massimo Migani vati ichokwadi kuti chirongwa chokuendesa vana kuItaly kuti vanoitwa maoparesheni chakambomiswa asi vanotarisira kuti chinogona kusimudzirwa kupera kwegore rino kana kutanga kwegore rinouya. Kubva muna 1985 vana vanodarika mazana mana vaenda kunorapwa kuItaly. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Vofa Munjodzi Dziri Kuitika Husiku paZororo reKisimusi
text: Mutauriri wemapurisa Chief Supritendant Paul Nyathi vari kukurudzira vatyairi kuti vafambe kwakachena nekuti husiku kwave kuitika njodzi dzakawandisa mumigwagwa pazororo rino rekisimusi izvo zvapa kuti vanhu makumi matanhatu nevana vashaye. Mapurisa anoti vatyairi pachezvavo ndivo vari kukonzerawo njodzi nekusatevedzera mitemo yemumigwagwa. Dunhu reMasvingo ndiro rine vanhu vakawanda vashaya avo vari kusvika gumi nevashanu, kuchitevera Matebelalnd South ine gumi, kwouya Harare ne Mashonaland East dzine vanhu vasere vashaya. Mashonaland Central ine munhu mumwe chete. Vanhu vafa pazororo rekisimusi gore rino vakawandisa kudarika gore rapera apo pakafa vanhu makumi mashanu nevatanhatu. Vanhu mazana mana nemakumi mana nevatatu vashaya zvichienzaniswa nevanhu mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevana gore rapera. No media source currently available

headline: Vechidiki Votaura Zvimhingamupinyi Zvavanosangana Nazvo Munyaya dzeHIV/AIDS
text: Kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe ichiverengwa pane dzimwe nyika dziri kukwanisa kurwisa HIV/Aids pamwe nekupa dzidziso pamusoro pekudzivirira zvirwere zvepabonde uye kuronga mhuri, vamwe vechidiki vanoti zvakaomera vakawanda vavo kuti vade kuongororwa ropa ravo, kurapwa zvirwere zvepabonde kana kutsvaga zvekudzivirira zvirwere izvi. Izvi zvakabuda pamusangano weAdolescent Sexual and Reproductive Health Dialogue wakaitwa muBulawayo munguva pfupi yapfuura nesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health nevamwe vechidiki, wekuzeya kuongororwa ropa, kutsvaga ruzivo rwekuronga mhuri, pamwe nerwekuzvidzivirira kwevechidiki kubva kuzvirwere zvepabonde kwevechidiki. Mumwe mukomana anoda kungoziikanwa nezita rekuti Everson, ndemumwe wevechidiki vari muBulawayo, vanodzidzisa vamwe vavo nezveHIV/AIDS, kuronga mhuri pamwe nekudzivirira zvirwere zvepabonde. Everson anoti nyaya yekuti muzvipatara nemumakiriniki hamuna vanamukoti vakakwana ndeimwe inoita kuti vechidiki vakawanda vatadze kuongororwa ropa ravo, kutsvaga ruzivo rwekuronga mhuri pamwe nerwekuzvidzivirira kubva kuzvirwere zvepabonde. Everson anotiwo vechidiki vanotya kubuda pachena panyaya dzine chekuita nezvepabonde nekuda kwekuti vanonyara kutaura nevanhu vanenge vari kumakiriniki kana dzimwe nzvimbo dzavanogona kuongororwa ropa ravo kana kuwana ruzivo rwekuronga mhuri pamwe nerwekuzvidzivirira kubva kuzvirwere zvepabonde. Mumwe musikana wechidiki, Muzvare Natasha Shoko, vanobvumirana nemaonero aya vachiti vechidiki vanoona vana mukoti vakawanda sevanhu vanovasarura vasingakwanise kuvanzwisisa kunyanya panyaya dzine chekuita nezvedzidziso yekudzivirira zvirwere zvepabonde kana kuronga mhuri. VaWatson Chiwambo ndemumwezve mukomana wechidiki anoitawo zvekudzidzisa vamwe vezera rake nezveHIV/AIDS. VaChiwambo vanoti mutemo wekuti vechidiki vari pasi pemakore gumi nematanhatu havakwanise kuenda kuzvipatara kana makiriniki vari vega unokanganisa vechidiki munyaya dzekurwisa HIV/AIDS nzvimwe zvirwere zvepabonde uye kusimudzira ruzivo rwekuronga mhuri. Mumwe wechidiki anoita zvekurwira kodzero dzevechidiki, Muzvare Bertha Nyoni, vanobvumawo kuti mutemo uyu unokanganisa vechidiki. VaNhlanhla Moyo vanoshanda nesangano reYoung People’s Network mubazi reSexual and Reproductive Health. VaNhlanhla vanoti kunyange hazvo chingave chokwadi kuti vechidiki vanosangana nematambudziko akawanda mukeudza kuwana ruzivo pamwe nekurapwa HIV/Aids nezvirwere zvepabonde uye kuronga mhuri, vanoti vechidiki vanofanirwa kuzvipira kuenda kunzvimbo dzinoita izvi. Murongi wemabasa nesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaMongi Khumalo, vanoti zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji, kunyanya vechidiki pachavo, vazeye nezvenyaya iyi senzira yekupedza matambudziko avanosngana nawo panyaya dzine chekuita nezvedzidziso yekudzivirira zvirwere zvepabonde kana kuronga mhuri. Munguva pfupi yapfuura, sangano reUNAIDS rakaburitsa gwaro rinoratidza kuti vechidiki vemuZimbabwe, kunyanya vari pakati pemakore gumi nemashanu nemakumi maviri nemashanu havanyanyofarira kunogororwa ropa ravo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzeHIV/Aids dzinoti kurwisa denda iri kungabudirira chete kana veruzhinji vakaziva mamiriro ehutano hwavo. No media source currently available

headline: Komisheni Inoona zveKodzero Yoshushikana neKushomeka kweVanhu Vaongororwa Chirwere cheCOVID-19 Kusvika Nhasi
text: Komisheni inoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu yeZimbabwe Human Rights Commission, inoti iri kushushikana nehuwandu hwevanhu vaongororwa kana vaine chirwere che COVID-19 munyika kusvika pari zvino. Komisheni iyi inoti vanhu zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevana vanozi vainge vaongororwa kusvika musi wa30 Kurume, vaive vashoma zvikuru pachitariswa zviuru zvevanhu zvakapinda munyika kubva pakatanga chirwere ichi kuChina gore rapera. Mugwaro rayakaburitsa neChitatu, Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission inotiwo iri kukurudzira hurumende kuti ipe dzidziso pamusoro peCoronavirus mundimi dzakasiyanasiyana, kusanganisirawo mutauro wemaoko kana kuti Sign Language, senzira yekuti veruzhinji vabatsirikane. Komisheni iyi inotiwo hurumende iri kunonoka kuita kuti kuongororwa kwevanhu kuti vane hutachiwana here kana kuti kwete kuitwe mumatunhu ose emunyika, kwete kuti kungoitwa muHarare chete. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi sezvo gurukota rebazi rinoona nezvekomisheni iyi, reMitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vanga vasiri kubatika panharembozha yavo. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu, uye vaive mukuru weZimRights, VaOkay Machisa, vanoti vanobvumirana nemaonero eZimbabwe Human Rights Commission ekuti vanhu vaongororwa vashoma kwazvo pachitariswa huwandu hwevanhu vanopinda munyika nepamiganho yenyika yose, kusanganisirawo nhandare dzendege. Panyaya yekuti shambadzo iitwe nemitauro yose inocherechedzwa munyika, VaMachisa vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutevera zviri mubumbiro renyika panyaya yemitauro, yoshambadza mashoko kuvanhu vose. Vanotiwo nyaya yekuti matunhu ose akwanise kuongorora vanhu kana vaine hutachiwana hweCoronavirus, vanoti zvakakosha chose kuti matunhu ose awaniswe mukana wekuita ongororo idzi. Pari zvino chipatara cheSally Mugabe Hospital muHarare ndicho chete chiri kuita ongororo dzechirwere cheCOVID-19 munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoti Yabvisa Zvipingaidzo Zvanga Zvichikonzera Mitsetse Mirefu Munzvimbo Dziri Kubayiwa Vanhu Nhomba dzeCovid-19
text: Hurumende inoti vakoti muzvipatara nemakirinika vanofanirwa kunge vachiita basa rebaya vanhu nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 chete kwete kunyora makhadhi nekuvabya sezvavari kuita pari zvino ichiti ndizvo zviri kupa kuti mitsetse irambe yakareba munzvimbo idzi. Vachitaura mushure mekushanyira mamwe makirinika ekanzuru yeHarare ari kubaya nhomba dzeCovid-19 mumisha yeBudiriro neMufakose vaine mumiriri weUnicef muZImbabwe, Dr Tajudeen Oyewale, mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, Dr John Mangwiro, vati vave kupedza dambudziko iri nekupinza vana bharani vachaita basa rekunyora makadhi chete kuitira kuti vakoti vaite basa rekubaya chete. Vati kufamba kwavaita mumakirinika nhasi kwavaratidza kuti basa rekubaya vanhu harisi kafamba sezvinotaririsirwa nekuti vakoti, avo vanotove vashoma, vanopedza nguva vachinyora makadhi pachinhambo chekubaya vanhu. VaMangwiro vatiwo munhu wese anenge aenda pakirinika kana chipatara chipi zvacho anofanira kubaiwa nhomba yaanoda kwete kuudzwa kuti tiri kubaya nhomba yekutanga kana yepiri chete sezviri kuitika pane dzimwe nzvimbo dziri kubaiwa vanhu. Vati nhomba dzirimo munyika nekudaro vanhu ngavabaiwe. Dr Oyewale vati vaona kuti pane gwanza rinoda kuvharwa kutira kuti vakoti vaite basa rekubaya vanhu chete uye vatiwo vanhu vemunharaunda vanofanira kubatsira vakoti kuti vabaiwe nekukasika. Mukuru wezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Dr Prosper Chonzi, vati kunyange hazvo paine matambudziko pano nepapo, huwandu hwevanhu vari kubaiwa nhomba mumakirinika avo huri kukwira zvekuti kiririnika inobaya vanhu vashoma inobaya vanhu vanodarika zana nemakumi mashanu uye dzimwe dzave kubaya vanhu vanodarika mazana matatu pazuva. Asi vagari vemuBudiriro neMufakose vati nzvimbo dzinobairwa vanhu dzinofanirwa kuwedzerwa sezvo dziri shoma. Amai Yvone Katiyo Studio7 vatiwo vakoti vepaMufakose Family Health Care vashoma izvi zviri kupa kuti vawandirwe nevanhu. Mumwe mudzimai ati anonzi Mai Ticha audza Studio7 kuti kuti vangadai vakabaiwa nhomba yepiri musi wa11 Nyamavhuvhu asi izvi zviri kutadza kuitika nekuti vanhu vari kuda kubaiwa vawandisa. Vanhu munzvimbo zhinji munyika vave kuvata pamitsetse yekubaiwa nhomba dzeCovid-19 sezvo makambani akawanda nehurumende vave kuti vasina kubaiwa vave kunzi vasaenda kumabasa kana kurambidzwa kuita zvinhu zvakaita sekushandisa mabhazi ehurumende. Zimbabwe inoti ine hurongwa kwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekudzvirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Nezuro vanhu mazana mashanu negumi nevana vakabatwa neCovid-19, uye gumi nevasere vakafa nedenda iri. Kusvika nezuro vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga vainge vava mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru zana nemakumi mana nezvishanu nemazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevanomwe (2 145 537, ukuwo vanhu vainge vabaiwa nhomba yepiri vanga vava miriyoni nezviuru mazana matatu nezvina nemazana masere nevaviri (1 304 802.) Vanhu vafa denda iri vave zviuru zvina nezana nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu (4 156). No media source currently available

headline: Vanoita zveChipfambi Vozeza Kunotora Mapiritsi kuZvipatara
text: Ongororo yakaitwa neCenter for Sexual Health and HIV/AIDS Research inoratidza kuti vanoita mabasa echipfambi vakawanda vave kutya kuenda kunotora mishonga yavo yeHIV/AIDS kana kunorapwa zvimwe zvirwere pamwe nekuwana dzidziso, sezvo vachiti vari kunyombwa kana kushungurudzwa nanamukoti. Ongororo iyi yakaitwa mushure mekuona vakawanda vevanhu ava vasisaendi kuzvipatara nemakirinika, zvisineyi kuti bazi rezvehutano nemasangano akasiyana siyana ari kukurudzira kuti vanhu vaongororwe hutachiwana pamwe nekuenda kunopihwa mushonga kana vachinge vawanikwa vainahwo. Vachitaura pamusangano wange wakarongwa neveZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights maererano neongororo yavo, vanoona nekufambiswa kwezvirongwa muCESHHAR, Amai Sibongile Mtetwa, vakati vanoita mabasa echipfambi vari kushungurudzwa pamwe nekupomerwa mhosva yekuparadzirwa hutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS. Vanoti ongororo yavo yakaitwa pasi pechirongwa che“Sisters With a Voice” yakaburitsa pachena kuti vanhu ava ndivo vanonekwa pekupedzisira kana vachinge vaenda kumakirinika. Vanoti semuenziso mumwe mudzimai akashungurudzika chose mushure mekuudzwa namukoti wepane imwe kirinika yavasina kuda kudoma kuti sei ainge achiita zvivindi zvekuuya kukirinika kuzotora mapiritisi asi iye akazvitsvakira hutachiwanda ega. Vanotiwo pane zvakawanda zvinoitika muzvipatara nemakirinika zvave kuita kuti vanoita zvechipfambi veregedze kuenda kuzvipatara izvi sezvo vachitya kunonyadziswa pamberi pevamwe varwere. Amai Mtetwa vanoti kuita kwakadai hakuna kunaka uye sangano ravo richishanda nebazi rezvehutano nemamwe masangano vave kushanda nanamukoti nevamwe vanoshanda muzvipatara kuti vabate vanhu ava pamwe nevarwere zvakanaka. Vanoti kana izvi zvikaitika vanhu vanosununguka kuenda kunotora mapiritsi avo eHIV/AIDS pamwe nekurapwa zvirwere zvepabonde. Ongororo iyi yakaratidzawo kuti pane vanhu vanoita zvechipfambi vanodarika zviuru makumi mashanu vakaenda kumakirinika eCESHHAR kubva muna2009 kusvika pari zvino uye zvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana zvevanu ava zvaive neHIV/AIDS. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti nyika haigoni kukunda muhondo yekurwisana neHIV/AIDS kana ikasapinza vanoita mabasa echipfamibi muzvirongwa zvayo zvekunwa mapiritsi anowedzera hupenyu ema anti-retorivals, kudzivirira chirwere ichi pamwe nekurapwa zvirwere zvepabonde. Sangano reNational Aids Council rinoti ririkubatsira vanoita mabasa echipfambi kuumba sangano ravo kuti vakwanis kuzeya nyaya dzavo pamwe nekurwira kodzero dzavo. NAC inoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu ava vapewo pfungwa dzavo maererano nezvinoitika mubasa ravo kuitira kuti vanogadzira mitemo vaumbe mutemo vachiziva zvinoitika mubasa iri. Mumwe anorarama nemabasa echipfambi akaita hurukuro neStudio 7 Amai Sharo Mazviwa vakati nhamo ndiyo inovasunda kupinda mumabasa aya Sachigaro wesangano reDoctors for Human Rights Doctor Rutendo Bonde vanoti kodzero dzevanhu ava dzinofanira kukosheswa. Chirongwa cheSisters With a Voice chinobatsira vanoita mabasa echipfambi nemapiritsi emaARVs, kuvarapa zvirwere zvepabonde, kuvapa dzidziso pamusoro pezvirwere izvi , kuvadzidzisa kodzero dzavo, pamwe nekuvakurudzira kuti vaende kuzvipatara kuti vandoongororwa hutano hwavo. No media source currently available

headline: Zuva reInternational Literacy Day Rinosvika Dzidzo Iri Parumananzombe neCovid-19
text:
Nyika dzepasi rose dzacherechedza zuva reInternational Literacy Day nhasi panguva iyo pasi rese riri kuvhiringirwa dzidzo nedenda reCovid-19. Zuva ranhasi nderekurangarira kukosha kwakaita kugona kunyora nekuverenga. Asi zuva iri racherechedzwa nhasi pasi rose rakatarisana nedenda reCovid-19 iro riri kuvhiringa dzidzo munyika dzakawanda. Mumwe mudzidzisi ari nhengo yeProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaRosten Mutapa, vati denda reCovid-19 riri kutadzisa vana vakawanda kuti vadzidze sezvo zvikoro zviri kuvharwa nguva dzakawanda, uye vabereki vasina mari dzekuti vana vavo vashandise madandemutande.

Mutungamiri weAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vatiwo dambudziko reCovid-19 riri kutadzisa kuti vana vatange chikoro vave nezera rinodiwa uye vamwe vachatorega chikoro sezvakaita vamwe miriyoni imwechete kubva gore rapera.

Mutauriri weZimbabwe Teachers Association, VaGoodwill Taderera, vati kudzidza kuburikidza nepamaredhiyo hazvishande sezvo vana vasina zvikwanisiro zvikuru vana vekumaruwa.

Asi mutauriri webato rinopikisa reMDC T, VaWitness Dube, vati nyaya
yechirwere cheCovid-19 haisi iyo iri kutadzisa kuti vana vasadzidze
sezvo vana vari kudzidza mudzimwe nyika munguva ino yeCovid-19.

Mutauriri webazi rezvedzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, vati hurumende
iri kuedza zvikuru kupa mukana wekudzidza kuvana kuburikidza nekudzidza pamadandemutande pamwe nemaredhiyo.

Zuva reInternational Literacy Day rakatanga kucherechedzwa mugore ra1966 uye mhemberero dzegore rino dziri kuitwa pasi pedingindira
rekuti:“Literacy for a human-centered recovery: Narrowing the digital
divide”. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Inoudza Dare Kuti Mushandi Haafanirwe Kumakidzwa Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Sangano revashandi, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZTCU, raenda kumatare nechikumbiro chechimbichimbi chekuti vashandi vasamanikidzwe kubayiwa nhomba dzekudzivirira Covid-19 richiti zviri kuitwa pari zvino zviri kutyora kodzero dzevashandi. ZCTU yaendesa kudare gurukota revashandi, VaPaul Mavima, gweta guru rehurumende, VaPrince Machaya, pamwe nemamwe makambani ari kurambidza vashandi vasina kubayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kuenda kubasa. Makambani aya anosanganisira makambani ehurumende anoti NetOne neZimbabwe National Road Administration kozitiwo makambani akaita seWindmill, Zimnat Insurance, SeedCo Zimbabwe pamwe neManicaland State University of Applied Science. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vaenda kudare mushure mekuwana zvichemo zvakawanda kubva kuvashandi vari kurambidzwa kushanda nekuti havana kubayiwa nhomba dzekudzivirira Covid-19. VaMoyo vati vanhu vane zvikonzero zvakasiyana siyana zvekuti vasabayiwe zvinosanganisira kutoshaya nhomba dzacho. Vatiwo hazvina zvazvinobatsira kuti makambani aya anorambidza vashandi vasina kubayiwa kushanda asi vatengi vemakambani aya vachibvumidzwa kupinda mukambani aya vasina kubayiwa izvo vati rusarura rwunifanuira kumiswa. Vatiwo zvinosuwisa kuti hurumende iri kuramba yakapeta maoko kodzero dzevanhu dzichitsikwa tsikwa. Mutungamiriri wesangano revashandirwi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, Dr Israel Murefu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pana nhengo dzavo dziri kutora matanho ekuchetedza hutano hwevashandi. Dr Murefu vati sekuziva kwavo hapana vashandi vari kudzingwa basa nekuti havana kubayiwa nhomba vachiti vari kungonzi vagare kumba kuitira kuti vasaparadzire chirwere ichi kune vaya vakabayiwa. VaMavima vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kupikisa chikumbiro cheZCTU kudare. Vati kuenda kumatare handiko kungagadzirisa nyaya iyi vachiti hurumende, vashandi nevashandirwi vanofanira kuita nhaurirano dzekugadzirisa nyaya iyi pasi peTripatite Negotiating Forum. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vashandirwi nevashandi vataurirane mumakambani avo. Vatiwo denda reCovid-19 riri kupedza vanhu pasi rese uye hurumende haingaregi vanhu vachipera nekuda kwekuti pane vamwe vasingade kubayiwa nhomba dzekudzivirira Covid-19. Dare repamusoro rinotarisirwa kutara zuva rekuti nyaya yeZCTU ichanzikwa rini svondo rinouya. Zimbabwe inoti iri kuronga kubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzanakuitirakuti Covid-19 isarambe ichipararira munyika.

headline: Kuramwa Mabasa kwaVana Chiremba Kwava neMazuva Makumi Matatu neMaviri
text: Vanhu vakawanda vanonzi vari kufa muzvipatara zuva-nezuva sezvo vana chiremba vari kuramwa mabasa vachiti vanoda kuwedzerwa mari dzemihoro pamwe nezvikwanisiro zvinoita kuti vakwanise kuita basa ravo. Varwere vanonzi vari kufa muzvipatara nekushaya anovapa mishonga uku hurumende nanachiremba vachikakaVadzana panyaya yemari dzemihoro. Mugari wemuHarare, VaTendai Chapeyama, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira mushe muzvipatara zvikuru zvehurumende zvakaita secheParirenyatwa umo varwere vari kuswera varere muzvipatara vasina kana rubatsiro rwavari kuwana. Amai Nomalanga Chemhere avo vane murwere ari muchipatara vanoti vave kutorapisa murwere kunana chiremba vakazvimirira asi izvi zvave kuvadhurira. Muzvare Primrose Chimimba vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti igadzirise nhuna dzanachiremba kuitira kuti vanhu vasarambe vachirasikirwa nehupenyu. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuhurumende kuti vanhu vangani varasikirwa nehupenyu hwavo kuburikidza nekuramwa mabasa kwavana chiremba. Kuramwa mabasa uku nemazuva rechimakumi matatu nemaviri. Asi Amai Chemhere vati kana vanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa vasingdadi kudzoka kumabasa, zviri nani hurumende ibvise vana chiremba ava pabasa yoisa vamwe vanhu vakaita savana chiremba vechisoja vazobatsira vanhu muzvipatara. Vamwe vana mukoti vatataura navo vanoti vanga vachidzoserwa kudzimba nevakuru vavo sezvo muzvipatara manga musina vanachiremba. Zvichakdai, mumwe chiremba wepaParirenyatwa watataura naye, VaWallace Hlambelo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti havasi kuzodzokera kubasa kudzamara hurumende yagadzirisa nhuna dzavo. Kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu muzvipatara kwabva kwawedzera kuipa sezvo vana chiremba vakuru vave kuramwawo mabasa vachiti havakwanise kuitawo basa ravo nemazvo kana vana chiremba vadiki vasiri parutivi pavo. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vakaudza vatori venhau neChipiri kuti hurumende yakabvuma kutambira dzimwe nhuna dzanachiremba asi kwete dzose. Vakatiwo hurumende haina mari yekunze yekubhadhara vana chiremba ava sezvavari kuda izvo zviri kuramba kutambirwa nana chiremba ava. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inobatana neDzimwe Nyika Kucherechedza Zuva reWorld Cancer Day
text: Zimbabwe inoti sedzimwe nyika pasi rese dambudziko rechirwere chegomarara riri kuramba richikura huye zvakakosha kutsvaka nzira dzekuti vese vanobatwa nechirwere ichi vakwanise kurapiwa. Vachitaura pamhemberero dzekucherechedza zuva rechirwere chegomarara pasi rose reWorld Cancer Day muHarare nhasi, vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiriri wenyika vari zvakare gurukota rezvehutano, VaConstantino Chiwenga vati chirwere chegomarara idambudziko munyika huye hurumende iri kutsvaka nzira dzekubatsira vese vanobatwa nedenda iri. VaChiwenga vati mugore ra2018 chete vanhu zviuru zvinomwe nemazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nevana vakabatwa nechirwere chegomarara munyika. Vatiwo kurwisa chirwere ichi zvakakosha kuti vanhu vavhenekwe vachiti vanhu vazhinji munyika vari kubatwa chirwere ichi chatodzika midzi. VaChiwenga vati mugore ra2017 vanhu vana muvanhu gumi vaibatwa nechirwere ichi vairasikirwa nehupenyu. Vatiwo munyika dzisina kubudirira seZimbabwe vana vasere muvana gumi vanobatwa nechirwere chegomarara vanoshaya asi kunyika dzakabudirira vaviri muvana gumi ndivo vanofa nechirwere ichi. Vatiwo sezvo mishonga yekurapa chirwere ichi ichidhura huye nzvimbo dzekurapira chirwere ichi dzirishoma huye dziri mumaguta chete, hurumende yakazvipira kuwanisa mishonga yegomarara pachena. Vati izvi ndozvakaita kuti mubhajeti yegore rino kuiswe homwe padivi yekubatsiridza mukurwisa chirwere chegomarara sezvinongoitwawo mukurwisa chirwere cheHIV/Aids. VaChiwenga vatiwo hurumende ichange ichiitisa zvidzidzo zvemachiremba egomarara pamwe nevakoti kuitira kuti vakwanise kubatsira veruzhinji, kuramboenderera mberi nekubaya nhomba yeHuman Papilloma Virus (HPV) kuvanasikana vari pakati pemakore gumi negumi nemana senzira yekudzivirira gomarara remuromo wechibereko. Vatiwo kuvhenekwa kwechirwere chegomarara kucharamba kuchiitwa uye kuwaniswa kwemishonga nezvekurapisa gomarara kucharamba kuchisimbaradzwa. Vachipawo humbowo hwavo mushure mekurwara negomarara rechibereko pamhemberero dzanhasi, Amai Busisiwe Moyo vati kurapwa gomarara munyika mutoro. Izvi zvatsigirwaro nemukuru weKidzcan VvaDaniel Mckenzie, avo vati kusaenzana kwemikana pakati pevanowana nevanoshaya kuri kukonzera ndufu dzakawanda kuvana. Vatiwo pane mukana wakakura wekuti vana vanobatwa negomarara varapwe vachipora asi nyaya yehurombo inoita kuti vazhinji vasakwanise kuwana mishonga pamwe nekuongororwa nekurapwa. Mumiriri wesangano reWorld Health Organization muZimbabwe, Dr Alex Gasasira vatsigirawo kuti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vese vakwanise kuwana mukana wekuongororwa, kurapwa pamwe nekuwana mishonga zvisinei nekwavanenge vari munyika. Mutauriri weCancer Association of Zimbabwe, VaLovemore Makurirofa vaudzwo Studio 7 kuti vari kukurudzirawo kuti munhu wese agone kurapwa zvisineyi nekunobva kana mamiriro akaita munhu. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti mishonga yegomarara ibve kuhurumende vachiti pamusoro pekudzikisa mitengo zvinoitawo kuti iwanike kuzvipatara zvehurumende. Zuva rechirwere chegomarara rinocherechedzwa musi wa4 Kukadzi gore negore. Dingindira regore rino kusvika 2024 riri kukurudzira kuti vanhu vese vakwanise kurapwa kana kuti Closing the Cancer Care Gap. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Voziya neNzara kuManicaland
text: Vanhu vakawanda mudunhu reManicaland vanoti vakatarisana nenzara inotyisa sezvo zvirimwa zvavo zvisina kuita zvakanaka nepamusana pekushanduka kuri kuita mamiriro ekunze. Vanhu vakawanda mudunhu reManicaland vanoti vakatarisana nenzara inotyisa sezvo zvirimwa zvavo zvisina kuita zvakanaka nepamusana pekushanduka kuri kuita mamiriro ekunze. Vagari vekuMarange, Chakohwa pamwe nekuHotsprings mudunhu re Manicaland vanoti vava kurarama nemichero yemusango. Mumwe wevagari ava, VaTimothy Sigauke vemudunhu rekwaChakohwa, vanoti havasati vatanga kuwana rubatsiro rwezvekudya mudunhu ravo. Mumwe mugari wekuMarange, VaElisha Chibuwe, vanoti vari kurwadzikana zvikuru nevana vari kutadza kuenda kuchikoro nepamusana pekushaya chekudya. Kunyange hazvo hupfu huri kuwanikwa muzvitoro zvemunharaunda iyi, Muzvare Abigail Chibuwe vanoti havana mari yekutenga hupfu hwemuzvitoro uhwu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzekurima dzinoti kuchinja kwemamiriro ekunze ndiko kuri kukonzera kusanaya kwemvura zvakaringana, uye kupisa kwakanyanyisa kuri kusiya zvirimwa zvizhinji zvatsva. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti kupisa kwakanyanyisa uku, kana kuti El Nino, hakusati kwamboitika muZimbabwe kwemakore makumi manomwe nemashanu, uye kuchasiya goho regore rino rakadzikira zvakapetwa kaviri zvichienzaniswa negoho regore rapera. Hurumende inoti vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni matatu munyika vanoda rubatsiro rwezvekudya,asi nekubooka kwehomwe yenyika, Zimbabwe, iyo inoda mari yechikafu inosvika bhiriyoni nemazana mashanu emamiriyoni emadhora, inogona kutadza kupa chikafu vese vanoda rubatsiro. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakatara nzara sedambudziko rakaipisisa munyika vakakurudzira masangano anobatsira kuti abatsire nepaanogona napo pose kuwanira vanhu chikafu. No media source currently available

headline: Vadzidzi Vanomwe Vanobatwa neCovid-19 paChikoro chePrince Edward muHarare
text: Vamwe vabereki vanonzi vatanga kubvisa vana vavo pane chimwe chikoro muHarare mushure mekunge vamwe vadzidzi vepachikoro ichi vawanikwa vaine chirwere cheCovid-19. Gwaro raburitswa nemukuru wechikoro chePrince Edward High School chiri muHarare, Va A.G. Gora, rinoti mushure mekuongororesa vadzidzi vepachikoro chavo nezuro, vana vanomwe vawanikwa vaine chirwere cheCovid 19 uye havasati vawana zvakabuda mukuongororwa kwevamwe kunyange hazvo vadzidzi vese vakaongororwa. VaGora vati vadzidzi vawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi vapatsanurwa kune vamwe vana uye vamirira kunzwa kubazi rezvedzidzo pamusoro pedambudziko ravasangana naro iri. Mumwe mubereki ane vana vanodzidza pachikoro ichi, Amai Revai Gambe, vati vaona zvakakodzera kuti vambobvisa vana vavo pachikoro kudzamara hurumende yatora matanho akasimba ekuti vana vavo vasabatwe nechirwere cheCovid 19. Mumwe mubereki ane mwana anodzidza pachikoro apa abvisawo mwana wake pachikoro apa nhasi, uyo aramba kudomwa nezita, akurudzira hurumende kuti ikurumidze kugadzirisa dambudziko iri kuitira kuti vana vasarasikirwe nenguva yedzidzo sezvo vana vakatora nguva yakareba vasingaende kuzvikoro zvichitevera kuvharwa kwakanga kwakaitwa nyika yose nekuda kwedenda reCovid 19. Mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubazi redzidzo, VaTaungana Ndoro, vaudza Studio 7 kuti bazi ravo harisati rave nedanho raratora panyaya iyi vachiti vachatevedzera zvinenge zvabva kubva kubazi rehutano. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, VaJohn Mangwiro, vati bazi ravo ratumira vanhu kunoongorora mamiriro akaita zvinhu pachikoro apa kuitira kuti vagoona kuti votora matanho api. Pasvika Studio 7 pachikoro chePrince Edward vezvehutano vanga vachifirita chikoro chose. Zvichakadai, vamwe vedzisvondo vari pasi peZimbabwe Catholic Bishops Conference vabaiwa nhomba yeSinopharm pahurongwa hwanga huchitungamirwa nebazi rezvehutano vamwe vafundisi vachikurudzira kuti vose vanoita zvechitendero vabaiwe nhomba iyi kuitira kuti vazvidzivirire kuchirwere cheCovid19. Vabaiwa nhomba ava vafundisi mazana maviri nemakumi masere nevasere. Vanhu vakabayiwa nhomba kekutanga nezuro vakasvika zviuru zvishanu nemazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nevapfumbamwe, 5 269, kusanganisira mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutamba vave zviuru makumi mana nezvipfumbamwe nemazana nemazana mana nevana (49 404) uye vabaiwa nhomba yechipiri vave zviuru zviviri nemazana mana nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe (2489). Bazi rezvehutano rinoti kubva pakatanga chirwere ichi, muZimbabwe mave nevanhu zviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu nemazana manomwe nemakumi mana nevapfumbamwe (36 749) vakabatwa vaine chirwere ichi, uye vakapora vava zviuru makumi matatu nezvina nemazana mana nemakumi manomwe nevatanhatu (34476). Munyika mave nevanhu chiuru nemazana mashanu negumi nevatanhatu, 1 516, vafa nechirwere cheCovid 19 uye huwandu uhwu hunogona kukwira pachaburitswa mamwe mashoko nebazi iri nhasi manheru. No media source currently available

headline: Varwere Votambura Hurumende naVanachiremba Vachinetsana
text: Zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara zvehurumende zvinoshandiswa neveruzhinji vasina mari kuti varapwe. Kusamira zvakanaka uku kwatonyanya kuwedzerwa nekuramwa mabasa kwavana chiremba avo vapinda musvondo retatu vachikanda mapadza pasi. Kunyange hazvo zvipatara zveParirenyatwa Group of Hospitals neHarare Central zvakavhurwa, hapana zvakawanda zviri kuitwa mukubatsira varwere sezvo vanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa. Vari kubatsirwa chete ndevaya vanenge vachirwarisa kana vanenge vapinda mutsaona. Mota dzinotakura vanhu vanorwara, pamwe nedzavanhuwo zvavo, dzanga dzichitaukura varwere kubva pachipatara cheParirenyatwa vachienda kune zvimwe zvipatara. Vatataura navo vanoti vange vari kubvisa hama dzavo sezvo dzisiri kuwana rubatsiro pachipatara ichi. Mumwe wevanhu ava, VaWakefield Mlilo, vanoti ivo nehama dzavo vaburitsa muni’nina wavo muchipatara sezvo asina kumbobvira awona chiremba kubvira paakapinda muchipatara ichi nemusi weChina chapfuura. VaMlilo vanoti vave kuenda nehama yavo kuchipatara che All Souls Mission kwaMtoko. Amai Ruramai Phiri vanogara mumusha weRugare vanoti kubvira pakatanga vanachiremba kurwamwa basa, munzvimbo mavo mafa vanhu vaviri mushure mekushaiwa rubatsiro kubva kuchipata cheHarare Central. VaNesbet Nyoni avo vange vauya kuzoona hama yavo paHarare Hospital vaudza Studio7 kuti zvinosuwisa kuti zvipatara izvi zviri kudzorera varwere kudzimba dzavo vasina kubatsirwa kunyange vaye vanenge vapinda mutsaona. VaNyoni vanoti hurumende ngaigadzirise zvichemo zvana chiremba kuitira kuti zvinhu zvifambe muzvipatara. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaJoseph Murawu, vanoti hurumende inofanira kugadzirisa nyaya dzehuwori kuitira kuti ikwanise kubhadhara vanachiremba mari dzavari kuda. Vanachiremba vemuzvipatara zvehurumende pasi pesangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association vakatanga kuramwa mabasa musi wa27 Gumiguru vachida kuti mari dzavanotambiriswa dziwedzerwe kubva pamadhora mazana maviri nemakumi masere kusvika pachuru nemazana maviri emadhora pamwedzi. Izvi zvavhiringa basa muzvipatara zvese zvehurumende uye kana vanotengesa mumigwagwa pazvipatara izvi vanoti basa ravo radzikira sezvo varwere nevanhu vanoenda kuzvipatara izvi vave vashoma. Vamwe amai vanoshandira paParirenyatwa vasina kuda kudomwa nezita vanoti bhizimisi ravo radzikira chose kubvira pakatanga kuramwa vanachiremba kuramwa basa. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi revakuru vakuru vezvipatara izvi sezvo vati havana kupihwa mvumo yekutaura nevatori venhau kubva kubazi rezvehutano nekuchengetedzwa kwevana. Vana chiremba vari kuramwa basa vari kutarisirwa kuita musangano nevatori venhau mangwana apo vachazivisa zvabuda munhaurirano dzavari kuita nehurumende. Vamwewo vashandi vanoita zvehutano vatataura navo vakaita sana mukoti nevamwe, vasina kuda kudomwa nemazita vati vanotarisira kuti hurumende ichavawedzerawo mari vachiti vacharamwawo mabasa kana vasina kuwedzerwa mari mari dzavanotambira. No media source currently available

headline: Zvinhu Zvichakaminama Muzvipatara zveHurumende
text: Apo kudzokera kubasa kwavana chiremba kwange kusati kwaziviswa kune veruzhinji neChina masiakati, vamwe varwere vange vachiburitswa nehama dzavo muchipatara chepaChinhoyi vachinorapirwa kumba sezvo muchipatara ichi manga musina vana chiremba. Zvinhu zvanga zvasvika pakaoma pachipatara ichi izvo zvange zvave kumanikidza vamwe vanhu kuti vatore hama dzavo vachinodzirapisa kunana chiremba vakazvimirira. Muzvare Tariro Chinogwenya, avo vanogara na amai vavo mumusha unogara veruzhinji weChikonohono, vaudza Studio7 neChina masikati kuti amai vavo vakadimurwa gumbo nezuro nachiremba wavakatora kubva kuHarare uyo vakabhadhara madhora ekuAmerica mazana mana. Muzvare Chinogwenya vati amai vavo vakanonokerwa kurapwa sezvo vari murwere weshuga izvo zvakazokonzera kuti vadimurwe gumbo. Muzvare Chinogwenya vati vakaisa amai vavo muwadhi yakatsaurwa iyo vati inodhura sezvo vari kubhadhara madhora makumi matatu ekuAmerica pazuva. Mumwe mugari, Amai Cleopatra Tsomondo, vaudza Studio7 kuti vakaburitsa murume wavo muchipatara cheChinhoyi nekuti ainge asingarapwe zvakakwana. Amai Tsomondo vati mari yavari kubhadhara chiremba akazvimirira nemishonga yakawanda zvikuru. Mumwe murwere adzoserwa kumba nhasi, VaErick Madzimbamuto, vati vadzoserwa kumba vachinzi pachipatara hapana vanachiremba. Mumwe murwere anoda kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti Tawanda ati zvave pachena kuti vana mukoti havachashande sezvavanofanirwa kuita. Mukuru webazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMashonaland West, Dr Wencilus Nyamayaro, vati chipatara chemuChinhoyi chakaremerwa zvakanyanya sezvo varwere vematunhu madiki vachiendeswa pachipatara ichi. Mukuru wechipatara chemuChinhoyi, Dr Collet Mawire, vatiwo madhokotera anga asati ave pabasa panguva yashanyirwa chipatara ichi neStudio7. Vanhu vakawanda vari kutarisira kuti vana chiremba vachadzokera pamabasa avo nechimbi chimbi zvichitevera kumiswa kwaitwa kuramwa mabasa uku nesangano ravo reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mubati wehomwe muZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr Prince Butau, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pachine zvinhu zvakawanda zvichiri kutauriranwa nehurumende sezvo zvichemo zvavo zvizhinji zvisati zvagadziriswa. No media source currently available

headline: Kukwira kweHuwandu hweVane Covid-19 Kwoita Kuti Hurumende Ikurudzirwe Kuvheneka Vanhu Vakawanda
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChina kuti vanhu vanosvika zviuru zvitatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri, kana kuti 3 092, vakabatwa nechirwere charura pasi rose cheCovid-19, uye huwandu hwevanhu vafa hwakakwira kusvika pamakumi mashanu nevatatu, kana kuti 53. Bazi iri rakazivisawo kuti huwandu hwevanhu vakanga vapora kusvika nezuro hwakanga hwave pavanhu mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nevana, kana kuti 924. Vanhu vanosvika mazana maviri negumi nevatatu kana kuti 213, vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi pavanhu zviuru zvitatu nezana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemumwechete, kana kuti 3 191, vakavhenekwa kuona kana vaine chirwere ichi. Dunhu reHarare ndiro riri pamusoro pahuwandu hwevanhu vane chirwere ichi, riine vanhu vanosvika chiuru nemakumi manomwe nevashanu, kana kuti 1 075, richiteverwa nedunhu reBulawayo, iro rine vanhu mazana masere nevashanu kana kuti 805 vabatwa nechirwere ichi kusvika nemusi weChina. Makambani akawanda munyika anonzi ari kumbovhara zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwevamwe vashandi vaine chirwere ichi. Nemusi weChitatu, kambani yemabhazi yeZUPCO, iyo inove ndiyo chete ine mvumo yekutakura veruzhinji munguva ino yemutemo unorambidza kufamba famba kwevanhu, yakazivisa kuti vashandi vayo gumi vakanga vawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi mushure mekuvhenekwa nevashandi vebazi rezvehutano. Izvi zvinonzi neimwe nyanzvi yezvehutano vari chiremba, Dr. Edgar Munatsi, hurumende inofanirwa kusimbisa hurongwa hwekutevera vese vakambosangana nevashandi ava pamwewo nevanho vose vari kuwanikwa vaine chirwere ichi, uyewo vose vanofamba nemabhazi eZUPCO vanofanirwa kuvhenekwawo kuti havana chirwere ichi here. Dr. Munatsi vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutarisisa zvakare hurongwa hwayo hwekuti ZUPCO ndiyo chete inofanirwa kunge ichitakura veruzhinji munyika, kuitira kuti ibvumidzewo vamwe vane dzimotokari dzavo kutakurawo vanhu. Johns Hopkins University Hospital yemuno muAmerica inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nemanomwe nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 17.3 million vabatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose, icho chaurayawo vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nezvitatu kana kuti 673,000 pasi rose. Dr. Munatsi vanoti kunyange hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kuongororwa kana vaine chirwere cheCovid-19 pazuva hwave kuwanda, hurumende inofanirwa kutokwinya kuti iwedzere kuitira kuti irwisane nechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Vakoti Vakawanda Vari Kubatwa neChirwere cheCovid-19 Vachiita Basa Ravo
text: Sangano revakoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru nekukundikana kwehurumende kupa vashandi vemuzvipatara zvikwanisiro zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere cheCovid-19.
