Izvi zvinotevera kubatwa kwevakoti gumi nevasere nechirwere ichi pachipatara cheUnited Bulawayo Hospitals kana kuti UBH mushure mekurapa mumwe murume ainge aine chirwere ichi. Mwedzi wapera vamwe vakoti gumi nevana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi pachipatara cheMpilo. Vamwe vashandi vemuzvipatara paUBH kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba makumi matanhatu nevasere vakambomanikidzwawo kumbogara kudzimba mushure mekurapa mumwezve murwere weCovid-19. Mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vakuru reSenior Hospital Doctors Association Dr Aaron Musara, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinhu zvakatonyanya kuipa kuzvipatara zvematunhu zvisina zvekudzivirira vashandi zvakakwana. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mukuru anoona nezvekurwisa chirwere ichi, Dr Agnes Mahomva, sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Mutungamiri musangano reZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnoch Dongo, vati zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kuvakoti nevamwe vashandi vemuzvipatara. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 munyika hwakwira kusvika pamazana masere nemakumi masere nevashanu, kana kuti 885. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kushushikanawo nekukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munharaunda hwakakwira zvakanyanya neChitatu sezvo pavanhu makumi mapfumbamwe nevasere vakabatwa nechirwere ichi, makumi mana nevasere vakachitapurirwa munharaunda pasina nhoroondo yekubuda kunze kwenyika. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi munyika vave mazana maviri nevatanhatu, kana kuti 206. Vanhu vafa vachiri vapfumbamwe uye vavhenekewa chirwere ichi munyika yose vadarika zviuru makumi masere nezviviri kana kuti 82,000. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari vemuMaguta Voshora Makanzuru neKutadza Kuwanira Vanhu Mvura Yakachena
text: Masangano anomirira vagari mumaguta nemadhorobha ari kushoropodza makanzuru achivapomera mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu nekutadzayekutadza kuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena. Izvi zvakabuda pamusangano wakaitwa muHarare nemusi weChina wakapindwa nemapazi ehurumende akasiyana siyana, makanzuru uye vagari vemumadhorobha. Sachigaro weCombined Harare Residents Association, VaSimba Moyo, vanoti musangano uyu wakabatsira kuti vakwanise kuonesana neve makanzuru nezvekukomba kwedambudziko remvura. VaAnoziva Muguti, mutungamiriri weMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance kana kuti MURRA vati mudhorobha ravo kodzero dzevanhu dziri kumbunyikidzwa nekanzuru iri kuvavharira vagari mvura. Vemasangano aya vataura kuti makanzuru ari kutyora chikamu chechimakumi manomwe nemanomwe chebumbiro remutemo renyika icho chinopa vagari kodzero yekuwana mvura yakachena nguva dzose. Vamwe vakaita saVaPrecious Shumba, veHarare Residents Trust (HRT), vati mune dzimwe nzvimbo muHarare dzakaita seMabvuku, vanhu vatove nemakore akawanda vasingawani mvura. Vatizve mvura yemuguta mavo hainwike nekuti haisi kucheneswa zvakakwana nekanzuru yavo. Asi vanotungamirira bazi remvura mukanzuru yeHarare, Engineer Hosiah Chisango, vati kanzuru yavo inochenesa mvura vachisvitsa pachipimo chinodiwa ne bazi reUnited Nations rinoona nezvehutano reWorld Health Organization. “Tinoshanda nemaresidents representative ose muno muHarare tichivaudza kuti mvura yedu yakachena ngavanwe.” Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Tiri kuonesana kuti quality yedu iri kuimprover, ikozvino 96% ye masamples atiri kutesta ari kupasa saka hapana hutachiona hunowanikwa.” Meya weguta reMasvingo, VaHubert Fidze vaudzavo musangano uyu kuti nyaya yekushwaikwa kwemari munyika nemariro ehupfumi hwenyika zviri kukanganisa makanzuru kuti ape vagari mvura yakakwana. “Dambudziko remvura sekuona kwandaita muno mukati meZimbabwe ririko sezvabuda mumusangano uno.” Vanotiwo, “Dambudziko guru riripo nderemari. Vanhu vawanda mumaguta asi supply yakaramba akadaro. Tine mari yatiri kuda kuti tiwedzere mvura asi mari hatisi kuiwana.” Vemasangano anomirira vagari vatenderana kushanda pamwe nevanotungamira maguta kuti vabude nemazano ekupedza dambudziko remvura, vachikurudzira kuti vagari vabhadhare mvura uye vemakanzuru vashandise mari iyi zvakanaka. Nyaya yekushaikwa kwemvura yakachena ndiyo inopa kuti nyika itarisane nematambudziko akaita serecholera uye typhoid. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe kuMhangura Voramba Kubaya Nhomba yeCovid-19 Madzimai Akazvitakura neAri Kuyamwisa
text: Vamwe vari kubaya nhomba kuMhangura, mudunhu reMashonaland West vari kupikisana nekurudziro yehurumende yekuti madzimai akazvitakura kana kuti ari kuyamwisa abayiwe nhomba yeCovid-19 kana hutano hwavo hwakamira zvakanaka. Mamwe madzimai audza Studio 7 kuti vari kudzoserwa kumba vasina kubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 vachinzi havabaiwe sezvo vakazvitakura kana kuti vachiri kuyamwisa. Amai Emilda Mwala avo vari kuyamwisa mwana wavo ane mwedzi mitanhatu vanoti vakadzoswa paMakonde Christian Hospital. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nemumwe mudzimai akazvitakura Amai Rutendo Makwara avo vanoti vakarambirwawo pakiriniki iri pedyo nekuGudubu kuMhangura. Mukuru anoona nezvedzidziso yehutano kana kuti Provincial Health Promotion Officer mudunhu reMashonaland West Dr George Kambondo vaudza Studio 7 kuti dunhu ravo harisi kubaya nhomba madzimai akazvitakura kana vari kuyamwisa. Dr Kambondo vanoti mhando yenhomba iri kushandiswa munyika iri kubva kunyika yeChina haina kuongororwa kuti inoshandiswa pamadzimai aya here pasina dambudziko.\n\nAsi mukuru anoona nezvechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika Dr Agnes Mahomva vanoti hapana chakaipa kuti madzimai akazvitakura kana ari kuyamwisa vabaiwe nhomba. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nevaive mukuru wechipatara cheChitungwiza Dr Enoch Mayida vati madzimai ari kuyamwisa anokwanisa kubayiwa nhomba uye vakatiwo madzimai akazvitakura asiri kurwarisa nezvirwere zvakaita seBP, shuga kana kunzwa dzungu anokwanisa kubayiwa nhomba. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri webazi rezvehutano vaDonald Mujiri avo vanga vachinzi vari mumusangano. Mukuru mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMashonaland West Dr Gift Masoja vanoti kusvika parizvino madzimai akazvitakura akabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 anosvika zvikamu makumi maviri nezvitanhatu kubva muzana uye madzimai matatu akazvitakura vakafa nechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Cholera Yopa Vanhu Kuti Vasabate Maoko paRufu
text: Zvichitevera kubuda kwakaita chirwere chekorera mumisha inogara veruzhinji yeGlen View neBudiriro, bazi rinoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwezvakatikomberedza, reEnvironmental Management Agency, EMA, rakapa vagari mabhini ekurasira marara anodarika zviuru makumi mashanu senzira yekumisa kupararira kwekorera, iyo yauraya vanhu vanodarika makumi. Bazi reEMA rinoti riri kushanda nekanzuru yeHarare mukuona kuti marara arasirwa munzvimbo dzakakodzera senzira yekuchengetedza hutano, uye kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere chekorera. Mukuru anoona nezvekushambadza mabasa eEMA, VaLeon Mutungamiri, vanoti vakaona zvakakodzera kuti vapinde mumisha inogara veruzhinji vachipa imba yega yega, bhini rekurasira marara. VaMutungamiri vanoti basa ravari kuita richaitwawo mumusha weBudiriro vachipa vagari mabhini pamwe nekuvadzidzisa zvakakoshera kuisa marara mumabhini, uye nzira dzinoiswa nadzo marara mumabhini aya. VaMutungamiri vanoti vari kupawo dzidziso kukanzuru yeHarare kuti ibvise marara ari mupombi dzinotakura mvura dzine tsvina, kuitira kuti madhireni aya asamise kufamba kwemvura inenge yanaya. Vakomana nevasikana vari kushanda neEMA vanoti dambudziko riripo nderekuti vanhu vari kurasira mashizha mumadhireni anofamba nemvura. Vanoti mashizha aya anogona kuchengetwa zvakanaka kuitira kuti ave mufudze, kwete kuarasira munzvimbo dzinofamba nemvura. Mumwe mugari wemuGlen View, Amai Annatolia Mahwindi, vanoti kanzuru inouya kamwe chete pamwedzi kuzotakura marara. Vanotiwo vari kufara nerubatsiro rwemabhini avakapihwa neEMA. Mumwe mugari wemumusha uyu, Va Enos Mahwindi, vanoti vakafara zvikuru nedanho rakatorwa neEma nokuti rinodzidzisa vagari nezvehutsanana kuitira kuti chirwere chekorera chisapararire. Mumwe mugari, Amai Tsitsi Mutekede, vakaratidzawo kufara nemabhini avakapihwa, vachiti vava kuwana pekurasira marara, izvo zvichaita kuti nzvimbo yavanogara, igare yakachena. Mutauri weHarare City Council, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti hachisi chokwadi kuti kanzuru iri kutadza kutakura marara munzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji. Vanotiwo marori ekanzuru ari mubishi rekubvisa marara akarasirwa pese pese kuGlenview. Meya mutsva weHarare, VaHerbert Gomba, vakatsinhira mashoko aVaChideme izvo zviri kupesana nezviri kutaurwa nevagari vemuGlen View.

headline: Vaive Mukuru weBulawayo Polytechnic Engineer Mabasa Vakashaya neCovid-19 Voradzikwa
text: Mukuru wechikoro cheBulawayo Polytechnic Engineer Gilbert Mzenzi Mabasa avo vakashaya nemusi weChishanu nechirwere cheCovid-19 kuArundel Hospital chiri pe kuUnited Bulawayo Hospital’s vakaradzikwa nemusi weSvondo kuBulawayo kumarinda eAthlone. Vachitaura nebepanhau reSunday News, gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro Muzvinafundo Amon Murwira vati VaMabasa munhu ainge ari mbariro munyaya dzedzidzo sezvo ainge akazvipira kuvandudza dzidzo munyika uye nyika yarasikirwa zvikuru. Engineer Mabasa vaizivikanwa zvikuru nerekuti “The Teacher” semunhu aida kudzidzisa vanhu zveshoko raMwari nehupenyu. Vange vave nemakore makumi matanhatu nemashanu ekuberekwa. Vakazivisa musi wa 6 Nyamavhuvhu kuti vainge vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. VaMabasa vasiya mudzimai nevana vatanhatu. Mumwe akashanda naEngineer Mabasa inhengo yeparamende yeMDC Alliance yaive sachigaro wedzidzo VaDaniel Molokele. Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rinoti nemusi weMugovera vanhu gumi nevatanhatu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vafa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru zvina nemazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe kana kuti 4, 390. Vanhu zana nemakumi matatu nemumwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zana rezviuru nemakumi maviri nemana zvine mazana matatu nemakumi matanmhatu nemanomwe kana kuti 124, 367. Vanhu mazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevatanhatu kana kuti 226 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvasiya vapora vave zana rezviuru negumi nemazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe nemashanu kana kuti 110, 775. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mashanu zvine makumi mapfumbamwe nemakumi matanhatu nemazana matatu nemakumi masere nemumwe kana kuti 1, 596 381 vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kapiri sezvinotarisirwa. Vabayiwa nhomba kekutanga vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mashanu negumi nematanhatu zvine mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu nematatu kana kuti 2, 513, 353. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kutin inyatsoshanda zvinotarisirwa kudzivirira kuparira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kubatwa neCovid-19 Hworamba Huchikwira
text: Hurumende yakazivisa neChitatu kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa ne Covid-19 munyika hwakakwira kusvika pachiuru nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 1 089, zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwevamwe vanhu makumi maviri nevashanu vaine chirwere ichi. Vanhu vakavhenekwa chirwere ichi nezuro vanosvika zviuru zviviri nemazana matanhatu negumi nevaviri, kana kuti 2 612. Vanhu vakanga vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi kusvika nezuro vaive mazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu kana kuti 395, uye vashaya vachiri makumi maviri. Mumwe chiremba, Dr Edgar Munatsi, avo vari ku Britain, vanoti dambudziko rekukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vave kuwanikwa vaine chirwere ichi, zvikuru muvanhu vagara vari munyika, richanetsa kudzivirira nekuti vanhu vanga vasiri kutevera zvakadzama mitemo yekuvhara kumeso pamwe nekugeza maoko. No media source currently available

headline: Vabereki veMwana Ane Chirwere cheChiropa Vokumbira Rubatsiro
text: Hupenyu hwemwanasikana Manqoba Mabhena, uyo akaberekwa aine chirwere chechiropa chinonzi Biliary Atresia huri kuramba huri panjodzi sezvo vabereki vake vasati vawana mari yekuti ainde kunorapwa kuIndia. Amai vaManqoba, Muzvare Shamiso Yikoniko vanoti vana chiremba vakavataurira kuti chiropa chemwana chinogona kumira kushanda chero ipi nguva kana akasarapwa nekukurumidza. Vanoti vanoda mari inosvika zviuru makumi mana nematatu ($43,000) yekuti vainde kuIndia kunorapisa mwanasikana wavo. Asi pare zvino vanoti vawana mari inokwana chiuru gumi nemasere ($18,000) chete. Naizvozvo, Muzvare Yikoniko vari kukumbira rubatsiro kumhuri yeZimbabwe. Vanoti zve vanoda kubatsira vanogona kuisa mari mubhuku ravo rebhanga reFBC. Account number yavo inoti 3070070770125. Munogona zve kushandisa Ecocash muchishandisa number dzinoti 0772 935 224. No media source currently available

headline: Mabhizimisi Akagarwa Matunduru neCovid19 Anoti Dambudziko reMagetsi Rauya Panguva Yakaipa
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kuyambira kuti Zimbabwe haisi kuzokwanisa kuti hupfumi hwayo hukure nezvikamu zvinodarika zvinomwe kubva muzana nekuda kwekushaikwa kwemagetsi. Zesa yakazivisa kuti inenge yodzima magetsi kwemaawa gumi nemaviri pazuva sezvo magwenya ayo asiri kushanda zvakanaka. Kambani iyi inoti iri kuwana magetsi mashoma kubva kugwenya rinoshandisa marasha reHwange uye iri kugadzirisawo magwenya anoshandisa mvura kuKariba. ZETDC inotiwo magetsi airi kutenga kubva kuMozambique neSouth Africa mashoma pane ari kudiwa. Mushure mekutatarika kwemakore maviri nekuda kwekusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura uye chirwere cheCovid-19, gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Nthuli Ncube vakati vanenge vachitarisira kuti hupfumi hwenyika huchakwira zvakanyanya gore rino. Bhanga guru rinokweretesa mari pasi rose reInternational Monetary Fund rinoti kana zvihu zvose zvakaringana, hupfumi hweZimbabwe huchakwira nezvikamu zvitanhatu kubva muzana. Asi vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato reMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, vanoti nyaya yemagetsi igangaidzwa kumukwenyi mhezi yavavira mudumbu vati hurumende yakundikana kugadzirisa dambudziko remagetsi kwemakore anodarika makumi mana. Mukuru weZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaChris Mugaga, vatendawokuti magetsi anokwanisa kugwadamisa hupfumi hwenyika. Vati vemabhizimisi vachanyanya kuomerwa sezvo vachiri kuyedza kubuda mumadhaka mavari zvakonzerwa nechirwere cheCovid-.19. Vachipawo pfungwa dzavo, pakugadzirisa dambudziko, vaimbova gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, VaFortune Chasi, vati hurumende inofaira kubuda negwara rakajeka kusanganisirawo kukurudzira vanhu kushandisa simba rezuva uye kugadzira mamwe magwenya. ZETDC inotiwo nzvimbo dzakakosha dzakaita sezvipatara, kunocheneswa mvura yekunwa uye kunzvimbo dzinoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwenyika ndidzo dzichawana magetsi. Hatina kukwanis akubata gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, VaSoda Zhemu, kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. No media source currently available

headline: Meya weBulawayo Okurudzira Vanotengesa Kuita Hutsanana
text: Vanoita mabasa ekutengesa muguta reBulawayo vaita musangano wekuonesana nekunzwana pfungwa nameya weguta iri, uye vari kanzura weWard 3, VaMartin Moyo. Nyaya dzakurukurwa mumusangano uyu dzinosanganisira dzekutorerwa kunoitwa vanotengesa zvinhu ava nemapurisa, mitero, nzvimbo dzekutengesera, mitemo mitsva inonzi iri kuda kudzikwa pamwe nehwaro hungatungamira vanotengesa ava huri kuronga kuumbwa. Asi vamwe vapinda mumusangano uyu vanonzi vakurudzirawo kanzuru yeguta reBulawayo kuti ikoshese raramo yevanhu, kwete kukoshesa kuchengetedzwa kwezvivakwa pamwe nemigwagwa vachikanganwa vanhu. Asi VaMoyo vanoti kanzuru yavo yanzwisisa zvose zvataurwa mumusangano uyu, asiwo vati zvakakosha zvikuru kuti vanorarama nekutengesa zvinhu ava vakoshesewo nzvimbo dzavanoshandira kuburikidza nekudzichenesa. Meya Moyo vanoti guta ravo harisati zvaro rasangana nedambudziko revanotengesera mukati meguta zvisina mvumo, sezvo vanotengesa zvinhu ava vachitengesera munzvimbo dzavakapiwa dziri kumucheto kweguta. Musangano uyu wapindwawo nevamiriri vemasangano anosanganisira reZimbabwe Chamber of Informal Economy Association, pamwe neBulawayo Agenda. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe neBotswana Dzoita Mushandira Pamwe paCovid-19
text: Zimbabwe neBotswana dzakaita chibvumirano chekubairana nhomba yeCovid-19 zvizvarwa zvadzo zvinogara munyika mbiri idzi. Izvi zvakaziviswa negurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaFrederick Shava, avo vakati danho iri rakatorwa nokuti chara chimwe hachitswanyi inda. VaShava, avo vari murwendo rwemazuva matatu ekubvakachira nyika nhatu dzinoti South Africa, Botswana neNamibia, vakati hurongwa uhu hwakabvumiranwa mumusangano wavakaita negurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muBotswana, VaLemogang Kwape. Kuburikidza nehurongwa uhu, VaShava vakati nyika mbiri idzi dziri kutarisira kusvika pachinhanho chekuti kupararira kwedenda iri kuve kushoma nekukurumidza. Vakatiwo kana nyika mbiri idzi dzikakwanisa kuderedza kupararira kweCOVID-19, musangano wechitatu weZimbabwe/Botswana Bi-National Commission uri kutarisirwa kuitirwa mudhorobha reVictoria Falls mumwedzi mishomanini iri kutevera. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende yeBotswana panyaya iyi nokuti VaKwape vanga vasingabatike panharembozha yavo sezvo vari murwendo rwekubvakachira Lesotho. Nyanzwi munyaya dzehutano uye vari chiremba pachipatara chikuru cheNyangabgwe Referral Hospital mudhorobha reFrancistown, VaTarisai Garanevako vaudza Studio7 kuti Zimbabwe ndiyo ichakohwa pahombe kuburikidza nechibvumirano ichi. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinorarama nekutenga nekutengesa mudhorobha reGaborone, Muzvare Florence Manzungu, vagamuchira hurongwa uhu vachiti COVID-19 inotoda kuisa misoro pamwe chete. Pari zvino, Botswana yabaya nhomba vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi matanhatu ruzhinji rwavo vari vashandi vezvehutano, mapurisa, masoja nevebazi rinoona nekupinda nekubuda kwevanhu munyika. Nyika iyi ine vanhu vanodarikazviurumakumimashanu nemazabna masere vabatwa neCovid-19,uye vafa nechirwere ichi vari mazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe nevana. No media source currently available

headline: Makorokoza Oisa Hupenyu hweVagari veMasvingo paNjodzi neKuchera pedyo neDzimba uye Matangi eMvura
text: Vamwe vagari vekuMasvingo vanoti vari kuronga kuendesa kanzuru yavo kumatare kana isina kubvisa mukati memazuva manomwe makorokoza ari kuchera goridhe pedyo nematangi emvura nedzimba dzavo sezvo vachigona kuzokonzera njodzi huru. Vagari vanoti matangi emvura anogona kutsemuka oyeredza dzimba dzavo zvinogona kukonzera rufu. Sangano revagari reMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance(MURRA), richimirirwa nemagweta aro ekwa Mutendi, Mudisi and Shumba, rinoti raendesa tsamba yeyambiro iyi kukanzuru. Gweta revagari Advocate Phillip Shumba vati kanzuru inofanira kutora matanho ekubvisa makorokoza aya nekuti ndiyo ine matangi emvura ari mugomo remumusha we Target Kopje. Matangi aya anotyirwa kuti akadhirika nekucherwa anogona kupa kuti dzimba dziri pedyo nawo dziyeredzwe nemafashamu emvura sezvo achinzi anotakura marita anosvika mamirironi gumi anopa dhorobha rose mvura yekushandisa. Amai Entrance Takaidza, vemumusha wekwaMajange, vanoti kunze kwenyaya yemvura makorokoza aya ari kushandisa zvinoputika achidhuura gomo zvopa kuti dzimba dzavo dzitsemuke uye kukonzera ruzha rwakanyanya. Meya wedhorobha reMasvingo, VaCollen Maboke, vanoti vari mubishi rekugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Mukuru webasa muMURRA, VaAnoziva Muguti, vanoti vanoti vatora danho iri nekuti hupenyu hwe vanhu hunogona kupinda munjodzi.. Asi mamwe makorokoza akataura ne Studio 7 anoti ivo vari kuchera mugo umu nekuti vari kusevenzera vakuru vakuru vezvematongerwo enyika avaramba kudoma nemazita. Mumwe mukorokoza ati anoda kuzivikanwa nekunzi Chinjiri, ati chavanoda imari zvematangi nedzimba dzevanhu havaneyi nazvo. Magweta eMurra ati aendesawo tsamba idzi kubazi rinoona nezve zvicherwa munyika neku hofisi yegurukota reMasvingo, VaEzra Chadzamira. VaShumba vati pakasabuda zviri kudiwa nevagari nyaya iyi inopedzwa nematare edzimhosva sezvo ine chekuita nekodzero dzevanhu dzakaita sehupenyu ne mvura. No media source currently available

headline: Nhamo Yoramba Yakabata Vamwe Vagari kuChimanimani
text: Vamwe vagari vekuChimanimani vanodarika gumi nevaviri vanonzi vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Izvi zvakaitika mushure mekunge hurumende yati vanhu vanodarika mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu vange vambotama musha nekutyira kuyeredzwa nemafashamu emvura vadzokere kumisha yavo yekumatende avari kugara kubva muna 2019 apo vakaparadzirwa misha nedutumupengo reCyclone Idai. Vanhu ava vakambotamiswa mushure mekunge dunhu iri rapindazve munzira yemafashamu emvura nemadutumupengo emhepo maviri kana kuti Tropical Storm Chalane yakarova muna Zvita, uye Tropical Storm Eloise mwedzi uno. Manicaland ndiro dunhu riri kutevera Harare pavanhu vakawandisa vari kurwara neCovid-19 pari zvino vanove mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matatu nevasere kana kuti 938. Hatina kukwanisa kubata sachigaro mubazi rekudzivirira njodzi kuManicaland kana kuti Civil Protection Committee chairperson, VaEdgars Seenza, vange vachitungamira hurongwa hwekubatsira vanhu ava. Asi tabata mumwe mugari wekuChimanimani kuNgangu VaPardon Maguta. No media source currently available

headline: Kubva Zvavhurwa Mabhodha, Vanhu Makumi Mapfumbamwe Vobatwa neCovid-19 Vabva kuSouth Africa
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu zana nemumwe kana kuti 101 vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weSvondo. Pavanhu ava, makumi mana nevatanhatu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika vamwe makumi mashanu nevashanu vakabva nacho kuSouth Africa. Kubva zvavhurwa miganhu yenyika musi wa 1 Zvita, vanhu makumu mapfumbamwe vakabva kuSouth Africa vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi munyika. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira munyika vave zvuru gumi nemazana manomwe ane gumi nevasere. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vave zvuru zvisere nemazana masere nemakumi masere kana kuti 8, 880 zvichitevera kupora kwevamwe vanhu makumi matatu nevatanhatu nezuro. Vanhu vachiri kurwara vave churu chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemakumi mana nevanomwe kana kuti 1, 547. Vanhu vafa vachiri mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemumwe kana kuti 291 uye nezuro hakuna akarasikirwa nehupenyu. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazana maviri kana kuti 2, 2 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zvuru makumi mashanu nezvitatu zvine mazana mashanu nemakumi mana nevatatu kana kuti 53, 543. Vapora vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezvuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 1,9 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu nemanomwe kana kuti 67 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vadarika zvuru mazana maviri nemakumi masere nemaviri kana kuti kuti 282, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nemana nezvuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 14, 5 million. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 1, 5 million. Asi vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi mana nematatu kana kuti 43 million.

headline: Mutemo Unorambidza Vanhu Kufambafamba Wotadzisa Vanorarama neHIV/Aids Kuwana Mishonga Yavo
text: Rimwe sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, rinoti vamwe vanorarama nehutachiwana hweHIV vagere kumaruwa ari kure vari kukundikana kuenda kunzvimbo dzehutano dzavanositorera mishonga yavo yemaARVs. Mukuru wesangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti vanhu vanodarika mazana mashanu ezviuru vanorarama nehutachiwana hweHIV/Aids vari vari kumaruwa vari kukundikana kuwana chekufambisa kuti vanotora mishonga yavo panguva ino yekurambidzwa kufamba kwevanhu senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCoronavirus. VaMaguwu vanoti izvi zviri kukonzerwa nemutemo wakadzikwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, unorambidza vanhu kufambafamba kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe, senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana hwe coronavirus. Vanoti matunhu avawana nyunyuto iyi anosanganisira reMutasa kuManicaland pamwe neHwange kuMatabeleland North. VaMaguwu vanoti mabhazi ari kubvumidzwa kufamba chete munguva yemushanda kwemutemo wekurambidza vanhu kufambafamba ndeehurumende eZUPCO, ayo vanoti haasvike kunzvimbo dzakawanda dzine vanhu vane matambudziko ava. Sangano reNational Aids Council rakazivisa svondo rapera kuti riri kukurudzira vanorarama nehutachiwana vose kuti vange vaine mishonga yemwedzi mitatu munguva ino yekusafamba kwevanhu kuitira kuti vange vakazvidzivirira zvakakwana. VaMaguwu vanoti sesangano, vanoona sekuti hurumende yaifanirwa kushanda nemasangano akazvimirira oga, uyewo kuti iendese mishonga iyi munzvimbo dziri kumaruwa idzi dzakaita sezvikoro nemakiriniki kuitira kuti vanhu ava vakwanise kuwana mishonga yavo pedyo. No media source currently available

headline: VanaMukoti Voramwa Mabasa kuChipatara cheMpilo
text: Vamwe vana mukoti varatidzira paMpilo Hopital nhasi mangwanani vachiti havasi kusafara nemashandiro avo. Vana mukoti vange vachisvika zana vaungana kwenguva inoda kusvika awa imwe chete pamusiwo mukuru wechipatara ichi vachiimba vamwe vavo vakabata zvinyorwa zvakasiyana-siyana zvichiratidza kusafara kwavo. Mukuru weZimbabwe Nurses Association mudunhu reBulawayo VaDonald Chidowore vati vari kutsutsumwa nedanho rekuti vave kunzi vashande kwemazuva mashanu pavhiki pane kuti vashande mazuva maviri sezvavari kuita pari zvino. Vati havawone chikonzero chekuti vashande kwenguva yakareba seizvi sezvo mari yavari kutambira isiri kuvakwanira uye vasina zvikwanisiro zvekushanda. Munyori mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEventhough Siziba avo vange varipowo pakuratidzira uku vati zvimwe zvinyunyuto zvavana mukoti zvinosanganisira kuti havakwanise kubatsira varwere zvakakwana sezvavanotarisirwa nekuti zvipatara zvakawanda munyika hazvina mishonga. Vatiwo hutano hwaana mukoti huri panjodzi sezvo vasingapiwe mishonga kana zvipfeko zvinovadzivrira kuzvirwere kunyanya panguva ino hutachiwana hwecoronavirus huri kupararira pasi rose. Vamwe vevana mukoti vange vari pabasa vazozodzokera pabasa papera kuratidzira uku. Vanoziva nezviri kuitika vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanamukoti vanzi vamboenderera mberi vachishanda mazuva maviri pasvondo kusvika nyaya iyi yagadziriswa nevakuru vakuru. Taedza kunzwa kubva kumukuru wemabasa ekurapwa paMpilo Dr Solwayo Ngwenya asi vati hapana zvavange vachikwanisa kutaura panyaya iyi nekuti vari pazororo pari zvino. Mukuru wechipatara VaLeonard Mabande vaudzawo Studio parunhare kuti vari kuHarare uko vari kumusangano webazi rezvehutano. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano Dr John Mangwiro vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti vanganyatsoziva nezvekuti vana mukoti vanofanirwa kushanda mazuva managani munyori webazi iri Dr Agnes Mahomva asi tatadza kuvabata sezvo nherembozha yavo yange isingabatike. Vana mukoti pamwe navana chiremba munyika vave nenguva yakareba vachinyunyuta pamusoro pemashandiro avo uye kuti mari yemihoro yavanowana haivakwanire. No media source currently available

headline: Zvinhu Zvinonzi Hazvisati Zvagadzikana paChipatara cheMpilo Kunyange Vanachiremba Vakadzoka paBasa
text: Kunyange hazvo vanachiremba vadiki vakazivisa munguva pfupi yapfuura kuti vave kudzoka pabasa, zvinhu hazvisati zvave kunyatsofamba zvakanaka pachipatara cheMpilo muBulawayo chinove ndicho chipatara chikuru chechipiri munyika. Pasvika Studio 7 pachipatara ichi pakati penguva dza12 na 3 masikati, pange pane madhokotera anoverengeka navanamukoti vakawanda vange vachiwona varwere kuzvikamu zvinorapa varwere vachibva kumba kana kuti Casualty neOutpatients. Vamwe vanamukoti vange vachionawo varwere mumawadhi akasiyana-siyana. Mumwe murume asina kuda kudomwa nezita audza Studio 7 kuti ave nemazuva maviri achiuya kuzoona hama yake iri kurwara pachipatara apa uye ati haazi kugutsikana kuti vanachiremba vadzoka pabasa nemwoyo yavo yose here achiti hama yake iyi haisati yanyatsotaurirwa navanachiremba ava kuti iri kunzweyi. Mumwewo murume angozvidoma nezita rekuti Nyoni atiwo ane hama yake iri muchipatara mekare. VaNyoni vati hama yavo iyi iri kuwonekwa navanachiremba asi vati dambudziko nderekuti vari kunzi vanotenga mishonga sezvo mishonga iyi isiri kuwanikwa pachipatara ichi. Dr Mthabisi Bhebe, munyori weMpilo Doctors Association variwo nhengo yeZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti vana chiremba vadiki vave nenguva inosvika mwedzi vadzokera kubasa. Asi vatiwo sekuziva kwavo zvinhu hazvisati zvanyatsomira zvakanaka muzvipatara zvikuru munyika vachitiwo pane vanachiremba vadiki vanosvika makumi mashanu nevatatu vakasiya mabasa munyika yose uye kune vamwewo vakawanda vari kuda kusiya vachienda kumafuro manyoro. Mukuru wechipatara cheMpilo, VaLeonard Mabande, vaudza Studio 7 kuti havasati vave kukwanisa kutaura kuti zvinhu zvakamira sei uye kuti ndivanachiremba vangani vadzoka pabasa kusvika pari zvino sezvo vachiri kuita ongororo. VaMabande vati vanofara kuti munguva pfupi yapfuura chipatara chavo chakakwanisa kuwana magwenya emagetsi anoita kuti michina inobatsira kurapa vane chirwere chigomarara ishande isingakanganiswe nekuenda kwemagetsi. Vati vanotarisira kuti izvi zvichabatsira varwere zvikuru. Chipatara cheMpilo chaive chine vanachiremba vadiki mazana maviri nevana uye panguva yekuramwa kwavo mabasa, vana chiremba makumi mashanu nemumwe ndivo vakadzingwa basa. Vanoziva zviri kuitika vanoti zvinhu hazvisati zvave kunyatsofamba zvakanaka nekuti vaive vadzingwa ava vanofanirwa kutanga vanyatsodzorwa pabasa zviri pamutemo uye izvi zvinogona kutora nguva. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Mashanu Obatwa neCoronavirus
text: Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter kuti pane mapurisa mashanu akabatwa nechirwere cheCovid19 nemusi weMuvhuro. VaMangwana havana kutaura kuti mapurisa aya akatapurirwa chirwere ichi sei. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano vachiita zvidzidzo zvepamusoro kuBritain, Dr Edgar Munatsi vakaudza Studio 7 kuti kubatwa kwemapurisa aya nechirwere ichi hakusi kuvashamisa nekuti vanofamba vari mumarori vasingatevedzere mitemo yekuti vasatapurirwe chirwere ichi. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus munyika hwakwira kusvika pamazana mashanu nemakumo mapfumbamwe nemumwe kana kuti 591. Izvi zvinotevera kubatwa nechirwere ichi kwevamwe vanhu gumi nevanomwe nezuro. Pavanhu ava pane gumi nevatatu vakabva kuSouth Africa, vatatu vakatapurirwa munyika uye mumwe chete kubva kuBotswana. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vanosvika zana nemakumi matanhatu nevaviri kana kuti 162. Vanhu vafa vachiri vanomwe. Kuwedzera kwehuwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi huri kuuya apo vashandi vemuzvipatara vakawanda kusanganisira vanachiremba nevakoti vari kuramwa mabasa vachiti havasi kufara nemari dzavari kutambira. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano Doctor Obadiah Moyo sesvo vasati vapindura mashoko atakavatumira nezvenyaya yekuramwa Mabasa kwevashandi vehurumende. Mumashoko kuvashandi vose vehurumende, gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakati vainge vawedzera vashandi mari zvakapetwa zvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana uye kuti vaizovapa mamwe madhora manomwe nemashanu ekubatsirikana. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nevatatu kana kuti 383,000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muAfrica. Vashaya vadarika zviuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemumwe kana kuti 9,691. Vapora vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi masere nevatatu kana kuti 183,000. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni gumi nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 10,3 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi ichiteverwa neBrazil. Vanhu vafa muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nemanomwe kana kuti 127, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAmerica vachidarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matanhatu, 2,6 million. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vadarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemasere kana kuti 508,000.  \nVapora vachidarika mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 5,2 million.

headline: Coronavirus Yovhiringidza Kucherechedzwa Zvakanaka kweZuva RaanaAmai
text: Vanhu vakawanda pasi rose vavhiringidzwa zvikuru kucherechedza Zuva reMother’s Day sezvo vachiri vakazvivharira mudzimba nekutya kutapurirwa chirwere checoronavirus. Vakawanda vanoti vangotumira zvipo asi vamwe vachiti vangotaura nevanaamai vavo pambozhanhare uye vachazoita mabiko kana zvecoronavirus zvapera. Zuva rekutenda mabasa anoitwa naanaamai iri rinochercehdzwa musvondo rechipiri rwemwedzi waChivabvu gore roga roga. Muzvare Wendy Muperi avo vari kuIreland vati vanoda kutenda amai wavo vakavarera vari vashanu kunyangwe zvinhu zvainge zvakaoma. No media source currently available VaWhisper Ganya avo vari kuCape Town, South Africa vatendawo amai wavo vari kuMt Darwin vachiti vanoda kuvarangarira nezvose zvavakavaitira mukukura kwavo. No media source currently available Muzvare Netsai Marova vanogara kuMabvuku vati vanoda kuti Mwari aropafadze amai vavo nebasa guru rekuvachengeta. No media source currently available Izvi zvatsigirwawo naVaKumbirai Mafunda vari muHarare vati amai wavo vari kwaVumbunu, Manicaland nemamwe madzimai ose vakakosha zvikuru muhupenyu uye vakati vazvichengetedze munguva ino yecoronavirus. No media source currently available

headline: Varwere Voshaya muZvipatara Sezvo Musina Varapi
text: Sangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association rinoti richiri mubishi kuongora kuti huwandu hwevacheche nemadzimai vakashaya apo vaisununguka apo vana chiremba vairatidzira kutanga neChishanu hwakamira sei. Mutungamiri wavana chiremba ava, Dr Fortune Nyamande, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mari dzemihoro dzave kuoneka mumabhanga kunyangwe vachikwanisa kudzitora neChipiri chete. Mumashoko aburitswa nesangano ravana chiremba neravana mukoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association mushure memusangano wavakaita neMuvhuro, masangano aya ati achadzokera kubasa chete kana vabata mari yavo nemusi weChipiri. Vatiwo vanoda kuti vapihwe mabhonasi avo musi wa 31 Ndira. Asi vakuru vemamwe maasangano evashandi vehurumende vakasangana nagavhuna webhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, vakaudzwa kuti hurumende haina mari uye mabhonasi angangopihwa vanhu mukati memwedzi mitanhatu. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa, kanawo gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha dzavo. Dr Nyamande vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaProsper Chitambara, vanoti dambudziko rekutadza kubhadhara vashandi hari kuvashamisa uye zvichatora nguva kuti hurumende irigadzirise. No media source currently available

headline: Munhu Mumwe Chete Ofa neCovid-19 kuBulawayo Asi kuMash.East neCental Hakuchina Ane Chirwere Ichi
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muBulawayo nMugovera. Izvi zvinoreva kuti vanhu vafa nyika yose vave mazana maviri nemakumi mana nevatatu kana kuti 243. Vanhu vashanu vakabatwawo nechirwere ichi uye vose vari muBulawayo makare munova mavakachitapurirwawo munharaunda zvekare. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika vave zviuru zvisere nemazana matatu ane makumi matanhatu nemanomwe kana kuti 8, 367. Vanhu gumi vakaporawo kubva kuchirwere ichi, uye vanomwe vacho vari muBulawayo vamwe vatatu kuMasvingo. Vapora nyika yose vave zviuru zvinomwe nemazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevana kana kuti 7, 894. Vanhu vachiri kurwara mazana maviri nemakumi matatu kana kuti 230. Pavanhu vari kurwara ava, zana nevaviri kana kuti 102 vari muBulawayo uye makumi matanhatu nevatatu vari muHarare. Asi kuMashonaland East neMasvingo hakuchina kana munhu mumwe chete ari kurwara neCovid-19 parizvino. kuMashonaland Central kune munhu mumwe chete chete. Nezuro kwakavhenekwa vanhu mazana matanhatu nemakumi masere nemumwe kana kuti 681. Pavanhu ava, mazana mashanu nevatanhatu kana kuti 530 vari muHarare muBulawayo makumi mana nevapfumbamwe uye Manicaland makumi mapfumbamwe nevana. Ko chii chiri kupa kuti zvinhu zviite kunge zvisina kumira zvakanaka muBulawayo? Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vakambotungamira Chitungwiza Hospital, Dr Enoch Mayida vanoti vamwe vanhu vanonzi vanenge vabatwa nechirere ichi muBulawayo vanenge vari vemumamwe maguta asi vavhenekerwa mudhorobha iri. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari Vofarira Kuvandudzwa kweMabvuku Clinic Kuve Chipatara
text: Kanzuru yeHarare ichishanda nemasangano akazvimiririra yakavandudza kirinika yeMabvuku kuve chipatara izvo zvoyemurwa zvikuru nevagari vekuMabvuku. Vagari vanoti kuvepo kwechipatara ichi kuri kuvabatsira zvikuru mukuwana kodzero yehutano nemutengo wakaderera. Chipatara cheMabvuku ichi chave nemishina inoshandiswa kuonekwa zviri mumuviri inosanganisira ma ultra sound scans ne radiological services. Pachipatara apa pave kuvhiyiwawo kusanganisira madzimai anenge ane pamuviri, kubviswa mazino pamwe nekutorwa maX-Ray. Kirinika iyi isati yave chipatara, vanhu vaitumirwa kuzvipatara zvakadai seHarare Hospital neParirenyatwa Group of Hospitals. Amai Sandra Masiyiwa ndeumwe mugari wekuMabvuku. Amai Masiyiwa, avo vanga vachibva kuchipatara cheMabvuku kunorapisa mwana wavo, vanoti kusimudzirwa kwekirinika iyi kuti ive chipatara kwavarerutsira hupenyu sezvo zvobatsira mukurapwa kwavo pachipatara chiri pedyo navo. Izvi zvatsigirwa naMuzvare Caroline Kazingizi avo vaudza Studio7 kuti kuvapo kwechipatara ichi kwava kuderedza mari yavanoshandisa mukuwana hutano hwakanaka. Muzvare Kazingizi vanoti munguva shoma yapfuura vaiti vakasangana nematambudziko anoda maX-Ray kana kuvhiyiwa vaitonotsvaka rubatsiro kuzvipatara zvakadai seHarare Hospital neParirenyatwa izvo zvavanoti zvanga zviri kure navo huye pachidawo mari dzekufambisa kuenda kuzvipatara izvi. Mumwe mugari wekuMabvuku angoda kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti Obiama atiwo kuvapo kwechipatara pedyo navo kunobatsira kuchengetedza hutano hwavo sezvo vamwe vairasikirwa nehupenyu vachiendeswa kunobatsirwa kunezvimwe zvipatara. Asi VaNdlovu vatiwo chiri kunetsa pachipatara ichi inyaya yechinono, vakati varwere vari kunonoka kubatsirwa. Mukuru anoona nezvemabasa ehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Dr Prosper Chonzi, vanoti kuvapo kwechipatara cheMabvuku kwaderedza zvikuru varwere vanoendeswa kune zvimwe zvipatara. VaChonzi vati sekanzuru vanofadzwa zvikuru kuti varwere vowana kubatsirwa panzvimbo imwe chete vakatiwo izvi zvinobetsera kuchengetedza hupenyu kunyanya kumadzimai anenge asangana nenjodzi mukusununguka. Kanzuru yeHarare inoti iri kutarisira kuvandudzawo mamwe emakirinika ayo ari mumusha inogara vazhinji kuti avewo zvipatara. No media source currently available

headline: Madhokotera Anoenderera Mberi Achiramwa Mabasa
text: Vanachiremba nevanamukoti vapinda mumigwagwa muHarare vachiti havasi kuzodzokera kubasa kudzamara vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wesangano ravanachiremba, reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, VaPeter Magombeyi, vabuditswa muhupambwa. Vanachiremba nevanamukoti vanga vachidarika mazana matatu varatidzira muHarare vachiti havasi kufara nekupambwa kwakaitwa VaMagombeyi vachiti havasi kuzodzokera kubasa kana VaMagombeyi vasina kubuditswa muhupambwa. Vamwe vanga vari pakati pevaratidziri ava vanosanganisira hama dzaVaMagombeyi, idzo dzaratidza kushushikana zvikuru nekupambwa kwakaitwa hama yavo neMugovera nevari kufungidzirwa kuti vasori. Baba vaVaMagombeyi, VaHarry Magombeyi, vati mhuri yavo yose iri kushushikana mupfungwa kubva pakapambwa mwana wavo uye vane tarisiro yekuwana mwana wavo ari mupenyu. Mumwe chiremba mukuru anga ari pakati pevaratidziri ava, VaBothwell Mbuvayesango, vati havakwanise kushanda kudzamara VaMagombeyi vawanikwa. Vanachiremba vakatanga kuramwa mabasa neSvondo zvichitevera kupambwa kwakaitwa VaMagombeyi. Munyori musangano rinomirira vanamukoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEdwick Nhema, vatiwo vari kutyirawo hupenyu hwavo zvakare zvichitevera mashoko ekutyisidzira akasvitswa panharembozha yavo VaMagombeyi vasati vapambwa neMugovera. Vanamukoti vekuBulawayovanonziwo vatanga kuramwa mabasa nepamusana pekupambwa kwaVaMagombeyi pamwe nekushomeka kwemari dzavari kutambiriswa nehurumende. KuChinhoyi zvinonzi madhokotera chete ndiwo ari kuramwa mabasa. Zvichakadai, munyori musangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, VaTawanda Zvakada, vati varwere muzvipatara zvakawanda havasisina achavarapa nekuda kwekuramwa mabasa kwavari kuita uku. Vanachiremba nevanamukoti vanga vachiratidzira muHarare vatadza kusvika kuparamende mushure mekunge mapurisa anga akapakatira zvombo avavharira panosangana migwagwa inoti Mazowe Street naJosiah Tongogara kuti vasapinde pakati peguta vachibva pachipatara cheParirenyatwa pavatangira kuratidzira uku vakatakura zvinyorwa zvakasiyana-siyana. Mushure memaawa maviri varitidziri ava vakamiswa nemapurisa panzvimbo iyi apo pavanga vachiimba zvakaomara, mapurisa azobvumidza hutungamiri hwevaratidziri ava chete kuti hunosiya gwaro renyunyuto kudare reparamende. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi gurukota rezvehutano, VaObadiah Moyo, vakaudza vatori venhau nezuro kuti kuti hurumende ichashandisa mauto nemapurisa kuti abatsire muzvipatara sezvo vana chiremba vari kuramwa mabasa. Zvichakadai, sangano ravachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights raburitsa mashoko ekutsoropodza kupambwa kwaVaMagombeyi richiti hurumende inofanira kuona kuti VaMgombeyi vawanikwa uye kodzero dzeveruzhinji dzachengetedzwa. Hurumende yakazivisa kuti yaudza mapazi ayo ose anoona nezvekudzivirirwa nekuchengetedzwa kwenyika kuti aferefete kuti zvizivikanwe kuti VaMagombeyi vakapambwa nani, hurumende ichiti pari zvino haisi kuzivawo kuti VaMagombeyi varipi. Kupambwa kwaVaMagombeyi kwashorwawo nesangano rinomirira vadzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inokurudzirwa Kuendesa Muzvare Joanna Mamombe kuChipatara
text: Sangano reWomen's Academy for Leadership and Political Excellence, kana kuti WALPE, uye rimwe rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu pasi rose, reInternational Commission of Jurists (ICJ), ari kukurudzira hurumende yeZimbabwe kuti iendese kuchipatara mumiriri weHarare West mudare reparamende, Muzvare Joana Mamombe, vebato reMDC Alliance, avo vasiri kunzwa zvakanaka kujeri reChikurubi kwavari. Muzvare Mamombe vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutyora mitemo yeCovid-19. Kunyangwe vange vamboendeswa kuchipatara cheParktown nemusi weChina, Muzvare Mamombe vakamanikidzwa kubuditswa muchipatara ichi nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori kunyangwe vanachiremba vaiti vaifanira kugara muchipatara vachivhenekwa. Sangano reICJ rinoti zvave pachena kuti mutemo wave kushandiswa sechombo chekutsikirira vanopikisa muZimbabwe. Sangano iri rinoti mukusaburitsa Muzvare Mamombe mujeri, hurumende iri kutyora bumbiro remutemo, pachikamu chechimakumi mashanu, kana kuti Article 50(d), chinoti musungwa ane kodzero yekurapwa. Rinotiwo Zimbabwe iri kutyora zvibvumirano neUnited Nations pakubata vasungwa. Tatumira mibvunzo kugurukota rezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, nezvemashoko aya asi vange vasati vapindura pataenda pamhepo. Tatumirawo mimwe mibvunzo yedu kumutauriri weZimbabwe Prisons and Correctional Services (ZPCS), Superintendent Meya Khanyezi, asi vange vasatiwo vapindura. Mukuru wesangano reWALPE, Muzvare Stabile Dewa, vanoti havasi kufara nemabatirwo ari kuitwa Muzvare Mamombe. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzoshushikana neKushomeka kweVanhu Vari Kubaiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Nyanzvi dzezvehutano dzinoti dziri kushushikana zvikuru nekushomeka kwevanhu vari kuzvipira kubaiwa nhomba yekudzvirira Covid-19 kunyange hazvo pave nezvirongwa zviviri zviri kufambiswa nguva imwe chete zvinoti Phase 1 ne Phase 2. Nemusi weChina vanhu vanokwana mazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu, kana kuti 395, ndivo chete vakazvipira kubaiwa nhomba iyi, kuchitiwo nemusi weChitatu vanhu makumi mashanu nevanomwe, 57, ndivo bedzi vakabaiwa nyika yose. Huwandu hwevanhu vabaiwa nhomba kubva patanga chirongwa ichi hwakasvika pazviuru makumi mana nevaviri, kana kuti 40 002. Phase 1 yakanangana nekubayiwa kwevashandi vari mune zvehutano, mapurisa nemauto pamwe nevanoshanda kumiganhu yenyika, kuchitiwo Phase 2 ichinanganawo nekubayiwa kwevarairidzi, vashandi vemumahotera, vemakereke, pamwe nevakwegura. Vashandi vezvehutano ndevamwe vanonzi havasi kuzvipira kubaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 yeSinoPharm yakabva kuChina iyi. Hurumende yakazivisa kuti ine tarisiro yekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi senzira yekudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwehutachiwana. Asi mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti kana pakasave nedzidziso yakasimba chikamu chepiri chePhase chinogona zvakare kuita sechikamu chekutanga kushaya vanhu vanozvipira kunobayiwa. VaRusike vanoti havaone hurumende ichisvika pamamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana zvevana veZimbabwe, zvainotarisira kuti zvichabaiwa nhomba iyi nyika yose kunze kwekunge yashanda zvakasimba nemasangano evashandi mukushambadza nhomba iyi kuti itambirike muvanhu. Asi mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvirongwa zvekubaya vanhu nhomba zviri kufamba hazvo zvakanaka, uye vakaparurawo zvirongwa zvekukwezva veruzhinji kuti vabaiwe nhomba iyi, izvo zvave kuitawo kuti vashandi vari muboka rezvehutano vakawanda vatambire nhomba iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Dzimwe Nyanzvi Dzinoti Mitemo yeCovid-19 Lockdown Ngaibviswe, Chikuru Kubayiwa Nhomba kweVeruzhinji
text: Hurumende yakawedzera nemasvondo maviri mitemo yeCovid-19, kana kuti Level 2 Lockdown. Izvi zvakaziviswa nemusi weChipiri negurukota rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa. Vachitaura kuvatori venhau, Amai Mutsvangwa vakati mabhawa ane marezenisi ekuita basa rawo anogona kubvumidza vanhu vakabayiwa nhomba dzose kuti vapinde mumabhawa avo, asinvachiti mabhawa anosungirwa kutevedzera mitemo yose yokurwisana neCovid-19. Pasi pemitemo yeLockdown Level 2, vanhu vanorambidzwa kufambafamba pakati pa10 o’clock manheru na 5:30 mangwanani. Mabhizimisi anovhurwa na 8 o’clock mangwanani achisungirwa kuvharwa na 7 o’clock manheru. Amai Mutsvangwa vanoti veruzhinji vanokurudzirwa kutevedzera mitemo yose yekurwisana nedenda reCovid-19. Vachipindura mashoko abva kuhurumende aya, vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati maLockdown apedza basa rawo asi hurumende inofanirwa kuwedzera zvikuru huwandu hwevanhuu vanobayiwa nhomba zuva rogaroga. Dr Madzorera vati hazvibetseri kuti zuva nezuva hurumende iudze vanhu kuti vanhu vangani vafa neCovid-19, vachiti vanhu vanoda kuziva kuti mishonga iri kushanda sei uye vangani vakaita dambudziko mushure mekubayiwa nhomba. Vanoti hurumende inofanira kuudza vanhu zvinovakurudzira kuti vabaiwe nhomba, vachiti inofanirwavo kutsvaka motikari dzinoenda kwakasiyana siyana, kana kuti ‘mobile clinics’, kunobaya nhomba avo vasingakwanisi kusvika kuzvipatara kana kunzvimbo dzinobaiwa vanhu nhomba Chimwe chataurwa naDr Madzorera ndechekuti hurumende inofanirwa kushanda nevamwe vakazvimirira nekuti haisi kuzopedza chirwere ichi iri yega. No media source currently available Tabatavo mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vakati vari kunze kwenyika, vachiti vachataura nesu kana vadzoka munyika.

headline: Hurumende Yoronga Kuongorora Madzimai Akawanda Chirwere cheGomarara
text: Hurumende inoti inotarisira kuve yaongorora gomarara remuromo wechibereko pamadzimai mamiriyoni matatu nemazana maviri panozosvika gore ra2020. Asi hurumende iri kutendawo kuti kune mamwe maruwa uchava mutoro sezvo kusina michina. Amai Yeukai Zhou vanobva kwaNhema kuShurugwi vanoti kunyanyangwe hazvo vachiziva kuti zvakakosha kuongoorwa gomarara rechibereko kusavepo kwezvipatara pedyo navo zvinoisa hutano hwavo panjodzi. Aya ndiwo matambudziko akasangana nemadzimai akawanda ari mumaruwa kunova kunogara vanhu vazhinji. Vamwe chiremba vari nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano hwemadzimai Dr Angeline Mapanga vanoti gomarara remuromo wechibereko iri rinokonzerwa neHuman Papiloma Virus inotapuriranwa pabonde. Gwaro reNational Cancer Prevention and Control Strategy for Zimbabwe (2014-2018) rinoti pamagomarara ese, gomarara remuromo wechibereko ndo ririkunyanyouraya madzimai nezvikamu makumi matatu nechidimbu kubva muzana. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo gomarara rechibereko idambudziko guru munyika. Mumwe mukuru mubazi rezvehutano, Doctor Bernard Madzima vanoti vari kuvavarira kuve vaongorora gomarara iri pamadzimai mamiriyoni matatu nemazana maviri ezviuru panozosvika gore ra2020. VaMadzima vanoti parizvino pagore kuri kuongororwa madzimai anosvika zana rezviuru vachiti huwandu uhwu huripasi zvakanyanya uye nyika inofanirwa kuwedzera huwandu hwevanhu vanoongororwa. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo Zimbabwe rine nzvimbo dzinosvika zana nemakumi matatu dzinoongorora gomarara remuromo wechibereko. Mumwe mushandi wekuZimbabwe Association of Church Related Hospitals Amai Anna Machakata Rufu avo vane zvipatara zvinopawo madzimai mikana yekunoongororwa gomarara remuromo wechibereko pachena vanoti hapana chingakonese Zimbabwe kusvitsa huwandu hwemadzimai avanotarisira kuve vaongorora gomarara iri muna 2020. Amai Muchakata Rufu vanoti zvakakosha parizvino kupa madzimai ruzivo rwekuti zvii zvakanakira kuongororwa gomarara remuromo wechibereko. Vatiwo madzimai anofanira kubvunza pazvipatara zviri pedyo navo kuti vaziviswe kwavanogona kunoongororwa pachena. Gwaro rakaburitswa nekomiti yeseneti inoona nezvekuenzaniswa kwemikana nebudiriro mushure mukushanyira zvipatara zvine michina yekuongorora gomarara iri rakaburitsa pachena kuti pavanhu zviuru zvinomwe vakaongororwa pachipatara cheParirenyatwa, zviuru zviviri vakashaya. Rufu urwu runonzi rurukukonzerwa nekuti vanhu vanenge vanonoka kuenda kuchipatara kana kuti vanenge vasina mari yekutenga mushonga uyo unodhura. Komiti iyi inotiwo muna 2018 bazi rezvehutano rakapihwa mari inosvika zviuru mazana makumi mashanu zvekushambadzira chirwere ichi asi gore rino rakapihwa zviuru makumi manomwe nemashanu chete. Komiti iyi yakakurudzira hurumende kuti ishambadzire nezvechirwere ichi kumunhu wese uye kuumba homwe yekurapa gomarara sezvakaitwa HIV/AIDS. No media source currently available

headline: National Aids Council Yoronga Hurongwa Hunobatsira Matunhu Madiki
text: Sangano reNational Aids Council rinoti hurongwa hwaro hwekuti matunhu madiki kana kuti madhisitirikiti azvirongere oga mashandisirwo emari inobva muhomwe ye AIDS Fund hwave padanho repamusoro soro. Mukuru anoona nezvemari musangano iri, VaAlbert Manenji, vanoti vakaona zvakakosha kuti vatore danho iri sezvo mamwe matunhu anga achichema chema kuti ari kunonoka kana kutotadza kuwana mari idzi nekuda kwezvimhingamipinyi zvinokonzerwa nekugoverwa kwemari kana ichibva kumuzinda. Vanoti pari zvino sangano iri riri kungoita zvirongwa zvakafanana kumatunhu ose, pasina kutariswa kuti zvichemo zvinogona kusiyana dunhu nedunhu. Gore rino sangano iri rakaisa parutivi mari inosvika mamiriyoni mashanu ekushandisa mukurwisa pamwe nekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Matunhu makuru gumi emunyika achawana mazana mashanu ezviuru zvemadhora iyo anozopa kumatunhu maduku zvichienderana nezvirongwa zvaanenge achiita. Svondo rino misangano yekukwenenzvera hurongwa uhwu iri pakati kuMasvingo uko humiriri hwematunhu madiki ose ari makumi masere nemashanu munoshandira sangano reNational Aids Council huri kudzidziswa. No media source currently available

headline: Varwere Voomerwa neHupenyu Sezvo Vanotengesa Mishonga Vovhara Zvitoro
text: Zvimwe zvitoro zvinotengesa mishonga kana kuti mapharmacies zviri kuvharwa kune dzimwe nzvimbo nekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Sangano reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights (ZADHR) rinoti bazi rezvehutano riri panguva yakaoma nemamirirro akaita zvinhu munyika. Mutungamiri we sangano rePharmaceutical Society of Zimbabwe (PSZ), Amai Portia Mwendera vanoti kushaikwa kwemari yekuti vatenge mishonga nezvinodiwa kugadzira mishonga munyika ndizvo zvauraya basa revanotengesa nekugadzira mishonga. Sangano reZimbabwe Diabetes Association, rinotungamirirwa nevave mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, Doctor John Chamunorwa mangwiro rinoti riri kushingirira kutsvaga nzira dzekubatsira nadzo varwere veshuga kuti vawane mishonga pachena senzira yekubatsira varwere munyika. Doctor mangwiro vati vakabatikana uye havakwanisi kutaura zvizhinji maerrano nekushaikwa kwemishonga munyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemishonga vachishanda nekambani yeAfro Pham Pharmacies, VaMartin Chinembiri vanoti kana bhanga guru renyika re RBZ rikasagadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi munyika kuti vemakambani nezvitoro vagone kuwana mari dze kuAmerica dzinodiwa kuti vahodhe zvakanaka, hapana chinofamba. Vanotiwo izvi zviri kusiya varwere vakaomerwa ne hupenyu. No media source currently available

headline: Dzimwe Nhengo dzeParamende Dzinoti Hurumende Ngaibude Pachena paRubatsiro rweCovid-19
text: Apo huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nehutachiwana weCoronavirus huri kuramba huchikwira munyika, dzimwe nhengo dzeparamende muHarare dzinoti dzinodawo kuva nechekuita nehurongwa hwehurumende hwekudzivirira chirwere ichi pamwe nekuona kuti rubatsiro rwuri kupihwa nyika pamusoro peCoronavirus rwuri kufambiswa sei. Nhengo dzeparamende nemakanzura emuHarare dzinoti dzinofanira kuva nechekuita nemabasa ehurumende ekudzivirira chirwere cheCoronavirus. Mumiriri weGlen Norah muNational Assembly, VaWellingotn Chikombo, vati izvi zvakakosha nekuti vanongonzwa kuti pane zviri kuitwa nehurumende, asi kunzvimbo dzavanomirira kusina chiri kuitika. Asi VaChikombo vati kunyange hazvo paramande yakavharwa, inofanirwa kuvhura sezvakaita paramende yekuAmerica kuitira kuti izeye nyaya dzakakosha dzinobata Covid-19. Mumiriri weWarren Park, VaShakespear Hamauswa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakakosha kuti muhurongwwa hwayo hurumende ishande nenhengo dzeparamende mukudzivirira Coronavirus. Vatiwo vanongonzwa kuti hurumende iri kuwana zvinhu zvekushandisa kudzviririra Coronavirus asi havasi kuona zvinhu izvi munzvimbo yavanomirira. VaHamauswa vatiwo kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kuti zvikoro zvepamusoro zviri kugadzira mamasiki nemasanitaiza, zvinhu izvi hazvisati zvave kuwanikwa mumisha inogara vazhinji uye zvakakosha kuti hurumende ishande nemadzimai ane makirabhu ekokusona mumisha iyi pakugadzira zvinhu izvi. Kanzura weWard 16 muHarare, VaDenford Ngadziore, vaudza Studio7 kuti havasati vatanga kuwana maSanitiser and maMask vachiti vari kuwana zvinhu izvi kubva kumasangano anoshanda kazvimirira, asi zvishoma. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubazi rezvehutano kana kugurukota rinoona nezvedunhu reHarare, VaOliver Chidhau, sezvo vange vasiri kudaira mbozhanhare yavo. Asi mumashoko avo, sachigaro weTaskforce inoona nezvechirwere cheCoronavirus, zvakare vari mumwe wevatevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika, VaKembo Mohadi, vazivisa kuti nyika ichawedzera huwandu hwevanhu vari kuongororwa zvichiteverwa kuvhurwa kweimwe nzvimbo inoita ongororo yechirwere cheCoronavirus kuBulawayo. Vatiwo pane dzimwe nzvimbo dzekuongorora chirwere ichi dzichavhurwa munguva pfupi iri kutevera. Asi VaMohadi vati Taskforce yavo yakaita misangano mumatunhu ese munyika ichinzwa pfungwa kubva kunhengo dzeparamende pamwe nevakuru vakuru mumatunhu aya uye ichashandisa zvakabuda mumisangano iyi kusimbaradza chirongwa chayo chekudzivirira kupararira kweCoronavirus. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vabatwa neCovid-19 Hunoramba Huchikwira Munyika
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika huri kuramba huchikwira zvakanyanya zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwevamwe gumi nevanomwe (17) vaine chirwere ichi pakati pevanhu zviuru zviviri nemazana mana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu (2 495) vakavhenekwa nemusi weChina. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neChina manheru kuti huwandu hwevanhu vane chirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yose hwange hwave pazana nemakumi mana nevapfumbamwe (149). Vanhu vapona kubva kuchirwere ichi vasvikawo pamakumi maviri nevasere (28), uye vafa nechirwere ichi vachiri vana (4). Izvi zvinouya panguva iyo vanachiremba pachipatara cheGweru Provincial Hospital vakabudirira neChina wakare kusunungutsa mudzimai aive nepamuviri ane chirwere cheCovid-19, muchiitiko chinove chekutanga muZimbabwe. Sangano ravanachiremba vakuru, reZimbabwe Senior Hospital Doctors Assciation, rinoti vanachiremba ava vakakwanisa kusunungutsa mudzimai uyu kuburikidza nekumuvhiya kuti vakwanise kuburitsa mwana. Huwandu hwevanhu vavhenekwa kuti vane chirwere cheCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete munyika yose hunonzi hwasvika pazviuru makumi mana nemazana masere ane makumi mana nevanomwe (40 847). Chipatara cheJohns Hopkins chemuAmerica chinoti pasi rose huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hwadarika mamiriyoni mashanu nemazana masere ezviuru (5,8 million), kuchitiwo vafa vadarika mazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu ezviuru (360 000). Chipatara ichi chinoti vanhu vaongororwa pasi rose vadarika mamiriyoni gumi neshanu nemazana matanhatu ezviuru (15.6 million). Muno muAmerica vanhu vanodarika miriyoni nemazana manomwe ezviuru (1.7 million) vabatwa nechirwere ichi, uye vashaya vadarikawo zviuru zana nechimwe nemazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nemumwe chete (101.621). Mumwe chiremba ataura akazvimirira, Doctor Gilson Mandigo, vanoti zvinotyisa kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa chirwere che Covid-19 hwanyanya kukwira zvikuru svondo rino. Asi vanoti chakanaka panyaya iyi ndechekuti vanhu ava vari munzvimbo dzavakachengetedzwa kana kuti quarantine centres, zvekuti havakwanise kuparadzira chirwere ichi kune vamwe vagara vari munyika. Doctor Mandigo vakorokotedzawo kubudirira kwakaita vanachiremba vekuchiptarata cheGweru Provincial Hopsital, vachiti mucherechedzo wekuti hazvisi zvinhu zvose zvakashata zviri kubuda mubazi rezvehutano, kune zvimwe zvakanakawo zviri kuitika, kunyange hazvo vanachiremba navanamukoti vari kushupika. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Zana neMakumi Mashanu neMumwe (151) Vafa neChirwere cheMalaria Chopararira muNyika
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vaongororwe pamwe nekurapwa chirwere chemalaria icho chiri kuramba chichiuraya vanhu munyika. Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano VaDonald Mujiri vati kusvika parizvino vanhu zana nemakumi mashanu nemumwe vafa nechirwere cheMalaria gore rino chete. VaMujiri vati ongororo yavo yezvirwere yakaratidza kuti pavhiki ra17 kusvika 23 Gumiguru vanhu churu chimwechete nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vazhinji vari vekuMashonaland East kwozotevera Mashonaland Central province. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu vana vakafa panguva imwechete iyi nechirwere vaviri vari vemuHarare. Vachitaura neStudio 7 mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Doctor Prosper Chonzi vatiwo kunyangwe muHarare manga musina dambudziko rechirwere ichi ravemo. Dr Chonzi vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vaongororwe chirwere ichi vakaita zviratidzo zvekuti vabatwa nacho. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti zvikamu zvinodarika gumi nezviviri kubva muzana zvevari kubatwa nechirwere chemalaria munyika vana vari pasi pemakore mashanu.VaChonzi vati vana ava vanowanzobatwa nemalaria sezvo vachinyanyotambira panze uye vasingagoni kukurumidza kutaura kana vachidzimbikana nemuviri. Dr Chonzi vatiwo kuzvipatara zvekanzuru kuongororwa malaria kunoitwa pachena uyewo mishonga yechirwere ichi inopiwa pachena. Nyanzvi munezvehutano uye vaimbova gurukora rezvehutano Doctor Henry Madzorera vati chirwere chemalaria chirwere chinorapika. VaMadzorera vati hurumende inofanirwa kupfapfaidza mishonga munogona kuberekera humhutu kudzivirira ndufu dzechirwere ichi Dr Madzorera vatiwo veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuzvidzivirira kuchirwere ichi kuburikidza nekuzvivhara muviri kana vachinge vari panze husiku uyewo kushandisa zvinodzinga humhutu kana vari mudzimba dzavanorara. VaMujiri vatiwo hurumende yakatotanga chirongwa chekupfapfaidza dzimba kumatunhu makumi maviri nemashanu uye vari kutarisira kubatsira vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana masere kana kuti 2.8 million. Bazi rezvehutano ririkukurudzira kuti avo vanopihwa mambure ekudzivirira humhutu vanofanirwa kuashandisa sezvinotarisirwa vachiti vamwe vanoguma voshandisa mamwe mabasa vachizviisa panjodzi yekubata malaria. Ko munhu anoziva sei kuti abatwa nechirwere ichi? Nyanzvi dzinoti anotanga kupisa muviri, kurutsa, kutemwa nemusoro, kuneta. Manyoka nekungorwadziwa nemuviri. No media source currently available

headline: Varwere vePfungwa paNgomahuru Vogeza Mudziva Rine Ngwena Nekushaya Mvura
text: Dzimwe hama dzevarwere vepfungwa vari pachipatara cheNgomahuru kuMasvingo dzinoti dziri kutyira kuti vanogona kurumwa nemakarwe kana kunyura mumvura apo vanenge vachigeza murwizi sezvo chipatara ichi chaita dambudziko guru rekushaya mvura kubva zvafa pombi dzemvura. Vakuru vepachipatara apa vanoti vave kusvika mwedzi miviri vasina mvura sezvo Zimbabwe National Water Authority(ZINWA) isiri kugadzira muchina unopomba mvura. Mukuru wepachipatara apa, Dr Parirenyatwa Maramba, vati varwere vanofanira kugeza zuva nezuva nekudaro vanotoenda kurwizi rweMagwangwadza, urwo runopinda mudhamu reTugwi Mukosi rine makarwe anorura. Asi izvi hazvisi kufadza hama dzevarwere ava dzinoti dzave kugara dzakabatira hura mumaoko dzichityira kuti vanogona kubatwa nemakarwe kana kunyura mumadziva sezvo pfungwa dzavo dzisinganyatsoita zvakanaka. VaSimbarashe Dhauzi, vane mwana wavo pachipatara apa vanoti vave nenguva vachishungurudzika nekutyira hupenyu hwemwana wavo. Amai Anna Magwaza, vekwa Madamombe, kwaChivi, vane hanzvadzi yavo inogara pachipatara apa vanoti kunze kwekutyira makarwe, hama dzavo dzinogona kutiza vashandi vepachipatara apa pavonobuda muwaya vachienda kurwizi vakazoshaikwa zvachose votetereka nenyika. Vanoona nezvekushanda neveruzhinji pachipatara cheNgomahuru, VaMorgan Manzunzu, vanoti vanotairisa kuti dambudziko iri richagadziriswa nekukurumidza, uye vari kutora matanho kuti varwere vasanyura kana kubatwa nemakarwe. Vaenderera mberi vachiti mvura yekunwa nekubikira varwere vanotora pachibhorani asi yekugeza inodiwa yakawanda nekuwandawo kwakaita varwere ndosaka vachienda kurwizi. Mutauriri weZINWA, Amai Marjorie Munyonga, vati dambudziko riri kugadziriswa uye vanotarisira kutanga kupomba mvura zvakanaka mangwana(Chipriri 16). Chipatara cheNgomahuru chine varwere vepfungwa vanosvika zana nemakumi matatu nevashanu. Varume vari zana negumi uye vakadzi vari makumi maviri nevashanu. Chipatara ichi ndicho choga chevarwere vepfungwa mudunhu reMasvingo uye chiri chimwe chezvishoma munyika yose. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoendesa VanaHutsana kuRufu neKune Mamwe Magungano Kuyedza Kurwisa Cholera
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvehutano Dr David Parirenyatwa vakaudza dare reparamende kuti hurumende ichange ichitumira vanahutsana kumachechi, kurufu nepamwe pose panoungana vanhu zvikuru muChegutu nenzvimbo dzakapoteredza kuti vaona kuti chirwere cheCholera hachirambe chichipararira. Vanhu vana vanonzi nehurumende vakafa nechirwere ichi uye vanhu makumi matanhatu nemashanu vanonzi vanifungidzirwa kuti vakatapurirwa chirwere ichi. Doctor Fortune Nyamande vanoti zviri kutaurwa naDr Parirenyatwa panyaya yavana hutsanana ndizvo chaizvo zvinofanira kuitwa kuti cholera isapararire munyika. Vakurudzirawo vanhu kuti kana vakafungidzira kuti munhu abatwa nechirwere ichi vamupe mvura ine munyu netsvigiri kana kuti "salt sugar solution" apo vanenge vachienda naye kuchipatara.

headline: Kushaya Dzidziso Kwopa Kuti Vakawanda Vatapurirwe Chirwere cheCovid19 Vadzoka kuZimbabwe
text: Mukuru mubazi rezvehutano anoona nezvemamiriro enharaunda uye nzvimbo dziri kuchengeterwa vanhu vari kubva kunze kwenyika kana kuti maqurantine centres VaVictor Nyamandi vanoti kushaya ruzivo rwakakwana ndiko kwopa kuti vanhu vakawanda vatapurirane chirwere checoronavirus munzvimbo idzi. Vanoti vari kushushikanawo zvikuru nekutiza kuri kuita vanhu munzvimbo idzi mushure mekunge mapurisa azivisa kuti vanhu zana nemakumi masere nevana vainge vatiza. Pavanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nevashanu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika, mazana mana nemakumi mana nemasere vakabva kunze kwenyika, makumi manomwe nemanomwe vachitapurirwa chirwere ichi munyika. Dare repamusoro rakatombopa mutongo wekuti hurumende igadzirise zvinhu kunzvimbo dzinochengeterwa vanhu idzi mushure mekunge sangano ravanachiremba reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights rakwidza nyaya kumatare richiti hakuna hutsanana. No media source currently available

headline: Vanachiremba Vakuru Voratidzira muHarare
text: Munyori mukuru musangano ravanachiremba vakuru reZimbabwe Senior Hospital Doctors Association, Doctor Aaron Musara, vanoti vachange vachiratidzira muHarare nekusafara kwavo nemamiriro akaita zvinhu muzvipatara zvehurumende. Vanachiremba ava vari kutarisirwa kuenda netsamba yenyunyuto kudare reparamende. Kuratidzira uku kuri kuuya apo gurukota rezvehutano, Doctor Obadiah Moyo, vakaudza Studio7 nezuro kuti hurumende haisi kuzotaurirana navanachiremba vari kuramwa kana kuti vakadzingwa mabasa. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, mushure mehurukuro nemusi weChina nevakuru vekereke yeRoman Catholic vakati vanachiremba vakadzingwa vaikwanisa kudzokera kumabasa mukati memazuva maviri pasina kutorerwa matanho. Asi izvi zvinenge zvakona n'anga murapwa achida sezvo Doctor Moyo vanoti vashoma ndivo vakatambira kurudziro uyi. Vanachiremba vanoti vari kuda kuti hurumende itange yaratidza kuzvipira kugadzirisa zvinhu zvaita manyama amire nerongo muzvipatara zvinosanganisira kushaikwa kwemishonga uye michina yekushandisa. Dr Muasara vaudza Studio7 kuti vanachiremba vanoda chose kushanda asi zvinhu zviri kuvarwadza kuti vamwe varwere vave kungofa nekuda kwekuti havana zvikwanisiro. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kuwanisa Mishonga Inodzivirira Kudzoka kweGomarara repaZamu Kune Vanenge Vambobatwa neChirwere Ichi
text: Nyanzvi mune zvegomarara remazamu dzinoti zvakakosha kuti pawaniswe mishonga inodzivirira kuti vanenge vambobatwa nechirwere ichi vasazodzokororwe nacho, ukuwo hurumende ichi kurudzirwawo kuti itore matanho anoitwa kuti kurapwa kwemagomarara kuve nyore munyika. Izvi zvabuda neChishanu apo nyanzvi mune zvegomarara dzasangana pachipatara cheParirenyatwa icho change chichitambidzwa mapiritsi eTamoxifen akatsvagwa nesangano reCancerserve ayo anobatsira kuti vanenge vamboita gomarara remazamu vasazobatwe naro zvekare. Vachitaura mushure mechiitiko ichi, nyanzvi mune zvekurapwa kwechirwere chegomarara, uye vari ivo vakatanga sangano reCancerserve, Doctor Anna Mary Nyakabau, vati mushonga weTamoxifen wakakosha mukudzivirira kudzoka kwechirwere chegomarara rezamu. Asi vati pane vamwe vasingakwanisi kutenga mushonga uyu, uyo unonwiwa kwemakore ari pakati pemashanu negumi, nekudaro zvakakosha kuti vanoshaya cheuviri vabatsirwe mukuwana mishonga iyi. Vachitambira mushonga uyu pachiitiko ichi, mukuru weRadiotherapy pachipatara cheParirenyatwa Group of Hospitals, Doctor Nothando Mutizira, vati mushonga weTamoxifen unopiwa mushure mekunge munhu arapwa akapora. Dr Mutizira vati mishonga iyi yakakosha mukurwisa denda regomarara remazamu kuti risadzoke zvakare. Vachitaurawo pachiitiko chanhasi ichi, VaItai Mabasa Bopoto, avo vakatobviswawo rimwe zamu nekuda kwegomarara iri uye vatove pamishonga yeTamoxifen, vati zvakakosha kuti hurumende itore matanho anoita kuti chirwere chegomarara ichi chirapwewo pachena munyika pamwe nekuona kuti michina yekushandisa iripo. VaBopoto vati vakatozopona kubva kuchirwere ichi nekuda kwerubatsiro rwavakawana kumhuri neshamwari dzavo, vakati kurapwa kwechirwere ichi kunoda makunun’unu emadhora. Vati nguva zhinji michina mishoma iri kuzvipatara zvehurumende zvakadai seParirenyatwa inenge yakafa. Izvi zvinogarochemwa chemwa nazvo nevanhu vakawanda vanobatwa chirwere chegomarara. Vataura pachiitiko ichi vakamiririra munyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano, Doctor Aspect Jacob Maunganidze vati hurumende inokoshesa zvakanyanya kudzivirirwa kwechirwere chegomarara remazamu uyewo vakati vari kushandawo nevamwe vanobatsira kuti mishonga yakaita seTamoxifen iwanikwe pachena munyika. VaMaunganidze vatiwo hurumende iri kugadzirisa dambudziko remichina. Mishonga yapiwa chipatara cheParirenyatwa inonzi ichabatsira vanhu mazana matatu nemakumi masere (380), avo vasingakwanisi kutenga mishonga iyi kwegore rese. Gomarara rezamu rinobata zvese vanhukadzi nevanhurume asi kumadzimai rinonzi ndiyo mhando yegomarara inotevera gomarara rechibereko mukuuraya madzimai zvakanyanya munyika. Mwedzi uno waGumiguru mwedzi wekuyeuchidzana pamusoro pechirwere chegomarara repamazamu, kana kuti breast Cancer Awareness Month. Vanhurume munyika vanonzi vari kukurudzirwawo zvakanyanya kuti vaende kunoongororwa kana vaine gomarara repamazamu sezvinota vanhukadzi senzira yekuti dzivirira kana kukasika kurapwa kwechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Mhemberero dzeBlack History Month dzeGore Rino Dzovhiringidzwa neCovid-19
text: Gore roga-roga vanhu vemuAmerica vanocherechedza mwedzi uno waKukadzi semwedzi wekurangarira nhoroondo yevanhu vatema vari munyika iyi, kana kuti “Black History Month.” Izvi vanozviita kuburikidza nekuungana vachiita mitambo yakasiyanasiyana pamwe nekuridza mimhanzi yenyika dzakasiyanasiyana. Mumwe wevanhu vaimbopinda mumhemberero idzi mumakore ose adarika uye vari chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaJonah Masiya, avo vanoita zvemimhanzi, vanoti nekuda kwedenda reCovid-19, gore rino vari kucherechedza mwedzi uyu neimwe nzira isiri yekuungana sezvagara zvichiitwa makore ose adarika. VaMasiya, vanove zvakare mudzidzisi, vanoti makore ose adarika vaibatana nevamwe vachiridza mimhanzi yekumusha kucherechedza mwedzi uyu, asi gore rino vachange vachiridza vari kumba kwavo sevamwe vose vachizongoonekwa pamadandemutande. No media source currently available

headline: Mushonga weCovid-19 Wakawanikwa Asi Zvichatora Nguva Kuti Usvike kuZimbabwe neDzimwe Nyika
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzavekutarisira kuti kuwanikwa kwemishonga yekurapa chirwere cheCovid-19 kuchabatsira kuti vanhu vasafe vakawanda pasi rose. Nemusi weMugovera vanoona nezvemishonga muAmerica veFood and Drug Administration kana kuti FDA vakapa mvumo kuti mushonga unonzi Regeneron wakapihwa mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaDonald Trump pavakarwa neCovid-19 uchitange kupihwa vanenge vabatwa nechirwere ichi zvikuru vana uye vakwegura. Mamwe makambani maviri akati agadzira nhomba yekurapa chirwere ichi anoti Pfizer ne Moderna akamirira kupihwa mvumo neFDA. Asi zviri kutarisirwa kuti zvichatora nguva kuti munhu wose abaiwe nhomba pasi rose sezvo mushonga wacho wakawandirwa. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano Dr Henry Madzorera vanoti kuuya kuZimbabwe kuchatora nguva nekuti haisi nyika ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa kana kufa nechirwere ichi. Vati vanoona sekuti America, India, South Africa neBrazil ndidzo dzichatanga kuwana mushonga nekukasika. No media source currently available Bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vari kurwara nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwakakwira neMugovera kusvika pazviuru zvipfumbamwe anezana nemakumi manomwe nevaviri kana kuti 9,172 mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu makumi mashanu nevaviri vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vose vakabatwa nechirwere ichi havana nhoroondo yekubuda munyika uye vakawanda vacho vari muguta reBulawayo. Vanhu vari kurwara mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nevaviri kana kuti 672 uye pavanhu ava, mazana maviri negumi nevashanu vari muBulawayo, zana nemakumi matanhatu nevana kana kuti 164 vari kuMatabeleland North, Harare ine makumi masere nevatanhatu 76, Matabeleland South makumi matanhatu nevashanu uye Mashonaland East ndiyo ine vanhu vashoma vari kurwara pamatunhu ose vanove gumi nevaviri. Vanhu vapora kusvika parizvino vave zviuru zvisere nemazana maviri ane makumi matatu nevashanu kana kuti 8, 235 mushure mekunge vanhu gumi nemumwe vapora neMugovera. Vanhu vafa vachiri mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nevashanu kana kuti 265. Bepanhau reSunday Mail rinotiwo kutanga svondo rino National Institute of Health Research kana kuti (NIHR) ichapinda munharaunda dzakasiyana siyana mumadhorobha nemumaruwa ichiita ongororo yekuona kuti chirwere cheCovid19 charuura munzvimbo dzipi chaidzo. Chirongwa ichi chinonzi National Sero-Prevalence Survey for Covid-19 uye chichapetwa musi wa30 Zvita. Vanhu vari mudzimba zviuru zvimomwe mumatunhu makumi mashanu nemana dzichavhenekwa hutachona uhu. Mapurisa anotiwo achasimbaradza kusunga vasiri kupfeka zvekuzvidzivirira kana kuti maface mask. Vanhu zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevana vanonzi vakasungwa kubva muna kurume pakatanga kupararira chirwere ichi munyika. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri kana kuti 2 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zviuru makumi mana nemapfumbamwe ane zana nemakumi maviri nerimwe kana kuti 49,121. Vapora vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 1, 7 million. South Africa ine vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi matanhatu nemashanu kana kuti 765 000 vabatwa nechirwere ichi ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi mashanu nemasere kana kuti 58 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica chete vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu nematanhatu kana kuti 256,000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nemaviri kana kuti 12 miillion. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 1,3 million. Asi vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi matatu nemasere kana kuti 37 million.

headline: Vechidiki Voyambirwa Kuti "Morning After Pill" Haridziviriri Kubatwa neHIV
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezveutano dziri kuyambira vanasikana kuti vasajairira kugaronwamapiritsi ekudzivirira kubata pamuviri anonzi pachirungu ma “emergency contraceptive pills,” asi kuti vashandise nzira dzekuronga mhuri kana voiita zvepabonde. Mapiritsi ekudzivirira pamuviri aya anonwiwa mangwanani mushure mekunge munhu aita zvepabonde asina kuzvidzivirira nemakondomu. Mapiritsi aya anonyanyozivikanwa nezita rekuti, “Morning after pill.” Nyanzvi munyaya dzeHIV/AIDS, Amai Muchanyara Mukamuri, vanoti kunyanyoshandiswa kwema morning after pill kunongoratidza kuti vechidiki vari kuita zvepabonde vasina kuzvidzivirira. Amai Mukamuri vanoti vechidiki vanonyanyotya kubata pamuviri pachinzvimbo chekuti vatye zvirwere zvepabonde zvakadai seHIV/AIDS. Amai Mukamuri vanotiwo tsvakiridzo dzakaitwa dzinoratidza kuti kushandiswa kwakanyanya kwemapiritsi aya kunoita kuti vanhu vawedzere kusimba, kuita zvirwere zvakadai sema Ovarian Cysts nezvimwewo. Chiremba vanoshanda nesangano re Zimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, Doctor Nicholas Wazadza, vanotiwo pamusoro pekuwedzera kusimba, mapiritsi aya akaramba achinwiwa, haazokwanisi kudzivirira pamuviri. VaWazadza vanotiwo vanoyambira vechidiki kuti kunwa mapiritsi aya hakudziviriri zvirwere zvepabonde. Doctor Moses Macheka, avo vanoshanda neZimbabwe National Family Planning Council, vanoti vanhu havafanirwi kushandisa nzira iyi senzira yekuronga mhuri. Ma Morning after Pill anoshandiswa kudzivirira pamuvirikana anwiwa mukati memazuva matatu mushure mekuita zvepabonde pasina kushandiswa makondomu senzira yekuzvidzivirira. No media source currently available

headline: VanaChiremba, Vakoti, Voronga Kuramwa Mabasa Kutanga kweGore
text: Vana chiremba nana mukoti vanoshanda muzvipatara zvehurumende vazivisa hurumende kuti vacharega kuenda kubasa panotanga mwedzi unouya kana vasina kupihwa mari dzavo mwedzi uno waZvita usati wapera. Izvi zvataurwa nemutungamiri wesangano ravanachiremba vemuzvipatara zvehurumende, reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, VaFortune Nyamande, avo vanoti sangano ravo rakabatana nesangano ravana mukoti reZimbabwe Nurses association vanyorera hurumende tsamba vachiizivsa nezvedanho iri. Doctor Nyamande vanoti vanyorera hurumende vachiizivisa nezvedanho ravachatora rekusaenda kumabasa kubva musi wa 1 Ndira gore rinouya. Vanoti ivo nevakoti vemuzvipatara zvehurumende vatora danho iri nezvikonzero zvekushaiwa mari dzekufambisa sezvo vasati vatambira mihoro yavo yemwedzi uno pamwechete nemari dzebhonasi dzavakavimbiswa nehurumende. Doctor Nyamande vashorawo mafambisirwo avanoti ari kuitwa mashoko nehurumende, ekushandisa mapepanhau ichisiya nzira dzagara dziripo kare dzekutaurirana. Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakatozivisa kuti hurumende ichatadza kubhadhara vamwe vashandi vayo gore rino nekuda kwekushomeka kwemari iri kupinda muhomwe dzayo. “VaChinamasa vakashandisa mapepanhau kuti zivisa nezvekushandurwa kwemazuva edu ekutambira mihoro yedu, saka nesu tichashandisawo nzira idzodzo,” Doctor Nyamande vanodaro. Varairidzi, avo vaifanirwa kutambira mari dzavo neMuvhuro, vanzi vave kutambira neChipiri, asi ruzhinji rwose kusanganisira vanachiremba nevakoti, vachinzi vachazowana mari dzavo musi wa 5 Ndira gore rinouya. Asi vashandi vazhinji vehurumende vataura neStudio 7 vanoti havana chivimbo chekuti vanowaniswa mari dzavo pamazuva matsva akatarwa. Takundikana kubata gurukota rezvehutano, VaDavid Parirenyatwa, pamwe negurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Priscah Mupfumira, kuti tinzwe kana pane matanho avachatora ekudzivirira dambudziko ringaitika kana vanachiremba nanamukoti vakaramwa mabasa. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Zana neMakumi Matatu neVapfumbamwe Vofa neKuda kweDutumupengo Idai
text: Bazi rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko raburitswa padandemutande raro reTwitter kuti vanhu zana nemakumi matatu nemapfumbamwe vafa kusvika pari zvino nedambudziko reTropical Cyclone Idai. Vanhu zana nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe havasi kuzivikanwa kuti vari kupi uye vamwe vanosvika zana nemakumi matanhatu vari muzvitsuwa vakamirira kununurwa. Mutauriri werimwe bazi reUnited Nations reWorld Food Programme kana kuti WFP VaHerve Verhoosel vati ongororo yavakaita nezuro inoratidza kuti vanhu zviuru mazana maviri muZimbabwe vakaputsirwa dzimba uye vanoda rubatsiro nechimbi chimbi. WFP inoti kuChimanimani, zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana zvezvivakwa zvakaputswa dutumupengo iri. Amai Solinda Ngwenya vekuBulawayo vanoti vakarasikirwa nemhuri yehanzvadzi yavo yese yainge iri kuChimanimani ichiita mabasa ekuparidza shoko raMwari. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, vamwe vanhu vakawirwa nedambudziko iri vanoti havasati vawana rubatsiro. Vamwe vanoti hurumende yeZimbabwe iyo ine zvikopokopo zviviri chete zveAir Force zviri kuManicaland inenge iri kuremerwa nezvinhu zvawedzerwawo nekuti migwagwa nemazambuko zvakaparadzwa. VaBrighton Nyanisi vari muWard 14 kuChipinge East vanoti havasati vawana chikafu kubva nemusi weMugovera.
