No media source currently available Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemumiriri wenzvimbo iyi mudare reparamende, VaMathew Mlambo veMDC. No media source currently available Asi vachitaurawo nezvechikafu, gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi nemagariro evanhu Doctor Sekai Nzenza vanoti nyaya yekuparara kwemigwagwa nemazambuko ndiyo iri kupa kuti chikafu chitadze kusvika kune dzimwe nzvimbo. Asi vati vari kushanda zvakasimba kuzvigadzirisa. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vabatwa neCovid-19 Vadarika Zviuru Zvishanu
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muZimbabwe hwadarika zviuru zvishanu zvine zana nemakumi manomwe nematanhatu kana kuti 5176. Izvi zvinotevera kubatwa kwevanhu vanodarika zana nevana kana kuti 104 nechirewere ichi munyika neMugovera. Vanhu vaviri vakafa kuBulawayo neCovid-19 zvichireva kuti munyika yose, vanhu zana nemakumi matatu vafa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vapora vanosvika zviuru zviviri nemakumi mana nemasere kana kuti 2047. Kupararira zvakanyanya kuri kuita chirwere ichi kuri kuuya apo vakoti navanachiremba vave kupinda mumwedzi miviri vachiramwa mabasa vachinyunyuta nemari dzavari kutambiriswa uye kushaya zvikwanisiro zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere checoronavirus. Mukuru weHealth Services Board inoona nezvemashandiro avashanmdi vemuzvipatara Dr Paulinus Sikosana vaudza Studio 7 kuti ikozvino havasi pabasa nekudaro havakwanise kutaura nezvenyaya iyi. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika vari gurukota rezvehutano VaConstantino Chiwenga sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Enoch Mayida avo vakambotungamira chipatara cheChitungwiza vanoti huwandu hwwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hunogona kunge hwakakura nekuda kwekuti vamwe vari kufa vasati vavhenekwa. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru zana vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Vafa vadarika zviuru makumi maviri nemashanu ane mazana matatu nemasere kana kuti 25, 337. Vanhu vapora vadarika zviuru mazana masere nemakumi maviri nematatu kana kuti 823, 000. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nerimwe ane zviuru mazana mana kana kuti 21,4 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana ne makumi matanhatu nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 169, 000. Brazil ine vanhu vafa vanodarika chiuru zana kana kuti 100,000 ndiyo inotevera America pandufu pasi rose. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi pasi rose vadarika zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe nerimwe kana kuti 771,000.  Vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nematatu ane zviuru mazana mana kana kuti 13,4 million

headline: Nhengo dzeMDC Nhatu Dzinotongerwa Kugara Mujeri kweMakore Makumi Maviri
text: Dare repamusoro reHigh Court ratura mutongo wekuti nhengo dzeMDC-T nhatu dzakabatwa nemhosva yekuponda mupurisa mumusha weGlen View muHarare dzipike makore makumi maviri mujeri. Dare repamusoro reHigh Court ratura mutongo wekuti nhengo dzeMDC-T nhatu dzakabatwa nemhosva yekuponda mupurisa mumusha weGlen View muHarare dzipike makore makumi maviri mujeri. Mutongi wedare repamusoro, VaChinembiri Bhunu, vati vatura mutongo wekuti nhengo dzeMDCT nhatu idzi dzinoti VaTungamirai Madzokere, VaLast Maengehama naMuzvare Yvvonne Musarurwa, vapike kwemakore makumi maviri pamhosva yavakabatwa nayo yekuponda mupurisa Inspector Petros Mutedza mumusha weGlen View muHarare muna 2011. Mumutongo wavo, VaBhunu vati vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika havafaniri kuita zvemhirizhonga vakati matare haazoregedza kutura mitongo yakawomarara. Vatiwo mapato ezvematongerwo enyika anofanira kutevedzera zvaanenge audzwa nemapurisa kana achinge arambidzwa kuratidzira vachiti vezvematongerwo enyika vakaregedzwa vachiratidzira pamadiro zvinogona kukonzera kusagadzikana munyika kana hondo chaiyo. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kunyange hazvo pavasungwa ava pasiri kunyatsozivikanwa kuti ndiyani akakanda dombo rakatema VaMutedza zvakakonzera kuti vafe, vaona zvakakodzera kuti vasatongerere VaMaengehama naVaMadzokere rufu vachiti mumwe wevasungwa ava, Muzvare Musarurwa, munhu akachengetedzwa nebumbiro idzva remitemo kuti vasatongerwe rufu. Mumwe wevakabatwa nemhosva, VaPhineas Nhatarikwa, avo vaishanda semutyairi kuMDC-T panguva yakapondwa VaMutedza, vatongerwa kuti vakagare mujeri kwemakore matatu asi mutongo wanzi usendekwe parutivi kwemakore mashanu. VaNhatarikwa vanzi vabhadhare mari yefaindi madhora mazana mashanu. VaMaengehama vambofenda mudare panga pachiturwa mutongo uyu. VaBhunu vapedza kutura mutongo uyu, Muzvare Musarurwa vabva vatanga kudaidzira mudare vachiti mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vachabva pachigaro chete kunyange zvikadii. Zvichakadai, munyori mukuru mu MDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vati mutongo waturwa naVaBhunu une chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weMDC-T, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, vati sebato havasi kuzobvuma kutyisidzirwa kuti vasaratidzire nematare avati ari kushanda pamwe chete neZanu PF. Zvichakadai, rimwe remagweta ari kumirira vasungwa ava, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, vazivisa dare kuti vachapikisa mutongo waturwa naVaBhunu uyu. VaBhunu vati dare richagara zvakare neChipiri richinzwa chikumbiro chekuti vasungwa vambopihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso vakamirira kupikisa mutongo waturwa nedare. Dare iri ranga rakazara nevanhu vanga vauya kuzonzwa nyaya iyi uye vamwe vevanhu ava vanga vachisanganisira vatevedzeri vaVaTsvangirai vanoti Amai Khupe, VaElias Mudzuri pamwe naVaNelson Chamisa nevamwe vakuru-vakuru muMDC-T. Pakatanga nyaya iyi, vasungwa panyaya iyi vaiva makumi maviri nevapfumbamwe asi vasungwa vana ava ndivo vakazobatwa nemhosva yekuponda VaMutedza. Vasungwa ava vairamba mhosva iyi vachiti vari kushungurudzwa zvine chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika.

headline: MDC Alliance Yoshushikana neMaitiro aVaMnangagwa
text: MDC Alliance inoti haisi kufara kuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatara zuva resarudzo pasina kugadziriswa zvose zvinodiwa kuti paitwe sarudzo dziri pachena. Vachitaura nevatori venhau pamuzinda weMDCT inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, mumwe wevatungamiri veMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, vati mubatanidzwa wavo hausi kufara kuti VaMnangagwa vakatara musi wa30 Chikunguru sezuva resarudzo pasina kugadziriswa zvose zvinodiwa kuti sarudzo dziri pachena dziitwe munyika. VaBiti vatiwo vari kuda kuti veruzhinji vapihwe mukana wekunotarisa gwaro revavhoti zvakare zvichitevera kunyoresa kwakaita vamwe vanhu sevavhoti veruzhinji pavaitarisa kuti mazita avo avo arimo here mugwaro revavhoti. VaBiti vati vanhu vakachinja nzvimbo dzekuvhotera paitariswa gwaro revavhoti mazita avo arimo here mugwaro revavhoti. VaBiti vati kusagadzirira zvakakwana kwekomisheni inoona nezvesarudzo panyaya yegwaro revavhoti iro risati rabuda kwave kuvapa dambudziko rekunyoresa mazita evachakwikwidza musarudzo dzegore rino kudare rinotora mazita evanhu vari kuda kukwikwidza musarudzo dzegore rino. Vaenderera mberi vachiti vacharatidzira nemusi weChipiri muHarare vachinosvika kumahofisi eZEC pamwe nemahofisi emutungamiri vachiratidza kunyunyuta kwavo. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nasachigaro weZEC, Amai Priscilla Chigumba kuti tinzwe pavamire panyaya iyi sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha dzavo. Asi mumwe komishina weZEC, VaQubani Moyo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti komisheni yavo ichagara pasi yotarisa nhuna dzeMDC Allianc idzi vachiti komisheni yavo yakazvipira kuita sarudzo dzinogutsa mapato ose achakwikwidza musarudzo dzegore rino. No media source currently available Mune imwewo nyaya, vaimbova gurukota rezvematunhu, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, vamiswa pamberi pedare ramejasitiri muHarare uko kwavapihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso madhora mazana matatu pamhosva yavari kupomerwa yekubuda munyika zvisiri pamutemo panguva yakapindira masoja mune zvematongerwo enyika zvakazoita kuti vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiye basa. Zvichakadai, VaMakomborero Haruzivishe, avo vaimbova mumwe wevatungamiri wesangano rinomiria vadzidzi reZinasu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa iri kushandisa mutemo zvetsvete. VaHaruzivishe vanoti VaMnangwagwa pachavo munhu anofanirawo kumiswa pamberi pedare sezvo vakabuda pachena voga kuti vakabuda munyika zvisiri pamutemo pavakadzingwa basa naVaMugabe. Zvichakadai, VaKasukuwere, avo vari kuramba mhosva yavari kupomerwa, vakatarisirwa kudzoka kudare musi wa11 Chikumi apo pachatanga kutongwa kwemhosva yavari kupomerwa iyi. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoyambira Nhengo dzeZanu PF Kuti Dzingwarire veMasangano Akazvimirira
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, vari zvakare mutungamiriri webato reZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanoyambira nhengo dzebato ravo kuti dzichenjerere masangano akazvimirira munyika. Vachivhura musangano wePolitburo kumuzinda webato ravo muHarare neMugovera, VaMnangagwa vati nhengo dzebato ravo dzinofanirwa kungwarira masangano akazvimirira nevamwe vasori avo vasingadi kuona Zimbabwe yakasununguka, vachiti masangano aya ari kuhwanda nenyaya yekudzidzisa veruzhinji nyaya dzekuvhota. Asi murongi wemabasa musangano reZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, unova mubatanidzwa wemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaWilbert Mandinde vati havana chinangwa chekuve hurumende uyewo vanokatyamadzwa nekutya kunoita bato reZanu PF masangano akazvimirira. VaMandinde vakurudzirawo bato iri kuti rishande pamwechete nemasangano akazvimirira. VaMnangagwa vatiwo vanoda kuti bato ravo rikwanise kuhwina sarudzo dzema by-elections pamwe nekutora zvigaro zvaive nenhengo dzemapato anopikisa. Vakurudzira nhengo dzavo kuti dzienderere mberi nezvirongwa zvekukwezva vavhoti vachiti vanoda kukunda zvine mutsindo pasarudzo dzema by-election pamwe nesarudzo dziri kutarisirwa 2023. Vayambirawo nhengo dzebato ravo idzo vati dziri kukonzera nyonga nyonga pamwe nekusawirirana mubato vachiti avo vanoda kuparadza bato iri ndivo vachazoguma vaparara. VaMnangagwa vakatomisa basa vaimbove gurukota rezvekuchengetedzwa kwenyika, VaOwen Mudha Ncube, avo vainzi vaikonzerawo nyonga nyonga, kunyanya mudunhu reMidlands. VaMnangagwa vatiwo vari kushushikana nemafashamu emvura kune dzimwe nzvimbo, vakakurudzira vanobatsira veruzhinji munguva yenjodzi dzakadai, veCivil Protection Unit kuti vagare vakagadzirira kubatsira vanenge vawirwa nedambudziko iri. Vakurudzirawo avo vasina kubaiwa nhomba kuti vabaiwe vachiti nyika ine nhomba dzakawandisa. No media source currently available

headline: Makereke Opokana neMashoko aVaGeorge Charamba
text:
Paita kukandirana makobvu nematete pakati pemutauriri wemutungamiri
wenyika, VaGeorge Charamba, nevamwe vakuru vedzisvondo dziri pasi
pemubatanidzwa weZimbabwe Heads of Christian Denominations, CHOCD,
pamusoro pekuti makereke avhurwe asi achibvumidza chete vanhu vakabayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira cherwere cheCovid-19. Mubatanidzwa weZHOCD, wakazivisa kuti danho rehurumende iri rakanaka asi rinonetsa kutevedzera sezvo kereke isingagone kudzinga vanhu vanenge vauya kuchechi ichivati havana kubayiwa nhomba. VaCharamba nezuro vakabva vatuka makereke aya padandemutande ravo
reTwitter vachidoma munyori weZHOCD, VaKenneth Mtata, nezita kuti
kuramba kwavo uku kune chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika. Asi VaMtata vaudza Studio 7 nhasi kuti mashoko aVaCharamba anoratidza
kuti havazive kuti zvinyorwa zveZHOCD zvinonyorwa sei. VaMtata vati ivo munyori chete asi pfungwa ndedzehutungamiri nemakereke awo.

VaMtata vati havatyi kuti vakadomwa nezita naVaCharamba vachiti semugari wemunyika vakasununguka kutaura zvavanoda
zvinosanganisira zvematongerwo enyika.

Sachigaro wekereke yeEvalengical Fellowship of Zimbabwe, imwe
yemakereke anoumba ZHOCD, Bishop Never Muparutsa, vati mashoko aVaCharamba haana kunaka sezvo VaMtata vanongove munyori.

Bishop Muparutsa vati vachanotaura negurukota rezvehutano uye vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, gurukota
rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, Amai Oppah Muchinguri-Kashiri, pamwe nemukuru weNational Covid-19 Taskfore, Dr Agnes Mahomva, pamusoro pedanho rehurumende rekuti vasina kubayiwa nhomba vasabvumidzwe kupinda muchechi. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi raVaCharamba pataenda kumhepo sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi anopinda chechi yeRoman Catholic,
VaClifford Rusere, vati mutemo unofanirwa kubata munhu wese zvisinei
kuti makereke here kana kuti makambani. VaRusere vati kana makambani ave kumanikidzirwa kuti vanenge vasina
kubayiwa vasaende kubasa makereke anofanirwa kutevedzerawo izvozvo.

Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekuderedza
kutapuriranwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reProject 263 Rinoenda kuDare reHigh Court Richida Kuwaniswa Gwaro reVavhoti repaDandemutande neZEC
text: Sangano rinoongora sarudzo reProject Vote 263 nemusi weChina rakakwira kudare repamusoro reHigh Court richida kuti dare rimanikidze Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, kuti iri wanise gwaro revavhoti repadandemutande, kana kuti electronic voters roll. Mukuru wesangano iri VaYoungerson Matete, vanoti ZEC haisi kuda kuvapa gwaro repadandemutande iri asi ichida kuti vatenge gwaro revavhoti remapepa, kana kuti hard copy, iro ravanoti riri kudhura zvakanyanya. VaMatete vanoti gwaro revavhoti rebepa riri kutengeswa nedhora rimwechete papeji, uye gwaro iri rine mapeji anodarika zana nemakumi masere ezviuru. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri weZEC, VaJasper Mangwana kuti tinzwe divi ravo, asi vakamboudza zvavo Studio 7 kuti komisheni yavo iri mushishi kugadzirisa gwaro revavhoti kuti riende padandemutande. Mamwe masangano akazvimirira pamwe nemapato anopikisa vari kunetsanawo neZEC pamusoro pegwaro revavhoti repadandemutande iri. No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai Voshora VaMugabe neKumanikidza Vanhu Kufora Vachitiwo Vave Kunzwa Zviri Nani
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMovement for Democratic Change VaMorgan Tsvangirai nemusi weChitatu vakatumira mashoko kumhuri yeZimbabwe vachivimbisa kuti munguva pfupi inotevera vachange vodzoka kumusha vachibatsirana navo kurwira rusununguko. VaTsvangirai parizvino vari muchipatara kuSouth Africa uko vati vari kunaya. Vatenda mhuri yeZimbabwe nemudzimai wavo amai Elizabeth Tsvangirai nekuvatsigira vari muchipatara. Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa atiwo achadzoka munyika kuzoenderera mberi nekumirira zvido zvevanhu vachinetsana nevanhu vari kutyora kodzero dzevanhu munyika. Vati vari kuzvizivawo kuti vanhu vemuZimbabwe vari kunetseka zvikuru. VaTsvangirai vati vari kunzwawo kuti bato reZanu-PF ravharisa nyika yose nekumanikidza vanhu kusanganisa vanotengesa mumigwagwa kuti vaende kunofora vachitsigira mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. VaTsvangirai vati chinofanira kunge chichifora kuenda mberi handi vanhu asi kuti hupfumi. VaTsvangirai vatiwo vari kuenderera mberi vachinaya uye kurwarwa kwavo hakufanire kukonzera kusagadzikana munyika. Vatiwo nyika yeZimbabwe itori pakaoma kudarika hutano hwavo. Mutauriri waVaTsvangirai vaudza Studio 7 kuti mhuri yeZimbabwe ngaigadzikane zvayo sezvo VaTsvangirai vachange vobatana nawo mukurwira hutongo hwejekerere. No media source currently available

headline: Hupenyu hwaVaMorgan Tsvangirai Hworangarirwa kuSouth Africa
text: Sangano re Southern African Liaision Office, nezuro rakaita musangano wekurangarira mutungamiri weMDC wekutanga, muchakabvu Morgan Tsvangirai, pahurongwa hwakaitirwa muPretoria, kuSouth Africa. Vanhu vangangosvika zana vakaungana muPretoria vachirangarira mabasa akaitwa akaitwa naVaTsvangirai munyaya dzematongerwo enyika pamwe nekodzero dzevanhu. VaTsvangirai vakarumbidzwa semunhu aive akashinga, ane rudo uye anoremekedza muonero wakasiyana siyana. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, murwiri wekodzero dzevanhukadzi, Amai Priscilla Misihairabwi Mushonga, vakati kunyange hazvo vakanga vasingawirirane mune zvimwe zvinhu naVaTsvangirai, muchakabvu munhu aive neruremekedzo, uye vakadzidza zvakawanda kubva kuna VaTsvangirai. Amai Misihairabwi Mushonga vakati kusawirirara pakati penhengo dze MDC T inotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozane Khupe ne MDC-T inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, kuchagadziriswa mushure mesarudzo. Mutauriri waVaChamisa, Va Nkululeko Sibanda, vakarumbidzawo VaTsvangirai nekudoma kwavo VaChamisa, semumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri weMDC-T. VaSibanda vakati VaTsvangirai vakaona kuti Va Chamisa munhu ane ruzivo kwete munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika chete, asi nemunyaya dzakasiyana siyana. Mumiriri weMDC T muSouth Africa, VaAmos Moyo, vakatiwo chirongwa chekurangarira VaTsvangira, chichazenge chichiitwa gore rega rega, sezvo VaTsangirai vaive munhu airemekedzwa nevanhu vakawanda, kwete munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika chete, asi nemunyaya dzekodzero dzavashandi. Chirongwa chekurangarira VaTsvangirai chakatsigirwa nemuzinda weNorway muSouth Africa. No media source currently available

headline: VeZanu-PF neCCC Vokakavadzana nezveKusagadzikana Kwoita Nyika paMberi peSarudzo dza2023
text:
Vebato reZanu-PF neveCitizens Coalition for Change vatatsurana muMasvingo nhasi pakuti ndiyani ari kukonzera mhirizhonga nekusagadzikana munyika pamberi pesarudzo dza2023. Vachitaura pamusangano wekutaura nezvegadziriro yesarudzo dzegore rinouya wakokerwa nesangano revatori venhau reZimbabwe Union of Journalists nhasi paChevron Hotel, vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri weCCC muMasvingo, VaDereck Charamba nemunyori mubazi revechidiki muZanu PF muMasvingo, VaCharles Munganasa vati mapato avo akagadzirira zvakakwana kupinda musarudzo dzegore rinouya.

VaCharamba vati bato ravo riri kugadzirira sarudzo idzi nekutsvaga rutsigiromurunyararo asi vakapomera Zanu-PF mhosva yekuita nekuvakanganisa VaCharamba vati huwandu hw mhirizhonga yezvematongerwe enyika nekumbunyikidzwa kwekodzero dzavatsigiri vavo huri kukura munyika apo sarudzo dzave pedyo. Izvi zvarambwa naVaMunganasa avo vapomera mhosva yekukwira kwemhirizhonga dzematongerwe enyika kubato rinopikisa re CCC vachiti ndiro rinotanga mhirizhonga.

VaMunganasa vanoti bato reCCC rinobatsirwa nemasangano akaozvimirira oga kunemera bato ravo mhosva dzenhema vachiti vanhu varikuita izvi varikuita voga vasina kutumwa nebato ravo.
Vaenderera mberi vachiti vanotarisira kukunda musarudzo gore rinouya nekuti mabasa ari kuitwa nebato ravo ari kuonekwa nevavhoti.

VaCharamba vati hapana mabasa anoonekwa akaitwa nebato reZanu PF kubva muna 2018 sezvo hupfumi hwenyika huri kumawere uye vanhu varikutambura. Munyori mukuru musangano reZUJ muMasvingo, VaTatenda Chatagu vatiwo vaita musangano uyu pakati pevatori venhau nevatungamiriri vemapato aya kuti vazeye nyaya yemhirizhonga pasarudzo iyo inobatawo vatori venhau vanenge vachita mabasa avo

Mapurisa ange akakokwawo kumusangano wanhasi haana kuuya. Bato reCCC riri kupomera bato reZanu PF mhosva yekuponda nhengo dzaro dzinoti VaMboneni Ncube, KuKwekwe pasarudzo dzema by-election muna Kurume, Muzvare MoreBlessing Ali kuNyatsimwe mwedzi wapera pamwe na Nyasha Zhambe Mawere kwaGutu gore rapera muna Zvita. Asi Zanu PF inoramba mhosva idzi ichiti vanhu vakazviita vakapara mhosva vakazvimirira ndosaka vakasungwa nemapurisa.

Mugwaro rayo rezvekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu nemhirizhonga munyika mumwedzi waChikumi, sangano rakazvimirira roga reZimbabwe Peace Project rinoti bato reZANU PF ndiro rakanyanya kutyora kodzero dzevanhu nezvikamu zvinodarika makumi mana nematatu kubva muzana 43,8%, ukuwo bato reCCC rinewo zvikamu zvinodarika zvitatu nechidimbu kubva muzana kana kuti 3.5%. No media source currently available

headline: VaHaruzivishe Vopika Mwedzi Gumi neMina
text: Nhengo yekomiti yepamusoro yeboka revechidiki muMDC Alliance, VaMakomborero Haruzivishe, vatongerwa kugara mujeri kwegore nemwedzi miviri mushure mekubatwa kwavakaitwa nemhosva yekurudzira mhirizhonga pamwe nekuramba kusungwa nemapurisa. Mutongi wedare, Amai Judith Taruvinga, vatura mutongo wekuti VaHaruzivishe vapike kwemakore maviri pamhosva yekutanga yekunzi vakakurudzira mhirizhonga asi vasendeka mwedzi gumi parutivi sezvo aka kari kekutanga VaHaruzivishe vachibatwe nemhosva. Pamhosva yechipiri yekunzi VaHaruzivishe vairamba kusungwa pavakapara mhosva yekutanga, Amai Taruvinga vati VaHarizivishe vagare mujere kwegore asi vakasendeka mwedzi mitanhatu parutivi. Amai Taruvinga vati nguva yavatara kuti VaHaruzivishe vapike pamhosva dzose dziri mbiri ichange ichifambirana saka nokudaro vati VaHaruzivishe vachapika mwedzi gumi nemina. Mutauriri weMDC Alliance, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere, vaudza Studio 7 vakakomberedzwa nemapurisa anga akapakatira zvombo achivamanikidza kupinda mumotokari yavo ayo anga achivarambirambidza zvakare kutaura nevatori venhau kuti havana kufara nemutongo waturwa nedare. Rimwe remagweta eMDC Alliance uye vari nhengo yebato iri, VaJacob Mafume, vati vachakwidza nyaya yaVaHaruzivishe kudare repamusoro nechinangwa chekuti mutongo uyu usendekwe parutivi. VaHaruzivishe vanonzi vakakurudzira vanotengesera mumigwagwa avo vaisungwa nemapurisa kuti vaite mhirizhonga pakati pedhorobha muHarare gore rapera zvakazoita kuti mapurisa pamwe nematokari yavo vatemwe nematombo nevanotengesera mumigwagwa ava. Zvinonziwo mapurisa paaida kuvasunga, VaHaruzivishe vakaramba kusungwa vakagara pasi zvakazoita kuti mapurisa avatakure. Asi VaHaruzivishe vakaudza dare paitongwa nyaya iyi kuti vaitobvawo mune imwe imba yekudyira iri muna First Street pavakaona mapurisa achisunga vanotengesera mumigwagwa mumwe mupurisa ndipo paakasvika kwavari akavatorera nharembozha yavo achiti “Tinokuzivai vanhu veMDC munonetsa”. VaHaruzivishe vakatiwo vari kushungurudzwa zvine chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika. Zvichakadai, paita bongozozo panze pedare mushure mekuturwa kwemutongo uyu apo mumwe mupurisa apomerwa mhosva yekubata zamu reimwe nhengo yeboka remadzimai reMDC Alliance, Amai Vongai Tome, mapurisa paanga odzinga vanhu vose vanga vafambira nyaya pamatare zvaita kuti mapurisa nenhengo dzeMDC Alliance idzi vakandirane makobvu nematete. Mapurisa azopedzisira orova vanhu zvaite kuti nhengo dzeMDC Alliance idzi dziite rutsoka ndibereke dzichiita aziva kwake aziva kwake. Mumhirizhonga iyi pazosungwa Amai Tome neumwe wechidiki anzi anonzi Ngoni Dzapfumba ukuwo mutori wenhau wekambani 263Chat, Samuel Takawira, akakuvara ruoko mushure mekurohwa kwaaitwa nemapurisa. Munyori mukuru musangano rinomirira vatori venhau vechidiki reYoung Journalists Association, Va Philemon Jambaya, vashora kurohwa kwaitwa Takawira nemapurisa vakakurudzira hurumende kuti ikoshese kodzero dzevatori venhau panguva yavanenge vachiita basa ravo. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remapurisa panyaya iyi apo taenda pamhepo. No media source currently available

headline: VaReport Phelekezela Mphoko Vanoitwa Mutevedzeri weChipiri waVaMugabe
text: Kunyange hazvo veruzhinji muHarare vachiti havana ruzivo rwakanyaya pamusoro pemumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiriri wenyika vadomwa, VaReport Phelekezela Mphoko, ongororo yataita inoratidza kuti VaMphoko igamba rehondo yerusunungujo uye vakashanda muhurumende kwenguva yakareba vachimirira Zimbabwe kunyika dzakasiyana siyana. Vaimbova kanzura muHarare, VaWarship Dumba, vanoti havana chavanoziva pamusoro paVaMphoko uye vakatanga kunzwa nezvavo painge pave kuda kuitwa kongiresi yebato reZanu PF. VaWashington Ngirazi vekuMbare vanotiwo hapana zvavanoziva kunze kwenguti vaimbomirira Zimbabwe kunze kwenyika. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakazvimirira, VaTakura Zhangazha, vanotiwo ndezvechokwadi kuti veruzhinji havana ruzivo ruzhinji pamusoro paVaMphoko uye zvakakosha kuti vazivikanwe neveruzhinji. Asi vanoti vane chivimbo chekuti vachaita basa ravo nemazvo sezvo vadoma nemutungamiriri wenyika. VaZhangazha vanotiwo chimwe chinofanira kuziva VaMphoko ndechekuti VaMugabe havapikiswe uye vanogona kusiya basa zvakaita vaimbove mutevedzeri waVaMugabe, Amai Joice Mujuru, kana vakada kukura musoro. Vanodzidzisa zvidzidzo zvematongerwo enyika paUniversity of Zimbabwe, Amai Charity Manyeruke, vanotiwo vanhu havangazive vanhu vese vakaenda kuhondo uye chakakosha ndechekuti VaMphoko igamba rehondo. Vanotiwo VaMphoko inhengo yeZanu pF yakavimbika ndosaka vasarudzwa nemutungamiriri wenyika. VaMphoko ndemumwe weavo vaitungamira mauto eZimbamwe People’s Revolutionary Army kana kuti ZIPRA uye vakambomirira ZAPU kuMozambigue Zimbabwe isati yawana kuzvitonga. Vari ikoko vakashanda nedzimwe nhengo dzebato reAfrican National Congress yeSouth Africa dzakaita semutungamiriri wenyika iyi, VaJacob Zuma. VaTjenesani Ntungakwa avo vanoongorora mashaindiro aiita bato reZAPU vanotiwo VaMphoko munhu aive nechinzvimbo chikuru munguva yehondo. VaMphoko vakambomirira Zimbabwe kunyika dzakaita seRussia uye vange vachimirira nyika kuSouth Africa kubva muna 2011 kusvika pavakasiya basa mwedzi mishonana yapfuura. No media source currently available

headline: Tajamuka Inoti VaMkhwananzi Vambomira Kutaurira Sangano Iri
text: No media source currently available Chikwata cheTajamuka chinoti chatambira chikumbiro chemutauriri wacho, VaPromise Mkwananzi,chekuti vambosuduruka apo nyaya dzehuwori nekusashandisa mari zvine mwero dzavari kupomerwa dziri kuongororwa. Komiti inoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muTajamuka yaita musangano muHarare neMuvhuro apo yaumba komiti ichaongorora nyaya dziri kupomerwa VaMkwananzi. VaGift Ostallos Siziba ndivo vacbata chinzvimbo chemutauriri wechikwata ichi. VaSiziba vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyaya dzaVaMkwananzi dzakatanga kubuda pamadandemutande mazuva apfuura uye komiti yadomwa iyi ichaunganidza humbowo isati yapa pfungwa dzayo kuti zvingaitwe. Zvichitevera zvainyorwa nekutaurwa pamadandemutande nedzimwe nyaya dzavaipomerwa, VaMkwananzi vakazivisa nezuro manheru kuti vainge vave kumbosuduruka kuti vagadzirise nyaya iyi. Pane zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinoti zvaibatsira Tajamuka nemari zvave kupomera VaMkwananzi mhosva yehuwori pamwe nekusashandisa mari zvine mwero. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMkwananzi kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo vange vasiri kudaira mbozhanhare yavo. Asi vachinyora padandemutande, VaMkhwananzi vakati vari kumbomira kuita mutauriri wesangano iri zvichitevera kupomerwa kwavari kuitwa nyaya nemunhu wavati anonzi Fadziso Doyce nee Jena, kuitira kuti zita ravo risikanganise mafambiro ezvinhu muTajamuka. Munyori mukuru weMDC – T Youth Assembly mudunhu reHarare, VaDenford Ngadziore, vaudza Studio 7 kuti senhengo dzeTajamuka/Sesijikile, zvaitikika izvi hazvifaniri kudzorera basa rechikwata ichi kumashure. Vati chikwata ichi chine nhengo dzakawanda uye dzinofanira kuenderera mberi nebasa. Munyori mukuru musangano revadzidzi vemuzvikoro zvepamusoro, reZimbabwe National Students Unions, VaMakomborero Haruzivishe, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvaitika muTajamuka/Sesijikile zvakakosha uye zvinoratidza kuti kana paita nyaya, dzinofanira kuongororwa, zvisinei kuti ndiani anenge aidziita. Vati ZINASU yakapinda muTajamuka/Sesijikile nekuti vanotsigira zvinorwirwa nesangano iri. Chikwata cheTajamuka/Sesijikile icho chinove mubatanidzwa wemasangano evechidiki anorwira kodzero dzevanhu pamwe nevechidiki kubva kumapato anopikisa chakaumbwa gore rapfuura. Chikwata ichi chinorwira kuti munyika muve nehutongi hwejekerere pamwe nekuti vanhu vagare zvakanaka.

headline: MDC Inotungamirwa naVaNcube Yozvipira Kuita Mushandira Pamwe Musarudzo dza2018
text: Bato reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaWelshman Ncube rinoti richashanda nemamwe mapato kuitira kuti mubatanidzwa wemapato ukunde Zanu PF musarudzo dza 2018. Bato reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaWelshman Ncube rinoti richashanda nemamwe mapato kuitira kuti mubatanidzwa wemapato ukunde Zanu PF musarudzo dza 2018. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano weNational Council wekupedzesera gore rino waitirwa muHarare. Vachitaura papera musangano uyu, VaNcube vati bato ravo rapa hutungamiriri hwebato iri basa rekutaurirana nemapato ese anopikisa kuitira kuti vaumbe mubatanidzwa sezvo iri iyi nzira yega ingaite kuti vakunde bato riri kutonga reZanu PF. VaNcube vatiwo zviri pachena kuti vanhu vese munyika vari kuda kuti mapato anopikisa abatane musarudzo vakatiwo musangano wavo watambira chisungo cheMDC inotungamiririrwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai pamusangano wayo weNational Council chekuti bato iri rakazvipira kushanda nemamwe mapato mukuumba mubatanidzwa uchakwikwidza Zanu PF. Vati kana izvi zvikabudirira mapato ese anopikisa achamiririrwa nemunhu mumwe chete musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika uye musarudzo dzeparamende mapato aya anenge achimiririrwa nenhengo imwe chete muconstituency yega yega. Vati pane nhaurirano dzavave kutoita nemamwe mapato uye zvinofadza kutipane chido chekubatana kubva kumapato akawanda munyika. Mutevedzeri waVaWelshman Ncube, VaEdwin Mushoriwa, vanotiwo zvimwe zvisungo zvabuda mumusangano wavo ndezvekuti bato iri richaita kongiresi yaro mukutanga kwegore rinoouya. Vatiwo musangano uyu waita chisungo chekuti vanofanira kuramba vachirwira kuti mitemo yesarudzo isandurwe kuti paitwe sarudzo dzakachena. Vatiwo mutemo unofanira kusandurwa kuti kana anenge akunda ogadzwa ipapo vachiti izvi ndizvo zvingadziviririre zviri kutika kuGambia uko mutungamiriri wenyika iyi akakundwa musarudz,o VaYahya Jamme, vari kuramba kubva pachigaro. Vatiwo izvi zvakaitika muZimbabwe muna 2008 apo VaMugabe vakakundwa musarudzo naVaTsvangirai asi vakaramba kubva pachigaro nekuti mapato anopikisa ange asina zano rekuti iota sei kutora masimba. VaNcube vati vanofara chose nezviri kuitwa neAfrican Union, ECOWAS neUnited Nations ku Gambia uye SADC inofanira kuitawo zvimwezvo kana pakaita anoramba kubva pachigaro akundwa muna 2018. Zvichakadai, sachigaro wemadzimai mubato iri AmaiMonica Ngwenya vaudza Studio 7 kuti madzimai akatoita chisungo pamusangano wavo svondo rapera chekuti vanofanira kupinda musarudzo vakawanda muna 2018. Nyanzvi munyaya dzematonmgerwo enyika dzinoti VaMugabe nebato ravo reZanu PF vane hunyanzvi hwekubira sarudzo zvekuti mapato anopikisa haakwanise kuvakunda kana akasabatana. Mapato anopikisa munyika ave kutoshanda akabatana muzvirongwa zvakasiyana siyana zvakaita seCoalition of Democtracts kana kuti Code neNational Electorla Reform Agenda kana kuti NERA. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Yoita Musangano Wayo muGweru neSvondo
text: MDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa ichaita musangano neSvondo muGweru wekutenda vatsigiri vayo vakaivhotera musarudzo dzakaitwa gore rakapera. Mutauriri webato iri, VaJacob Mafume, vaudza Studio7 kuti bato ravo riri kutenda zvikuru vanhu vakarivhotera, uye mutungamiri webato ravo, VaNelson Chamisa, vachange vari ku Mkoba Stadium kuchaitirwa musangano uyu. “Kunenge kune musangano muhombe; tinenge tichiungana sezvo tiri bato rezvematongerwo enyika. Tinoudzana zviri kuitika munyika nekushungurudzwa kuri kuitwa vatsigiri vedu vari kurohwa, vari kuurayiwa, vari kuitwa zvakasiyana siyana,” VaMafume vakaudza Studio7. “Tinoda kupa vanhu gwara, tichivaudza kuti kongiresi yavepo. Munoziva kuti pakongiresi tinenge tichichinja hutungamiri hwedu, tichipana gwara, tichigadzirisana pakakanganisika.” MDC yakaita musangano weNational Council iyo yakabvumirana kuti kongiresi iitwe kubva musi wa 24 kusvika 26 Chivabvu. Kune vamwe vaida kuti kongiresi iitwe muna Gumiguru. Kongiresi iyi iri kuitwa zvichitevera kushaya gore rapera kwevaimbove mutungamiri webato iri, VaMorgan Tsvangirai. VaMafume vati VaChamisa vachashandisa mukana wemusangano wekuGweru kuudza veruzhinji muZimbabwe pamusoro pechirongwa chebato ravo chekugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Pastor Mawarire Vanonyimwa Mukana weKubvisa Mari yeChibatiso
text: Dare redzimhosva rinoti Pastor Evan Mawarire vanofanirwa kugara muchitokisi kudzamara musi 17 Kukadzi apo vachaunzwa mudare iri. VaMawarire vanyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso vachinzi dare remajisitireti harikwanisi kutaura nezvenyaya yechibatiso sezvo mufundisi wesvondo ye His Generation vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuronga zvekuda kupidigura hurumende. VaMawarire vari kupomerwa zvakare mhosva yekushandisa mureza wenyika zviri kunze kwemutemo. Muchuchisi wenyaya iyi, VaEdmore Nyazamba vaudza dare kuti VaMawarire, avo vanoshanda neboka reThis Flag, vakaronga zvekupidigura hurumende yaVaRobert Mugabe kubudikidza nekurudzira vanhu vari pasi rose kuti vaungane vachiratidzira ku New York gore rapera paipindwa musangano weUnited Nations naVaMugabe muna Gunyana gore rapera. VaNyazamba vati mavhidhiyo akaburitswa naVaMawarire padandemutande aipesvedzerawo vanhu kuti vapandukire hurumende. Asi rimwe remagweta ari kumirira VaMawarire, VaHarrison Nkomo, vabva vasvitsa chikumbiro chekuti nyaya iri kupomerwa VaMawarire iraswe vachiti haina musoro. VaNkomo vaudza dare kuti haisi mhosva kuti munhu ataure kuti mutungamiri wenyika anofanira kusiya basa kana achinge atadza kufambisa zvinhu zvakanaka munyika. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kusungwa kwakaitwa VaMawarire kunotyora kodzero dzavo dziri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika dzekutaura zvavanofunga. Mutongi wedare, VaElisha Singano, vatura mutongo wekuti pane fungidziro yakasimba yekuti VaMawarire vakapara mhosva yavari kupomerwa saka vanofanira kugara mutirongo kusvika musi wa17 mwedzi uno pachadzoka nyaya iyi kudare. Zvaturwa nedare zvatsinhirwa naVaNkomo. VaNkomo vati vachakwidza nyaya iyi kudare repamusoro sezvo matare amejasiriti asingabvumirwe kupa musungwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso pamhosva yakakomba seiri kupomerwa VaMawarire. Mumwe wevanorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyika, Muzvare Linda Masarira, avo vanga vari mudare panga pachizeyewa nyaya iyi, vaudza Studio7 kuti kusungwa kwaVaMawarire kuri kuvashugurudza zvikuru. VaMawarire vaudza vanhu vanga vakavamirira kuti vavaone vachipinda mumotokari inotakura vasungwa kuti veruzhinji vasatye zvavo vachivavimbisa kuti zvinhu zvichanaka chete munyika. Mune imwewo nyaya yanga iri kumatare, nyaya iri kupomerwa mufundisi weRemnant Church, VaPatrick Mugadza, avo vakasungwa mushure mekunge vataura mashoko ekuti vakaudzwa naMwari kuti VaMugabe vachafa gore rino, yatadza kusimuka mumatare nepamusana pekuti vanochengeta vasungwa vatadza kuvaunza kudare vachiti havana mafuta. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, Vanodoma Makurukota Avo
text: Mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, nemusi weChina vakadoma makurukota ehurumende yebato ravo kana kuti shadow ministers makumi maviri nematanhatu, pamwe nemamwe gumi achange ari makurukota ematunhu, kana kuti provincial ministers. Vamwe vevakadomwa kuve makurukota vanosanganisira VaMorgen Komichi, avo vakadomwa kuve gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika; VaTapiwa Mashakada vari gurukota rezvehupfumi; Dr. Ruth Labode segurukota rezvehutano; Amai Paurina Mpariwa vari gurukota rezvevashandi nemabasa, kuchitiwo VaPeter Moyo vachidomwa segurukota rinoona nezvekugadzikana kwenyika. Mwanakomana wevakave mutungamiri weMDC wekutanga, mushakabvu VaMorgan Tsvangirai, VaVincent Tsvangirai, vakadomwawo kuve gurukota rinoona nezvevechidiki, mitambo netsika. Vakadomwa kuve makurukota ematunhu vanosanganisira VaMorgen Femai, avo vachange vari gurukota redunhu reHarare; VaGift Konjana vari gurukota redunhu reMashonaland West; Amai Jane Chifamba vari gurukota reMashonaland East; VaGift Chimanikire vari kuMashonaland Central, kuchitiwo VaGiles Mutsekwa vari gurukota redunhu reManicaland. Mutauriri waVaMwonzora, VaLloyd Damba, vanoti mutungamiri webato ravo akatora danho iri achitevera kodzero dzinowanikwa munyika ine hutongo hwejekere idzo dzinobvumidza mapato anopikisa kuti aumbewo dare remakurukota rinenge richiona kuti hurumende yemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa iri kushanda sei. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vopesana Pfungwa Zvichitevera Kuva Sachigaro weAU Kwakaitwa VaMugabe
text: Kugadzwa kwakaitwa mutungamiri wenyika, Va Robert Mugabe, sasachigaro wesangano renyika dziri mu Africa re African Union kuri kutambirwa nevamwe ukuwo vamwe vachiti hazvina zvazvinobatsira Zimbabwe. No media source currently available Vamwe vatsigiri veZanu PF vakaita saVa Clever Mahachi vanoti vari kufara zvikuru kuti VaMugabe vakatora matomhu musangano re Africa Union vachiti ndivo vane hunyanzvi hwakadzama munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika kana pachienzaniswa nevatungamiri vedzimwe nyika. Asi mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Va Mathias Tsomondo, vanoti hapana zvazvinobatsira nyika kuti Va Mugabe vakaitwa sachigaro weAU. Mupepeti webepanhau re The Observer, Va Barnabas Thondlana, vanotiwo kunyange hazvo Va Mugabe vari munhu akakodzera kutora chigaro ichi, uku kwave kuvapa mutoro wakakura kwazvo pakatariswa zera ravo. Va Mugabe vari kusvitsa makore makumi mapfumbamwe nerimwe chete mwedzi uno. Asi Va Thondlana vanoti Va Mugabe munhu anoziva nyaya dzose dzakatarisana nenyika dzose dziri mu Africa zvekuti vanokwanisa kugadzirisa zvinenge zvichidiwa munyika idzi. Va Tsomondo vanoti chigaro chatorwa naVa Mugabe ichi hachina zvachinobatsira mukusimbaradza hukama pakati peZimbabwe nenyika dzekumavirira. Vanoti kunyange hazvo dzimwe nyika dzekumavirira dzanga dzotanga kudyidzana neZimbabwe, Va Mugabe pachavo vanofanira kugadzirisa chimiro chavo munyaya dzemabatiro avanoita nyaya dzesarudzo munyika kuitira kuti AU irambe ine chimiro chakanaka. Vaimbova mutungamiri wesangano revadzidzi munyika, re Zimbabwe National Students Union, Va Pride Mkono, vanoti hapana chekutarisira chakanyanya zvikuru kubva kuna Va Mugabe nechigaro chavo chitsva chavapihwa ichi. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, Va Blessing Vava, avo vanoshanda vakazvimirira, vaudza Studio7 kuti Va Mugabe vane basa rakakura kwazvo mu Africa pakatariswa nyaya yekusagadzikana mune dzimwe nyika dziri mu Africa zvikurusei ku Nigeria ne Democratic Republic of the Congo. Va Mkono vanotiwo kunyange hazvo Va Mugabe vakaita mukurumbira zvichitevera kusarudzwa kwavakaitwa kuti vatungamire AU pamwe chete nesangano renyika dziri kuchamhembe kwe Africa, mukurumbira uyu hauna zvaunoreva kana zvinhu zvakaita manyama amire nerongo munyika mavo. Kunyange hazvo vanhu vazhinji vachiti zera raVa Mugabe richavatadzisa kuita basa ravo idzva mu Africa nemazvo, Va Vava vanoti hapana chinganyanyonetsa sezvo vaine vanhu vanenge vachivabatsira kuita basa. Va Mugabe, avo vanova zvakare sachigaro we SADC, vachange vari sachigaro veAU kusvika muna Ndira 2015.

headline: ERC Yokurudzira ZEC Kuti itevevedzere Mutemo Mukufambisa Sarudzo
text: Sangano rinoongorora sarudzo rakazvimirira reElection Resource Centre kana kuti ERC, riri kukurudzira Zimbabwe Electoral Commission kuti itevedzere mutemo panyaya yekufambisa sarudzo dzegore rino kuitira kuti dzitambirwe nevari kupikisa. Sangano iri rinotiwo ZEC haifanire kuita zano ndega zvinozokonzera mutauro wakanyanya munyika. Sachigaro vebhodhi reERC, VaTrust Maanda vanoti ZEC pari zvino iri kukundikana kutevedzera mutemo wesarudzo kana zvisungo zvayo zvayakatara kuti ichatevedzera mukuita sarudzo dzakachena. VaMaanda vanoti semuenzaniso, sangano ravo rakaona kuti ZEC ingadai yakaburitsa gwaro revavhoti vari kukwikwidza vasati vapinda musarudzo uye kupa vanhu mukana wekuti variongorore kuitira kana paine zvinoda kugadziriswa. Mapato anopikisa ari kuchema-chemawo nezviri kuitwa neZEC achiti iri kukundikana kubata gadziriro yesarudzo. No media source currently available

headline: VaBiden Votura Mashoko kuNyika yeAmerica Vachiti Vazadzikisa Zvavakavimbisa Kuita Mumazuva Zana eKutanga
text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden nhasi vatura mashoko avo kunyika yeAmerica pamberi pematare maviri eHouse of Representatives neSenate mudare reCapital Hill muWashington DC. Izvi zvauya mushure mekunge VaBiden vasvika mazuva zana vari muhofisi kubva zvavatora mhiko yekutungamira nyika. VaBiden sezvange zvakatarisirwa vataura nezvechirwere cheCovid-19 icho chauraya vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu pasi rose kusanganisira zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi mana nevanomwe kana kuti 547 000 muAmerica uye kubata vanhu mamiriyoni makumi matatu nemaviri kana kuti 32 million. Asi vati vari kubudirira kurwisa chirwere ichi sezvavakavimbisa musarudzo. Vati vachapa dzimwe nyika nhomba kana vanhu vose vemuAmerica vabayiwa nhomba. Panyaya yezvehupfumi, VaBiden vati hurumende yavo yakwanisa kuti zvinhu zvigadzikane. Vanhu vakawanda zvikuru vakawana mabasa muAmerica uye IMF inoti hupfumi hweAmerica huchakwira nezvikamu zvitanhatu kubva muzana. VaBiden vanoti vanoda kuti vashandi vawedzerwe mari uye madzimai apihwewo mari yakawanda. Vanoti vakazvipira kushanda nemaRepublicans pagwara ravo rekuvandudza zvehupfumi. VaBiden vataurawo nezvekuda kwavo kuwandudza zviwakwa vachiti zvichabatsira kuwanisa vanhu vakawanda mabasa. Vati vanoda kuti shoroma dzibhadharewo mutero wakati kurei kuti vakwanise kugadzira zvivakwa izvi. MuAmerica hamuna kugadzikana mune mamwe matunhu zvichitevera kuurayiwa kwevamwe vatema nemapurisa zvikuru vechichena. VaBiden vati nyaya iyi inoda kugadziriswa. VaBiden vakurudzirawo kuvandudzwa kwemitemo ine chekuita nekutengeswa kwepfuti zvichitevera kuurayiwa kwevanhu vakawanda nevamwe vanhu vanokwanisa kutenga pfuti asi vasina kugadzikana mupfungwa. Kekutanga munhoroondo yeAmerica, mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika Amai Kamala Harris mudzimai wekutanga kuva nechigaro ichi uye Amai Nancy Pelosi mudzimai wekutanga kuva mutauriri wedare reHouse of Representative vange vakagara pazvigaro zvepamusoro pedyo naVaBiden. Papedza VaBiden kutaura, Senator Tim Scott vekuSouth Carolina vabva vataurawo vakamirira bato rinopikisa remaRebuplicans. Senator Scott ndivo chete munhu mutema anova Senator mubato remaRepublicans. VaScott vati maDemocrats haasi kuratidza kuda kushanda nebato ravo panyaya dzakaita sekurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 kuti vana vadzokere kuchikoro kana pakuvandudza hupfumi. Vati kazhinji maDemocrats anoita zano ndega. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoshorwa neKukundikana Kuumba Komiti Inoongorora Mauto, Mapurisa neVasori
text: Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvemitemo nemashandiro eparamende veVeritas vanoti kutadza kwehurumende kuzadzikisa bumbiro remutemo nekuumba komiti yakazvimirira yoga inoongorora mapurisa, mauto kana vasori vanenge vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu ndizvo zviri kupa kuti vanhu vane hama dzinenge dzaurayiwa, kuitwa kafiramberi kana kubatwa chibharo i vatadze kumhan’ara nyaya dzavo. Komiti iyi yaifanira kunge yakaumbwa makore matanhatu apfuura kuzadzikisa chikamu chemazana maviri negumi kana kuti Section 210 yebumbiro remutemo. Veritas iri kushorawo dare reConstitutional Court nekutadza kuudza hurumende kuti itevedzere mutemo nekuumba komiti iyi kunyangwe muna 2015 VaDouglas Mahiya mutauriri wesangano reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association vakakwidza nyaya iyi kudare mushure mekushungurudzwa nemapurisa vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kupidigura vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Asi gurukota rezvemutemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi varamba kuti hurumende iri kudya manonoko vachiti pane zvimwe zvakakosha zvayange ichiita zvakafanana nesarudzo . No media source currently available Asi gweta vari mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reHuman Rights watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica VaDewa Mavhinga vanoti hurumende inofanira kuumba komiti iyi nechimbi chimbi. No media source currently available VeHuman Rights Watch, Amnesty International neOxfam International vakatonyora tsamba yenyunyuto kumutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nenyaya yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu iri kupomerwa vanodzivirira nyika iyi. VaMnangagwa vakadzoka kumusangano weAfrican Union nezuro.

headline: Mapato eMDC Alliance neMDC-T Otarisirwa Kunetsana Pamusoro peZita
text: Pave nemaonero akasiyanasiyana pagakava ramuka pamberi pesarudzo dza2023 pakati pemapato eMDC Alliance neMDC-T pamusoro pezita rekuti MDC Alliance, zvichitevera mashoko emutungamiri weMDC-T, VaDouglas mwonzora ekuti vanogona kupinda musarudzo dz2023 vari pasi pezita rekuti MDC alliance. Mmwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, vakazobudawo zvakare panhepfenyuro yeHeart and Soul Television vachiti bato ravo ringangopinda musarudzo riri pasi perimwe zita kuitira kuti nyaya yezita isazovakanganisa. Asi VaBiti vanonzi vakati vanofanirwa kuramba vachishandisa zita rekuti MDC, vozoisa rimwe mberi risiri Alliance kuitira kuramba vakabata rutsigiro rwavanga vaunganidza pasi peMDC Alliance. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaRejoice Ngwenya, vanoti VaMwonzora nebato ravo reMDC-T havafanirwe kuswera vachida kukambira zita rekuti MDC Alliance nekuti kubva zvakabuda mutongo wedare reSupreme Court uchiti MDC-T ndiro bato riri pamutemo, pamwe chete nekutora pfuma yose yeMDC Alliance, zvakatoratidza kuti mapato aya akasiyana. VaNgwenya vanoti MDC-T inofanirwa kuramba iri mudanga rayo, kwete kuti ide kukanganisa zvakare vari kumhanya vari mugwanza reMDC Alliance. Vanotiwo hazvizoshamisi kuona MDC-T ichipinda musarudzo ichinzi MDC Alliance, vachiti pasi peZanu PF chese chinhu chinogona kuitika. Vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGilbert Dzikiti, vanotiwo sezvo MDC-T riri iro bato rakaonekwa nedare reSupreme Court kuti ndiro riri pamutemo, zviri pamutemo kuti bato iri rive iro rinopinda mumubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance. VaDzikiti varambawo zvakare mashoko kana muono wekuti Zanu PF ndiyo ine chekuita nekunetsana kuri mumapato maviri aya, vachiti matambudziko ari muMDC haana kutanga nhasi asi kuti akakonzerwa nevaive mutungamiri webato iri, mushakabvu VaMorgan Tsvangirai mushure mekudoma kwavo vatevedzeri vavo vaviri, uye nekuda masimba kwevamwe vari mubato iri. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reCitizens Forum Rokurudzira Kuomeserwa kweVanotengesa Nyika
text: Rimwe sangano rinozviti Citizens Forum rinoti ranyora tsamba dzenyunyuto kumasangano akazvimiririra avanoti akabatsira mukurongwa kwekuratidzira kwakaitwa mwedzi wapera. Vachitaura nevatori venhau, mukuru musangano iri, VaAlex Gakanje, vati masangano aya akapesvedzera mhirizhonga, uye vachaavharisa. Mamwe emasangano adomwa neCitizens Form anosanganisira Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, Law Society of Zimbabwe, Zimbabwe lawyers for Human Rights nemizinda yeAmerica neBritain. Asiwo mukuru wePlatform for Youth Development inove nhengo yeCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaClaris Madhuku, vashora zvikuru Citizens Forum vachiti kutyityidzirana kunodzorera nyika shure. VaMadhuku vatiwo vese vane moyo wekuda kuona kubudirira kwenyika, vari kukurudzira nhaurirano, izvo zviri kuitwa nemasangano avanodyidzana nawo. Studio7 haina kukwamisa kunzwa divi reBritain neAmerica pamusoro pemashoko eCitizens Forum. Nyika mbiri idzi dzakabuda pachena dzichishora mabatirwo akaitwa mhirizhonga nemauto nemapurisa. Vanhu vanodarika gumi nevashanu vakapfurwa vakafa, uye vanhu vanodarika makumi manomwe vakarapwa maronda akakonzerwa nemabara epfuti. Hurumende yeZanu PF iri kupomera MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa mhosva yekuronga mhirizhonga. Asi MDC inoti haisi iyo yakaronga kuratidzira uku, uye zviri kuitwa nehurumende, zvakafanana nekutsvaga uta mugate. Mune imwewo nyaya, vechidiki mubato reZanu PF vari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vatsungirire mumatambudziko akatarisana nenyika vachiti vane chivimbo chekuti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachagadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika. Vachitaura nevatapi venhau muHarare, vechidiki vebato reZanu PF vati vawirirana kuti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanofanirwa kupiwa mukana. Mumwe wevechidiki ava, Muzvare Yeukai Simbanegavi, vati vanonzwisisa kutambura kuri kuita veruzhinji nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyaya dzezveupfumi. Muzvare Simbanegavi vati VaMnangagwa vanofanirwa kupiwa mukana wekurwisa huori, kutsvaka mari dzekunze pamwe nekugadzirisa matambudziko ari kusangana neveruzhinji muhupenyu hwavo. Muzvare Simbanegavi vatiwo sevechidiki vari kushora zvikuru nekwavanoti kushandiswa kwevechidiki mukuratidzira kwakaitika muna Ndira.

headline: VaMasisi Vosimbaradza Kuti Zvirango Zvibviswe, America Ichiti VaMnangagwa Ngavamire Kutonga neDemo
text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeBotswana VaMokgweetsi Masisi vanoti vari kuda kutaura nehurumende yeAmerica kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagw nevamwe vavo nehurumende yeAmerica zvibviswe. Asi hurumende yeAmerica inoti kana vatungamiri venyika vakaramba vachityora kodzero dzevanhu zvirango hazvisi kuzobviswa Vachitaura nevatori venhau vachangosvika panhandare yendege yeSir Seretse Khama International Airport iyo iri muguta guru renyika iyi reGaborone nhasi mangwanani, VaMasisi vati vakazvipira kuita mutongi gava maenzanise pakati peZimbabwe neAmerica munyaya yezvirango. VaMasisi vavimbisa kuti vachaita zvose zvavanogona kuona kuti izwi rekuramba zvirango raita maungira pasi rose. VaMnangagwa vadzokawo munyika nhasi kubva kumusangano weUnited Nations uye vati vari kufara kuti vakawana rutsigiro rwevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica kuti zvirango zvibiswe. Mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru mudare remakurukota uye vari vari mutauriri wemtungamiri wenyika, VaGeorge Charamba vaudza Studio7 kuti zvave pachema semhanza yembudzi kuti nyika zhinji kunyanya idzo dziri mudunhu reSADC dzoramba dzakamira neZimbabwe semusambangwena panyaya yezvirango. Asi vachipindura mashoko ekuti zvirango zvibviswe, mumiriri weAmerica muSouth Africa VaReuben E Brigety vakaudza vatori venhau veNews24 kuti America haisi kuzobvisa zvirango izvi nekuti haitendi kuti ndizvo zvaondonga hupfumi hweZimbabwe. Vanoti zvirango izvi zvakatemerwa vatungamiri vari kupomerwa mhosva dzekutonga nedemo uye hazvinei nevanhuwo zvavo. VaBrigety vati vatungamiri veZimbabwe vakatendeuka nekumira kutyora kodzero dzevanhu zvirango izvi zvinoswera zvabviswa. Mutauriri webato rinopikisa munyika reCitizens Coalition for Change, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere vatiwo nyaya yekutadza kutungamira ndiyo yapa kuti Zimbabwe iite seyakageza negoka munyama Mashoko aMuzvare Mahere atsinhirwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvemagariro evanhu, VaTendai Mbofana avo vati kubviswa kwezvirango hakungapedze nhamo yadai kupfunya chisero munyika nokuda kwehuori. America yakatanga kutemera vakuru muhurumende nevavanodyidzana navo zvirango muna 2001. Vatungamiri venyika yeAmerica kutanga kuna VaGeorge Bush, VaBarack Obama, VaDonald Trump naVaJoe Biden vari kuramba vachizviwedzera gore roga roga hupenyu hwezvirango izvi vachiti vakuru vehurumende vari kuenderera mberi nekutyora kodzero dzevanhu zvokonzera kusagadzikana mudunhu rese rekuchamhembe kweAfrica. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Alliance Inoti Zanu-PF Iri Kurova Vatsigiri Vayo
text: Bato reMDC Alliance rinoti nhengo yaro yevechidiki, ye Youth Assembly National Executive, Takunda Madzana, ari kurwara zvakaipisisa muchipatara mushure mekurohwa nevanhu vasingazivikanwi vanonzi vakange vakapakata pfuti, avo vanonzi vakamupisa nemoto wemagetsi. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatshwayo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo rinopomera bato reZanu-PF mhosva yekupamba nekurova Takunda Madzana, vachiti imwezve nhengo yavo yakatoshaya ku Plumtree mushure mekurohwa nevavanoti vanhu ve Zanu-PF. No media source currently available Asi umwe wevakuru mubato reZanu-PF, Doctor Simba Mavaza, avo vati mapurisa nemasoja havasi veZanu-PF kana bato ripi zvaro rezvematongerwo enyika asi ndeve nyika nevanhu vose.Vati zvekare bato reMDC Alliance rapererwa nemazano nekusadiwa kwaro nevanhu, naizvozvo riri kutsvaka pekuwanda napo sezvo riri kutadza kuwana rutsigiro rwevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: VaJim Kunaka veZanu PF Vopomerwa Mhosva yeKutyisidzira Nhengo dzeMDC-T neRufu
text: VaJim Kunaka, avo vakambenge vabuda muZanu PF vachinopinda mubato reZimbabwe People First rinotungamirirwa naAmai Joice Mujuru asi vakazodzokera kuZanu PF, vanonzi vatyisidzira nerufu VaDenford Ngadziore, vanove munyori muboka revechidiki vebato reMDC T mudunhu reHarare. VaKunaka vanonzi vachaira VaNgadziore nhare vakatanga nekutaura zita ravo vachibva vazozivisa kuti nhasi usiku nhengo dzebato reZanu PF dzichapisa dzimba nemidziyo yevatsigiri vebato rinopikisa reMDC T. VaKunaka vanonzi vapa zvikonzero zvekuti vachapisa dzimba idzi nekuda kwezviri kuitwa nevatsigiri veMDC T zvekuratidzira vachishora hurumende yaVaRobert Mugabe pamwe nebato ravo reZanu PF. VaNgadziore vanoti mashoko avatambira kubva kuna VaKunaka aya avatyisa chose sezvo VaKunaka vachizivikanwa nenyaya dzemhirizhonga pamwe nechikwata chavo cheChipangano. “Tave kutotyira hupenyu hwedu nekuti VaKunaka vanozivikanwa nemhirizhonga. Saka ndaudzawo hutungamiri hwebato redu uye vamwe vangu vechidiki kuti tione kuti tachengetedza hupenyu hwemhuri dzedu pamwe nemhuri dzedu,” VaNgdziore vanodaro. No media source currently available Asi VaKunaka varamba mashoko aya pavabvunzwa neStudio 7 vachiti hapana kana chikonzero chingaita kuti vade kurwisa VaNgadziore nekuti havasi munhu avangatya.  VaKunaka vanoti kana vaine zvavanoda kuita kunhengo dzeMDC T vanongoita zvisina dambudziko. "Ndinovatyisidzira pakayi? I think that's being stupid. I think you better find a better story for me to answer. You better find chimwe chiri nhingi, handina kana dhiri navo avo. Handityisidziri munhu ini nekuti kana ndichida munhu ndino dealer naye one-on-one. he is not even a threat to me," VaKunaka vaudza Studio 7 parunhare. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, vanofungidzirwa kuti inhengo dzeZanu-PF mudunhu reMasvingo vanonzi neChina usiku vakapisa musha wasachigaro weMDC-T Youth Assembly mudunhu iri VaPhillip Chingini vakaparadza midziyo inokosha zviuru zvemadhora. Nhengo yeMDC-T iyi inonzi inogara mumusha weChiredzi uye yaipomerwa mhosva yekukurudzira vanhu kuti varatidzire mumasvingo kutigira MDC-T. Asi sachigaro weZanu-PF mudunhu iri VaAmasa Nenjana varamba mashoko ekuti bato ravo riri kuita zvemhirizhonga.

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri Kunze kweNyika Zvoumba Homwe Ichabatsira Musarudzo dza2023
text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri munyika dzakasiyana siyana, zvakaumba sangano, reCitizen Action For Change, iro zvinoti rinotsvaka mari yekubatsira panguva yesarudzo dza2023. Mukuru wesangano iri, VaJuma Ulete, vaudza Studio 7 kuti sangano iri rinoda kuona sarudzo dzakachena, naizvozvo mari yavari kuunganidza ichashandiswa mukubatsira kunyoresa vanhu kuti vavhote uye nekuchengetedzwa kwemavhoti panguva yesarudzo. Citizen Action For Change inoti vanhu vaneta nekubirwa kodzero dzavo nguva dzose panoitwa sarudzo naizvozvo vanoda kuona kuti izvi zvinomiswa, vachiti imwe yemari iyi ichashandiswa kubhadhara vanhu vanochengetedza mavhoti kubva panguva inovhota vanhu kusvika pakuverengwa kwawo. “Isusu hatina bato ratinoshandira. Tiri zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe. Chatinoda ndechekuti pave nejekerere. Chido chedu ndechesarudzo yakachena kuti vana veZimbabwe vagosarudza zvavanoda kuti vaenderere mberi,” vanodaro VaUlete. Vakafanobata chigaro chemurongi wemisangano muZanu-PF, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakaudza vatori venhau mwedzi wapera kuti bato ravo rakaisa ziso raro pabato reMDC Alliance kuona kuti hariwani mari inobva kunze kwenyika inozoshandiswa musarudzo muZimbabwe. VaUlete vanoti mari yavari kuunganidza ndeyezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinoda kugadzirisa zvunhu munyika yazvo. Mutaurii weMDC Alliance, Muzvare Fadzai Mahere, vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyaya iyi iri kuitwa nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvine kodzero yekuita izvi naizvozvo hapana mutemo unovatadzisa kuenderera mberi nebasa ravari kuita iri. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Inoti Vanhu vemuZimbabwe Ngavabatane Kukurudzira VaMugabe Kubva paChigaro Vachishandisa Nzira Dziri paMutemo
text: Bato rinopikisa reMDC-T rakaburitsa mashoko kuvatori venhau nemusi weMuvhuro richiti mhuri yeZimbabwe inofanira kubatana yoshandisa nzira dzose dziri pamutemo kuti vamanikidze mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nevamwe vari muhurumende yavo kuti vasiye basa nekuti vakundikana kutonga. MDC-T yati iri kushora zvikuru vanhu veZanu-PF vari kuda kufora nemusi weChitatu vachiratidza kuti vari kutsigira VaMugabe mukufora kwavanoti Million Man March. VeMDC-T vati vanhu veZanu-PF ava vanofanira kufora vachiti VaMugabe vaende pamudyandigere. Vati hurumende yaVaMugabe yaendesa nyika kumawere munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye iri kutonga nedemo. Mutauriri weMDC-T VaObert Gutu vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato reZanu-PF rapererwa nemazano nekudaro rinofanira kukanda mapfumo pasi. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, munyori mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association VaVictor Matemadanda vati vave kukurudzira nhengo dzebato ravo kuti dzibatane nevamwe mukuratidzira uku. Vakarwa hondo yerusununguko vaimbe vatsika madziro vachiti havatenderana nekufora uku sezvo vaiti vamwe vechidiki vebato iri vane pamuromo pasingamharwe nenhunzi. No media source currently available

headline: VaDabengwa Voberekwa Kumusana naVaChamisa Kuti ZAPU Iwane Zvigaro
text: Bato reZAPU rinopinda muchibvumirano neMDC Alliance chekutsigira VaNelson Chamisa musarudzo. Mutungamiri webato reZAPU, VaDumiso Dabengwa, vazivisa nezvechibvumirano ichi pamusangano wavaita nevatapi venhau neChishanu muBulawayo. Mutauriri weZAPU, VaIphithule Maphosa, vanoti ZAPU haizi kupinda muMDC Alliance asi chibvumirano ichi chichaita kuti bato reZAPU ripiwe zvigaro gumi zvedare reparamende zvichakwikwidzwa nenhengo dzebato iri dzichitsigirwa neMDC Alliance. VaMaphosa vati bato ravo rakamboedza kutaura nemamwe mapato asi richitadza kuwirirana nawo izvo zvaita kuti rishande neMDC Alliance. Chipangamazano paUniversity of Pretoria, VaTinashe Mawere, vanoti VaDabengwa munhu ane nhoroondo inoremekedzwa mukurwira rusununguko rwenyika vachitiwo chibvumirano ichi chinogona kubatsira VaChamisa neMDC Alliance zvikuru. Mudzidzisi munyaya dzerunyararo nebudiriro uye vari muongorori wezvematongerwo enyika akazvimirira, Vincent Chakunda, vanotsinhirawo maonero aya. Mune imwewo nyaya, Zimbabwe Electoral Commission inoti vanhu mazana maviri nevashanu ndivo vakakwanisa kuendesa mazita avo kudare reNomination Court nezuro kuti vakwikwidze pazvigaro gumi nezviviri zvedare reparamende zviri mudunhu reBulawayo. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu-PF Yogadzirira Conference Paine Kukandirana Makobvu neMatete
text: Bato reZanu-PF neMuvhuro rakatanga kuita musangano waro wePolitburo sehwaro hwekutanga hweconference yepagore yegumi nenhanhatu iri kuitwa kuVictoria Falls. Bato iri richaitawo musangano weCentral committee risati raenda kuVictoria Falls mukupera kwesvondo. Asi zviri kubuda mubato iri murwendo rwekuenda kuconference iyi zviri kuratidza kuti zvinhu zvakaita manyama amire nerongo. Matunhu anosvika mashanu pari zvino ati ari kuda kuti bato ridzokokere pabumbiro remitemo rakare rinoti mumwe wevatevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika anofanira kunge ari mudzimai. Matunhu anoti Harare, Mashonaland East, Mashonaland Central, Mashonaland West ne Bulawayo anoti ari kuda kuti bumbiro rechinjwe kuti mudzimai aone chigaro chepamusoro. Dunhu reMidlands neMasvingo anonzi ari kutsigira mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, anoti ari kuda kuti komiti yeNational Disciplinary Committee iyo iri kudzinga vanonzi nhubu mubato, inofanira kuvandudzwa. Komiti iyi ine nhengo dzinosanganisira mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaPhelekezela Mphoko, uye mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, amai Grace Mugabe, avo vave kupomerwa mhosva yekuti vari kudzinga mubato vanofungidzirwa kuti vanotsigira VaMnangagwa. Paitawo kukandirana makobvu nematate pakati pemunyori anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mubato, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, negurukota rinoona nezvevarwi vehondo yerusununguko, VaChris Mutsvangwa. VaKasukuwere vari kuti VaMutsvangwa ngavadzingwe mubato vachivapomera mhosva yehuori. Asi VaMutsvangwa vari kutiwo VaKasukuwere ngavabviswe pachigaro ichi sezvo vasina nhoroondo yehondo yechimurenga. Makakatanwa aya anoratidza kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mubato. Asi vachitaura neStudio 7, mutauriri weZanu-PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vanoti conference yavo ichasimbisa nyaya yehupfumi vakatarisa chirongwa cheZIMASSET. Vatiwo iyi haisi congress nekudaro hapatarisirwe kudomwa mamwe makurukota matsva. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaBlessing Vava vanoti VaMugabe vakasadoma achavatsiva zvinoreva kuti mubato munoramba muine bata murefu bata mupfupi muZanu-PF.

headline: VaChamisa naVaMudzuri Vodomwa Kuitwa VaTevedzeri VeBato reMDC
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC-T VaMorgan Tsvangirai vadoma VaElias Mudzuri naVaNelson Chamisa sevatevedzeri vavo. Vachitaura kumba kwavo kuHarare nevatori venhau VaTsvangirai vati zvavaita zvido zvebato ravo, “Kudoma kwandaita vaviri ava kunotevera kurudziro yakaitwa neNational Council nezuro." Vaviri ava pamwe naAmai Thokozani Khupe vachandibatsira kugadzirira sarudzo dzemuna 2018. Izvi zvave kureva kuti VaTsvangirai vanenge vave nevatevedzeri vatatu kusanganisa Amai Khupe. Kudomwa kwaVaChamisa naVaMudzuri kunotevera misangano miviri yakaitwa nezuro yeNational Council neNational Executive. VaTsvangirai vakazivisa mwedzi wapera kuti vainge vaine chirwere chegomarara rematumbu asi vakaudza Studio 7 kuti havasi kuzosiya basa uye vanotarisira kunaya sezvo vari kudaira mushonga. Tichakupai zvizere nezvenyaya iyi muteerere Studio 7 na 7 pm pamasaisai anoti 909 am ne 4930 kilohertz pa short wave

headline: Doctor Magaisa Voitwa Gamba reVanhu neMasangano Akazvimirira
text: Gweta raive nemukurumbira, Dr Alex Magaisa, avo vakashaya nemusi wesvondo kuBritain nhasi vapihwa ruremekedzo rwegamba revanhu, People’s Hero, nerimwe sangano ravakatanga muZimbabwe, reConstitutional Law Centre, uye sangano iri ratara mazuva mashanu ekuvachema kutanga nhasi. Munyori weCLC zvakare vari mukuru weZimrights, VaDzikamai Bere, vaudza vatori venhau kuti mukati memazuva mashanu aya kutanga nhasi, pachaitwa zvirongwa zvakawanda zvekurangarira mushakabvu nemabasa. Nhasi manheru nenguva dza7 padandemutande reTwitter Spaces reCLC pachataura rimwe gweta rine mukurumbira, VaBrian Kagoro, uye mangwana na5 manheru pachaitwa Public Lecture apo pachataura gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, avo vakashandawo naVaMagaisa. VaBere vanoti nemusi weChishanu pachaitwawo munamato wekurangarira VaMagaisa uyo uchange uchitungamirirwa nemumwe murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, VaDeprose Muchena. Vatiwo vano kurudzira veruzhinji kuti vabude nehuwandu hwavo kunotambira mutumbi waVaMagaisa kuRobert Mugabe International apo uchauya kuzoradzikwa pazuva risati rataurwa nemhuri yavo. VaLovemore Kadenge avo vanobva kumusha kumwe chete nemufi vanoti zvinofadza chose kuona Alex apihwa ruremekedzo rwakakura kudai nevamwe vake. Vati mufi akaratidza hunyanzvi hwake po akashanda sechipangamazano chemutungamiri wenyika VaMorgan Tsvangirai panguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa uyewo pakunyorwa kwebumbiro remutemo weZimbabwe. VaMagaisa vakashaya nesvondo kuBritain mushure mekurwara nechirwere chemoyo.  No media source currently available

headline: Veruzhinji Vopa Pfungwa Dzavo nezveRwendo RwaVaMugabe Kumusangano weUN
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vari muNew York kuAmerica uko vari vari kupinda mumusanganano weUnited Nations General Assembly. Asi vanhu vemuZimbabwe vanoti kunyange hazvo vasiri kufara nenzendo dzaVaMugabe dzekunze kwenyika, urwu rwendo rwunodiwa kuti VaMugabe vaveko. Vachitaura neStudio 7 muHarare neChishanu, vanhu vakawanda vati VaMugabe vanofanira kupinda mumusangano weUnited Nations uye vanofanira kushandisa mukana uyu kutaura nedzimwe nyika kuti dziregerere Zimbabwe pazvikwereti zvayo. Vamwewo vakaita saRas Chanakira vati kunyange hazvo vasiri kufara nenzendo dzaVaMugabe dzekunze kwenyika, rwendo rwekuUN rwakakosha uye VaMugabe vanofanira kuchenjerera kuita zvavaikaita masvondo maviri apfuura apo vakeverenga mashoko asiri iwo pakuvhurwa kwedare reparamende. “Aiwa, aah, no, zvakanaka kuti vaende President but hatidi kuti vano mixer speech sezvavakaita pakuvhurwa kweparamende, handitika?” Vanodaro Ras Chanakira. “Totarisirawo kuti this time vanotiitira zvakanaka uye havacollapse.” VaWakefiled Mlilo vatiwo vanotsigira rwendo rwemutungamiriri wenyika kuAmerica uye vatiwo vanofunga kuti VaMugabe vachashandisa mukana uyu kugadzirisa hukama hwavo nedzimwe nyika. Mumwewo mugari wemuHarare VaTendai Hakata vati VaMugabe vanofanira kusiyana nekufamba sezvo vavamunhu mukuru. Vati VaMugabe vave kufanira kutuma vamwe vavo kumisangano yakaita seye UN. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika VaTakura Zhangazha vati kunyange hazvo vanhu vasiri kufara nenzendo dzaVaMugabe rwendo rwe kuUN rwakakosha uye VaMugabe vanofanira kuvepo sezvo Zimbabwe ichi batsirwa nenyika dzepasi rose mumatambudziko akasiyana siyana . Vatungamiriri venyika dzepasi rese vanosangana muAmerica gore rega rega pasi pesangano reUnited Nations, apo vanozeya nyaya dzinonetsa pasi rese. VaMugabe vari kutarisirwa kutaura kuUnited Nations General Assembly nemusi weMuvhuro. Vari kuperekedzwa nemudzimai wavo Amai Grace Mugabe, gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika VaSimbarashe Mumbengegwi uye gurukota rezvehutano Doctor David Parirenyatwa. Vatungamiri ava vari kutarisira kuzeya chirongwa chekutambira gwara idzva reUnited Nations rehurongwa hweSustainable Development Agenda kutsiva maMillenium Development Goals. Izvi zviri kuitwa pamusangano wakakosha kana kuti special summit kutanga neChishanu kusvika Mugovera. No media source currently available

headline: VaItai Dzamara Vosvika Makore Matatu Nhasi Vapambwa
text: Nhasi mhuri yekwaItai Dzamara, vezvematongerwo enyika, vemachechi nevanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vari kutarisirwa kuungana muAfrica Unity Square vachirangarira murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu VaDzamara avo vakapambwa muna 2015. VaDzamara vasvika makore matatu pasina anoziva kuti vari kupi. Vakapambwa apo vaigerwa pedyo nemba yavo kuGlen View muHarare nevanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vasori. VaDzamara vairatidzira vachiti vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vaifanira kusiya basa sezvo vainge vakundikana kutonga nyika. Vaigarawo vachitaura neStudio 7. Imwe shamwari yaVaDzamara vachiita zvemitambo uye vakambopambwawo VaSilvanos Mudzvova vanoti zvakakosha kuti vaungane vakawanda vachirangarira VaDzamara. No media source currently available

headline: Mashoko eDemocratic Alliance Ekuti Vabvakure Vabude muSouth Africa Obvundutsa Vakawanda
text: Bato guru rinopikisa muSouth Africa, reDemocratic Alliance rakaparura hurongwa hwaro hwekutsvaga rutsigiro musarudzo dziri kutarisirwa munyika iyi gore rinouya richikurudzira kuti vabvakure vari munyika iyi vagadzirise hugaro hwavo kana kuti vobatsirwa kubuda munyika iyi. Bato iri rinoti richatora matanho anoita kuti vanhu vekune dzimwe nyika vasangopinda muSouth Africa zvisiri pamutemo kuburikidza nekuvhara miganho yenyika iyi. Rimwe bato idzva remunyika iyi, re African Basic Movement munaNyamavhuvhu gore rino rakakurudzirawo kuti zvizvarwa zvose zvekune dzimwe nyika zviri muSouth Africa zvinge zvabuda munyika iyi panopera gore rino. Nyanzvi mune zvemutemo vachishanda nesangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica,VaDewa Mavhinga, avo vari muSouth Africa, vanoti vave kutyira kuti mashoko emapato maviri aya anogona kukonzeresa mhirizhonga yekurwiswa kwevanhu vasiri vemunytika iyi sezvakamboitika makore adarika. VaMavhinga vanoti havashamiswi nemashoko ebato reDemocratic Alliance aya sezvo meya weguta reJohannesburg, anove webato iri, akagara ataura kuti haadi vabvakure muguta rake achiti ndivo vari kupara dzimhosva dzakawanda muguta iri. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Votsigira Danho reMDC Rekuratidzira, Vamwe Vachiti Bato iri Ngaribatane neVamwe muNhaurirano
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC, VaNelson Chamisa vakazivisa nezuro kuti bato ravo rave kuzopinda mumigwagwa richiratidzira pamusoro pemabatirwo avakati ari kuitwa nyaya dzehupfumi hwenyika nehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa.  VaChamisa vakataura mashoko aya pamusangano wavakaita nevatori venhau muHarare neChitatu, vakati misangano yavakaita nenhengo dzavo mumatunhu gumi emunyika yakavaratidza kuti vanhu vaneta nekuparara kwehupfumi.  Mutungamiri weMDC uyu akati vatsigiri vebato rake vave kuda kuti vapinde mumigwagwa, vachiti iyi ndiyo chete nzira yekugadzirisa nayo zvinetswa izvi.  Mushure memusangano uyu, vechidiki veMDC mudunhu reHarare vakabva vapinda mumigwagwa vachiratidzira vachikurudzira kuti VaMnangagwa vasiye basa. Varatidzira ava vakazoparadzwa nemapurisa achishandisa utsi hunokachidza.  Zvichitevera mashoko aya, pave nemaonero akasiyana pamusoro pedanho riri kukurudzirwa navatsigiri veMDC iri, vamwe vachiti pane nzira dzakawanda kwazvo dzekugadzirisa nadzo matambudziko ari munyika dzisiri kupinda mumigwagwa.  Ukuwo, vamwe vari kuti mutauro unonzwisiswa nehurumende chete ndewekuti vanhu vapinde mumigwagwa, uye izvi zvinobvumirwa mubumbiro remitemo yenyika.  Mukuru weCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu ndemumwe wevari kukurudzira kuti vanhu varatidzire murunyararo, vachiti hapana chinobatika chati chaitwa nehurumende mukuratidza kuti ine zvairi kuita mukugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika.  Asi izvi zvinoshoropodzwa nasachigaro vevechidiki vebato reZanu PF mudunhu reHarare, VaAlex Gakanje, avo vanotsoropodza pfungwa yaVaMaguwu yekuti vanhu varatidzire, vachiti VaMaguwu vari kufurira vanhu kuti vapinde mumigwagwa vachityora mutemo.  Asi VaMaguwu vanoti chinhu chinozivikanwa nemunhu wese kuti kubva muna 2000 nyika haina kwairi kuenda, iri kungotenderera panzvimbo imwechete nekuti hurumende iri kungoramba ichipa pfungwa dzisina zvadzinobatsira nyika nazvo. VaGakanje vanoti mhirizhonga iri kukurudzirwa neMDC iyi inotora hupenyu hwevanhu vanenge vaiswa pamhene nemaitiro akadai. No media source currently available

headline: United Nations Yotumira Nhumwa Kuzoongorora Nyaya yeKupfurwa kweVanhu neMauto Muna Ndira
text: Sangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights rinoti rinotambira nemufaro danho rebazi reUnited Nation’s rinoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu reHigh Commission for Health Rights kutumira nhumwa kuZimbabwe kuzoongorora nezvenyaya yekupfurwa kwevanhu nemauto muHarare muna Ndira. Vanhu ava vairatidzira vachiti havaifara nenyaya yekukwidzwa kwemutengo wemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. Vamwe vanhu vanonzi vakaurayiwa, mamwe madzimai achipomera mauto mhosva yekuvabata chibharo uye vakawanda vakasungwa. Hurumende iri kuramba kuti izvi zvakaitika ichiti mauto aizorwa mafuta enguruve yaasina kudya. Vachitaura nebepanhau reSunday Mail munyori mukuru mubazi rezvemutemo amai Virginia Mabhiza vakati gurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi vainge vatenderana nemukuru weUNHRC Amai Michelle Bachelet nezvekutumirwa kwenhumwa kuZimbabwe. Mutauriri weZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights VaKumbirai Mafunda vati vanotambira rwendo urwu nemaoko maviri. No media source currently available

headline: Muchuchusi weHurumende Anoti Anoda Kuti Nhengo dzeMDC-T Dzitongerwe Rufu paMhosva yeKuponda Mupurisa
text: Nhengo dzeMDCT dzakabatwa nemhosva yekuponda mupurisa mumusha weGlen View muHarare muna 2011 nhasi dzakumbira kunzwirwa tsitsi nedare kunyangwe hazvo dzichiri kutsika madziro dzichiti hadzina mhosva yadzakapara. Muchuchisi wehurumende panyaya iyi, VaEdmore Nyazamba, vakurudzira dare kuti ritongere rufu vasungwa vanoti VaTungamirai Madzokere, Muzvare Yvonne Musarurwa pamwe naVaLast Maengehama avo vakabatwa nemhosva yekuponda Assistant Inspector Petros Mutedza pamhirizhonga yakaitika muna 2011 pakati pemapurisa nevechidiki veMDCT. VaNyazamba vati chiitiko ichi chakakanganisawo pfungwa dzevanhu vakawanda vakaona izvi zvichiitika vanosanganisira vana vadiki pamwe nevanhuwo zvavo vasinei nezvematongerwo enyika. Asi rimwe remagweta evasungwa ava, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, vati vasungwa ava havana mhosva yavakapara uye vati mukupa mutongo, dare rinofa kutarisa kuti humbowo hwakasvitswa kudare hauburitse pachena kuti ngana ndiye akakanda dombo rakatema VaMutedza zvakazokonzera kuti vafe. Vaenderera mberi vachiti mutongo wakaturwa nemutongi wedare VaChinembiri Bhunu unoita sekuti imhosva kuti munhu anzi inhengo yeMDCT nepamusana pekuti hazvisi kubuda pachena mumutongo wavo kuti nhengo dzeMDCT dzakabatwa nemhosva yekuponda iyi dzakanyatsoita chii chaizvo chakakonzera kuti VaMutedza. Zvichakadai, Amai Mtetwa vakurudzira dare kuti mumtongo wango ribude pachena kuti hurumende inofanira kuferefeta nyaya dzevanhu vese vanonzi vakapondwa pamwe nekushayikwa zvinechekuita nezvematongerwo enyika vachiti vamwe vanhu varikupomerwa mhosva dzekuponda vari kungoswerombeya nemigwagwa vasina zvavari kuitwa zvinopedzisira zvaita sekuti mutemo une vamwe vanhu vaunoshandisirwa. Amai Mtetwa vatiwo bumbiro remitemo idzva haribvumidzwe kuti munhukadzi atongerwe rufu sezvakumbirwa naVaNyazamba; naizvozvo vati Muzvare Musarurwa havafanire kutongerwa nyangwe zvodii. Amai Mtetwa vatiwo vasungwa ava vakagara mujeri kwemakore anoda kusvika kumatatu nyaya iyi ichizeyewa mumatare saka vanofanirwa kutorwa sevanhu vakatombopika. Zvichakadai, mutongi wedare, VaBhunu, vatambira chikumbiro chasvitswa kudare nemagweta evasungwa ava chekuti VaPhineas Nhatarikwa, avo vakabatwawo nemhosva yekubatsira VaMadzokere naMuzvare Musarurwa kubva panzvimbo yakaparirwa mhosva, vabuditswe muhusungwa. Amai Mtetwa vati hazvikodzere kuti VaNhatarikwa, avo vanove mutyairi weMDCT vabatwe nemhosva iyi sezvo vaive munhu aiita basa rake panguva yaakasungwa. VaBhunu vabvuma chikumbiro chekuti VaNhatarikwa vabuditswe muhusungwa vakamirira kupihwa panyaya iyi. Zvichitevera zvasvitswa kudare nemagweta ari kumirira vasungwa, VaBhunu vati nyaya iyi ichadzoka mudare musi wa19 mwedzi uno pavachatura mutongo wekuti vanhu ava vanogara mujeri kwenguva yakareba zvakadii. Imwe nhengo yeMDCT yanga iri mudare ichinzwa nyaya iyi, VaSimon Mpande, vati varikuwona sekuti VaBhunu vane divi ravakarerekera pakutongwa kwenyaya iyi. VaSydney Chisi avo vanoshanda nesangano reYouth Initiative for Democracy in Zimbabwe kana kuti Yidez vati vanowona sekuti nyaya iyi inyaya yakatongwa kare pasiri kutariswa humbowo hwakasvitswa kudare. Mudare nhasi manga makazara kuti maku nevatungamiri veMDCT vanga vachisanganisira vatevedzeri vaVaMorgan Tsvangirai muMDCT vanoti Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, VaNelson Chamisa naVaElias Mudzuri. Vamwewo vanga vari mudare vanosanganisira mutungamiri weTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume pamwe nenhengo dzeparamende dzeMDCT dzakati wandei. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoita Hurukuro neVakuru veMakereke
text: Munyori mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Council of Churches, Reverend Kenneth Mutata, vanoti zvakakosha kuti vemachechi vaite misangano yekubudirana pachena nevatungamiri vezvematongerwo enyika. Vanoti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti zvinotaurwa nevatungamiri vehurumende dai zvichizozadziswa zvinoita kuti veruznji vaone gwara rehurumende zvakanaka. Mashoko aReverend Mutata anotevera musangano wakaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nevakuru vemachechi. Zvinonzi pamusangano uyu Va Mnangagwa vakataura nyaya dzakasiyana siyana nevakuru vemakereke. VaMnangagwa vanonzi vakavimbisa kutsigira zvinoitwa nevemakereke. Vakaudzawo vemachechi kuti vasununguke mukupawo pfungwa dzavo pamusoro pematongerwo enyika. Muhurukuro dzavaiita nevemachechi aya, pane dzimwe nguva VaMnangagwa vaishandisa mavhesi emubhaibheri zvikuru pamusoro pedambudziko rehuori hwauraya nyika. Zvinonziwo VaMnangagwa vakaudza vemakereke kuti vanzwisisewo kuti havangagoni kuvandudza zvinhu zvese nechimbi chimbi munyika asi vakati vakazvipira kugadzirisa zvese zvavanofanirwa kugadzirisa. No media source currently available

headline: MDC-T yaVaChamisa Yorwisa Kuti Vari kuChikwata chaMuzvare Khupe Vadzingwe muParamende
text: MDCT inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa inonzi yanyorera kuparamende ichikumbira kuti vaimbova mutevedzeri webato iri Muzvare Thokozani Khupe nevamwe vabviswe kuve nhengo dzeparamende zvichitevera makatanwa ari mubato iri. Vakafanobata chigaro chasachigaro webato reMDCT rinotungamirwa naVaChamisa, VaMorgen Komichi, vanoti bato ravo rakaendesa tsamba kumutauriri wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, nechinangwa chekuti Muzvare Thokozani Khupe nevamwe vavo vari kuvatsigira vadzingwe muparamende. Izvi zvinotevera kudzingwa kwakaitwa Muzvare Khupe, avo vaiva mutevedzeri wemutungamiri muMDCT, pamwe naVaAbednigo Bhebhe, avo vaiva murongi wemisangano mubato iri. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMudenda kuti tinzwe divi reparamende panyaya iyi. Asi mutauriri weboka reMDC-T inotungamirwa naMuzvare Khupe, VaObert Gutu, vanoti zviri kutaurwa naVaKomichi izvi ndezvemugotsi matsuro. Zvichakadai, imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaVivid Gwede, vanoti kunyorwa kwetsamba yekubvisa Muzvare Khupe nevamwe vavo muparamende hachisi chinhu chinoshamisa. Aka hakasi kekutanga kuti MDC-T idzinge nhengo dzayo muparamende. Vaimbova munyori mukuru weMDCT, VaTendai Biti nevamwe, vakambodzingiswa kuparamende mushure mekunge vanetsana nevaimbova mutungamiri webato iri, mushakabvu VaMorgan Tsvangirai. Kunetsana pakati paVaChamisa naMuzvare kwakatanga pakafa VaTsvangirai apo komiti yepamusorosoro yeMDCT, yeNational Council, yakabuda nechisungo chekuti VaChamisa vatsive VaTsvangirai, nekune rumwe rutivi, Muzvare Khupe vachiti panofanirwa kuitwa kongiresi yechimbichimbi kutsvaga anotsiva VaTsvangirai. Zvichakadai, Muzvare Khupe vanoti hurongwa hwekuita kongiresi hwave pachinhanho chepamusoro vachiti kongiresi iyi ichaitwa musi wa 21 mwedzi uno. Nekune rumwe rutivi, VaChamisa vanoti hapasisina nguva yekuita kongiresi gore rino sezvo patarisanwa nesarudzo. Zvikwata zviviri izvi zviri kurwirawo zita rekuti MDC-T, uye nyaya iyi yakatosvitswa kudare redzimhosva. No media source currently available

headline: Mhuri yeVaShona Iri muKenya Yotarisira Kuvhota Kekutanga neChipiri Kubva Zvayawaniswa Magwaro eKuve Zvizvarwa zveNyika iyi Muna 2020
text: Mhuri yeVaShona iri muKenya ichange ichivhota kekutanga musarudzo dzenyika dziri kuitwa nemusi weChipiri 09 Nyamavhuvhu 2022, mushure mekupiwa magwaro ekuve zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi. Mutauriri wemhuri yeVaShona iyi, VaOliver Muregerera, vanoti vari kufara zvakanyanya nekukwanisa kushandisa kodzero dzavo dzevhota sezvimwe zvizvarwa zvemuKenya, vachiti chinhu chakatarisirwa nevanhu vose. Vabereki vemhuri idzi vakapinda munyika yeKenya vachibva kuZimbabwe makore anodarika makumi matanhatu adarika vakagara pasi pehutungamiri hwakasiyanasiyana, asi hapana akakwanisa kuvapa magwaro aya, kusvikira mugore ra 2020 pavakazocherechedzwa nekupiwa magwaro aya nemutungamiri wenyika, VaUhuru Kenyatta. Mhuri dzingangoda kusvika kuzviuru zvina dzinonzi dzakakwanisa kunge dzichipiwa magwaro aya. VaMuregerera vanoti kuwaniswa magwaro uku hakuna kungovapa mukana wekuvhota chete, asi kuti vave kukwanisawo zvakare kuvhura mabhuku ekumabhanga, kukwereta mari kumabhanga, kuenda kuzvikoro zvepamusoro, nezvimwe zvakawanda. Vanotiwo nekuda kwekuti vave nemagwaro ekuve zvizvarwa zveKenya, vanotarisirawo kuti musarudzo dzichatevera vana vavo vari kuchikoro pari zvino vachazokwanisawo kukwikwidza muzvigaro zvakasiyanasiyana. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vobatana neVatungamiri veAfrican Union Kushora Kupidigurwa kweHurumende neMauto
text: Vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vakawanda vanoti vari kushushikana zvikuru nekusagadzikana kwezvinhu munyika dzakawanda zvikuru kune hurumende dzakapidigurwa nemauto. Izvi zvakabuda pamusangano wemazuva maviri wepagore weAfrican Union wakaitirwa kumuzinda wesangano iri weAddis Ababa, Ethiopia ukapera neSvondo. Nyika dzine hurumende dzakapidigurwa nemauto dzinosanganisira Mali, Guinea, Burkina Faso neSudan. Nyika dzose idzi dzakatombomiswa kuve nhengo dzesangano reAfrican Union. Sachigaro weAfrica Union Commissionn VaMoussa Faki vakati vari kushushikana zvikuru nenyaya yekupidigurwa kwehurunde nemauto. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vange vari kumusangano uyu vakashorawo nyaya yekubvuta masimba nechisimba pachishandiswa mauto.
