Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti VaMnangagwa ndemumwe akapidugurawo hurumende achishandisa mauto muna 2017. Nyaya yekuti Israel yova muongorori kana kuti observer here kuAfrica Union yakonzerawo mutauro nyika dzakaita sedzakawanda dzemuSADC, Nigeria, Algeria dzichiti hadzidi kuti Israel iri kunetsa nePalestine ipihwe chiremera ichi. Asi DRC, Morroco, DRC nedzimwe dziri kutsigira Israel. Nyaya iyi yakambonzi isendekwe parutivi yozozeyiwa gofre rinouya. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau neMugovera, Africa Union yakati mutungamiri wenyika yeSenegal VaMack Sall ndivo vainge vasarudzwa kuva sachigaro wegungano iri kusvika gore rinouya. Dingindira regore rino rakanangana nekusimbisa nyaya dzekurwisa nzara kuburikidza nekurima nekusimbaradza nyaya dzezvehutano nechinangwa chekusimudzira magariro evanhu kana kuti “Strengthening Resilience in Nutrition and Food Security on the African Continent: Strengthening Agro-Food Systems, Health and Social Protection Systems for the Acceleration of the Human, Social and Economic Development.” Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vanoti dingindira iri rakanaka chose asi muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi. Vanoti vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vanofanira kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika kuti pave ebudiriro.

headline: VaTsvangirai Vanoti MDC-T Haisi Kuzobatana naAmai Mujuru
text: Mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vayambira nhengo dzavo kuti dzirambe dzakamira semuzamba vachiti bato ravo harisi kuzotungamirirwa nebato reZimbabwe People First sezviri kufunga vakawanda. Mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vanoti MDC ibato guru uye harisi kuzomedzwa nemutungamiri weZimbabwe People First, Amai Joice Mujuru. VaTsvangirai vatiwo hapana kutaurirana kuripo pakati pavo naAmai Mujuru, izvo vanogaronzwa veruzhinji vachitaura. Vachitaura kekutanga kubva pakanyoreswa Zimbabwe People First svondo rapera, VaTsvangirai vayambira nhengo dzavo kuti dzirambe dzakamira semuzamba vachiti bato ravo harisi kuzotungamirirwa nebato reZimbabwe People First sezviri kufungwa nevakawanda. Vachitaura neChipiri pamahofisi ebato ravo muChinhoyi, VaTsvangirai vaudza vatsigiri vavo kuti vasaite semhepo inoenda kunoenda mhepo, asi kuti varambe vachitsigira bato ravo kudzamara rave kutonga. VaTsvangirai vatiwo mashoko ekuti vari kuita nhaurirano naAmai Mujuru manyepo uye bato ravo harisi kuzotungamirirwa nemumwe mutungamiri werimwe bato, kunze kwaivo VaTsvangirai vakasarudzwa nekongiresi kuti vatungamire bato. VaTsvangirai vati kuisa Amai Mujuru pamberi kana kuita mubatanidzwa nebato ravo zvakafanana nekudzokera kuZanu PF, sezvo Amai Mujuru vari munhu akadzingwa muZanu PF nepamusana pekunetsana kuri mubato iri, asi ivo mukati memoyo wayo vachiri kuda kuramba vari mubato iri. VaTsvangirai vatorawo mukana uyu kushoropodza zvikuru mashoko emutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaPhelekezela Mphoko, ekuti pane vanhu mubato reZanu PF vari kuti kana mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vabva pachigaro, munhu achatora nzvimbo yavo haafanirwe kunge ari muZezuru sezvo VaMugabe vari muZezuru. VaTsvangirai vati hakuna chizvarwa chakakosha kudarika chimwe chizvarwa munyika. Vati vanhu vane mafungiro akadaro, imharadzi dzevanhu munyika. Vachitaura kunhengo dzehutungamiri hwebato ravo muMashonaland West dzanga dzichidarika mazana mashanu, VaTsvangirai vati vanhu vasateerera mashoko aVaMugabe ekuti nyika dzemuAfrica dzibude mumubatanidzwa wenyika dzepasi rose weUnited Nations vachiti mashoko aVaMugabe ndeemunhu anyanya kukwegura. VaTsvangirai vati vanhu vanofanirwa kudzidza pane zvakaitika apo VaMugabe vakabudisa nyika mumusangano weCommonwealth muna Mbudzi 2003, izvo zvakasiya Zimbabwe isisina madzisahwira ayo akawanda. VaTsvangirai vari kushanyira matunhu ose emunyika vachisangana nehutungamiri hwevatsigiri vavo vachitaura pamusoro pezviri kuitika mubato pamwe nemunyika. Musangano wemuChinhoyi wapindwawo nehutungamiri hweMDC-T hunosanganisira mutevedzeri waVaTsvangirai, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, munyori mukuru mubato iri, VaDouglas Mwonzora, pamwe nemutauriri webato, VaObert Gutu. No media source currently available

headline: ZEC Yotenda Kuti Humhizha MUkufambiswa kweMashoko Hunogona Kushandiswa Kudzidzisa Vanhu neZvesarudzo
text: Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Youth Council Vasungano Chisina vanoti sangano reZimbabwe Electoral Coimmission kana kuti ZEC rakabuda pachena kumusangano wakarongwa neNational Association of Youth Organization kana kuti NAYO kuKadoma Ranch Motel. Musangano uyu wakatanga nemusi weChipiri ukapera neChishanu wainge wakanangana nekudzidzisa vechidiki nezvehumhizha mukuburitwa kwemashoko kana kuti digital media. VaChisina vakaudza Studio 7 kuti kubva kune zvakataurwa nevesangano re ZEC vainge vari kumusangano uyu, musarudzo munogona kushandiswawo digital media iyi. “Kubva kune zvakataurwa nevaimirira ZEC pamusangano uyu zvakabuda pachena kuti muZimbabwe vanhu vapfumbamwe pagumi vane nharembozha kana kuti vari pedyo nayo nekudaro pakashandiswa nharembozha pakudzidzisa vanhumashoko anogona kufambiswa nechimbi chimbi mukunyoresa nekudzidzisa vanhu nezvesarudzo.” VaChisina vatenda kuti vechidiki vemuZimbabwe vachine rwendo rwurefu mukukwanisa kushandisa humhizha hwechizvino zvino mukuita mabasa akasiyana siyana. “Tadzidza zvakawanda. Asi chikuru chatadzidza ndechekuti vechidiki vakawanda havana ruzivo nezvekushandisa digital media. Se Zimbabwe Youth Council tave kutoenda kunobuda negwaro rekuti tidzidze vechidiki nezvekushandisa digital media mumabasa akasiyan siyana.” Hatina kukwanisa kubata mukuru weZEC Amai Rita Makarau sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nhraembozha ravo. Musangano uyu wakaparurwa neNAYO nemusi weChipiri nechinangwa chekudzidzisa vechidiki nezvekushandisa humhizha hwechizvino zvino kana kuti digital media kuti vapinde muzvirongwa zvehutongi hwejekerere zvakaita sesarudzo nezvimwe. Humhizha uhu hunosanganisira kushandisa nharembozha nemadandemutande akaita seFacebook, WhatsApp ne Twitter. Musangano uyu uri kuitirwa kuKadoma Ranch Hotel uye uri kutarisirwa wakapera nemusi weChishanu. Sangano reNAYO isangano remuZimbabwe rinoyedza kuunza kuyanana mune vechidiki kuitira kuti vamise nyaya dzemhirizhonga. Musangano uyu wange wakanangana nekukurudzira nhaurirano pakati pevechidiki vemuZimbabwe neve kunze kana kuti Dialogue Exchange Program. Vanoona nezvekuenzaniswa kwemikana pakati pevakomana nevasikana musangano iri, Muzvare Starline Mukumbachore, vanoti chinangwa chavo chikuru ndechekukurudzirawo kushandiswa kwemichina yechizvino zvino munyaya dzesarudzo. Izvi vanoti zvakanangana nesarudzo dzichazoitwa muna 2018. No media source currently available

headline: VaKasukuwere Voronga Kukwikwidza Musarudzo dzeMutungamiri weNyika muna 2023
text: Vaimbova gurukota muhurumende vasati vaenda muhupoteri muSouth Africa VaSaviour Kasukuwere vanonzi vari kuronga kukwidza musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika gore rinouya. Izvi zvapa kuti patange kukandiranwa makobvu nematete pakati pavo neZanu-PF. Patabata VaKasukuwere, vati vange vasina kusungunuka kutaura sezvo vange vari parufu. VaKasukuwere vakabudawo pane imwe vhidhiyo vachiti vakagadzirira kutungamira uye havasi kuzoita zvakaitwa nemamwe makurukota ari muhupoteri anoti VaJonathan Moyo naVaPatrick Zhuwao. Vaviri ava vakakumbira ruregerero kuvatsigiri rebato ravo nekumbotsigira vanopikisa mushure mekuenda muhupoteri. Bato reZanu-PF rakabva rati vakasungunuka kudzoka kubato. Mutauriri wechikwata cheTysonWabantu Movement chiri kutsigira VaKasukuwere, VaNtokozi Msipha vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaKasukuwere vari kudzokera kuZimbabwe uye vachakiwkwidza musarudzo dzegore rinouya dzemutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available Sezvo tichitema tisina divi ratinorerekera, tabata mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu-PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi avo vati Zanu-PF haishaiswe hope naVaKasukuwere. No media source currently available

headline: Crisis in Zimbabwe Yonetseka neKutyorwa kweKodzero dzeVanhu muNyika
text: Sangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition nemusi weMuvhuro rakaita musangano kuJohannesburg, South Africa vachizeya mamiriro akaita zvinhu muZimbabwe zvikuru nyaya yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. Masangano akapinda mumusangano uyu anosanganisa Tajamuka, National Vendors Union Zimbabwe, ZCTU, Platform for Youth Development nemamwe. Mukuru weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition Amai Pamela Kadau vakaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kunetsekana zvikuru nenyaya yekurohwa kwevanhu munyika nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori uye mapurisa. Amai Kadau vati zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kuSouth Africa zvinotiwo zviri kuda kupihwa mukana wekuvhota. Asi mukuru weZimbabwe Electotal Commission Amai Rita Makarau vakaudza vatori venhau mazuva mashoka apfura kuti mutemo uripo parizvino haupe vanhu vari kunze kwenyika mukana wekuvhota. Vakati izvi zvinokwanisika chete kana bumbiro remutemo ravandudzwa. No media source currently available

headline: MDC-T Yoendesa Banga Guru reNyika kuMatare
text: Bato rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai rinoti rave kuendesa bhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, kumatare edzimhosva pamusoro pehurongwa hwebhanga iri hwekuda kuwunza mari yepepa iri kudaidzwa kuti ma bond notes. Bato rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai rinoti rave kuendesa bhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, kumatare edzimhosva pamusoro pehurongwa hwebhanga iri hwekuda kuwunza mari yepepa iri kudaidzwa kuti ma bond notes. MDC-T inoti zviri kuda kuitwa nebhanga iri zviri kunze kwemutemo. Nhengo dzekomiti yepamusoro ye MDC-T ye National Executive dzasangana pamuzinda webato iri paHarvest House neChina dzikabuda nechisungo chekuti bato ravo rikwidze nyaya yema bond notes kudare repamusoro-soro sezvo bato iri richiti zviri kuda kuitwa neRBZ zvinotyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Mutauriri weMDC-T, Va Obert Gutu, vaudza Studio 7 papera musangano uyu kuti bato harisi kuzopeta mawoko aro hurumende yeZanu PF ichiita muzerere nenhupenyu hwevanhu. VaGutu vati RBZ haina masimba ekudhinda mari isiri mari inocherechedzwa nenyika kana kuti official currency. VaGutu vatiwo bato ravo richaratidzira mumigwagwa nenyaya iyi. Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, vakati vachapa zvikamu zvishanu kubva muzana zvema bond notes kune vemabhizimusi vanenge vachitengesa zvinhu kunze kwenyika senzira yekukurukudzira kuti vemabhizimusi vatengesere dzimwe nyika kuti nyika iwane mari yekunze sezvo vachiti mari zhinji iri kubuditswa munyika zvisiri pamutemo hurumende isina chairi kuwana. Nekune rumwe rutivi, mutauriri weZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vaudzawo Studio 7 parunhare kuti havangamhanyire kumedza kutsenga vachada vachiti vari kumirira kutanga vawona kuti veRBZ pamwe naivo veMDC-T vachaitasei nezvenyaya iyi. MDC-T inoti zviri kuda kuitwa nehurumende izvi kudzosa mari yemuZimbabwe nerweseri. Asi VaMangudya vakati mari yekunze icharamba ichishandiswa munyika kudzamara hupfumi hwenyika hwagadzikana kuti Zimbabwe ikwanise kudhinda mari yayo.

headline: Vanhu VemuBulawayo Voratidzira Zvine Mutsindo
text: Mapurisa muBulawayo ashandisa hutsi hunokachidza kuti adzinge vanhu vange vachiratidzira muguta iri. Pazosvika nguva dzekuma1 masikati muguta mange musisina vanhu zvitoro nemabhanga zvavharwa. Kunyange hazvo muguta matanga muine runyararo, zvitoro zvikuru zvakawanda zvange zvakavharwa uye panguva dzekuma9 mangwanani mhomho yevanhu yaungana paCity Hall vakazotenderera mumigwagwa yeguta ichiimba nekuisa matombo nezvimwe zvose zvavange vachikwanisa kuwana kudzivirira kufamba kwemotokari muguta. Kuratidzira uku kwaitikawo munzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji dzakadai Sizinda, Tshabalala neEntumbane uko vamwe vevange vachiratidzira ava vapaza chimwe chitoro cheChoppies vachitora zvinhu. Kuvhurwa kwekotoro yekutanga kwedare reHigh Court uko kwaitwa nemutevedzeri waChief Justice, Justice Elizabeth Gwaunza, kwambomiswa kukazoenderera mberi mushure mekanguva apo vanhu ava vasvika vakaratidzira panze pedare iri. Mukuru weboka revechidiki mubato reMDC mudunhu reBulawayo VaMalandu Ncube avo vange variwo pakati pevange vachiratidzira vati iyi inzira yeveruzhinji yekuratidza hurumende kuti vaneta nematambudziko avari kusangana nawo zuva nezuva, vachitiwo kukwidzwa kwemutengo wemafuta edzimotokari kwawedzera kutambura uku. Gweta VaKholwani Ngwenya avo vange vari pachiitiko chekuvhurwa kweHigh Court ndemumwe wevaona zvaitika uye vaudza Studio 7 kuti kuratidzira kwaitwa nevanhu uku kunoenderana nekodzero dzavo pasi pebumbiro remutemo wenyika. Mumwe mugari wemuBulawayo VaMoses Kumbweya vati kuratidzira kwevanhu kwaitika uku hakushamisi nekuti veruzhinji munyika vave kunhonga svosve nemuromo. Mumwe mufundisii VaSikhalo Cele vaudza Studio 7 kuti mamiriro aita zvinhu munyika ave kuda kuti vanhu vose, kusanganisira mapato ezvematongerwo enyika, vaite maonera pamwe. Nhasi range riri zuva rekutanga rakadeedzerwa nevemamwe masangano akazvimirira ega kusanganisira veZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions kana kuti ZCTU kuti vagare kumba. No media source currently available

headline: Mambo Ndiweni, VaFelix Ndiweni, Vopikisa Danho reHurumende reKuvaturura Hushe
text: Ishe Ndiweni, VaFelix Nhlanhlayamangwe Ndiweni, vave kuronga kukwira kudare repamusoro reHigh Court vachipikisa danho rakatorwa nehurumende munguva pfupi yapfuura rekuvaturunura hushe. Gweta raIshe Ndiweni, VaDumisani Dube vaudza Studio 7 kuti mamwe mapurisa anodzivirira mhirizhonga akaenda kumba kwaIshe Ndiweni nemusi weMugovera kuti vanotora motokari uye zvipfeko zvehushe zvavanoshandisa, asi vakakundikana kuita izvi. Izvi zvinotevera gwaro rakanyorwa nemunyori webazi rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, VaZvinechimwe Churu, mumazuva mashoma apfuura vachizivisa kuti Ishe Ndiweni havafanirwe kunge vari ivo ishe wenzvimbo yeNtabazinduna mudunhu reMatabeleland North. VaDube vati vari kupikisa danho iri vachiti harizi pamutemo. Ishe Ndiweni vakagadzwa mugore ra2014 asi vanga vasati vagadzwa zviri pamutemo. Mwedzi wapera dare remadzishe edunhu reMatabeleland North, richitungamirwa naIshe Shana vekuJambezi, rakapa kurudziro yekuti Ishe Ndiweni vabviswe pachigaro ichi sezvo zvichinzi havana kusarudzwa pachiteverwa tsika dzemhuri yavo dzinoshandiswa pakugadza hushe. VaJoram Ndiweni, avo vanove dangwe kumhuri yekwaNdiweni, ndivo vanonzi vanofanirwa kuve ishe asi pari zvino vari kugara kuBritain. Mutauriri wemhuri yekwaNdiweni VaBancinyane Ndiweni vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti mhuri yekwaNdiweni yakasarudza VaFelix Ndiweni kuti vave ishe uye hapana zvati zvachinja. Vati vachazivisa zvizere kana Ishe Ndiweni vadzoka kubva kunze kwenyika kwavari pari zvino. Gweta, VaDube, vatsinhira kuti kusarudzwa kwakaitwa Ishe Ndiweni nemhuri yavo hakufanirwi kuchinjwa. Taedza kunzwa kubva kumutevedzeri wemukuru wemadzishe munyika Ishe Mtshane Khumalo asi vati vange vasingakwanisi kutaura zvakawanda pamusoro panyaya iyi sezvo vange vari parwendo. Mumwe murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu VaThemba Chivheya vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanoona danho rehurumende rekubvisa Ishe Ndiweni pachigaro rine zvematongerwo enyika mukati sezvo vachizivikanwa nekutsoropodza hurumende. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Ishe Ndiweni vakambosungwa vakatongerwa kugara mujeri kwegore nemwedzi mitanhatu mushure mekunge vabatwa nemhosva yekupwanya ruzhowa rwepamusha wemumwe mugari wemunzvimbo yavo, asi vakabuda mujeri mushure mekupikisa kusungwa kwavo. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yocherechedza Makore Makumi Mana eKuzvitonga Paine Maonero Akasiyana Pane Zvaitwa neHurumende
text: Vana veZimbabwe neMugovera uno vari kucherechedza makore makumi mana nyika yawana kuzvitonga kubva kuhutongi hwevachena, avo vaive vakapakata muhapwa dzavo hupfumi hwese hwenyika, vatema vachikwangwaya nekunhonga svosve nemuromo. Kuuya kwehutongo hwevatema kwakasimudza tariro yevakawanda vachiti vakanga vazowana hutongo hwejekerere, ruzhinji rwavo rwakanga rwakandwa murukangarabwe nevachena pavaitora ivhu ravo rose raive rakanaka. Asi makore makumi mana nyika yawana kuzvitonga, vamwe vavo vave kuti zvinhu zvatonyanya kuvaipira zvichienzaniswa nenguva yehutongo hwevachena, sezvo vasisina mabasa ekuti vakwanise kuriritira mhuri dzavo. Vanoti mamiriro ezvehupfumi aparara zvekuti munhu haachanise kuziva kuti remangwana rinobuda richimuigira chii. Nyaya dzehutano dzinonzi dzatove matakadyakare sezvo zvipatara zvizhinji zvemunyika zvisisashande sezvinotarisirwa. Vashoma vachiri mumabasa vacho vanoti nguva zhinji vave kuipedzera mumigwagwa vachiratidzira kuitira kut vapiwe mihoro inovararamisa. Kupinda pachigaro kwevave mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa muna 2017, mushure mekubviswa nemauto kwevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe, kwakambopa veruzhinji tarisiro yeramangwana rakajeka. Asi ruzhinji rwavo ndirwo rwave kuti rwakapemberera n’anga neyakabata Mai, sezvo vachiti zvinhu zvatonyanya kuenda kumawere. Asi kuti hapanawo here chakanaka chakaitwa neZanu PF kwemakore makumi mana ose aya? Sachigaro veZanu PF mudunhu reNorth America, VaRegis Charumbira, vanoti chikuru chaitwa nebato ravo kupa ivhu kuvatema, zvisineyi nekuti ndevebato ripi rezvematongerwo enyika. VaCharumbira vanoti bato ravo pari zvino rave kutopedza kuongorora kuti ndivanaani vakawana mapurazi akawanda kudarika vamwe, uye kuti vakanga vasati vawana ivhu, kusanganisirawo zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika, vawaniswe. Asi mutewedzeri wemunyori anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muMDC mudunhu reNorth America VaTimothy Muringai, vanoti Zanu PF yakundikana kwemakore akawanda kuzadzisa zvose zvakarwirwa hondo yerusununguko. Vanoti zvinhu zvaparara kwemakore akawanda munyaya dzezvehupfumi, zvehutano pamwe nekuvharwa kwemakambani, izvo zviri kusiya vashandi vakawanda vave mumigwagwa vasisina mabasa. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Voenzanisa Kubvutwa kweMasimba neMauto kuMali neZvakaitika muZimbabwe 2017
text: Vanhu vakawanda muAfrica nepasi rose vari kutevera nemaziso matsvuku zviri kuitika munyika yeMali, uko mauto akabvisa mutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaIbrahim Boubacar Keita, pachigaro nemusi weChipiri uye kumusunga pamwechete nemutungamiri wehurumende yake VaBoubou Cisse nemamwe makurukota ehurumende. Izvi zvinonzi zvakatanga mushure mekunge chikwata chemauto chakatora nechisimba akamba yemauto ye Kati iri makiromita gumi nemashanu kubva muguta guru renyika iyi re Bamako. Mauto aya akazofora achipinda muguta guru umo akasvikosunga mutungamiri wenyika nevamwe vake pamwe nekuumanikidza kuti asiye basa. VaKeita vakabuda panhepfenyuro yenyika iyi vachizivisa kuti vakanga vosiya basa senzira yekudzivirira kudeuka kweropa. Masangano akawanda kusanganisira sangano rinoona nezvekugadzikana munyika dzepasi rose reUnited Nations Security Council, European Union, sangano reAfrican Union, pamwe nere Economic Community of West African States (Ecowas) iro Mali iri nhengo akatozivisa nezvekusatambira kwawo kubvutwa kwemasimba uku nemauto. Sangano reAfrican Union neChitatu rakamisa Mali kuve nhengo yesangano iri nekuda kwechiitiko ichi. Gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muAmerica, VaMike Pompeo vakazivisawo kuti nyika yavo iri kubatana nemasangano eAfrican Union neECOWAS mukushoropodza zvakaitika neChipiri muMali. Sachigaro veAfrican Union vari mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, vakakurudzirawo kudzoserwa kwehutongo hweveruzhinji nekukasika. Mutungamiri weFrance, VaEmmanuel Macron vakakurudzirawo kudzoswa kwehutongo hwejekerere munyika iyi. Pave nemaonero akasiyanasiyana pakubvutwa kwemasimba mu Mali nemauto nekubvutwawo kwemasimba nemauto muZimbabwe, vamwe vachiti masangano ari kubuda paachena achishoropodza zviri kuitika kuMali aifanirwa kuita zvimwechete muZimbabwe muna 2017, apo mauto akabvisa vaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe pachigaro pamwe nekuvamanikidza kusiya chiogaro. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachitungamira bato reDemocratic Party, Doctor Urayayi Zembe, vanoti pane kufanana kezvakaitika kuMali nezvakaitika muZimbabwe muna 2017, zvikuru panyaya yehuwori nekubirwa kwesarudzo. Vanoti zviviri izvi zvakafanana uye ndizvo zvakasimudza kuti munyika mbiri idzi mauto atungamire mukubviswa kwehutungamiri. Asi Doctor Zembe vanoti musiyano uripo chete ndewekuti muZimbabwe veruzhinji vakapinda mumigwagwa mushure mekuridzirwa huwi nemauto pamwe nevesangano revakarwa hondo yerusununguko kuti vanhu vauye vatsigireVaMugabe vabve pachigaro. Izvi zvinotsinhirwa nevanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, Doctor Simba Mavaza, avo vanoti vanhu vari kuenzanisa Zimbabwe neMali havasi kunzwisisa zvakaitika. Vanoti nyaya yekuMali inyaya yemauto akabvisa mutungamiri pachigaro isina vanhu mukati uye paramende yeMali haina kugara kuti itorere matanho mutungamiri wenyika, VaKeita kuti vadzingwe kana kuti varegedze basa sezvakaitika muZimbabwe. Doctor Mavaza vanoti VaMugabe vakabviswa pachigaro nebato ravo, iro rakazoshevedza vaive mutewedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti vadzoke munyika mushure mekunge vatizira kuSouth Africa. Vanotiwo VaMugabe havana kumbobvira vasungwa nemauto sezvakaitika kuMali uko VaKeita vakaiswa muhusungwa nemauto. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoudza African Union Kuti Vari Kuchengetedza VaMugabe Zvakanaka
text: Mutungami wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakapinda mumusangano wavo wekutanga kuAfrican Union kuAddis Ababa, Ethiopia nemusi weSvondo. Musangano wechimakumi matatu kana kuti 30th AU Assembly wevatungamiri wenyika watanga. No media source currently available Vachitaura pamusangano uyu VaMnangagwa vakaudza vamwe vatungamiri venyika kuti vaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakachengetedzeka. Izvi zvakatambirwa nemufaro nevamwe vatungamiti venyika dzemuAfrica. Vachitaura nemusi weMugovera pamusangano weNew Partnership for Africa’s Development kana kuti NEPAD, VaMngangagwa vakati Zimbabwe yakazvipira kutevedzera zviga zveAfrican Union. Vakatiwo Zimbabwe yakazvipira kushanda nedzimwe nyika munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Asi vanotungamira sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica VaDewa Mavhinga vaudza Studio 7 kuti vatungamiri veAU ava vanofanira kukurudzira VaMnangagwa kuti vaite sarudzo dzakachena. No media source currently available

headline: VaMudzuri Vanoti VaTsvangirai Vachakunda Musarudzo yeMutungamiri weNyika
text: Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri we MDC-T, Engineer Elias Mudzuri, vanoti vari kushushikana zvikuru nemashoko avari kutambira ekuti murongi wemisangano muZanu PF, retired Brigadier General Engelbert Rugeje, vari kutyisidzira vanhu vachivayeuchidza nezvemhirizhonga yakaitika musarudzo dza 2008. VaMudzuri vanoti VaRugeje, semunhu akasiya chiuto, vanofanirwa kuchiita semunhuwo zvake, kwete kuramba vaine mweya wekutyisidzira vanhu munguva yegadziriro yesarudzo. VaRugeje vakaburitswa mubepanhau rekuMasvingo vachinzi vainge vataura mashoko ekutyisidzira vanhu pamusangano wavakaita kuMasvingo mazuva mashoma apfuura. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi raVa Rugeje pamashoko avari kunzi vakataura. Asi VaMudzuri vanoti vanhu vekuMasvingo vava kugara vachitya sezvo vachiziva mabasa aVaRugeje munyaya dzekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. VaMudzuri, ava vanobva kuZaka kuMasvingo, vanoti vanoyeuka zvakaitwa naVaRugeje kuZaka muna 2008, mushure mekunge vakurudzira vanhu veZanu PF pamwe nemauto kuti varwise musha wekwaMudzuri. Asi VaMudzuri vanoti zvisineyi nekutyisidzirwa kuri kuitwa vanhu, zvikuru kumaruwa, mutungamiri webato ravo, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vachakunda mutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. “Gore ra 2018 nderedu. MDC inokunda musarudzo. VaMnangagwa vakakundwa naBlessing Chebundo, nokudaro sarudzo yemutungamiri ine zvakawanda zvinotariswa pamunhu. VaMnangagwa havamire pana VaTsvangirai,” vadaro VaMudzuri. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoti Ichiri Kuferefeta Kutsakatika kwaVaItai Dzamara
text: Hurumende inoti ichiri kuferefeta kuti VaItai Dzamara, avo vakapambwa nevanhu vasinga zivikanwe makore mana apfuura, vari kupi uye inoti pari zvino hapana zvayati yawana. Izvi zvinoitika apo mhuri yaVaDzamara iri kuparura Manheru eChitatu, Itai Dzamara Trust, unova mucherechedzo wezvinhu zvese zvairwirwa naVaDzamara. Izvi zvataurwa negurukota rezvemukati menyika, VaCain Matema, muNational Assembly vachipindura mubvunzo kubva kunhengo dzebato rinopikisa reMDC. Mumiriri weKambuzuma muNational Assembly, VaWillas Madzimure, vange vakumbira VaMathema kuti vazivise dare iri kuti vasvika papi nekutsvaga VaDzamara avo vakapambwa mumusha weGlen View 7 muna 2015. VaDzamara, avo vaive mutori wenhau, vakasiya basa rekutora nhau vachiti vava kurwira kodzero dzevanhu kudzamara vaive mutungamiri wenyika panguva iyi, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiya basa. Vakaita mukuru wesangano reOccupy Africa Unity Sqaure iro raive nevanhu vaiswera vakaungana muAfrica Unity Square vachiti VaMugabe vabve pachigaro sezvo vaityora kodzero dzevanhu. Musi wa9 Kurume muna 2015, VaDzamara vakapambwa nevanhu vasingazivikanwe uye kusvika nhasi havazikanwe kuti vari kupi. Dare repamusoro soro rakapa mutongo wekuti hurumende, kuburikidza nemapurisa, itsvage kuna VaDzamara pamwe nekuzivisa mhuri yavo kuti vari kupi. Munin’ina waVaDzamara, VaPatson Dzamara, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mapurisa akataura navo kwemwedzi mitatu chete zvichitevera mutongo uyu, uye kubvira ipapo, mapurisa haasi kutaura navo. VaDzamara vati vakatomboedza kutaura nemapurisa, gurukota rezvemukati menyika pamwe nemutungamiriri wenyika kuti vagadzirise nyaya iyi asi hapana chakabuda. Mhuri yaVaDzamara iri kuparura Itai Dzamara Trust rinova sangano richange richimirira zvese zvairwira naVaDzamara. VaPatson Dzamara vati mukoma wavo aida kuti vanhu vagare vakasununguka murunyararo uye izvi ndizvo zvichange zvichimirwa neItai Dzamara Trust. Zvichakadai, sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudyidzana nekutengeserana nedzimwe nyika, VaKindness Paradza, vazivisa kuti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatambira chisungo chekuti nhengo dzeparamende dzipihwe maDiplomatic Passports. Vati nekudaro nhengo dzese dzeparamende dzichatanga kupihwa magwaro aya zvisinei nekuti ndedze bato ripi. VaParadza vayambira kuti vachashandisa magwaro aya zvisina mwero vachaatorerwa. Mune imwewo nyaya, nhengo dzeparamende kuMDC dzaramba kuzeya bhiri reMaintenance of Peace and Order dzichiti dzinoda kutanga dzawona zvakashandurwa pabhiri iri mushure mekunge imwe komiti yeparamende yeParliamentary Legal Committee yati bhiri iri rinotyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Vange vakabata chinzvimbo chemumutauriri weNational Assembly, VaWilliam Mutomba, vabvuma kutambira chikumbiro chenhengo dzeMDC uye gurukota rezvemukati menyika, VaCain Mathema, vachiti vachauya nebhiri rine zvakashandurwa mudare neChina. No media source currently available

headline: Kanzura Kudzai Kadzombe Vanoti Musha Mukadzi
text: Kanzura anomirira Marlborough (ward 41) mukanzuru yeguta reHarare, Amai Kudzai Kadzombe, vanoti munhukadzi wese anopinda mune zvematongerwo enyika anofanirwa kusimba dzisunge, sezvo basa iri riine zvakawanda zvinoda kushinga. Amai Kadzombe, avo vakapinda mukanzuru mushure mekusarudzwa gore rapera vakamirira MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, vanoti handi nyore kuti zvinhu zvifambe zvakanaka kumunhukadzi munyaya dzakawanda dzinosanganisirawo zvematongerwo enyika.  “Chokwadi hazvisi nyore kuve munhukadzi anenge achishanda pakati pevanhurume. Nguva zhinji unoona uchitarisirwa pasi, saka unotofanirwa kushinga pazvinhu zvaunenge uchiita nemoyo wako wese,” vadaro Amai Kadzombe. Zvichitevera kusarudzwa kuti vave kanzura wewadhi 41, pakatanga kushanda kanzuru Amai Kadzombe vakasarudzwa kuva sachigaro wekomiti yekanzuru inoona nezvakatipoteredza, izvo zvinosanganisira mvura. Vanoti sekanzuru vari kuedza nepavanogona napo pose kuitira kuti vagadzirise dambudziko remvura rakatarisana neguta renyika. Asi vanoti kuti izvi zvibudirire, panofanirwa kuita muonera pamwe chete pakati pekanzuru yeHarare nemapazi ehurumende. Amai Kadzombe vanobvuma kuti pane dambudziko guru rekuti mvura yemuLake Chivero icheneswe sezvo tsvina iri kupinda mumvura iyi yakawandisa zvikuru zvekukurira mishonga yekuchenesa mvura. Semunhukadzi, Amai Kadzombe vanoti vakwanisa munguva diki kugadzirisa zvimwe zvichemo zvevanhukadzi vemunharaunda mavo kuburikidza nekuvandudza nzvimbo yekurapwa iri pedyo navo. Amai Kadzombe vanoti vanhukadzi vanofanirwa kubatana, uye vasabvume kutyityidzirwa kuitira kuti vazvisimudzire muhupenyu hwavo. “Musha mukadzi. Musha uno weZimbabwe, tisu madzimai. Ngatibataneyi, tibatsirane kugadzirisa nyika yedu kuti ienderere mberi,” vadaro Amai Kadzombe. No media source currently available

headline: Dare Redzimhosva Roshorerwa Kutambira Zvakaitwa NeMauto
text: Dare guru redzimhosva rinoti kutora masimba nechisimba kwakaitwa nemauto svondo rapera kuri pamutemo. Vachitaura neChishanu mushure mekunzwa nyaya yakakwidzwa kudare iri nevesangano rakarwa hondo yerusununguko, mutongi Justice George Chiweshe, vakati zvakaitwa nemauto, achitungamirwa nemukuru wavo, VaConstantino Chiwenga, zvinobvumidzwa neChikamu 212 che bumbiro remitemo weZimbabwe. Asi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, Va Dewa Mavhinga, vanoti nyaya iyi haina kuziviswa kune veruzhinji uye haina kubatwa zvakanaka. Va Mavhinga vanoti hapana akapiwa nguva yekutaura akamirira rimwe divi. No media source currently available

headline: 'Komishini Yakazvimiririra Ingabatsira Vanhu Vanoshungurudzwa Nehurumende' - HRW
text: Zvichitevera kurohwa kwakaitwa vanhu vasina mhosva nemapurisa svondo rapfuura, sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, re Human Rights Watch (HRW), rinoti panofanira kuumbwa komishini yakazvimiririra kuti vanhu vawane batsiro yekumhangarira hurumende kana ichinge yavatadzira. Nemusi we Muvhuro, vatsigiri vebato reMDC vakange vakamirira kunzwa mutungamiriri wavo, VaNelson Chamisa, vachitaura vakarohwa zvakaipisisa nemapurisa akange akapakata zvombo. Bazi re America rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika rakabudisa mashoko ekushora zvikuru zvakaitwa nemapurisa richiti hurumende inofanirwa kutevedzera bumbiro remutemo. America inoti haisi kufara nemapurisa eZimbabwe arikushandisa masimba akapfurikidza pavanhu vakaungana pasina mhirizhonga sezvinobvumidzwa nebumbiro remutemo. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika mubazi rinoona ne zvenyika dzemu Africa, kana kuti Assistant Secretary of State for U.S. Department of State’s Bureau of African Affairs, VaTibor Nagy, vati zviri pachena kuti hurumende ye Zimbabwe haisi kutevedza bumbiro remutemo wenyika iro rinobvumidza vanhu kuungana kana kuratidzira murunyararo, vachiti vanokurudzira hurumende ye Zimbabwe kuti iremekedze mitemo yenyika uye kuti irege vanhu vachiungana murunyararo sekuda kwavo. Mukuru we Human Rights Watch kuchamhembe kwe Africa, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti pakagara paine komishini yakazvimiririra, zvingabatsira vanhu vazhinji sezvo komishini iyi ichizokwanisa kuferefeta zvinenge zvaitika uye ichibatsira vanhu kuendesa nyaya dzavo kumatare edzimhosva. No media source currently available

headline: Citizens Coalition for Change Inoti Haichineyi neZita reMDC
text:
Bato reCitizens Coalition for Change, kana kuti CCC, rinoti rava bato idzva rakazvimirira risineyi nechose chine chekuita nebato re MDC rakavambwa namuchakabvu VaMorgan Tsvangirai muna 1999.

Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weCCC, VaOstalss Siziba, vati mashoko
ekuti vabude mubato reMDC zviri pamutemo mashoko asina musoro sezvo
mutemo uri pachena kuti munhu anenge ave nhengo yerimwe bato anobva
atorega kuva nhengo yeMDC.

Izvi zvatsigirwawo nasachigaro weCCC mudunhu reMashonaland West,
VaRalph Magunje, avo vati nhengo dzavo dzakabuda mubato reMDC
nekusapinda mumisangano yebato iri kubva mugore ra2018, kusabhadhara mari yekuva nhengo kwemakore matatu uye kuve nhengo yerimwe bato sezvavakaita.

Asi mutauriri weMDC T, VaWitness Dube, vati vari kuyambira nhengo dzeCCC kuti dzibude mubato ravo zviri pamutemo kwete kuti vazoyeuka bako vanaiwa vave kuvadzinga zvakare muparamende nemumakanzura kana vakakunda.

VaDube vati bato ravo rine ruzivo rwakadzama pamusoro pezvinotaura
mutemo webato nokudaro nhengo dziri kuzviti ndedze CCC
dzisazochema mune ramangwana nekuda kwenharo dzadzo.

Nyaya yekuvhomorana pazvigaro yakatanga apo bato reMDC T rakadzinga
nhengo dzeMDC Alliance muparamende nemakanzura richiti inhengo dzaro dzakanga dzasiya gwara remusangano. No media source currently available

headline: Pazuva reKubatana, VaMnangagwa Vokurudzira Nhaurirano Vanopikisa Vachiti Pamuromo Chete
text: Zimbabwe nemusi weChitatu yakacherechedza makore makumi matatu nemana pasainwa chibvumirano cheUnity Accord icho chakabatanidza mapato akarwira nyika eZAPU neZANU muna 1987 mushure mekunge paita kusanzwisisana pakati pemapato aya izvo zvakaurayisa vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi maviri kubva muna 1983. Mumashoko avo ekupemberera zuva iri, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, varumbidza vakanyorerana chibvumirano ichi, vashakabvu Joshua Nkomo vaitungamirira PF ZAPU navaVaRobert Mugabe vaitungamirira ZANU-PF vachiti chibvumirano ichi chakunza runyararo nekugadzikana munyika. Vati Unity Accord yakaunza runyararo nekugadzikana munyika izvo zvave kuita kuti nyika ikwanise kuita budiriro nekusimudzira mararamire everuzhinji. VaMnangagwa vati chidzidzo chikuru chinobva pane zvakaitwa naVaNkomo naVaMugabe ndechekuti kupokana kwese kunogadziriswa chete nenhaurirano dzinoitwa murunyararo. Vati vakazvipira kuramba vachitaura nevanhu vari mumatunhu akaurawa vanhu panguva yeGukurahundi nechinangwa chekuona kuti marwadzo avo apodzwa. Vatiwo madzishe ari kutungamira basa iri pamwe nekuona kuti nzvimbo idzi dzasimudzirwawo sedzimwe nzvimbo munyika. Asi mutungamiriri weZAPU uye ari mwana wamushakabvu Joshua Nkomo, VaSibangilizwe Nkomo vati zuva ranhasi harisi rekupemberera asi kuchema vanhu vakaurawa panguva yeGukukurahundi. Pamashoko aVaMnangagwa ekuti vari kusangana nekutaura nevanhu vekuMatabeleland neMidlands, VaNkomo vati chakakosha kutanga kutaura neZAPU nekuti vanhu vakapondwa muzita rebato iri. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare VaAlick Gomo vati havachaoni kukosha lweNational Unity Day nekuda kwekuchema chema nekugunun’una kuri kuita vanhu vakawanda munyika. Mukuru weMedia Centre, VaEnerst Mudzengi vaudza Studio 7 kuti zuva iri rakakoshera kuZAPU neZANU asi vakati vanhu vanogonawo kudzidza kubva kune zvakaitwa naVaNkomo naVaMugabe. PF ZAPU ndiro raive bato guru raipikisa muna 1980 uye zvichitevera Unity Accord mapato aya akabava abatana kuva ZANU PF. Asi vamwe vaive nhengo dzeZAPU vasina kufara nezvaitika muZANU PF vakabuda vakadzokera kunoumba zvakare bato ravo reZAPU Zuva rakaisainwa Unity Accord musi wa22 Zvita 1987 rave zororo rinocherechedzwa gore rega rega musi uyu. Chibvumirano ichi chakanyoreranwa mushure mekunge hurumende yatumira mauto eFifth Brigade kuMidlands neMatabeleland ayo ari kupomerewa mhovsa dzekuponda. Vakawanda vakafa munguva iyi vachiri vakavigwa mumakuva akawanda kana kuti vari mumigodhi iri mumatunhu aya. No media source currently available

headline: Ko Vanhu Gumi neVanomwe Vabviswa Pazvirango neAmerica Ndivanani?
text: Kunyangwe hazvo America yakatemera zvirango vamwe vanhu vana nezuro kusanganisira mwana wemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, Emmerson Mnanngagwa Junior, pane vamwe vanhu kunyanya vaive muhurumende vakabviswa pazvirango. Vanhu ava vanoti Amai Flora Buka, VaIgnatious Morgan Chombo, VaNicholas Tasungunurwa Goche,naVaRugare Aleck Ngidi Gumbo. Vamwe vabviswa vanosanganisira VaJaison Machaya, VaReuben Marumahoko, VaHerbert Murerwa nemudzimai wavo Amai Ruth Chipo Murerwa, VaKenneth Keparadza Mutiwekuzivam VaDavid Chapfika, VaPhineas Chihota, mwana waVaPatrick Chinamasa, Gamuchirai Chinamasa, Amai Abigail Damasane, VaAndrew Langa, mupurisa VaLevy Sibanda, Amai Hellin Mushanyuri Gono, mudzimai waVaGideon Gono, uye VaChenhamo Chakezha Chimutengende.

headline: Zimbabwe Inovhota Ichiramba Kutambira Chisungo cheUN Chinorambidza Kupondwa kweMarudzi, Kuparwa kweMhosva dzeHondo neZvimwe
text:
Zimbabwe imwe yenyika gumi neshanu dzakavhota dzichipikisa kutambirwa kwechisungo cheUnited Nations General Assembly chinorambidza kupondwa kwevanhu, kuparwa kwemhosva dzehondo pamwe nerusarura pakati pemarudzi. Asi chisungo ichi chakabudirira zvichitevera kutambirwa kwachakaitwa nemusi weChipiri nenyika zana negumi neshanu dzinosanganisira vavakidzani veZimbabwe, South Africa neBotswana.

Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vari mukuru weMedia Center, VaEnerst Mudzengi, vati chisungo chakatambirwa neUnited Nations ichi chinopa nyika dziri musangano iri mukana wekuyamura zvizvarwa zvedzimwe nyika kana zvave kushungurudzwa nehurumende dzazvo.

Mudzidzisi mukuru pachikoro cheUnversity of Zimbabwe uye vari mukuru
weMass Public Opinion of Zimbabwe, Professor Eldred Masunungure, vati kuvhota kweZimbabwe kune chekuita nekusada kuferefetwa kwenyika munyaya dzemhirizhonga dzakaitika musarudzo dzakapfuura. Zimbabwe ine nhoroondo yemhirizhonga inozivikanwa pasi rose zvichitevera kupondwa kwakaitwa vanhu munguva yeGukurahundi kumatunhu eMatabeleland neMidlands, iyo yakasiya vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi maviri vafa. Pane mhirizhonga yakaitikawo muna 2000 apo bato idzva reMovement for Democratic Change, MDC, rakatyorerwa kodzero dzenhengo dzaro, dzimwe nhengo dzebato iri dzinoti Talent Mabika naMorgan Chiminya dzikaurayiwa mumhirizhonga yakaitika kuBuhera. Vakauraya vaviri ava vanozivikanwa asi havana kusungwa. Muna 2005 vanhu vakaputsirwa dzimba dzavo nehurumende izvo zvakasiya vanhu vanodarika mazana manomwe ezviuru vasina pekugara, uye vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nemazana mana ezviuru vakasara vavhiringwa neOperation Murambatsvina. Sangano reUnited Nations rakatumira nhumwa rayo, Amai Anna Tibaijuka, avo vakaburitsawo gwaro raishora zvainge zvaitwa nehurumende yeZimbabwe. Muna 2008 zviuru nezviuru zvenhengo dzeMDC zvakaparadzirwa dzimba, kutorera zvipfuyo pamwe nekufirwa nehama mumhirizhonga yakaitika musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika yakadzokororwa mushure mekunge mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vakunda vaive mutungamiri wenyika panguva iyi, muchakabvu Robert Mugabe, nemavhoti anonzi aive pasi pemavhoti anotarisirwa nemutemo kuitira kuti munhu anzi akunda sarudzo iyi zviri pamutemo. VaTsvangirai vakabuda musarudzo iyi vachiti havangarambe vari musarudzo yaiurayisa vatsigiri vavo. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo,
vati kuvhota kwakaita Zimbabwe muGeneral Assembly kunoburitsa pachena kuti vatungamiri vemunyika vanofarira kupondwa kwezvizvarwa zvemunyika.

Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika,
VaFredrick Shava, kana gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, sezvo mbozhanhare dzavo dzanga dzisingadavirwe. Asi mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaGeorge Charamba, vanyora
padandemutande ravo kuti kuvhota kweZimbabwe kuUnited Nations
kwakazembera panhoroondo yenyika, zvakadzidzwa nenyika
mukushamwaridzana kwayo nedzimwe nyika pamwe nemanzwisisiro anoita vatungamiri munyaya dzepasi rose. Asi vachangotora mhiko kuti vave nhengo yekomisheni yekuregererana, reZimbabwe Peace and Reconciliation Commission, VaObert Gutu, vati vanotambira danho reZimbabwe. Dzimwe nyika dzavhota dzichipesana nedanho iri dzinosanganisira
Russia, Cuba, Nicaragua, Burundi, North Korea, Egypt nedzimwe idzo
dzinonzi nevezvematongerwo enyika dziri pasi pehurumende dzinotonga
nechisimba. Gore rapera, Zimbabwe yakava nyika yoga yemuAfrica yakapikisa chisungo cheGeneral Assembly chekuomesera Myanmar nepamusana perusarura rudzi kwairi kuita munyika iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu PF Inokunda Freedom Pary kuMhondoro-Mubayira
text: Mumiririri weZEC musarudzo iyi, VaGodfrey Maisiri, vanoti VaGangarahwe vakakunda VaRodwell Nyanganya avo vaimiririra bato reFreedom Front. Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, inoti VaGeorge Gangarahwe vaimirira Zanu Pf musarudzo yakaitwa neMugovera kuMhondoro Mubayira ndivo vakakunda. Mumiririri weZEC musarudzo iyi, VaGodfrey Maisiri, vanoti VaGangarahwe vakakunda VaRodwell Nyanganya avo vaimiririra bato reFreedom Front. VaGangarahwe vakaita mavhoti zviuru gumi nezvitatu nemazana mapfumbamwe ane makumi matatu nezvina, ukuwo VaNyanganya vachiita mavhoti chiuru chimwe chete nemakumi mashanu nematanhatu. Vachiratidza mufaro mushure mekunzwa mashoko ekukunda kwavo, VaGangarahwe vakati havana kukunda VaNyanganya nebato ravo chete, asi vakunda mapato ose anopikisa munyika sezvo vainge vachikokera nhengo dzavo muchivande kuti dzivhotere VaNyanganya. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nasachigaro weZanu PF mudunhu reMashonaland West, VaEphaim Chengeta, avo vanoti kukunda kwebato ravo chiratidzo chekuti hapana bato rinopikisa richakunda Zanu PF mudunhu rose. VaGangarahwe vanoti vachaita zvirongwa zvebudiriro zvakawanda zvichayamura zvikuru sei vechidiki kuti vasashandiswe kuita zvakaipa. Amai Muzvare Getrude Rwizi vanobva munzvimbo yamambo Rwizi, vanoti vari kutarisira kuyamurwa kutanga maprojects akaita sekupfuya huku kuti dunhu ravo ribudirire. Asi mumwe mugari wekwaMubayira, VaPanashe Musunami, avo vanoti havana kuvhota, vanoti Zanu PF yaizvikwikwidza sezvo mapato makuru anopikisa vakaramba kukwikwidza. VaMusunami vanoti sarudzo yesvondo rapera haina shanduko yainounza mukurarama kwavo. VaNyanganya vainge vasipo apo paiziviswa zvainge zvabuda musarudzo uyezve bato ravo rainge riine vaongorori vashoma panzvimbo makumi mashanu nesere dzaivhoterwa muma wadhi mapfumbamwe. Sarudzo iyi yakaitwa mushure mekunge vaimbomiririra Mhondoro Mubayira, VaSylvester Nguni, vadzingwa mubato reZanu Pf vachipomerwa mhosva yekutsigira vaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru, avo vakadzingwawo mubato iri gore rapera. Nhengo dzebazi repamusoro rePolitburo mubato reZanu PF dzaimbeya mbeya muMhondoro Mubayira neMugovera dzinosanganisira mukokeri wemisangano, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro, Professor Jonathan Moyo, pamwe nemutungamiri wedare re Seneti, Amai Edna Madzongwe. No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai Vanoshora Mhirizhonga Yakaitika muBato Ravo reMDC-T
text: Mutungamiriri weMovement for Democratic Change, VaMorgan Tsvangirai vashoropodza mhirizhonga yakaitika kumahofisi ebato ravo kuBulawayo neSvondo uko kwakarohwa vamwe vatungamiri vebato iri. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare, VaTsvangirai vati zvinosuwisa kuti mafaro avo ekubatana nemamwe mapato anopikisa vachiumba MDC Alliance agurisirwa panzira nekuda kwemhirizhonga yakaitika iyi. VaTsvangirai vati havadi zvemhirizhonga mubato ravo, vakati kunyangwe zvazvo mapurisa ari kuferefeta nyaya iyi, ivo sebato vari kuitawo tsvagiridzo dzavo. Vati kana pane nhengo dzavo dzakakonzera mhirizhonga iyi dzicharangwa nebato ravo zvakaomarara. Vakarohwa kuBulawayo vanosanganisira mumwe wevatevedzeri vaVaTsvangirai, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe nasachigaro webato iri VaLovemore Moyo. Vatungamiri ava vaive vasipo pakaparurwa mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa neMugovera. Vachibvunzwa kuti vatungamiriri vebato reMDC vari kuwirirana here nezvemubatanidzwa, VaTsvangirai vati vakaita chibvumirano sebato chinosunga vatsigiri nehutungamiriri hwese. Mhirizhonga yakaitwa kubato reMDC T iyi yasvorwawo zvikuru nemasangano ano kurudzira runyararo munyika. Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Peace Project, Muzvare Jestina Mukoko vati havatarisire kuti kusawirirana mumapato ezvematongerwo enyika kugadziriswe nemhirizhonga kunyanya nyika yadongorera sarudzo dziri kutarisirwa kuitwa gore rinouya. Kunyangwe zvazvo VaTsvangirai vati bato ravo hari kurudziri mhirizhonga, Muzvare Mukoko vati matanho achatorwa nebato reMDC-T kune vakaita mhirizhonga ndiwo acharatidza kuti bato iri rakamira papi panyaya yemhirizhonga. MDC T yakabatana nemamwe mapato matanhatu nemugovera kuumba mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance, uyo uchakwikwidzana neZanu PF musarudzo dza 2018 uchi tungamirirwa naVatsvangirai. Mutungamiri weMDC-T uyu atiwo vanhu vakaita mhirizhonga iyi vanoda kusvibisa zita rebato pamwe nemubatanidzwa uyu asi vati izvi hazvisi kuzobudirira. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kugadzirisa Nyaya dzeKodzero dzeVanhu neMitemo yeSarudzo Isati Yadzorwa muCommonwealth
text: Apo chikwata cheCommonwealth changa chiri munyika kuzoona kuti Zimbabwe inokodzera here kudzorerwa mugungano iri chakapeta rwendo rwacho nemusi weChitatu, zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvine maonero akasiyanasiyana pamusoro pehurongwa uhu. Vamwe vari kuti chinhu chakanaka kuti Zimbabwe idzoserwe mugungano renyika makumi mashanu nenhanhatu, zhinji dzacho dziri dzaive pasi pehutungamiri hweBritain, asi vamwewo vachiti hurumende ichine zvakawanda zvainofanirwa kugadzirisa zvakaita senyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu. Kushanya kwechikwata ichi kwakasanganidzanawo nekupiwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso kwenhengo dzebato rinopikisa reCCC gumi neina dzakanga dzave kusvitsa mwedzi mishanu dziri muhusungwa mushure mekusungwa kuNyatsime dzichipomerwa mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga. Asi vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti chiitiko chekupiwa mukana kwevanopikisa ichi chakaitwa nehurumende kuti iratidze chikwata chaishanya ichi kuti munyika munoteverwa mitemo, asi vamwewo vachiti kumatare kune mitemo inoteverwa zvisineyi nezvematongerwo enyika. Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa rinopikisa rePeople’s Patriotic Party, VaZvaringeni Samuel Chasi, vanoti zvakanaka kuti Zimbabwe idzoserwe muCommonwealth, asi inofanirwa kupindawo zvakare mugungano reInternational Criminal Court, uye kugadziridza mabatiro ayo nyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu. VaChasi vanotiwo pamusoro pekodzero dzevanhu, hurumende inofanirwa zvakare kugadzirisa mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo, uye inofanirwa kuzotariswa zvakare nesangano iri mushure mesarudzo dzegore rinouya isati yadzoserwa mugungano reCommonwealth. Asi mutauriri weNational Constitutional Assembly, NCA, VaMadock Chivasa vanoti Zimbabwe inofanirwa kungodzoserwa mugungano iri pasina zviga kana zvirango zvainonzi itange yazadzisa. VaChivasa vanoti kana paine zvinonetsa munyika vana veZimbabwe ndivo vanofanirwa kugara pasi vozvigadzirisa, kwete kuti vekunze kana masangano ekunze vapindire. Chikwata cheCommonwealth ichi chakaita misangano nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, bato riri kutonga reZanu PF, mapato anopikisa anoti reCitizens’ Coalition for Change neMDC inotungamirirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora, nhengo dzePOLAD, pamwe nevemamwe masangano akazvimirira. Asi mamwe mapato ari kunyunyuta kuti haana kupiwa mukana wekusangana nechikwata ichi achipawo maonero awo panyaya iyi, vachiti vaidawo kupa mamiriro ezvinhu munyika, zvikuru munyaya dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Nhengo dzeMDC-T Dzorangarira Vamwe Vadzo Vakapondwa Muna 2008
text: Nhengo dzeMDC-T inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa pamwe nehutungamiri hwebato iri vanoti hurumende inofanira kuongorora nyaya yemhirizhonga yakaitika makore gumi adarika pamberi pesarudzo yechipiri yemutungamiri wenyika ye presidential runoff iyo yakasiya vanhu vakawanda vafa uye vamwe vasisina pokugara. Vatsigiri veMDC vakaita saVaEnoch Mkudu vanoti mhirizhonga yakaitika iyi ichizere mundangariro dzavo vachiti dai hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa ikaona kuti sarudzo dzemwedzi unouya dzaitwa pasina mhirizhonga yakadai iyo yavanoti ichiri kuvabata pamoyo. Imwe nhengo yeMDC, VaKudakwashe Matibiri, vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa iite hurongwa hwekusangana nevakapona neburi retsono pamhirizhonga iyi. Mutungamiri weboka reMDCT iri, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti bato ravo pamwe nevatsigiri vavo vachiri kushushikana nezvakaitika izvi. Mutauriri waVaChamisa, VaNkululeko Sibanda, vati VaChamisa vachagadzirisa nyaya iyi vachiti VaMnangagwa vazvitadza sezvo vaiva mumwe wevanhu vaiva muhurumende yakakonzera mhirizhonga iyi pasi pehutungamiri hwaVaRobert Mugabe avo vakazobviswa pachigaro nemauto gore rapera. Mumwe mufundisi wechechi yeApostolic Faith Mission, Mufundisi Rogers Conrad Tekwa, vanoti vedzisvondo vane basa rakakura kwazvo rekubatsirana nehurumende mukuedza kugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rinoona nezvinoitika mukati menyika, VaObert Mpofu, kuti tinzwe pamire hurumende panyaya iyi. Asi VaMpofu, avo vanove zvakare munyori anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mubato riri kutonga reZanu PF, vakati sebato pamwe nehurumende vakazvipira kuita sarudzo dzisina mhirizhonga rwendo rwuno. MDC inoti pane nhengo dzayo dzinodarika mazana maviri dzakapondwa pamberi pesarudzo yechipiri yemutungamiri wenyika yakaitwa muna Chikumi 2008. Vanhu vazhinzji vakapisirwa misha vamwe vakatiza kwavaigara vachinotsvaga hupoteri kune dzimwe nzvimbo. Mhirizhonga iyi yakakonzera kuti vaimbova mutungamiri weMDC, mushakabvu VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vabude mumakwikwi esarudzo iyi vachiti zvaisaita kuti vagozotonga makuva izvo zvakazopedzira kuti paumbwe hurumende yemubatanidzwa iyo yakapera muna 2013 pakaitwa dzimwe sarudzo dzinonzi neMDC dzakabirirwa zvemhando yepamusorosoro. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Inoshoropodza Gwaro Rakaburitswa neKomisheni yaVaMotlanthe
text: Bato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa rinoti gwaro rekomisheni yakadomwa kuongorora nezvemhirizhonga yakaitika musi wa 1 Nyamavhuvhu raburitswa kune veruzhinji nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, harina zvariri kubatsira nazvo nyika pari zvino kunze kwekuda kubata vanhu kumeso. Gwaro iri rakanyorwa nekomisheni yaitungamirirwa nevaive mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaKgalema Motlanthe, mushure mekunzwa humbowo kubva kuvanhu vakasiyanasiyana. Mutauriri webato iri, VaJacob Mafume, vanoti sebato vanoona sekunge gwaro iri ragara richida kuvharidzira kuurayiwa kwakaitwa vanhu nemauto. Vanotiwo chimwe chavashamisa ndechekuti gwaro iri riri kukurudzira kuti vakapfura nekuuraya vanhu vatsvagwe vamiswe pamberi pematare, asi riri iro basa raifanirwa kuitwa nekomisheni iyi rekuburitsa pachena vakauraya vanhu. VaMafume varambawo kuti bato ravo ndiro rakakonzeresa mhirizhonga iyi. No media source currently available Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu uye vari mukuru wesangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti vanoona sekunge komisheni yaVaMotlanthe iyi yakaedza kwazvo kuburitsa pachena kuti mauto akapfurikidza mwero pakushandisa chisimba mukupomhodza kuratidzira. Asi VaMavhinga vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuchiendesawo ongororo yakaitwa iyi mberi kuburikidza nekusunga vose vane chekuita nekupfurwa kwevanhu vorangwa zvakakodzera. No media source currently available

headline: VaSikhala Vanoti Mota dzePOLAD Kutenda Vatsigiri vaVaMnangagwa Vasina Zvido zveRuzhinji
text: Mutevedzeri wasachigaro webato reMDC Alliance VaJob Sikhala vanoti motokari dzakapihwa vatungamiri vemapato madiki anopikisa vari mugungano rePolitical Actors Dialogue kana kuti POLAD kutenda vavanoti vari kushandiswa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kudzorera hutongi hwejekerere kumashure. Asi mutauriri werimwe bato riri mugungano iri reNational Constitutional Assembly VaMaddock Chivasa vanoti hapana chakaipa kuti nhengo dzePOLAD dzipihwe dzimotokari dzekushandisa mukuunza kubatana munyika. Nyaya yekuti hurumende yakatengera vatungamiri vemapato anopikisa ari mugungano rePOLAD zvikakarara zvemotokari dzemhando yeIsuzu D-Max izvo zvipatara zvakawanda zvisina mishonga, madhorobha akawanda asina maamburenzi yakonzerawo mutauro munyika. MuHarare semuenzaniso munonzi amburenzi nhanhatu pachidiwa makumi matatu nembiri uye vanhu vanoda kusvika zvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana vachinzi vakatarisana nenzara inotyisa. Vari muPOLAD vanoti gungano iri rinobatsira asi vamwe vanopikisa vachiti riri kungopfukutawo mari yenyika uye harina meno. Bato guru rinopikisa reMDC Alliance harisi mumubatanidzwa uyu kunyangwe vamwe vakuru mubato reMDC-T rinotungamirirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora vari kuti vanenge vave mugungano iri mavhiki anotevera. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission Yofara neMamiriro Akaita Zvinhu Musarudzo
text: Sachigaro veZimbabwe Human Rights Commission, Doctor Elasto Mugwadi, vanoti komisheni yavo inofara nemamiriro akaita zvinhu mayererano nesarudzo dzichaitwa nemusi weMuvhuro. VaMugwadi vanoti kunyange hazvo pange pane zvichemo zvakasvitswa kukomisheni yavo, zvange zviri zvishoma uye vakagadzirisa zvichemo zvizhinji. Mamwe mapato anopikisa anotaura kuti haasikufara ne Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, kana kuti Zec, pamusoro pemabatiro airikuita gadziriro yesarudzo idzi. Izvi zvakakonzera kuti mamwe mapato nemasangano akazvimiririra aende kumatare edzimhosva kuti Zec imanikidzwe kuteerera zvichemo zvavo. “Ndingati zvinhu zvinenge zvakamira zvirinani kana tichienzanisa nemamwe makore apfuura aya,” VaMugwadi vaudza Studio7. “Kana tichitarira runyararo huripo uye tichitarira kodzero dzevanhu kuti vari kukwanisa here kuungana sezvavanoda uye vanokwanisa here kuita misangano yavo pavanodira uye vanokwanisa here kutaura zvavanoda vasina anovashungurudza. Izvi tiri kuona kuti zviri kuitika.” Svondo rapera, sangano revadzidzisi rakabudirira kumatare edzimhosva kwarakange raenda richimanikidza Zec kuti ibvumidze vadzidzisi kuvhota kunzvimbo dzavanenge vaendeswa neZec kunovhotesa vanhu. No media source currently available

headline: VaBiti Vorwira Kodzero dzeVakatongerwa Rufu
text: Gweta rine mukurumbira uye vachiita zvematongerwo enyika, VaTendai Biti, vanoti vave kubatana nevamwe vari kurwisa nyaya yekutongera vanhu rufu vachiti kuita izvi kunotyora kodzero dzevanhu. Bumbiro remitemo idzva harichabvumidze kuurayiwa kwevanhukadzi, uye varume vari pasi pemakore makumi maviri nerimwe, pamwe nevarume vari pamakore apfuura makore makumi manomwe. Zimbabwe yakagumisira kuuraya munhu mujeri muna 2005. Asi pachine vanhu vanoda kusvika kana kupfuura zana vakatongerwa rufu. Mukuru wesangano reAmnesty International kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDeprose Muchena, vanoti hurumende inofanira kubvisa mutemo wekutongera vanhu rufu zvachose nekuti kutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, varizve gurukota rinoona nezvemitemo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanoti naivowo vanoda kuti mutemo wekutongerwa vanhu rufu ubviswe. VaBiti vanoti bumbiro remitemo idzva rinochengetedza kodzero dzevakatongerwa rufu uye vazvipira kubatsira vasungwa ava. No media source currently available

headline: Vaive mukuru weZANLA VaBernard Manyadza Vanoti VaMugabe Havaremekedze Vakarwa Hondo
text: Murwi wehondo yerusununguko uye vaive muZANLA High command, VaBernard Manyadza vaizivikanwa nekuti Parker Chipoyera munguva yehondo vanoti musangano wemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nevakarwa hondo uri kuitwa musi wa 7 Kubvumbi hauna zvauchaburitsa nekuti kunetsana mubato reZanu-PF kwasvika padanho rakaipisisa. Mumwe murwi wehondo yerusununguko amai Margaret Dongo vakatoudza vakarwa hondo ava kuti vasaende kumusangano uyu kuri kuratidza kunyunyuta nemabatirwo avari kuitwa neseri kweruoko neZanu-PF. Musangano uyu wakanangana nekugadzirisa kunetsana pakati pevakarwa hondo nevamwe vari muchikwata chinonzi G4 chemuZanu-PF chiri kutsigirana naamai Grace Mugabe. Vakarwa hondo ava vanoti mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaPhelekezela Mphoko, gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro VaJonathan Moyo uye gurukota rezvematunhu VaSaviour Kasukuwere vanofanira kudzingwa mubato nekukonzera nyonga nyonga. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vatanhatu Vanosungwa Vachiratidzira muHarare
text: Kuratidzira uku kwatangira pamuzinda weMDC paHarvest House apo varatidziri ava vaimba vakatakura zvinyorwa zvakasiyana-siyana vachinanga kuparamende. Mapurisa anorwisana nemvongamupopoto asunga vanhu vatanhatu ndokubva avhiringidza kuratidzira kwaitwa nenhengo dzeMDC-T pamwe neTajamuka muHarare idzo dzanga dzichiti dzinoda kuti hurumende ibvise ma bond notes mumabhanga. Kuratidzira uku kwatangira pamuzinda weMDC paHarvest House apo varatidziri ava vaimba vakatakura zvinyorwa zvakasiyana-siyana vachinanga kuparamende. Vasati vatanga kuratidzira, mutungamiri weboka revechidiki muMDC-T, VaHappymore Chidziva, vaudza varatidziri ava kuti havasi kufara nema bond notes akaparurwa nebhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe neMuvhuro. VaChidziva vati sezvo hupfumi hwenyika hwaita madamburikiti mashatekuzhe mutariro wemadhende, VaMugabe vave kufanirakusiya matomhu voenda pamudyandigere. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemumwe wevaratidziri ava, VaHardlife Mudzingwa, avo vaudza Studio 7 kuti kuunzwa kwakaitwa mari iyi hakusi kubatsira kupedza dambudziko rekushayikwa kwemari mumabhanga. Varatidziri ava pavanga voda kusvika kuparamende vabva vagamuchirwa nemapurisa anorwisa mvongamupopoto ayo avadira mvura inovava nekuvakandira zvombo zvehutsi hunokachidza. Varatidziri ava vabva vaita hushamwari nemhepo vachiita aziva kwake aziva kwake vamwe vachitizira mumitsetse yevanhu vanga vachitsvaga mari mumabhanga pamwe nemuzvitoro. Mapurisa abva atanga kudeedzera kuti vanhu vabve mumitsetse iyi uye vezvitoro vabva vavharawo vakazovhura havo mushure memaawa akati kuti. Mapurisa azoswera oita hwekiti negonzo nevaratidziri avo vanga vave kuratidzira vari muzvikwata zvikwata munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana mudhorobha. Zvimwe zvitoro zvinonzi zvapwanywa nevaratidziri ava asi hatina kukwanisa kuziva kuti pane zvatorwa here muzvitoro izvi. Hurumende yakaparura ma bond notes neMuvhuro ichiti achashandiswa kupa mubayiro kune vanenge vatengesa zvinhu kunze kweyika. Asi ma bond notes aya ave kungowanikwa nemunhuwo zvake kubhanga. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti ma bond notes aya yatove mari chaiyo izvo zvaiwanzotaurwa nevari kushora ma bond notes aya avo vanoti hurumende iri kudzosa dhora remuZimbabwe nerweseri.

headline: Mapurisa Oyedza Kurambidza Hurongwe hweKuratidzira Huri kunzi "Munhu Wese muRoad"
text: Masangano akawanda munyika anoti achange achiratidzira nemusi weChishanu pasi pechirongwa chinonzi “Munhu wese muRoad”. Masangano ari kuratidzira anosanganisira #Tajamuka/Sesijikile, #This Flower, #This Flag, Occupy Africa Unity Square, Bulawayo Youth Arise, ZINASU nemamwe. Masangano aya anoti haasi kufara nenyaya kuda kuparurwa kwemari yemabond notes nehurumende uye nyaya yehuori hunonzi hwatekeshera nenyika zvikuru muhurumende. Asi mapurisa kuburikidza nemukuru muHarare, Officer Commanding Police Harare Central District Chief Superintendent JT Chizemo vari kuramba kupa mvumo masangano aya kuti aratidzire. Mapurisa anodzivirira mhirizhonga atozara muHarare uye neChishanu anonzi achafumobata jongwe muromo kunodzivirira kuti vanhu vasaratidzire. Mapurisa anonzi ari kuda kusungawo VaStern Zvorwadza ve#This Flower naDr Patson Dzamara veOccupy Africa Unity Square vachi vapomera mhosva yekuronga kuratidzira uku. Asi VaJason Zhuwawu vebato reZanu-PF vanotungamira Team ZANU-PF Live, iyo ino buritsa mashoko ezvinenge zvichiitwa nebato iri, vati vanhu vari kuratidzira havana kana pfungwa dzekuvaka uye vanofanira kutaurirana nehurumende kwete kuratidzira. Asi VaZvorwadza vanoti hurumende inhinhi, haidi kunzwa pfungwa dzevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: VaKasukuwere Vanobvisiswa Zviuru Zvitatu zveMadhora seChibatiso
text: Vaimbova gurukota rezvematunhu muhurumende yaVaRobert Mugabe, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, vabvisiswa zviuru zvitatu zvemadhora kuitira kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo. Izvi zvinotevera kumiswa pamberi pedare vachipomerwa mhosva ina dzekushandisa masimba avo zvisirizvo vachiri muhurumende. VaKasukuwere vari kupomerwa mhosva ina vachinzi vakapfurikidza mwero mukuita basa ravo pavaimbova gurukota rezvevechidiki pamwe nepavakazove gurukota rezvematunhu. Muchichisi wenyaya idzi, VaMichael Reza, vaudza dare kuti VaKasukuwere vakashandisa masimba avo zvisiri izvo pavaiva gurukota rezvechidiki pavanonzi vakapa basa kambani yeBrainworks kuti imire pakati pehurumende nemakambani anochera zvicherwa akaita seUnki Mine neZimplats munhaurirano dzekuti makambani aya atevedzere mutemo waimbovapo wekuendesa hupfumi kuvatema. VaReza vati VaKasukuwere vaifanira kupa kambani yeBrainworks kana imwewo kambani mushure mekunge nyaya yekupa basa iri yaendeswa kuti pasarudzwe kambani yaizoita basa kana kuti tender. Pane dzimwe nyaya nhatu dzavanonzi vakapara vari gurukota rezvematunhu, VaReza vati VaKasukuwere vakashandisa masimba mukupa Amai Junior Shuvai Gumbochuma, vanove mukoma wevaimbova mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, masitendi ekuvaka dzimba muHarare pamwe nekuMasvingo vasina kutevedzera nzira dzinoshandiswa mukupihwa kunoitwa masitendi. Kubva zvabviswa VaMugabe pachigaro muna Mbudzi gore rapera, kune makurukota akati kuti asungwa achimiswa pamberi pematare edzimhosva. Makurukota aya anosanganisira VaIgnatious Chombo, Va Samuel Udenge, VaJoseph Made, VaJason Machaya nevamwe. Vose makurukota aya vanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vaitsigira chikwata cheGeneration 40, icho chairwisana neTeam Lacoste, iyo inonzi inotsigira VaMnangagwa. Nyaya isati yatanga kuzeyewa, vakafanobata chigaro chemuchuchisi mukuru wenyika, VaKumbirai Hodzi, avo vanga vachishanyira matare vachiona mamiriro akaita zvinhu mumatare, vaudza mutongi wedare kuti nyaya dzehuori sedziri kupomerwa VaKasukuwere dzinofanira kunzwikwa nekukasika uye kuti dzibatwe neruoko rwakasimba kuti veruzhinji vaone kuti hurumende yakazvipira kurwisana nehuori. Mune imwewo nyaya yaitika pamatare, mamejasitiriti matsva makumi matanhatu atoreswa mhiko dzekuva mamejasitiriti pamberi pemukuru wemamejasititi munyika, VaMishrod Guvamombe. Izvi zvauyawo panguva iyo dzimwe nyaya dzanga dzichinonoka kufambiswa mumatare nepamusana pekushomeka kwemamejasitiriti zvikuru sei mumadhorobha madiki. No media source currently available

headline: Dare reDzimhosva Rinobvisisa Muzvare Mahere, Tsitsi Dangarembga neVamwe Mari yeChibatiso
text: Mutauriri weMDC Alliance, Muzvare Fadzai Mahere, munyori wemabhuku ane mukurumbira pasi rose, Tsitsi Dangarembga, nevamwe negumi nemumwe chete vakasungwa neChishanu, vaburitswa muhusungwa zvichitevera kubhadhariswa kwavaitwa mari yechibatiso inoita zviuru zvishanu zvemadhora emaRTGS. Vasungwa ava vamiswa pamberi pedare mushure mekurara vari muchitokisi vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora mirawu ye Covid-19 Regulations pamwe nekukurudzira zvemhirizhonga. Vasungwa ava vanzi nedare vadzoke kudare musi wa18 Gunyana. Muchichisi wenyaya idzi, VaMichael Reza, vaudza dare kuti vasungwa ava vakaratidzira zviri kunze kwemutemo vachiisa hupenyu hweveruzhinji panjodzi uye vakakurudzira mhirizhonga nekuratidzira kwavakaita. Kunyange hazvo magweta ari kumirira vanhu ava ati ane zvichemo, magweta aya ati achataura zvichemo izvi mudare pachadzoka nyaya iyi kudare. Hurumende haina kupikisa chikumbiro chekuti vasungwa ava vapihwe mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso zvaita kuti mutongi wedare, VaNgoni Nduna, vati vasungwa vese ava vabhadhare madhora zviuru zvishanu pamunhu semari yechibatiso. Zvaturwa nedare zvatsinhirwa nerimwe remagweta evasungwa ava, VaPaidamoyo Saurombe. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, vashora hurumende nekusunga kwayakaita vanhu ava. VaBiti vakurudzira sangano remubatanidzwa wenyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica, reSADC, pamwe nemutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, kuti vashandise chigaro chavo sasachigaro weAfrican Union kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa muZimbabwe vachiti veruzhinji munyika vave kugara muhutapwa. Mumwe wevanhu vanga vari muhusungwa, VaLoveridge Chinzvende, vabhadhariswa zviuru zvishanu zvemadhora kuitira kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo. Vamwe vevanhu vamiswa mudare vanosanganisira Simon Drury, Tinashe Murapatsa, Nyasha Musendu, Josse Lots, Jessica Drury naTinotenda Muswe. Sangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights rinoti vanhu vanodarika makumi matanhatu vasungwa kusvika pari zvino, vachisungirwa nyaya yekuratifdzira kwanezuro, uye vanhu gumi nevatanhatu vakakuvara uye vanoda kurapwa. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rinoona nezvinoitika mukati menyika, VaKazembe Kazembe ,kuti tinzwe pamire hurumende pane zvataurwa neMDC Alliance izvi. Asi VaKazembe vakaudza vatori venhau svondo rino kuti hurumende haisi kuzopeta maoko ichisiya vemapato anopikisa vachikonzeresa kusagadzikana munyika kubudikidza nekuratidzira kwavakati hakusi pamutemo uye kwavakati kwaizopinza veruzhinji panjodzi sezvo chirwere cheCovid19 chiri kuuraya vanhu munyika. Zvichakadai, mapurisa nemasoja nhasi vaswera vachirambidza zvakare veruzhinji kupinda mudhorobha sezvakaitika nezuro pakange pashevedzerwa neveboka reJuly 31st Movement kuti veruzhinji varatidzire vachiti havasi kufara nehuori hwavanoti hwatekeshera munyika. Mapurisa nemasoja vawedzerawo kuvhara migwagwa yose inopinda mudhorobha zvaita kuti vanhu vashomanana vakwanisa kupinda mudhorobha, zvivatorere nguva yakareba kupinda mudhorobha. Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti mauto anofanirwa kunge ari mamakamba awo, asi nepamusana pekuti munyika maita dambudziko reCovid-19, mauto aya ari kubatsira kuona kuti vanhu havasi kutyora mitemo yeCovid-19 Regulations. No media source currently available

headline: Nhengo dzeMDC-T Dzobatwa neMhosva yeKuponda Mupurisa
text: Nhengo nhatu dzeMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai nemusi weChipiri dzakabatwa nemhosva yekuponda mupurisa mumusha weGlenView muHarare muna 2011. Vachitura mutongo wavo panyaya iyi, mutongi wedare repamusoro, VaChinembiri Bhunu, vawana vanhu vatatu vaine mhosva yekuponda VaMutedza. VaBhunu vati kunyangwe hazvo zvisina kubuda pachena kuti ngana ndiye akapotsera dombo rakatema VaMutedza zvakazokonzera kuti VaMutedza vafe zviri pachena kuti vatsigiri veMDCT ava vaiva nechinangwa nechekuponda sezvo mumwe mufakazi akapa humbowo pakutongwa kwenyaya iyi akati akanzwa mumwe munhu achidaidzira kuti mapurisa arohwe sezvo achidyidzana nebato riri kutonga reZanu PF. Vabatwa nemhosva yekuponda ava ndiVaLast Maengehama avo vaimbova nhengo yekomiti yepamusoro muMDCT, VaTungamirai Madzokere vanove kanzura mukanzuru yeHarare pamwe naMuzvare Yvonne Musarurwa vanove nhengo yeboka revechidiki muMDC-T. VaPhineas Nhatarikwa, avo vanoshanda semutyairi muMDC-T, vabatwa nemhosva yekubatsira Muzvare Musarurwa naVaMadzokere kubva panzvimbo yakaparirwa mhosva iyi mushure mekuvatakura nemotokari pakaitika kurwisana pakati pemapurisa nevechidiki ve MDCT. Vamwe vatatu vanoti VaEdwin Muingiri, VaLazarus Maengehama naVaPaul Rukanda vasunungurwa sezvo zvanzi nedare hapana humbowo hunoratidza kuti vaivepo pakapondwa VaMutedza. VaRukanda vaudza Studio 7 kuti havasi kufara nemutongo waturwa nedare sezvo zviri pachena kuti pari kuitwa zvematongerwo enyika. Pakatanga nyaya iyi, paive nevasungwa makumi maviri nevapfumbamwe asi vamwe makumi maviri nevaviri vakawanikwa vasinawo mhosva pakanzwikwa nyaya iyi. Vanhu ava vaisanganisira VaPaul Madzore avo vaimbove sachigaro kuboka revechidiki muMDCT vasati vabuda mubato iri. Pakutongwa kwenyaya iyi, nhengo dzeMDC-T idzo dzairamba mhosva iyi dzichiti dzaishungurudzwa zvine chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika. Gweta revasungwa ava Amai Beatrice Mtetwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanhu ava vachadzoka kudare nemusi weChina kuti patange kuzeyiwa chirango chavo. Vati kusvika izvi zvaitwa havana zvakawanda zvavakataura nevatori venhau.  No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa Vanoti VaMnangagwa Vakundikana Kugadzira Nyaya Dzekupambwa kweVanhu muNyika
text: Mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC Alliance VaNelson Chamisa vanoti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa havasi kuratidza hutungamiri panyaya iri kupomerwa mapurisa nevasori yekuva nechekuita nekupambwa kwenhengo dzevechidiki nhatu dzebato ravo vachidzokorora kuti zvave kuda kuti United Nations ipindire. Vati vakatonyorera tsamba kuUnited Nations kuti munyika mapindwa naPongwe nekudaro inofanira kuongorora nyaya dzekupambwa kwevanhu. VaChamisa vati VaMnangagwa vawana mikana miviri yekutaura nenyika nezuro kumarinda eHeroes Acre uye neMugovera panyaya yelockdown asi havana kana kutaura nezvekupambwa nekushungurudzwa kwenhengo yeparamende inomiririra Harare West mudare reparamende Muzvare Joanna Mamombe, nemutevedzeri wasachigaro weMDC Youth Assembly Muzvare Cecilia Chimbiri uye mutevedzeri wemurongi wemabasa musangano revechidiki iri, Muzvare Netsai Marova. Vatatu ava vanonzi vakapambwa kuWarren Park vakazowanikwa kuBindura. Gurukota rezvemukati menyika VaKazembe Kazembe vanoti vakakumbira mukuru wemapurisa VaGodwin Matanga kuti vaongorore nyaya iyi. Vanotiwo vanhu vanofanira kumirira ongororo iyi kwete kutaura zvisina humbowo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri Asi VaChamisa vanoti havana chivimbo nezviri kuitwa izvi. No media source currently available

headline: Dare Rinorasa Mhosva Yanga Ichipomerwa Chin'ono
text: Dare repamusoro nhasi rarasa mhosva yanga ichipomerwa mutori wenhau, Hopewell Chin’ono, yekuburitsa mashoko emanyepo richiti mutemo wakashandiswa kusunga Chin’ono wakabviswa kare mumabhuku emitemo yenyika. Mutongi wedare repamusoro, Justice Jester Charewa, varasa mutongo wakaitwa nedare repasi wekuti Chin’ono ane nyaya uye anofanira kutongwa. Gweta raChin’ono, VaHarrison Nkomo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti Justice Charewa varasa mutongo wedare ramajisitiriti panyaya iyi vachiti mutemo wakashandiswa pana Chin’ono hausisiri mutemo munyika ino. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naChin’ono kuti tinzwe kuti ari kunzwa sei nemutongo wapihwa nedare. Asi VaNkomo vati Chin’ono afara chose nemutongo uyu ati zvese zvakaitika zvingadai zvisina kuitika dai mapurisa nevachuchusi vakange vamuterera paaitaura kuti mutemo wavaishandisa wainge waraswa nedare repamusorosoro kare. VaNkomo vati vachagara pasi naChin’ono kuti otora matanho apo zvichitevera mutongo waJustice Charewa. Vatiwo vari kuda kuti Chin’ono atange apihwa mari yechibatiso yaakabvisa panyaya iyi sezvo yaraswa nedare. Chin’ono akasungwa musi wa 8 Ndira achipomerwa mhosva yekutyora chikamu chemutemo weCriminal Law (Codification and Reform) Act mushure mekunyora padandemutande rake reTwitter kuti pane mwana mudiki ainge afa mushure mekurohwa nemapurisa. Akagara jeri reChikurubi mushure mekunyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso nedare ramajisitiriti uye akozipihwa mukana webhabhadhara mari yechibatiso musi wa 27 Ndira. Chin’ono akabvisa zviuru makumi maviri zvemadhora emaRTGS semari yechibatiso zvihitevera kusungwa kwaakaitwa muna Ndira. Asi achinyora paTwitter yake, Chin’ono ati ari kuda kusungisa hurumende nekumusunga kwayakaita, pamwe nekumuchengetedza uye nehutsinye hwayakaratidza paive muhusungwa iye asina mhosva yaakapara. Mutauriri weMDC Alliance, Fadzayi Mahere pamwe nemuriri weZengesa West, VaJob Sikhala, vari kupomerwawo mhosva yakafanana neyanga ichipomerwa Chino’ono. Mune imwewo nyaya, mukuru wevechidiki muMDC Alliance, Obey Sithole, avo vakasungwa nemusi Muvhuro vachipomerwa mhosva yekuita zvinhu zvinonyangadza kana kuti Criminal Nuisance amiswa pamberi pedare nhasi. Gweta rake, VaObey Shava, vakumbira dare kuti musungwa atongwe achibva kumba asi mutongi wedare, VaRichard Mangosi, vati vaudza VaShava kuti vachapa mutongo wavo pachikumbiro ichi mangwana. Mune imwewo nyaya mumiriri weHarare West muNational Assembly, Muzvare Joana Mamombe, nemumwe wavo Muzvare Cecilia Chimbiri, vasvitsawo chikumbiro chekuti vapihwe mukana wekutongwa vachibva kudzimba dzavo mushure mekubhadhariswa mari yechibatiso. Aka ndekechina vaviri ava vachikumbira kuti vabviswe kuChikurubi Maximum Prison kwavakachengetedzwa. Mutongi wedare, VaTawanda Chitapi, vaudza gweta revaviri ava, VaAlec Muchadehama, kuti vachapa mutongo wavo pachikumbiro chaMuzvare Mamombe naMuzvare Chimbiri nemusi weChishanu. No media source currently available

headline: MDC-T neMDC Alliance Dzoramba Dzichitatsurana
text: Munyori mukuru weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vanoti bato rakadzinga munhu muparamende ndiro rine masimba ekudoma munhu anotsiva akadzingwa wacho pakatariswa mitemo yeProportional Representation pamwe nemadomerwo enhengo dzedare reSenate.  Mashoko aVaMwonzora anotevera mashoko emunyori mukuru weMDC Alliance, VaChalton Hwende, avo vazivisa Studio7 kuti bato ravo raunganidza magwaro enyunyuto, ayo akasainwa nevanhu vanodarika mazana matatu ezviuru, vachiratidza kusafara kwavo nekudomwa kwemazita evanhu vachatora zvigaro zvemu National Assembly pamwe nemudare reSenate, kwakaitwa neMDC-T. Izvi zvinotevera kudzingwa kwakaitwa nhengo dzeMDC Alliance mumatare aya, neMDC-T. VaMwonzora vanoti pamutemo MDC Alliance harisi bato asi kuti mubatanidzwa wemapato manomwe akasainirana chibvumirano chekukwikwidza pamwe chete, asi mapato aya achiramba akazvimirira. Asi VaHwende, avo vanove mumwe wenhengo dzeMDC Alliance dzakatanga kudzingwa mudare neMDC-T iri kufanotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe, vanoti zviri pachena kuti vanhu vakaburitsa zvido zvavo nekusaina magwaro enyunyuto dzavo ayo vakaendesa kumahofisi eZimbabwe Electoral Commission munyika yose.  VaHwende vanoti hazviite kuti vanhu vamirirwe nemunhu akakundwa musarudzo sezviri kuda kuitwa neMDC-T. Asi VaMwonzora vanoti mutemo uri pachena pakuti nderipi bato rine vanhu vari muparamende, nokudaro zviri kuitwa nevamwe vavo ava hakuna kwazvinosvika. VaMwonzora vatiwo bvato ravo rakaita musangano neChishanu wekuzeya zvakabuda musarudzo yameya weHarare. Vati magweta avo ari kuzeya nyaya iyi sezvo paine chibvumirano cheMDC Alliance chekuti bato rePeople's Democratic Party rine chinzvimbo chemutevedzeri wameya, kwete kuti munhu akabva kubato iri aitwe meya sekusarudzwa kwakaitwa VaMafume. VaMafume vakabva kuPeople's Democratic Party vachipinda muchibvumirano cheMDC Alliance. Asi VaMwonzora vabvuma kuti havakwanisi kudzinga VaMafume sameya sezvo vasiri nhengo yakabva kuMDC-T ichipinda muchibvumirano cheMDC Alliance icho chakaumbwa mutungamiri wekutanga weMDC, VaMorgan Richard Tsvangirai, vasati vashaya. Asi vati magweta avo ari kuzeya nyaya iyi vakatarisa zvinoreva chibvumirano cheMDC Alliance vozotora matanho anokodzera. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi raVaMafume panyaya iyi. Asi muhurukuro yavakaita neStudio7 nemusi weChishanu, VaMafume vakati kusarudzwa kwavakaitwa kuva meya mecherechedzo mukuru wekuti nderipi bato rine vanhu pakati peMDC Alliance inotungamirwa naVaNeslon Chamisa, neMDC-T iri kufanotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe. No media source currently available

headline: Nyaya yeZvirango Yotsviriridza muZimbabwe
text: Vanhu vakawanda munyika vanoti vane maonero akasiyana siyana pazvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru vakuru muZimbabwe nenyika dzekumavirira dzichiti vanhu ava vari kuita zvehuori pamwe nekutyora kodzero dzevanhu muZimbabwe. Mumwe wevanoti zvirango zvehupfumi izvi ngazvibviswe zvachose, ndiVa Calvern Chitsunge, nhengo yeBroad Alliance Against Sanctions. Nhengo dzeBroad Alliance Against Sanctions dzakatanga kuratidzira pamuzinda weAmerica muna Kurume 2019, uye dzinoti dzicharamba dziripo kusvika zvirango zvabviswa. VaChitsunge vanoti zvirango izvi zviri kukanganisa hupenyu hwevana veZimbabwe. VaChitsunge vanotiwo hurumende iri kuremekedza kodzero dzeveruzhinji pamwe kugadzirisa mitemo yaikanganisa kuzadzikiswa kwekodzero dzevanhu nekudaro hapana chikonzero chekuti zvirango izvi zvirambe zviripo. Mutungamiri webato reLabour, Economists and African Democrats, Muzvare Linda Masarira, vanotiwo zvirango zvakaiswa izvi zviri kukuvadza hupfumi hwenyika nekudaro zvinofanirwa kubviswa. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vanotiwo zvirango zvehupfumi zvine chinangwa chekungobvisa hurumende yeZanuPF pachigaro. VaMugwadi vanoti hurumende yeZanuPF inoremekedza kodzero. Asi munyori anoona nezvevanogara kunze kwenyika muMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo , vanoti avo varipazvirango izvi vanofanirwa kutanga vazvichenesa kuti zvirango zvibviswe. Mumwe murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, VaPride Mkono,vanoti zvirango zvinofanirwa kuramba zviripo kudzamara vanhu vakatemerwa zvirango izvi vagadzirisa nyaya yekuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu muZimbabwe. Izvi zvatsigirwawo nemurwiri wekodzero dzevanhu uye vari mukuru wesangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, avo vanoti vari pazvirango vanoziva zvavanofanirwa kuita kuitira kuti zvirango izvi zvibviswe. Nyaya yezvirango iri kusimudza musoro wayo panguva iyo nhumwa yeUnited Nations, Amai Alena Douhan, vari munyika vachinzwa pamusoro pekodzero dzevanhu pamwe nezvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru vakuru muhurumende nemuZanu PF pamwe nemakambani avanodyidzana nawo. Zvirango izvi zvakatanga muna 2002 apo nyika dzemuEuropean Union dzakabuda nezvisungo zvekusadyidzana munyaya dzehupfumi nevanhu nemakambani ari pazvirango. Vaive mutungamiri weAmerica, VaGeorge W Bush, vakasaina mutemo we Executive Order muna Kurume 2003 waitemera zvirango zvehupfumi pamwe nekurambidzwa kushanyira America kwevanhu vari pazvirango izvi. Nyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica kana kuti SADC dzine hurongwa hwekuratidzira musi wa 25 Gumiguru dzichikuridzira kuti zvirango izvi zvibviswe dzichiti zviri kuvhiringa hupfumi hweZimbabwe. Asi America, iyo inoongorora zvirango izvi gore rega rega, inoti zvirango izvi zvicharamba zviripo pavanhu vanoita zvehuori pamwe nekutyora kodzero dzevanhu muZimbabwe. Vari pazvirango zveAmerica vanhu vanodarika makumi masere, uye vanosanganisira mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, gurukota revasori, VaOwen Ncube, mukuru wemapurisa, VaGodwin Matanga nemamwe makurukota pamwe nevakuru vamwe vakuru muZanu PF. No media source currently available

headline: Vatsigiri veMDC Alliance Vorwiswa neVanofungidzirwa Kuti VaTsigiri veZanu-PF paMusangano Wavo
text: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa neMuvhuro vakaita misangano nevatsigiri vavo kuCaledonia neMabvuku kwavakati makanzura ebato ravo achaita huori kana vapinda panyanga vachadzingwa pamwe nekutorerwa matanho akaomarara. Pakamboita mhirizhonga pakati pevechidiki vebato ravo nevechidiki veZanu PF vaChamisa vasati vasvika kuCaledonia. Mhirizhonga inonzi yakaitika panzvimbo yemabhizimusi paGazebo kuCaledonia apo vechidiki veZanu PF vanonzi vakanda matombo panga pakaungana vatsigiri veMDC Alliance vakamirira VaChamisa. Imwe nhengo yeboka revechidiki muMDCT inotungamirwa naVaChamisa, VaDennis Muroyiwa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vechidiki veZanu PF vanga vaine chitsama vapotedzera matombo zvaita kuti vatsigiri veMDC vaviri vakuvare. VaMuroyiwa vati vakuvara ava vakaendeswa kuchipatara. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nasachigaro weboka revechidiki muZanu PF, VaGodfrey Gomwe, kuti tinzwe pamire bato ravo panyaya iyi. Mhirizhonga yaitika iyi inouya panguva iyo mutungamiri weZanu PF uye vari mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachigara vakataura kuti vanoda sarudzo dziri pachena uye dzisina mhirizhonga. Pavakasvika kuCaledonia, VaChamisa vatsoropodza nyaya yemhirizhonga vachiti mawoko avo akachena panyaya yemhirizhonga. Vachitaurawo pane mumwe musangano wakaitirwa kuMabvuku, VaChamisa vati makanzura ese ebato ravo achaita huori kana vachinge vapinda panyanga varangwa zvakaomarara vachiti mameya anofanira kunge aine masimba. VaChamisa vakakurudzirawo kuti vatsigiri vebato ravo vavhotere VaJames Chidhakwa pasarudzo dzeparamende vachiti nhengo yeparamende inomirira Mabvuku parizvino, VaJames Maridadi, havana rutsigiro rwebato ravo sezvo vachiti vakaendesa mapepa ekukwikwidza kuZEC zvemusoro wavo mushure mekunge vakundwa naVaChidhakwa musarudzo dzema primary dzebato ravo. No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa Voshuvira Zimbabwe Zuva Rakanaka Ichicherechedza Kusvitsa Makore Makumi Mana Ichizvitonga
text: Mutungamiri weMDC, Va Nelson Chamisa, vatumira mashoko avo kuruzhinji rwevanhu vemuZimbabwe vachivakorokotedza pakusvika kwaita Zimbabwe makore makumi mana yawana kuzvitonga. VaChamisa vati vari kuziva kushupika kuri kuita veruzhinji munyika panguva iyo nyika yakatarisana nedambudziko rechirwere Coronavirus, uye vachimanikidzwa kugara mudzimba senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi, icho chabata vanhu makumi maviri nevana muZimbabwe, uye kuuraya vanhu vatatu. Chirwere ichi chabata vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nemazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe ezviuru, uye kuuraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi mashanu nezvinomwe. VaChamisa vati zvakakosha kuti nyika itarise kwayakabva, uye zvakaitika mumakore makumi mana apfuura, senzira yekuvaka hwaro hweremangwana renyika. Vati mumakore apfuura aya, pane zvakawanda zvakaitwa munyaya dzekugadzirisa zvaikanganiswa.
