Asi vati zvinhu zvinosuwisa kuti nyika yakaona kupondwa kwevanhu vanodarika makumi maviri ezviuru kumatunhu e Matabeleland ne Midlands, munguva yeGukurahundi. VaChamisa vatiwo vanhu vakawanda vakatyorerwa kodzero dzavo munguva yeMurambatsvina, uye musarudzo dzakaitwa muna 2008, idzo dzakaona ropa revanhu vakawanda richideurwa. VaChamisa varatidzawo kushushikana nehuori hwavati huri kuitika munyika, uhwo vati huri kuparadza hupfumi hwenyika. VaChamisa vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti muZimbabwe muve nepfungwa yakanangana nekusimudzira hupenyu hwemunhu wese, muve nesarudzo dzinoitwa zvisina kupikisana mukati. VaChamisa vatora mukana uyu kuenzanisa kukosha kwemakore makumi mana nezviri mubhaibheri zvinobata makore mana akaitika akaratidza kusimuka kwevana veIsrael mushure mekushupika kwemakore akawanda vari kunze kwenzvimbo yavo yechipikirwa kwemakore makumi mana. Bhaibheri rinoratidza kuti chinangwa chaMwari chaive chekuti vana veIsrael vatore nyika yavo yavakanga vavimbiswa mukati memazuva, asi izvi zvinonzi zvakazotora makore makumi mana kuti zviitike. Mutungamiri veMDC vatiwo zvisineyi nematambudziko akatarisina neveruzhinji panguva ino, vanoshuvira zororo rakanaka renyika vanhu vachicherechedza kusvika kwavaita makore makumi mana nyika yawana kuzvitonga muna 1980. No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa Vanosvitsa Mapepa Avo kuConstitutional Court
text: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vasvitsa mapepa avo kudare redzimhosva vachida kuti zvakabuda musarudzo dzakaitwa musi wa30 Chikunguru zvisendekwe parutivi. Magweta aVaChamisa vaita chipatapata kuti vabate nguva yekusvitsa mapepa kudare repamusoro-soro reConstitional Court sezvo Chishanu ranga riri zuva rekupedzisira kuti vapikise zvakabuda musarudzo pasi pemitemo inobata sarudzo.. Rimwe remagweta aVaChamisa, VaThabani Mpofu, vati chasara yave nyaya yekuti vatongi vachinzwa nyaya iyi. VaMpofu vati vasvitsa humbowo hwakati tsvikiti kudare hunoratidza kuti sarudzo idzi dzakabirirwa. Vati chikuru pahumbowo hwavanahwo ndechekuti zvakaziviswa nekomisheni inoona nezvesarudzo zvakasiyana nezviri pamapepa akasainwa nevaimirira mapato panzvimbo dzaivhoterwa kana kuti ma V11 forms. Vatiwo vari kutyisidzirwa zvikuru nekumirira kwavari kuita VaChamisa panyaya iyi asi vati havasi kuzodzokera kumashure. Mapepa asvitswa kudare aya asvitswawo kune vese vakakwikwidza musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, sachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, pamwe nemukuru anoona nezvesarudzo muZec, VaUtoile Silaigwana, kuti vapindure kudare. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMnangagwa kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi . Asi neChina VaMnangagwa vakati havazoenderera mberi nehurongwa hwekugadzwa kwavo kudzamara nyaya yapera kunzwikwa nematare sezvataurwawo naVaMpofu kuti kugadzwa kwanga kuchida kuitwa naVaMnangagwa kwave kufanira kutomiswa. Mumiriri waVaMnangagwa, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, uye vari gurukota rezvemitemo, vazivisa kuti hurongwa hwekugadza VaMnangagwa semutungamiri wenyika hwanga huchida kuitwa neSvondo, hwambomiswa zvichitevera danho ratorwa naVaChamisa. Dare rine mazuva gumi nemana ekuti ringe rabuda nemutongo waro panyaya iyi. Dare iri rinogona kuti zvikaburitswa neZec ndizvo zviri pamutemo, kanawo kubuda nemutongo wekuti VaChamisa ndivo vakakunda musarudzo kana richinge ragutsikana nehumbowo, kanawo kuti sarudzo iyi idzokororwe. Zvarinotura hazvipikiswe, uye warinenge rati ndiye akakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika ndiye anobva agadzwa mukati memaawa makumi mana nemasere. VaChamisa vanoti ndivo vakakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika kunyange hazvo Zec yakazivisa kuti VaMnangagwa ndivo vakakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Pasi Rose Rinocherechedza Zuva reHutongo hweJekerere, reInternational Democracy Day
text: Zimbabwe neSvondo yakabatana nepasi rose mukucherechedza zuva rehutongo hwejekerere, kana kuti International Day of Democracy. Dingindira regore rino rakanga rakanangana nekuyeuchidza dzihurumende kuti hutongo hwejekere hwakanangana nevanhu. Zimbabwe, sedzimwe nyika dzakawanda mupasi rose, inotarisiswawo mabatiro ainoita kodzero dzevanhu, uye kuti iri kutevera zvakadii hutongo hwejekerere. Dzimwe nyika, zvikuru dzekumawirira, pamwe nezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe, vanopomera hurumende yeZimbabwe mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Izvi zvinonzi ndizvo zvakazosvitsa kuti vamwe vakuru muhurumende yevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe, kusanganisira naivo VaMugabe, vatemerwe zvirango. Vamwe vanotiwo hapana shanduko yati yavepo pasi pehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa, iyo iri kupomerwawo mhosva yekutowedzera kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu ichishandisa mapurisa nemauto. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Human Rights Association, VaOkay Machisa, vanoti kunyange hazvo vaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakabatsira mukusunungura Zimbabwe, matongero avakanga vozoita mumashure akanga afanana nekuti vakanosungirira zvakare nyika pavakanga vasunungura. Vanoti hutongo hwejekerere hunoonekwa nemafambisirwo anenge achiitwa sarudzo munyika, pachitariswa kuti vanhu vari kuvhota murunyararo here, uye kuti zvabuda musarudzo zviri kutambirwa zvakadii. VaMachisa vanoti kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe ichiita sarudzo, zvinozobuda musarudzo idzi zvinowanzopikiswa nemamwe mapato anenge apinda musarudzo idzi, izvo zvinozoita kuti paonekwe sekunge hutongo hwejekerere husiri kuteverwa. Vanotiwo nyaya dzekupambwa kwevanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vanopikisa nehurumende dzeimwe nyaya inosvibisa hurumende panyaya yehutongo hwejekerere. No media source currently available

headline: Mauto Anoti Agadzirira Kudzokera kuMakamba Avo Sezvo Apedza Basa
text: Mumwe mukuru wemauto Major-General Douglas Nyikayaramba vanoti mauto akwanisa kuunza runyararo mushure mekuratidzira kune mhirizhonga mukati nekudaro vagadzirira kudzokera kumakamba avo kana mapurisa ati haachadi rubatsiro. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare nezuro, VaNyikayaramba vakati mauto achaita ongororo yezvavari kupomerwa zvekutyora kodzero dzevanhu asi vakati pane vanhu vakaba pfuti nehembe dzemauto vakanobata madzimai chibharo nekupfura vanhu. Nyaya yekuti mauto ari kushungurudza vanhu iyi imwe nyaya yakapa kuti bato guru rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa rirambe kuita hurukuro nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nezuro. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemutauriri weNPF VaJealousy Mawarire vanoti hakuna nhaurirano dzingaitwa mauto achirura mudzimba dzevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu-PF Inoti Iri Kutora Nhamba dzeVanhu Vanenge Vanyoresa kuVhota
text: Nhengo yeZanu-PF Politburo VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana vanoti hapana chakaipa pane zviri kuitwa nenhengo dzebato ravo zvekutora nhamba kana kuti ma serial numbers evavhoti vachiti ichi chisungo chebato ravo chekuona kuti nhengo dzaro chaidzo dzanyoresa kuvhota. :Isu tinoenda kunhengo dzedu dzeZanu PF kuti dzitiratidze kana dzakanyoresa, hatibvunze vanhu vasiri vebato redu," VaMunyaradzi vatsanangura. Asi munyori mukuru weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vanoti veZanu-PF havafanire kumanikidza vanhu kuti vavape nhamba dzavo dzemapepa aya. "Zvinenge zvisina kushata kana veZanu PF vachibvunzana pachavo. Asi zvatiri kunzwa ndezvekuti nhengo dzedu dzeMDC dziri kumakidzwa kuratidza ma serial numbers aya. Ndizvo tiri kuramba izvozvo," vadaro VaMwonzora. Vatiwo vakatenderana neZanu-PF kuti madzishe, masabhuku nemakanzura havafanire kutora nhamba dzevanhu sezo vachimbogovera vanhu zvekudya zvehurumemende. Zvichakadaro, VaMwonzora naVaMangwana vati ivo nemumwe mumiriri we MDC inotungamirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, ndivo vakapa kuti Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, kana kuti ZEC, iwedzere nguva yekunyoresa vavhoti. Komisheni inoone nezvesarudzo yeZEC inoti iri kuzoenderera mberi nekunyoresa vavhoti zvakasimba ichipinda munharaunda dzavo kana kuti registrationblitz kubva musi wa 10 Ndira kusvika musi wa 8 Kukadzi. Vakafanobata chigaro chasachigaro weZEC, VaEmmanuel Magade, vanoti hurumende yakatopa ZEC mari yekuita chirongwa ichi. Asi vamwe vanhu munyika vari kugunun’una kuti vari kutyisidzirwa zvakanyanya nevanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu-PF vachivamanikidza kuti vavape nhamba dzemapepa avanenge vavhotesa. No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa Votambirwa Zvine Mutsindo kuGweru
text: Zviuru nezviru zvevanhu zvaungana munhandare yeMkoba muGweru nhasi pamusangano webato idzva richangoumbwa reCitiozens Coalition for Change kana kuti Tripple C rinotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa. VaChamisa vatambirwa nenziyo uye detembo. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu VaChamisa vashora zvikuru nyaya yemhirizhonga munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika yakapa kuti vanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu-PF vauraye mumwe wevatsigiri wavo VaMboneni Ncube kuKwekwe svondo rapera. VaChamisa vavimbisawo kuti vachadzora dhora remuAmerica vakamirira kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemumwe akafanobata chigaro chemutevedzeri webato iri VaTendai Biti avo vakambovawo gurukota rezvehupfumi. Panyaya yekutungamira VaChamisa vati vashakabvu vakawanda vaive vatungamiri vanosanganisira VaMorgan Tsvangirai veMDC, VaDumiso Dabengwa veZapu uye VaRobert Mugabe vakafa vavatambira kuti vave mutungamiri wenyika. Pamusangano vamwe vanhu vekuGweru varatidza kusafara nezviri kuitwa nezvimwe zvizvarwa zvekuChina munyika zvavanoti kuvhiringidza hupfumi hwenyika nekutyora kodzero dzevashandi. Asi muzinda weChina muZimbabwe unoti vemabhizimisi vakawanda vari kungozorwa mafuta enguve yavasina kudya vachiti vari kusimudzira nyika. Vamwe vataura pamusangano uyu mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru musangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions VaKudakwashe Munengiwa avo vati vahsnadi vanoda kuti dhora remunyika ridzoswe. Mutungamiri wesangano revadzidzi reZimbabwe National Students Unions atiwo pamusangano uyu zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvikoro nenyaya yekuramwa basa kwevarairidzi. Asi vachitaura neStudio 7 panyaya yemhirizhonga, mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashaoko mubato reZanu-PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vakati bato ravo harisi zvemangoromera. Sarudzo dzemaby-elections kutsiva nhengo dzepamende dzakadzingwa neMDC-T dzichinzi dzaitsigira VaChamisa uye vamwe vakadzingwa kuZanu-PF nevakafa. No media source currently available

headline: Kongiresi dzeMatunhu eMDC Dzovhiringidzwa neKurwisana kweNhengo dzeBato
text: Bato rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa riri kuita misangano yekongiresi mumatunhu aro maduku ose, kana kuti ma district, risati rapinda mumakongiresi ematunhu makuru, kana kuti ma province. Kana rapeta misangano yematunhu iyi, bato iri rinozoita kongiresi yaro huru yenyika yose mwedzi unouya. Misangano yekongiresi iyi iri kushandiswa kusarudza hutungamiri hwematunhu aya kuburikidza nekuita sarudzo, idzo dzinokwikwidzana nhengo dzebato iri. Asi zvinonzi misangano mizhinji yaitwa kusvika pari zvino haisi kufamba zvakanaka nekuda kwemhirizhonga, iyo iri kuona nhengo dzebato iri dzichirwisana zvinotyisa, zvekusvika pakukuvadzana. Kurwisana uku kunonzi kuri kuitika pakati pezvikwata zvinonzi zviri kutsigira vanotarisirwa kukwikwidzana pakongiresi huru, mutungamiri webato VaNelson Chamisa, nemunyori mukuru webato, VaDouglas Mwonzora. Mukupera kwesvondo, kurwisana uku kwakakanganisa sarudzo dzedunhu reChitungwiza, uko dzimwe nhengo dzinonzi dzakakuwara zvakaipisisa uye mapurisa akatosungawo vanhu vane chitsama vanosanganisira mumiriri weZengeza East muparamende, VaGoodrich Chimbaira. Kudunhu reChegutu kunonzi kwakaitawo kuriwsana, izvo zvakaita kuti vanhu vana vasungwe nemapurisa, kuchitiwo kumatunhu eMasvingo, Sanyati neNorton kunonzi sarudzo dzakatadza kuenderera mberi zvakanaka nekuda kwemhirizhonga. Vamwe vanoti kusagadzikana kuri mubato iri ndiko kwakakonzera kuti rikundwe musarudzo ye by-election kuBulawayo, uko MDC yakakundwa neZanu PF. Vamwe muMDC vanoti kusagadzikana kuri mubato ravo kwakakonzerwa neZanu PF, iyo vanoti yakadira mari yekukanganisa kongiresi yavo, chiitiko chakarambwa neZanu PF. Mutauriri weMDC, VaJacob Mafume, vanoti kunyange hazvo nhengo dzavo dzakarwisana, zvinovafadza ndezvekuti hapana kudeuka kweropa kwakaitika. VaMafume vanoti bato ravo riri kuongorora nyaya dzemhirizhonga mumatunhu matatu, uye vanenge vawanikwa vaine mhosva vachatorerwa matanho anokodzera. asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakarerukira kubato reZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanoti kurwisana kuri kuitika mubato rinopikisa iri mucherechedzo wekuti zvinhu hazvichina kumira zvakanaka. Vanoti kupatsanuka kuri kuita MDC hakuna kutanga nhasi, zvekuti vanhu vemuZimbabwe zvatove kuvasemesa. No media source currently available

headline: ZimRights Yokurudzira Veruzhinji Kuramba Vachinyoresa Kuvhota
text: Chirongwa chekunyoresa vanhu kuvhota boka rinoona nezvesarudzo munyika reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, richipinda muvanhu chapera munyika yose paine vanhu vanosvika 4 630,095 vakanga vanyoresa kuvhota pakupera kwezuva musi weMuvhuro. Huwandu uhwu hwaziviswa neboka riri kutungamira sarudzo reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC. Huwandu uhwu, uhwo hunodarika zvishoma zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana ehuwandu hwaitarisirwa hwemamiriyoni manomwe, huri pasi kwazvo pane zvaitarisirwa neZEC kubva pakatanga chirongwa ichi musi wa14 Gunyana gore rino. ZEC yakazivisa kuti ichawedzera chirongwa ichi nemasvondo mashanu, asi yaiti inoda mari inoita mamiriyoni masere kuti chibudirire. Hurongwa hwekunyoresa kuvhota uhwu hwaive hwakaiswa muzvikamu zvina, chikamu chechina chinove chapera ichi. Asi masangano akawanda pamwe neveruzhinji vaichemachema kuti chirongwa ichi hachisi kufambiswa zvakanaka nekuda kwezvimhingamipinyi zvakasiyanasiyana zvaisangana nevaida kunyoresa kuvhota, izvo zvakazoita kuti vakumbire kuti chirongwa ichi kuti chiwedzerwe nguva. Mukuru wesangano reZimRights, VaOkay Machisa, vanove mumwe wevanhu vaikurudzira kuti chirongwa ichi chiwedzerwe nguva, vanoti vanofara nedanho reZEC rekuti iwedzere nguva, uye vanokurudzira veruzhinji kuti vashandise mukana uyu kunonyoresa kuvhota. VaMachisa vanoti vanhu vanofanirwa kuramba vachinyoresa kuvhota kusvikira panguva ye nomination court. No media source currently available

headline: ZUJ Inoshora Kusungwa kweVatori veNhau veNewsday
text: Mapurisa emuHarare neChina vakasunga mutevedzeri wemupepeti mukuru webepanhau reNewsday, Nqaba Matshazi, uye mutori wenhau, Xolisani Ncube, vachipomerwa mhosva yekunyora manyepo. Mapurisa emuHarare neChina vakasunga mutevedzeri wemupepeti mukuru webepanhau reNewsday, Nqaba Matshazi, uye mutori wenhau, Xolisani Ncube, vachipomerwa mhosva yekunyora manyepo. Matshazi na Ncube vari kupomerwa mhosva yekunyora manyepo pasi pemutemo we Criminal Law (Codification and Reform) Act. Vatori venhau ava vanonzi vakanyora nyaya yekuti nhengo dzesangano revasori reCentral Intelligence Organization dzainge dzapihwa mari dzemabhonasi kunyange hazvo vamwe vashandi vehurumende vasati vapihwa mari idzi. Gweta riri kumirira vatori venhau ava, VaTaona Nyamakura, vati Matshazi naNcube vari kurara mutirongo sezvo vasina kubudirira kuendeswa kudare. No media source currently available Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa, Chief superintendent Paul Nyathi, sezvo vange vasingadaire nharembozha yavo. Hapasati pajekeswa kuti ndiyani akamhang'ara nyaya iyi kumapurisa. Asi munyori mukuru wesangano revatori venhau reZimbabwe Union of Journalists, VaFoster Dongozi, vashora zvikuru kusungwa kwevatori venhau ava. No media source currently available

headline: Bato reCCC rinoti Misangano Yaro muKupera kweSvondo Yave Kuzoenderera Mberi Mushure Mekugara Pasi neMapurisa
text: Mapurisa anonzi amborambidza bato rinopikisa reCitizens’ Coalition for Change kuita misangano nevatsigiri varo mukupera kwesvondo kuMarondera nekuBinga North. Tsamba dziri mumaoko eStudio 7 dzinoratidza kuti mapurisa anga ashandisa mutemo weMaintenance of Peace Act, kana kuti MOPA, kurambidza bato reCCC kuita misangano nevatsigiri varo kuMarondera mangwana uye neMuvhuro kuBinga North. Asi mutauriri weCCC, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere, vaudza Studio 7 kuti misangano yavo yave kuzoenderera mberi kuMarondera, Binga North, Beitbridge neTsholotsho mushure mekuita musangano nemapurisa. Mutauriri weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaObert Masaraure vashora kumborambidzwa kweCCC kuita misangano yayo panguva iyo bato reZanu PF risiri kurambidzwa kuita misangano yaro. VaMasaraure vakurudzira komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission kuti imire pakati ichigadzirisa nyaya dzakadai. Asi mutauriri weZEC, Amai Joice Leticia Kazembe, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti komisheni yavo haina kwayakarerekera, vakakurudzira kuti mapato ane zvichemo asvitse zvichemo zvawo kukomiti ye multi-party liason kuti nyaya idzi dziongororwe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vari mutungamiri webato reDemocratic Party, VaUrayazi Zembe, vati zviri kuitwa nemapurisa zvekurambidza VaChamisa nebato ravo kuita misangano zvinoratidza kuti munyika hamuna hutongi hwejekerere. Studio 7 yakundikana kunzwa divi remapurisa panyaya iyi sezvo tatadza kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi. Zvichakadai, Zanu PF yakatarisirwa kuitawo misangano mikuru miviri nevatsigiri vayo mukupera kwesvondo. Musangano uchaitwa ku Karoi mangwana Mugovera uchange uchitungamirwa nasachigaro vebato iri Amai Oppah Muchinguri-Kashiri kuchitiwo nemusi weSvondo mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato reZanu PF uye vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga vachange vachisangana nevatsigiri vebato ravo kwaMutare.

headline: VaMugabe Vanoshamisa Veruzhinji Vachiti Vasiya Basa
text: Vange vari mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiya basa rekutungamira hurumende mushure mekunge vazivisa paramende kuti vasiya basa semutungamiri wenyika. VaMugabe vatora danho iri panguva iyo paramende yanga ichitora matanho ekuvapomera mhosva sezviri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika, pachishandiswa nzira ye impeachment. Mutauriri wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, vaudza nhengo dzeparamende dzanga dzaungana kuHarare International Conference Centre, kuti hurongwa hwe impeachment hwava kumiswa sezvo VaMugabe vabvuma kubva pachigaro. Gurukota rezvemutemo, VaHappyton Bonyongwe, ndivo vanonzi vatura shoko rekusiya basa kwaVaMugabe kuna VaMudenda, izvo zvinonzi VaBonyongwe vatombopengerwa nedzimwe nhengo dzeparamende dzanga dzafunga kuti vari kuda kukanganisa hurongwa hwe impeachment hwanga hwatanga. VaMugabe vasiya basa zvichitevera kupindira kwakaita mauto nemusi weChipiri svondo rapera achiti zvinhu zvanga zvaipa munyika, kusanganisira kuparara kwehupfumi munyika. Bato reZanu PF rakatobuda nechisungo chekuti vakadzingwa semutevedzeri waVaMugabe muhurumende nemuZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ndivo vari kutora basa raiitwa naVaMugabe. VaMugabe vakaberekwa musi wa 21 Kukadzi 1924 kwaKutama mudunhu reMashonaland West. Vakadzidza paKutama neku Fort Hare University kuSouth Africa, mushure vakazoshanda semurairidzi. Zanu PF yatosvitsa zita raVaMnangagwa kuti vatambirwe zviri pamutemo semutungamiri wenyika. Pasi pemitemo yenyika, VaMnangagwa vanofanirwa kutora mhiko yekuva mutungamiri wenyika achabata matomu kusvika panoitwa sarudzo gore rinouya. Muna 1963, VaMugabe vakasarudzwa semunyori mukuru webato idzva rakanga raumbwa reZimbabwe African National Union, Zanu. Vakazosarudzwa semutungamiri webato iri muna 1975, muna 1980 vakazosarudzwa kuve mutungamiri wehurumende yeZimbabwe zvichitevera kukunda kwebato ravo musarudzo. Muna 1987, vakazove mutungamiri wenyika kusvika kusiya kwavo basa neChipiri, Mbudzi 21, 2017. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vopesana Pamusoro peDanho reMDC Alliance Ichipikisa Zvakabuda Musarudzo
text: Vanhu vakawanda vanoti MDC Alliance ine kodzero dzekupikisa zvakabuda musarudzo sezvo kodzero iyi ichichengetedzwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Vanhu vakawanda vataura neStudio 7 muChinhoyi vanoti kuendeswa kwegwaro renyunyuto kudare repamusoro reConstitutional Court kwakaitwa neMDC Alliance, ikodzero yechizvarwa chose munyika kuita izvi. Mumwe mugari wemumusha weveruzhinji weChikonohono muChinhoyi, VaTendai Mushonga, vanoti uyo achaonekwa nematare kuti ndiye akakunda anofanirwa kugadzwa pasina kumwe kunyunyuta. VaMushonga vanoti gwaro renyunyuto reMDC Alliance rave mumatare rakanaka sezvo richiratidza kuti munyika mune hutongi hwejekerere. Mumwe mugari wekuKaroi, VaTravor Chiwanga, vanoti vanhu havachina chivimbo nematare edzimhosva kunyange hazvo vanhu vakawanda vari kutarisira kunaka kwezvinhu zvisinei nekuti ndiani akunda nekuda kwehutongi hwevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. VaChiwanga vanoti vakawanda vari kumamisha vari kuda kuti VaMnangagwa vagadzwe semutungamiri wenyika, ukuwo vari mumadhorobha vachiti dai tsamba yenyunyuto yabudirira kuitira kuti VaNelson Chamisa vagadzwe semutungamiri wenyika kuitira kuti nyaya dzezvehupfumi dzigadzirisike. Asi mumwe mugari, VaClifford Khupheko, vanoti ivo nevamwe vavo vari kurwadziwa kutkupikisa kweMDC Alliance kwave kumisa kugadzwa kwaVaMnangagwa semutungamiri wenyika. VaKhupeko vashoropodza kunonoka kuenda kumatare kwakaitwa nemagweta aVaChamisa vachiti mucherochedzo wekuti havana hany'a nenyika yavo. Dare reConstitutional Court rinofanirwa kupa mutongo waro mukati memazuva gumi nemana. Panyaya iri mudare, pane zvinhu zvitatu zvinofanirwa kuitwa nedare iri. Chokutanga rinofanirwa kuona humbowo hwaiswa pamberi paro neMDC Alliance, uye rikagutsikana kuti humbowo uhu hwakawandisa, uye hunotsigira kuti VaChamisa vakabiridzirwa, rinogona kuti VaChamisa ndivo vakasarudzwa zviri pamutemo, kana kuti rinogona kuti sarudzo iyi idzokororwe. Kana dare rikatadza kugutswa nehumbowo hwarapihwa, dare iri rinopa mutongo wekuti VaMnangagwa ndivo vakakunda. Mutongo weConstitutional Court haupikiswe, uye anenge anzi ndiye akakunda, anofanirwa kugadzwa semutungamiri wenyika mukati memaawa makumi mana nemasere. No media source currently available

headline: Varwiri veKodzero Vashanu Vanomiswa Mudare Vachipomerwa Mhosva yeKuronga Kubvisa Hurumende
text: Varwiri vekodzero vashanu vakasungwa mushure mekupinda musangano wezvekodzero dzevanhu kuMaldives vamiswa pamberi pedare vachipomerwa mhosva yekuronga zvekupidigura hurumende. Asi vasungwa ava vasvitsa chikumbiro kudare chekuti nyaya iyi iraswe vachiti havana mhosva yavakapara uye kodzero dzavo dzakatyorwa vari muhusungwa. Hurumende yati vasungwa vashanu ava, avo vanoti VaTatenda Mombeyarara vesangano reCitizens Manifesto, VaGamuchirai Mukura vesangano reCommunity Tolerance Reconciliation and Development, VaNyasha Frank Mpahlo veTransparency International Zimbabwe, VaGeorge Makoni veCentre for Community Development in Zimbabwe, naMuzvare Farirai Gumbonzvanda vesangano reRosaria Memorial Trust, vakaronga zvekupidigura hurumende kumusangano wavakapinda kuMaldives wakarongwa nesangano rinoshanda rakazvimirira rekuSerbia rinodaidzwa kuti Centre for Apllied None Violent Action and Strategies kana kuti CANVAS. Hurumende yatiwo vasungwa ava vakadzidziswa zvekushandisa pfuti diki pamwe nezvekupidigura hurumende vachishanda nevamwe vavo vavati vachiri kutsvagwa nemapurisa. Vachuchisi venyaya iyi vatiwo vasungwa ava vakadzidziswa nzira dzekukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vanopandukira sei hurumende uye nzira dzekutiza nadzo kusungwa mukuratidzira pamwe nekuita zvechitororo. Hurumende yatiwo ine humbowo hwainahwo hwayakakawana munharembozha dzevasungwa ava pamwe nemuma computer avo ayo akapambwa nemapurisa pakasungwa varwiri vekodzero ava pavakasvika panhandare yendege yeRobert Gabriel Mugabe International Airport neMuvhuro manheru. Asi rimwe remagweta evasungwa ava, Muzvare Jessie Majome, vasvitsa chikumbiro kudare chekuti nyaya iyi iraswe vachiti vasungwa ava havana mhosva yavakapara uye vati vasungwa ava vakatyorerwa kodzero dzavo pavakasungwa. Vachipa humbowo hwavo kudare, VaMombeyarara vati vakatyisidzirwa zvakakomba nemapurisa uye havana kuudzwa chikonzero chekusungwa kwavo pavakasungwa sezvinotaurwa nebumbiro remitemo. VaMakoni vatiwo vakamanikidzwawo kuvhura nharembozha dzavo nema computer avo vese mapurisa asina matsamba ekuita izvi sezvakatarwa mumurawu. Vasungwa vese ava vatiwo vakarariswa mumatirongo akasiyana-siyana aive nerima uye ane zvimbuzi zvakange zvakapfachukira tsvina yevanhu neweti uye vakanyimwa chikafu nemvura yekunwa kubva pavakasungwa kusvika pavakazobvumidzwa kuti vaonekwe nemagweta avo nezuro Chipiri masikati. Vasati vapinda mudare, VaMombeyarara vaudza Studio7 kuti vari kushubgurudzwa nehurumende zvisina maturo. Vasungwa vese ava vaudza dare kuti musangano wavakanopinda kuMaldives wakange usinei nezvekupidigura hurumende asi kuti waive wekurwira kodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inopa Mari Inopiwa Mapato Pasi peMutemo wePolitical Parties Finance Act kuMDC-T, Kwete kuMDC Alliance
text: Hurumende svondo rapera yakapa mari inopiwa mapato ezvematongerwo enyika pasi pemutemo wePolitical Parties Finance Act inoita mamiriyoni manomwe nemazana mashanu ezviuru zvemadhora emunyika kubato reMDC-T iro riri kufanotungamirwa naMuzvare Khupe, kunyange hazvo bato iri risina kuwana mavhoti anoita kuti rikodzere kupiwa mari iyi. Mari iyi yaifanirwa kupiwa kubato reMDC Alliance riri kutungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, iro rakawana mavhoti akawanda anodarika zvikamu zvishanu kubva muzana zvinofanirwa kuwanikwa nebato pasarudzo kuti rikodzere kuwana mari iyi. Hurumende inonzi yakapa bato iri mari iyi zviichitevera mutongo wedare reSupreme Court, iro rakati MDC Alliance harisi bato rezvematongerwo enyika sezvo yakabva mumubatanidzwa wemapato masere akapinda musarudzo pasi peMDC Alliance. Muna Chivabvu mutongi wedare reHigh Court, Justice Nyaradzo Munangati-Manongwa vakapa mutongo unorambidza hurumende kupa mari iyi kubato reMDC-T mushure mekunge MDC Alliance yaendesa gurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi pamwe negurukota rezvemari muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube kumatare richida kuti VaZiyambi varipe mari iyi. Asi hurumende yakazopikisa mutongo uyu kudare repamusorosoro reSupreme Court, iro risati ranzwa nyaya iyi. Bato reMDC-T rinoti ndiro rinokodzera kwana mari iyi sezvo riri iro bato riri pamutemo, richiti MDC Alliance mubatanidzwa waive nemapato manomwe kusanganisira nairo bato reMDC-T. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaFelix Magalela Mafa-Sibanda, vanoti zvakaitwa nehurumende zvekupa mari kuMDC-T mucherechedzo wekuti bato iri riri kushandiswa neZanu PF. VaMagalela Mafa vanoti sebato vave kusiya zvose mumaoko evanhu vanove ndivo vane zvido zviri kumbunyikidzwa. No media source currently available Gweta rezvemitemo, vachidzidzisa zvemutemo pa Univesirty of Kent, Doctor Alex magaisa, vanoti izvi zvaitwa nehurumende hazvinyanye kushamisa asi yakapotsa zvikuru sezvo nyaya iyi yanga ichiri kumatare edzimhosva. No media source currently available

headline: Vanoongorora Sarudzo Vorumbidza Mafambisirwo Aitwa Sarudzo muKenya
text: Zvizvarwa zveKenya zvapinda musarudzo idzo dzinonzi nevanoongorora mafambisirwo esarudzo dzaitwa murunyararo kunyange hazvo dzanonoka kutanga mune mamwe matunhu nekuda kwedambudziko nemichina yekuvhotesa. Zvigaro zvanga zvichivhoterwa zvinoti chemutungamiri wenyika, nhengo dzeparamende, maseneta, magavhuna pamwe nevatungamiri vematunhu. Musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, makwikwi makuru anonzi ari pakati pemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaWilliam Ruto nevakambove mutungamiri wehurumende, VaRaila Odinga, avo vari kutsigirwa zvakanyanya nemutungamiri wenyika, VaUhuru Kenyatta. Sarudzo dzemuKenya idzi dzapawo mukana kuzvizvarwa zvenyika iyi zviri kumhiri kwemakungwa kuti zvikwanise kuvhota kekutanga munhoroondo yenyika iyi zviri munyika dzazvigere, kuchitiwo mukana wepiri kune vari kunze kwenyika asi vari muAfrica. Zvizvarwa zveKenya zviri munyika gumi nembiri dzinoti Canada, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom, America, Qatar, South Africa, Germany, Rwanda, Burundi, Uganda, Tanzania neSouth Sudan zvakwanisa kunge zvichipinda musarudzo idzi. Vamwe vawaniswawo mukana wekuvhota kekutanga imhuri yeVaShona iri muKenya, iyo yakawaniswa magwaro ekuti vave zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi. Vamiriri vemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu pamwe neanoona nezvesarudzo muZimbabwe uye vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika varikowo kuKenya uko vanga vachiongorora sarudzo idzi. Mumwe wevariko ndisachigaro veZimbabwe Election Support Network, VaAndrew Makoni, avo vanoti vagutsikana nemafambisirwo aitwa sarudzo nesangano rinotungamira sarudzo munyika iyi reIndependent Electoral and Boundaries Commission (IEBC), vachiti raratidza kurongeka, zvinokwanisa kudzidzwawo neZimbabwe Electoral Commission. VaMakoni vatiwo wafadzwa nekuona kuti mauto nemapurisa anga ari munzvimbo dzanga dzichivhoterwa haana kukanganisa kana kupindira mumafambisirwo esarudzo idzi. Zvichabuda musarudzo zvinotarisirwa kutanga kuziviswa neChitatu. Vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemaviri vanonzi ndivo vakanga vakanyoresa kuvhora musarudzo dzemuKenya idzi. No media source currently available

headline: MDC-T yaMuzvare Khupe Yoronga Kusangana neVatsigiri Vayo muMatunhu emuHarare
text: Bato reMDC-T inotungamirirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe riri kuronga kupinda mumatunhu emuHarare neMugovera richiratidza kuvatsigiri varo mutungamiri webato pamwe nevachakwikwidza musarudzo. Mutauriri webato iri, Muzvare Linda Tsungirirai Masarira vanoti bato ravo ratora nzira yekusangana nevatsigiri vavo iyi sezvo vatya kuti vakaita musangano mukuru waizogona kukanganiswa nevemamwe mapato avasina kudoma nemazita. Muzvare Masarira vanoti nzira yekupinda muvanhu vachisangana nevatsigiri vavo inovapawo mukana wekusangana nevatsigiri padunhu rega rega sezvo sarudzo dzegore rino dzakanangana nenzvimbo dzekuvhotera, kana kuti polling station-based. Vanoti hurongwa hwavo hweMugovera uhwu huchatangira muHarare Gardens, huchizoperera kuChitungwiza. Semamwe mapato anopikisa, vanotiwo sebato havasi kufara nemafambisirwo ari kuitwa gadziriro dzesarudzo neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, zvikuru panyaya yekunonoka kuwanisa gwaro revavhoti kune mapato ari kukwikwidza musarudzo. "And hatina vimbo kuti ZEC ichakwanisa kutiburitsira and election iri free and fair and credible," Muzvare Masarira vanodaro. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reZimbabwe Women In Politics Alliance Rinoti Richaenderera Mberi Nekuratidzira Kunyangwe Rikashungurudzwa
text: Nhengo dzemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu anoti re Zimbabwe Activists Alliance, Occupy Africa Unity Square Movement neZimbabwe Women In Politics Alliance dzakabata nevamwe vana veZimbabwe, dzinoti dzirikuenderera mberi nekuratidzida kwavo kusafara nemafambisirwo ari kuitwa zvinhu munyika kunyangwe vachiti vakashungurudzwa mambakwedza eMugovera nevanofungidzirwa kuti mapurisa kana kuti vasori. Nhengo idzi dziri kurara nekuswera mu Africa Unity Square muHarare uye dzinoti dziri kugadzira tsamba yenyunyuto kana kuti petition ichaendeswa kudare reparamende nekune mutungamiri wenyika vaRobert Mugabe. "Kunyangwe vakati shungurudza ticharamba tichienda mberi nekuratidzira kwedu sezvo mararamiro atiri kuita muno munyika asina kumira zvakanaka. Mari mumabhanga hamuna, mabasa hapana, vana vavazi kuenda kuzvikoro apa huwori hwuri kuramba hwuchiwanda munyika asi hapana ari kusungwa. Isu ticharamba tiri muno muAfrica Unity Square kusvika tanzwikwa zvichemo zvedu," Muzvare Lynda Masarira vesangano re Zimbabwe Women In Politics vaudza Studio 7. Muzvare Masarira vanoti vakakwidza nyaya yavo kumagweta avo nemamwe masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu asi havana kuenda kumapurisa sezvo vakambo shungurudzwa nemapurisa aya musi Chishanu. "Hatina kuenda nenyaya yedu kumapurisa asi maphone evazhinji vari kuratidzira nesu akabiwa, ini ndikakuvadzwa ruwoko nechigunwe vamwe vakarohwa nekukuvadzwa asi izvi hazvisi kuzoita kuti tiregedze kuratidzira," Muzvare Masarira vaenderera mberi. Vanoti nemusi weChipiri vachaita musangano nevatori venhau wekuzeya mafambiro arikuita zvinhu mukuratidzira kwavarikuita. No media source currently available

headline: Nyika Yoita Sarudzo dzemaBy-Election Dziri Kunzi neVanopikisa Kutungana KweMbudzi
text: Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission amai Rita Makarau vanoti sangano ravo ragadzirira kuita sarudzo dzemaby-elections dziri kuitwa kuMbire, Epworth neMarondera Central. Izvi zvinotevera kudzingwa mubato reZanu-PF kwaVaDavid Butau uye VaRay Kaukonde kuMarondera Central. Vaviri ava vaipomerwa mhosva yekutsigira vaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika amai Joyce Mujuru vakadzingwawo mubato. KuEpworth kuri kuitwa sarudzo mushure mekushaya kwaVaAmos Midzi veZanu-PF. Vanhu varikukurudzirwa nezec kuti vauye nemapepa chaiwo ekuvhota kwete madrivers license. Amai Rita Makarau sachigaro weZEC vanoti vavhoti vanofanira kuuya nezvitupa zvinoonekwa kwete madrivers license. No media source currently available  Tichiri panyaya iyi mutauriri wesangano rinoongorora sarudzo rakazvimirira reZimbabwe Election Support Network Amai Ellen Dingane vanoti zvinhu zvirikufamba zvakanaka parezvino. No media source currently available Mapato achakwikwidza kuEpworth anosanganisira Zanu-PF, Transform Zimbabwe neZAPU. KuMarondera kuchakwikwidza Zanu-PF, Transform Zimbabwe, Freedom Front ne National Constitutional Assembly uye kuMbire kuchakwikwidza Zanu-PF, Transform Zimbabwe neNCA. Asi mapatao akaita seMDC ne People’s Democratic Party ari kuramwa kupinda musarudzo idzi achiti mitemo yesarudzo iripo yakarerekera kubatsira bato riri kutonga reZanu-PF kuti rikunde. Asi bato reZanu-PF rinoti zviri kutaurwa izvi ndezvemugotsi matsuro. Bato iri rinoti veMDC vanotya kukundwa musarudzo.

headline: America Inoti Vakapfura Vanhu muHarare Muna Nyamavhuvhu Ngavasungwe
text: America iri kukurudzira mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti vaburitse zvakabuda muongororo yekupfurwa kwevanhu muHarare nemauto musi wa1 Nyamavhuvhu uye kuti vakapara mhosva iyi vasungwe. Izvi zvakabuda mumusangano wekomiti inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muAmerica wakaitwa nemusi weChina muWashington DC waizeya nyaya yekudyidzana kweZimbabwe neAmerica. Masenator akataura pamusangano uyu anosanganisa sachigaro wekomiti iyi VaJake Flake vekuArizona, VaChris Coons vekuDelaware uye VaCory Booker vekuNew Jersey. Vatatu ava vakashanyira Zimbabwe gore rino nerapera vachinotaura naVaMnangagwa nevamwe vakuru muhurumende yavo. Mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru mubazi rezvekudyidzana nenyika dzemuAfrica muhurumende yeAmerica kana kuti Deputy Assistant Secretary of African Affairs VaMatthew Harrington vakati vanoda kuona hurumende yaVaMnangagwa ichitora matanho akasimba kune vakauraya vanhu vatanhatu muHarare VaHarrington vakati vari kunetsekawo nenyaya yekushungurudzwa kwevanopikisa hurumende kusanganisa kushungurudzwa kwavanoti kuti kuitwa vaTendai Biti avo vari kuendeswa kumatare nehurumende vachinzi vakazivisa zvainge zvabuda musarudzo ZEC isat yazvitura kuruzhinji. VaMnangagwa vakakukurudzirwawo kuti vazadzikise zvavari kuvimbisa mukuunza hutongo hwejekerere vasati vataura kuti zvirango zvavakatemerwa neAmerica nevamwe vakuru muhurumemende yavo zvibviswe. Mashoko aya akatsinhirwawo naVaBooker avo vakati zvirango zvakatemerwa vakuru vehurumende kuti vatonge zvine mutsa asi kusvika parizvino vakati hapana chavaona chachinja. VaCoons vakatiwo Zimbabwe haina kumira pakanaka panyaya yekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika nekudaro inofanira kusunga dzisimbe. Vachipawo huchapupu kukomiti iyi, muzvinabhizimisi VaJoe Mtizwa vakati zvinhu zvave nani zvakanyanya panyaya dzekuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu pasi pehutongo hwaVaMnangagwa zvichienzaniswa nezvaiitika pasi pevaove mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. VaMtizwa vatiwo vanoda kuti zvirango zvibviswe nekuti zviri kukonzera matambudziko kuvanhuwo zvavo muZimbabwe uye vemabhizimisi. Asi vamwe vakapa humbowo VaTodd Moss vanoshanda nesangano reCentre for Global Development vakati nyaya yekuti zvirango ndizvo zvakanganisa hupfumi muZimbabwe ndeyemugotsi matsuro. Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vaudzawo Studio 7 parunhare kuti VaMnangagwa havana dambudziko nekuburitsa zvanenge zvabuda muongororo yaVaMothlante. VaMangwana vatiwo hurumende inoda kuti zvirango zvibviswe vachiti zviri kukanganisa avarombo. Asi vachipindura mashoko aya, mutauriri webato rinopikisa VaJacob Mafume vakati Zanu-PF haina kuzvipira kuvandudza zvinhu zvapa kuti vanhu vanonge svosve nemuromo. America yakatemera vakuru veZimbabwe zvirango muna 2001 ichipomera hurumende mhosva yekutonga nedemo. Asi Zimbabwe inoti yakatemerwa zvirango nenyaya yekuti yainge yatora minda kuvachena. No media source currently available

headline: Chikwata Chinotsigira VaMnangagwa Chodududza paHondo yeMusangano wePolitburo
text: Munyori mukuru wesangano revakarwa hondo reZimbabwe Liberation War Veterans Association VaVictor Matemadanda vanoti sangano ravo radududza pachisungo charo chekuti riri kuda kumisa gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro muzvinafundo Jonathan Moyo uye gurukota rezvematunhu VaSaviour Kasukuwere kuti vasapinde mumusangano wePoltiburo. Vaviri ava vari kupomerwa mhosva yekukonzera nyonga nyonga mubato iri iro roita kunge bhasikiri raTizira rekuti uku riri kurukwa uku riri kurudunurwa. Paita hondo pakati pechikwata chinonzi chiri kutsigira mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nechimwe chinonzi chiri kutsigira amai Grace Mugabe chinozisikanwa nekuti Generation 40. Zviri kubuda mukuwrisana uku zviri kubuditsa pachena kuti vakarwa hondo vakawanda vari kutsigira VaMnangagwa madzimai achitsigira chikwata cheGeneration 40. Zvichakadaro, pari kutyirwa kuti kunogona kuita bata murefu bata mupfupi pamuzinda weZanu-PF muHarare pari kuitirwa musangano wePolitburo uyu sezvo nhengo dzeZanu-PF dziri keunderera mberi dzichikandirana makobvu nematete. Vamwe Vakuru vemapurisa vanoti vatogara vakagadzirira kuti panogona kuita mvonga mupopoto. Mukuru wemadzimai mudunhu reMashonaland West Amai Angeline Muchemeyi avo vanonzi nevamwe vanotsigira chikwata cheGeneration 40 vaudza madzimai ose emusangano wavo kuti vaende nehuwandu hwavo kumuzinda webato iri muHarare. Bazi remadzimai raronga mabhazi gumi nemana kuti atakure vanhu . Mutsamba yavanyora Amai Muchemeyi vakurudzira madzimai kuti vaende kunotambira mukuru wavo vari zvakare mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika amai Mugabe apo vanenge vachiuya kuzopinda mumusangano wePolitburo. Sachigaro weZanu PF mudunhu reMashonaland West VaEphraim Chengeta vanyorawo gwaro kunhengo dzose dzeProvincial Coordinating Committee (PCC) kuti dziendewo kuHarare kumusangano uyu. VaChengeta havana kutaura kuti donzvo rekusangana nemutungamiri wenyika ndereyi. Asi vati kungosangana nemutungamiri webato sezvavanogaroita. VaMatemadanda vati VaMoo naVaKasukuwere vanoda kushandisa madzimai kuti arwisane nevakarwa hondo asi vati havasi kuzoita izvi. No media source currently available Asi izvi hazvina kufadza vamwe mumusangano weZanu-PF avo vanofungidzirwa kuti vanotsigira chikwata chinotungamirirwa nemutevedzeri wenyika VaMnangagwa. Vaimbove sachigaro wevechidiki mudunhu reMashonaland Central, VaGodfrey Tsenengamu vanoti vanotsigira VaMnangagwa, vanyorawo gwaro vachikoka vechidiki vose mubato pamwe nevana vevaimbove varwi verusununguko kuti vaende kumuzinda webato kuHarare kunotambira mukuru wenyika vasati vapinda mumusangano wePolitburo. Mutsamba mavo VaTsenengamu vati “Ibasa redu kuchengetedza musangano uyu wemisodzi, dikita neropa, hatingapete maoko musangano uchiparadzwa nembavha, ngochani nevatengesi vanodya nemuvengi’. VaTsenengamu vazoti kunyange vari kuenda kumuzinda webato reZanu-PF vakazvimirira, vanoshora misangano yakadai inoratidza kunetsana mubato asi vanhu munyika vachinonga svosve nemuromo. Vanoziva zviri kuitika mubato iri vanoti nhengo dzePolitburo dzichabudirana pachena sezvo paine nyaya dzekurangana nekudzingana mumusangano dziri kubuda. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Voratidzira muHarare Vachirwisana neMapurisa
text: Zvinhu zvinonzi zvafuma zvakaita manyama amire nerongo muHarare nenzvimbo dzakapoteredza sezvo vemakombi nevanhuwo zvavo vari kurwisana nemapurisa. Zvinonzi pane bata murefu bata mupfupi munzvimbo dzakaita seHatfield, Epworth, Ruwa, Zimre Park, Mabvuku neTafara. Vanhu vakawanda vanonzi vatotadza kuenda kumabasa nekuda kwekurwisana uku. Mapurisa ari kukandira vanhu hutsi hunokatyidza uku vanhu vachikanda matombo. Vemakombi vakamboratidzirawo kwaMutare vachigunun'una nenyaya yehuori yavanoti iri kuitwa nemapurisa uye maroad blocks avanoti akawandisa mumigwagwa. Kurwisana uku kuri kuuya kunyangwe vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muZanu-PF vari gurukota rezvematunhu VaSaviour Kasukuwere vakayedza kutyisidzira vanhu vanoratidzira nemhirizhonga. Izvi zvakatevera kuratidzira kwakaitika kuBeitbridge nemusi weChishanu vanhu vachiramba kutambira chirongwa chehurumende chekurambidza kupinda munyika zvimwe zvinhu zvinotengwa nevanhu kuSouth Africa nemutengo wakaderera zvozotengeswa muZimbabwe. Vanhu makumi manomwe nevaviri vakasungwa vamwe gumi nevanomwe vakamiswa pamberi pedare nemusi weSvondo. Tichakupai zvizere munguva pfupi inotevera.

headline: MISA-Zimbabwe, Vatori veNhau Vopikisa Mutongo weCriminal Defamation
text: Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevatori venhau kuchamhembe kweAfrica reMISA-Zimbabwe rakabatana nevamwe vatori venhau, neChitatu rasvitsa kudare repamusorosoro reConstitutional Court, magwaro ekuti mutemo unosvibisa chimiro chemunhu wecriminal defamation uraswe mubumbiro idzva remitemo. Mumagwaro asvitswa kudare negweta riri kumirira sangano iri pamwe nevatori venhau ava, VaChris Mhike, vanoti chikamu 96 chemutemo wecriminal law (Codofication and Reform) Act (Chapter 9:23) uri kunze kwemutemo sezvo usingadyidzane nezvikamu 61 ne 62 zvebumbiro remitemo, nekudaro unofanirwa kuraswa. VaMhike vanoti zvikamu 61 ne 62 zvebumbiro idzva izvo zvinochengetedza kodzero dzevanhu mukufambiswa kwenhau pamwe nekuwaniswa mashoko pamwe nekodzero dzekutaura vakasununguka. Vamwe vakwira dare pamwe neMISA-Zimbabwe vatori venhau vanoti Nqaba Matshazi, Sydney Saize pamwe naGodwin Mangudya, pamwe nevanoita zvekudhinda mapepa vakazvimirira VaRoger Dean Stringer. Matshazi naVaStringer vanonzi vakamboshungurudzwawo nemutemo uyu. Vakwirirwa dare vanoti gurukota rezvemitemo nemabasa eparamende uye vari mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaJonathan Moyo pamwe negweta guru rehurumende VaPrince Machaya. Vatatu ava vane mazuva gumi ekupikisa nyaya iyi. Danho iri rinouya panguva shoma dare rimwechetero ratonga kuti mutemo wecorminal defamation uchiri kushanda sezvo wakangobviswa chete pabumbiro remitemo rekare. No media source currently available

headline: Vemitambo Vofarira Kirsty Coventry seGurukota Idzva reMitambo neVechidiki
text: Vemumhuri yemutambo vari kubvumirana kuti Muzvare Kirsty Coventry vanokodzera kubasa iri sezvo vachiziva nzira dzese dzemitambo zvekuti vachagadzirisa panga pasinga fambe zvakana. Muzvare Coventry, avo vakatora menduru nhanhatu kumaOlympic Games, vapihwa basa iri nhasi masikati nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, apo vadoma makurukota enyika. Mutambi wetsiva, Farai Mugoni, anoti basa iri ranga richida munhu akambopinda munhandare, munhu anoziva matambudziko evatambi zvekuti anofunga kuti Muzvare Coventry vanokodzera. Aimbove shasha yeZimbabwe mutsiva zvekare muhuremu hweligh heavyweight neheavyweight, Arigoma Chiponda. anoti ari kufaranezvaitika izvi achiti ari kutarisira kuti Muzvare Coventry vachakandawo mumitambo vatungamiri vakambopindawo munhandare. Muongorori wemutambo, VaFarai Kambamura, vanoti kusarudzwa kwaMuzvare Coventry kuve nhengo yeInternational Olympic Committee kunoratidza kuti munhu ari kuziva zvaari kuita vachiwedzera ivo kuti Zimbabwe yakomborerwa nekupihwa kwake basa iri. Mutambi we volleyball, Oliver Musongoro, anoti Muzvare Coventry vane ruzivo rwakadzama rezvemitambo zvichitevera kufamba kwavaita munyika dzakasiyana siyana zvekuti vari kuona pachiita shanduko sezvo vave panyanga. Musongoro anoti afara nekuti paiswa munhu ari mumitambo kare. Muteveri wemitambo, VaKudzai Bere, vanoti zvinofadza kuti vatambi vakaita saMuzvare Coventry vatambidzwe mabasa akadai sekutendwa zvavakaitira nyika pasina mubhadharo. Makore apfuura panga pachiita kugunununa kuti makurukuta ari kupihwa basa iri ari kuritadza sezvo anga asingazive zvemitambo. Asi Muzvare Coventry vane basa guru rekuedza kusandura mafungiro evamwe vemuhurumende avo vasingakosheshe zvemitambo izvo zvanga zvichikonzera kuti mitambo isawane mari yakasimba kubva kuhurumende. Pamusoro pekuve nhengo yeInternational Olympic Committee, Muzvare Coventry ndivo zvekare mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weZimbabwe Olympic Commiittee, basa raarikutarisirwa kusiya nezvaave ikozvino. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vochema Zvichitevera Kunyoresa kwaVaChiyangwa Kuti Vakwikwidze Chigaro cheZifa
text: Veruzhinji vanotevera mutambo wenhabvu havasi kufara nekuti nhengo yeZanu PF, VaPhillip Chiyangwa, vatore chinzvimbo chemutungamiri weZimbabwe Football Association. No media source currently available Asi zviripo ndezvekuti veruzhinji vacho havasi ivo vanosarudza vatungamiri venhabvu asi kuti izvi zvinoitwa neZifa Council, iyo inozivikanwa zvikuru nemhaka yehuori. Mamiriro akaita zvinhu pari zvino ari kuratidza kuti VaChiyangwa vangangotora chigaro ichi sezvo vari kufarirwa neZifa Council mushure memisangano yavakaita navo kubvira musi uyo vakati vari kuda kutungamira sangano renhabvu iri. Asi vakawanda vari kuti VaChiyangwa havakodzeri kutora basa iri sezvo vari kuda kuti papinde munhu akambotamba nhabvu kana ane nhorondo yekutungamira mutambo uyu. Asi VaChiyangwa vari kuti vane mari yekukwanisa kusandura zviri kuitika munhabvu muZimbabwe. Asi vaimbove murairidzi wemaWarriors, VaMisheck Chidzambwa, vanoti kunofanira kusatariswa zvemari asi kuti munhu ane ruzivo rwenhabvu here uye kutungamira zvinhu zvinobudirira munyika. Nhengo yeZimbabwe National Soccer Supporters Association, VaStanford Makwiro, vanoti hakudiwe munhu anoti anobuditsa mari yake yemohumwe yekuburitsa Zifa mumadhaka airi, asi kuti munhu anokwanisa kuti Zifa ishande zvisina huori mukati. Muteveri weDynamos, VaPeter Mukweva, vanoti nhabvu muAfrica iri kufa nemhaka yekuisa pazvinzvimbo vanhu vasingazive zvemutambo uyu. Vachitaura nevamwe vavo pane imwe nzvimbo yavanga vachitandara, VaMukweva vakati zviri kuda kuitwa munhabvu muZimbabwe zvakafanana nezviri kuitwa muAfrica umo vanoti nhabvu yawira pasi vachitarisa kubudirira kwayo kuEurope neku South America. VaJosiah Munetsi, avo vanove nhengo yerimwe sangano revatsigiri vemaWarriors, reWarriors Fan Club, vanoti munhabvu hamudiwe munhu anonzi ane mari sezvo Zifa iine mari yayo kudhara. Pari zvino vaimbotambira maWarriors, VaJames Takavada, naVa Alexander Maseko, ndivo chete vabuda pachena kuti vari kuda kukwikwidzana naVa Chiyangwa. Benjani Mwaruwari, uyo anga achitarisirwawo kukwikwidza chinzvimbo ichi, anonzi ari kuzvipira kuve mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenhabvu muZimbabwe. Vanga vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weZifa, VaOmega Sibanda, vanotiwo vari kukwikwidza chigaro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiri weZifa. Vese vari kuda kukwikwidza vanofanira kuve vanyoresa mazita avo 12 dzemanheru eChina dzisati dzadarika. Vaendesa magwaro ayo kusvika pari zvino ndiVaChiyangwa, VaSibanda, vaimbove nhengo ye Zifa Board, Va Trevor Carlise pamwe nemutauriri weguta reHarare, Va Leslie Gwindi. Hazvisati zvazivikanwa kana VaMaseko naMwaruwari vasvitsawo magwaro avo. Sarudzo yemutunganiri weZifa iri kuitwa musi wa 5 Zvita.

headline: Manica Diamonds yadzinga Nhumwa
text: CHIKWATA chenhabvu cheManica Diamonds nhasi chadzinga basa murairidzi wacho Johanisi Nhumwa pamwe chete nevatevedzeri vake vose.   Nhumwa adzingwa basa zvichitevera kukundwa kwakaita Manica Diamonds nezuro neDynamos FC 1-0 uye asiya chikwata ichi chakagara pechi10 palog kubva mumitambo 29 yachatamba mwaka uno.   Chinyorwa chabva kuManica Diamonds chinoti, “Manica Diamonds Football Club inoda kuzivisa vose vainoshanda nayo kuti taparadzana nemuridzi wedu, Johanisi Nhumwa nevatevedzeri vake.   “Tinotenda zvikuru nebasa ravakaita kuchikwata chedu saka tinovashuvira rombo rakanaka mune remangwana ravo.” Manica Diamonds yabva yatsiva Nhumwa naJairosi Tapera uyo achange achitevedzerwa naTafadzwa Mashiri, Patrick Mandizha, Thembinkosi SIbanda nevamwe.

headline: TAMIRIRA CHAN, COSAFA: MHOFU
text: MURAIRIDZI wechikwata chenhabvu chenyika chemaWarriors – Sunday “Mhofu” Chidzambwa anoti panguva ino ave kumbomira kufunga zvemakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations (Afcon) asi kurwira kuchengetedza mukombe weCosafa Senior Men’s Challenge Cup uye nekuenda kumutambo we2020 African Nations Championship (CHAN).   Svondo radarika, maWarriors akabudirira kuenda kumutambo weAfcon uyo uchaitirwa kuEgypt kutanga musi wa21 Chikumi uchizopera musi wa19 Chikunguru.   Chikwata chenyika ichi chakarakasha Congo-Brazzaville 2-0 zvakaita kuti chipedze chiri pamusoro muboka racho  muGroup G.   Aka kachange kari kechina maWarriors achienda kumutambo uyu.   Gore rino, zvakawanda zviri kutarisirwa kubva kumaWarriors kuAfcon sezvo makore adarika paakamboenda kumakwishu aya aingokundirwa muchikamu chekutanga.   Mhofu anoti panguva ino ave kumbomira kufunga zveAfcon sezvo chikwata chake chine mimwe mitambo ikoshosha iri kutevera yeCosafa neCHAN.   “Zvinhu zvinofadza kuti tiri kuenda kuAfcon zvakare asi panguva ino tave kufunga zvemimwe mitambo iri kutevera yeCosafa neCHAN.   “Tisu shasha dzeCosafa saka tinoda kurwira kuchengetedza mukombe wedu uyu munguva inotevera apo pachatambwa mutambo uyu,” anodaro.   Anoti mitambo yeCosafa neCHAN anoda kuishandisa kuongorora vatambi – kunyanya vanotambira nhabvu yavo muligi reCastle Premiership – ovapawo mukana wekurwira zvinzvimbo zvakasiyana muchikwata icho achazotakura kuenda nacho kuEgypt.   “Vatambi vatichasarudza kuenda navo kuCosafa neCHAN tinoda kuvapa mukana wekurwira zvinzvimbo muchikwata chevakuru icho chatichatakura kuenda nacho kuAfcon.   “Hatisati tave nechikwata chatichatakura kuenda kumutambo uyu, tichiri kuongorora vatambi vese uye vamwe vasina kumbobvira vambotamba vanogona kutokwana tikaenda navo,” anodaro.   Mutambo weCHAN unotambwa nevatambi vanotambira munyika dzavo chete.   MaWarriors haasati ambohwina mutambo uyu asi mugore ra2014 akasvika kusemi-fainari yemakwishu aya apo airairidzwa naIan “Dibango” Gorowa.   Mhofu anoti zvinonetsa kuti maWarriors ahwine mukombe uyu sezvo pese pavanenge vavaka chikwata chakasimba chinenge chichirwira kuenda kumutambo uyu, vamwe vatambi vanobva vatengwa kunze kwenyika saka zvinotoda kuti vabike vechidiki vakawanda.    Sunday Chidzambwa   “CHAN inonetsa kuti pese patinenge taruka chikwata chedu chevatambi vemuno, tave kugadzirira mumwe mutambi anobva abva atengwa kunze kwenyika, oenda kunotambira kunze. Saka zvinokanganisa gadziriro dzedu dzatinenge tichiita.   “Saka vechidiki ngavabikwe kuti zvisazotinetsa kutsvaga vamwe vatambi vekutsiva vanenge vabva,” anodaro.   Zvakadai, mutambo wemaWarriors neCongo-Brazzaville wainge wakazara nhandare zvekuti pane fungidziro huru kuti sangano rinotungamira nhabvu reZimbabwe Football Association rakaita mari kubva pamutambo uyu.   Mukushi wemashoko weZifa – Xolisani Gwesela – anoti vachiri kumboverenga kuti matikiti akatengwa mangani uye vachabvisa dhora patikiti roga roga rakatengwa voendesa kunobatsira mhuri dzakasangana nemafashamu emvura yaive nedutu guru yeCyclone Idai.   “Tichiri kumboverenga matikiti edu tione kuti akatengwa mangani uye isu tichabvisa dhora rimwe patikiti rese rakatengwa toenda kunobatsira vanhu vakasangana nemafashamu eCyclone Idai iyo yakauraya vanhu kunzvimbo dzakaita seChimanimani,” anodaro Gwesela.

headline: Mitambo yekuEngland yamiswa
text: MITAMBO yeEngland Premier League yesvondo rino yamiswa nhasi zvichitevera kufa kwaQueen Elizabeth II nezuro manheru.   Great Britain yapinda mumazuva 10 ekuchema mambokadzi avo vakatonga nyika iyi kwemakore anodarika 70. Izvi zvaona England Football Association (FA) ichimisa mitambo yose yenhabvu yemuEngland yange ichazotambwa svondo rino.   Muchinyorwa chaburitswa neEngland FA inoti: “Zvichitevera musangano wataita nhasi mangwanani, zvikwata zvemuPremier League zvacherechedza Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II.   “Senzira yekukudza upenyu hwavo uhwo hwaive hwakatikoshera nenyika yedu uye senzira yekuvaremekedza, mitambo yesvondo rino yePremier League yambomiswa kusanganisira yemusi weMuvhuro.”

headline: Vodzidziswa nezveMixed Martial Arts
text: VARAIRIDZI veMixed Martial Arts (MMA) vemuno vachawaniswa mukana wekudzidziswa zvizere ruzivo rwemutambo uyu apo vari kurongerwa zvidzidzo nesangano reZimbabwe National Boxing and Wrestling Control (ZNBWC) iro riri kuunza nyanzvi dzemutambo uyu dzekunze kwenyika.   MMA mumwe wemitambo iri kusimukira zvikuru pasi rose uye une mukurumbira kunyika dzakawanda nekudaro ZNBWC yakabatana neMixed Martial Arts South Africa iyo ichatumira nyanzvi muno kuzodzidzisa nezvemutambo uyu.   Mumashoko aakaverengerwa svondo rino muHarare naSharon Dube anove mutauriri weZNBWC apo paiparurwa chirongwa ichi, chamangwiza weZNBWC — Lawrence Zimbudzana — anoti MMA mutambo uri kufarirwa zvikuru pasi rose.   “Makore adarika tikatarisisa zvikuru, MMA mutambo uri kukura chaizvo kunyika dzakawanda uye unoteverwa zvakanyanya.   Saka isu tiri kutora chikamu chekuuunza muno.   “Musi wa29 na30 Gumiguru tichaita zvidzidzo muHarare apo tichaunza shasha dzine hunyanzvi mumutambo uyu kuzopakurira ruzivo rwavo,” anodaro Zimbudzana.   Pari zvino Zimbabwe ine vatambi vaviri vari kukwikwidza mumutambo uyu vanoti Themba Gorimbo anove Sportsman of the Year naSylvester Chipfumbi uyo akanyorawo nhoroondo yekuve shasha ahwina bhande reExtreme Fighting Championship Bantamweight munaChivabvu.   Zimbudzana anoti zvichitevera kubudirira kwaita vatambi vaviri ava, ZNBWC yazviona zvakakodzera kusimudzira mutambo uyu nekuushambadza zvakanyanya munyika kuitira kupawo mukana kune vatambi vangade kuzoutamba.   “Zvinofadza kuti tine shasha mbiri dziri kukwikwidza kune dzimwe nyika, saka izvi zvimwe zvezvikonzero zvakatituma kuti tisumudzire mutambo uyu zvigopawo mikana kune vamwe vatambi vangade kukwikwidza,” anodaro.   Kana varairidzi vemutambo uyu vadzidziswa, ZNBWC iri kuronga kutanga mitambo yeMMA muna2022.

headline: Garai kumba:ZIFA
text: MANEJA wechikwata chenhabvu chenyika chemaWarriors — Wellington Mpandare — oyambira vatsigiri vangade kuenda kunoona mutambo weZimbabwe neAlgeria uyo uchatambirwa muno nemusi weMuvhuro unotevera wekurwira kuenda kumutambo we2021 Africa Cup of Nations kuti vasaende kunhandare asi kuti vaone mutambo uyu vari kudzimba dzavo.   MaWarriors nemaDesert Foxes ekuAlgeria, iyo ine vatambi vane mukurumbira vakaita saRiyad Mahrez anotambira Manchester City yekuEngland naIsmael Bennacer weAC Milan (Italy), vari kusangana mumitambo miviri yemuboka ravo reGroup H.   Mutambo wekutanga uriko husiku hwemusi weChina chino kuAlgeria uye wechipiri uchange uri muno kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium nemusi weMuvhuro unotevera.   Boka iri rine zvimwe zvikwata zvinoti Botswana neZambia.   Mitambo miviri yevakomana vaZdravko Logarusic, murairidzi wemaWarriors, neAlgeria yakakosha zvikuru uye vanofanirwa kutora zvibodzwa zvose kuti vaende pamusoro muboka ravo iri vagowana mukana wekuenda kumakwikwi e2021 Africa Cup of Nations ayo achaitirwa kuCameroon.   Mutambo wemaWarriors wemusi weMuvhuro uchange uri wekutanga kutambirwa munyika muno kubva pakamiswa mitambo pasi rose nechinangwa chekurwisa kupararira kweCovid-19.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza svondo rino, maWarriors asati asimuka akananga kuAlgeria, Mpandare anoti vatsigiri venhabvu havasi kutenderwa kunhandare kuchange kuchitambwa mutambo uyu muno.   “Vatsigiri venhabvu havasi kutenderwa kunhandare saka ngavagare kudzimba dzavo. Nemusi weMuvhuro patiri kusangana neAlgeria muno hakuna ari kutenderwa kuuya kuzoona nhabvu, mutambo uyu uchatambwa pasina vatsigiri.   “Isu tiri kutevedzera matanho akatorwa neHurumende, hatidi kuisa utano hwevatambi vedu nehweruzhinji panjodzi saka vanhu ngavagare kudzimba dzavo,” anodaro Mpandare.   Anoenderera mberi achiti, “Ngatisazoti hatina kupa yambiro, kuchange kune vemitemo vachichengetedza vachiona kuti hapana ari kupinda munhandare.”   Zvakadaro, sangano revatsigiri vemaWarriors reFriends of the Warriors rinoti riri kuronga nzvimbo dzichaonerwa bhora nevatsigiri nemusi weMuvhuro.   Mutungamiri wesangano iri — Edward Chimedza — anoti sezvo kunhandare kusiri kutenderwa kuti vanhu vapinde, sevatsigiri vari kutsvaga nzvimbo dzichaungana vanhu  vasingadarike 100 kuitira kuti vakwanise kuona mutambo uyu pamaterevhizheni.   “Isu tinoziva kukosha kwemitambo miviri iyi saka tiri kuitawo zvatinokwanisa kuti titsigire chikwata chedu. Tichaungana sevatsigiri kunzvimbo dzakasiyana uko tinenge tichitevedzera hedu mitemo yese yesocial-distancing kuti vanhu vasaite chitsoko-tsoko.   “Saka tine nzvimbo dzakawanda dzatichange tichishanda nadzo. Vakomana vedu vanofanira kuziva kuti tinavo uye tiri kuvatsigira, ivo ngavabate basa sebasa,” anodaro Chimedza.   Mumitambo mina yakapedzisira kusangana zvikwata zviviri izvi, maWarriors haasati ambokundwa neAlgeria.   Zvikwata izvi zvakaita mangange katatu uye maWarriors akahwina mumwe mutambo wacho.

headline: ‘Onai COSAFA muri kumba’
text: VATSIGIRI vechikwata chenhabvu cheZimbabwe Warriors vanokurudzirwa kuti vatevedzere mitemo yenyika neyeWorld Health Organization (WHO) iyo yakananga kuderedza kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 uye kuti vasaungane panguva iyo vachaona chikwata chavo chichikwikwidza mumitambo yeCosafa Cup iri kuitirwa kuSouth Africa.   Mitambo yeCosafa Cup yakatanga svondo rino uye maWarriors ari kurwira kuhwina mukombe uyu kechinomwe zvekare kuudzora kumusha kubva gore ra2018.   Kusvika pari zvino, maWarriors ndiwo akahwina mikombe yakawanda kudarika zvimwe zvikwata achiteverwa neZambia iyo yakwanisa kuhwina mukombe iwoyu kashanu.   Achitaura svondo rino, mutungamiri weFriends of the Warriors – Edward Chimedza – anoti ino haisisi nguva yekuti vatsigiri venhabvu vaungane vachiona pazvivhitivhiti mitambo iri kuitirwa kuSouth Africa sezvo zvichizokonzera kuti Covid-19 itapuriranwe pakati pevanhu.   “Chikumbiro changu kune vatsigiri venhabvu, ndapota ngatisanungane sezvataiita kare nekuti Covid-19 iri kuuraya. Kare taingonzwa kuti chirwere ichi chiriko kune vamwe vanenge vane hama dzavo dzabatwa kana kuuraiwa nacho, asi iye zvino chave kuuraya hama dzedu dzepedyo muno.   “Saka ngationei mitambo tiri kudzimba dzedu tichitsigira chikwata chedu tichienda padandemutande pakaita seTwitter neFacebook tichitumira mashoko esimbaradzo ipapo. Hatidi vanoungana nekuti mhando itsva yeCovid-19 iyo iri kunzi Delta variant iri kuuraya uye haisi kutambisa.   “Hatidi kurasikirwa nehama dzakawanda, ngatigare kudzimba dzedu toona mitambo tiri ikoko,” anodaro Chimedza.   Anoenderera achiti zvakakosha kuti vatsigiri venhabvu vaende kunobaiwa nhomba kana kuti majekiseni ekudzivirira Covid-19 sezvo iyi iri iyo imwe yenzira dzinobatsira.   “Ngatiite mudungwe wekuenda kunobaiwa nhomba nekuti zvinobatsira kudzivirira chirwere ichi. Kana tichida kuzowana mukana wekuona zvikwata zvedu zvichikwikwidza, ngatifarirei kubaiwa, ngatiite mudungwe wekunobaiwa,” anodaro Chimedza.   Achitaurawo, mutsigiri mukuru wenhabvu Adomsi Mukwasi, anoti kana zvichibvira dai mapurisa afamba achiongorora munzvimbo sedzekutandarira kuti vanhu havasi kuungana here izvo zvisingatenderwe achiti kazhinji panowanzotamba chikwata chenyika, vanhu vanofarisa vachida kuona chikwata chavo chichitamba.   “Chikwata chedu tinochidisisa zvikuru zvekuti tinoda kuona mitambo yacho takawanda. Asi iye zvino dai tambogara kudzimba nekuti Covid-19 haina kumira zvakanaka, vanhu vari kufa.   “Kuti tikunde denda iri tinofanira kutevedzera zvinotaurwa neHurumende yedu togara kudzimba tichitsigira chikwata chedu.   “Tine mapoka akawanda eWhatsApp anoita nezvenhabvu, imomo ngatinge tichikurukura tichiongorora matambiro anenge achiita chikwata chedu kwete kuungana.   “Kuungana imhosva huru, ndapota hangu ngatigare kudzimba,” anodaro Mukwasi.   Achitaurawo, munyori mukuru weFriends of the Warriors – Zivanai Muwashu – anoti zvinorwadza kuti chikwata chavo chakaenda kumakwikwi aya chisina vatsigiri, asi vanofanira kutevedzera mitemo iripo ine chekuita nedenda reCovid-19 kuitira kuti zvigobatsira kuponesa upenyu hweveruzhinji.   Anoti naizvozvo vatsigiri vanofanira kubatana mukuisa minamato kuti maWarriors agohwina kuSouth Africa.   “Cosafa yagara ndeyedu makore ose, saka tinoziva kuti maWarriors achadadisa kumutambo uyu. Isu sevatsigiri, ngatinamatire chikwata chedu kuti chigokunda mukombe uuye kumusha,” anodaro Muwashu.   Zvakadaro, maWarriors akavhurira mitambo yawo yeCosafa apo akasangana neMozambique. Mutambo wavo unotevera achasangana neMalawai musi weChishanu.   Mutevedzeri waZdravko “Loga” Logarusic, Tonderayi Ndiraya ndiye ange achifanorairidza maWarriors sezvo Loga ange arambidzwa kupinda munyika yeSouth Africa nekuti ange asina magwaro akakwanana (visa).   Asi Loga akazopihwa zvake visa rekuti atevere chikwata chake kuSouth Africa.

headline: Pane Chikwata chemuAfrica Chichaenderera Mberi muWorld Cup Here?
text: Kunyangwe hazvo pasina chikwata chemuAfrica chati chatiora mapoinzi matatu kumakwikwi eWorld Cup, vazhinji munyika vachiine tarisiro yekuti zvikwata zvishanu zviri kumiririra Africa zvichaenderera mberi muchikamu chechipiri chemakundano aya. Africa iri kumiririrwa kumakwikwi aya neSenegal, Ghana, Cameroon, Tunisia neMorocco. Mumitambo yekutanga, Senegal yakarohwa 2-0 neNetherlands, Tunisia yakaita mangange 0-0 neDenmark, Morocco yakaita mangange 0-0 neCroatia. Izvi zvasiya vatsigiri venhabvu vekuAfrica vazhinji vachibvunza kuti zvikwata zvishanu zvinobva kuAfrica zvichakwanisa kuenderera mberi here sezvo parizvino pasina zvikwata zvati zvakwanisa kukunda. Asi muongorori wenhau dzemitambo Muziwethu Hadebe anoti ane chivimbo chekuti zvikwata zvekuAfrica zvinokwanisa kuenderera mberi kubva kuma Group stages nekuti zviri kutamba nemoyo wese kunyangwe hazvo zvisati zvakunda pamitambo yatambwa parizvino. "Vatsigiri vezhinji venhabvu vari munyika vazhinji vanoti shuwiro yavo ndeyekuti zvikwata zvemu Africa zvienderere mberi kubva pama group stages mumakwikwi e FIFA World Cup 2022 kuQatar. Kunyangwe hazvo vasati vakunda mumitambo yatambwa kumakwikwi aya ndine tarisiro yekuti vachienderera mberi," Hadebe audza Studio 7. No media source currently available

headline: PSL yotanga August
text: SANGANO rePremier Soccer League iro rinoronga mitambo yeCastle Premiership rinoti riri kuronga kuti kutanga mwaka unotevera nhabvu yemuno igotanga kutambwa kubva munaNyamavhuvhu ichizopera Chivabvu wegore rinenge richitevera ra2020.   Kubva kare, nhabvu yemuno inotambwa kutanga munaKurume ichizopera munaMbudzi asi kuuya kwasachigaro mutsva wePSL Farai Jere kwakaona pachisimuka nyaya iyi yekuti karenda yenhabvu yemuno ishandurwe igotanga munaNyamavhuvhu yofambirana neyekunze kwenyika, kunyanya yekuEurope iyo inotanga munaNyamavhuvhu ichizopera munaChivabvu wegore rinotevera.   Mukushi wemashoko wePSL, Kudzai Bare anoti sangano ravo rakanyorera kuZimbabwe Football Association richivazivisa kuti kutanga gore rinotevera vanoda kushandura mwaka wenhabvu kuti utange munaNyamavhuvhu uye vakamirira kunzwa kwavari kuti vofamba nenzira ipi.   “Kutaura kuno tinotevedzera zvatinenge tarairwa neZifa, takanyorera tichivazivisa kuti tave kuda kushandura mwaka wedu.   “Saka kana vati zvakanaka tiendere mberi ndipo patichashandura karenda yedu yenhabvu kutanga gore rinotevera,” anodaro Bare.   Mukushi wemashoko weZifa Xolisani Gwesela anoti sangano ravo riri kuziva nezvenyaya iyi uye richazeya nezvayo apo richaita congress yaro svondo rino.   Anoti parizvino hapana zvizhinji zvaanokwanisa kutaura pamusoro penyaya iyi.   “Iyi nyaya tiri kuiziva, tangomirira congress yedu ndipo tichaizeya toona kuti tofamba nenzira ipi.   “Congress yedu iriko musi wa15 Zvita saka kana zuva iri radarika ndipo tichazivisa kuti zvichafambiswa sei,” anodaro Gwesela.   Kana zvikanzi zvashanduka kutanga gore rinotevera mwaka wenhabvu wave kutambwa kubva Nyamavhuvhu uchipera munaChivabvu, pane mibvunzo yakwanda iri pamiromo yevatsigiri venhabvu iyo inoda mhinduro.   Mubvunzo wekutanga ndewekuti panguva iyi mvura inenge ichinaya saka PSL iri kuronga zvipi kugadzirisa dambudziko iri remvura kuitira kuti zvikwata zvitambe zvakasununguka uye vatsigiri vasanaiwe nemvura?   Mumwe mubvunzo ndewekuti sezvo panguva iyi zvakare ndipo panenge pachitambwa nhabvu kuEurope saka PSL  haizotorerwa vatsigiri vayo here vachiona zvikwata zvavanofarira paterevhizheni votadza kuenda kunhandare?   Bare anoti mibvunzo yose iyi vachazoipundura hunge kana vanzwa zvichabva kuZifa pamusoro penyaya iyi.

headline: ‘Hakuna DeMbare yakadaro’
text: MUTAMBI wenhabvu weDynamos FC, Kudzanayi Dhemere, anoti matambiro akaita chikwata chavo mwaka wadarika haana kufadza izvo zvakachiona chichipedza chiri pechipfumbamwe palog reCastle Premiership.   Zvikuru zvaitarisirwa kubva kuDeMbare nevatambi vayo vanosanganisira Dhemere, Ngandu “Moto-moto” Mangala naEdward Sadomba asi yakakundikana kurwira mukombe wePSL.   Izvi zvakaona chikwata ichi chichishandura murairidzi wacho mwaka uri pakati apo pakadzingwa Lloyd “Mablanyo” Chigowe akatsiviwa naTonderayi Ndiraya.   Ndiraya akakwanisa kudzikamisa chikwata ichi  akachitungamira chikapedza chiri pechipfumbamwe palog.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Dhemere – uyo vazhinji vaitarisira zvikuru kwaari kuti ndiye mumwe wevatambi vachatungamira chikwata ichi kurwira mukombe wePSL – anoti gore radarika harina kufamba sezvavaifungira.   Anoti vanofanirwa kutokunya dzisimbe mwaka uri kutevera kuitira kuti DeMbare idzokere pachidanho chayo chakare apo yaizezesa munyaya dzenhabvu munyika muno.   “Patakapedza tiri hapasipo pataida kupedza tiri. Gore rino range riri rekudzidza uye takadzidza zvakawanda,” anodaro.   Kupera kwemwaka wadarika kwakaonawo kondirakiti yake kuDeMbare ichipera uye anoti ari kutarisira kuti apihwe imwe gore rino apo anoda kushanda nesimba.   “Izvezvi handizive kuti ndiri kuita sei asi chishuvo changu kuti ndirambe ndiri kuDeMbare, ndipihwe imwe kondirakiti uye kana ndapihwa ndichashanda nesimba ndigobatsira chikwata chedu tirwire mukombe wePSL. Ichi chishuvo chezvikwata zvese zvinokwikwidza muPSL uye isu tinofanirwa kuonekwa tiripo tichirwirawo mukombe mukuru muno munyika,” anodaro Dhemere.   DeMbare yakapedzisira kusimudza mukombe weCastle Premiership mugore ra2014 apo yairairidzwa naKalisto Pasuwa.   Kubva kwakaita Pasuwa kuchikwata ichi, hachina kuzombohwina mukombe uyu zvakare kunyangwe hazvo makore matatu anoti 2015 na2017 chaipedza chiri pechipiri palog.

headline: Batsirai chikwata chemaWarriors
text: KOMITI iri kuunganidza mari yekutsigira chikwata chenhabvu chenyika cheZimbabwe Warriors — icho chatove kunyika yeEgypt chichigadzirira kukwikiwdza mumitambo yeAfrica Cup of Nations (Afcon) – yeWarriors 2019 Fund Raising Committee, iri kukumbira makambani, mapoka akasiyana neveruzhinji kuti vabatsire mukuunganidzwa kwemari inosvika US$500 000.   Mutungamiri wenyika President Mnangagwa vakadoma komiti iyi yechinangwa chekuti iunganidze mari ichashandiswa nechikwata chenyika ichi mumakwikwi ari kutanga nemusi weChishanu svondo rinouya, 21 Chikumi.   Musi uyu, nenguva dza10 manheru, Zimbabwe ichatatsurana neEgypt mumutambo wekuzarura makwikwi aya.   Sachigaro wekomiti yeWarriors Communications Sub-Committee, Dr Eve Gadzikwa, vanoti mari iri kudiwa ichabatsira pakutsigira maWarriors mukunomiririra Zimbabwe kwavari kuita.   “Sekomiti, tiri kumhanya-mhanya kutsvaga mari nekudaro tinokumbira makambani neveruzhinji kuti vatsigire maWarriors. Ndinoda kuzivisa nyika kuti mari yose yatichaunganidza ichashanda basa rayo chairo uye nenzira dzakajeka. Tinozviziva kuti tinofanirwa kuita zvinhu zvine chiremerera kuitira kuti tigoramba tichitsigirwa.   “Tiri kuedza kuunganidza mari inosvika US$500 000 yekutsigira maWarriors. Rutsigiro rwedu rwunovapa simba rekutamba bhora nesimba, saka chikumbiro chedu kumunhu wose ndechekuti ngatibatane tibatsire nemari kana zvimwe zvatinokwanisa,” vanodaro Dr Gadzikwa.   Nemusi weChitatu chino, kwakaitwa mabiko muguta reHarare ekuparura kuunganidzwa kwemari yekutsigira maWarriors.

headline: Martinez anoda kugara pasi naRonaldo
text: wePortugal, Roberto Martinez, akazivisa chinangwa chake chekuda kugara pasi naCristiano Ronaldo kuti vakurukure nezveramangwana rake kuchikwata ichi sezvo zvisingaizivikanwe kuti anoda kuita sei nePortugal zvichitevera kupera kweWorld Cup.   Ronaldo akasiiwa naFernando Santos mumitambo yePortugal yemaknockout kuQatar asi aimbove murairidzi weBelgium uyu anosimbirira kuti anoda kutaura nemutambi uyu zvichitevera kugadzwa kwaakaitwa.   Martinez akagadzwa kuve murairidzi mutsva wePortugal nemusi weMuvhuro sezvo ange amboita chibvumirano chemuromo chete zvisinei nekutatarika kwaakaita kuWorld Cup neBelgium.   Anonzi achaedza kutaura nemutambi mutsva weAl-Nassr uyu. Achitaura nevatori venhau kekutanga abva kugadzwa semurairidzi, Martinez anotaura nezvechinangwa chake chekuumba chikwata chakasimba vachienda kumberi.   “Matanho anotorwa munhandare,’’ anodaro.    Cristiano Ronaldo   “Ini handitore matanho muhofisi. Ndinovimba ndichataura nevatambi vese.   “Cristiano Ronaldo mutambi aripowo ipapo. Ave nemakore 19 ari muchikwata chenyika.   “Ndinovimba tinogona kugara naye pasi toumba chikwata chakasimba. Izuva rekugutsikana kukuru, asi mangwana tichatanga kuita basa.” – SportsMail Football

headline: ‘Zifa ngaibude pachena’
text: MURAIRIDZI weFC Platinum — Norman ‘Muchina wemajuzi’ Mapeza — anoti hutungamiriri hwenhabvu yemuno hweZIFA hunofanira kutaura chokwadi maringe nemamiriro emutambo uyu sezvo hupenyu hwevatambi vazhinji hwakanganisika.   Izvi zvinotevera kumiswa kwakaitwa nhabvu nemimwe mitambo munyika muno muna Kurume gore rapera senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Mapeza anoti ZIFA ngaitaure chokwadi kuti iri kuronga zvipi pamusoro pekudzoka kwemutambo uyu. “Vakomana vazhinji venhabvu vange vachiraramisa mhuri dzavo kuburikidza nemari dzavange vachiwana kubva kunhabvu asi iye zvino havana chekubata sezvo mutambo uyu usiri kutambwa. Kana vakomana vakasatamba nhabvu havawane mari yekuti vakwanise kutengera mhuri dzavo chikafu chekudya kumba. Saka nhabvu ikasadzoka nekuchimbidza zvinoramba zvichivaomera vakomana ava.   “Tiri kushaya kuti chii chaizvo chiri kukonesa kuti mutambo uyu udzoswe muno munyika medu, kune dzimwe nyika uri kutambwa asi muno chete ndimo mauchiri wakamiswa. Izvi zviri kukanganisa zvakawanda.   “Saka ZIFA ngaitaure chokwadi kuti zvinhu zviri kufamba sei chaizvo vanhu vazive pane kungotsika-tsika zvavari kuita izvi,” anodaro Mapeza. Svondo rapera, mutauriri weZIFA Xolisani Gwesela akaudza Kwayedza kuti sangano ravo rakanyorera kuHurumende richikumbira bvumo yekuti mutambo wenhabvu uchidzoka uye vachakamirira mhinduro yacho. Chikwata cheFC Platinum chiri kukwikwidza mumitambo yeCAF Confederations Cup umo chiri kurwira kuenda kumagroup stages kunyangwe hazvo chisiri kunyatsowana nguva yekugadzirira. Mapeza anoti mutambi wenhabvu anofanirwa kugara achitamba svondo rega-rega.   “Igaroziva kuti mutambi hunyanzvi hwake hunonyatsobuda kana akaita nguva achitamba nhabvu, anenge asina ngura yekugara nguva yakareba asingatambe.   “Manje isu tiri kupedza nguva tisingatambe nhabvu nekuti ligi remuno rakamiswa, tiri kuzongonokwikwidza mumitambo yemuAfrica. Vatambi vedu vanenge vasina kusvika padanho chairo rinotarisirwa rekukwikwidza sezvo vanenge vagara nguva refu vasina kukwikwidza. Saka dai nhabvu yemuno yange ichitambwa, zvaibatsira zvikuru mumitambo yedu nekuti vatambi vedu vanenge vasina ngura,” anodaro. Mapeza anoti anotyirawo vatambi vechidiki avo vave nemakore maviri vasingatambe nhabvu kuti remangwana ravo rinogona kukanganisika.   “Moziva, vechidiki iye zvino vave kukanganiswa nezvinodhaka nekuti vari kuswera vachingomberereka kumaraini vasina zvekuita, ndipo vanopedzisira vave kutora zvinodhaka,” anodaro.   Chikwata chaMapeza chakasimuka nemusi weChipiri chakananga kuSenegal uko chiri kunosangana necheAssociation Sportive et Culturelle Diaraf (ASC Diaraf) mumutambo wechipiri wekurwira kufambira mberi muCAF Confederation Cup.   Mumutambo wekutanga wakatambirwa muno kuNational Sports Stadium, FC Platinum yakakundwa 1-0 saka iri kufanirwa kunohwina 2-0 kana nezvimwe zvibodzwa zvepamusoro, ASC Diaraf isinganwise, kuti chigogona kufambira mberi mumutambo uyu.   Mapeza anoti kunyangwe hake chikwata chake chakakundwa muno, havasi kurasa tariro uye vari kuenda kuSenegal vane chivimbo chekuti vachanohwina.   “Isu hatirase tariro, tinotamba mitambo yese kuti tihwine uye ndizvo zvatiri kuenda kunoita kuSenegal. Kana ivo vakahwina muno, hapana chinotitadzisa kuti tinohwinawo ikoko,” anodaro Mapeza.

headline: Kuzunza mambure konetsa
text: 2017: 17; 2018: 17   Abel Ndooka MUMAKORE masere adarika, zvikwata zvinokwikwidza muCastle Premiership zviri kukundikana kubika mutambi anokwanisa kunwisa ka20 mumwaka mumwe chete.   Izvi zvakapedzisirwa kuitwa mugore ra2010 apo Norman Maroto – uyo aitambira Gunners FC – akanwisa ka22 ndokuhwina mubairo weGolden boot.   Kubva gore iri, hapanazve mumwe mutambi akwanisa kuzviita uye mwaka uno Rodwell Chinyengetere weFC Platinum – shasha dzeCastle Premiership – ndiye akahwina mubairo uyu asi akakwanisa kunwisa ka17 chete mwaka wese.   Gore radarika, Dominic Chungwa akanwisawo ka17 zvakare achitambira CAPS UNITED.   Muhurukuro nevamwe varairidzi, vanoti kuti muCastle Premiership munyatsobude mutambi anonwisa ka20 kana kudarika mumwaka mumwe chete zvinogona kuti netsei nekuti vatambi vacho hakuna.

headline: Zvinhu zvakasunga: Ndiraya
text: MURAIRIDZI weDynamos FC, Tonderai ‘Stanza’ Ndiraya, anoti mwaka wegore rino wakaoma zvikuru sezvo zvikwata zvose zvinokwikwidza muCastle Premiership zviri kutamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura.   DeMbare, iyo yakapedzisira kuhwina mukombe wePSL mugore ra2014 ichirairidzwa naKalisto Pasuwa, mwaka uno yatanga zvakanaka mumitambo yayo apo iri kuda kuhwina mukombe uyu kekutanga mumakore matanhatu.   Pari zvino chikwata ichi chakagara pechitatu nezvibodzwa 16 palog kubva mumitambo misere yachatamba uye chiri kutevera Chicken Inn iyo iri kutungamira neManica Diamond iri pechipiri.   Ndiraya anoti ari kuyemura nhabvu inodakadza iri kutambwa nezvikwata zvakasiyana zviri muPSL kunyangwe hazvo pasati patambwa mitambo yakawanda.   “Kutanga kwakaita mwaka wegore rino, zvikwata zvose zviri kutamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura iyo tiri kuona svondo rega-rega. Ini pachangu ndiri kuyemura nhabvu yandiri kuona ichitambwa kunyangwe hazvo mitambo yatambwa kusvika pari zvino ichiri yekutanga,” anodaro.   Apo mitambo yakambomiswa pazororo reKirisimasi, DeMbare yakatenga vatambi vane chitsama vakadai saEvans Katema, Ralph Kawondera, Keith Murera, Emmanuel Paga naIssa Sadiki. Ndiraya ari kurumbidza vatambi ava achiti vachabatsira kusimbisa chikwata chake apo mwaka uno vari kurwa semvumba kuti vagotora mukombe wePSL.   “Zvamunoziva kuti Dynamos tinotambira kuhwina mikombe yese yenhabvu uye gore rino ndizvo zvimwe chetezve. Tinofanirwa kutamba chaizvo kuti zvikwanisike saka tinenge tichitora mutambo sekuuya kwaunenge uchiita. Nevatambi vatsva vatakaunza muchikwata chedu avo vakatanga zvakanaka, tinovimba kuti vachatibatsira kuti tirambe tichisimukira tichihwina mitambo yedu,” anodaro Ndiraya.   DeMbare iri kusangana nechikwata cheSunshine City Boys cheHarare City nemusi weSvondo kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium mumutambo weHarare Derby. Zvikwata zvizviri izvi pazvakapedzisira kusangana mumutambo wePSL mugore ra2019, Harare City yakahwina 3-1.   Asi, gore radarika zvakambosangana mumutambo weChibuku Super Cup apo Dynamos yakahwina wekutanga 1-0 uye wechipiri ukazopera ari mangange 0-0.

headline: MaChevrons opinda muhondo
text: CHIKWATA chenyika cheCricket chemaChevrons chiri kupinda muhondo svondo rino apo chichatanga kubandana necheIreland mumitambo mishanu yeTwenty20 International Series nemitatu yeOne Day International (ODI) iyo ichange iri yeInternational Cricket Council (ICC) Men’s Cricket World Cup Super League.   Mitambo yeICC Super League ndeyekurwira tikiti rekuenda kuICC Cricket World Cup iyo ichatambirwa kunyika yeIndia mugore ra2023.   Zvikwata zvichapedza zviri pamusoro muTop 8 zvinobva zvabudirira kuenda kuWorld Cup asi zvinosara zvinenge zvave kuenda nenzira yekutamba mimwe mitambo yemaqualifiers iyo inozorongwa patsva neICC.   Saka maChevrons ari kutofanirwa kuhwina mitambo yawo yeSuper League kuti agowana tikiti rekuenda kuWorld Cup.   Muchinyorwa chakabva kuZimbabwe Cricket (ZC), mutauriri weZC Darlington Majonga anoti maChevrons achatanga kutatsurana neIreland musi weChishanu kuClontarf uye mimwe mitambo ichatambirwa kuBready kunyika iyi.   “Chikwata chedu chemaChevrons chiri kupinda muhondo necheIreland mumitambo mishanu yeT20 series nemitatu yeODI uye yeODI ichange iri yeSuper League yekurwira kuenda kuWorld Cup. “Mitambo iri kutanga Chishanu chino chatakatarisana nacho uye ichatambwa mazuva anoti 27 na29 Nyamavhuvhu kozoti mimwe ichatambwa musi wa1, 2 na4 Gunyana.   Mitambo yeODI ichazotambwa mumazuva anoti 8, 10 na13 Gunyana,” anodaro Majonga. MaChevrons paanopedza kutatsurana neIreland, anobva ananga kuEdinburg kuScotland uko zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichasangana mumitambo mitatu yeT20 ichatambwa mumazuva anoti 15, 17 na19 Gunyana.

headline: Munzwembiri otungamirira Zim kuWorld Beach Games
text: ZIMBABWE Olympic Committee (ZOC) inoti iri kufara zvikuru nekugadzwa kwakaitwa Merit Munzwembiri – uyo akafanobata chigaro chadirector tv production and digital platforms kuZimbabwe Broadcating Corporation (ZBC) – saChef De Mission (CDM) weZimbabwe Bali 2023 Beach Games.   Mitambo yeWorld Beach Games yakaitirwa kuchitsuwa cheBali kuIndonesia kubva nemusi wa5 Nyamavhuvhu kusvika 12 Nyamavhuvhu.   Mushure mekubudirira kwake musarudzo dzakaitwa, bhodhi reZOC nemusi wa15 Gunyana rakazadzikisa kugadzwa kwaMunzwembiri saChef De Mission weZimbabwe Bali Beach Games 2023.   Izvi zvakaitwa zvichifambirana nemitemo uye zvinangwa zveZOC Athletes Development and Support senzira yekuona kuti zvikwata zvemuZimbabwe zvawaniswa rutsigiro rwakakwana kuti zvizokwanisa kupinda mumakwikwi enyika dzepasi rose mugore ra2025.   Munzwembiri ndiye zvekare sachigaro anoona nezvenyaya dzekuenzaniswa kwemikana pakati pevanhukadzi nevanhurume kuZOC.   “Ndiri kufara zvikuru nekusarudzwa kwandakaitwa muchirongwa ichi chemaWorld Beach Games 2023 uye ndiri kuvimbisa kushanda nesimba kuti tisimudzire mureza weZimbabwe munyaya dzezvemitambo,” anodaro Munzwembiri.   “Kuburikidza nemitambo iyi, tine donzvo rekusimudzira chimiro chedu seZOC.”

headline: Zemura akatamba, Bournemouth ikahwinha
text: MUTAMBI wemaWarriors, Jordan Zemura, akatambira chikwata chake cheAFC Bournemouth svondo richangodarika apo chakabva kumashure ndokukunda cheNottingham Forest 3-2.   Zemura akatanga arimo mumutambo uyu asi akazoburitswa pakapera chikamu chekutanga chemutambo uyu, apo vainge vakakundwa 2-0. Muchikamu chechipiri (second half), Bournemouth yakaburitsa Zemura ndokupinza Ryan Fredericks ndokurwa kusvika vahwina 3-2.   Uyu wange uri mutambo wechipiri watambwa neBournemouth zvichitevera kudzingwa basa kwakaitwa Scott Parker svondo radarika mushure mekunge chadashurwa 9-0 neLiverpool.   Mumutambo wekutanga wakatambwa neBournemouth Parker adzingwa, yakaita mangange 0-0 neWolverhampton Wanderers uye mutambo uyu, Zemura akatamba maminitsi 69 akazotsiviwa zvekare naFredericks.   Tichitarisa vamwe vatambi vemaWarriors vakatamba svondo radarika kuzvikwata zvavo kuEurope, muEngland Division One Brendan Galloway akatambira chikwata chake chePlymouth Argyle apo chakakunda cheDerby County 3-2.   Kuchitiwo muchinda Marshall Munetsi akatamba mutambo wose apo chikwata chake cheStade deReims chakaita mangange 1-1 necheLens mumutambo weLigue 1 kuFrance.

headline: ‘Mhofu anoita’
