text: VARAIRIDZI vakasiyana vezvikwata zvinokwikwidza muCastle Premiership vanoti vatsigiri venhabvu kana vaongorori vemutambo uyu vanofanirwa kupa Sunday “Mhofu” Chidzambwa rukudzo nekuti kubudirira kuenda kumakwikwi eAfrica Cup of Nations harisi dambe.   Izvi zvinotevera kushoropodzwa kwakaitwa Mhofu nevamwe vatsigiri venhabvu apo maWarriors akakundwa neEgypt 1-0 mumutambo wekutanga weAfcon kuEgypt nemusi weChishanu svondo rapera.   Asi, vamwe varairidzi vezvikwata zvenhabvu vanoti Mhofu anofanirwa kurumbidzwa nekuve murairidzi wekutanga wemuZimbabwe kuenda nechikwata chenyika ichi kumakwikwi aya kaviri.   Murairidzi weManica Diamonds — Luke “Vahombe”  Masomere — anoti kushoropodza kunoitwa nevamwe vatsigiri venhabvu hakubatsire chinhu asi kunodzikisira mutambo uyu.   Anoti Mhofu ndiye muridzi webasa iri uye vatambi vaanenge asarudza kuti vatambe ane zvikonzero zvaanenge avasarudzira.   “MuAfrica muno mune nyika dzakawanda chaizvo asi zhinji dzacho hadziko kuAfcon, isu tiriko saka chinhu chikuru ichocho. Saka tikaenda kuAfcon tikanokundwa zvinoreva kuti takundwa nezvimwe zvikwata zviri pamberi pedu nekudaro ngatimbomire zvekutaura zvisina basa titsigire Mhofu nevakomana vedu.   “Munhu asingazive zvenhabvu ndiye anomhanya pamberi kutaurisa zvaasingazive. Ngatimbomire kutaurisa tipe rutsigiro kuvakoma vedu uye nemutyairi wedu Mhofu kuti vabate basa.   “Kukundwa kunotarisirwa munhabvu, kana vakaburitswa mumutambo uyu tongovatambira kuti ndizvo zvaitika, vodzoka votanga patsva kugadzirira makwishu anotevera kuti vagodzokera ikoko vave pane chimwe chidanho. Vakomana vedu vakatamba zvinonwisa mvura asi kungoti vakasangana nevamwe vatambi vepamusoro, asi pabhora chairo vaitamba zvaidadisa,” anodaro Masomere.   Murairidzi weChicken Inn, Joey “Mafero” Antipas, anoti ino inguva yekuti vatsigiri venhabvu vabatane vachitsigira Mhofu nemaWarriors.   “Munhabvu kana chikwata chako chaunorairidza chikahwina unopembedzwa asi kana chikakundwa unoshoropodzwa zvikuru wonzi ngaadzingwe basa. Asi, izvi zvakashata chose uye kana pane pakanganisika ngatidzidze kusimudzirana kwete kungoshoropodza.   “Mhofu vari kuita basa rakanaka chose saka ngativape rutsigiro rwakakosha kunyangwe vakakundwa. Isu tinomira navo nekuti basa iri vanorinzwisisa.   “Ngatibatane pane zvinenge zvangoitika uye zvinenge zvangoitikawo, asi ini semurairidzi ndinoziva kuti zvakakosha sei kutungamira nyika yako kuenda kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations. Hakuendeki zvekumhanya saka Mhofu vakatobata basa guru kuendako nemaWarriors,” anodaro Mafero.   Rosemary Mugadza – uyo aimbove murairidzi wemaMighty Warriors – anoti Mhofu ari kuita basa rakanakisa chose asi mitambo mikuru yakadai seAfcon isati yasvika anofanirwa kupihwa nguva yakakura yekugadzirira nechikwata chake.   Mugadza anoti kazhinji Mhofu haasi kumbopihwa nguva yakakura yekuita gadziriro nevatambi vake.   “Mhofu vari kuita basa rakanaka, kana mitambo yemaWarriors yandaona yekuAfcon chikwata chaitamba zvinonwisa mvura asi nguva yakakwana yekunyatsogadzirira mitambo iyi havasi kuipihwa, ichi ndicho chokwadi.   “Kana vachipinda mumutambo mikuru inenge iyi, vanofanirwa kupinda mukembi kwenguva ndefu nechikwata chavo vonyatsoshanda nacho vochibika uye votamba mitambo yakawanda yehushamwari. Asi, handizvo zviri kuitika. Kazhinji panguva yemitambo yehushamwari pakarenda reFifa maWarriors edu haaungane kutamba, ndipo ipapo Mhofu anofanirwa kunge ane chikwata chake achichiongorora achitarisa vamwe vatambi achigadzirira mitambo mikuru yakaita seAfcon,” anodaro Mugadza.   MaWarriors kuAfcon ari muboka rimwechete reGroup A rine zvimwe zvikwata zvinoti Egypt, Uganda neDemocratic Republic of Congo (DRC).

headline: ‘Ndamirira Ambunda’
text: SHASHA yetsiva Tinashe “Chairman” Mwadziwana anoti zvishuvo zvemwoyo zvake zvave kuzadzikiswa apo achasangana nemutambi wekuNamibia, Paulus “The Rock” Ambunda, pazuva rekupemberera Zimbabwe kuwana kuzvitonga kuzere.   Mwedzi yadarika, Kwayedza yakaita hurukuro naMwadziwana achiti anoshuvira kumbosangana naAmbunda uyo waanoti anotamba tsiva yepamusoro yaanoyemura zvikuru.   Mwadziwana anoti izvi ndizvo zvakazotuma mamwe mapuromota kuti abatane aronge mutambo uyu uchamuona achisangana naAmbunda musi wa18 Kubvumbi kuMbare Netball Complex vachirwira bhande reWorld Africa Boxing Association Super Bantamweight World Title.   “Ndiri kunzwa manyuku-nyuku zvikuru nekuti mutambo wandainge ndakamirira hupenyu hwangu wazouya manje. Paulus Ambunda mutambi mukuru wetsiva muAfrica muno.   “Uyu mutambo wandaigara ndichingoshuvira uye ndinotarisira kuti ndikauhwina uchandisvitsa pane rimwe danho hombe chairo,” anodaro Mwadziwana.   Maneja wake, Clyde Musonda anoti gadziriro dzemutambo uyu dzave padanho repamusoro.   “Chairman makore adarika ndiye mumwe wevatambi vetsiva vemuno vange vachidadisa uye tinofara nekusimukira kwaari kuita.  Musi wa18 Kubvumbi, achasangana naAmbunda kuMbare Netball Complex uko kunobva Chairman saka tinoziva kuti chaunga chichauya kuzopemberera mwana wacho wemuMbare,” anodaro Musonda.   Mwadziwana kusvika parizvino arwa mitambo 30 ndokuhwina 18, akakundwa mimwe 12 yacho.   Ambunda arwawo mitambo 30 ndokuhwina 27, ndokukundwa mitatu chete.

headline: Mhirizhonga yamisa mitambo yePSL
text: PREMIER Soccer League inoti yambomisa mitambo yose yenhabvu yeCastle Premiership nekuda kwemhirizhonga iyo iri kukonzera kuti mimwe mitambo isapere zvakanaka.   Danho iri rinotevera mhirizhonga yakaitika kunhandare yeBabourfields kuBulawayo nemusi weSvondo pamutambo weHighlanders neDynamos izvo zvakaona mutambo uyu uchitadza kupera.   Muchinyorwa, chamangwiza wePSL – Kennedy Ndebele – anoti vamisa mitambo zvichitevera kuwanda kwenyaya dzemhirizhonga.   “Nekuda kwemhirizhonga iyo iri kuitika kumitambo yakasiyana, izvo zviri kuzosvibisa nhabvu yedu, tatora danho rekuzivisa kuti mitambo yose yePSL yambomiswa. Tichazokuzivisai kuti ichadzoka rinhi.   “Iye zvino tave kuita hurukuro nevanochengetedza mutemo vanosanganisira Zimbabwe Republic Police (ZRP), vanochengetedza mitemo kuzvikwata zvakasiyana nevaridzi venhandare kuti titsvage nzira dzekupedza mhirizhonga iyi.   “Tinotora mukana uno kukumbira ruregerero kuvatsigiri, vakotsveri vedu nevose vane chekuita nenhabvu. Tinovimbisa kuti tichagadzirisa nyaya iyi,” anodaro Ndebele.    Mhirizhonga yakaitika kuBabourfields pamutambo weHighlanders neDynamos nemusi weSvondo wadarika   Anoti iye zvino vazivisa zvikwata zveHighlanders neDynamos kuti vavanyorere vachitsanangura kuti zvakafamba sei musi weSvondo wadarika.   Mhirizhonga iyi yakaona vatsigiri vezvikwata zviviri izvi vachipinda munhandare mutambo usati wapera zvikakonzeresa kuti umiswe apo Bosso yainge yakatungamira 1-0.   Masvondo adarika kuMandava Stadium kuZvishavane, mutambo weFC Platinum neHighlanders wakatadza kupera zvekare zvichitevera mhirizhonga apo FC Platinum yainge yapihwa pena.   Vatsigiri veBosso vakapinda munhandare vachinyunyuta.

headline: Rodriguez odzika midzi kuMunich
text: (27) acharamba ari kuBayern Munich kusvika mwaka wegore rino wapera uye haasi kuzoenda kuArsenal kana, kuNapoli mwedzi uno.   Chizvarwa chekuColombia ichi, chiri kuBayern kwemwaka miviri nechikwereti kubva kuReal Madrid uye haasi kunyatsotamba sezvaangade achirairidzwa naNiko Kovac mwaka uno.   Akatadza kutamba mitambo mitanhatu yeBundesliga nemiviri yeChampions League mushure mekunge akuvara gumbo rake munaMbudzi ndokuzodzoka svondo radarika apo vakakunda Hoffenheim.   Mamiriro ezvinhu aya ndiwo akaita kuti pabude mashoko ekuti anogona kuenda kuArsenal kana kuti kuNapoli mwedzi uno kuti atambe kakawanda.   Asi, sekutaura kweESPN FC, Rodriguez acharamba ari kuBayern kusvika kondirakiti yake yapera panopera mwaka uno uye anogona kuramba ariko mwaka unotevera.   Zvimwe zviri mukondirakiti iyi zvakawiriranwa mugore ra2017, zvinotaura kuti Bayern inofanirwa kutenga mutambi uyu yobhadhara mari inosvika 37 miriyoni paunzi.   Rodriguez akwanisa kunwisa katatu nekubatsira vamwe vatambi kunwisa kaviri mumitambo 12 yaatambira chikwata cheBavaria ichi mwaka uno.   Anoshanda zvakanaka nemurairidzi weNapoli Carlo Ancelotti uyo waakashanda naye kuReal Madrid neBayern, asi hazvizivikanwe kuti vaviri ava vachasanganiswa zvakare here. – SportsMail Football

headline: Tinosvika kure: fc Platinum
text: SHASHA yeCastle Premiership, FC Platinum, inoti shuviro yayo kuti ive chimwe chechikwata zvikuru muAfrica yese kuburikidza nekutamba nhabvu yepamusoro-soro.   Pure Platinum Play, sezita remadunhurirwa reFC Platinum, ndiyo iri kutungamira palog reCastle Premiership uye yasarirwa nemitambo 10 kuti ichengetedze mukombe wayo uyo yakahwinha mwaka wadarika.   Ikakwanisa kuzviita zvakare mwaka uno inobva yapinda muboka rine zvikwata zvinoti Dynamos, CAPS UNITED neHighlanders izvo zvakakwanisa kuchengetedza mukombe uyu mushure mekunge zvauhwinha kubva gore ra1980.   Kuhwina kwakaita Platinum mukombe uyu gore radarika, yakabva yaita chikwata chekutanga chisiri chemuHarare neBulawayo kutora mukombe uyu.   Mukushi wemashoko weFC Platinum, Chido Chizondo, anoti hurongwa hwavo ndewekurwira kuti vave shasha dzemuZimbabwe uye nekuvewo chimwe chezvikwata zvikuru muAfrica.

headline: Votatsurana mumitambo yenaph
text: makuwerere nomusi weChishanu chino paAlfred Beit Primary, muHarare, apo shasha dzakakunda mumitambo yakasiyana yezvikoro zviri mudunhu reHarare dzichange dzichitatsurana.   Kwayedza neMuvhuro uno yakashanyira zvikwata zvakanga zviri kukwikwidza pachidanho chedistrict zviri pasi peMbare-Hatfield District pachikoro cheNettleton Junior ndokuita hurukuro nazvo.   Mai Lilian Chidovori Tadzingwa, avo vanova sports director paNettleton Junior, vanoti vanasikana vazhinji vepachikoro chavo vakasarudzwa kukwikwidza mumitambo yebhora (ball games).   “Tine chivimbo chekunokunda, saka pachidanho ichi sangano reNational Association of Primary School Heads (NAPH) ndiro richasarudza chikwata chichanomiririra Harare Province pakati pematunhu manomwe ari muHarare. Pamakwikwi atakaita, takasangana nezvimwe zvikoro musi wa8 Chikumi paDavid Livingstone School tikatora nhamba yetatu mumitambo yebhora pakati pezvikoro zvinomwe,” vanodaro.   Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Mukuru wechikoro cheNettleton, VaLeo Busvumani, vanotsigira zvikuru nyaya dzemitambo uye temu ino vakatenga mabhora matsva, zvekushandisa mumitambo yehockey nemimwe midziyo yakawanda. Pachikoro chedu tine vana vane matarenda akawanda zvikuru nekuti handi vose vanogona muchikoro. Saka sevarairidzi, zvakakosha kuti ticherechedze zvimwe zvipo zviri muvana.”   Vanoti sevarairidzi, vanofundisa vana mitambo yakasiyana. Vanoshuvira kuti kudai zvikoro zvakwanisa kuvawanisa rutsigiro rwekuti vanofundiswa humwe hunyanzvi hutsva maringe nezvemitambo.   VaNobert Mudzikati, vanova district coach kumitambo yenhabvu yevasikana, vanoti vanofara kusimudzira vane matarenda emutambo uyu.   “Pano tine chikwata chakasimba uye tinovimba kuti tichakunda zvisinei nekuti hatina hedu kuwana nguva yakakwana yekufundira,” vanodaro.   Makwikwi emhando iyi anogaroitwa gore negore achitsigirwa neNAPH.

headline: ‘Nhabvu inoda vatsigiri vemari’
text: ZVIKWATA zvenhabvu zvinokwikwidza muCastle Lager Premiership zviri kukurudzirwa kuti zvitsvage vanozvitsigira nemari kana zvichida kuti zvirarame muPSL. Kurudziro iyi yakaitwa nemutariri wePremier Soccer League, Kudzai Bare, nemusi weMuvhuro uno apo pakaitwa draw reChibuku Super Cup semi-final muHarare. Achitaura neKwayedza, Bare anoti zvinozivikanwa kuti mari inohwiniswa zvikwata zvemuno ishoma, nekudaro zvikwata izvi zvinofanirwa kuzvitsvagira vatsigiri vanozozvibatsira nemari. “Igaroziva kuti mari inohwiniswa ishoma asi zvikwata zvinokwikwidza muno hazvifanirwe kutambira nhabvu zvichiti zviri kutambira mari iyoyo nekuti haitombokwani kuchengetedza chikwata kwemwaka mumwe chete. “Saka chikwata chipi nechipi chine basa guru rekuzvitsvagira vakotsveri vanodira mari kuti chigorarama uye chisimbe. Ndizvo chete zvinodiwa sezviri kuita zvimwe zvikwata zvakaita seChicken Inn,” anodaro Bare. Gore rapera, chikwata chakasimudza mukombe wePSL chakahwiniswa $100 000 kozoti chakahwina weChibuku Super Cup chikapihwa $75 000 asi gore rino kambani inotsigira aya, yeDelta Beverages, inoti ichawedzera mari iyi kakapetwa katatu. Bare anorumbidza Delta nekutsigira kwairi kuita mutambo wenhabvu. “Sekuziva kunoita munhu wose, Delta ikambani hombe zvikurusa uye mabhajeti avo anoitwa gore richitanga saka zvinonetsa kuti tivapemhe kuti wedzerai imwe mari. Izvi zvinorongwa gore richitanga uye hapana aiziva kuti zvinhu zvichazomira semamiriro azvaita,” anodaro Bare. Zvakadaro, semi-final yeChibuku Super Cup – iyo ichatambwa svondo rino – ichaona ZPC Kariba ichisangana neHighlanders kozoti Harare City kana kuti Triangle ichasangana neNgezi Platinum Stars. Chikwata chichahwinha pakati peHarare City neTriangle ndicho chichazosangana neNgezi Platinum.

headline: ZC yamirira Afghanistan
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Cricket (ZC) rinoti rakanyorera kuHurumende richikumbira mvumo yekuti mutambo wemaChevrons neAfghanistan uenderere mberi mukupera kwemwedzi uno.   Izvi zvinotevera kuziviswa kwakaitwa nesangano reInternational Cricket Council (ICC) nguva pfupi yadarika kuti riri kuronga kudzosa mutambo uyu sezvo mitambo pasi rose yaive yambomiswa senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19.   Nyika zhinji dzakatotanga kuita gadziriro yecricket kusanganisira maChevrons ayo akatanga gadziriro dzawo dzekusangana neAfghanistan nguva yadarika.   Chikwata chemaChevrons chinofanirwa kusangana neAfghanistan uye neIndia asi mutambo weIndia wakambomiswa sezvo nyika iyi ichiti haisati yatora danho rekuti mitambo yakasiyana ichitanga zvakare.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, mutauriri weZC Darlington Majonga anoti sangano ravo riri kumhanya-mhanya kugadzirira kuti panouya chikwata cheAfghanistan pasawanikwe chinokanganisa mutambo wezvikwata zviviri izvi.   “Takanyorera kuHurumende yedu tichizivisa nezvemutambo uyu saka takamirira kunzwa kubva kwavari kuti vanotitendera here kuti uendere mberi. Isuwo kudivi kwedu tiri kumhanya-mhanya kugadzirisa zvose zvinodiwa kuti mutambo ugotambwa zvakanaka pasina chinokanganisa kana chinoita kuti denda recoronavirus ritapukire,” anodaro Majonga.   Kana Hurumende ikatendera kuti mutambo uyu uenderere mberi, chikwata cheAfghanistan chinenge chave kutarisirwa kusvika muno masvondo maviri anotevera.   Panouya chikwata ichi, vatambi vacho vachambogara mazuva 14 kunzvimbo yavo voga vachiongororwa kuti havana here hutachiona hwecoronavirus sezvinodiwa nemutemo wenyika ino.   Majonga anoti gwaro rakabva kuICC rinoti zvikwata zvinoenda kunosangana nedzimwe nyika, vatambi vacho vanosvika vachimbogara mazuva 14 vari kwavo voga vachiongororwa utano hwavo.   “Mutemo wavepo uri kungoitwa kunyika dzese, Afghanistan painosvika kuno vatambi uye nevarairidzi vacho vese vanosvika vombogara mazuva 14 mu’quarantine’. Izvi tiri kuzviita senzira yekubatsira kuti coronavirus isapararire saka tiri kutevedzera mitemo yese yeWHO, yeHurumende uye neyeICC,” anodaro Majonga.   Zvakadai, ZC yakazivisawo kuti sangano iri nereCricket Australia zvakawirirana kuti mutambo wezvikwata zvavo weOne Day International uyo waifanirwa kutambwa munaNyamavhuvhu umbomiswa nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakasiyana.   Akafanobata chigaro chamanaging director weZC, Givemore Makoni anoti, “Tange tichitarisira chaizvo kusangana neAustralia asi tichitarisa mamiriro akazvakaita takazviona zvakakodzera kumbomisa mutambo toronga patsva mamwe mazuva ekuutamba.”   Achitaurawo chamangwiza weCricket Australia, Nick Hockley anoti, “Takanetseka kuti takasvika pakukanzura mutambo uyu, asi CA neZC takawirirana kuti ndiyo nzira yekutora kuti tikwanise kuchengetedza hupenyu hwevatambi vedu, vatsigiri uye vanoshanda vachibatsira pakuronga mitambo.   “Isu takazvipira kuramba tichishanda neZimbabwe Cricket pakuronga mazuva matsva ekutamba mutambo uyu.”

headline: Lionel Messi Anotungamira Argentina Kupinda muSemifainari yeWorld Cup Mushure meKurova Netherlands muMapenareti
text: Argentina yaita chikwata chepiri kupinda musemifainari yemukombe wepasi rose weFIFA World Cup 2022 uri kutambirwa kuQatar, mushure mekukunda Netherlands 4-3 mumapenareti. Zvikwata izvi zvanga zvapedza zviri mangange munguva dzemaminitsi makumi mapfumbamwe, ndokupinda munguva yawedzerwa, kana kuti extra time, mutambo wakaramba uri mangange 2-2. Lionel Messi, uyo anga akatarisirwa nevakawanda kuti ndiye achafambisa injini yeArgentina, haana zvake kurasisa vangadai vanga vabheja vachimutemba sezvo atamba zvinonwisa mvura, uye kunwisa penareti yeArgentina yekutanga. Mubati wepagedhi weArgentina, Emiliano Martinez, ashurawo mare mushure mekubata mapenareti maviri ekutanga eNetherlands, ukuwo chikwata chake chichinwisa matatu ekutanga. Argentina yave kusangana neCroatia nemusi weChipiri musemifainari yekutanga. Mugovera kune mitambo miviri yemakotafainari yanga yasara, wekutanga uri pakati peMorocco nePortugal, kuchizotevera mumwe pakati peEngland neFrance.

headline: Tine hasha: dynamos
text: MURAIRIDZI weDynamos FC – Lloyd “Mablanyo” Chigowe — anoti veruzhinji ngavasatarisire chikwata chake pasi vachifunga kuti chapera zvichitevera kusatamba zvakanaka kwachakaita mwaka wapera sezvo gore rino chiri kudzoka zvine mutsindo uye chine huturu hukuru.   Mwaka wa2018, vatsigiri vazhinji vechikwata ichi vanoda kukanganwa nezvawo nekuti aive marwadzo chete kuDeMbare iyo yakapedza gore rose ichirwisa kuti isaburitswe muligi reCastle Premierhip.   Apo zvinhu zvakange zvaita manyama amire nerongo kuDynamos, zvakaona hutungamiri hwechikwata ichi vachidzinga Lloyd Mutasa semurairidzi kaviri achitsiviwa naBiggie Zuze asi haana kusvika kure sezvo naiyewo akadzingwa basa zvakare.   Chigowe ndiye akabva azogadzwa pachigaro chinopisa ichi.   Mwaka wegore rino usati watanga, vamwe vatsigiri venhabvu vange vachitoti gore rino hakuna cheDeMbare asi Chigowe anozviramba achiti vanhu ngavasataure bhora risati ratambwa.   “Chekutanga, vanhu vanofanirwa kuziva kuti gore ra2017 takapedza tiri pechipiri, takatombotungamira kwenguva refu asi zvikazongodhakwa pakupedzisira. Saka ngavasafunge kuti tiri mumatope nekuti 2018 hazvina kuti fambira zvakanaka.   “Pamwe pese apa zvaingoendeka wani, zvozongonzi nekuti mwaka mumwe chete zvatotidhakira?   “Handifunge kudaro,” anodaro Chigowe.   Anoti mwaka uno vari kuda kurwa semvumba vadzokere pachigaro chavo chaicho chemunhabvu muZimbabwe.   “Zvegore radarika zvakatodarika, zvimwe zvikwata ngazvisafunge kuti ticharamba takadaro.   “Tadzoka tashanduka uye tine huturu hukuru,” anodaro.   Kutaura kuno chikwata ichi chiri pakati pekuvaka uye vatambi vakaita saKudzanayi Dhemere, Jimmy Tigere, Tawanda Macheke, Simba Chinani naGodfrey Mukambi vamwe vanotarisirwa kuchisumudzira mwaka uno.   Vamwe vatambi vakaita saEdward Sadomba naArchford Gutu – avo vakambotambira chikwata ichi kare – vanogona kudzoswa kuzochitambira zvakare.

headline: Ndinofarira Man U: Hadebe
text: MUTAMBI wemaWarriors neYeni Malatyaspor yekuTurkey, Teenage Hadebe, anoti shuviro yake kuti agotamba mumakwikwi eUEFA Champions League uye nekuzotambira Manchester United mune remangwana.   Hadebe mumwe wevatambi vemaWarriors vanotambira nhabvu yavo kuEurope uko akatanga kutambira mwaka uno achibva kuKaizer Chiefs yekuSouth Africa.   Kuenda kwaakaita achinotambira kuTurkey, mutambi uyu akabva aita chizvarwa chemuZimbabwe chechipiri kutamba nhabvu kuTurkey Super Lig, achitevera matsimba aNorman Mapeza uyo akambotambira Galatasaray inove chimwe chezvikwata zvikuru kunyika iyi.   Achitaura neKwayedza nemusi weChishanu chadarika apo maWarriors akaita mangange 0-0 neBotswana kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium, Hadebe anoti agadzikana kuYeni Malatyaspor.   “Ndiri kufara chaizvo nemafambiro ari kuita hupenyu kuTurkey. Ndakatambirwa zvakanaka zvikuru kuchikwata changu uye ndoda kuramba ndichisimukira ndiriko kusvika ndave kutamba mumakwikwi eUEFA Champions League. Uyu mutambo unotambwa nezvikwata zvikuru nevatambi vakuru ndimo mavanotamba, saka iniwo ndoda kumutambawo neYeni Malatyaspor,” anodaro.   Anoti achazvipa makore matatu achitamba kuTurkey uye kana adarika shuviro yake kuenda kunotambira kuEngland.   “Ndichazvipa makore matatu ndiri kuYeni Malatyaspor ndichinyatsobikwa ndichijairirawo muEurope ndochimbonotambira kune imwe nyika. Kana zvikafamba zvakanaka ndoda kuzotambira Manchester United nekuti ndicho chikwata changu chandinotsigira pasi rose. Izvezvi Manchester United zvinhu hazvisi kuifambira zvakanaka asi ndoshuvira kuzoitambira mune ramangwana,” anodaro Hadebe.   Makwikwi eUEFA Champions League ndeemitambo mikuru inoteverwa pasi rose nezvikwata zvikuru zvekuEurope zvinosanganisira Liverpool, Barcelona, Real Madrid, Bayern Munich, Paris Saint-Germain, Juventus uye nevatambi vanoti Cristiano Ronaldo, Lionel Messi, Robert Lewandoswki, Kylian Mbappe, Mohamed Salah, Sadio Mane naRiyad Mahrez.   Mutambi wenhabvu wekupedzisira kubva muZimbabwe kutambawo muUEFA Champions League ndiMarvelous Nakamba uyo akambotambamo gore radarika achiri kuClub Brugge yekuBelgium.   Hadebe anoti Nakamba muenzaniso wakanaka kwaari nevamwe vatambi venhabvu vakawanda vemuno uye vazhinji vanoshuvira kusvika paave.   “Kwatiri sevatambi venhabvu, Nakamba muenzaniso wakanaka uye tese tinodawo kusvika paave. Tinoshuvirawo kuzotambirawo muEngland nerimwe zuva tichitevera matsimba ake,” anodaro Hadebe.   Kusvika parizvino muSuper Lig, Yeni Malatyaspor yatamba mitambo 11 uye Hadebe akwanisa kutamba mitambo misere uye akavhoterwa kuve muchikwata chemwedzi waGumiguru.   Anoti chiremera ichi chinorakidza kuti ari kufamba mugwara chairo kuTurkey nekudaro acharamba achishanda nesimba.   “Kubva ndaenda kuTurkey, ndakambopinda muchikwata chakatamba nhabvu chaive chiri muTeam of the week uye ndikazopinda muTeam of the month yaGumiguru. Zvinorakidza kuti ndiri kutamba zvinonwisa mvura uye ndiri kufamba mugwara chairo,” anodaro.   Muchinda uyu ari muchikwata chemaWarriors icho chiri kurwira kuenda kumutambo we2021 Africa Cup of Nations.   Akatanga kusarudzwa kuti atambire mumakwikwi aya mugore ra2017 asi haana kutamba kana mutambo mumwechete.   Hadebe akazodzokera kuAfcon gore rino kuEgpyt uko akatamba mumutambo wekutanga achimaka Mohamed Salah.

headline: Kaka odzoka munhabvu
text: wenhabvu weBrazil, Kaka, anonzi ari kutarisirwa kudzoka kuzotambira chikwata cheMonza icho chiri kutungamirwa naSilvio Berlusconi.   Shasha iyi yakasendeka shangu dzenhabvu gore radarika mushure mekutamba kwemakore akawanda, asi ari kunzi ari kudiwa naBerlusconi uyo aimbove muridzi weAC Milan.   Berlusconi ari kuda kuonekwa simba rake zvichitevera kutenga kwaakaita chikwata ichi chemuSerie C.   Sekutaura kwebepanhau rekuSpain, Marca, Berlusconi anofarira Kaka zvikuru zvichitevera nguva yavakashanda vese kuMilan uye ari kuda kuti mutambi uyu abatsire Monza kuti isimudzirwe mwaka uno.   Kaka zvinonzi ari kudawo kuenda kuchikwata ichi nekuda kwekushanda zvakanaka kwaakaita naBerlusconi kuSan Siro, uko kwaakagara makore matanhatu kubva 2003 kusvika 2009, ndokuzombodzoka mugore ra2013.   Parizvino haana chikwata chaari kutambira zvichitevera makore matatu aakatambira Orlando City yemuMLS.   Mutambi uyu anozivikanwa nematambiro anonwisa mvura uye achinwisa zvinodadisa.   Kaka akahwina mubairo weBallon d’Or uye akambotambira chikwata cheReal Madrid chekuSpain.   Berlusconi akatengesa AC Milan makore maviri adarika, iye zvino kambani yake yeFininvest yakazivisa svondo radarika kuti yakange yapedza kutenga chikwata ichi nemari inosvika 2,2 miriyoni paunzi asi inogona kusvika ku2,6 miriyoni.   Berlusconi – uyo aimbove prime minister weItaly – akatengesa AC Milan kune kambani yekuChina nemari inosvika $800 miriyoni mugore ra2017. – Sportsmail Football

headline: Chatsva kuBulawayo . . . Bosso yotatsurana neDeMbare
text: Ndooka   KUNOTSVA demo kugosara mupinyi kunhandare yeBabourfields Stadium kuBulawayo nemusi weSvondo uko makara asingaonane — Highlanders neDynamos — zvichatatsurana mumutambo weCastle Premiership uyo vazhinji vanoziva seBattle of Zimbabwe kana kuti Zim Derby.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi kubva kare pazvinonosangana panotambwa nhabvu inonwisa mvura.   Makwishu aya ari kuuya kwapera masvondo mashoma zvichitevera kusangana kwakaita zvikwata izvi mumutambo weIndependence Trophy uyo wakahwinwa neBosso 1-0.   Murairidzi weDeMbare, Tonderai “Stanza” Ndiraya, anoti mutambo uyu mukuru kuchikwata chake.   “Tiri kudzokera kuBulawayo zvekare mwedzi usati wambodarika kunosangana neBosso mumutambo mukuru uyu uyo watinogara tichitarisira makore ese.   “Tinoremekedza mutambo uyu nekudaro tichaukoshesa zvikuru. Patakapedzisira kuenda kunhandare iyi, hazvina kutifambira zvakanaka. Saka tinovimba kuti svondo rino zvichatinakirawo,” anodaro Ndiraya.   DeMbare pari zvino ndiyo iri kutungamira palog muPSL kubva pamitambo 14 yatambwa.   Asi, mumutambo wayo wekupedzisira yakaita mangange 1-1 neBulawayo City kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium muguta reHarare.   Ndiraya anoti mune mimwe mitambo yavo yadarika, vange vachitora zvibodzwa zvese uye vane tarisiro yekuti izvi zvirambe zvichiitika.   “Hongu, takarasa zvibodzwa tiri pamusha svondo radarika, zvinowanikwa. Mune mimwe mitambo yedu yakatamba tiri kunze, tange tichitora zvibodzwa zvese. Saka zviri kutisunda kuti tishande nesimba takatarisana nemutambo wedu uyu wemusi weSvondo,” anodaro Ndiraya.   Murairidzi weBosso, Mandla Mpofu, anoti vari mushishi kuita gadziriro dzechikwata chavo vakatarisana nemutambo uyu.    Mandla Mpofu   “Tiri mushishi kuita gadziriro dzemutambo wedu mukuru watakatarisana nawo neDeMbare. Tinozosununguka kutaura zvakawanda nemusi weChina chete apo tinotenderwa kutaura nevatori venhau,” anodaro Mpofu.   Bosso pari zvino yakagara pechi11 palog rePSL uye yakwanisa kuwana zvibodzwa 16 kubva pamitambo 13.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi pazvakapedzisira kusangana mumutambo wePSL uyo wakatambirwa muHarare mugore ra2019, wakapera ari mangange 1-1.   Kune mimwe mitambo iriko svondo rino, FC Platinum ichatatsurana nechikwata cheMiracle Boys kana kuti Yadah Stars nemusi weChishanu kuNational Sports Stadium.   Kuchiti nemusi weSvondo zvekare, CAPS ‘Kepe-kepe’ United ichange iri pamusha apo ichasangana neChicken Inn kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium.   Chicken Inn ndiyo iri pechipiri palogo rePSL apo yakasiiwa neDembare nezvibodzwa zviviri chete kubva pamitambo 14 yayatamba.

headline: MaGems ogadzirira remangwana
text: VAMWE vatambi venetball vemuchikwata chenyika chemaGems vari kugadzirira ramangwana ravo kuburikidza nekuenda kuchikoro uko vari kuita zvidzidzo zvakasiyana-siyana.   Vatambi ava vanosanganisira kaputeni wechikwata ichi Felistus Kwangwa uyo ari kuita zvidzidzo zveEconomic History paUniversity of Zimbabwe, kozoti Claris Kwaramba ari kuitawo zvidzidzo zvemutemo payunivhesiti imwechete iyi zvakare.   Achitaura neKwayedza svondo rino muHarare pamhemberero dzekudzoka kwemaGems kubva kuSouth Africa uko vainge vaenda kunokwikwidza kumakwishu eAfrica Netball Championships, Kwangwa anoti semaGems vari kukurudzirana kuti vaende kuchikoro vanodzidza kuitira ramangwana ravo.   Kwangwa anoti dzidzo ndiyo musimboti wehupenyu uye anokoshesa fundo yake zvekuti paanenge asingatambe netball anenge achiverenga mabhuku.   “Chokwadi dzidzo ndiyo musimboti wehupenyu, unofanirwa kudzidza. SemaGems tinokurudzirana kuti ngatidzidzei uye tigadzirire remangwana redu,” anodaro.   Kwangwa anoti dhigirii rake raari kuita reEconomic History anogona kuzoshanda mabasa anosanganisira kuve muzvinhanhorowondo (Historian), muongorori wemamiriro ezvenyaya dzehupfumi (Economic analyst) kana kuita zvetsvakurudzo (researcher).   Anoti ari kutarisira remangwana rake rakanaka nekudaro ari kushanda nesimba kuti agobudirira mufundo yake.   “Dhigirii randiri kudzidza ndinogona kuita mabasa akasiyana saka ndiri kuvavarira kuti ndipedze uye kana ndave naro ndotanga kushanda.   “Asi hazvireve kuti ndichabva ndasiya kutamba netball nekuti mwoyo wangu uri pamutambo uyu uye ndichashanda nesimba kuti ndizviite zviri zvese,” anodaro Kwangwa.   Zvakadaro, chikwata chemaGems chakapedza chiri pechina kumakwishu eAfrica Netball Championship chiri kumashure kweSouth Africa.

headline: Kakomana kanetsa ne’motor-cross’
text: SHASHA yechidiki yemujaho wemotor-cross Emmanuel Bako (13) inoti inoshuvira zvikuru kuti rimwe remazuva izopihwa chiremerera chekuve shangwiti munyika muno mune zvemitambo.   Emmanuel, uyo anove nyanzvi inozivikanwa mumutambo uyu achihwina mibairo yakasiyana muZimbabwe nekunyika dzekunze dzinosanganisira South Africa, anoti akamirira kudzoka kwemutambo uyu zvichitevera kumiswa kwawakaitwa nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Anoti gore rino range richirakidza kuve rake sezvo aitarisira kuhwina mijaho yakawanda asi zvose zvakaenda mudondo nekuda kwechirwere ichi.   “Gore rino zvange zvakaoma kugara tisingakwikwidze, ini ndihwo hupenyu hwangu asi ndave nemufaro mukuru kuti mutambo uyu wave kudzoka sezvo tine tarisiro yekuti tichatanga kukwikwidza zvekare munguva iri                                            kutevera.   “Ndinotenda Hurumende yedu nekuti yakatipa mvumo yekuita gadziriro saka ndiri kuita gadziriro pakupera kwevhiki rega-rega musi weMugovera neSvondo kuDonnybrook Raceway.   “Zvatakanzwa kuti mutambo uyu wave kudzoka iye zvino tave kutosimbaradza gadziriro dzacho nekuti ndinoda kuramba ndichisimukira,” anodaro Emmanuel.   Emmanuel akatanga kukwikwidza mumujaho wemotor cross aine makore mana ekuberekwa  achirairidzwa naStanley Mugiyo uyo nanhasi anove murairidzi wake.   Anoti motor-cross ndiwo hupenyu hwake uye acharamba achishanda nesimba sezvo anoda kunokwikwidza kuEurope, Asia nekuAmerica.   “Shuviro yangu kuti rimwe remazuva ndizopihwawo chiremerera munyika yangu chekuve gamba mune zvemitambo saka ndinoramba ndichishanda nesimba,” anodaro.   Baba vake, Brighton Bako avo vanove mutsigiri wake mukuru, vanoti zvakakosha kuti vabereki vatsigire zvipo zvevana vavo.   “Sevabereki, ibasa redu kuti titsigire vana vedu pane zvose zvavanoda kuita muhupenyu hwavo.   Mitambo yakasiyana yava nemari zhinji saka ukaona kuti mwana wako ane chipo chemitambo yakasiyana mutsigire nekuti hauzive kuti mangwana zvinofamba sei,” anodaro Brighton.   Gore rino, Emmanuel akakwikwidza kuSouth Africa akahwina mujaho we85CC (big wheel) Inland Championship.

headline: Munetsi azunza mambure kuFrance
text: MUTAMBI wemaWarriors, Marshall Munetsi anwisa nhasi manheru apo chikwata chake cheStade de Reims chakunda cheAngers 4-2 mumutambo weFrench Ligue 1.   Mutambo uyu ndiwo wekutanga wahwinwa neReims mwaka uno kubva mumitambo mishanu yayatamba.   Mumutambo uyu, Munetsi ndiye avhurira kunwisa mutambo watambwa maminitsi 23 uye chikwata chake ndicho chatungamira kusvika mutambo wapera.   Kusvika pari zvino chikwata chaMunetsi chatamba mitambo mishanu iyo yaona chikukundwa miviri ndokuita mangange miviri nekuhwina mumwe chete.   Wekutanga chakakundwa 4-1 neMarseille, ndokuzokundwa 4-2 neClermont uye ndokuita mangange 1-1 neStrasbourg neLyon.

headline: Vatsigiri vopemhera vatambi mari
text: VATSIGIRI venhabvu vezvikwata zvakasiyana vobatana mukubatsira vatambi vemutambo uyu kuburikidza nekuunganidza mari nechikafu zvekuti vawane raramo.   Mitambo mizhinji, kusanganisira nhabvu, pari zvino yakambomiswa nechinangwa chekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Izvi zvaita kuti vatambi vakawanda vaomerwe nehupenyu sezvo vachiwana raramo yavo kubva kumutambo wenhabvu.   Mutungamiriri wesangano reFriends of the Warriors, Edward Chimedza, anoti sevatsigiri venhabvu vari kuita musangano svondo rino pamasai-sai (virtual meeting) apo vachakurukura nemasangano akasiyana evatsigiri vachironga kuti vobatsira sei vatambi venhabvu panguva ino.   “Isu tine rudo nemutambo wenhabvu uye kutaura chokwadi chirwere cheCovid-19 chakanganisa zvakawanda. Saka isu sevatsigiri venhabvu tiri kubatsirawo nepatinogona vatambi vakasiyana panguva ino zvinhu zvakaoma kudai,” anodaro Chimedza.   Mashoko ake anotsinhirwa naChris “Romario” Musekiwa anove organising secretary wesangano reZimbabwe National Soccer Supporters Association achiti kuuya kweCovid-19 kwakanganisa zvakawanda munyika muno nepasi rose.   “Hatina kumbozvifungira kuti tingasvike patave iye zvino munyika zvinhu zvakaoma kudai zvakonzereswa neCovid-19. Asi isu tinoziva nhabvu ichitiunzira mufaro mukuru kwazvo kwatiri uye ichitibatanidza nevanhu vakawanda.  Saka nehuwandu hwedu tiri kurangana kuti tigobatsirawo vatambi vakasiyana kuburikidza nekuvatsigira chikafu.    “Nguva yatiri yakaoma saka tinofanira kuvarangarirawo vazive kuti isu vatsigiri vavo tine rudo navo,” anodaro.   Anoti ngachive chidzidzo chikuru kuzvikwata zvinokwikwidza muPremier Soccer League kuti zvinofanira kugara zvakarongeka zviine homwe yemari kuitira kuti kana zvinhu zvaoma senguva ino yoshandiswa mukubatsira vatambi.   “Zvikwata zvedu ngazvidzidze kubva pane zviri kuitika nekuda kwehutachiona hwecoronavirus kuti mune ramangwana ngavagare vakagadzirira vane homwe yekubatsira vatambi kana zvinhu zvaoma sezvatiri kusangana nazvo iye zvino,” anodaro Romario.

headline: Ndakatamba chikweshe: Nyangela
text: SHASHA yakambonetsa munhabvu Maronga “Bomber” Ngangela anoti nhabvu yezvikweshe yakakosha chaizvo nekuti ndiko kwakabikwa tarenda rake kusvikira ave nemukurumbira.   Nyangela anoti kubikwa kwevatambi hakufanire kutangira kumaAcademy, asi kuti kuzvikweshe.   “Isu tichikura, nhandare dzaizara vanhu vachiuya kuzotiona tichitamba zvikweshe chaizvo.   “Zvaisimudzira chaizvo kune vechidiki kuti vari kuonekwa vachitamba zvichikweshe uye zvaivatuma kuramba vachishanda nesimba. Saka tinofanirwa kuzvikoshesa uye kutsvaga zvinosimudzira vechidiki kuti varambe vachishanda nesimba,” anodaro Nyangela.   Bomber mumwe wevatambi vaizunza mambure  munhorondo yenhabvu yemuno izvo zvaimuona achinwisa kanodarika ka20 mumwaka yakasiyana achitambira Black Rhinos FC.   Zita rekuti Bomber vanotaura vanoti rakabva pakuti Nyangela ainwisa bhora zvisina mukare akamboona izvo zvakamuona achinwisa ka30 mune mumwe mwaka kozoti pamwe akanwisa ka29 ndokuhinha mubairo weGolden Boot mugore ra1987 ari kuBlack Rhinos.   Makore ano hakuchina vatambi vakaita saBomber vanozunza mambure zvinonwisa mvura.   “Tichitarisa vatambi variko ava zvinosuwisa zvikuru. Mutambi akanwisa nhasi anombogara mitambo mina kana mishanu achitadza kunwisa zvakare uye mumutambo wacho anotoda mikana 10 chaiyo kuti anwise kamwe chete.   “Isu taiti tikapihwa mukana mumwe chete taibva tatoziva kuti igobhora iroro,” anodaro.   Asi anoti kana vatambi vechikwata vakatamba vakabatana zvinobatsira kuti vahwine.   “Ndinoona sekunge zvikwata hazvisi kutamba zvakabatana chete, asi zvikabatana mumwe nemumwe achiita basa rake raapindira munhandare zvinohwina chete.   “Nhabvu haisi yehumbimbindoga, vatambi vanofanirwa kutamba sechikwata chimwe vakabatana,” anodaro.   Bomber anoti zvakakosha kuti vatambi vashande nesimba kuitira kuti vagokwanisa kuenda kune maligi anobhadhara mari yakanaka.   “Nhabvu yave nemari zhinji pasi rese uye vatambi vemuno ndiyo yavave kungofunga chete.   “Mari ngaive muripo unopihwa kumutambi anenge ashanda nesimba kwete kuti vanotungamidza mari.   “Isu panguva yedu pataitamba nhabvu yaisabhadhara sezvayave kuita iye zvino. Asi, taive nerudo nemutambo uyu uye taifara chaizvo kana vatsigiri vakauya kuzotiona kunhandare tichitamba,” anodaro.   Kubva asendeka nhabvu, muchinda uyu ange ari kushanda kubika vatambi vechidiki vari kusimukira uye akamborairidza kuBlack Rhinos ari mutevedzeri waStanford ‘Stix’ Mutizwa.   Anoti iye pamwe nedzimwe shasha dzakambonetsa dzichitamba nhabvu vane basa rekusimudzira vechidiki.   “Kutaura kuno ndine vechidiki vandiri kubatsira vari kukura ndichivapa ruzivo rwenhabvu nemazano kuti vasimukire mumutambo uyu uye muhupenyu hwavo.   “Tinoona vazhinji vachiwira pasi pasina kwavasvika nekuda kwekuzvirova matundundu. Saka tiri kuedza semalegends kubatsira vana vedu, vasimuke mumutambo uyu. Mari nembiri zvinokuvadza, hunge zvikasashandiswa zvakanaka, vechidiki ngavazvizive,” anodaro.   Kunyangwe hake Bomber aizivikanwa ari shasha yekuzunza mambure panguva yake muchikwata cheBlack Rhinos, anoti chinhu chakange chakamukoshera mikombe yavaihwina sechikwata sezvavakaita mugore ra1984 apo vakahwina mikombe miviri.   “Ini chinhu chandaitungamidza pazvese kuhwina sechikwata, ndizvo zvainge zvakandikoshera chete. Kunyangwe tikasatamba zvinogutsa asi kubatana kwataive takaita ndiko kwaindikoshera chete. Hapasi pose pataihwina, dzimwe dzenguva zvairema tichirwa kuti tisaburitswe muligi.   “Ndizvo zvimwe ndinoda kudzidzisa kune vechidiki kuti nhabvu ngaive yechikwata uye ngavatungamidze chikwata pazvese vanenge vachiita,” anodaro Bomber.

headline: Mayweather oyambira Nurmagomedov
text: oyambira Khabib Nurmagomedov apo akatarisana nemutambo wake naConor McGregor weUFC 229.   Chizvarwa chekuRussia ichi chicharwa kuchengetedza bhande rake relightweight kubva kuna McGregor muIrish uyo ari kudzoka mumutambo uyu, mumutambo uchatambirwa kuT-Mobile Arena kuLas Vegas musi waGumiguru 6.   Mayweather – uyo akakunda McGregor mumutambo wakaburitsa mari zhinji wetsiva gore radarika – anoyambira Nurmagomedov uyo asati ambokundwa mumutambo weMMA kuti munhu waacharwa naye haana waanotya.   “Conor haadzokere shure uye haambotye kana munhu zvachose, kuhwina kana kukundwa kana kuita mangange,” Mayweather akaudza mutori wenhau weTMZ Adam Glynn kuHard Rock Hotel and Casino kuAtlantic City svondo rino.   “Conor ari kuzorwa mutambo uyu.   “Handingakwanise kutaura kuti achahwina ndiani nekuti munhu ari kusangana naConor McGregor handisati ndambomuona hangu achirwa, asi kubva pane zvandakanzwa pamusoro pake, mutambi anorwa zveshuwa uye anogona kuparadza munhu, chipo chiripo.   “Asi, vatsigiri vanoda kukuona uchisimuka uchirwa. Ndizvo vatambi vanoda kuona chete.   “Conor McGregor, mutambi anonetsa kurwa naye nekuti mutambi wepamusoro.   “Sekutaura kwandamboita kare, Conor McGregor haasi kuzotya kupinda mumutambo uyu, haatye,                         murwi chaiye.” – SportsMail MMA

headline: Tarumbwa ‘anwisa’ zvekare . . . apa Quin Tasha pamuviri
text: VATAMBI venhabvu pasi rose, vanoratidza sekuti vanopinda murudo kana kuroora nevanhu vane mukurumbira sewavo. Aimbotungamira chikwata chenyika yeEngland, David Beckham, akaroora tsvarakadenga yaiita zverunako, mutambi wemadhirama uye muimbi Victoria Caroline Beckham, Wayne Rooney akaroorawo Coleen Mary wekuIreland uyo anova munyori uye achishanda pachiteshi cheterevhizheni. Imwe yenyaya dzinogona kunakidza ndeye aimbova mutambi weFC Barcelona, Gerard Pique, uyo akachata neshasha yekuimba yekuColumbia, Shakira.   Zvino aimbove mutambi weHighlanders neChicken Inn – Obidiah Tarumbwa – akapindawo muboka revatambi venhabvu ava zvichitevera kudanana kwaari kuita naQuin Tasha uyo anozivikanwa zvikuru munyaya dzekutamba mimhanzi. Tasha aimbova mutambi wechikwata chevanhukadzi chete cheWhin Quins.   Tarumbwa, uyo akambotambira chikwata chekuBelgium chinonzi Cercle Brugge, anoratidza kuti achiri “kunwisa” zvichitevera kupa pamuviri kwaakaita Quin Tasha.   Vaviri ava vakatanga kudanana makore maviri adarika uye Tasha ane pamuviri pave nemwedzi misere. Kunyangwe zvazvo vaviri ava vasina kuda kutaura zvakawanda pamusoro perudo rwavo, Tasha akatumira mashoko padandemutande kumudiwa wake musi wekupemberera zuva rekuzvarwa kwake 29 Mbudzi, izvo zvakatsinhira kudanana kwavo.   Zvisinei nekuti Tarumbwa ane vana nevamwe vakadzi uye dzimwe nguva vaasingabhadharire mari dzemendenenzi, Tasha ari kuratuidza kusave nehanya nazvo.   “Izuva rako mudiwa wangu uye ndiri kupemberera zuva rino newe. Mwari wemasimba ose vakuropafadze nemakore akawanda azere nebudiriro. “Ndinonzwa kufara nekuve nemunhu ane rudo uye mweya wakanaka sewe muupenyu hwangu.   “Vakazvitaura zvose, vakataura mashoko akaipa pamusoro pako asi handiwirirane nazvo. Mukomana uyu anoshamisa kwandiri. Anotya Mwari, ane ruremekedzo, anotsigira uye nekusimudzira.   “Nguva dzose anenge ari padivi pangu panguva yakanaka neyakaoma, anondiudza nzira dzekugadzirisa matambudziko ose. Ndiye zvose zvandinoda pamunhurume.   “Achava MURUME wangu, achazova DADDY, ndinokuremekedza uye ndinokuda murume iwe #Obidiah Tarumbwa,” anodaro Quin Tasha padandemutande.

headline: Kudzoka kwenhabvu kworumbidzwa
text: VARAIRIDZI venhabvu nevatsigiri vemutambo uyu svondo rino vakatambira nemufaro mukuru kudzoswa kwakaita bhora zvichitevera kumiswa kwakaitwa mitambo yose munyika muno kubvira munaKurume gore rapera senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Izvi zvinotevera kuziviswa kwakaitwa neHurumende nemusi weChipiri svondo rino kuti mitambo yose yave kutenderwa kuti ichidzoka asi pachitevedzerwa mitemo yeWorld Health Organization (WHO) uye neyemunyika ino panyaya yekurwisa Covid-19.   Murairidzi weDynamos FC — Tonderai ‘Stanza’ Ndiraya — anoti kudzoka kwenhabvu kunofadza zvikuru sezvo vatambi vange vanzwa nekungogara.   Anoti iye zvino amirira kuti vachiudzwa kuti vanotanga rinhi kuita gadziriro dzekuti mitambo ichitanga kutambwa.   “Kudzoka kwenhabvu tinokutambira zvikuru nekuti mutambo uyu ndiwo kudya kwedu. Tange tanzwa nekugara, vamwe vakasvika pakurasikirwa nemabasa asi iye zvino tine mufaro nekuti chishuwo chedu chave kuzadzikiswa.   “Saka tinoda kutenda Hurumende yedu yakanzwa zvichemo zvedu, iye zvino tatenderwa kuti mutambo wedu uchidzoka.   “Tave kumirira kuziviswa kuti tochitanga rinhi kuita gadziriro, ipapo tinoda nguva nekuti vatambi vedu vange vave nenguva yakareba vakangogara saka tinofanira kushanda navo zvakasimba kuti vanyatsobikwa vagodzokera padanho ravaive kare,” anodaro Ndiraya.   Mashoko ake anotsinhirwa nemurairidzi weChicken Inn — Joey ‘Mafero’ Antipas — achiti ave kutogadzirira kutanga basa rake sezvo ange anzwa nekungogara.   Anoti semunhu wenhabvu, kungogara pasina mutambo uyu kunomuremera.   “Zvinhu zvinofadza zvatange tichichemera kwegore rese kuti mutambo ngaudzoke, iye zvino wadzoka manje. Vakomana vedu vave kukwanisa kutamba mutambo uyu uye vokwanisa kuwana raramo muhupenyu hwavo.   “Iye zvino tamirira kunzwa kuti tofamba negwara ripi sezvo pane zvakawanda zviri kudiwa kuitwa nesu varairidzi, vatambi vedu uyezve nevamwe vari mune zvemutambo kuti tinge takachengetedzeka mitambo painozotambwa,” anodaro Mafero.   Mutungamiri wesangano reFriends of the Warriors — Edward Chimedza — anoti sevatsigiri vanotambira nemaoko maviri kudzoka kwemutambo uyu.   Anokurudzira hutungamiri hweZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) nePremier Soccer League (PSL) kuti vatore matanho ekuona kuti mitambo iyi inge ichiburitswa paterevhizheni sezvo vatsigiri vachange vachiona nhabvu vari kudzimba dzavo kana dzimwe nzvimbo kusiri kunhandare.   “Vakomana vedu vedu vatinofarira manje-manje tichange tave kuvaona vachitamba nhabvu mutambo uyu wadzoka.   “Asi tongochema kuZifa nePSL kuti ngavagadzirise vaone kuti mutambo uyu uri kubuda paTV nekuti kunhandare hatisi kuenda nekuda kwekuti zvinokonzera kuti tiungane izvo zvisiri kutenderwa. Saka toda kuona nhabvu paTV tichitsigira zvikwata zvedu,” anodaro Chimedza.

headline: FC PLATINUM, ESPERANCE DHUMA-DHUMA! … Munhandare isina vatsigiri
text: NORMAN Mapeza, murairidzi weFC Platinum anogashira mashoko ekuti chikwata chake chichatatsurana necheEsperance manheru eChishanu chino munhandare ichange isina vatsigiri mumutambo weCAF Champions League. Sangano rinotungamirira nhabvu muAfrica, reConfederation of African Football (CAF) rakatonga kuti Esperance itambe mitambo yayo miviri inotevera pamusha payo munhandare ichange isina vatsigiri.   Danho iri rinouya mushure mekunge vatsigiri veEsperance vakonzera zhowezhowe pamitambo yechikwata ichi miviri nezvikwata zvinoti Primero Agosto yekuAngola neAl Ahly yekuEgypt.   Zvinoreva kuti mutambo weEsperance neshasha dzemuZimbabwe, FC Platinum, uyo uriko nemusi weChishanu ikoko, uchatambwa munhandare ichange isina vatsigiri – danho rinogadzirwa naMapeza semakomborero asi ari matambudziko nekune rimwe divi.   “Tingade kutamba navo (Esperance) vatsigiri varimo, asi danho iri (mutongo weCAF) rinogona kutinakira,” anodaro Mapeza.   “Chekutanga ndechekuti danho iri rinovabvisa pakuti vari kutamba vari pamusha, tose tova nemikana yakafanana.   “Zvoreva kuti, kana dai zvazvo isu tichatamba tisiri pamusha, tichaita setiri pamusha uye Esperance ichange isina mutsigiri uya wechi12.   “Asiwo, kushaikwa kwevatsigiri kunogona kuuraya kunakidza kwemutambo sezvo kuvapo kwavo kuchingoita kuti mutambo uendeke,” anodaro.   Zvenhandare isina vatsigiri padivi, Mapeza achapinda mumutambo uyu nehuchenjeri.   “Hurongwa hwedu hahuna kusanduka,” anodaro Mapeza.   “Aka ndekekutanga kedu kutamba muCAF Champions League saka chakakosha kuti machinda angu anakirwe nemutambo achidzidza.   “Kusiyana neOrlando Pirates, Esperance chikwata chakatosiyana, naizvozvo tichavaremekedza.   “Esperance inotyisa, ndivozve vane mukombe wemuAfrican uyu saka tichatamba navo takachenjera,” anodaro.   Keputeni weFC Platinum, Mhari anowirirana nezvinorehwa nemurairidzi wake achiti mutambo wavachangobva kuita mangange 0-0 neOrlando Pirates yekuSouth Africa waunza chivimbo muchikwata chekuZvishavane ichi.   “Tisati tatamba neOrlando Pirates, tanga tichingotambwa hunyunyu muchikwata chatiri. Ndinovimba izvi zvasanduka,” anodaro Mhari.   “Takakwanisa kumira uye mutambo iwoyo wakatipa chivimbo.   “Machinda ari kufara uye tinovimba kuramba takadaro patinotamba neEsperance Chishanu chino,” anodaro.

headline: Tabhadhara zvikwereti zvose: Zifa
text: SANGANO rinotungamira nhabvu munyika muno reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) rinoti rakapedza kubhadhara zvikwereti zvaro zvese zvaisvika $7 miriyoni kumakambani, mapoka akasiyana pamwe nekuvanhu vakazvimirira.   Achitaura neKwayedza svondo rino, mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weZifa, Omega Sibanda, anoti sangano ravo harisisina chikwereti nemunhu kana kambani zvayo sezvo rakapedza kubhadhara zvose.   Zifa yaive nezvikwereti izvo zvakange zvasvika $7 miriyoni asi gore rino muna Kubvumbi mutungamiri wesangano iri Phillip Chiyangwa akabuda achitaura kuti vakange vasarirwa nechikwereti che$2 miriyoni chete.   “Takapedza kubhadhara zvikwereti zvose zvatainge tinazvo izvo zvaidzorera basa redu kumashure. Iye zvino zvinhu zvave kuchiendeka nekuti takapedza kubhadhara.   “Asi, kana achiripo anoti hatina kumupa mari yake akasununguka kuuya kwatiri otirakidza mapepa ake anotaura kuti tine chikwereti naye toona kuti neatinawo zviri kuenderana here.   “Kana tatarisa tikaona kuti zviri kuenderana tonyorerana pasi toona kuti tobhadharana sei kusvika munhu iyeye tamupa mari yake yechikwereti chake,” anodaro Sibanda.   Nyaya yezvikwereti izvi yakambodzorera nhabvu yemuno kumashure zvikuru izvo zvakaona maWarriors achirambidzwa kuwana mukana wekurwira kuenda kumutambo we2018 World Cup nekuda kwechikwereti chaive neZifa kuna Valinhos uyo akamborairidza maWarriors.   Sibanda anoti parizvino hapana chichavatadzisa kuti basa ravo rifambire mberi nekuti havasisina zvimhingamipinyi zvinosanganisira zvikwereti izvo zvakange zvakavamomotera.   “Iye zvino tave kuchifambisa basa, hapasisina chinotidzorera shure nekuti zvikwereti takapedza kubhadhara. Basa tave kuita takasununguka uye mari yatichange tichiwana tichaishandisa mubasa redu,” anodaro.   Sibanda – uyo achangobva kudzoserwa pachigaro chake kuZifa pamwe chete naChiyangwa – anoti sangano ravo rine hurongwa hwekusimudzira nhabvu yekumaruwa.   “Chinhu chikuru chatiri kuda kushanda kuti chibudirire kuendesa nhabvu kumamisha uko nekumapurazi kune vanhu vakawanda uye vane rudo nenhabvu asi havawaniswe mukana wekuona mutambo uyu saka tinoda kuendesa mutambo kwavari.   “Tinogara tichitaura nenyaya dzegrassroots nguva dzese, kumamisha uko ndiko kwadzinotangira nekuti kune vana vane matarenda uye tarenda ravo rinoda kuonekwa robikwa zvakasimba.   “Saka nhabvu tiri kuenda nayo ikoko uye varairidzi venhabvu vakuru vane mukurumbira vanofanirwa kuendako vachinoshanda nevana,” anodaro Sibanda.

headline: Siyanai nemaboozer: Stix
text: SHASHA yakambonetsa munhabvu, Stanford “Stix” Mtizwa, anoti vatambi vezvikwata zviri muPremier Soccer League vanofanirwa kusiyana nekatsika kekutamba mitambo yekubheja mari yemaboozer panguva ino apo mitambo yose yakambomiswa senzira yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 sezvo zvigona kukanganisa remangwana ravo.   Stix anoti kana vatambi ava vakakuvara vachitamba mitambo iyi zvisingazivikanwe nezvikwata zvavo zvichavakanganisa nekuti vonogona kushaya anovarapisa.   “Panguva ino zvinhu zvakaoma, tese tiri kuzviziva asi ini ndinoyambira vatambi kuti ngavachengetedze miviri yavo nekuti kana nhabvu ikazonzi yadzoswa vanenge vakagadzirira. Vari kudzimba dzavo vanotoita gadziriro dzavo dzese dzinodiwa nezvikwata zvavo vakatopedza.   “Asi ngavasiye tsika yavari kuita nekuti tiri kunzwa kuti kune vamwe vave kuita zvekutamba mitambo yekubheja mari kana kuti maboozer. Itsika yakashata kutamba mitambo iyi usina kupihwa mvumo nechikwata chako nekuti ukakuvara ikoko chete zvinokuomera, unoshaya anokurapisa,” anodaro Stix.   Stix, uyo ave kushanda kuchikwata cheBlack Rhinos basa rekuongorora vatambi vekune zvimwe zvikwata (chief scout) anoti ino ndiyo nguva yekuti masangano anotungamira nhabvu ashandise mukana uyu kugadzirisa zvose zvinokanganisa kusimukira kwemutambo uyu.   Anoti sangano rinotungamira nhabvu reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) rinofanira kubatsira zvikwata zvose nemari kuti zvifambise mabasa azvo.   “Zvikwata zviri kuremerwa izvo ndiri kuzvionerawo ndega. Saka Zifa inofanira kupindira yobatsira zvikwata zvese nemari nekuti vatambi vanodawo mari yekuzvichengeta nemhuri dzavo.   “Zvasiyana nekare apo taiziva kuti taienda kumabasa uye kana tabva kubasa toenda kubhora, iye zvino vatambi vakutamba bhora chete. Saka kana vasiri kutamba nhabvu yacho hapana mari yavanenge vachiwana. Naizvozvo vanoda kuchengetwa vanoda mari saka Zifa ngaipindire idire mari yakabva kuFifa.   “Fifa yakapa nyika dzose mari kuti dzibatsirikane panhabvu saka mari iyoyo ngaishande kubatsira zvikwata zvemuno zvese,” anodaro.   Stix anozivikanwa achitambira chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors nezvikwata zvinosanganisira CAPS United neBlack Rhinos.    Kubva zvaakasendeka kutamba nhabvu, akazotanga kurairidza izvo zvakamuona achimborairidza Black Rhinos.

headline: Manondo otarira mberi
text: MUTAMBI weCAPS United – William Manondo – uyo mwaka uchangodarika akahwina mubairo weGolden Boot, anoti chiremerera ichi chaisakwanisika pasina rubetsero rwevamwe vaanotamba navo muchikwata chavo pamwe chete nemurairidzi wake, Lloyd ‘Lodza’ Chitembwe.   Manondo akamuka chibhebhenenga mumwaka wake wekutanga ari kuGreen Machine izvo zvakamuona achinwisa ka17 ndokuhwina mubairo uyu apo akapedza ari pamberi pevamwe vatambi vakaita saWalter Musona weFC Platinum uyo akakwanisa kunwisa ka14 kuchiti Delick Murimba weNgezi Platinum akanwisa ka13.   Mubairo weGolden Boot uri kuona Manondo achiwaniswa US$6 375.   Kunyangwe hazvo akakundikana kunwisa kanodarika ka20 mumwaka mumwe chete, izvo zvakapedzisira kuitwa naNorman Maroto mugore ra2010, Manondo mwaka uchangodarika akabatsira chikwata chake zvikuru icho chaitatarika nekuda kwenyaya dzakawanda dzaisanganisira vatambi vaimboramba kutamba vachida mari dzavo dzebhonasi yavainge vasingabhadharwe.   Mwaka uchangopera, Kepekepe yakazopedza yakagara pechi11 palogo.   Aka ndekekutanga CAPS United ichipedza isiri muTop 10 izvo yakapedzisira kuzviita gore ra2012 apo yakapedza iri pechi10 palogo.   Makore adarika, yange ichisimukira ichipedza iri muTop 8.   Kuhwina kwaakaita Golden Boot uku, kwaona Manondo achipinda muboka rimwe chete nevatambi vakaita mukurumbira kuKepe-kepe vakambohwina mubairo vakaita saAlosi Bunjira (1996), Tapfuma Gahadzikwa (2001), Leonard Tsipa (2004 na2016) uye Nyasha Mushekwi (2009).    William Manondo   Manondo anoti anoshuvira kuti matambiro aakaita mwaka wadarika achamuvhurira mikana yekuenda kunze kwenyika.   “Chekutanga, ndinoda kutenda Mwari nekuti ndivo vakandisunda vaive neni kusvika ndahwina mubairo uyu weGolden Boot.   Zvinoreva zvakawanda kwandiri saka ndine mufaro mukuru nekuti hazviitike nyore.   “Panguva imwe chete, ndinoda kuremekedza murairidzi wangu ‘Coach Lodza’ nevamwe vandinotamba navo nekuti takatamba sechikwata. Uri wega pasina vamwe vaunotamba navo hazvikwanisike,” anodaro.   Manondo anoenderera achiti, “Hongu, ndakatamba zvinonwisa mvura mwaka wadarika asi shuviro yemutambi wese wenhabvu kuenda kunotambira kunze kwenyika. Asi Mwari ndiye anoziva remangwana uye nguva yake ndiyo yatinomirira.”   Manondo akazvarirwa muHarare akakurira kuMbare uye anoti aifarira nhabvu kubva achiri chindumurwa.   Murwendo rwake rwenhabvu, akatanga achitambira Kiglon ndokubva akamboenda kuFC Platinum iyo akatambira 2011 kusvika 2013.   Panguva yavaive kuFC Platinum, akambotumirwa kuGunners nechikwereti uko anotamba mwaka mumwe chete ndokuzodzokera kuFC Platinum. Kubva 2013 kusvika 2021, mutambi uyu – uyo vazhinji vanoziva saMr Chibuku – aitambira Harare City.   Paakabva kuHarare City, ndipo paakaenda kuCAPS United kutanga kwa2022 uko akasvika zvine mutsimba ndokuhwina mubairo mukuru uyu weGolden Boot.   Akangokwanisa kutambirawo chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors kaviri apo akaenda kumutambo we2016 African Nations Championship (CHAN) uyo wakaitirwa kunyika yeRwanda.   Mumitambo miviri yaakatamba yechikwata chenyika iyi, akanwisawo kamwe chete. Manondo anoyera Soko Mukanya.

headline: Dynamos Yokweshana neFC Platinum muCastle Premier Soccer League
text: Kunenge kusingadanwe anonzwa mukupera kwesvondo apo makwikwi enhabvu eCastle Premier Soccer League hwonanga kwamvura yacheka makumbo. Kunhandare yeMandava Stadium neMugovera achange ari makuwerere apo zvikwata zvirikurwira mukombe weCastle Lager Premier Soccer League, FC Platinum neDynamos zvirikutashurana mumutambo wanga uri pamuromo wevakawanda svondo rose. FC Platinum haisati yarohwa mumitambo gumi nemiviri yapfuura asi vanoongorora zvenhabvu vanoti yanga isingatambe nezvikwata zvakasimba vachiti ivo chikwata chese muZimbabwe chinoratidza kugona kwacho nekurova Dembare chete. Murairidzi wechikwata cheDynamos Tonderayi Ndiraya arikubvuma kuti mutambo uyu wakaoma asi anoti seDynamos vanotarisira kukunda mumitambo yese yavanotamba. FC Platinum irikukwikwidza zvine mutsindo mumakundano aya gore rino zvekuti mutambi wavo arikurura Brian Muzondiwa anoti chishuwo chake chekutora mukombe weligi nekunomiririra nyika muCaf Champions League chichazadzikiswa. Asi vanokwanisa kuswedera pedyo nekuita izvi chete kana vakakunda Dynamos sezvo izvi zvinovasiya vave pachinhanho chechipiri nemapoinzi maviri pamusoro peDembare. Asi vakarohwa unenge wave mutoro chaiwo sezvo vanenge vave nemapoinzi mana pasi peDynamos uyezve masere pasi pechikwata chirikutungamira cheChicken Inn icho chirikutarisirwa kudambura ZPC Kariba pamusha. Kugona Kunenge Kudada neDembare dzikaita mangange maGame Cocks (Chicken Inn) akakunda, zvikwata izvi zvinobva zvasara zvakasimba kwasara mitambo misère chete kuti makundano aya asvike kwamvura yacheka makumbo. FC Platinum neDynamos zvirikusangana zvekare svondo rinouya mumakundano eChibuku Super Cup mushure mekubatanidzwa neChina pamabiko akaitirwa kuGweru. Mubati wehomwe weDynamos VaWebster Marechera vanoti Dynamos yatarisana nemari yavanga vachitsvaga kuti vabhadhare zvikwereti zvakawanda zvavakatarisana nazvo. Vanoti varikutarisira kukunda FC Platinum mumitambo yose miviri iyi. Mune muumwe mutambo wakatarisirwa neveruzhinji ndeuyo urimuRufaro Stadium neMugovera zvekare apo Highlanders irikushanyira Harare City. Highlanders yave nemurairidzi mutsva Cosmos ‘Tsano’ Zulu mushure mekudzingwa kwaBongani Mafu. Mutambi Brighton Tuwaya uyo akambotambira Lancashire Steel, Shabanie Mine pamwe neDynamos ane chivimbo naZulu zvekuti anoti Bosso ichasimuka mumitambo yasara. Asi murairidzi weHarare City Taurayi Mangwiro anoti chikwata chake chinofanira kugadzirisa pavarikunyanyo tadza pekupedzisa mikana yavari kuwana kuti varove Bosso.  Mimwi mitambo iriko yakamira seizvi Caps United vs Buffaloes Whawha vs Triangle Dongo vs Chapungu Tsholotsho vs How Mine. No media source currently available

headline: Croatia Yotamba neFrance Kurwira Mukombe weWorld Cup
text: Croatia yapinda mufainari yayo yekutanga yeWorld Cup kubvira makundano epasi rese aya avambwa muna 1930. Vateveri vechikwata cheCroatia vari mumafaro mushure mekunge chikwata chavo chakapinda mufainari ye 2018 World Cup nezuro manheru mushure mekurova England 2-1 nechibodzwa chakakandwa na Mario Mandzukic munguva yemuwedzerwa. Croatia yakatanga yakatungamirwa ndokudzora kuita mangange 1-1 ndokuzopedzisa England apo varuzhinhi vanga vave kufunga kuti mutambo uyu uchaenda kumapenereti. Aka ndiko kekutanga Croatia ichipinda mufainari yemakundano eWorld Cup mushure mekusvika muma semi fainari muna 1998 apo yakarohwa 2-1 neFrance. VaTapiwa Mahwengwa avo vanotevera chikwata cheBarcelona vanoti zvinodakadza kuti zvikwata zvisina mukurumbira wakanyanya seCroatia zviitewo mukurumbira. Mumwe muteveri wemutambo wenhabvu, VaWalter Mombo, vanoti veruzhinji vanga vachidherera Croatia asi vasina kutarisa nhoroondo yayo mumakwikwi aya. Croatia yave kusangana mufainari ichaitirwa muLuzhiniki Stadium neSvondo neFrance, iyo yakarova Belgium mu semi final. Belgium iri kusangana neEngland neMugovera dzichirwira chinzvimbo chechitatu mumakwikwi e2018 World Cup ari kutarisirwa kupera zvine mutsindo pamutambo we Croatia neFrance neSvondo. No media source currently available

headline: Mitambo yeCastle Premier Soccer League Yotsvuka Ropa
text: Makundano eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League atsvuka ropa kwasara mitambo mishanu kuti mitambo ipere. Zvave pachena kuti zvikwata zvitatu zvinoti FC Platinum, Caps United pamwe neHighlanders ndizvo zvasara zvichiri nemukana wekutora mukombe uyu. FC Platinum yaramba yakabatirira nzvimbo yayo yepamusoro mushure mekurova Dynamos 2-0 muMandava. Kugona Kunenge Kudada yave nemapoinzi makumi mashanu nerimwechete, rimwechete pamusoro peCaps United iyo yaramba iri pachinhanho chechipiri mushure mekurova How Mine 3-2. Vatsigiri veCaps United vakapemberera zvikuru mushure mekukunda kwavo. Asi pakave nekunyunyuta kukuru mushure mekunge Highlanders yapihwa penareti mutambo wave kupera neNgezi Platinum Stars. Vatambi veNgezi Platinum Stars vakaunganira muridzi wepembe vachiti yaive isiri penareti sezvo bhora risina kubatwa sezvaive zvaonekwa nemubati wepembe zvakapa kuti Highlanders ikunde 2-1. Kunyange zvakadaro. Highlanders yaramba iri pachinhanho chechitatu nemapoinzi makumi matatu nemasere.. Mutsigiri wechikwata ichi VaLovemore Majecha vanoti vari kunzwa kufara vachitarisira zvakawanda mwaka uno. ZPC Kariba yakadarika Dynamos nemapoinzi matatu mushure memangange 0-0 neMutare City Rovers. NeMugovera kwakaitazve mangange pakati zero kwa zero pakati peChapungu neBulawayo City. Chicken Inn yakaitawo mangange 1-1 neTriangle. Hwange yakatora mapoinzi matatu mushure mekukudambura Border Strikers 2-0.

headline: ‘Aubameyang, Lacazette ka1’
text: anokurudzira murairidzi weArsenal – Unai Emery – kuti ashandise kuwirirana kuri pakati pake naAlexandre Lacazette nedonzvo rekusimudzira matambiro echikwata chavo.   Emery akatanga hupenyu hwake semurairidzi weArsenal nekuzvamburwa mumaoko eManchester City svondo radarika, apo paakasarudza kusatangisa Lacazette.   Chizvarwa chekuFrance ichi chakaunza mufaro mukuru kuArsenal zvichitevera kutengwa kwaakaitwa nemari inosvika 53 miriyoni paunzi mugore ra2017 uye akatanga achipisa kuEmirates.   Zvisinei, matambiro aLacazette akazodzikisirwa nekuuya kwaAubameyang munaNdira uye kutangisa vatambi vaviri ava kwange kuri kunetsa zvikuru kuvatambisa pamwe chete.   Asi chizvarwa chekuGabon ichi – Aubameyang – anoti anofunga kuti vanogona kutamba vese vakanetsa, hunge vasarudzwa naEmery muchikwata chake uye ndokutaura kuti anogona kusuduruka pachinzvimbo chake chaanofarira kutamba kuti Lacazette apinde muchikwata vatambe vese.   “Tinotamba tese zvakanaka uye tinowirirana,” Aubameyang akaudza ESPN. “Pane kamoto kanobaka kana tiri kutamba tese tiri munhandare.   “Tinotsvagana, takazviona nemusi weSvondo apo takatamba neCity paakapinda. Handina basa nazvo kutamba chinzvimbo asi hunge Laca akapinda otamba pachinzvimbo changu. Chatinoda chete kubatsira chikwata chedu chibudirire.” — Sportsmail Football

headline: Vatambi vebhora baiwai majekiseni
text: VATAMBI venhabvu uye vatsigiri vemutambo uyu vokurudzirwa kuti vaende kunobaiwa majekiseni emushonga wekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 segadziriro yekutanga kwemitambo iyi iyo iri kutarisirwa kutanga munguva pfupi inotevera.   Kuridziro iyi yakaitwa neaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weDynamos FC – Esther Tayo Mawere – uyo ari mune zvehutano zvekare achiti zvakakosha kuti vatambi venhabvu vabaiwe mushonga wekudzivirira denda iri pamwe nevatsigiri kana vachida kuzowaniswa mukana wekuona nhabvu yePremier Soccer League nekufamba kwenguva.   Nhabvu nemimwe mitambo yose zvakapihwa mvumo yekuti zvichidzoke asi vatambi uye vatungamiriri vemitambo yakasiyana vanofanirwa kunotariswa denda reCovid-19.   Mitambo yose ichange ichitambwa munhandare isina vatsigiri.   Mawere anoti kunze kwekuti vatambi vangovhenekwa vaonekwe kuti vane Covid-19 here kana kuti kwete, zvakakosha kuti vabaiwewo majekiseni ekudzivirira chirwere ichi.   “Nhabvu yakadzoswa uye vatambi vanonzi vachange vachitariswa kuti vane Covid-19 here kana kuti kwete. Asi, ini ndinokurudzira kuti vakasununguka ngavabve vaenda kunobaiwa zvekare jekiseni rekudzivirira denda iri kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisambowane mukana wekunyuka.   Vatambi venhabvu vagara vanosangana nevanhu vakawanda uye nhabvu painenge ichitambwa ipapo vanenge vachisangana vakawanda saka kutobaiwa jekiseni uku kwakatokosha nekuti kunobatsira kuvachengetedza kubva kuchirwere ichi,” anodaro Mawere.   Anoti nhabvu yemuno inonetsa kutambwa pasina vatsigiri nekudaro zvakakoshawo kuti vatsigiri vabaiwe majekiseni ekudzivirira Covid-19 kuitira nguva inotevera kana vachinge vave kuzotenderwa kuenda kunhandare kunoona mitambo.   “Kurudziro iyi tiri kuipa zvekare kuvatsigiri venhabvu kuti vakasununguka ngavaende kunobaiwa jekiseni.   Hakusi kuti kungobaiwa chete asi zvakatonakira hupenyu hwavo sezvo pavanosangana nevamwe vanhu denda iri vanogona kutapurirana asi akabaiwa jekiseni anenge akachengetedzeka zvake,” anodaro Mawere.

headline: DeMbare yagadza Mashingaidze saCEO
text: DYNAMOS yagadza aimbove CEO weZIFA, Jonathan Mashingaidze, kuve chamangwiza wechikwata ichi.   Mashingaidze akamboshanda basa iri kuchikwata ichi asati abviswa achipihwa rimwe mugore ra2021 panguva yechirwere cheCovid-19.   Mutauriri weDeMbare, Tinashe Farawo, anozivisa nezvekugadzwa kwaMashingaidze.   “Dynamos Football Club inoda kuzivisa nezvekugadzwa kwaJonathan Mashingaidze saChief Executive Officer wechikwata. Kugadzwa kwake kwatoitika uye kuri mugwara rinotenderwa neFIFA, CAF neZIFA Club licencing framework nezvirongwa zvechikwata.   “Mashingaidze, nyanzvi mune zvekutungamira nhabvu, ari kutarisirwa kutungamira basa rechikwata,” anodaro Farawo.   Mashingaidze achange achishanda ari general manager zvekare.

headline: Benjani adzingwa neNgezi
text: MURAIRIDZI weNgezi Platinum Stars, Benjani Mwaruwari adzingwa basa nechikwata ichi nhasi zvichitevera kusatamba zvinogutsa kwachange chichiita mumitambo yacho yeCastle Lager Premiership.   Benjani adzingwa basa mushure mekurairidza chikwata ichi mumitambo 13 iyo akangokwanisa kuhwina mitatu, ndokuita mangange mitanhatu uye kukundwa mina.   Akagadzwa pachigaro chinopisa ichi zvichitevera kudzingwa basa kwainge kwakaitwa Rodwell Dhlakama mwedzi mishoma yadarika.   Zvakawanda zviri kutevera.

headline: Tichapedzerana neBurkina Faso: Mpandare
text: MANEJA wechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors – Wellington Mpandare – anoti vari kutarisira kuti vachatamba nhabvu yepamusoro apo vari kusangana neBurkina Faso nhasi mumutambo wavo wechipiri wemuGroup A Africa Nations Championship (CHAN) kuCameroon.   Mutambo wekutanga wemaWarriors wakatambwa nemusi weMugovera wadarika apo vakakundwa 1-0 neCameroon.   Mpandare anoti kupedza nguva refu vatambi vasingatambe nhabvu uye kuvhiringidzwa kwavakazoitwa neCovid-19 kwakakonzera kuti chikwata chavo chisatambe zvakanaka.   “Zvange zvisiri nyore kwatiri nekuti nhabvu munyika haisi kutambwa kwegore rose uye kuzoti iyo Covid-19 yakativhiringidza zvikuru gadziriro dzedu dzeCHAN.   “Chimwezve, mutambo wekutanga wagara unonetsa muchitamba nechikwata chinenge chiri pamusha pacho. Asi tinotarisira kusvika kure,” anodaro Mpandare.   Anoenderera mberi achiti,”Tinotarisira kuti tichatamba zvakasiyana patiri kusangana neBurkina Faso. Yakati simbei kudarika Cameroon zvayo.”

headline: Khabib otya kurangwa nababa vake
text: Nurmagomedov – Abdulmanap – oyambira kuti murango waachapa mwana wake uchange uri mukuru kudarika waachapihwa neUFC uye neNevada State Athletic Commission zvichitevera nyaka-nyaka yaakakonzera pakapera mutambo wake naConor McGregor.   Kunyangwe hake akakumbira ruregerero nekutangisa kwaakaita hondo zvichitevera kukunda kwaakaita McGregor mumutambo wavo wekurwira bhande, Khabib ave kutya murango waachapihwa nababa vake vadzokera kumba kwavo kuRussia.   “Mutambo uyu ndewerukudzo. Kwete kutaura marara pamusoro pemumwe munhu. Handitaure zvakawora zvemumwe munhu ini, baba vangu, chitendero changu kana nyika yangu, izvi zvakandikoshera. Baba vanhu vachandiranga zvikuru pandiri kudzokera kumba,” anodaro Khabib.   Abdulmanap haana kufara nezvakaitwa nemwana wake, uyo ainge achangobva kukunda McGregor apo akasvetuka kubva munhandare yavairwrira ndokunorwa naDillion Dallas mumwe wemuchikwata chaMcGregor.   “Unoita zvese zvaunoda uri muoctagon (nhandare), kunze uko kwete nekuti kune vana, vanhukadzi uye nevanhuwo vanenge vachiona.   “Chikwata changu chagara chichizivikanwa nekuda kwekuzvibata, ndiko saka murango wandichamupa Khabib uchange wakakura kudarika waachapihwa neUFC,” anodaro Abdulmanap.   Achitaura nenyaya yekuzvibata, Abdulamanap anoti haana kufara kuti vanhu vatatu kubva muchikwata chake cheDagestani vakasungwa munyonga-nyonga iyi. Vakasvetuka kupinda munhandare ndokurova McGregor apo hondo yakatanga kuLas Vegas T-Mobile Arena.   Khabib ane hukama hwakasimba nababa vake avo vaive murairidzi wake kubva achiri mudiki apo akapihwa zita remadunhurirwa rekuti Eagle.   Akatanga kudzidziswa zvewrestling aine makore mapfumbamwe ekuberekwa uye baba vake vakashandura imwe kamuri yemba yavo kuve gym yaKhabib yekushandisa pamwe nevanini’na vake nedzimwe hama dzavo. – Sportsmail UFC

headline: Ndiri kurwadziwa: Mangwiro
text: MURAIRIDZI wechikwata chenhabvu cheHarare City – Taurai Mangwiro – anoti ari kurwadziwa zvikuru zvichitevera kuburitswa kwakaitwa chikwata chake muPremier Soccer League svondo radarika umo change chave nemwaka 10 chichikwikwidza.   Mwaka unotevera, maSunshine City Boys achange achitambira nhabvu yavo muDivision One.   Mumakore aMangwiro achirairidza nhabvu, aka ndekekutanga kutungamirira chikwata chinoburitswa muPSL.   Achitaura panhepfenyuro yeStar FM, Mangwiro anoti ari kurwadziwa kuti ave nenhoroondo iyi iyo asina kumbobvira atarisira kuti achaiita semurairidzi wenhabvi.   “Zvinhu zvinorwadza, zvandisina kumbobvira ndatarisira kuti ndichasangana nazvo mumakore 16 ndichirairidza nhabvu.   “Asi ndiyo nhabvu yacho,” anodaro Mangwiro.   Kuburitswa kweHarare City muPSL kunotevera kuita mangange kwakaita ZPC Kariba neHighlanders 1-1 nemusi weSvondo wadarika.   MaSunshine City Boys akabva atevera Tenax neWhawha izvo zvakaburitswa zvekare muPSL zvichidzokera kuDivision One.   Svondo rino, ndipo pachaonekwa chikwata chechina chichatevera zvikwata izvi kuenda kuDivision One.   Zvakadaro, mwaka wenhabvu wa2022 uri kupera svondo rino apo Dynamos FC ichisangana neCAPS United mumutambo weHarare Derby kuNational Sports Stadium.   Shasha dzePSL dza2022, FC Platinum dzichange dziri pamusha kuMandava Stadium uko dzichasangana neCranborne Bullets nemusi weMugovera.   Kuchiti Harare City ichatamba neHighlanders mumutambo wayo wekupedzisira muPSL.

headline: Ballance odzoka kuzotambira maChevrons
text: ZIMBABWE Cricket yakazivisa kuti vakaita chibvumirano naGary Ballance chemakore maviri chekuti adzoke kuzotambira cricket yake muno zvichitevera kubva kwaakaita kuchikwata cheYorkshire.   Ballance, uyo akambotambira nyika yeEngland, anoti ane mufaro mukuru kudzoka kuzotambira nyika yake yaakazvarirwa.   “Ndiri kunzwa manyuku-nyuku kumirira Zimbabwe uye ndatarisira kushanda nevarairidzi vemhando yepamusoro nevatambi vane tarenda.   “Mukana wekumirira Zimbabwe wandipa simba rekushanda nesimba uye ndinonzwa kufara kuti ndiri kuenderera mberi nekutamba mutambo uyu.   “Ndange ndichikurukurura nevanhu vakawanda vecricket vemuno kwemakore akawanda uye ndichiona kukura kwange kuchiita mutambo uyu makore adarika,” anodaro Ballance.   Achitaura nezvekudzoka kwaBallance, director of cricket kuZC – Hamilton Masakadza – anoti sangano ravo ratarisira kushanda naBallance uyo vane idi rekuti achaunza shanduko huru mumutambo uyu.   “Zvinofadza kuti tave naGary, mutambi ane tarenda ane ruzivo rwemutambo uyu uye adzoka kuzotamba cricket kwazvakatangira.   “Kuuya kwake kwakakosha nekuti tiri kutarisira kuona achishandura zvakawanda mumutambo uyu achitambira zvikwata zvedu,” anodaro Masakadza.   Balance asati aenda kunotambira kuEngland, akaita mukurumbira mugore ra2006 apo akanetsa kumutambo weWorld Cup achitambira Zimbabwe U19.

headline: Ndazvipira: Chigova
text: MUBATI wepagedhi wemaWarriors – George Chigova – anoti akazvipira kubatsira chikwata chake panguva iyo mutambo unenge waoma uye ari mudenga rechinonwe zvichitevera kubata kwaakaita mapena matatu apo Zimbabwe yakasangana neBotswana mumutambo weCosafa Cup quarter-final svondo rapera kuPolokwane, kuSouth Africa.   Mutambo wezvikwata zviviri izvi wakange wakapera uri mangange 1-1 ndokuenda kumapena apo Chigova akaita zvinorova ndokubata mapena matatu akatevedzana zvakaita kuti maWarriors akwanise kufambira mberi mumutambo uyu.   Achitaura ari kuPolokwane apo vakange vagadzirira kutamba neLesotho mumutambo wesemi-final neChitatu svondo rino, Chigova anoti akangozviudza mumwoyo make kuti nguva yasvika basa ngaribatwe kuti chikwata chienderere mberi.   “Zvamunoziva mapena anotarisirwa saka ndakangozviudza kuti ngandishande nesimba kuti ndibatsire chikwata kuenda kumberi mumutambo uyu.   “Tange tave panguva yakaoma nekuti takatadza kushandisa mikana yatakawana mumutambo wedu saka pakazosvika kumapena hauzive zvinoitika. Asi ndinofara kuti tichiri mumutambo uyu takakwanisa kusarohwa nehana tasvika kumapena,” anodaro.   Panguva iyo Chigova ari kurumbidzwa nemunhu wese munyika nehunyanzvi hwaakataridza musi weSvondo, mutambi uyu anoti chakakosha ndechekuti chikwata chavo chakabudirira kuenderera mberi mumutambo uyu.   “Chikuru ndechekuti tiri kufambira mberi mumutambo uyu uye chishuvo chedu kuti tirwire kuchengetedza mukombe wedu,” anodaro Chigova.   Hunyazvi hwakarakidzwa naChigova svondo rapera hwakamuona achipinda mumabhuku enhoroondo evatambi vepagedhi, shasha pakubata mapena sekatsi.   Aka hakasi kekutanga mutambi uyu achitaridza hunyanzvi hwake sezvo mugore ra2014 akabata mamwe mapena apo maWarriors akasvika kusemi-fainari yemutambo weCHAN neLybia uyo wakatambirwa kuSouth Africa zvakare.   Panguva iyi, Chigova akaedza nepaanogona kubatsira chikwata chemaWarriors nekubata mapena asi akazorasiswa nevamwe vatambi vanosanganisira Peter “Rio” Moyo, Simba Nhivi, Milton Ncube naAli Sadiki avo vakatadza kunwisawo avo mapena.   Dzimwe shasha pakubata mapena dzinosanganisira Japhet “Shortcat” Mparutsa uyo aitambira Dynamos FC nemaWarriors. Mugore ra1985 mufainari yeNetbrew Zifa Cup apo ainge ave kutambira Black Rhinos, Shortcat akabatira Henry “Beef” Chari pena mutambo uyu ndokupera uri mangange 1-1.   Kozoti Tapiwa Kapini – uyo akambotambira Highlanders – akanetsa zvikuru achibata mapena kuchikwata ichi uye nepaaitambira maYoung Warriors.   Tafadzwa Dube vazhinji vachiri kumurangarira iri katsi chaiyo panyaya dzekubata mapena apo aitambira CAPS United uye neFC Platinum.

headline: ‘Matambiro eChevrons marwadzo’
text: HUTUNGAMIRI hweZimbabwe Cricket (ZC) hunoti hunoda kuona shanduko huru mumatambiro anoita chikwata chenyika chemaChevrons zvichitevera kusatamba zvinogutsa kwachange chichiita mumitambo yadarika.   Nguva pfupi yadarika, maChevrons akarakashwa (whitewash) pamusha neBangladesh mumitambo yeOne Day International, Twenty20 Series neTest Match uye izvi zvinotevera kukundwa kwakaitwa chikwata chenyika ichi zvekare nePakistan pamwe neAfghanistan gore rino.   Pamusangano wakaitwa svondo radarika, ZC yakapa basa kuna director of cricket, Hamilton Masakadza, kuti ave nehurongwa hwekumutsiridza chikwata ichi apo chiri kutarisirwa kunokwikwidza necheIreland uye neScotland mumitambo yeSuper League yekurwira kuenda kumutambo weICC 2023 World Cup kuIndia.   Muchinyorwa chakabva kuZC, mukushi wemashoko wesangano iri – Darlington Majonga – anoti Masakadza akapihwa basa rekuti agadzirise zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana maringe nemaChevrons. “Takabuda mumusangano tikawirirana kuti director of cricket auye nehurongwa hwekumutsiridza mutambo uyu uye kuti agadzirise nyaya nhatu dzinoti kusarudza vatambi, nyaya dzehunyanzvi hwevatambi uye kuongorora matambiro evatambi vacho.   “Hurongwa uhu hunofanira kunge hwavepo chikwata chenyika chisati chasimuka chakananga kuIreland uko chinofanira kunosangana neIreland chozosangana zvekare neScotland mumitambo yeSuper League,” anodaro Majonga.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza svondo rino, Majonga anoti chikwata chemaChevrons chiri kufanirwa kusimuka chakananga kuIreland mumazuva anotevera kunorwira tickiti rekuenda kuWorld Cup. Anoti nekuda kwekuti Zimbabwe iri kuonekwa senyika ine vanhu vakawanda vari kubatwa neCovid-19, maChevrons ari kufanirwa kusimuka osvika ombogara pavo vega kwemazuva izvo zvinotarisirwa kuitwa nevanhu vanenge vashanya kune dzimwe nyika panguva ino apo pasi rese riri kurwisana nedenda reCovid-19,” anodaro Majonga.   Anoenderera mberi achiti, “Tiri pakati pekuita hurukuro maringe nemafambiro atichaita kuenda kuIreland neScotland kunotamba nezvikwata zviviri izvi. Patichafamba, tinofanira kusvika tombogara pedu toga nekuti ndizvo zvinotenderwa kuitwa panguva ino yatiri yekurwisana neCovid-19 sezvo denda iri riri kuuraya vanhu pasi rose.   “Mitambo yekuIreland neScotland yakatikoshera nekuti ndeyeSuper League yekurwira kuenda kuWorld Cup saka tinotofanirwa kukwidziridza masokisi edu kuti tigohwina.”

headline: MaChevrons orongera Sri Lanka
text: CHIKWATA chenyika checricket chemaChevrons chiri kuSri Lanka uko chichasangana nechemaLions mumitambo mitatu yeICC Men’s Cricket World Cup Super League.   Mitambo iyi yeOne Day International ichatanga nemusi weSvondo uye mimwe ichizotambwa musi wa18 na21 Ndira kunhandare yePallekele International Cricket Stadium kuKandy.   MaChevrons ari kufanirwa kuhwina mitambo iyi yeSuper League sezvo ichizovabatsira kuti vagobudirira kuenda kumutambo we2023 ICC World Cup uyo uchaitirwa kuIndia.   Murairidzi wemaChevrons, Lalchand Rajput, anoti ane chivimbo chekuti chikwata chake chinogona kukunda Sri Lanka uye mitambo iyi yakavakoshera.   “Mitambo yose iyi yakatikoshera nekuti Super League ndiyo ichazivisa vachabudirira kamwe chete vasingazonotambe mimwe mitambo, saka zvakakosha kuti tigadzirire totanga zvakanaka.   “Ndiri munhu anozvitemba uye ndinoziva kuti Sri Lanka togona kuikunda tichitarisa kuti takave nemutambo wakanaka tichitamba mutambo wePro50,” anodaro.   Kusvika pari zvino, maChevrons akwanisa kutamba mitambo mipfumbamwe asi akangohwina miviri chete, akakundwa mitanhatu uye ndiwo akasenga ari pasi muboka reSuper League.   Rajput, uyo anove chirwara chenyika yeIndia, anoti matambiro ange achiita chikwata chake haasi kufadza nekudaro vanofanirwa kutokunya masokisi avo.   “Hatina kutanga zvakanaka mumutambo uyu, asi ndinoziva kuti nevatambi vatinavo – avo vange vachitamba zvinonwisa mvura muPro50 – tichatamba zvakanaka patiri kusangana neSri Lanka,” anodaro.   Zvakadaro, Rajput anonzi paakasvika kuSri Lanka achibva kuIndia akabatwa nedenda reCovid-19 ndokumboiswa kunzvimbo yake oga kwemazuva matatu senzira yebio-secure bubble iyo iri kushandiswa panotambwa mitambo yecricket kunyika dzose.

headline: ‘Zifa inonzwisisa basa guru reHurumende’
text: ZIFA inoti inonzwisisa kuti Hurumende ine zvimwe zvinhu zvikuru zvairi kuita, izvo zvinoda kuitwa nechimbi-chimbi nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19, nekudaro haingainamikidze kuti iipe mari yekubatsira kuti mutambo wenhabvu urambe uchiendeka.   Sangano iri rinoti harikwanisi kumanikidza Hurumende kuti iripe mari nekuda kwekuti hurumende yeBotswana yakapa mari yekutsigira nhabvu kunyika iyi.   Vatambi vane chitsama vemuZimbabwe nevarairidzi vacho vari kuzvikwata zvepamusoro zvekuBotswana uye mutambi mumwe nemumwe achange achiwana US$206, kubva pahomwe yakaiswa padivi nehurumende yenyika iyi yekutsigira nhabvu.   Mutambi mumwe nemumwe anotambira muligi reBotswana First Division achawana US$124,18 pasi pehomwe iyi.   Homwe iyi ndeyekubatsira nemari yemuhoro yevatambi kubva munaKubvumbi kusvika munaChikumi. Gurukota rezvemitambo kuBotswana VaTumiso Rakgare  nemusi weMuvhuro uno vakatsinhira kuti hurumende yavo ine hurongwa hwekubatsira zvikwata zvenhabvu zvepamusoro nemari yemuhoro yevatambi.   “Mari iyi ichaiswa mumaakaundi ebhengi evatambi senzira yekudzivirira nyaya yekuti zvimwe zvikwata zvinogona kupedzisira zvave kuishandisa mumabasa azvo ezuva nezuva,” vanodaro VaRakgare.   Vanoti vanamuzvinhapembe vachabatsirwa kuburikidza nehomwe yesangano rinoona nezvenhabvu pasi rose yeFifa relief fund sechiwirirano chakaitwa neBotswana Football Association.   Nhengo yebhodhi reZifa Philemon Machana anoti zvakakosha kutambira mamiriro akaita zvinhu parizvino sezvo zvichisiyana nyika nenyika.   “Tinonamata kuti rimwe zuva tichasvikawo ipapo, asi parizvino Hurumende yedu iri pakamanikana sezvo iine zvimwe zvikuru zvairi kuita. Tinovimba kuti mamiriro ezvinhu achaita zviri nani nekufamba kwenguva uye nhabvu yozove nerutsigiro rwakawanda,” anodaro.   Zvakadai, kuBotswana zvikwata zviri muligi yepamusoro zvichawana US$3 311 pachimwe nechimwe.   Chikwata chenhabvu chenyika iyi chinozivikanwa nekuti Zebras, chiri muboka rimwechete nemaWarriors eZimbabwe mumakwikwi ekurwira kuenda kuAfcon 2021, chine chibodzwa chimwe chete kubva mumitambo miviri uye chiri pachinzvimbo chechitatu.   MaWarriors ari pachinzvimbo chechipiri muboka iri kubva mumitambo yakawanda uye ari mumashure meAlgeria iyo ine zvibodzwa zvitanhatu.   Zambia ndiyo yakasenga boka iri iyo isina kana chibodzwa kubva mumitambo miviri.

headline: Chabvondoka kuDivision One
text: ZVIKWATA zvinokwikwidza muNorthern Region Division One zvokurudzirwa kuti zvitambe nhabvu kusvika zvadambuka makumbo sezvo zvichange zviri muTop 8 munaKubvumbi ndizvo zvichanotatsurana mumutambo weAxis Super 8 Tournament.   Mwaka uno, Northern Region iri kuronga mutambo weAxis Super 8 Tournament uyo uchaona zvikwata zvisere zvichapedza zviri muTop 8 zvichizonokwikwidza mumutambo uyu, uyo uchatanga munaChivabvu.   Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weNorthern Region, Sweeney Mushonga, anoti zvikwata zvose zvinokwanisa kupinda mumutambo uyu uyo unokosha US$20 000.   Mushonga anoti zvikwata zvakawanda zvine mukana wekupinda mumutambo uyu sezvo zvose zviri kutamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura.   “Kutanga munaChivabvu, zvikwata zvinenge zvapedza zviri muTop 8 munaKubvumbi zvichapinda mumutambo weAxis Super 8 uyo unozotanga mwedzi unotevera. Zvikwata zvose zvine mukana wekupinda mumutambo uyu saka tichaona pakupera kwaKubvumbi,” anodaro Mushonga.       Anoti pakupera kwemwaka wegore rino, shasha dzeNorthern Region ndidzo dzichapinda muPremier League kwete dzeAxis Super 8.   “Pakupinda muPremier League, shasha dzinopedza dziri pamusoro muNorthern Region ndidzo dzichazoenda kuPremier League kwete dzeAxis Super 8.   “Axis Super 8 iripo pakuti mitambo iwande, vamwe vatambi vagowana mukana wekutambawo uye mitambo igonakidza,” anodaro Mushonga.   Zvakadaro, svondo rino kuchange kusingadanwe anonzwa mumutambo weNorthern Region apo pachasangana Herentals Under-20 neSimba Stars mumutambo wezvikwata zviviri izvi izvo zviri kutungamira pari zvino.
