headline: yangova ‘go bhora’. . . zvibodzwa 178 zvazunguza mambure
text: SVONDO rino mutambo weCastle Premiership uri kupinda muvhiki re11 apo zvikwata 18 zvose zviri kukwikwidza zvatamba mitambo 10 ndokunwisa ka178.   Kana zvichienzaniswa negore radarika panguva imwe chete apo zvikwata zvese zvainge zvatamba mitambo 10, zvakakwanisa kunwisa ka158. Ngezi Platinum – iyo iri kutungamira palog – yaive yanwisa ka16 mumitambo yayo.   Zvakadai, mwaka uno vatambi vatatu vanoti Simba Nhivi weCAPS UNITED, Lameck Nhamo weTriangle United naDavid Temwanjira weShabanie Mine vakwanisa kunwisa kashanu apo vari kudzingirirana kurwira mubairo weGolden Boot.   Hapasati pazivikanwa kuti pavatatu ava ndiani achazopedza ari pamusoro pevamwe panyaya yekunwisa.   Vamwe vatambi vari kutevera pakunwisa ndiObadiah Tarumwa (Chicken Inn), Ozias Zibande (Highlanders) naTerence Dzvukamanja (Ngezi Platinum) avo vanwisa kana kusvika parizvino.   Ngezi Platinum – iyo iri kutungamira palog – ndiyo iri kutungamirazve pakunwisa sezvo yanwisa ka16 mwaka uno mumitambo yayo. Chikwata ichi chiri pamberi pakubvarura mambure uye changonwiswa kaviri chete.

headline: ‘Mwoyo wangu uri panaMayweather’
text: SHASHA yetsiva Tinashe “Chairman” Mwadziwana anoti tsiva ndiwo hupenyu hwake uye anoyemura zvikuru mutambi ane mukurumbira Floyd “Money” Mayweather (Jnr) zvekuti akasvika pakutumidza mwanakomana wake zita rekuti Floyd.   “Ini pasi rose Floyd Mayweather (Jnr) ndicho chibaba chetsiva, hakuna mumwe anotevera. Ndiye wandinoyemura nekuti akaita zvikuru mumutambo uyu. Ndinomuda chaizvo zvekuti mwanakomana wangu ndakatomupa zita rekuti Floyd, kubva kuna Mayweather,” anodaro.   Pavatambi vepasi rose, Mwadziwana anoti anoshuvira kumbosangana naPaulus Ambunda wekuNamibia uyo anoti anotamba tsiva yepamusoro.   “Paulus Ambunda wekuNamibia ishasha, ndakamuona achitamba ndikatorwa mwoyo nekugona kwake. Ini ndinoda kusangana naye uye ndinoziva kuti tichasangana chete nerimwe zuva,” anodaro Mwadziwana.   Anoti haambofa akakanganwa mutambo wake wekuMalawi weBantamweight mugore ra2015 apo akarova Robert Kachiza wekunyika iyi kusvika afenda muround rechipiri sezvo wakamusimudzira zvikuru kusvikira paari nhasi uno. Kurova kwaakaita Kachiza kusvikira afenda kwakakatyamadza gurukota rezvemitambo nekusimudzirwa kwevechidiki rekuMalawi Grace Obama Chiumia ndokuti kukundwa kwake kwakanyadzisa nyika.   Achitaura neKwayedza svondo rino, Mwadziwana – uyo parizvino anova Zimbabwe National Super Bantanweight Champion – anoti mutambo wake wa2015 ndemumwe wemitambo yakamubatsira kusimukira kusvika ave shasha yemuZimbabwe.   “Ndichiri kurangarira zvikuru gore ra2015 ndakabika Kachiza munyika make kuMalawi, ndakamubinha akafenda muround rechipiri. Gurukota remitambo rekunyika yavo Grace Obama Chiumia avo vaive munhandare vachiona mutambo uyu vakauya kuzondikorokotedza ndokundipa jezi reLiverpool rekunditenda nematambiro andainge ndaita.   “Kubva ipapo handina kubva ndambomira, ndakaramba ndichingokavira bhora mberi sezvo shuviro yangu kuti ndive mumwe wevatambi vakuru vetsiva munyika ino,” anodaro Mwadziwana.   Mugore ra2017, Mwadziwana akazosangana naKachiza zvakare kuStodart Hall kuMbare, muHarare. Mwadziwana akahwina zvakare mutambo uyu ndokupihwa mubairo wekombi, sitendi yemba nemari US$2 000 napuromota wake aimutsigira.   Anoti hupenyu hwake hwaave kurarama parizvino kuburikidza netsiva.   “Kugara kwandave kuita izvezvi kuburikidza netsiva, mutambo uyu waita kuti ndive neimba yandinoti yanguwo yandakavaka uye ndine kombi inondiwanisawo mari pandinenge ndisingarwe. Zvinhu zvinofadza zvikuru kuti basa rako riri kukupa raramo uye zvinokutuma kuti urambe uchishanda nesimba,” anodaro.   Kubva achitanga tsiva, Mwadziwana atamba mitambo 28 ndokuhwina 17 uye akakundwa 11.   Parizvino ndiye ane bhande reZimbabwe Super Bantamweight iro raakahwina mugore ra2018 uye ari kuronga kurwa kurichengetedza mwedzi uno mumutambo uchiri kurongwa nemapuromota ake.   Kana akakwanisa kurichengetedza, tarisiro yake kutanga kurwira mamwe mabhande makuru ekunze akadai seWorld Boxing Union (WBU) neWorld Boxing Organisation (WBO).   “Parizvino ndine mutambo uchiri kurongwa kuti ndigorwira kuchengetedza bhande rangu reZimbabwe National Bantamweight. Kana ndikakwanisa kuhwina zvinoreva kuti ndinenge ndave kusimukira kuenda mberi mumutambo uyu ndave kukwanisa kurwira mamwe mabhande ekunze. Saka mutambo uchiri pakurongwa handisati ndanyatsoziva zvizere sezvo puromota wangu ari kumhanya-mhanya kugadzirisa. Ini ndiri kuita gadziriro dzangu ndakangomirira kunzwa kuti mutambo wakutsva,” anodaro.

headline: Morocco Yopinda Muchikamu cheChipiri kuWorld Cup Iri Pamusoro peGungano Rayo Uye Isina Kana Kukundwa
text: Morocco yave nyika yechipiri kubva kuAfrica kupinda muchikamu chechipiri chemakwikwi eFIFA World Cup mushure mekurova Canada 2-1 nhasi. Senegal ndiyo yakatanga kupinda muchikamu chechipiri ichi. kana kuti Round of 16. Morroco ndiyo yapedza yakatungamira Group F isina kudyiwa kana mutambo mumwe chete. Nyika iyi yakashura mare apo yakarova Belgium 2-0 uye kuita mangange 0-0 neCroatia. Nyika dzabudirira kuenda kuchikamu chechipiri dzave gumi nembiri arizvino uye dzinoti, Potugal, Brazil, Argentina, Poland, France, England, Australia, Senegal, Croatia, Morocco, USA, Netherlands. Panyika dzemuAfrica dzange dziri kumakwikwi aya, Tunisia ndiyo yakatanga kubuda. Ghana neCameroon dzasarwa nemutambo mumwe chete.

headline: TAGADZIRIRA AFCON: DECO
text: MUTAMBI wemaWarriors neLamontville Golden Arrows yekuSouth Africa – Danny “Deco” Phiri – anoti anoda kuita zvinorova apo vari kuenda kuEgypt kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations (Afcon) ayo ari kutanga masvondo maviri  anotevera.   Phiri aive muchikwata chemaWarrirors chakaenda kuAfcon kuGabon mugore ra2017 apo chairairidzwa naKalisto Pasuwa asi havana kusvika kure mumutambo uyu sezvo vakaburitswa kumagroup stages ndokudzoka kumusha vasina kumbohwina kana mutambo mumwechete zvawo.   Muchikwata ichi maive nevamwe vatambi zvakare vakasarudzwa gore rino vakadai saMarvelous Nakamba, Knowledge Musona, Khama Billiat, Kudakwashe Mahachi naTeenage Hadebe.   “Aka kachange kari kechipiri kedu vamwe vatambi kudzokera kunotamba kuAfcon saka tiri kufanirwa kurakidza kuti takura uye tine zvidzidzo zvatakawana pamakwisu ekutanga ayo takaenda mugore ra2017.   “Saka gore rino tiri kufanirwa kutamba sevanhu vakurawo uye vanoziva zvavari kuita, tiri kuda kuita zvinorova,” anodaro Phiri.   Parizvino maWarriors ari kuSouth Africa uko ari kurwira kuchengetedza mukombe weCosafa Cup.   MaWarriors kana akabudirira kuhwina mukombe weCosafa svondo rino anobva apinda munhorowondo yekuhwina mukombe uyu katatu kakatevedzana.   South Africa neZambia zvakambohwinawo mukombe uyu kana, pachikwata chimwe nechimwe.   Chikwata chenyika ichi chichange zvakare chichishandisa mutambo uyu segadziriro yemakwishu eAfcon apo chichasangana nemaPharoahs ekuEgypt musi wa21 Chikumi.   Deco anoti vanozviziva kuti vatsigiri venhabvu vachange vakatarisira mutambo uyu apo vachatatsurana nevatambi veEgypt vanosanganisira Mohamed Salah.   Mugore ra2017 kuAfcon, maWarriors aive muboka reGroup D nezvimwe zvikwata zvinoti Algeria, Senegal neTunisia izvo zvaive zvizere nevatambi vepamusoro vanosanganisira Riyad Mahrez weAlgeria uyo panguva iyi aipisa zvikuru achangobva kuhwina mubairo weSoccer Star of the Year kozoti vamwe vakaita saSadio Mane weLiverpool.   “Isu vamwe sekutaura kwandamboita Afcon iyi ndeyedu yechipiri, takadzidza zvakawanda kare.   “Tinoziva kuti vatambi vane mazita aya uye Afcon yadarika takasangana nevamwe vaitopisa futi.   “Saka isu sechikwata tave kuziva kuti vatambi ava tinovamaka sei uye zvii zvinodiwa kuti tibudirire patinosangana navo.   “Chedu chatinofanirwa kuita chete kutamba sechikwata.   “Isuwo muchikwata chedu varimo zvakare vatambi vane mukurumbira saka hatisi kuvhunduka, tinongofanirwa kushanda nesimba chete kuti tisvike kure,” anodaro Deco.

headline: Voshandisa mitambo kurwisa mhirizhonga
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Powerlifting Federation (ZPF) rodzidzisa veruzhinji kuipa kwemhirizhonga yemudzimba pamwe nekupa chenjedzo pamusoro pedenda reHIV/AIDS kuburikidza nekuita mitambo yakasiyana.   Svondo radarika, ZPF yakaita mutambo wekusimbisa muviri kuHighfields, muHarare apo vaisendeka mamitsi 15 parutivi pachikamu chega-chega voita hukurukuro neveruzhinji pamusoro pemhirizhonga yemudzimba, kuipa kwekutora zvinodhaka nekupa chenjedzo yedenda reHIV/AIDS.   Sachigaro we ZPF mupurovhinzi yeHarare – Moses ‘Black Moses’ Nyamhotsi – anoti zvakakosha kuti pose panoitwa mitambo yakasiyana pombotorwa nguva yekukurukura neveruzhinji vachipihwa chenjedzo pamusoro penyaya dzemhizhonga, zvinodhaka zvinokanganisa muviri nezvirwere zvakasiyana.   Black Moses anoti nyaya dzemhirizhonga yemudzimba dziri kuwanda mazuva ano nekudaro vakatora danho rekuronga mitambo iyi.   “Mitambo ine simba uye inounganidza vanhu vanobva kunzvimbo dzakasiyana. Saka isu takaona kuti panoungana vanhu tichiita zvemitambo, ngatibve tatora mukana wekukurukura navo nyaya todzidzisana kuti mhirizhonga yakashata zvachose. Tiri kubva tabata dzimwe nyaya dziri kunetsa dzakaita sedzekutorwa kwezvinodhaka uye topa chenjedzo pamusoro pedenda reHIV.   “HIV iriko hama, vanhu ngavangwarire uye vagare vachizvichengetedza nguva dzose,” anodaro.   Black Moses anoenderera achiti: “Danho iri takaritora nechinangwa chekuti vanhu pavanoita mitambo yekusimbisa miviri dzimwe nguva vanenge vakaneta, saka pfungwa dzekutora zvinodhaka hadzimbovabate. Chikuru chavanenge vave kufunga nezvacho kusimbisa muviri chete.”   Zvakadaro, svondo radarika ZPF yakaita mitambo yeNational Powerlifting nePara-Powerlifting Championships.

headline: Pochettino orumbidzwa
text: ari kurumbidza Mauricio Pochettino semurairidzi anogona basa zvakanyanya apo Manchester City yakatarisira kutatsurana neParis Saint-Germain mumakwikwi eChampions League.   Pochettino ari kupinda mumutambo uyu paine runyerekupe rwakanyanya maringe neramangwana rake apo bepanhau reSportsmail rakamboburitsa nyaya yekuti anogona kuda kuramba chikwata chake achienda kuManchester United.   Vazhinji vari kutsutsumwa kuti angakwanisa here kusimudza mikombe yakawanda mushure mekutadza kuhwinha mukombe mukuru ari kuTottenham uye paakatadza paLigue 1 title nepaChampions League nePSG mwaka wapfuura.   Mugadziriro dzemutambo wemusi weChitatu kuEtihad, Guardiola anoti: ‘’Unogona kuva maneja anogona basa zvakanyanya asi usingatore mukombe.   ‘’Mamaneja ane mukana wekutora mukombe ari pamusoro, zvikwata zvikuru zvine mari yakawanda uye vatambi vanogona. Zvisinei kumamaneja hazvisi nyore kuhwinha.   ‘’Izvi hazvirevi kuti mamaneja ari muChampionship kana asiri muchikwata chevatanhatu vari pamusoro pePremier League havagone basa munyaya dzezvidavado, kutaurirana uye kutungamirira. Hazvina basa kutora mikombe”.   Guardiola naPochettino vane nhoroondo yakakura vese muChampions League, kubva mazuva apo Pochettino aiva kuTottenham. Spurs yakarova City mumaquarter finals eChampions League muna2019. Tottenham yakanga yasvika kumafainari apo yakakundwa zvibodzwa 2-0 neLiverpool.   Kubva ipapo, mukombe mumwe chete wakatorwa naPochettino ndeweCoupe De France nePSG mwaka wapfuura. – SportsMail

headline: Tinohwinha: Chivandire
text: SHASHA yetsiva yechidzimai, Kudakwashe ‘Take Money’ Chivandire, otsidza kuti ari kudzoka nebhande reWorld Boxing Council Super-bantam Weight iro ari kunorwira nemusi weMugovera svondo rino kuZambia.   Take Money achabandana naCatherine Phiri kuGovernment Complex kuZambia uye ane mukana wekunyora nhoroondo mumutambo uyu nekuve wekutanga kuhwina bhande guru reWBC.   Achitaura asati asimuka akananga kuZambia svondo rino, Chivandire anoti ari kunosimudza mureza wenyika uye yasvika nguva yekuti vanhukadzi vari mune zvemitambo vacherechedzwe nemabasa makuru avanenge vachiita.   “Ndinopa chitsidzo kumhuri yeZimbabwe kuti ndiri kudzoka nebhande reWBC Super-bantam Weight iro ndiri kunorwira kuZambia musi weMugovera.   “Catherine Phiri apera, svondo rino haana chake. Ini ndave kutomuziva seaimbove shasha nekuti musi weMugovera ndichabuda munhandare ndave shasha ndirini ndine bhande reWBC,” anodaro Chivandire.   Mwedzi yadarika, Chivandire ange achishanda zvakasimba achiita gadziriro nemurairidzi anovazve maneja wake, Clyde Musonda, weDeltaforce Boxing.   Musonda anorumbidza mashandiro ange achiita Chivandire achiti anovimba naye kuti achanobata basa sebasa kuZambia.   “Chivandire anoziva z vaanoita, mwedzi yadarika, tange tichishanda zvakasimba naye tichigadzirira mutambo watatarisana nawo uyu. Chishuvo chedu chekuti nemakore aafamba mutsiva, svondo rino agohwina bhande iri reWBC ugove muripo wekushanda kwaange achiita nesimba.   “Tinoziva kuti mutambo uchange usiri nyore nekuti Phiri agara ishasha inozivikanwa kubvira nekubvira.   “Asi, isu hatisi kutarira izvozvo, yave nguva yekuti Take Money achitongawo mutsiva manje,” anodaro Musonda.   Mutambo wevaviri ava usati watanga, nhandare ichambotanga yadziiswa nemitambo yakasiyana iyo ichaona vamwe vatambi vemuno vachibanda nevekuZambia.   Bongani Makovora acharwa naDavy Mwale wekuZambia mumutambo weBatanmweight apowo Issa Aliyah Phiri achibandana naMubelala Mukuni wekuZambia mumutambo weLightweight kozoti Chiedza Homakoma anokwikwidza mulightweight acharwa naFaith Kanjungu.

headline: ‘Bhora radhakwa’: mitambo yeDynamos, caps haisisina mukurumbira
text: SHASHA yakambonetsa ichitamba nhabvu kuzvikwata zvinoti Arcadia United, CAPS UNITED nemaWarriors – Carlos Max – anoti mutambo weHarare Derby pakati peDynamos neCAPS UNITED hausisina mukurumbira sezvawaiita kare.   Svondo rino, nzira dzese dziri kunanga kunhandare yeRufaro Stadimu nemusi weSvondo uko Dynamos ichatamba neCAPS UNITED mumutambo uyu uyo waizivikanwa kare uchinakidza zvekukunda ngoma kurira.   Mutambo wekutanga wakatambwa muna Kubvumbi kuNational Sports Stadium pakati pezvikwata izvi, wakaona Kepe-kepe ichihwina 1-0 uye Denver Mukamba – uyo panguva iyi aitambira CAPS UNITED – ndiye akanwisa chibodzwa ichi.   “Munoona chii? Mutambo uyu mukuru uye kare ndiwo waitoburitsa shasha dzePSL dzegore iroro asi zvasiyana nemakore ano nekuti zvakawanda zvashanduka.   “Kuvatsigiri venhabvu unogona uchiri mutambo mukuru asi kuvatambi havachaukoshese nekuti tinozvionera nematambiro acho, haasiriwo ataiita kare,” anodaro.

headline: Makuwerere muPremier Soccer League Apo Mitambo Yosvika kwaMvura Yacheka Makumbo
text: Zvikwata zviri pamusoro pegungano reCastle Lager Premier Soccer League zvatarisana nemitambo yakaoma mukupera kwesvondo. Zvikwata zvitatu zviri kurwira mukombe weCastle Lager Premier Soccer League, FC Platinum, Caps United ne Highlanders zviri panguva yakaoma apo zviri kusangana kunze kwemusha nezvikwata zvakaomerwa mumakundano aya. FC Platinum iyo iri kutungamira makundano ezvikwata gumi nezvitanhatu aya, yakananga kuRufaro Stadium uko irikusangana nechikwata chaMoses Chunga icho chine chinangwa chekupedza chiri pazvikwata zvisere zvinenge zviri pamusoro mukupera kwemwaka. Chunga naNorman Mapeza uyo anorairidza Kugona Kunenge Kudada vakatamba vese muchikwata chemaWarriors asi vanga vasati vawana mukana wekuratidzana masimba avo muhurairidzi. Aimbotambira chikwata cheCaps United Charles Manjera anoti mutambo uyu wakabaka moto zvekuti wakaoma kudoma chikwata chinokunda. Manjera anoti semaonero ake mutambo uyu unoita mangange. Asi chikwata chakanyanyoomerwa nemutambo iCaps United. Makepekepe, iyo yakasiiwa nepoindi imwechete neFC Platinum yakananga kuBeitbridge uko irikusangana neBorder Strikers. Border Strikers ndiyo iri pasi pasi mumakundano aya asi zvikwata zviri kurwira hupenyu hwazvo zvinonetsa kukunda. Border Strikers ine murairidzi mutsva Luke Masomere uyo asati akunda mumitambo miviri iyo atamba zvekuti arikutarisira kukunda mumutambo wake wekutanga pamusha muDubulavadzimu Stadium. Muongorori wezvemutambo wenhabvu VaSilas Mukonoweshuro vanoti Caps United innge yaita raki ikakwanisa kudzoka nepoindi kuBorder. Highlanders irikubudawo muBulawayo asi yakananga padyo nepamba muGweru umo iri kutamba neChapungu muAscot Stadium. Panowanzotamba zvikwata izvi zvinowanzoita mangange asi kwete ikozvino apo Highlanders yakatarisana nemukombe, Chapungu yacho ichirwira kuramba iri muPremier League. Mimwe mitambo iriko yakamira seizvi  Mugovera Ngezi v Tsholotsho - Baobab ZPC Kariba v Triangle - Nyamhunga How Mine v Mutare City- Luveve  Svondo  Bulawayo City v Chicken inn- Barbourfields Mabhiza Mujaho mukuru wekutanga kwemwaka 2016/2017 weZimbabwe National Army Charity Shield uriko neMugovera muBorrowdale Race Course uiine mabhiza masere. Bhiza rirkutarisirwa kutora mukombe uyu ndeiro rinobva kuSouth Africa Eurakilon asi richiraridzwa nemurairidzi wemuno Gokhan Terzi. Mutasvi wemabhiza VaTapuwa Manxusa vanoti Eurakilon rinotora mukombe. Mamwe mabhiza angangorwisa zvine mutsindo anosanganisa Approval Rating, Newton Power na The Mutineer. Asi zvasaririra kune avo vanobheja kuti vaone kuti vanokanda mari yavo pabhiza ripi. Cricket Zvichakadaro, aimbove kaputeni wechikwata chenyika cheZimbabwe Heath Streak ndiye adomwa kuita murairidzi mutsva wechikwata chenyika checricket chemaChevrons. Mashoko ari kufamba asina kutsinhirwa ari kuti Streak akapihwa basa iri neChishanu mushure mekutambura kwechikwata chenyika kwenguva yakareba. Streak uyo aimbove mutungamiri wevatambi anoziva vatambi vemuno uyezve nematambiro avo zvekuti anokwanisa kusimudzira matambiro echikwata ichi. Streak anobva abatana naTatenda Taibu uyo akambotamba naye muhurongwa hwevarairidzi muchikwata ichi. Taibu achangopihwa basa rehumaneja. Streak ndiye anofungidzirwa kuti akakunda vamwe vaidawp basa iri vanoti Andy Blignaut, Peter Kirsten uye Justine Summons. Izvi zvinotevera kudzingwa basa kwaDav Whatmore muna Chikumi.

headline: MaSpringboks ovimba naEtzebeth
text: wekuSouth Africa, Eben Etzebeth, ari kutarisirwa kutamba mutambo wake wekutanga achitambira nyika yake kubva zvaakapedzisira mwedzi 10 yadarika apo maSpringboks achatamba mumakwikwi eRugby Championship neArgentina kuKing’s Park musi weMugovera.   Murairidzi wemaSpringboks, Rassie Erasmus, akazivisa kuti kaputeni wegore radarika uyu akatenderwa nanachiremba kuti atambe uye anogona kutamba awa rekutanga apo vari kusangana nemaPuma.   Etzebeth akange ambomira kutamba zvichitevera  kukuvara kwaakange aita ruoko rwake uye nemusana.   “Utano hwake ndihwo hune nyaya nekudaro ndosaka tisiri kuzomuona achitamba maminitsi anodarika 60 svondo rino,” Erasmus anodaro.   “Tichangotambira matsamba kubva kunanachiremba vanamazvikokota. Ange achiita gadziriro dzakakwana nesu kubva pakapera mwaka wemaStormers weSuper Rugby, asi tange tichimirira tsamba yeutano hwake chete.   “Ndinoda kutangisa mutambi akaita saye mumutambo uyu pane kumutangisa akagara pabhenji. Kana tikatangisa mumwe mutambi obva akuvara mumaminitsi okutanga, tinochiona chimoto.”   Kudzoka kwaEtzebeth pamwe chete nevamwe vatambi vanosanganisira Wareen Whiteley anotamba paloose-forward nahooker Malcolm Marx kwabatsira kusimbisa chikwata ichi nekuwedzera huwandu hwevatambi vekusarudza.   Chikwata chaErasmus chakakunda England 2-1 pamusha munaChikumi.   “Takakomborerwa kuvatambi vekumberi, nguva yanga yareba tisina vatambi ava pamwe nemahooker chaiyo vakakwana muchikwata. Taive tizere nevepasi chete saka tave kusanganisa vatinavo nevanokwanisa kutisimudzira uye kuhwinisa chikwata chedu,” anodaro Erasmus. — Sportsmail Rugby

headline: Tiri kuronga kudzora nhabvu: Zifa
text: MUKURU wesangano rinoona nezvenhabvu muno reZifa, Felton Kamambo, anoti hutungamiri hwenhabvu huchasangana svondo rino kuti vagokurukura nechinangwa chekuti mutambo uyu udzoswe asi uchizotambwa pasina vatsigiri.   Nhabvu yemuno yaifanirwa kunge yakatanga muna Kurume kana Kubvumbi asi nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19, yakambomiswa senzira yekuti vanhu vasaungane uye chirwere ichi chisapararire.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Kamambo anoti Zifa nemamwe masangano enhabvu anosanganisira Premier Soccer League (PSL) vachasangana kuti vagoronga gwara rekufamba naro iro vachazopa kuSports and Recreation Commission.   “Hutungamiri hwenhabvu tichasangana svondo rino tironge kuti tofamba nenzira ipi iyo inoita kuti nhabvu yedu idzoke. Chimwe chinhu chikuru chatichakurukura kuti nhabvu itambwe pasina vatsigiri, kana pane zvatinenge tawirirana tichazvipa kuSRC vozvizeya ivo vozotiudza kuti zvinoita here,” anodaro Kamambo.   Anoenderera mberi achiti kuti nhabvu igotambwa pasina vatsigiri richave dambudziko guru kuzvikwata zvizhinji sezvo zvakawanda zvichirarama nemari iyo zvinowana pagedhi inenge yabhadharwa nevatsigiri.   Asi anoti ivo sesangano vakazvipira kubatsira zvikwata zvose zvemuno neimwe mari yekuti zvifambise mabasa azvo kuitira kuti zvisazonyanyoremerwa.   “Isu tichabatsira zvikwata zvose nekubhadhara imwe mari yakafanana neyevaridzi vepembe, chikuru chatiri kuda kuti nhabvu itambwe uye zvikwata zvedu zvisanyanyoremerwa.   “Kune dzimwe nyika sekuEurope nhabvu yave kutambwa isina vatsigiri saka isu tokwanisa kuzviitawo,” anodaro Kamambo.

headline: Dynamos Yotatsurana neHighlanders muChibuku Super Cup
text:
Chikwata cheDynamos chatambidzwa Highlanders mumakundano eChibuku Super Cup. Uyu ndiwo mumwe wemitambo mikuru miviri yabuda mumubatanidzwa yezvikwa yeChibuku Super Cup yaitwa nhasi masikati mumwe wacho uchisanganisirawo Caps United ne Harare City.

Mitambo iyi iriko musi wa 29 Gunyana. Dynamos neHighlanders dzine nhoroondo yakasimba yekukwidzana asi mubati wehomwe weDembare VaWebster Marechera vanoti vachakunda.

Makepekepe Iri kusangana neHarare City iyo ichangobva kuvatorera murairidzi wavo Lloyd Chitembwe.

Asi maneja weCaps United VaShakesper Chinogwenya vanoti uyu mutambo ndewevarairidzi vaviri Chitembwe wacho neakamutsiva Darlington Dodo.

Mimwe mitambo iri kusanganisira Chicken Inn neManica Diamonds pamwe neZPC Kariba neHwange.

Chikwata chichakunda pakati peMushowani neBulawayo Chiefs chichasangana neNgezi, Black Rhinos ichitamba nevachakunda pakati peYadah ne TelOne.

Munyori mukuru weBlack Rhinos Lieutenant Mabhinginye vanoti varikuda kushandura matambiro avari kuita muligi kuisa kumukombe uyu.
Chikwata chichatora mukombe uyu chinobudirira kumirira nyika muCaf Confederation Cup. No media source currently available

headline: Aluvah abuda muchipatara kuCameroon
text: MUTSIGIRI mukuru wenhabvu, Alvin “Aluvah” Zhakata, anoti aburitswa muchipatara mushure mekunge avhenekwa nemachiremba ekunyika yeCameroon avo vange vachimurapa chirwere chemoyo icho chakangomubata achiona mutambo weAFCON pakati pechikwata cheMalawi necheMorocco ikoko.   Aluvah ari kuCameroon uko akaenda kumakwikwi eAfrica Cup of Nations (AFCON) uyo ari kutambirwa kunyika iyi. Ange ava nemazuva ari muchipatara.   Zvichitevera kuburitswa kwakaita chikwata chenhabvu chenyika chemaWarriors kumitambo iyi, Aluvah haana kudzoka sezvo akasara achiona mimwe mitambo uye paaiona mutambo weMalawi neMorocco, ndipo akadonha arwara nechirwere chemoyo ndokumhanyiswa kuchipatara.   Aluvah ange agara muchipatara izvo zvakazomuona achibhadharirwa mari dzange dzichidiwako, zvose nedzemachiremba, nemutungamiri weCameroon Football Association, Samuel Eto’o.   Achitaura ari kunyika iyi, Aluvah audza Kwayedza nhasi mangwanani kuti ave kunzwa zviri nani.   “Ndave kunzwa zvakanaka manje, ndakavhenekwa nanachiremba vange vachindirapa ndikaitwa mascan akadzoka achiratidza kuti ndave nani,” anodaro.   Aluvah anoti haasati ave kuziva kuti anodzoka kumusha kuZimbabwe rinhi.   “Ndichakuzivisai zuva rekudzoka,” anodaro.   Aka hakasi kekutanga Aluvah achisangana netsekwende apo anenge achinotsigira mitambo yeAfrica Cup of Nations. Mugore ra2019, achienda kuAFCON kuEgypt – apo akafamba kubva kuSouth Africa – akambovharirwa mujeri nemapurisa munyika yeSudan umo maive nehondo.   Akazokwanisa hake kupfuurira mberi nerwendo rwake kunosvika kuEgypt asi pakudzoka akazobhadharirwa ndege nesangano reConfederation of African Football (CAF).

headline: Dynamos Inotenga Vatambi Vatsva
text: Dynamos yatenga vatambi vatsva senzira yekuti chikwata ichi chisimbe kudarika zvachiri. Dembare iri kudzoka munhandare neSvondo iine vatambi vatsva apo ichatamba neZPC Kariba sekutaura kwaita gwaro rabva kune vanoronga mitambo muPremier Soccer League, VaElisha Mandireva. Mutungamiri weDembare, VaSolomon Sanyamandwe, vanoti vateveri veDynamos vanofanira kugadziririra kuona Dynamos yakasimba uyezve yakasiyana zvikuru neyaivepo munharaunda yekutanga iyo yaitatarika zvinotyisa. VaSanyamandwe vanoti Dembare yakatenga vatambi vatsva vakati wandei kusanganisira Kingstone Nkhata kubva kuSupersport yekuSouth Africa uyo vanotarisira kuti achapedza dambudziko ravanaro rezvibodzwa. VaSanyamandwe vanoti Nkhata akanyorerana chibvumirano chemwedzi mitanhatu neDembare vachizoona kuti vanokwanisa here kuwedzera nguva yacho. Nkhata ane nhoroondo yakasimba mumutambo wenhabvu mushure mekutambira Kaiser Chiefs, Free State Stars, Black Leopards neSupersport United muSouth Africa pamwe neBuymore neCaps United mu Zimbabwe. Nkhata akatambira Zimbabwe kanokwana kagumi akanwisa zvibodzwa zvitatu. Pamusoro paNkhata, VaSanyamandwe vanoti Dynamos yakatenga zvekare Brett Amidu kubva kuFC Platinum vachiwedzera ivo kuti zviri mumaoko emurairidzi wavo, Lloyd Mutasa, kushandisa kana kuregedza Denver Mukamba uyo akadzoka kubva kuCaps United. Mukamba ane nhoroondo yemisikanzwa. Asi Mutasa anoti hapana mutambi ane nzvimbo muchikwata ichi. Dynamos yaifanira kuve yakadzoka munhandare svondo rapera ichisangana neHighlanders asi mutambo uyu wakamiswa nePSL.. Pari zvino, Dembare iri pachinhanho chegumi nenhatu, mapoinzi mashanu kubva pachikwata chakatarisana nekubuda muPSL cheNichrut icho chine mapoinzi gumi nemanomwe. Mutasa anoseka avo vari kuti chikwata chake chingangobuda mumakwikwi aya. Pari zvino, chikwata cheFC Platinum ndicho chiri kutungamira makundano ePSL nemapoinzi makumi mana nemapfumbamwe, mapoinzi maviri pamusoro peNgezi Platinum Stars. No media source currently available

headline: Raza apinda muTeam of the Tournament
text: MUTAMBI wemaChevrons, Sikandar Raza, akasarudzwa kupinda muchikwata cheUpstox Most Valubale Team of the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup 2022.   Zvichitevera kupera kwakaita mutambo weICC T20 World Cup uyo waitambirwa kuAustralia uye wakazohwinwa neEngland mushure mekukunda Pakistan musi weSvondo wadarika, Raza akadomwa kuve mumwe wevakatamba zvinonwisa mvura kumutambo uyu.   Akapinda muchikwata chakasarudzwa cheTeam of the Tournament chine vamwe vakaita saAlex Hales weEngland, Jos Buttler (England), Virat Kohli (India), Glen Phillips (New Zealand) naShadab Khan (Pakistan).   Muchikwata chemaChevrons chakanokwikwidza kumutambo uyu, Raza mumwe wevatambi vakadadisa izvo zvakaona achiita 216 runs uye ndokutora 10 wickets.   Ichi chiremerera chikuru sezvo zvinorakidza kusimukira kuri kuita mutambo uyu munyika muno zvichitevera kugadzwa kwakaitwa Dave Houghton pachigaro chinopisa chekurairidza maChevrons nguva pfupi yadarika.   Mumutambo uchangopera uyu weT20 World Cup, maCheverons akapedza ari pekupedzisira muboka reGroup B reSuper 12.   Chikwata chenyika ichi chakangokwanisa kuhwina mutambo mumwe chete wePakistan ndokuita mangange neSouth Africa uyo wakazotadziswa kupera nekuda kwemvura yakanaya musi wacho.   Zvakadaro, Zimbabwe yakapihwa chiremerera chekuronga mutambo weICC U19 Men’s World Cup 2026 pamwe chete neNamibia.   Sachigaro weZimbabwe Cricket (ZC), Tavengwa Mukuhlani, anoti sangano ravo riri kunzwa manyukunyuku nechiremerera chikuru chakapihwa nyika ichi.   “Tiri kunzwa kufara kuti mutambo weICC U19 Men’s World Cup 2026 uri kuzotambirwa muZimbabwe.   “Izvi hazvibatsire kungosimukira kwemutambo uyu munyika chete, asi mukana wekurakidza kuti tiri imwe yenyika dzine mukurumbira mukutamba mutambo uyu pasi rese.   “Panosvika 2026, tinenge takagadzirira zvikuru,” anodaro.   Zimbabwe zvekare yakapihwa mukana wekuronga mutambo weICC Men’s World Cup 2027 wevakuru pamwe chete neSouth Africa neNamibia.

headline: Ashton odzoka kuEngland
text: akasayina kondirakiti neSale kuti akwanise kudzoka muchikwata cheEngland zvichitevera kubva kwaakaita kuToulon.   Ange ari makwikwi ekurwira kutenga Ashton kubva paakanwisa hat-trick yemaBarbariasn apo yaitamba neEngland kuTwickengam muna Chivabvu ndokubva ataura chishuvo chake chekukwikwidza kumutambo weWorld Cup gore rinotevera.   Mutemo weEngland uripo iye zvino hautenderi kuti vatambi vanotambira kune dzimwe nyika vashavedzwe kuzotambira chikwata ichi.   Mushure mekunge afungisisa zvakadzama, Ashton — uyo ainge ashanyirwa nakaputeni weEngland anove sahwira wake, Dylan Hartley, paaive pazororo zvichitevera mutambo wemaBarbarians – ndipo paakazivisa Toulon kuti vamusiye achienda.   Pekutanga, chikwata chekuFrance ichi chakarwa zvakasimba kuti chichengetedze mutambi uyu asi hazvina kutadzisa Sale nemaHarlequins kurakidza nechido chekuda kumutenga uye svondo rino ndipo pakazobvuma Toulon kuti imusiye achienda.   Ashton haana hake kutaura zvakawanda pamusoro penyaya yekuda kutambira nyika yake, achiti pari zvino ari kufunga nezvemaSharks chete.   “KuToulon ndakadzidza zvakawanda ndichiwedzera zvimwe zvandakabva nazvo kuSaracens. Kune vatambi vakawanda kuSale Sharks avo vandiri kutarisira kutamba navo munguva inotevera. Handisi kuuya kuzororo.   Ndine rugby yakawada yekutamba yasara mumuviri wangu uye ndinoda kushanda nesimba kuti tidzorere chikwata ichi mukuhwina zvachaiita kumashure mugore ra2006.”  anodaro — SportsMail Rugby

headline: Ozil siyana nazvo: Emery
text: Unai Emery, otsigira Mesut Ozil kuti asaterere mashoko ekumushoropodza ari kubva kuGermany zvichitevera kusendeka kwaakaita kutambira nyika iyi nhabvu, ndokuti ari kumuona achitamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura mwaka unotevera.   Ozil akasendeka kutambira nhabvu Germany svondo rino zvichitevera kunetsana kwakaitika apo akatorwa mufananidzo aine mutungamiri wenyika yeTurkey, Erdogan, nyika yake yakatarisana nekuenda kumutambo weWorld Cup.   Vanoita zvematongerwo enyika kuGermany uye vanyori vemapepanhau vazhinji vakashoropodza izvi ndokubvunza kuti akazvipira chaizvo here kuGermany pakabuda mifananidzo iyi yaOzil uyo anobva kuTurkey.   Svondo rino mutungamiri weBayern Munich, Uli Hoeness, akapomera Ozil mhosva yekutamba nhabvu yemarara kwemakore akawanda ndokuti chikwata chake chaikanganisika matambiro acho nekuda kwake.   Murairidzi mutsva weArsenal — Emery — ange achitarisira zvimwewo zvitsva apo aitaura nevatori venhau kekutanga kuSouth-East Asia asi mibvunzo yaaibvunza yange ingori yaOzil nedanho raakatora.   Shoko range riri rimwe chete rekutsigira Ozil nedanho raakatora. “Idanho remwoyo wake rakatorwa naMesut uye ini ndinorikoshesa. Ndiye anofunga zvaanoona zvakamunakira, akatsanangura kwandiri uye isu kuno tiripo kumubatsira chete,” anodaro. — SportsMail Football

headline: MUCHAFARA: NAKAMBA
text: MUTAMBI wenhabvu wemaWarriors neAston Villa yekuEngland, Marvelous Nakamba anoti shuviro yake kuunza mufaro kuvatsigiri vese venhabvu vemuno nekuhwina mibairo mukuru yenhabvu nenyika yake.   Nakamba akaita mutambi wenhabvu wechishanu wemuZimbabwe kutambira muEngland Premier League achitevera matsimba aBruce Grobbelaar, Peter Ndlovu, Benjani Mwaruwari naBrendan Galloway, uye kutengwa kwaakaitwa neAston Villa matambiro ake aari kuita kurakidza kuti sei Dean Smith murairidzi wake akabhadhara mari inosvika 11 miriyoni paunzi kumuunza kuchikwata ichi achibva kuClub Brugge yekuBelgium.   Achitaura neKwayedza nguva pfupi yadarika muHarare apo ainge auya kuzotambira maWarriors mumutambo wekurwira tikiti rekuenda kumakwishu e2021 Africa Cup of Nations ayo achaitirwa kuCameroon, Nakamba akati rutsigiro rwaari kuona kubva kuvatsigiri vemuno zvichitevera kutengwa kwake neVilla kunonwisa mvura uye acharwa semvumba kuti agounza mufaro kwavari.   “Zvinofadza zvikuru uye zviri kundipa simba kuti ndirambe ndichishanda nesimba nguva nenguva kuti tiunze mufaro kwavari vatsigiri vedu,” akadaro.   Muchikwata chemaWarriors, Nakamba ndiye mumwe wevatambi vechikwata ichi vakuru vanotarisirwa nevamwe vatambi uye aive muchikwata chemaWarriors chaive kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations yakaitwa gore rino kuEgypt uye nechakaenda kuGabon mugore ra2017 chichirairidzwa naKalisto Pasuwa. Iyezvino ari kurwira kuenda kuAfcon yake yechitatu uye makwishu eFIFA World Cup 2022 iyo ichaitirwa kuQatar.   Kubva Nakamba atanga kutamba nhabvu, shasha iyi yakakurira mumhuri yeBantu Rovers umo akabikwa zvakasimba tarenda rake uye mugore ra2012 akaabva aenda kuFrance uko akanotambira chikwata cheNancy icho parizvino chiri kutambira muFrench Ligue 2. Achibva kuNancy akabva aenda kuVitesse yekuNetherlands uko kwaakanyatsogadzira zita rake kwaakatamba kubva mugore ra2012 kusvika mugore ra2017 apo akazobva achienda kuClub Brugge uko aitambira mwaka miviri yadarika.   Ari kuClub Brugge mutambi uyu akahwina mukombe weligi weBelgian First Division Trophy mumwaka wa2017-18 izvo zvakazomuona achitamba mumakwikwi eUEFA Champions league wemwaka wegore ra2018-19 apo chikwata chaksangana nezvimwe zvikwata zvinosanganisira Atletico Madrid.   Achibva kuClub Brugge ndipo paazotengwa neAston Villa mwaka uno uye ndiye mutambi wenhabvu ega kubva muZimbabwe ari kutambira muEngland Premier league.   Achitaura pamusoro pehupenyu hwaari kurarama kuEngland, Nakamba anoti ari kufambirwa zvakanaka uye anoda kuramba achidzidza achisimukira mumutambo uyu wenhabvu.   “KuEngland hupenyu huri kufamba zvakanaka uye ndiri kunzwa manyukunyuku nepandiri saka ndinoda kuramba ndichishanda nesimba ndigosvika kure, shuviro yangu kuti ndirambe ndichisimukira mumutambi uyu uye ndigounza mufaro kuchikwata cheAston Villa nevatsigiri vedu.   “Ini pachangu nditori mutsigiri mukuru weAston Villa nekuti yandandizarurira mukana wekuuya kuzotamba muligi renhabvu hombe pasi rese,” akadaro.   Shasha iyi inoti rutsigiro rwaanopihwa nevabereki vake Anthony naCharity Nakamba runokomborera uye zvinomutuma kuramba achishanda nesimba kuti aunze mufaro kwavari.   “Vabereki vangu ndivo vatsigiri vakuru vangu vakuru uye vanogara vachinditsigira uye pese pandinouya kuzotambira maWarriors vanenge varimo munhandare vachinditsigira saka zvinhu zvakandikoshera zvikuru uye ndozvitenda, ndizvo zvimwe zvacho zvinondituma kuti ndirambe ndichizvisunda ndishande nesimba,” akadaro Nakamba.   Kubva aenda kuAston mutambi uyu akwanisa kutamba mumitambo minonwe yemuEngland Premier league kozoti umwechete weCarabao Cup.   Shasha iyi yaive muchikwata cheVilla icho chakasangana neManchester City, Arsenal uye neLiverpool mitambo iyo anoti achiri kuirangarira zvikuru sezvo aisangana nevatambi vakuru venhabvu pasi rese.   “Iyi imwe yemitambo ndichiri kurangarira zvikuru yandakatamba asi yese yandatamba yakandikoshera zvikuru uye ini chishuvo change kuti ndirambe ndichisimukira mumutambo wangu uye nechikwata changu tienderere mberi munhabvu,” anodaro.   KuAston Villa, Nakamba ari kurairidzwa naDean Smith uye naJohn Terry gamba renhabvu remuEngland iro rakaita mukurumbira achitambira Chelsea Football Club, England neAston Villa.

headline: PSL: Vanhu votaura
text: VATSIGIRI venhabvu vanoti vari kushushikana zvikuru nenyaya dzemhirizhonga dziri kuitika kumitambo yakasiyana izvo zvakazokonzeresa kuti Premier Soccer League itore danho rekumisa mitambo yose yeCastle Premiership.   Svondo radarika kunhandare yeBarbourfields, kuBulawayo pamutambo weDynamos neHighlanders, vatsigiri vakapinda munhandare ndokutanga kubvarura mambure epagedhi pamwe nekuda kudzura mapango acho uye vamwe vachinorwisa varidzi vepembe.   Mutambo uyu wakazomiswa usati wapera apo Bosso yaive yakatungamira 1-0 nekuda kwemhirizhonga iyi.   Izvi zvakaita kuti PSL itore danho rekumisa mitambo yose nemusi weMuvhuro uno.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, mutsigiri mukuru wenhabvu ane mukurumbira munyika, Chris “Romario” Musekiwa anoti danho rakatorwa nePSL rakanaka zvikuru sezvo mhirizhonga yange ichiitwa nevatsgiri vezvikwata zvakasiyana isiri kurakidza chimiro chakanaka chemutambo uyu.    Chris ‘Romario’ Musekiwa   Anoti nhabvu inofanirwa kubatanidza vanhu kwete kuita zvemhirizhonga nekudaro vose vanokonzera kusagadzikana mumutambo uyu vanofanirwa kurangwa maringe nemutemo.   “Danho rakatorwa nePSL takarigamuchira zvikuru nemaoko maviri kuti vambogadzirise nyaya dzemhirizhonga idzo dziri kukanganisa chimiro chenhabvu yedu. Munhabvu, hamuna nzvimbo yemhirizhonga saka isu sevatsigiri tiri kuti bodo mhirizhonga, taramba.   “Vari kuzviita tinoti ngavasungwe nekuti vari kukanganisa chimiro chemutambo wedu izvo zvave kudzinga vakotsveri vanenge vachida kudira mari mumutambo kuti usimukire,” anodaro Romario.   Kuchiti mumwe mutsigiri wenhabvu ane mukurumbira, Adomsi Mukwasi, anotiwo PSL yakanonoka kutora danho iri sezvo mhirizhonga yave nenguva ichiitika.   Anoti zvikwata zvine vatsigiri vari kukonzera mhirizhonga ngazvibhadhariswe muripo unorwadza pamwe nekubvisirwa zvibodzwa.   Izvi, anodaro Mukwasi, zvinopa chidzidzo kune zvimwe zvikwata kuti zvifundise vatsigiri vazvo pamusoro pekuipa kwemhirizhonga munhandare.    Adomsi Mukwasi   “PSL inofanirwa kutobata basa sebasa mukugadzirisa nyaya dzemhirizhonga idzi. Ngaigare pasi nehutungamiri hwevatsigiri vezvikwata zvakasiyana voonesana kuti mhirizhonga yopera sei.   “Nhabvu isati yatanga, ngapaitwe zvirongwa zvekushambadza kuipa kwemhirizhonga, vatsigiri votaurwa navo kuti vasiyane nemhirizhonga uye kuti vaone nhabvu murugare,” anodaro Mukwasi.   Mutauriri weDynamos FC, Tinashe Farawo, anotiwo chikwata chavo chiri kushushikana zvikuru nenyaya yemhirizhonga, kunyanya yakaitika kunhandae yeBabourfields svondo radarika izvo zvakazokonzera kuti mutambo wavo umiswe.   Pachinyorwa icho chakatumirwa paTwitter, Farawo anoti, “Dynamos inosuwiswa zvikuru nenyaya yemhirizhonga yakaitika mumutambo wedu neHighlanders zvikazokonzera kuti mutambo umiswe panzira.   “Chikwata chedu chinoshora zvikuru mhirizhonga yose inoitika kunhandare dzakasiyana.   “SeDynamos, takazvipira mukukurudzira kupedza mhirizhonga munhabvu yedu sezvo ungori mutambo wemhuri uyo unofanirwa kutambwa munzvimbo yakasununguka. Pakupedzisira, tese tiri vanhu vamwe chete, tiri zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe wani tose.”

headline: ‘Tagadzirira kudzoka kwePSL’
text: VARAIRIDZI vezvikwata zvakasiyana zvinokwikwidza muCastle Premier Soccer League (PSL) vanoti vakagadzirira kudzoka kwemitambo iyo iri kutanga nemusi weMugovera svondo rino zvichitevera makore maviri yakambomiswa senzira yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Svondo rino, kuchange kusingadanwe anonzwa kunhandare dziri kumativi mana enyika uko zvikwata zvichatatsurana mumitambo yePSL yekutanga iyo yakapedzisira kutambwa mugore ra2019 apo FC Platinum yakahwina mukombe uyu kechitatu.   Varairidzi vakaita hurukuro neKwayedza svondo rino vanoti vane mufaro mukuru nekudzoka kwemitambo iyi.   Murairidzi wevakomana vatsva muPSL veCranborne Bullets – Nesbert ‘Yabo’ Saruchera – anoti chikwata chake chagadzirira zvakasimba kusangana nezvimwe zvavakabva nazvo kuDivision One. Mumutambo wekutanga, Cranborne Bullets ichasangana neChicken Inn kuLuveve Stadium kuBulawayo.   Yabo anoti mitambo yavange vachitamba yeChibuku Super Cup yakabatsira chaizvo kuumba chikwata chake apo chatarisana nemwaka wacho wekutanga muPSL.   “Yazosvika mitambo yatange takamirira kwenguva ndefu. Takatarisira zvikuru svondo rino apo tichatamba mutambo wedu wekutanga wePSL tichisangana neChicken Inn, maGamecocks. “Zvinhu zvatange takatarisira kwenguva ndefu asi tichikundikana kuzviita nekuda kwedenda reCovid iro range richidzorera mutambo wedu uyu kumashure. Iye zvino tave kutarisira mberi, mutambo wave kutsvuka ropa. Tingave tiri vadiki pazita sezvo tichangopinda muPSL asi tinovimbisa kuti tichatamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura,” anodaro Yabo.   Kuchiti murairidzi weTriangle United – Taurai Mangwiro – anoti kudzoka kwemitambo yePSL kunofadza asi zvakakosha kuti vose vane chekuita nenhabvu varangarire kuti denda reCovid-19 richiriko uye votora matanho ose ekuridzivirira.   “Iyi ndiyo nguva yatange takamirira kubva takaenda palockdown, taingoti nhabvu yedu ichanyatsodzoka rinhi. Iye zvino tine mufaro kuti tave kuchisimudzira mitambo yedu. “Asi zvakakosha kuti tirangarire kuti Covid-19 ichiriko haisati yapera. Saka patinenge tichitamba mitambo yedu titevedzere matanho ose anodiwa ekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri,” anodaro.   Chikwata chaMangwiro mutambo wacho wekutanga wemwaka uno chiri kunanga kuBulawayo uko chichasangana neBulawayo Chiefs. Murairidzi weChicken – Joey ‘Mafero’ Antipas – anoti mwaka wegore rino uchanakidza zvikuru sezvo vatsigiri vange vasuwa nhabvu.   Mafero, uyo chikwata chake cheGamecocks chakaburitswa muquarter-final yeChibuku Super Cup svondo radarika, anoti vachashanda nesimba kuti vagopedza vari pakati pezvikwata zvepamusoro. “Takatarisana nekudzoka kwemitambo yePSL, mutambo wedu mukuru wenhabvu munyika. Mutambo uyu pawange usingatambwe zvange zvichitirwadza, asi zvakakosha nekuti taive pakaoma senyika nekuda kweCovid-19. Isu tiri kutarisira zvikuru kutanga kwemitambo uye tinovimbisa kuti ticharwa semvumba mumitambo yedu tiyedze kusimudza mukombe watakambohwina 2015. Ndinoziva kuti zvakaoma nekuti tinenge tichikwikwidza nezvikwata zvakasimba,” anodaro Mafero.   Zvakadaro, kune mimwe mitambo iriko svondo rino, Dynamos ‘DeMbare’ inenge iri pamusha apo ichasangana neYadah Stars kuchiti vakaomana veBlack Rhinos vachange vari pamusha zvakare vachitatsurana neHighlanders.   FC Platinum iri kutanga mwaka wayo mutsva iri pamusha apo ichasanganawo nevakomana vachangopinda muPSL veTenax.

headline: Argentina neFrance Dzinganzi Dzakatamba Zvakafadza Vanhu Zvakanyana Munhoroondo yeWorld Cup Here?
text: Makundano eWorld Cup Qatar 2022 asvika kumagumo Argentina ichipemberera kutora mukombe wemakwikwi ayo akabuditsa zvishamiso zvakawanda uye anonzi nevamwe fainari yacho yanakidza kudarika dzakamboitika kare. Makundano aya akapera nezuro zita riri kungotaurwa nezvaro riri raLionel Messi. Chirikufadza veruzhinji ndechekuti Messi atora World Cup, mumakundano ake anogona kunge ari ekugumisira sezvo ave nemakore makumi matatu nemashanu ekuberekwa. Messi ange asimudza mikombe yose yakakosha kunze kweweWorld Cup izvo zvafadza vaimbobatira Kambuzuma United VaShepard Saizi. Messi akatungamira Argentina kutora mukombe uyu nekurova France nemapenereti 4-2 mushure mekunge mutambo uyu wapera uri mangange 2-2 munguva yakatarwa uyezve 3-3 mumaminitsi makumi matatu akawedzerwa. Zita raMessi ririkupinda munhoroondo yeWorld Cup pamwechete neraPele weBrazil naDiego Maradona weArgentina sevatambi vakaita mashiripiti anotyisa mumakundano aya. Makundano e2022 World Cup akaunzawo zvishamiso zvakawanda kusanganisira kubuda munharaunda yekutanga kwezvikwata zvine mukurumbira zvakaita seBelgium neGermany izvo zvakazoteverwawo neBrazil neSpain. Kukundwa kwakaitwa Argentina 2-1 neSaudi Arabia uye Japan kurova 2 Germany 1, Morocco ichikunda Belgium 2-0, kuri kupindawo munhoroondo yemakwikwi aya semabudiro akaitawo mitambo zvaive zvisingafungirwe. Vaimbove mubati wepembe muPremier Soccer League VaSam Hamandawana vanoti izvi zvinoratidza kuti nhabvu pasi rese yashanduka. Izvi zvakasimbiswa neMorocco imwe yezvikwata zvishanu zvaive zvakamirira Africa kumakundano aya pamwechete neCameroon, Ghana, Senegal neTunisia. Morocco yakaita chikwata chekutanga kubva muAfrica kusvika musemi fainari yeWorld Cup kubvira makundano aya aparurwa muna 1930. Mukuguma, Morocco yakapedza iri pachinzvimbo chechina ndokupihwa mamirioni makumi maviri nemashanu emadhora kana kuti $25 million neFifa. Maneja wechikwata cheZimbabwe Warriors VaWellington Mpandare vanoti Morocco yasimudza manyuku-nyuku muAfrica. Izvi zvatsinihrwa nnemuongorori wemutambo wenhabvu VaAdvance Katapa. Makundano eWorld Cup anotevera ari kuitwa muna 2026 kuCanada neAmerica uyezve achange ave nezvikwata makumi mana nezvisere kubva pamakumi matatu nemana. Africa ichange iine zvikwata zvipfumbamwe kubva pazvikwata zvishanu. No media source currently available

headline: Highlanders neFC Platinum dzotarisirwa Kupinda muMafinals eChibuku Super Cup
text: Makundano eChibuku Super Cup ar ikupinda musemi fainari apo Highlanders yadongorera mufainari. Chikwata chinotora mukombe weChibuku Super Cup chinobudirira kumiririra nyika mumakwikwi emuAfrica eCaf Confederation Cup Highlanders haisi kuvanza kuti chinangwa chavo ndechekutora mikombe yese mikuru weleaague newe Chibuku Super Cup. Chikwata ichi svondo rino chiri kuswedera pedyo nekuzadzikisa chinangwa chavo apo vari kusangana neNgezi Platinum Stars musemi fainari yeChibuku Super Cup muBabourfields Stadium. Pakambosangana zvikwata zviviri izvi munhandare imwe cheteyo, Ngezi Platinum Stars yakabuda ichizhamba ichiti yaive yabirirwa mushure mekunge Highlanders yapihwa penareti mutambo wave kupera ndokukunda 2-1. Asi ikozvino kuzhamba uku kungangotadza kuitika sezvo Highladers yacho iri kubvira moto. Bosso yakunda mumitambo gumi yavo yakateverana zvekuti pane vakawanda varikuti Ngezi Platinum Stars haisi kumira. Mutori wedu wenhau dzemitambo Michael Kariati anotipa nyaya iyi. VaRichard Musengezi mutsigiri wenhabvu vanoti mutambo uyu uchange wakaoma asi vari kuona Highlanders ichienderera mberi nekukunda kwayo. Asi Highlnders isafunge kuti yakatokunda kare nekuti Ngezi Platinum Stars inozivikanwa nenyaya yekuita zvishamiso. Imwe semi fainari iri kuMandava Stadium mangwana uko FC Platinum irikubandana neHarare City iyo inorairidzwa naMoses Chunga. Pakapedzisira kusangana zvikwata zviviri izvi Kugona Kunenge Kudada yakarohwa 2-1 ndokubviswa pamusoro pegungano reCastle Lager Premier Soccer League zvekuti vane shungu dzekudzorera. Murairidzi wavo Norman Mapeza anoti haasi kutarisa kuti uyu mutambo weligi kana wemukombe. Anoti iye vari kugadzirira mutambo uyu sezvavaingoita imwe yese yavakatamba. Murairidzi wemaSunshine City Boys Moses Chunga anoti mutambo wese wavanotamba vanotarisira kukunda achiti iye zvemutambo we Platinum arikuzvigadzirisa. Vakawanda vasineyi nezvikwata zvirikutamba izvi varikuona kunge fainari ichave pakati peFC Platinum neHighlanders. Fainari yemukombe uyu iriko musi wa 5 Mbudzi.

headline: Shaya, ini naPeter tisu toga: Chunga
text: SHASHA yakambonetsa munhabvu – Moses “Bambo” Chunga – anoti mushakabvu George “Mastermind” Shaya aive shasha uye aiyevedza kuona achitamba mutambo uyu zvekuti hakuna mumwezve ati asvika padanho rake.   Bambo anoti Shaya akasiya amutambidza “chimuti” chekutamba nhabvu iyewo ndokuzotambidza Peter Ndlovu. “Ukaona munhu wasvika pakupihwa zita rekuti Mastermind unenge uri padanho rekumberi kudarika vamwe vose. Mudhara ange ari kuseri kudarika vamwe vose.   “Tarasikirwa zvikuru,” anodaro Chunga.   Anoti pavatambi vose vakatamba nhabvu muZimbabwe, hakuna anosvika panaShaya.                               Peter Ndlovu   Anoti Shaya paakasendeka shangu dzake dzenhabvu, akabva atambidza “chimuti” chehunyanzvi kwaari icho akazopawo kunaPeter Ndlovu.   “Munyika muno pakutamba nhabvu, Shaya ndiye ari pamusoro kotevera ini waakapa chimuti, kuchizoti Peter Ndlovu. Hakuna mumwe ati asvika padanho redu tiri vatatu,” anodaro Bambo.   Anoti mukukura kwake, akadzidza zvakawanda kubva kunaShaya uyo waanoti aive nerudo rukuru.   “Mudhara aive nerudo rukuru. Ndakadzidza zvakawanda kubva kwaari, asi chikuru rudo rwaairatidza kwandiri nevamwe vatambi.      Moses Chunga    “Aida chaizvo kutiona tichisvika kure nemutambo uyu saka aitikurudzira kuti tishande nesimba. Ndakaterera mashoko ake ndikasvika kure nenhabvu,” anodaro Chunga.   Shaya ari kutarisirwa kuvigwa mangwana Muguvoera kumarinda eWarren Hills, muHarare uye Hurumende ndiyo iri kubatsira pakurufu nekuvigwa kwake.

headline: Zimbabwe Yodzoka kuMaOlympics Ari Maoko Chete
text: Team Zimbabwe irikudzoka kumba isina chayakabata kubva kuma 2016 Olympic Games. Vamhanyi vatatu vanga vasara vakaremerwa nerwendo mushure mekutadza kupinda kana pavamhanyi gumi vekutanga mumwe wavo akatadza kupedza nzendo yemarathon. Partson Ndlovu akapedza ari pachinhanho chemakumi mana nemumwe, achiteverwa naCuthbert Nyasango uyo aive pachinzvimbo chemakumi mashanu nemasere. Wirimai Juwao akatadza kupedza mujawo uhu. Apo Ndlovu ari kudzokera kuAmerica uko anogara, Nyasango naJuwao vakananga kumba kuzosangana nevamwe vatambi gumi vaive kuma Olympics pamwe nemaMighty Warriors avo vakakundikanawo kuwana menduru zvikuru pamwedzi uyo kwaive nemakundano aya. Kunyange hazvo Kirsty Coventry akasvika mufainari yemakwikwi ake, vamwe vese vakarohwa munharaunda yekutanga zvinoratidza kuti ramangwana remitambo reZimbabwe rine rima. Zvakamira zvakadai. Shasha yakabuda zvine mutsinde pama Olympic Games ndi Usain Bolt wekuJamaiaca uyo akatora menduru nhatu dzegoridhe mu100 metres, 200 metres pamwe ne 4 x 100 metres. Aya ave maOlympics matatu akateverana Bolt achitora menduru nhatu pamakundano ega ega. Asi mutinhwini wekuAmerica, Michael Phelps akapinda munhoroondo semutambi akatora menduru dzakawanda mumakwikwi emaOlympics. Totarisa nyaya dzenhabvu. Vatsigiri veDynamos vakave nemufaro neSvondo apo chikwata chavo chakatamba zvinodaadza ndokurova Harare City 2-1. Dembare yaifanira kuve yakabuda nezvibodzwa zvakawandisa dai yakashandisa mikana yavakawana. Pakapera nhabvu, nyaya dzaitaurwa ndedzematambiro aive aita chikwata kwete kuti murairidzi ngaeende serwange rwave rwiyo mazuva apera. Murairidzi weDynamos Lloyd Mutasa anoti ari kufara zvikuru nekukunda kwavakaita asi achiwedzera kuti vane mutoro wakaoma kumberi. Anoti vakomana vake vese vanga vaine shungu dzekuda kukunda ndosaka izvi zvaitika. Harare City iri kuti svondo rino ikakunda, svondo rinouya yokundwa, izvo zvisikufadza vatsigiri vavo. Asi caputeni wevatambi Arnold Chivheya anoti zvinowanikwa munhabvu achiti iye varikuyedza kuzvigadzirisa. Kukunda kwakaita Dynamos kwaauya panguva inofadza zviuru apo vavakidzani vavo veCaps United vakarohwa 3-1 neBulawayo City. Hapana aitarisira kuti izvi zvichaitika asi zvasiya maGreen Machine ave nemapoinzi mashanu pasi peFC Platinum iyo yakafamba zvakanaka kuTriangle uko vakanokunda 2-1. Highlanders irikuramba ichirohwa asi ikozvino yakadamburwa 1-0 neZPC Kariba kuNyanhunga. Asi Bosso iri kuramba iri pachinhanho chechitatu, poindi imwe chete pamusoro peDynamos. Mimwe mitambo yakapera seizvi.. Chicken Inn 1 Tsholotsho 0 Mutare City 2 Hwange 1 How Mine 1 Chapungu 1 Borders Striker 2 Ngezi Platinum 0  Kwapera mitambo makumi maviri, zvikwata zvina zviri pamusoro soro ndeizvi.. FC Platinum 42 points Caps United 37 points Highlanders 32 points. Dynamos 31 points.  Zvina zviri pasi pasi ndeizvi….  Hwange 24 points Mutare City 18 points Tsholotsho 13 points Border Strikers 13 points. No media source currently available
